question: How do I make a lemon herb baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Easy Herbed Grilled Salmon
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. salmon filet
1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/2 lemon
2 Tbsp. white wine
1/2 tsp. salt (optional)
1/2 tsp. onion powder
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. lemon pepper
1 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. dill weed
1/2 tsp. parsley flakes
1/4 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Preheat grill. Make a tray out of heavy-duty foil by folding a long piece in half and folding up all 4 sides with the dull side up. Spray the bottom of the foil tray with cooking spray. Place fish filet in the tray, skin side down. Smear a thin line of butter on filet. Squeeze lemon juice liberally over filet and then a splash of white wine. Sprinkle remaining seasonings lightly over filet and transfer the foil tray to the hot grill. Cover. Cook for 10 minutes per inch of thickness of filet. DO NOT overcook or it will be dry and unpalatable. Turning is not necessary. Salmon is done when it turns a light pink color throughout.

question: How do I make a lemon herb baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Lemon Grilled Salmon
Ingredients:
2 tsp. snipped fresh dill or 1/2 tsp. dill weed
1/2 tsp. lemon-pepper seasoning
1/2 tsp. salt (optional)
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 salmon fillet (1 1/2 lb.)
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
3 Tbsp. chicken broth
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/2 Tbsp. soy sauce
3 Tbsp. chopped green onions (can substitute regular)
1 small lemon, thinly sliced
2 onion slices, separated into rings
Directions:
In a small bowl, mix together dill, lemon-pepper, salt and garlic powder.
Sprinkle on salmon.
Place in a large resealable plastic bag or shallow glass container.
Combine brown sugar, broth, oil, soy sauce and green onions.
Pour over the salmon. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Turn once.

question: How do I make a lemon herb baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Pacific Salmon With Roasted Garlic
Ingredients:
4 (6 oz.) salmon fillets
1 medium head garlic
1/4 c. olive oil
1 1/2 Tbsp. butter
1 fresh lemon
fresh rosemary, chopped
Directions:
Separate garlic into cloves and peel. Place in small ramekin and cover with olive oil. Wrap with foil. Bake at 400° for 30 minutes. Place garlic and 1 tablespoon of oil from baked garlic in food processor. Add butter and puree; season with salt and fresh ground pepper.

question: How do I make a lemon herb baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Herbed Salmon Steaks
Ingredients:
3 (12 oz. each) pkg. frozen salmon steaks
1/4 c. lemon juice
2 tsp. marjoram leaves
2 tsp. onion salt
Directions:
Place frozen fish in greased casserole.
Mix lemon juice, marjoram leaves and onion salt.
Spoon on fish and bake at 450° for 45 minutes.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make a lemon herb baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Herb Roasted Orange Salmon
Ingredients:
1/4 c. orange juice
2 Tbsp. olive oil
grated zest of 1 orange
2 tsp. minced garlic
2 tsp. dried tarragon
salt and coarsely ground black pepper to taste
4 salmon fillets
2 tsp. freshly snipped chives
Directions:
Mix together the orange juice, olive oil, orange zest, garlic, tarragon, salt and pepper.
Add salmon and let set 1 hour, turning over every 10 to 15 minutes.
Preheat oven to 475°.
Place salmon, skin side down, on baking sheet.
Pour marinade over top.
Bake 7 to 8 minutes or until salmon is just cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.

question: How do I make homemade hummus?
answer:
Title: Homemade Hummus
Ingredients:
2 c. dried garbanzo beans
1 onion, chopped
3 Tbsp. Frontier brand Mexican seasoning mix (or cumin, turmeric, chilies, onion powder, paprika, oregano and cayenne pepper)
6 cloves garlic, crushed
juice of 1/2 lemon
3 Tbsp. mellow white miso
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
2/3 c. raw sesame tahini
Directions:
Soak beans in 6 cups water overnight, then rinse well.
Drain. Place beans in crock-pot (high) for 10 to 12 hours until quite soft.
Cook also with 3 cloves of the garlic, 5 cups of water, onion and Mexican seasoning mix.
When done, place beans in food processor (use a slotted spoon so most of broth is left in crock-pot).
Blend with lemon, remaining 3 cloves garlic, white miso, olive oil, cayenne and tahini.
Add more broth little by little as needed to make a smooth paste.
You can find miso and tahini at health food markets.
This makes great sandwiches with mayo, avocado, sprouts and grated carrots.

question: How do I make homemade hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
3 c. chickpeas (dried)
chickpea water
1 c. tahini
1/2 c. olive oil
1 Tbsp. salt
3 Tbsp. minced fresh garlic
Directions:
Cook chickpeas in enough water to keep covered.
Cook for approximately 1 to 1 1/2 hours.
Taste peas from time to time until done.
Save water when done.
In a food processor, add the ingredients in "batches."
Add chickpea water to keep it smooth (a thicker than pudding look).
Mix batches in a bowl with a wooden spoon.
Serve on a plate with olive oil drizzled on it, also with pita wedges and veggies.

question: How do I make homemade hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
2/3 c. white sesame seed
3/4 oz. garlic
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/4 c. lemon juice
19 oz. can garbanzo beans
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. cumin
1 tsp. sugar
water (as needed)
pinch of cayenne (as needed)
1/2 c. chopped fresh parsley (as needed)
Directions:
Process sesame seed several minutes until consistency of coarse peanut butter.
Add garlic cloves, their oil and lemon juice. Blend, then add drained garbanzos.
Add salt, cumin and sugar, then process until smooth.
Add very little water for sandwich spread, a bit more for dip.
Add a dash of cayenne pepper, if you like heat. Before serving, add chopped parsley for color and flavor.

question: How do I make homemade hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
1 2/3 c. (15 oz. can) cooked chickpeas, drained, reserve liquid
1/4 c. tahini (sesame paste)
1/4 c. lemon juice
3 large cloves garlic, crushed
1/2 tsp. ground coriander
1/4 tsp. cumin
1/4 tsp. paprika
water if needed
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
1/4 c. scallions
dash of cayenne
Directions:
In blender (in batches) or in food processor, process chickpeas, tahini and lemon juice until mixture reaches consistency of coarse paste; use as much of reserved pea liquid or water as needed.
Add garlic, coriander, cumin, paprika and cayenne and process again.
Transfer to a bowl and add scallions. Cover and chill one hour before serving the dip.
Add parsley as garnish.

question: How do I make homemade hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
1 c. Tahini
1 c. lemon juice
3 c. boiled chickpeas
1 c. olive oil
1/2 c. finely chopped parsley
5 cloves crushed garlic
1/2 tsp. red pepper
1/2 Tbsp. salt
Directions:
Mix Tahini, pepper, salt and garlic in blender for about 3 minutes.
Press chickpeas through sieve and add to blender.
Mix to thick paste.
Alternately add small quantities of oil and lemon juice.
When finished, place in small bowls.
Garnish with black olives and parsley.
Serve with wedges of Lebanese bread.

question: What can I make with polenta and mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Business
Ingredients:
1/2 to 1 lb. fresh mushrooms
8 slices white bread
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
2 eggs
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 c. milk
1 can mushroom soup
1/4 c. grated yellow cheese
butter
1/2 c. mayonnaise
Directions:
Clean and slice mushrooms.
Saute in butter until slightly cooked.
Butter 3 slices of bread.
Trim crusts and cut into 1-inch squares.
Put in a 9 x 13-inch casserole dish.

question: What can I make with polenta and mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Baked Polenta
Ingredients:
1 1/2 to 2 lb. chopped tomatoes
1 Tbsp. olive oil
bay leaf
2 basil leaves
2 branches fresh parsley
1/2 small onion, diced
1 clove garlic, chopped
salt and pepper
1 1/2 c. coarse cornmeal
8 oz. Fontina cheese, thinly sliced
5 oz. Gorgonzola cheese
Directions:
Tomato Sauce:
Combine the olive oil, bay leaf, basil, parsley, onion and garlic.
Cook slowly for 3 to 4 minutes.
Add tomatoes. Raise heat to medium-high and cook until tomatoes are heated through.
Remove the bay leaf and blend the mixture.
Put the sauce back in pan with bay leaf and simmer until thick.
Add salt and pepper.

question: What can I make with polenta and mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Polenta(Microwave)
Ingredients:
1 c. cornmeal
1 c. cold water
1 tsp. salt
3 c. boiling water (or more)
Directions:
Mix together until smooth in a large microwave-safe bowl.
Add 3 cups boiling water; stir well.
Cover with Saran wrap and microwave on High for 7 to 10 minutes.
Remove; stir well.
If too thick, more water may be added.
Put back into microwave for 7 to 10 more minutes on High.
This is done in 15 to 20 minutes. Serves 4 to 6.

question: What can I make with polenta and mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. mushrooms (white)
1 can Carnation milk
1 stick butter
1/2 c. flour
pinch of garlic powder
salt and white pepper
Directions:
Wash and slice mushrooms; set aside.
Melt butter over low heat, then add mushrooms, sauteing them until they are slightly brown.
Add flour; stir as you add, then slowly pour in canned milk.
Stir until you get the consistency you like.
Add garlic powder, salt and pepper.
Makes a great sauce over veggies, pasta, chicken or fish.

question: What can I make with polenta and mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Layered Mushrooms And Eggs
Ingredients:
1 can (about 10 3/4 oz.) condensed cream of mushroom soup (undiluted)
3 Tbsp. dry sherry or milk
1 1/2 c. (6 oz.) each shredded sharp Cheddar cheese and Jack cheese
18 eggs
2 Tbsp. milk
1 tsp. parsley flakes
1/2 tsp. dill weed
1/8 tsp. pepper
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/4 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1/4 c. chopped green onion
paprika
Directions:
In a pan over medium heat, stir soup and sherry until hot and smooth.
Remove from heat; set aside.
In a small bowl, toss cheeses lightly to mix; set aside.
Beat together eggs, milk, parsley, dill weed and pepper; set aside.

question: I want a recipe for chicken made on the stove.
answer:
Title: Chicken In A Pot
Ingredients:
1 (5 lb.) or 2 (3 lb.) roasting chickens
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. white wine
1/2 c. chicken broth
2 tsp. salt
12 small new potatoes, unpeeled
18 baby carrots
18 small white onions
12 medium mushrooms, halved
1/4 tsp. rosemary
1/2 c. chopped celery leaves
6 stalks celery, sliced
Directions:
Truss chicken.
Melt butter in large skillet and brown chicken slowly (about 30 minutes).
Transfer chicken to a large pot.
Pour wine, broth and salt into skillet and bring to a boil.
Stir to get all brown bits.
Pour this over chicken.
Cover and cook over medium heat for 45 minutes.
Remove chicken.
Add vegetables in layers:
first potatoes, second carrots, third celery, then onions and mushrooms.
Sprinkle with rosemary and celery leaves.
Place chicken on top of vegetables, cover and cook for 45 minutes more. Cut up the chicken and arrange with vegetables on platter.
Fill gravy boat with remaining juices.

question: I want a recipe for chicken made on the stove.
answer:
Title: A Fast Made Meal
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped chicken, ham or turkey
1 box Stove Top stuffing
1 can cream of chicken soup
small amount milk
Directions:
Add small amount of milk into soup.
Mix all together and cook in oven 10 minutes at 350°.

question: I want a recipe for chicken made on the stove.
answer:
Title: Barbecue Chicken In A Sack
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. catsup
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
4 Tbsp. water
3 Tbsp. brown sugar
2 Tbsp. vinegar
2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 Tbsp. butter
1/2 tsp. red pepper
2 tsp. dry mustard
2 tsp. paprika
2 tsp. salt
2 tsp. chili powder
2 frying size chickens, cut up into pieces
Directions:
Mix all ingredients except chicken and heat.
Salt and flour chicken pieces.
Then dip in sauce that has been heated.
When saturated, place in a well-greased paper grocery bag.
Twist bag closed.
Place on broiler pan.
Cook 15 minutes at 450°, then lower to 250° for 1 hour or until tender.

question: I want a recipe for chicken made on the stove.
answer:
Title: Jambalaya(Stove Top Recipe)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. cooking oil
1 hen, cut up (4 to 5 lb.)
1 tsp. black pepper
3 medium onions, chopped (1 to 1 1/2 lb.)
1 tsp. garlic powder
8 c. water
2 Tbsp. salt
1 more tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. m.s.g. (Accent; optional)
1 more tsp. black pepper
1/4 tsp. ground red pepper
1 tsp. Tabasco sauce or 1 Tbsp. Cajun Chef
4 c. long grain rice
Directions:
Use a 5-quart black iron pot.
Pour oil in pot.
Season hen with black pepper.
Brown hen over high heat.
Reduce to medium-high when oil clears.
Continue browning until meat is brown and pot has a layer of brown on it.
Add onions and the first teaspoon of garlic powder.
Saute over low heat until onions are clear.
Add water.
Stir and bring mixture to a full boil.
Turn fire off and allow oil to rise.
Skim off as much oil as possible without skimming gravy.
Add rest of seasonings and bring to a full boil again.
Adjust seasonings to taste.
All should be a little in excess to allow for the rice.
Add rice.
Bring to a relatively vigorous boil, stirring to prevent sticking.
Reduce heat to lowest setting.
Cover and allow to cook 10 minutes.
Remove lid and stir mixture allowing liquid to go down into rice.
Replace the lid and cook for 20 minutes more.
Remove lid and serve.
Serves 8 adults.

question: I want a recipe for chicken made on the stove.
answer:
Title: Stove Top Chicken Stew
Ingredients:
4 boneless chicken breasts
2 c. quartered potatoes
1 c. sliced carrots
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1 can cream of chicken soup
1/4 can water
1/4 tsp. poultry seasoning
Directions:
Wash chicken and place in heavy fryer; cover with vegetables. Mix soup with water and pour over vegetables.
Add seasoning. Cover and simmer until chicken and vegetables are tender, approximately 35 to 45 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a no-knead bread?
answer:
Title: Easy No-Knead Bread(Very Good)
Ingredients:
2 c. unbleached or all-purpose flour
1/4 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. salt
2 pkg. active dry yeast
1 egg
1 c. water
1/4 c. cooking oil
1 c. milk
Directions:
(Generously use cooking spray at the bottom of your baking pan.)

question: What’s a good recipe for a no-knead bread?
answer:
Title: Easy "No Knead" Yeast Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. milk
3 Tbsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. salt
1 1/2 Tbsp. oil
4 1/2 c. flour
1 c. warm water
2 pkg. yeast
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in cup of warm water; set aside.
Scald milk, sugar, salt and oil.
Let cool.
Mix yeast mixture and cooled milk mixture.
Stir in flour until well mixed.
Cover, let rise double in bowl, about 45 minutes.
After rising, stir dough a half minute.
Place dough in greased 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Cover, let rise double in size, 1 hour.
Bake at 400° for 25 to 30 minutes. Brush with oleo.
Makes 1 loaf.

question: What’s a good recipe for a no-knead bread?
answer:
Title: No Knead Bread
Ingredients:
2 pkg. dry yeast
1 tsp. salt
1/3 c. sugar
2 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 c. cooking oil
1 c. milk
1 c. water
1 egg
Directions:
Combine dry ingredients in large mixer bowl.
Set aside.
In saucepan, over low heat, combine oil, milk and water.
Heat until temperature reaches 120° to 130°.
Combine dry ingredients with the liquids, add egg.
Blend at low mixer speed until moistened.
Beat three minutes at medium speed.
By hand, stir in another 2 or 2 1/2 cups of flour to form a stiff batter.
(Batter will follow spoon.) Cover batter with damp cloth; let rise in warm place (80° to 85°) until light and doubled, about 50 minutes.
Stir down batter, spoon into greased two 8 x 4-inch loaf pans, batter does not rise a second time before baking.
Immediately place in oven.
Bake at 375° for 30 to 35 minutes.
Cool on rack.
Brush with melted butter.

question: What’s a good recipe for a no-knead bread?
answer:
Title: No-Knead Bread
Ingredients:
3 pkg. dry yeast
2 eggs
10 c. flour
4 tsp. salt
3 3/4 c. warm water
6 Tbsp. soft margarine
6 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Dissolve dry yeast in warm water; add remaining ingredients one by one.
Mix by hand until moist.
Seal in Tupperware fix-n-mix bowl until seal pops off.
Divide into 4 loaves.
Cover with towel and let rise 1/2 hour.
Bake at 350° for 1/2 hour.

question: What’s a good recipe for a no-knead bread?
answer:
Title: No Knead Bread
Ingredients:
3/4 c. boiling water
1 Tbsp. oleo
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1 egg
1 pkg. dry yeast or 1 yeast cake
1/4 c. lukewarm water
3 1/2 c. flour
3 Tbsp. nonfat dry milk
Directions:
Place first 3 ingredients in a large bowl and let cool to lukewarm.
Beat egg slightly and stir in.
Sprinkle yeast into 1/4 cup warm water and stir until dissolved.
Add to egg mixture.
Sift flour, measure and lightly stir in dry milk.
Add 1/3 of dry ingredients into yeast mixture at one at a time and beat after each addition until smooth.
Cover with moist cloth and let rise to almost double.
Punch down and place in greased 9 x 5 loaf bread pan.
Let rise slightly and bake in a 375° oven for about 45 minutes or until golden.
Take out of pan immediately to cool. Makes 1 loaf.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 stick butter
1 pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 pkg. grated parmesan cheese
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a microwavable bowl.
Microwave on high, stirring frequently, until mixture is smooth.
Serve with raw vegetables, bread or chips.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) frozen chopped spinach
1/2 c. chopped fresh parsley
1 c. mayonnaise
1 tsp. white pepper
1/2 tsp. dill weed
1/8 tsp. Tabasco sauce
1/2 c. chopped onion
2 (3 oz.) softened cream cheese
1 c. sour cream
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1 Tbsp. freshly squeezed lemon juice
Directions:
Thaw and squeeze all moisture from spinach.
Place in food processor.
Add remaining ingredients and process until well blended.
Refrigerate for 6 hours or overnight to blend seasonings.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Spinach Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
3/4 c. chopped onion
1 to 3 chopped garlic pieces
6 c. chicken broth (or bouillon)
8 oz. egg noodles
salt
paprika
croutons
6 c. milk
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach, chopped, thawed and drained
1/2 lb. Fontina cheese, shredded
1/2 lb. Provolone cheese, shredded
Directions:
Heat oil in large saucepan.
Add onions and garlic.
Saute 5 minutes.
Add chicken broth.
Heat to boil.
Add noodles and salt. Cook 6 minutes.
Stir in milk, spinach and cheese.
Cook until cheese melts.
Do not boil.
Sprinkle with croutons and paprika. (Can substitute broccoli or/add American, Cheddar cheeses.)

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Potato Bake
Ingredients:
6 medium potatoes
2 pkg. chopped spinach
1 1/2 c. sharp Cheddar cheese, grated
2 medium onions, chopped
1/2 c. heavy cream
1 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. thyme
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Peel potatoes and cut into thin strips (julienne).
Place layer of potatoes in greased baking dish.
Saute chopped onion until tender (not browned).
Layer onion over potatoes.
Drain spinach and press out most of liquid.
Layer spinach over onions. Layer half of cheese.
Add layer of potatoes.
Add remaining cheese.
Pour cream with thyme and nutmeg mixed in.
Drizzle over casserole and bake in 350° oven for 1 hour.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1 pkg. vegetable soup/dip mix
1 c. sour cream
1 c. mayonnaise
10 oz. frozen chopped spinach
3 small green scallions, finely chopped
Directions:
Thaw frozen spinach.
Rinse, drain and squeeze out excess juice.
Mix all ingredients in a medium bowl and chill for 2 hours.
Serve in hollowed out round bread (such as rye/pumpernickel) with scooped out bread, cut into chunks.
I sometimes put a small bowl in the center of the bread and put the dip in the bowl.
This way the rest of the bread can be later broken up to use with the dip.

question: What’s a recipe for roasted eggplant dip (Baba Ganoush)?
answer:
Title: Baba Ganoush(From "Wings Of Life" Cookbook)
Ingredients:
1 medium eggplant
4 or 5 cloves garlic, mashed
1 tsp. sea salt
1/2 c. tahini
juice of 1 lemon
1/2 c. finely minced fresh parsley
sprinkle cayenne pepper
Directions:
Prick the whole unpeeled eggplant in a few places with a fork, place it on a baking sheet and broil it about 4 inches from the heat in the oven.
Turn it to cook on all sides, until the eggplant is completely collapsed.
This takes about 20 minutes. When the eggplant is cool enough to handle, peel off the charred skin.
Beat the pulp with a fork until it is smooth or puree in blender.
In a separate bowl, mix garlic and salt.
Stir in the tahini.
With a wooden spoon, beat in the lemon juice.
Beat the tahini mixture into the eggplant a little at a time.
The mixture should whip up nicely and turn a lighter color.
Add the fresh parsley and cayenne pepper.

question: What’s a recipe for roasted eggplant dip (Baba Ganoush)?
answer:
Title: Baba Ghamouj(Eggplant Dip)
Ingredients:
1 medium eggplant
3 Tbsp. tahini (sesame extract; can be purchased from health food stores)
juice of 2 lemons
2 cloves garlic, minced
salt to taste
2 Tbsp. water
2 Tbsp. red bell pepper, chopped fine
Directions:
Broil eggplant with skin on, turning it frequently.
Or, you may cook eggplant in microwave for 6 minutes.
(Ensure the use of fork to make small holes in eggplant before it is placed in microwave.)
When cool, remove skin and mash like a potato.
Mix other ingredients; add to eggplant and blend well. Garnish with parsley and olive oil.
Serve with pita bread.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: What’s a recipe for roasted eggplant dip (Baba Ganoush)?
answer:
Title: Baba Ghanouj(Eggplant Puree)
Ingredients:
2 unpeeled eggplant (medium size)
2 cloves garlic
1/4 c. Tahini
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of paprika
Directions:
Place eggplant in a baking pan and bake in oven at 375° for about 30 minutes.
Remove eggplant and let cool; split open and scoop out pulp; set aside.

question: What’s a recipe for roasted eggplant dip (Baba Ganoush)?
answer:
Title: Baba Ghanoush
Ingredients:
1 recipe Eggplant Dip (without yogurt)
1/2 recipe Tahini
Directions:
Mix Eggplant Dip with Tahini Dip.
Presto, you have a third dip.

question: What’s a recipe for roasted eggplant dip (Baba Ganoush)?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Appetizer(Baba Ghannuj)
Ingredients:
1 large eggplant
1 clove garlic
2 Tbsp. water
1/4 c. sesame seed paste (tahini)
olive oil
1 tsp. salt
1/4 c. lemon juice
parsley (for decoration)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°.
Wash and remove stem of eggplant. Pierce with a fork about 5 times.
Place in a baking dish.
Bake for 45 minutes or until tender.
Remove from oven and run under cold water.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
3/4 c. salad oil
3 Tbsp. lime or lemon juice
1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. finely chopped green onions
1 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. coarse black pepper
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a covered jar and shake thoroughly. Chill.
Shake again before using.
Makes 1 1/2 cups dressing. Pour over broken romaine lettuce leaves and add croutons and anchovies if you like.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
1 clove garlic
1/2 c. salad oil
1 c. croutons
dash of salt
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. ground pepper
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. Worcestershire
6 anchovy fillets (can use anchovy paste)
1 egg
1 head romaine lettuce
1/4 c. crumbled Blue cheese
2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Crush garlic and combine with oil. Refrigerate for 1 hour. Add to this, salt, mustard, pepper, Worcestershire, lemon and anchovies.
Refrigerate. Boil egg.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
1 qt. mayonnaise
6 eggs
1 tsp. curry powder
1 1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 tsp. anchovy paste
1/2 c. lemon juice
parsley
Directions:
Blend eggs in blender; add anchovy paste.
Add rest of ingredients except mayonnaise and lemon juice.
Blend well. Empty mayonnaise in large mixing bowl.
Pour contents of blender over mayonnaise and mix by hand.
Add lemon juice and parsley. Chill.
Keep in refrigerator 4 to 6 weeks.
Serve with croutons.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
3/4 c. salad oil (canola, olive or vegetable)
3 Tbsp. lime or lemon juice
1/3 c. Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. chopped green onions
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Shake in a jar and serve immediately!

question: What’s a recipe for a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
1/3 c. oil
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. mustard
1/2 clove garlic (let stand in dressing 2 hours and remove)
1 beaten raw egg
4 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
1 c. bread crumbs
Directions:
Serve all but bread crumbs over your greens.
Then you sprinkle your salad with bread crumbs, broiled in garlic oil.

question: How do I make a light lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Lemon Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1/4 c. fresh lemon juice
2 large cloves garlic, coarsely chopped
1/2 c. olive oil
1/2 c. fresh grated Parmesan
Directions:
Puree lemon juice and garlic in food processor.
With machine running, gradually add olive oil and blend until smooth.
Add Parmesan cheese, blend until thickened.
Season with salt and pepper.

question: How do I make a light lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Creamy Vinaigrette Dressing
Ingredients:
1/2 c. oil
1/2 c. half and half
1 egg, lightly beaten
1 clove garlic, minced
5 Tbsp. tarragon vinegar
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. white pepper
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. sugar
juice of 1 1/2 lemons
Directions:
Whisk together and refrigerate for 2 hours.

question: How do I make a light lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Layered Vegetable Vinaigrette(Serves 8. Preparation :20.  Stand 1:00.  Total 1:20.)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. vinegar
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. Dijon mustard
fresh ground black pepper (to taste)
4 carrots
1 lb. green beans
2 tomatoes
2 cucumbers
1/4 lb. mushrooms
Directions:
Mix dressing (first 4 ingredients) in a jar. Shake well. Scrub or peel carrots and slice into rounds. Steam green beans for 5 minutes; drain. Slice tomatoes, cucumbers and mushrooms into slices. Layer vegetables in a serving dish and top with dressing. Refrigerate 1 hour or more before serving.

question: How do I make a light lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Light Blue Cheese Vinaigrette Dressing
Ingredients:
1/4 c. water
2 Tbsp. white vinegar
2 tsp. Dijon mustard
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/3 c. crumbled Blue cheese
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. dried oregano
1/2 tsp. ground pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a jar.
Cover tightly and shake vigorously.
Chill thoroughly.

question: How do I make a light lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Vinaigrette (Basic)
Ingredients:
1 tsp. Dijon mustard
scant 1/2 tsp. salt
5 twists of peppermill
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
scant tsp. fresh lemon juice
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/4 c. olive oil
Directions:
Put mustard in the bottom of a salad bowl.
Stir the first 5 ingredients, whisking constantly.
Add vegetable oil and olive oil in a very thin stream.
Makes 6 tablespoons of vinaigrette, enough for 10 to 12 cups of salad greens.
Use shortly after it is made. Add whatever you like, garlic, anchovies, shallots, sliced mushrooms, chopped capers, etc.
May be used on grilled fish or cold roast beef (add horseradish) or chicken.

question: How do I make garlic mashed potatoes with rosemary?
answer:
Title: Potatoes With Rosemary
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. light olive oil
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 1/2 lb. new potatoes, scrubbed and cut in 1-inch pieces
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 1/4 tsp. fresh rosemary, crumbled
Directions:
Heat olive oil and minced garlic in 10-inch heavy skillet over low heat until garlic starts to sizzle, about 10 minutes. Add potatoes.
Sprinkle with 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper and tiny pinch rosemary; toss to coat.
Increase heat to medium and cook, covered, until potatoes are tender when pierced, about 15 minutes.
Uncover skillet.
Increase heat to high and cook, stirring frequently, until well browned, 3 to 4 minutes. Sprinkle with remaining rosemary and additional salt and pepper. Any leftovers make ideal additions to beef or turkey hash.

question: How do I make garlic mashed potatoes with rosemary?
answer:
Title: Roasted Garlic Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 medium potatoes (about 2 lb.)
6 unpeeled garlic cloves
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 tsp. chopped fresh or 1/4 tsp. dried rosemary leaves
1/2 tsp. salt
1/3 to 1/2 c. low-fat milk
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°. Scrub the potatoes; pierce with fork to allow steam to escape. Wrap garlic cloves in aluminum foil.
Bake potatoes and garlic 1 hour or until potatoes are soft.
Heat oil and rosemary over medium heat 2 to 3 minutes or until rosemary is fragrant.
Cut potatoes in half; carefully spoon potatoes into large bowl. Save skins for another use or discard.
Slip skins off cloves of garlic; discard skins.
Add garlic, oil mixture and salt to potatoes.
Mash until fluffy, adding milk until desired consistency.
Makes 6 servings.

question: How do I make garlic mashed potatoes with rosemary?
answer:
Title: Potatoes Rosemary
Ingredients:
1 med onion, thinly sliced
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. grated lemon rind
1/4 cup bread crumbs
1 Tbsp. butter, melted
2 cloves garlic, minced
4 cups potatoes, peeled and diced
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1 cup shredded cheddar cheese (4 ozs.)
2 tsp. fresh or 1 tsp. dried Rosemary
Directions:
Saute onions and garlic until tender.
Stir in potatoes, seasoned salt, pepper and lemon rind.
Spoon half of mixture in lightly greased 1-1/2 qt.
baking dish.
Sprinkle half of the cheese.
Repeat with remaining potato mixture and cheese.
Stir together bread crumbs, butter and Rosemary.
Sprinkle over top. Bake covered at 400 degrees for 40 minutes.
Uncover and bake another 20 minutes or until potatoes are tender.

question: How do I make garlic mashed potatoes with rosemary?
answer:
Title: Herbed Garlic Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. potatoes
1/4 c. butter
1 small onion, minced
2 cloves garlic, slivered
3/4 c. milk
2 tsp. dried basil
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
In large pot, boil potatoes.
Drain.
In same pot, melt 2 tablespoons butter.
Add onion and garlic.
Cook until golden, stirring frequently.
Remove pot from heat and add potatoes, remaining 2 tablespoons butter, milk, basil, salt and pepper. Using an electric beater or potato masher, beat mixture until smooth.

question: How do I make garlic mashed potatoes with rosemary?
answer:
Title: Roasted Garlic Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 whole garlic heads
1 Tbsp. olive or vegetable oil
6 medium baking potatoes, peeled and cubed
1 cup plus 2 tablespoons milk
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 Tbsp. minced fresh rosemary or 1 tsp. dried rosemary, crushed
1 tsp. salt
1-1/2 cubes of unsalted butter
1 pinch cayenne pepper (to taste)
1/2 tsp black pepper
1/4 tsp liquid smoke
Fresh squeezed juice of one lime
1 bunch fresh tarragon leaves, cleaned, stems removed
1/4 cup half and half, cream or cream fraiche
Directions:
Set corn out to thaw for at least 2 hours.
Melt butter under medium heat (do not brown) in large skillet or frying pan.
Add cayenne, black pepper and liquid smoke.
Add corn and grill on high heat until corn is sweet and slightly tender (it is important for the corn to taste young, not overcooked like cream corn).
Add lime juice, tarragon and cream.
Stir for an additional 2 minutes.
Turn off heat and serve.

question: How can I make a quick ramen noodle dish?
answer:
Title: Ramen Noodle Salad
Ingredients:
4 pkg. Ramen noodles (chicken flavor)
1 onion, chopped
1 carrot, grated
4 Tbsp. mayonnaise
black olives, sliced (optional)
other veggies (optional)
Directions:
Cook noodles.
Drain.
Run cold water until noodles are cool. Add seasoning packages and mix well.
Add onion, carrot, olives and other veggies.
Mix well.
Spoon noodle mixture into rectangular serving dish.
Spread mayonnaise on top; just enough to coat.
Refrigerate until ready to serve.

question: How can I make a quick ramen noodle dish?
answer:
Title: Noodle Dish
Ingredients:
1 block butter
1 lb. ground meat
1 c. bell pepper, chopped
1 c. onion, chopped
2 small cans tomato sauce
2 cans mushrooms (small)
1 medium block Velveeta cheese
1 pkg. flat egg noodles
Directions:
Brown meat in butter.
Add bell pepper, onion, seasonings, etc. Add sauce and mushrooms.
Cook 5 to 10 minutes. Cut cheese in chunks and let melt (all must be melted). Add cooked noodles and mix together in casserole dish. Sprinkle bread crumbs on top. Bake at 350° until golden brown.

question: How can I make a quick ramen noodle dish?
answer:
Title: Ramen Noodle Oriental
Ingredients:
5 pkg. Ramen noodles
2 lb. ground beef
1 medium onion
4 stalks celery
1 (4 oz.) can sliced mushrooms
1/4 stick butter
1/2 c. soy sauce
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Brown beef and drain.
Saute onions, celery, mushrooms and soy sauce in butter.
Add salt and pepper.
Bring noodles to a boil. Boil 3 to 4 minutes; drain.
Serve by making a noodle bed.
Place beef mixture on top.
Serve hot.
Fast meal.

question: How can I make a quick ramen noodle dish?
answer:
Title: Ramen Noodle Salad
Ingredients:
1 head shredded cabbage
1 bell pepper (red or green), chopped
8 small green onions, chopped
1 pkg. slivered almonds, sauteed in 1 Tbsp. butter, then cooled
Directions:
Mix together in large bowl.

question: How can I make a quick ramen noodle dish?
answer:
Title: Ramen Noodle Salad
Ingredients:
8 oz. raw cauliflower, broccoli and carrots, all finely chopped
1 bunch green onions, thinly sliced
2 pkg. chicken Ramen noodles, crushed in small lengths
2/3 c. oil
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. vinegar
Directions:
Mix sugar, oil and vinegar.
Add flavor packets from noodles; mix well.
Add vegetables and stir.
Add crushed noodles and stir. Let stand in refrigerator for 24 hours.
Stir 3 or 4 times in between the 24 hours.
For a big bowl, double this recipe.

question: How do I make a rich beef bourguignon?
answer:
Title: Beef Bourguignon
Ingredients:
8 lb. meat (stew or chuck), cut into 1-1/2-inch cubes
Flour
Butter
Olive Oil
Salt and pepper
3 oz. warm Brandy
3/4 lb. bacon
4 cloves garlic
3 carrots, diced
3 leeks, diced
6 onions, finely chopped
3 Bay leaves
1-1/2 tsp. thyme
2 bottles Burgundy
Water to cover
2 lb. small boiling onions
3 cans small carrots
3 lb. mushrooms
Directions:
Cut meat and roll in flour.
Brown on all sides in half butter and olive oil.
Add salt and pepper.
Pour in 3 ounces warm Brandy and light.
Put in casserole dish.

question: How do I make a rich beef bourguignon?
answer:
Title: Beef Bourguignon
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1 1/2 lb. lean stew beef, cut in 1-inch cubes
1 large onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. flour
1 clove garlic, minced
1 1/2 c. red wine (boil 5 minutes before using)
1 can beef bouillon
2 tsp. tomato paste
2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
2 tsp. basil
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 lb. sliced mushrooms
Directions:
Brown beef and onion in oil. Sprinkle with flour and brown. Add remaining ingredients, except mushrooms. Cover and simmer slowly for 2 1/2 hours. Add mushrooms in last 15 minutes. Serve over plain or wild rice.

question: How do I make a rich beef bourguignon?
answer:
Title: Never-Fail Beef Bourguignon
Ingredients:
3 lb. lean beef, cubed
2 medium onions, sliced
2 Tbsp. flour
6 Tbsp. butter
4 bay leaves
1 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced
2 cloves garlic, crushed
20 small onions, peeled
3 to 4 (12 oz.) bottles red cooking wine
1 tsp. thyme
salt and pepper
1 Tbsp. parsley
Directions:
Roll beef cubes in flour.
Brown beef, sliced onions and garlic in butter.
Transfer all to a large Dutch oven.
Add bay leaves, thyme, parsley, salt and pepper.
Pour enough wine over meat to cover.
Simmer 2 1/2 hours.
Add whole onions and cook to tender.
Add mushrooms the last 15 minutes.
If sauce needs thickening, add flour and water to mixture.
Serve over rice or noodles.

question: How do I make a rich beef bourguignon?
answer:
Title: Beef Bourguignon
Ingredients:
1/4 c. shortening
3 lb. lean beef, cut into cubes
3 Tbsp. flour
1 c. canned beef broth, undiluted
1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. dried thyme
1 c. dry red wine
12 small white pearl onions
Directions:
In large skillet saute beef cubes until brown, stir in flour, salt, pepper and thyme, scraping skillet well.
Turn all into 2-quart casserole.
Pour on beef broth and wine.
Cover casserole and bake two hours at 350°.
Add onions and mushrooms.
If too dry, add equal parts broth and wine.
Continue baking until meat is fork-tender.
Remove from oven and skim excess fat from gravy. Serve from casserole with hot mashed potatoes, rice or cooked egg noodles.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a rich beef bourguignon?
answer:
Title: Beef Bourguignon
Ingredients:
2 lb. lean beef chuck round, cut in 1 1/2-inch cubes
2 Tbsp. butter or fat
2 Tbsp. sherry (heated optional)
24 small white onions
12 large mushrooms, quartered
1 tsp. tomato paste
1 tsp. browning gravy (gravy starter)
3 Tbsp. flour
1 c. beef consomme
1 c. red wine
salt and pepper to taste
bouquet garni (1 small bay leaf, 2 sprigs thyme, marjoram and 2 Tbsp. parsley)
Directions:
Brown meat fast in hot fat in heavy skillet.
Pour sherry over and transfer to medium casserole.
Salt lightly.
In remaining fat, saute onions and mushrooms lightly; stir in tomato paste, meat glaze and flour.
Add slowly, consomme and 1/4 cup wine.
Stir until boils.
Season to taste and pour over beef in casserole.
Add bouquet garni.
Cover and cook in slow oven (250°) about 3 hours until meat is tender and cuts with a fork.
Add remaining wine at intervals.
Serves 6.

question: What can I make with leftover rotisserie chicken?
answer:
Title: Rotisserie Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (4 1/2 to 5 1/2 lb.) grilled or roasted chicken
1 3/4 tsp. dried rosemary
2 Tbsp. butter
salt and pepper
Directions:
Prepare chicken by loosening the breast skin from the meat. Place 3/4 teaspoon rosemary and 1 tablespoon of butter on each side of the breast under the skin.
Take the remaining 1/2 teaspoon of rosemary and place inside the cavity.
Truss the bird. Sprinkle with salt and pepper to your taste.
Rotisserie for 2 hours, or until meat pulls from the bones easily.

question: What can I make with leftover rotisserie chicken?
answer:
Title: Rotel Chicken
Ingredients:
4 to 6 chicken breasts (boneless and skinless)
1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 can cream of chicken soup
1 small pkg. Velveeta cheese
1 large pkg. spaghetti
1 medium onion
1 c. chicken broth
Directions:
Cook chicken.
Drain and save 1 cup of broth.
Cook spaghetti and drain.
Saute onion and cut cheese into cubes.

question: What can I make with leftover rotisserie chicken?
answer:
Title: Don'S Rotisserie Chicken
Ingredients:
1 whole chicken
1 small green pepper, chunked
salt and pepper
1 small onion, quartered
3 or 4 Tbsp. margarine
3 strips bacon
Directions:
Put green pepper, salt, pepper, margarine and onion inside chicken.
Lay bacon over breast area and tie chicken well.
Put on spit and rub a little margarine over chicken.
Put on rotisserie and cook on medium or low until well done.

question: What can I make with leftover rotisserie chicken?
answer:
Title: Rotisseri Kumbak Sauce
Ingredients:
2 garlic cloves, chopped fine
1 c. mayonnaise
1/4 c. chili sauce
1/4 c. ketchup
1/2 c. oil
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. black pepper
dash of paprika and red pepper
juice of grated onion
2 Tbsp. grated onion
Directions:
Put all ingredients in a quart jar and shake. Keep in the refrigerator. Delicious salad dressing. Very good for boiled shrimp.

question: What can I make with leftover rotisserie chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken-Rotel
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. chicken
1 onion, chopped
1 bell pepper, chopped
1/2 stick butter
1 small can English peas, drained
1 lb. Velveeta cheese, chopped
7 oz. spaghetti
1 small can mushrooms, drained
1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes
Directions:
Boil chicken; save broth.
Debone chicken.
Saute onion and bell pepper in butter.
Add peas, mushrooms and cheese.
Stir until cheese melts.
Remove from heat and add chicken.
Boil noodles in 3 cups of chicken broth until done; do not drain noodles.
Mix noodles and chicken mixture in a casserole dish. Bake at 375° until bubbly.
Can be frozen before baked.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for a green smoothie?
answer:
Title: Best Breakfast Smoothie
Ingredients:
1 orange, peeled and torn into fourths
1 medium banana
1/2 c. chunked pineapple (fresh or frozen)
1/2 c. berries (raspberries, strawberries, blueberries or a combination)
1 heaping Tbsp. soy powder
3/4 c. milk (either soy or 1% coconut or combination)
Directions:
Put all ingredients into a Vita Mix machine (or a good blender, but it's not quite the same). Turn on slow, then increase to high speed and blend for 1/2 minute or longer until it's smooth. Serves 2 to 4 people, depending on how much each person wants.

question: What’s a good recipe for a green smoothie?
answer:
Title: Power Packed Smoothie
Ingredients:
1/2 c. frozen strawberries, thawed
1/2 c. skim milk
1/2 peeled banana
1/2 pkg. vanilla instant breakfast mix
1/2 c. frozen yogurt (no-fat vanilla or peach)
Directions:
Puree strawberries.
Add milk, banana, instant breakfast and frozen yogurt and blend until smooth.

question: What’s a good recipe for a green smoothie?
answer:
Title: Fruit Smoothie
Ingredients:
1 c. fresh or frozen fruit (bananas, pineapple, plums, strawberries, peaches, pears, berries, etc.)
milk, water or juice
1/2 c. plain or flavored yogurt
1 Tbsp. honey (optional)
Directions:
Blend 1 cup fruit and yogurt with enough milk, water or juice to make a milkshake consistency.
Drink and enjoy!

question: What’s a good recipe for a green smoothie?
answer:
Title: Smoothie Delight
Ingredients:
2 c. frozen strawberries, pitted
1 banana
1 tsp. lemon (optional)
1 c. frozen pineapple
3/4 c. apple juice
2 tsp. honey (optional)
Directions:
Legumes, which is another name for beans, peas and lentils, are all good sources of fiber, protein, iron, calcium, zinc and B vitamins.
This group also includes chickpeas, baked and refried beans, soy milk, tempeh and texturized vegetable protein.

question: What’s a good recipe for a green smoothie?
answer:
Title: Green Salad
Ingredients:
1 box lime Jell-O
1 c. hot water
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/4 c. sugar
1 small can crushed pineapple (juice, too)
1 c. black walnuts or pecans
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese (room temperature)
1 c. small, colored marshmallows
1 small carton Cool Whip
Directions:
Mix the lime Jell-O and hot water together and cool.
Mix the cream cheese, sugar and lemon juice.
Add the cooled Jell-O.
Add pineapple, marshmallows, Cool Whip and nuts.
Put in square pan. Cool at least 2 hours.

question: What can I do with canned tuna and pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta-Tuna Salad
Ingredients:
4 c. vegetable pasta (spiral)
2 cans white tuna (6 oz. each), drained
4 Tbsp. light mayonnaise
2 c. mixed vegetables
2 Tbsp. salt
1 Tbsp. olive oil or butter
1 1/2 Tbsp. oregano
1/2 c. sliced black olives or green (optional)
Directions:
Put the pasta in boiling water for 13 to 15 minutes; drain and set aside.
Put the oil (or butter) in a pan with the mixed vegetables over low heat.
Cover and let it simmer for 15 minutes (after 3 minutes add 3 tablespoons water and cover again).
In a salad bowl, mix mayonnaise, salt and oregano with the tuna.
Add the cooked pasta and vegetables.
Sprinkle the sliced olives on top (if desired).

question: What can I do with canned tuna and pasta?
answer:
Title: Tuna Sauce With Pasta
Ingredients:
1 clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. Italian parsley, chopped
1 Tbsp. fresh basil, chopped or 1 tsp. dried basil
1/4 c. olive oil
1/4 tsp. hot red pepper, crushed
1 (6 1/2 oz.) can chunk tuna, drained and flaked
2 heaping Tbsp. tomato paste
1/2 c. dry red wine
2 c. canned peeled Italian tomatoes
12 oz. any type pasta you like, cooked and drained
Directions:
Combine garlic, parsley and basil.
Set aside 1/2 of the mixture.
In a medium saucepan, saute other 1/2 of the mixture in oil (do not brown).
Add red pepper and salt.
Cook 1 minute.
Add tuna and tomato paste.
Stir with wooden spoon 1 minute more.
Add wine and stir over high heat until paste is dissolved.
Add tomatoes and cook 5 minutes more.
Adjust seasonings to taste. Remove from heat and add remaining herb mixture.
Pour over hot cooked pasta.
Serves 4 as a main dish.

question: What can I do with canned tuna and pasta?
answer:
Title: Tuna Pasta
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. olive oil
4 slices sweet onion (thin)
4 slices red onion (thin)
1/2 lb. tuna, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
2 small tomatoes, sliced
1/4 c. black olives, sliced
2 Tbsp. basil (fresh), minced
2 tsp. garlic, minced
salt and pepper to taste
1/4 lb. linguine
2 Tbsp. capers, drained
Italian parsley sprigs for garnish
Directions:
Heat oil in heavy medium skillet over medium-low heat.
Add onions and cook until translucent, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes.
Add tuna, tomatoes, olives, basil, garlic, salt and pepper; cook until fish is opaque, stirring often, about 9 minutes.

question: What can I do with canned tuna and pasta?
answer:
Title: No-Fat Tuna Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. uncooked whole wheat shells or spirals (1 1/2 c. cooked)
1/2 c. plain nonfat yogurt
1 1/2 tsp. honey
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. balsamic vinegar
1/2 tsp. dried dill weed
1/4 tsp. celery seed
1/4 tsp. paprika
pinch of white pepper (optional)
1 (6 1/2 oz.) can light tuna packed in water, rinsed if salted, drained and flaked
1/3 c. frozen peas, thawed
1/3 c. chopped celery
1/4 c. chopped red pepper
2 Tbsp. chopped green onion
Directions:
Cook pasta in boiling water for 10 to 12 minutes.
Drain and rinse with cold water.
In a large bowl, combine yogurt, honey, lemon juice, vinegar and spices.
Stir in pasta and remaining ingredients.
Serve at room temperature.
If salad needs to be made ahead of time, store in refrigerator.
But let set at room temperature 15 minutes before serving.

question: What can I do with canned tuna and pasta?
answer:
Title: Garden Tuna Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
3 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh basil or 1 tsp. dried basil
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 can (12 1/2 oz.) tuna, drained and flaked
1 pkg. (10 oz.) frozen green beans, thawed
8 oz. elbow macaroni, cooked, rinsed and drained
1 c. cherry tomatoes, quartered
1/2 c. thinly sliced red onion
1/2 c. sliced ripe olives (optional)
Directions:
In a large bowl combine the first 6 ingredients.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Cover; chill.
Makes 8 cups.

question: How do I make a classic eggplant parmesan?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Parmesan
Ingredients:
1/2 c. sliced onion
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. oil
1 lb. can stewed tomatoes (2 c.)
2 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. basil
Directions:
In a large skillet, saute onion and garlic until yellow.
Add tomatoes and seasonings.
With 2 knives, cut up and blend ingredients.
Simmer sauce, uncovered, about 20 minutes until slightly thick.

question: How do I make a classic eggplant parmesan?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Parmesan
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground chuck
1 c. chopped onion
1 c. chopped bell pepper
2 cloves garlic
1 Tbsp. parsley flakes
3 (8 oz.) tomato sauce
1 medium tomato paste
2 cans tomatoes, pureed
2 medium eggplant
2 (8 oz.) pkg. Mozzarella cheese
1 large Parmesan cheese
flour
salt and pepper
1 large olive oil
Directions:
Peel and slice eggplant in 1/4-inch slices. Salt and pepper. Shake in bag with flour and shake off excess. Fry in olive oil until golden brown. Saute onion, pepper, garlic, tomato sauce, tomatoes, tomato paste and parsley.
Salt and pepper to taste (not too much salt as cheese is salty). Cook sauce about 30 minutes.

question: How do I make a classic eggplant parmesan?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Parmesan
Ingredients:
2 medium eggplant
1 1/2 c. cornbread crumbs
2 eggs, beaten
1 onion, chopped
2 small cans tomato sauce
1/2 lb. sliced cheese
1/2 lb. ground beef
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
salt to taste
1 stick butter
2 bell peppers, chopped
Directions:
Cook ground beef, onion, bell pepper, garlic and salt.
Set aside.
Wash and peel eggplant; slice into rounds.
Dip into beaten egg and roll in crumbs.
Melt butter, 1/4 stick at a time, in a skillet and brown eggplant on both sides.
Put eggplant in casserole dish, add a layer of meat mixture, cover with tomato sauce and top with cheese.
Bake at 350° for about 30 minutes or until bubbly.

question: How do I make a classic eggplant parmesan?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Parmesan
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 Tbsp. oregano
1 c. chopped onion
1 Tbsp. garlic, minced
4 c. tomatoes
1 Tbsp. basil
1 (6 oz.) tomato paste
1 Tbsp. salt
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 bay leaf
Directions:
Cook onion in oil. Add remainder and cook 1 hour. Take out bay leaf.
For a smoother sauce, puree.

question: How do I make a classic eggplant parmesan?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Parmesan
Ingredients:
1 large eggplant (1 1/2 lb.)
1 Tbsp. salt
1 c. flour
4 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 c. tomato sauce
8 oz. Mozzarella cheese, shredded
1/3 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Peel eggplant and cut into 1/4-inch thick slices.
Score the surface of each side of the slices lightly with the point of a knife.
Arrange the slices in a single layer on paper towels. Sprinkle with salt and let stand 10 minutes.
Dredge with flour. Heat the oil until very hot.
Brown sliced eggplant briefly on both sides, then drain on paper towels.
Season tomato sauce to taste with oregano, pepper and garlic powder.
Pour 1/4-inch layer of tomato sauce in bottom of 9 x 13 x 2-inch baking dish. Cover with 1/3 eggplant slices, then 1/3 Mozzarella.
Repeat to form 3 layers.
Top with Parmesan cheese.
Cover and bake at 350° for 25 minutes.
Uncover and continue baking 10 minutes.
Place under broiler 2 minutes to brown cheese.
Serve.
Serves 8.

question: I want a recipe for vegetarian lasagna.
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/2 c. chopped onions
2 cloves garlic, minced
3 c. chopped canned tomatoes with juice
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
1 tsp. dried basil
1 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese, grated
1 c. low-fat cottage cheese
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed to drain
1 c. cooked kidney beans
6 uncooked lasagna noodles, broken into thirds
1 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
In a quart-size glass measuring cup or bowl, place oil, onions and garlic.
Cook, uncovered, at Medium power (50%) for 1 minute. Add tomatoes, oregano and basil and cook, uncovered, at High power (100%) for 10 minutes.
Stir in Parmesan cheese, cottage cheese, spinach and beans.

question: I want a recipe for vegetarian lasagna.
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Lasagna
Ingredients:
1/2 c. chopped fresh mushrooms
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 c. chopped onion
1 Tbsp. minced garlic
1 c. chopped green pepper
2 tsp. basil
1 tsp. oregano
2 bay leaves
2 tsp. salt
salt and pepper
1 lb. shredded Mozzarella cheese
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. chopped fresh parsley
1 (1 lb. 13 oz.) can tomato puree
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1 c. freshly chopped tomatoes
1/4 tsp. black pepper
2 c. Ricotta cheese
2 beaten eggs
1/2 lb. raw chopped spinach
dash of nutmeg
2 Tbsp. wheat germ
lasagna noodles
Directions:
In olive oil saute onion, garlic, green pepper, basil, oregano, bay leaves and salt.
When onions are soft, add tomato puree, tomato paste, chopped tomatoes and 1/4 teaspoon black pepper. Reduce heat and simmer for 45 minutes.
Add mushrooms, parsley, salt and pepper.
Mix Ricotta cheese, eggs, salt, pepper, spinach, nutmeg and wheat germ to make the filling.
You don't have to cook the noodles.
Spread a little of the sauce in a 13 x 9-inch pan. Place a layer of noodles next and then 1/2 of the filling.
Next add in a layer 1/2 of the rest of the sauce.
Layer the remaining ingredients in this order:
1/2 of the Mozzarella cheese, noodles, remaining filling, a little sauce, the rest of the Mozzarella cheese, another layer of noodles and the last bit of sauce. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
Cover with foil.
Bake at 375° for 45 minutes.

question: I want a recipe for vegetarian lasagna.
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Lasagna
Ingredients:
6 lasagna noodles (4 oz.)
2 qt. water
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 c. chopped onion
1 1/2 c. (1/8-inch) bias-cut carrots (about 4 medium)
2 tsp. minced garlic
1 3/4 c. spaghetti sauce (one 15 oz. jar)
1/2 c. water
1 tsp. basil
1/2 tsp. oregano
2 eggs
2 c. low-fat cottage cheese (about 16 oz.)
4 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
1 (10 oz.) frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 c. quartered and sliced zucchini
1 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese (4 oz.)
Directions:
Cook lasagna noodles in boiling water about 12 minutes. Drain, rinse and cover with cold water.
Heat vegetable oil in saucepan.
Add onion, carrots and garlic.
Saute until carrots are tender, about 10 minutes.
Add spaghetti sauce, water and spices. Bring to a simmer.
Beat eggs and blend in cottage cheese, Parmesan cheese and vegetables.

question: I want a recipe for vegetarian lasagna.
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Lasagna(Makes 8 Servings)
Ingredients:
8 oz. lasagna noodles, cooked tender
2 medium onions, chopped
4 cloves garlic, minced
3 Tbsp. olive oil
2 c. tomato sauce, canned tomatoes or thinned paste
2 tsp. dried oregano
1 tsp. dried basil
1/4 c. chopped fresh parsley
2 tsp. salt
3/4 lb. sliced mushrooms, sauteed in olive oil
3/4 c. dry, small, red beans, cooked tender
3/4 lb. Mozzarella cheese (low-fat), thinly sliced
2 c. Ricotta cheese (low-fat)
1/2 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Rinse the cooked noodles in cold water.
Set them aside. Saute the onions and garlic in the olive oil until soft and transparent, but not browned.
Stir in the tomato, oregano, basil, parsley and salt.
Cook sauce about 1/2 hour, simmering it and stirring often until it has thickened.
Stir in the sauteed mushrooms and cooked beans.

question: I want a recipe for vegetarian lasagna.
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Lasagna
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. lasagna noodles, cooked according to pkg. directions
1 medium onion, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1 (28 oz.) can tomatoes
1/4 c. fresh parsley, minced
1 Tbsp. oregano
1 bay leaf
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 lb. fresh spinach
1 lb. Ricotta cheese
1 egg
3/4 c. Romano, grated
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
3/4 lb. Mozzarella, grated
Directions:
Cook noodles and drain.
In large skillet, saute onion, garlic and pepper in oil until golden, 5 minutes.
Stir in tomato paste, tomatoes, parsley, oregano, bay leaf and 1/2 teaspoon salt. Simmer, uncovered, for 20 minutes.
In medium size bowl, combine spinach, Ricotta, egg, 1/4 cup Romano, 1 teaspoon salt and pepper. Spoon 1/3 tomato sauce in bottom of 13 x 9-inch baking dish.
Cover with layer of lasagna, half of the spinach and cheese filling, half of the Mozzarella and 1/4 cup Romano.
Repeat layers.
Top with remaining sauce and Romano.
Bake at 350° for 35 minutes.

question: How do I make a traditional shepherd’s pie?
answer:
Title: Shepherd'S Pie
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. oil
1 1/2 lb. hamburger meat
1 onion, finely chopped
1 large carrot, finely chopped
1 beef stock cube
1/2 tsp. mixed herbs
seasoning to taste
2 sticks celery, finely chopped
2 green onions (shallots), chopped
1 1/2 lb. potatoes, cooked and drained
1 oz. butter or margarine
1/4 c. milk
1 egg
Directions:
Heat oil in a large pan and saut meat, onions and carrot over a high heat until golden brown.
Add crumbled stock cube, mixed herbs, seasoning, celery and green onions (shallots).
Simmer for 5 minutes.
Spoon into greased ovenproof casserole.
Mash potatoes with butter and milk and spoon onto meat.
Brush with lightly beaten egg and bake at 400° for 30 minutes.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make a traditional shepherd’s pie?
answer:
Title: Shepherds Pie
Ingredients:
1 1/2 tsp. vegetable oil
1 large onion, chopped
1 small red pepper, finely chopped
1 garlic clove, crushed
1 lb. lean ground lamb
1 1/4 cup chicken stock or beef stock
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 Tbsp. tomato paste
1/4 cup Worcestershire sauce
1 1/4 cup mushrooms, sliced
Directions:
Heat oil in pan. Add the onion, red pepper and garlic. Saute until softened. Add the meat and saute
until browned. If desired, transfer the cooked mixture to a food processor and chop for a few seconds on the pulse setting. Transfer the meat
to a saucepan and add the stock, parsley, tomato paste, Worcestershire sauce. Add mushrooms. Cook over medium heat for about 20 minutes.

question: How do I make a traditional shepherd’s pie?
answer:
Title: Shepherd'S Pie
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 medium size onion, chopped
1 lb. ground beef (lean)
1 tsp. basil, dried
1/2 lb. fresh green beans, steamed until tender
1 c. canned tomatoes, chopped
2 medium size potatoes, cooked until tender
1 egg, beaten
1/2 c. water
Directions:
Heat oil in a large skillet and saute onions until golden.
Add beef and basil; cook until browned.
Stir in green beans and tomatoes; then turn mixture into a 1 1/2-quart ovenproof casserole. Preheat oven to 350°.

question: How do I make a traditional shepherd’s pie?
answer:
Title: Shepherd'S Pie
Ingredients:
4 c. leftover roast, cubed
2 c. leftover cooked vegetables or 1 can mixed vegetables
2 1/2 c. gravy
3 c. hot mashed potatoes
1 egg, well beaten
Directions:
Heat meat, vegetables and gravy thoroughly.
Pour into greased casserole.
Combine potatoes and egg.
Make a border with potato mix over meat mixture or cover it completely.
Bake at 425° for 15 to 20 minutes or until top is light brown.
Makes 6 servings.

question: How do I make a traditional shepherd’s pie?
answer:
Title: Shepherd'S Pie
Ingredients:
1 to 2 lb. ground beef
2 pkg. dry onion soup mix
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
2 c. dry instant potatoes or real potatoes, mashed
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. sour cream
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Brown the meat and drain.
Combine meat with soup mix.
Pour into a casserole dish.
Mix in green peppers.
Make mashed potatoes and mix in sour cream and butter.
Layer on top of meat mixture.
Sprinkle cheese over top.
Bake at 350° for 20 minutes.

question: How do I make egg salad for sandwiches?
answer:
Title: Egg Salad Sandwiches
Ingredients:
3 hard-boiled eggs
1/3 c. chopped celery
1 tsp. chopped onion
3 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1/4 tsp. salt
8 slices bread
Directions:
Peel eggs and chop.
Place in mixing bowl.
Add chopped celery and onion.
Add mayonnaise and salt.
Mix well.
Divide egg mixture between 4 slices of bread and spread with table knife. Top with remaining 4 slices of bread.
Makes 4 sandwiches. Refrigerate any leftovers.

question: How do I make egg salad for sandwiches?
answer:
Title: Egg Salad Sandwiches
Ingredients:
2 hard-cooked eggs, chopped
1/4 c. finely chopped celery
1/2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
1 tsp. diced pimiento
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
2 to 3 Tbsp. reduced calorie mayonnaise
6 (1/4-inch thick) slices whole wheat bread
2 slices tomato
2 lettuce leaves
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients.
Add mayonnaise and mix well. Spread 2 slices of bread with egg mixture.
Top each with another slice of bread.
Arrange tomato slices and lettuce on top of sandwich.
Top with remaining bread.
Cut each sandwich into quarters to serve, using wooden picks to hold layers together. Yield:
2 servings.

question: How do I make egg salad for sandwiches?
answer:
Title: Egg Salad Sandwiches
Ingredients:
4 hard-cooked eggs, chopped
1/4 c. shredded reduced-fat Colby Jack cheese (1 oz.)
2 Tbsp. sweet or dill pickle relish
2 Tbsp. finely chopped red sweet pepper
1/4 c. low-fat mayonnaise dressing
1 Tbsp. prepared mustard
10 slices whole wheat or white bread
5 small romaine leaves
halved cherry tomatoes and/or thin bite-size carrot strips
Directions:
In a medium bowl, stir together the eggs, cheese, relish, sweet pepper, mayonnaise, dressing and mustard. If desired, use large cookie cutters to cut bread slices into shapes. Line 5 bread slices with lettuce. Spread on the egg mixture. Top with the remaining bread slices. If desired, garnish sandwiches with cherry tomatoes and/or carrots, using wooden toothpicks to secure.

question: How do I make egg salad for sandwiches?
answer:
Title: Egg Salad Sandwiches Supreme
Ingredients:
6 hard-cooked eggs
1 c. sharp Cheddar cheese
1/4 c. finely chopped celery
3 Tbsp. stuffed green olives, sliced
mayonnaise
salt and pepper
bread
lettuce
Directions:
Combine ingredients and moisten well with mayonnaise.
Spread on buttered bread and add lettuce. Makes 6 sandwiches.

question: How do I make egg salad for sandwiches?
answer:
Title: Egg Salad Sandwich
Ingredients:
4 to 5 eggs (hard-boiled)
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. green olives, sliced
1/4 c. red onion (optional)
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 tsp. Dijon-style mustard
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Peel and mash eggs, using a fork or potato masher.
Add remaining ingredients and mix gently.
Chill before serving. Spread on your favorite bread for a great sandwich.
Makes 3 to 4 servings.

question: Can you suggest a meal with chicken and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Chicken Quiche (Quick & Easy)
Ingredients:
2 chicken breasts or 1 large can white meat chicken
Broccoli (or any vegetable or combination of vegetables)
1/2 c. regular shredded or 1 cup fat-free cheese
3/4 c. low-fat biscuit mix
3 eggs (or equivalent Egg Beaters)
1 1/2 c. skim milk
Directions:
Spray pan with non-stick spray.
Layer in the following order:
chicken, vegetable(s), cheese.
Pour batter over this. Cook for about 45 minutes at 350°.

question: Can you suggest a meal with chicken and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Pseudo-Southwestern Quinoa
Ingredients:
1 c. quinoa
1 t. ginger, minced
1 3/4 c. water 1/2 t. dulce or kelp powder
2 T. lemon juice
2 serrano peppers
1 t. oregano, dried
1 avocado, diced and drenched with lime juice
4 green onions chopped
2 ears fresh corn on the cob, cut off corn
1/2 diced green bell pepper
1/2 c. diced red sweet pepper
1/4 c. olive oil or flax seed oil
1 bunch cilantro chopped
Directions:
First of all quinoa (pronounced "keen-wa") is an alkalizing grain.
It is hardy and contains the highest amount if protein of any grain.
It cooks quickly and makes a delicious, crunchy dish. It is high in calcium, phosphorus, iron, B vitamins, and vitamin E and has an ideal balance of amino acids.
Wash quinoa thoroughly to remove the saponin, the rust-colored coating that protects this seed against insects, birds, and the sun.
While cooking, the germ on the outside of the grain unfolds like a partial spiral giving the finished cooked product a lovely appearance.

question: Can you suggest a meal with chicken and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Broccoli Quiche
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. diced cooked chicken
1 (10 oz.) box frozen, chopped broccoli, thawed and well drained
1 c. "lite" Ricotta cheese
1/2 c. low-fat plain yogurt
1 whole egg
1 egg white
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. margarine, melted
Directions:
Lightly spray a 9-inch pie plate with nonstick cooking spray. Combine half of the chicken and half of the broccoli in pie plate. Puree Ricotta, yogurt, egg, egg white, flour, baking powder, salt, Parmesan cheese and margarine in blender.
Pour over chicken in pie plate. Scatter remaining chicken and broccoli over top. Bake in preheated moderate oven at 350° for 30 to 45 minutes. Let stand 10 minutes before slicing.
Makes 4 dinner or 6 lunch servings.

question: Can you suggest a meal with chicken and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Quinoa Tabouleh
Ingredients:
1 c. quinoa
2 c. water
2 medium tomatoes, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
6 green onions with tops, finely chopped
1 medium cucumber, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 small green bell pepper, seeded and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 c. finely chopped fresh parsley
1/2 c. finely chopped fresh mint
1/3 c. freshly squeezed lemon juice
1/3 c. olive oil
1 garlic clove, minced
1 tsp. fine sea salt
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
Put the quinoa in a wire strainer and thoroughly rinse with hot water to remove any bitter flavor.

question: Can you suggest a meal with chicken and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Andrew'S Favorite Chicken Quiche
Ingredients:
9-inch pie crust
1 1/2 c. cooked, diced chicken
1/2 c. grated cheese (Cheddar and Mozzarella)
4 oz. jar sliced mushrooms
3 eggs, beaten
1 can cream of chicken soup
Directions:
Put chicken in unbaked crust.
Add cheese and mushrooms. Combine eggs and soup; pour over chicken mixture.
Bake 1 hour at 350°.

question: I need a recipe for a quick dinner under 20 minutes.
answer:
Title: A Meal In Minutes
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef
3/4 c. Minute rice
1/2 c. green pepper, diced
1 c. diced celery
1 tsp. garlic salt
1 onion, diced
1 c. tomato juice
1 small can mushrooms
Directions:
Brown meat and add remaining ingredients.
Cover and cook in electric skillet for 20 minutes.

question: I need a recipe for a quick dinner under 20 minutes.
answer:
Title: Dinner Rolls
Ingredients:
1/2 recipe Can Do Quick Sweet Dough
Directions:
Prepare 1/2 recipe of dough.
Shape as desired.
Let rise for 1 hour.
Bake about 20 minutes on greased baking sheet.
Makes 2 to 3 dozen.

question: I need a recipe for a quick dinner under 20 minutes.
answer:
Title: Quick Dinner Rolls
Ingredients:
3/4 c. warm water
1 pkg. active dry yeast
1/4 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. dry milk
2 1/4 to 3 c. flour
1 egg
1/4 c. shortening or oleo
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in water in a mixing bowl.
Add sugar and salt; stir.
Then add dry milk and half of the flour.
Beat 2 minutes. Add egg and shortening.
Then mix in, gradually, remaining flour until consistency of dough.
Place in a greased bowl until it is doubled in bulk.
Heat oven to 425°.
Bake 10 minutes.
Makes 1 dozen.

question: I need a recipe for a quick dinner under 20 minutes.
answer:
Title: Super Easy, Super Quick Supper
Ingredients:
1 box frozen chopped chicken or 1 lb. chicken, chopped and cooked
1 bag frozen broccoli
1 jar mushrooms
1 small onion, chopped
1 can bean sprouts
1 can water chestnuts, sliced
1 pkg. stir-fry seasoning
soy sauce to taste
3 c. cooked white rice
Directions:
Heat 1 tablespoon cooking oil (any variety) in large frying pan.
Add onion and cook until clear.
Add chicken and cook until thawed.
Add broccoli and mushrooms and cook about 5 minutes until heated through.
Add bean sprouts and water chestnuts.
Mix stir-fry seasoning according to package directions and pour over stir-fry.
Add soy sauce to taste.
Be careful not to cook too long, bean sprouts will become soggy.
Serve immediately over hot cooked rice.

question: I need a recipe for a quick dinner under 20 minutes.
answer:
Title: Quick And Easy Supper
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground beef
salt to taste
4 medium potatoes, sliced
4 medium onions, sliced
4 medium carrots, scraped and sliced
Directions:
Form meat into individual loaf size.
Place on a piece of aluminum foil.
Over meat, place potatoes, onions and carrots. Sprinkle salt over vegetables.
Wrap securely and bake 40 minutes at 350°.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a simple chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse(Makes 8 Servings)
Ingredients:
7 egg yolks
16 oz. semi-sweet chocolate chips
1 c. boiling water
1 large Cool Whip
1/2 c. sugar
Directions:
Add chips into blender.
Pour boiling water into blender.
Add yolks, one at a time.
Add the sugar.
Blend all ingredients until smooth.
Fold mixture and Cool Whip into a bowl.
Pour into dessert dishes and refrigerate.

question: How do I make a simple chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
4 oz. semi-sweet chocolate
4 egg yolks
1/2 stick butter, softened
dash of salt
1 tsp. vanilla
4 egg whites
6 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Put chocolate in saucepan.
Cover with 2 inches very hot tap water.
Cover.
Let stand 5 minutes or until chocolate is soft enough to stick toothpick through.
When chocolate is soft, but not dissolved, drain water.
Do not worry that some water clings.
Add yolks.
Stir with whisk and cook until thick.
Remove from heat. Add butter, salt and vanilla.
Mix well and cool.
Beat egg whites; gradually add sugar.
Beat until stiff.
Mix into chocolate. Serves 6.

question: How do I make a simple chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
1 pkg. (1 cup) semi-sweet chocolate chips
2 Tbsp. granulated or super-fine sugar
1/2 c. heavy cream
3 egg yolks
1/2 c. heavy cream, whipped
Directions:
Melt chocolate over simmering water in double boiler.
Stir in sugar and 1/2 cup heavy cream.
Cook, stirring constantly, until smooth and no lumps remain.
Beat yolks until smooth. Slowly pour in chocolate mixture while beating yolks constantly. Set aside and cool to room temperature.
When cool, fold in whipped cream.
Spoon into bowls and refrigerate until serving time.
Garnish with a rosette of whipped cream and chocolate curls.

question: How do I make a simple chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
4 eggs, separated
3/4 c. confectioners sugar
12 oz. semi-sweet chocolate bits
5 Tbsp. cold water
pinch of salt
1 1/2 c. heavy cream
2 tsp. vanilla extract
Directions:
Beat egg yolks and sugar until thick and lemon-colored.
Melt the chocolate with the water in a baking dish in a 350° oven for a few minutes.
Do not stir until chocolate is creamy.
Add egg yolks and sugar while chocolate is still warm.
Beat egg whites with pinch of salt until stiff.
Fold chocolate mixture into egg whites until there are no streaks.
Whip cream and add vanilla. Fold into chocolate mixture.
Spoon into serving bowl or individual cups.
Chill for 4 hours.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a simple chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
4 large egg yolks
3 c. heavy cream
1/4 c. sugar
2 oz. semisweet chocolate
4 oz. milk chocolate
Directions:
Beat egg yolks in small bowl with electric mixer on high speed until thick and lemon colored, about 3 minutes. Gradually add sugar and beat on high speed. Heat 1 cup whipping cream in 2-qt. saucepan over medium heat just until hot (do not boil). Gradually stir half of the hot cream into egg yolk mixture; stir back into hot cream in saucepan. Cook over low heat about 5 minutes, stirring constantly, until mixture thickens (do not boil). Let cool for about 10 minutes. Add chocolate to egg yolk mixture and stir until mixture thickens and chocolate is well blended, about 5 minutes. Cover and refrigerate for about 2 hours, stirring occasionally, just until chilled. Beat 1 1/2 c. whipping cream in chilled medium bowl with electric mixer on high speed until stiff. Mix 3/4 c. of whipped cream into chocolate mixture until blended. Fold remaining whipped cream gradually into chocolate mixture until well blended. Pipe or spoon mixture into cups or small dessert bowls. Refrigerate any remaining dessert.

question: What’s a good recipe for homemade salsa?
answer:
Title: Homemade Salsa Recipe
Ingredients:
about 6 to 8 finely chopped tomatoes (Roma tomatoes work best)
1 large finely chopped onion
green and red onions (if you have them)
1 jalapeno, minced (1/2 jalapeno with seeds removed if you prefer it mild)
1 garlic clove, minced
1/3 c. finely chopped fresh cilantro
juice squeezed from 1 to 2 limes
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Mix everything together and use with Tostitos chips or garnish on your favorite Mexican dish.
It's also very delicious on white chili.

question: What’s a good recipe for homemade salsa?
answer:
Title: Homemade Salsa
Ingredients:
4 tomatoes, chopped
5 jalapeno peppers, chopped
2 medium onions, chopped
1 tsp. minced garlic
salt to taste
1 1/2 Tbsp. wine vinegar
1/2 green bell pepper, chopped
2 Tbsp. chopped cilantro
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together and put into refrigerator for a couple of hours.
Serve with plain tortilla chips.

question: What’s a good recipe for homemade salsa?
answer:
Title: Homemade Salsa
Ingredients:
2 large cans whole tomatoes
1 bunch green onions
2 or more jalapenos
juice of 1 lemon
juice of 1 lime
handful of fresh cilantro
3 Tbsp. cumin
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. Accent
1 Tbsp. salt
1 tsp. cayenne pepper
1 Tbsp. garlic powder
Directions:
In a food processor, process onions, jalapenos, lemon juice, lime juice and cilantro.
Add drained tomatoes and pulse.
Add seasonings; mix by hand.
A good gift idea.

question: What’s a good recipe for homemade salsa?
answer:
Title: Homemade Salsa
Ingredients:
2 jalapeno peppers, seeded and chopped
6 Guero (hot yellow) peppers, seeded and chopped
2 large tomatoes, seeded and chopped
8 cloves garlic, minced
1 (14.5 oz.) can stewed tomatoes, drained and chopped
1/4 c. plus 2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh cilantro
1 tsp. dried whole oregano
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a large bowl, tossing gently to mix well.
Makes 4 cups.
Serve homemade salsa over fried eggs, cold meats, poultry, hamburgers or as a dip with tortilla chips.

question: What’s a good recipe for homemade salsa?
answer:
Title: Homemade Salsa
Ingredients:
12 large tomatoes, diced
2 large onions, diced
6 green peppers, chopped
6 to 8 jalapenos, chopped
2 to 4 hot peppers, chopped
2 tsp. black pepper
1/4 c. vinegar
6 to 8 cloves garlic, diced
1 bunch cilantro, chopped
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. chili pepper
Directions:
Clean your vegetables and chop up. Bring all ingredients to a boil in saucepot.
Reduce to medium heat for 10 minutes.
In a water bath kettle, process for 30 minutes.
Take out to cool.

question: What can I cook with black beans and corn?
answer:
Title: Black Bean And Corn Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. black beans (drained)
16 oz. (1 can) corn (drained)
1 lime, juiced
5 Tbsp. vegetable or olive oil
1/4 c. red onion, minced
1/4 c. scallions, minced
1/8 c. parsley or cilantro, minced
1 1/2 tsp. cumin
salt (to taste)
pepper (to taste)
1/2 c. tomatoes, chopped
Directions:
Mix together all ingredients, except tomatoes.
Cover and chill.

question: What can I cook with black beans and corn?
answer:
Title: Black Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 c. onions, chopped or 1 medium yellow onion
1/2 c. celery, chopped or 1 stalk
1 carrot, diced
2 cloves garlic, sliced
1/3 c. rice
1 tomato, chopped
1 tsp. cumin seed
1/2 tsp. basil
1/2 tsp. sage
1 can chicken broth or 1 1/2 c. homemade
1 large can black beans, drained and rinsed
hot sauce or Tabasco (optional)
Directions:
In a large skillet or saucepan, heat oil over medium-hot flame.
Add onions and saute for 5 minutes, until onion starts to soften, then add celery, carrots and garlic.
Cook until veggies start to become tender-crisp.
Add rice; stir and coat with juices in the pan.
Cook for 2 minutes.
Add tomato, spices, herbs and chicken broth.
Cover, reduce heat to simmer and cook for 10 to 15 minutes.
Add beans and continue cooking until rice is tender and beans are heated through.
Stir to keep rice from sticking.
Add Tabasco and pepper to taste.
Serve hot with crusty bread.
This can be a meal in itself or a side dish to barbecue pork or ribs.

question: What can I cook with black beans and corn?
answer:
Title: Black Bean And Corn Salsa
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. frozen whole corn
1 c. canned black beans, rinsed
1 sweet red pepper, chopped
1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and finely chopped
1 clove garlic, pressed
2 Tbsp. lime juice
2 tsp. chopped fresh cilantro
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cook corn and drain. Combine corn and remaining ingredients. Makes 4 cups.

question: What can I cook with black beans and corn?
answer:
Title: Black Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
1 lb. black beans
1/4 lb. ham for seasoning
1 large onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
2 green peppers, chopped
1 bay leaf
1/8 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. salt
3 to 4 c. cold water
2 pkg. yellow rice
chopped green onions, fat-free sour cream and tomato for garnish (optional)
Directions:
Wash beans thoroughly.
Cover with water and put in large pot to soak overnight.
Drain beans and place in crock-pot with 3 to 4 cups of water.
Add all other ingredients, except the rice.
Cook on high for 1 hour, then cook 8 to 10 hours on low.
Remove bay leaf.
Cook rice according to directions on package.
Serve beans over rice.
Garnish as desired.
This is a low-fat, high fiber meal.

question: What can I cook with black beans and corn?
answer:
Title: Black Bean And Rice Bake
Ingredients:
2 tsp. olive oil
1 1/2 c. chopped onion
3 garlic cloves, minced
1/2 c. chopped red bell pepper
1 (4 oz.) can diced green chiles
1 c. crushed, drained canned tomatoes
1 Tbsp. lime juice
1 1/2 to 2 tsp. chili powder
3/4 tsp. salt
16 oz. drained, cooked black beans
2 c. cooked brown rice
4 oz. Cheddar or Jack cheese
Directions:
Preheat
oven
to
350°.
Heat	oil
in
heavy,
large, nonstick
skillet
over
medium
heat.
Add
onion and garlic; saute 8
to 10 minutes until tender.
Add bell pepper; saute 3 minutes.
Stir in tomatoes, lime juice, chili powder and salt; bring to
a boil.
In a 2-quart casserole, mix beans and rice. Pour in
tomato
mixture and stir to combine.
Sprinkle casserole with cheese.
Bake 10 to 15 minutes until hot and bubbly. Healthy. Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 slices bacon (fried then crumbled)
2 1/2 c. cauliflower
3/4 c. sour cream (low fat version works just as well)
1/2 c. grated cheddar cheese
1 sm. yellow onion, finely chopped
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cook the cauliflower until firm, yet tender. Coarsely mash cauliflower with potato masher.
Add the sour cream, onion, cheese, salt and pepper.
Mix well.

question: How do I make mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Creole Cauliflower
Ingredients:
3 c. cooked chopped cauliflower
2 c. mashed cooked tomatoes
1/2 green pepper, chopped
1 onion, chopped
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 c. shredded cheese
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Melt butter in saucepan; add onion and green pepper and brown lightly.
Blend in flour, stirring, then add tomatoes, salt and pepper.
Heat to boiling point and cook three minutes, stirring constantly.
Add cauliflower and heat through. Place mixture in casserole, top with cheese and bake at 350° until cheese melts and is lightly browned.

question: How do I make mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Baked Cauliflower(This Is Also Good With Broccoli!)
Ingredients:
1 head cauliflower broken into flowerettes
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1 cup milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. chopped pimento
1/2 cup chopped green onions
1/2 cup buttered bread crumbs
1/2 cup grated cheese
Directions:
Cook cauliflower in boiling salted water until done but not too soft.
Drain and place in a baking dish.
Melt butter; add flour and stir until blended.
Add milk and continue stirring. Add seasonings, green onions and pimento.
Pour over cauliflower. Top with bread crumbs and cheese.
Bake at 375 degrees for about 20 minutes.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Bake
Ingredients:
1 lg. cauliflower, cut into flowerets
1/2 tsp. salt
3 c. water
1/4 c. butter or margarine, melted
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 c. buttery cracker crumbs
1 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese, divided
1 med. onion, chopped
1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes, chopped and undrained
Directions:
Combine first 3 ingredients in a large saucepan, bring to a boil.
Cover, reduce heat and cook for 5 minutes or until tender. Drain and set aside.
Combine butter and next 4 ingredients in a large bowl, stir in cauliflower, 1 cup cheese, onion, chopped green pepper and tomatoes.
Spoon into a greased 13x9x2 inch baking dish.
Bake at 350° for 35 minutes.
Add remaining 1/2 cup cheese and bake 5 additional minutes.
