question: How do I make mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Patties
Ingredients:
1 pkg. frozen cauliflower
1 tsp. baking powder
1 c. flour
1 c. water
2 eggs
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cook cauliflower; drain and mash.
Add other ingredients; mix well.
Let stand about 1 hour before cooking.
Drop by tablespoons into hot oil and cook until golden brown on both sides.
Can be frozen and then reheated as you need them.

question: I need a recipe for a vegetable stir-fry.
answer:
Title: "Stir-Fry Vegetables"
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
1 lb. bean sprouts
10 pea pods
2 c. cauliflower flowerets
2 c. broccoli flowerets
2 medium carrots, sliced
2 celery sticks, sliced
1 (8 oz.) pkg. mushrooms, sliced
1/2 medium bell pepper, sliced in rings or strips
1/2 medium brown onion, sliced in rings or strips
Directions:
In large skillet, heat oil over medium heat.
Add all vegetables, except onion, mushrooms and bell pepper.
Cook until vegetables are almost to the desired tenderness, then add the onion, mushrooms and bell pepper, adding as much soy sauce as desired to taste.
Cook up to 1/2 hour or until done to taste. Serve with rice, chow mein noodles or both.

question: I need a recipe for a vegetable stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Oven Fried Vegetables(A Weight Watcher Recipe)
Ingredients:
2 large potatoes (skin on), cut up into slices
2 zucchini, cut up into slices
1 large onion, cut up into slices
2 carrots, cut up into slices
1 green pepper, cut up into slices
1 red pepper, cut up into slices
1 turnip, sliced very thin
2 Tbsp. olive oil
seasoned salt
Directions:
Put vegetables in a bowl and toss with oil.
Arrange in a shallow layer on a nonstick cookie sheet; sprinkle with seasoned salt.
Cook 20 to 30 minutes at 425°.

question: I need a recipe for a vegetable stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
olive oil flavored vegetable spray
1 medium onion, cut into thin slices
1 1/2 c. julienne cut carrots
1 1/2 c. fresh sugar snap peas
1 c. chopped red pepper
1/2 c. canned low sodium chicken broth (undiluted)
2 Tbsp. low sodium soy sauce
2 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper
Directions:
Coat a wok or large nonstick skillet with cooking spray.
Heat at medium-high (375°) until hot.
Add onion.
Stir-fry 3 minutes. Add carrot.
Stir-fry 2 minutes.
Add peas and sweet red pepper. Stir-fry 4 to 5 minutes or until crisp-tender.

question: I need a recipe for a vegetable stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Vegetable Medley Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1/2 cup orange juice, chicken stock or low-sodium chicken stock
1 teaspoon cornstarch
2 teaspoons honey
2 teaspoons reduced-sodium soy sauce
2 teaspoons rice vinegar or white wine vinegar
1/4 teaspoon hot red pepper sauce
1 teaspoon each olive and dark sesame oil
4 small carrots, peeled and thinly sliced diagonally (2 cups)
1 large sweet red pepper (8 ounces), cut into strips 1/4 inch wide
1 medium-size yellow onion, halved and thinly sliced (2 cups)
4 ounces snow peas or sugar snap peas, trimmed
1 teaspoon toasted sesame seeds (optional)
Directions:
In a small bowl, stir together the orange juice and cornstarch until well blended. Add the honey, soy sauce, vinegar, and red pepper sauce, stirring to combine. In a large wok or 12-inch nonstick skillet, heat the olive oil and sesame oil over moderately high heat until hot but not smoking. Add the carrots, sweet red pepper, and onion and stir-fry for 8 minutes. Stir in the orange juice mixture and cook for 1 minute or until the sauce boils and thickens. Stir in the sesame seeds if desired. Serve with grilled poultry or beef and brown rice.

question: I need a recipe for a vegetable stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 c. bean sprouts
1 (8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts
1 c. slantedly sliced carrots
1 c. slantedly sliced celery
1 small sliced onion
1 small sliced zucchini
1/2 small cabbage, shredded coarsely
3 or 4 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. cooking wine
1 1/2 Tbsp. brown sugar
3 Tbsp. cornstarch
2 1/2 c. cold water
1/2 tsp. fresh ginger, minced
3 or 4 pieces garlic, minced
Directions:
In wok at high heat, sprayed well, add celery, carrots, onions and water chestnuts and stir-fry about 2 minutes, then add bean sprouts, cabbage and zucchini, stirring an additional 2 minutes or until cabbage begins to wilt.
Add spices, soy sauce and cooking wine to blend well.
Then dissolve water and cornstarch and then pour over vegetables.
Reduce heat and simmer until sauce thickens.
Serve over rice or noodles.

question: Give me a quick breakfast idea with oats.
answer:
Title: Breakfast Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. boiling water
1 c. quick oats
1 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. cloves
1/2 c. shortening
2 eggs
1 c. brown sugar
1/2 c. chopped dates
1/2 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
Combine first 2 ingredients and set aside.
Sift together next 5 ingredients.
Cream shortening, eggs and brown sugar.
Add nuts and dates to creamed mixture.
Combine all ingredients and mix well by hand.

question: Give me a quick breakfast idea with oats.
answer:
Title: Oats Cereal
Ingredients:
1 c. quick oats
1 c. brown sugar
6 c. coconut
1 c. oleo or butter
1 (12 oz.) can wheat germ
Directions:
Mix and roast until light brown.
Serve with milk.
Roast at 350°.

question: Give me a quick breakfast idea with oats.
answer:
Title: Breakfast Granola
Ingredients:
1 large box quick oats (2 lb. 10 oz.)
2 c. shredded coconut
2 c. wheat germ
1 c. whole wheat flour
1 Tbsp. salt
1 c. raw cashews or almonds, chopped
1/2 c. brown sugar
3/4 c. oil
1 c. honey
3/4 c. water
1 Tbsp. vanilla
Directions:
Mix together the first 6 ingredients.
Whiz together in blender the next 5 ingredients.
Add to dry mixture, stirring thoroughly.
Bake at 250°, stirring every 20 minutes for about 1 hour or until brown.
Yields 24 cups.

question: Give me a quick breakfast idea with oats.
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. rolled oats (breakfast oatmeal cereal)
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. melted shortening
1 yeast cake or 1 pkg. dry yeast
1/2 c. molasses or white or brown sugar
5 1/2 c. sifted flour
Directions:
Pour 2 cups boiling water over rolled oats; let sit for 1 hour, then add yeast softened in 1 cup warm water followed by remaining ingredients.
Add flour gradually, stirring until dough stiffens, then knead until all flour is absorbed.
Let dough rise in greased bowl until double.
Punch down.
Form into loaves.
Let rise again until double, then bake at 375° until golden brown, approximately 1 hour.
Remove from pans and cool on rack.

question: Give me a quick breakfast idea with oats.
answer:
Title: Apple And Oat Breakfast Mix
Ingredients:
2 c. quick cooking oatmeal
1 1/2 c. chopped, dried apples
2/3 c. chopped pecans
1/4 c. brown sugar, packed
1 tsp. cinnamon
Directions:
To dry apples:
Select any tart, firm-textured apple (Granny Smith, Jonathan or McIntosh).
Wash, peel, core and cut into 1/4 to 1/2-inch slices or rings.
Pretreat by dipping in ascorbic acid mixture.
Dry at 130° to 135° until pliable, preferably in a food dehydrator.
I use the oven; it works well.
I place fruit on a cookie sheet.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted salmon?
answer:
Title: Quick Salmon Casserole
Ingredients:
2 eggs, beaten
1/2 c. milk
1 tsp. lemon juice
2 tsp. chopped onion
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. sage
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 (1 lb.) can salmon, drained
1/2 c. buttered bread crumbs
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in order given; place in greased 8-inch casserole.
Bake at 350° for 40 minutes.
Serve with thin white sauce.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted salmon?
answer:
Title: Pacific Salmon With Roasted Garlic
Ingredients:
4 (6 oz.) salmon fillets
1 medium head garlic
1/4 c. olive oil
1 1/2 Tbsp. butter
1 fresh lemon
fresh rosemary, chopped
Directions:
Separate garlic into cloves and peel. Place in small ramekin and cover with olive oil. Wrap with foil. Bake at 400° for 30 minutes. Place garlic and 1 tablespoon of oil from baked garlic in food processor. Add butter and puree; season with salt and fresh ground pepper.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon, Fresh-Grilled Or Baked
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen salmon
2/3 c. onions, sliced
1 1/2 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
1/3 c. chopped fresh tomatoes
1/4 c. chopped green peppers
1/4 c. parsley
3 Tbsp. chopped pimentos
1/2 c. dry white wine
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. dill weed
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place salmon, skin side down, in baking dish which has been sprayed or greased and lined with aluminum foil.
Mix the vegetables, mushrooms, pimentos and parsley; put over fish.
Mix rest of ingredients and pour over fish.
Wrap foil over fish and seal tight.
Bake or grill 25 to 30 minutes at 350° or until flakes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted salmon?
answer:
Title: Quick Bernaise Sauce For Salmon(For Two)
Ingredients:
2/3 c. warm water
1 pkg. Durkee Hollandaise sauce
1 tsp. dried tarragon
sour cream
Directions:
To warm water add Hollandaise sauce (use a fork to blend in the powder).
Bring slowly to a simmer, stirring until the sauce thickens; use a "Dover" beater to smooth it if necessary.
Add a teaspoon of dried tarragon, stirring.
Just before serving, add an equal volume of sour cream, stirring.
This may be used as a hot or cold sauce.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted salmon?
answer:
Title: Quick Salmon Pie
Ingredients:
1 can salmon
1 c. Cheddar or American cheese, shredded
1/4 c. onions, chopped fine
2 c. milk
1 c. Bisquick
4 eggs, beaten
3/4 tsp. salt
dash of nutmeg
Directions:
Clean salmon by picking out bones and skin.
Put in greased pie plate.
Sprinkle 1 cup of cheese and onions over it.
Mix remaining ingredients in a bowl and pour over salmon.
Bake at 400° for 35 to 40 minutes or until knife inserted into pie comes out clean.

question: How do I make baked mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Baked Mac 'N' Cheese
Ingredients:
1 can condensed Cheddar cheese soup
1/2 can milk
1 tsp. prepared mustard
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 c. hot cooked elbow macaroni
2 tsp. margarine, melted
1 Tbsp. dry bread crumbs
Directions:
In a 1-quart casserole, combine soup, milk, mustard and pepper.
Stir in macaroni.
In a cup, combine margarine and bread crumbs.
Sprinkle over casserole and bake at 400° for 20 minutes or until hot and bubbly.
Yield:
4 side dish servings.

question: How do I make baked mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Baked Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
1 pkg. elbow macaroni
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1 3/4 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 lb. Cheddar, grated
1/3 bread crumbs
1 1/2 Tbsp. melted butter
Directions:
Cook
macaroni	as
directed
and drain. Melt butter in heavy saucepan.
Blend in flour. Stir in milk slowly and cook, stirring constantly,
until	mixture thickens. Add seasonings and
cheese, stirring
until
cheese
melts. Add macaroni and transfer to a buttered 1-quart casserole. Combine bread crumbs and melted butter. Sprinkle over macaroni. Bake in a 400° oven for 20 minutes.

question: How do I make baked mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Baked Mac And Cheese For 30 People
Ingredients:
1 lb. elbow macaroni
2 1/2 lb. New York State cheese
6 eggs
1 qt. milk
2 tsp. dry mustard
1 stick margarine
2 c. bread crumbs
Directions:
Boil macaroni according to directions on package; drain. While hot add grated cheese, saving some to put on top.
Add margarine and eggs which have been beaten into the milk.
Mix dry mustard with a little of the milk.
Place all in a large greased casserole. Spread cheese and bread crumbs on top.
Bake at 325° for 1 hour or until golden.
Delicious for large picnics or parties.

question: How do I make baked mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Mac & Cheese
Ingredients:
1 box elbow macaroni, (cooked & drained)
4 eggs
1 stick butter
3 c. mild shredded cheddar cheese
2 cans evaporated milk
salt & pepper to taste
Directions:
Mix all ingredients.
Make very soupy.
Cover with tin foil. Bake in 350 degree oven for 35-40 minutes.
If too much liquid, remove foil and bake until liquid is absorbed.

question: How do I make baked mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Homemade Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
8 slices American cheese
2 c. elbow macaroni, cooked
2 c. milk
1 bread slice
1/2 tsp. mustard powder
Directions:
Melt butter.
Add milk.
Add mustard powder.
Slowly add cheese.
Stir on low until sauce is thick.
Pour into baking dish with the macaroni.
Add broken bread bits.
Cook in oven at 350° for 20 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken nuggets?
answer:
Title: Chicken Nuggets
Ingredients:
1 c. dry bread crumbs
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. paprika
2 tsp. dried basil
3/4 c. butter or margarine, melted
2 1/2 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch cubes
Directions:
In a shallow bowl, combine the first 6 ingredients. Place melted butter in another. Dip chicken in butter and roll in crumbs. Place on a greased baking sheet and bake uncovered at 400° for 15 to 20 minutes or until juices run clear. Serve with your favorite dipping sauce.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken nuggets?
answer:
Title: Homemade Chicken Nuggets
Ingredients:
1 c. bread crumbs
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 1/2 to 2 lb. boneless chicken breasts
6 Tbsp. butter
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
Cut breasts into 1 1/2-inch pieces. Mix bread crumbs and cheese, salt and pepper.
Dip nuggets in melted butter and roll gently in crumbs.
Place on foil lined cookie sheet and bake 10 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken nuggets?
answer:
Title: Garden Style Chicken Nuggets
Ingredients:
1/2 pt. (8 oz.) sour cream
1/4 c. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. finely chopped garlic
2 lb. boneless chicken breast, cut into 1-inch pieces
1 1/2 c. plain dry bread crumbs
1 envelope vegetable soup mix
Directions:
In a medium bowl, thoroughly combine sour cream, mayonnaise, cheese, lemon juice and garlic.
Add chicken and toss until well coated.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken nuggets?
answer:
Title: Chicken Nuggets
Ingredients:
4 chicken breasts, skinned, boned and cut into bite size
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 c. plain flour
1/4 c. grated Parmesan
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/4 c. milk
corn oil or peanut oil
Directions:
Combine dry ingredients, mixing well.
Dip chicken in milk and dredge in flour mixture.
Heat one inch of oil in electric skillet to 325°.
Add chicken and fry 5 minutes on each side.
Drain on paper towels.
Makes 2 dozen nuggets.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken nuggets?
answer:
Title: Homemade Chicken Nuggets
Ingredients:
1 c. Pepperidge Farm stuffing crumbs
1 stick margarine
3 to 4 boneless chicken breasts
1/2 tsp. Accent
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese, grated
1/2 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. thyme
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Cut chicken into nugget size pieces. Melt margarine.
Combine in bowl and mix thoroughly, crumbs, Parmesan cheese, Accent, basil and thyme.
Dip chicken in margarine, then roll in crumb mixture.
Place on foil lined cookie sheet and bake 18 to 20 minutes.
Enjoy!

question: How do I make a hearty beef and barley soup?
answer:
Title: Hearty Vegetable Barley Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef stew meat, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 clove garlic, minced
7 c. water
1 (16 oz.) can whole tomatoes (undrained), cut into pieces
1/2 c. pearled barley
1/2 c. sliced celery
1/2 c. sliced carrots
4 beef bouillon cubes
1/2 tsp. crushed basil leaves
1 bay leaf
1 (9 oz.) pkg. frozen green beans or 16 oz. can undrained
Directions:
In 4-quart saucepan, brown meat in oil.
Add onion and garlic and continue cooking until onion is tender.
Drain.
Stir in remaining ingredients except green beans.
Cover, bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 50 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add green beans and continue cooking 10 minutes or until meat and barley are tender.
Additional water may be added if soup becomes too thick.
Makes twelve 1-cup servings.

question: How do I make a hearty beef and barley soup?
answer:
Title: Hearty Vegetable Barley Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. lean ground beef
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 garlic clove, minced
1 can (14 1/2 oz.) unsalted whole tomatoes undrained, cut into pieces
3/4 c. quick pearl barley or rice
5 1/2 c. water
1/2 c. sliced celery
1/2 c. sliced carrots
2 Beef Bouillon cubes
1/2 tsp. crushed basil
1 bay leaf
1 pkg. (9 oz.) frozen mixed vegetables
Directions:
Brown meat in Dutch oven.
Add onion & garlic till onion is tender.
Drain.
Stir in remaining ingredients except frozen vegetables.
Cover, bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir occasionally.
Add frozen vegetables.
Cook for 10 minutes until vegetables are done.
Additional water may be added if it becomes too thick upon standing.

question: How do I make a hearty beef and barley soup?
answer:
Title: Beef Barley Soup
Ingredients:
2 lb. boneless chuck, cut in 1/2-inch cubes
10 c. water
2 Tbsp. oil
1 1/2 c. medium barley
3 carrots, diced
1 c. chopped onion
3 large ribs celery with leaves, chopped coarse
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes, cut up
2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. chopped parsley
Directions:
In Dutch oven, bring beef and water to a boil.
Skim off foam.
Cover; simmer 1 hour.
Add remaining ingredients.
Stirring occasionally, simmer, uncovered, for 1 hour or until meat and barley are tender.
Serve immediately.
Refrigerate up to 3 days or freeze up to 3 months.
Serves 12.

question: How do I make a hearty beef and barley soup?
answer:
Title: Hearty Bean And Barley Soup
Ingredients:
2 lb. dried Great Northern beans
2 qt. water
1 c. fine barley
1 ham hock
2 c. coarsely chopped ham
1 lb. ground beef, cooked and drained
1 large onion, chopped
8 cloves garlic, chopped
6 carrots, sliced
4 (10 1/2 oz.) cans consomme
1 to 1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. hot sauce
2 fresh jalapeno peppers, split and seeded
Directions:
Sort and wash beans; place in a large Dutch oven.
Cover with water 2 inches above beans.
Let soak overnight.
Drain.
Add 2 quarts water; bring to a boil.
Add remaining ingredients; cover, reduce heat and simmer 2 1/2 hours, stirring occasionally.
Yields 5 1/2 quarts.
Freezes well.

question: How do I make a hearty beef and barley soup?
answer:
Title: Beef-Barley Soup
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 lb. beef stew meat, cut into 1-inch cubes
8 c. water
2 beef flavor bouillon cubes
1/2 c. hot water
1 (14 oz.) can stewed tomatoes
1 c. carrots, sliced
1 c. chopped onion
1 c. chopped celery
1/2 c. barley
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Heat oil and beef; cook, stirring often, until brown.
Add 8 cups of water; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer 1 hour or until meat is fork-tender.
With slotted spoon, remove meat.
With 2 forks, shred meat.
Set aside.
In cup, dissolve bouillon in 1/2 cup of water.
Add to soup kettle the tomatoes, carrots, onion, celery, barley, salt and pepper.
Stir in meat. Cover and simmer 1 1/2 to 2 hours until vegetables are tender.

question: How do I make a classic shrimp scampi?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Scampi(Makes 4 Servings)
Ingredients:
2 lb. large shrimp
1/2 c. olive oil
2 tsp. finely chopped garlic
2 Tbsp. finely chopped parsley
1/8 tsp. crushed red pepper flakes
1/2 tsp. dried, crushed oregano
2 Tbsp. bread crumbs
salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
Directions:
Preheat broiler to high.
Peel shrimp, rinse, drain well and pat dry.
Mix the remaining ingredients in a large bowl.
Add shrimp and mix to coat well.

question: How do I make a classic shrimp scampi?
answer:
Title: Low-Fat Shrimp Scampi
Ingredients:
2 lb. large raw shrimp
1/2 c. liquid Butter Buds
1/2 tsp. lite salt (optional)
6 cloves garlic, crushed
1/4 c. chopped parsley
2 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
6 lemon wedges (1 lemon)
4 c. cooked rice
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Remove shells from shrimp, leaving shell on tail section only.
Devein, wash under running water and drain on paper towels.
Spray a 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish with a nonfat cooking spray.
Blend together liquid Butter Buds, lite salt, garlic and 2 tablespoons parsley.
Pour into prepared dish. Arrange shrimp in single layer in baking dish.
Bake, uncovered, 5 minutes.
Turn shrimp.
Sprinkle with lemon peel, lemon juice and remaining parsley.
Bake 8 to 10 minutes longer, or until just tender.
Arrange shrimp over cooked rice.
Pour garlic-Butter Buds mixture over shrimp.
Garnish with lemon wedges.
Do not overcook the shrimp or they will be tough.
If using smaller shrimp, cut down on cooking time.
Serve with sourdough or French bread to soak up the sauce.
Yields 8 servings.

question: How do I make a classic shrimp scampi?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Scampi
Ingredients:
2 lb. shrimp, shelled and deveined
1 1/2 sticks margarine or butter
1 Tbsp. garlic or use garlic powder
1 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. parsley
1/2 c. chopped scallions or green onions
2 lemons (juice and grated rind of one; can use concentrated lemon juice)
Directions:
Melt margarine and add garlic, salt, pepper, parsley, scallions and lemons.
Grease a large shallow pan and place shrimp in single layer on bottom of pan.
Pour butter mixture over shrimp.
Place under broiler for 5 minutes, until pink.
Remove. Serve on bed of rice.
Can pour butter sauce over rice.

question: How do I make a classic shrimp scampi?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Scampi
Ingredients:
1 lb. raw shrimp with shells
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. butter/margarine
1/4 tsp. garlic powder or 2 cloves, minced
2 Tbsp. fresh or 1 Tbsp. dried parsley
2 Tbsp. dry sherry (optional)
2 c. instant rice
2 c. water
1 Tbsp. parsley
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. seafood seasoning
Directions:
Combine water, parsley, pepper and seasoning in covered saucepan.
Bring to a boil.
Combine oil, butter, garlic and parsley in 10-inch skillet and bring to frying temperature.

question: How do I make a classic shrimp scampi?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Scampi
Ingredients:
8 Tbsp. butter
3 to 6 cloves garlic, finely chopped
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. dried parsley flakes
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 lb. shrimp, shelled
Directions:
In shallow baking dish, combine all ingredients except shrimp. Microwave, uncovered, at High level for 4 to 5 minutes or until hot, stirring twice.
Stir shrimp into butter sauce.
Cover. Microwave at High for 5 to 7 1/2 minutes or until shrimp curl and turn pink.
Let stand, covered, 3 to 5 minutes before serving. Yield:
4 servings.

question: How do I make a traditional beef lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna With White Sauce
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 large onion, chopped
1 can tomatoes with liquid, cut up
2 Tbsp. tomato paste
1 beef bouillon cube
1 1/2 tsp. Italian seasoning
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. ground red pepper
2 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. milk
1 1/4 c. shredded Mozzarella
10 to 12 uncooked lasagna noodles
Directions:
In Dutch oven, cook beef and onion until meat is brown; drain. Add tomatoes, tomato paste, bouillon and seasonings.
Cover and cook for 20 minutes.

question: How do I make a traditional beef lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef, cooked
1 clove garlic
1 Tbsp. basil
2 c. tomatoes
12 oz. tomato paste
1 1/2 tsp. salt
3 c. cottage cheese
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. parsley flakes
1 tsp. salt
2 eggs, beaten
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 lb. Mozzarella cheese, sliced thin
Directions:
Cook first 6 ingredients together to make meat sauce.
Mix remaining ingredients together except for the Mozzarella cheese to make the cheese mixture.
Lightly grease a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Put thin layer of tomato sauce mixture in bottom of pan.
Next, layer uncooked lasagna noodles, next 1/2 of cottage cheese mixture and then 1/2 of Mozzarella cheese.
Repeat layering, saving some tomato mixture for top.
Cover with foil.
Bake at 350° for 60 minutes.

question: How do I make a traditional beef lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground beef
1 clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. whole basil
1 tsp. oregano
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 lb. can tomatoes
1 (12 oz.) can tomato paste
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
8 oz. egg noodles
3 c. creamed cottage cheese
1/2 c. Parmesan and Romano cheese
2 Tbsp. parsley flakes
2 beaten eggs
1/2 Tbsp. + 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 Tbsp. pepper
1 lb. Mozzarella cheese, sliced thin
Directions:
Brown beef; spoon off fat.
Add next 7 ingredients.
Simmer approximately 30 minutes.
Cook noodles; rinse and combine remaining ingredients in bowl except Mozzarella cheese.
Layer noodles, cottage cheese, Mozzarella, then meat sauce.
Repeat. Bake at 375° for 30 minutes.
Let stand 10 minutes before cutting into squares.

question: How do I make a traditional beef lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
2/3 lb. ground beef
1 Tbsp. butter
2 peeled and chopped onions
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can crushed tomatoes
2 Tbsp. tomato paste
1 beef bouillon cube
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried basil
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Saute ground beef in butter.
Transfer to a pot.
Saute onions; add to meat.
Also add remaining ingredients; cook over medium-low heat, covered, for 20 minutes.

question: How do I make a traditional beef lasagna?
answer:
Title: Real Italian Lasagna
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground beef
2 or 3 onions, chopped
1 (28 oz.) can whole tomatoes
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1/4 tsp. sage
1/4 tsp. parsley flakes
1/4 tsp. rosemary
1/4 tsp. thyme
1/4 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. celery salt
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. marjoram
1/4 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
salt and pepper to taste
6 to 8 lasagna noodles, cooked
8 oz. cottage cheese or Ricotta cheese
10 oz. Cheddar cheese, shredded
10 oz. Mozzarella cheese, shredded
1 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Brown the ground beef in a skillet, stirring until crumbly; drain.
Add the onions, tomatoes, tomato sauce and seasonings. Simmer for 30 minutes or longer, adding water gradually as needed. Layer the lasagna noodles, sauce, cottage cheese, Cheddar, Mozzarella and Parmesan cheeses 1/2 at a time in a greased 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
Bake at 350° for 25 minutes.
Yields 8 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a low-sugar dessert?
answer:
Title: "That Good Dessert"
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. plain flour
3/4 c. melted margarine or butter
3/4 c. chopped pecans (fine)
Directions:
Mix together; grease your hand and press into 9 x 12-inch pan. Bake at 375° for 15 minutes.
Cool.

question: What’s a good recipe for a low-sugar dessert?
answer:
Title: Sugarless Cake*
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 1/2 c. applesauce
1 c. dates or raisins
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 c. whole wheat flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. cloves
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. nuts or cranberries
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients.
Beat eggs and vanilla; add to dry mixture.
Add melted butter, applesauce, raisins and nuts.
Bake in tube pan in 350 °oven for 45 minutes to 1 hour.

question: What’s a good recipe for a low-sugar dessert?
answer:
Title: Good Neighbor Recipe
Ingredients:
1 tongue that does not slander
1 mind full of tolerance
2 ears closed to gossip
2 eyes overlooking other's faults
1 heart generous and kind
2 hands extending to help others
1 dash of wit
1 big smile
1 dash of sunny disposition
1 dash of cheerfulness
Directions:
Blend together all ingredients. Serve generous portions to everyone you meet.

question: What’s a good recipe for a low-sugar dessert?
answer:
Title: Sugarless Fruit Cake(Yields 2 Loaf Pans)
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped dates
1 c. chopped prunes
1 c. chopped raisins
1/2 c. margarine
2 c. water
4 eggs
2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
2 tsp. cinnamon
2 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. chopped nuts
4 pkg. Sweet 'N Low
Directions:
Place first 5 ingredients in saucepan.
Bring to a boil and simmer 2 minutes.
Cool.
Add remaining ingredients and bake for 40 minutes at 350° in 2 loaf pans, coated with vegetable spray.

question: What’s a good recipe for a low-sugar dessert?
answer:
Title: Diabetic Sugarless Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. raisins
1 sq. baking chocolate
1 c. chopped apple
1 tsp. baking powder
1 egg
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. water
1/2 c. margarine
1 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. soda
1 1/2 Tbsp. liquid sweetener
1/2 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
Chop raisins and boil water and raisins for 5 minutes in a 2-quart pan.
Remove from heat and add apples, chocolate and margarine.
When mixture is cool, stir in flour, baking powder and soda.
Add egg, liquid sweetener (Sweet 10) and vanilla.
Beat 1 minute by hand and stir in nuts.
Bake in 9 x 9-inch pan for 40 minutes at 350°.
Cut into pieces, wrap and store in freezer. Contains 175 calories per piece.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade veggie burger?
answer:
Title: Veggie Burger Patties
Ingredients:
3 c. water
2/3 c. pearl barley
2/3 c. lentils
2/3 c. long grain brown rice
1/4 c. vegetable oil
2 c. grated carrots
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 Tbsp. minced garlic
1/4 c. shelled sunflower seeds
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh basil
2 tsp. chopped fresh thyme
2 tsp. chopped fresh oregano
salt and pepper to taste
4 beaten eggs
7 Tbsp. flour
vegetable oil for frying
Directions:
Dried herbs can be substituted, use smaller amounts.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade veggie burger?
answer:
Title: Veggie Burger
Ingredients:
3 c. cooked lentils
1 c. plain bread crumbs
3 egg whites
1 c. cooked spinach
1/2 c. chopped carrots, cooked
1/2 c. chopped green onions
1 c. shredded Cheddar
1 Tbsp. black pepper
1 Tbsp. olive oil
salt to taste
8 wheat buns
Directions:
Combine lentils, bread crumbs, egg whites, spinach, carrots, onions, Cheddar cheese, salt and pepper in a bowl.
Shape into 6 equal patties.
Place on baking sheet.
Refrigerate for 2 hours.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade veggie burger?
answer:
Title: Veggie Burger
Ingredients:
1 medium red bell pepper
1 medium green bell pepper
1 onion
1/2 to 1 small garlic clove
1 large carrot
1/2 c. mushrooms
1 c. couscous (Moroccan pasta)
1 egg
Directions:
Ground bell pepper, onion, garlic, carrot and mushrooms.
(May chop fine in food processor for best results).
Cook 1 cup of couscous as directed on box of pasta.
Add to ground ingredients, then add 1 scrambled egg.
Mix well.
Roll out to patties.
Bake or fry as desired.
Serve on hamburger buns (cheese optional).
May use rice instead of couscous.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade veggie burger?
answer:
Title: Student Veggie Burger
Ingredients:
1 can beans (your choice)
pasta sauce
1 green pepper
1 onion
bread crumbs or crackers
vegetable oil
lettuce
cheese (optional)
hamburger condiments (ketchup, mustard, pickles, etc.)
bread
Directions:
Drain juice from beans and crush in mixing bowl.
When beans are mashed into a paste, add sauce, diced green pepper and diced onion.
Add bread crumbs or crushed crackers until mixture can be formed into patties.
Heat 1/8 cup oil in pan; grill patties. Sandwich patty with desired toppings and serve.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade veggie burger?
answer:
Title: Veggie Burger
Ingredients:
4 oz. ground turkey
1 1/2 c. fresh spinach, cooked
1/2 c. chopped zucchini
1 chopped green onion
black pepper to taste
Mrs. Dash to taste
Directions:
Process vegetables in food processor until well chopped.
Mix all with turkey.
Form into burger and bake.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Quick Salmon Casserole
Ingredients:
2 eggs, beaten
1/2 c. milk
1 tsp. lemon juice
2 tsp. chopped onion
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. sage
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 (1 lb.) can salmon, drained
1/2 c. buttered bread crumbs
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in order given; place in greased 8-inch casserole.
Bake at 350° for 40 minutes.
Serve with thin white sauce.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon, Fresh-Grilled Or Baked
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen salmon
2/3 c. onions, sliced
1 1/2 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
1/3 c. chopped fresh tomatoes
1/4 c. chopped green peppers
1/4 c. parsley
3 Tbsp. chopped pimentos
1/2 c. dry white wine
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. dill weed
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place salmon, skin side down, in baking dish which has been sprayed or greased and lined with aluminum foil.
Mix the vegetables, mushrooms, pimentos and parsley; put over fish.
Mix rest of ingredients and pour over fish.
Wrap foil over fish and seal tight.
Bake or grill 25 to 30 minutes at 350° or until flakes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Baked Salmon
Ingredients:
3/4 to 1 c. bread crumbs or cracker crumbs
2 c. (1 lb.) Royal Pink salmon
1/4 tsp. pepper
3/4 tsp. sage
2 tsp. minced onion
2 tsp. chopped parsley
2 tsp. chopped pickles
4 Tbsp. butter, melted
1/4 c. milk
Directions:
Drain salmon; flake in large pieces.
Arrange in bottom of medium sized shallow casserole.
Mix together remaining ingredients.
Spread over salmon and bake in a moderate oven at 400° about 25 minutes.
Serves 4.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Quick Salmon Pie
Ingredients:
1 can salmon
1 c. Cheddar or American cheese, shredded
1/4 c. onions, chopped fine
2 c. milk
1 c. Bisquick
4 eggs, beaten
3/4 tsp. salt
dash of nutmeg
Directions:
Clean salmon by picking out bones and skin.
Put in greased pie plate.
Sprinkle 1 cup of cheese and onions over it.
Mix remaining ingredients in a bowl and pour over salmon.
Bake at 400° for 35 to 40 minutes or until knife inserted into pie comes out clean.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Cakes
Ingredients:
1 large can salmon
1/4 c. milk
1 c. dry bread crumbs
1 egg
shortening
1 Tbsp. onion, chopped
1 Tbsp. green pepper, chopped fine
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Put salmon in bowl, flake and remove bones.
Beat egg. Combine with milk, crumbs and other ingredients.
Add to salmon. Mix well.
Shape into 6 cakes.
Place in hot shortening over medium heat and brown on both sides.
Serve with tartar sauce, if desired.
These may also be baked at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes.

question: How do I make a mango salsa for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Mango Salsa
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. chopped mango
1 1/2 c. chopped tomato
2 Tbsp. minced fresh cilantro
2 Tbsp. lime juice
1 Tbsp. jalapeno, finely chopped and seeded
1 tsp. fresh ginger, peeled and minced
Directions:
Combine and chill.
Can use this with grilled meats and fish.

question: How do I make a mango salsa for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Mango Salsa
Ingredients:
3 ripe mangos, peeled, seeded and chopped
1/2 sweet onion, chopped
1 tomato, chopped
3 Tbsp. cilantro
3 Tbsp. lime juice
3/4 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
Combine all ingredients; cover and chill. Serve as a relish for grilled fish or as a dip for chips.

question: How do I make a mango salsa for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Mango Salsa(Great With Salmon Or Beef Tenderloin.)
Ingredients:
1 mango, chopped
1/2 red bell pepper, chopped
1/3 c red onion, chopped
1/4 fresh cilantro, chopped
3 Tbsp fresh lime juice
1/3 c jalapeno jelly
1/3 c jalapeno chile, or part of it
Directions:
Whisk jelly and lime juice in large bowl.
Mix with remaining ingredients.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Can be made 3 hours ahead.
Marshall Fields has a mild red pepper jelly that is nice to use.

question: How do I make a mango salsa for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Papaya Or Mango Salsa
Ingredients:
6 sprigs cilantro, stemmed and chopped
1 large mango, peeled and diced
2 jalapenos, seeded and finely diced
1/2 small red onion, peeled and diced
1 to 2 limes, juiced
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Mix all ingredients well and allow to sit, refrigerated, for at least 1 hour.
You may make salsa ahead of serving time but only by 24 hours or less.

question: How do I make a mango salsa for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Mango-Kiwi Salsa
Ingredients:
2 to 3 mangos
5 kiwi
1/2 red onion
1/2 green pepper
1 tsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. garlic
1/3 c. lemon juice
1/2 c. lime juice
1 Tbsp. mint leaves
Directions:
Dice fruit and vegetables. Add other ingredients and chill before serving. Serve with tortilla chips.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
1/4 c. oats
1 c. packed brown sugar
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
3 to 4 green apples, peeled and sliced to make 6 c.
1 Tbsp. flour
1 Tbsp. white sugar
3/4 c. melted butter
Directions:
Mix together 1 1/2 cups flour, oats, brown sugar, cinnamon and melted butter.
Press 1/2 of mixture in bottom of a 9 x 12-inch greased baking dish.
In a large bowl, combine sliced apples with 1 tablespoon flour and 1 tablespoon sugar.
Turn into crust. Sprinkle with remaining half of mixture.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour. Serve warm with whipped cream or ice cream, if desired.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
1 c. brown sugar
5 oz. all-purpose white flour
4 to 6 c. cooking apples (1 1/2 to 2 lb.), peeled, cored and thinly sliced
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 c. butter
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 tsp. lemon rind, grated
Directions:
Combine 1/2 cup sugar and 1 ounce flour in mixing bowl. Squeeze lemon juice over apple slices.
Toss apples with sugar mixture.
Put
in
ovenproof
baking
dish.
Thoroughly
mix butter,
remaining
flour
and
cinnamon.
Add
lemon rind and remaining
1/2 cup of sugar.
Sprinkle mixture over apples and bake
in
oven
at 350° for 30 minutes or until golden.
Serve warm with ice cream.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Chicken Classic
Ingredients:
3 lb. chicken
1 can cream of chicken soup
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 soup can milk
1 stick butter
1/2 lb. herb stuffing mix
onion flakes
celery flakes
salt
1 c. stock from boiling chicken
Directions:
Boil chicken for 1 hour.
Onion, celery and salt can be added to the water.
Bone chicken.
Lay in 13 x 9-inch pan.
Mix both soup and the can of milk; pour over chicken.
Melt 1 stick of butter with 1 cup of stock from boiled chicken.
Sprinkle herb stuffing mix on top of chicken.
Pour butter/stock mixture on top of stuffing mix.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Crumbled Apple Dessert
Ingredients:
4 to 6 apples, sliced
2/3 c. light brown sugar
dash of cinnamon
3 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. cold water
1/2 c. brown sugar
1 c. flour
1/2 c. butter
pinch of salt
Directions:
Slice
apples
in deep baking dish.
Cover with 2/3 cup brown sugar,
cinnamon
and butter.
Sprinkle cold water over all. Combine
1/2
cup brown sugar, flour, 1/2 cup butter and salt to form
a crumbly mixture.
Put on top of apples.
Bake for 30
to 40
minutes or until apples are tender and crust a golden brown.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
1 c. brown sugar
5 oz. all-purpose flour
4 to 6 c. apples
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 c. butter
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
Directions:
Peel, core and slice apples.
Combine 1/2 cup of sugar and 1 ounce of flour in a bowl.
Combine lemon juice and apples.
Mix with sugar mixture.
Put in a baking dish.
Mix butter, remaining flour and cinnamon.
Add remaining 1/2 cup of sugar.
Sprinkle mixture over apples and bake at 350° for 30 minutes or until top is golden.

question: I want to make a no-bake cheesecake. Can you help?
answer:
Title: The Ultimate Cheesecake
Ingredients:
1 c. sifted all-purpose flour
1/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. grated lemon peel
1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
1 egg yolk
1/4 c. butter, softened
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Grease inside of 9-inch spring-form pan. Remove side.
Make crust:
In medium bowl combine flour, sugar, lemon peel and vanilla.
Make well in center; with fork blend in yolk and butter.
Mix with fingertips until smooth.
On bottom of pan, form half of dough into ball.
Roll pastry to edge of pan. Bake 6 to 8 minutes, or until golden brown.
Meanwhile, roll rest of dough into 3 strips 2 1/4-inches wide and 9-inches long. Assemble spring-form pan.
Line inside of pan with pastry strips, overlapping ends.
Preheat oven to 450°.

question: I want to make a no-bake cheesecake. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Basic Cheesecake(Easy, Delicious!)
Ingredients:
4 eggs
1 c. sugar
2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
2 tsp. vanilla
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Place all ingredients in blender.
Blend on High for 1 minute or 3 minutes with an electric mixer.
Pour into an 8-inch graham cracker
crust, or it is great without a crust as well. Microwave on Low for 19 to 23 minutes, rotating dish 1/4 turn every 7 minutes until center is almost set.
(Cut through it with a knife to see if it is set.
When knife is clean, it's ready.) Makes 1 (8-inch) cheesecake.

question: I want to make a no-bake cheesecake. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Old Fashion Cheesecake
Ingredients:
3 (8 oz.) cream cheese
1 (8 oz.) sour cream
1 1/3 c. sugar
2 tsp. vanilla
5 eggs
1 pkg. crescent rolls
raisins (optional)
cinnamon (optional)
Directions:
Blend cheeses.
Add sugar and vanilla.
Add eggs, one at a time, and beat after each egg.
Line bottom of a 9 x 13-inch pan with rolls, pressing seams together.
Pour in batter.
Top with cinnamon and raisins.
Bake at 375° for 35 to 45 minutes.
If using a glass pan, bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes.
Turn off oven and leave cake inside 5 to 7 minutes.

question: I want to make a no-bake cheesecake. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Best-Ever Cheesecake
Ingredients:
1 c. sifted enriched flour
1/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. grated lemon peel
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1 slightly beaten egg yolk
1/4 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar and lemon peel. Cut in butter until mixture is crumbly. Add egg yolk and vanilla; blend well. Pat 1/3 of dough on bottom of 9-inch spring-form pan (sides removed). Bake at 400° about 6 minutes or until golden; cool. Butter sides of pan; attach to bottom. Pat remaining dough evenly on sides to a height of 2-inches.

question: I want to make a no-bake cheesecake. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Special Individual Cheesecakes
Ingredients:
3 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 c. sugar
5 eggs
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla or lemon flavoring
1 c. sour cream
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. sugar
red currant jelly or prepared pie topping
Directions:
Cream 1 cup sugar and cream cheese.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well, about
10
to
15 minutes.
Add 1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla.
Pour
mixture
into
foil
lined
baking cups which have paper
separators.
Fill
about 3/4 full.
Bake for 40 minutes at 300°
.
Cheesecakes
will
rise,
but
will not brown.
Take out of oven
and cool for 5 minutes.
A hole will form in center
of cheesecakes.
Combine
sour cream, 1/2 cup sugar and 1/4 teaspoon vanilla;
put
about
one
or two teaspoons of mixture into the hole that forms in each cheesecake. Add 1 teaspoon jelly
or
pie filling on top.
Return to oven and bake for 5 minutes.
Makes 24 cheesecakes.

question: What’s a good recipe for garlic butter pasta?
answer:
Title: Easy Garlic Pasta
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. basil
1 Tbsp. parsley
1/4 c. butter/margarine (room temperature)
8 oz. cream cheese (room temperature)
1/3 c. Parmesan, grated
1/4 c. olive oil
1 clove garlic, chopped fine
1/2 Tbsp. pepper
2/3 c. boiling water
Directions:
Blend parsley and basil into butter.
Blend this with cream cheese.
Add Parmesan, olive oil, garlic and pepper.
When pasta is ready, drain.
Add 2/3 cup boiling water to cheese mixture. Stir and toss with pasta.

question: What’s a good recipe for garlic butter pasta?
answer:
Title: Garlic Herb Butter
Ingredients:
2/3 c. oleo
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
2 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. dry oregano
Directions:
Soften oleo and stir in remaining ingredients.
Use to make garlic bread; put on chicken.
Cook 1 cup spiral pasta according to package directions and drain well.
Put into serving bowl or dish.
Add 2 tablespoons or more to taste and toss well to coat pasta.

question: What’s a good recipe for garlic butter pasta?
answer:
Title: Good Neighbor Recipe
Ingredients:
1 tongue that does not slander
1 mind full of tolerance
2 ears closed to gossip
2 eyes overlooking other's faults
1 heart generous and kind
2 hands extending to help others
1 dash of wit
1 big smile
1 dash of sunny disposition
1 dash of cheerfulness
Directions:
Blend together all ingredients. Serve generous portions to everyone you meet.

question: What’s a good recipe for garlic butter pasta?
answer:
Title: Buttered Noodles
Ingredients:
9 c. wide egg noodles, uncooked
1/4 c. (1/2 stick) real butter
2 tsp. chopped fresh parsley
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Cook pasta according to package directions.
In saucepan over low heat, add remaining ingredients.
Heat until butter is melted; stir in hot pasta.
Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until thoroughly heated.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for garlic butter pasta?
answer:
Title: Mustard Butter Pasta With Broccoli
Ingredients:
5/8 c. butter (may be part olive oil or soy oil)
4 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
2 Tbsp. well minced parsley
2 Tbsp. finely sliced chives or green onion, sliced and minced
3/4 lb. fettucine or linguini
2 c. broccoli, cut in small flowerets
2 cloves garlic
1 Tbsp. oil
salt and pepper
Directions:
Set out butter to soften, when soft blend in mustard.
Slice garlic and pound in a mortar with a health pinch of salt.
When pulpy, add parsley and chives and continue pounding a short while. Blend this mixture into butter with a little black pepper.
In a large pot, boil a generous amount of water with a teaspoon salt and tablespoon oil.
Fan the pasta into boiling water.
If using fresh pasta, add broccoli at the same time, if using dried pasta, add broccoli for last couple of minutes of cooking.
When done, scoop out pasta and broccoli and drain.
Put the pasta and broccoli into a large skillet, allowing some water to dribble in.
Add the prepared butter and over moderate heat, toss the pasta until it is evenly coated.
Keep heat low enough that butter does not bubble or fry.
Check seasonings and add salt and pepper if necessary.

question: How do I make a hearty vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Hearty Beef Stew
Ingredients:
1/2 c. flour
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
4 lb. stew meat (1 1/2-inch cubes)
4 Tbsp. oil
3 small onions
3 c. water or beef broth
8 to 10 carrots (1-inch chunks)
12 oz. pkg. snow peas or 2 pkg. green beans
Directions:
Mix
well
flour,
salt
and
pepper,
then roll meat in mixture
and
brown
in
oil using large Dutch oven, then brown onions.
Add water and carrots; bring to boil.
Reduce heat and simmer
2 to 2 1/2 hours until meat is tender, then add peas or beans.
Cover
and
continue
to
cook until meat is completely done.
Can be stored in freezer.

question: How do I make a hearty vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Hearty Chicken Stew
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 medium onion, finely chopped
3 cloves garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. minced fresh ginger or 1 tsp. ground ginger
2 Tbsp. flour
2 medium tomatoes, diced
8 to 10 peppercorns or to taste
6 whole cloves
1 cinnamon stick
8 pieces chicken (about 2 1/2 lb.), skinned and fat removed
2 c. water
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
3/4 lb. baby carrots (fresh or frozen)
6 oz. green peas (fresh or frozen)
8 oz. red or white new potatoes, scrubbed and unpeeled
Directions:
In a deep skillet or Dutch oven, heat oil over medium-high heat.
Saute onion, ginger and garlic until onion is soft, about 3 minutes.
Add flour and cook 1 minute, stirring quickly to prevent sticking.
Stir in tomatoes and allow to cook another 2 minutes.

question: How do I make a hearty vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Hearty Hamburger Stew
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 c. chopped onoins
1 c. sliced carrots
12 fresh mushrooms, sliced
1/2 c. green peppers
1 lb. hamburger
2 c. tomato juice
1 c. diced potatoes
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. flour
2 c. milk
Directions:
Place onions, carrots, green pepper and mushrooms in butter. Add meat and cook until crumbly.
Drain off grease.
Stir in juice, potatoes and seasoning.
Cover and cook until vegetables are tender.
Combine flour and 1 cup of milk, beat until smooth. Stir into soup.
Add remaining milk.
Heat and stir.

question: How do I make a hearty vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Hearty Cabbage Stew
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground round
1 head cabbage
3 fresh carrots
1 medium onion
1 (10 oz.) frozen broccoli
1 (10 oz.) frozen corn
1 (10 oz.) frozen green beans
1 (15 oz.) can crowder peas
1 (15 oz.) can diced tomatoes
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
about 3 c. water
salt, pepper, garlic, oregano, basil and thyme to taste
Directions:
Saute ground round in 8-quart pot with onion; toss in shredded cabbage, cook until tender, adding water as needed.
Add spices and stir, to meat and cabbage.
Dice carrots, add to pot. Add 2 cups water, cover with lid; cook until tender.
Add green beans, broccoli and corn; cook until tender.
Add diced tomatoes and tomato sauce and 1 cup water and crowder peas.
Stir and cook for 1 to 2 hours on low-medium.
Add more water and spices as needed.
Serves about 12.
Serve with corn bread.

question: How do I make a hearty vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Hearty Beef And Vegetable Stew
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
2 tsp. salt, divided
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 lb. beef stew meat, cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces
2 Tbsp. oil
1 onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
4 parsnips (about 1 lb.), cut into 1-inch pieces
4 carrots (about 1 lb.), cut into 1-inch pieces
4 red skin potatoes (about 1 lb.), cut into 1-inch pieces
2 c. red wine or beef stock
1 1/2 tsp. dried thyme
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Combine flour, 1 teaspoon salt and pepper in plastic bag.
Add beef and shake until coated.
In large pot or Dutch oven, heat oil over medium-high heat.
Add meat in batches and cook until browned, about 20 minutes.
Remove meat. Reduce heat to medium.
Add onion, garlic and remaining 1 teaspoon salt.
Cook until onion is tender, about 5 minutes.

question: How do I make a quick and easy pad thai?
answer:
Title: Pad Thai(Stir-Fry Thai Noodles)
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. dried rice flour noodles (noodles can be found in Asian grocery store)
8 medium shrimp
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 large eggs
2 Tbsp. distilled vinegar
2 Tbsp. fish sauce
3 Tbsp. sugar
2 tsp. paprika
2 scallions, cut in 2-inch pieces
1 c. bean sprouts
1 garlic clove
1/2 c. roast unsalted peanuts, crushed
coriander sprigs for garnish
Directions:
Soak noodles in warm water for 30 minutes or until softened. Do not let noodles become mushy.
Drain and discard water.
Set noodles aside.
Heat oil over medium-high heat until hot.
Add garlic and stir-fry for 20 seconds.
Add shrimp and stir-fry for 2 to 3 minutes.
Set shrimp aside.
Add eggs, stirring constantly and breaking it into pieces.
Push eggs aside.
Add noodles, vinegar, fish sauce, sugar and paprika and toss gently over medium heat for about 1 to 2 minutes.
Add scallions, bean sprouts and shrimp.
Mix all together for about 2 minutes.
Place noodles on a large platter.
Sprinkle crushed peanuts over noodles and garnish with the coriander sprigs and bean sprouts.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: How do I make a quick and easy pad thai?
answer:
Title: Pad Thaismall Width Noodles
Ingredients:
1 bag (16 oz.) Pad Thai Noodles
1 Clove Garlic
4 Tbsp. Peanut Oil
1 Egg
16 to 24 Shrimp (1 1/4 lbs.)
2 Tbsp. White Vinegar
1 1/2 Tbsp. Fish Sauce
1 Tbsp. Sugar
1/4 c. Ground Peanuts
1 tsp. Pepper
1 tsp. Ground Dried Shrimp
1 Scallion
1 c. Fresh Cilantro
Directions:
Soak the noodles in cold water overnight or 15 minutes in hot water.
Shell and devein shrimp.
Chop scallion and cilantro. Grind or crush the peanuts.
Preheat the oil in the WOK on medium-high, then add garlic and shrimp then stir until the shrimp turns white, add the egg and stir till cooked, add the noodles and all of the seasonings, stir or toss well.
Turn heat off, add bean sprouts and scallions.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a quick and easy pad thai?
answer:
Title: Thai Chicken
Ingredients:
1/3 c. finely chopped green onions
2 crushed garlic cloves
3 Tbsp. hoisin sauce
2 Tbsp. peanut butter
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. sesame oil
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. Tabasco sauce
8 skinned chicken thighs
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Combine first 8 ingredients.
Mix well.
Arrange chicken in shallow baking dish, single layer.
Spread sauce on top. Marinate for 2 hours.

question: How do I make a quick and easy pad thai?
answer:
Title: Spicy Thai Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) can tomatoes
1/4 c. raisins
2 Tbsp. currant jelly
1 Tbsp. canned chopped green chili peppers
1 clove garlic
2 tsp. vinegar
1/2 to 1 tsp. crushed red pepper
dash of salt
1 (2 1/2 to 3 lb.) broiler-fryer chicken, cut up
Directions:
For sauce, place all ingredients except chicken in a blender container or food processor bowl. Cover and blend or process until smooth. Transfer to a small saucepan.
Heat to boiling. Reduce heat.
Simmer, uncovered, 10 minutes or until mixture reaches brushing consistency.

question: How do I make a quick and easy pad thai?
answer:
Title: Thai Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. bite-sized cooked chicken pieces
1/3 c. salad oil
2 Tbsp. peanut butter
4 tsp. soy sauce
4 tsp. cider vinegar
1/8 tsp. crushed red pepper
3 green onions, chopped
Directions:
In bowl, whisk salad oil, next five ingredients and 1 tablespoon of water.
Stir in green onions.
Add chicken pieces and toss to coat with dressing.
Serve on lettuce leaves.
Makes 4 servings.
Contains 350 calories and 27 g fat per serving.

question: What can I make with canned tomatoes and beans?
answer:
Title: Beans For Strict Fast
Ingredients:
1 large can Great Northern beans
1 (15 oz.) can tomatoes
2 Tbsp. flour
2 Tbsp. oil
salt to taste
Directions:
In a saucepan, heat through the beans and the can of tomatoes, add salt to taste.
In a skillet, heat the oil; add flour and brown, making a smooth paste.
Add slowly to bean mixture to thicken.
Cook through until heated.

question: What can I make with canned tomatoes and beans?
answer:
Title: Tomato Pudding To Eat With Beans
Ingredients:
1 pt. canned tomatoes
3 slices bread, crumbled
1/2 c. sugar
5 small slices butter
Directions:
Cook
in
small pan in microwave on High for 8 minutes, stirring in between, until bubbly through.

question: What can I make with canned tomatoes and beans?
answer:
Title: Green Beans And Tomatoes
Ingredients:
3 cans cut-style green beans, drained
1 can stewed tomatoes
1 medium onion, minced
1/2 stick oleo
Directions:
Saute the onion until limp and mix in the rest of the ingredients.
Simmer 30 minutes and put into casserole.
Cover and reheat leftovers.

question: What can I make with canned tomatoes and beans?
answer:
Title: No Beans Dip
Ingredients:
1 (15 oz.) can chili (no beans)
1 (10 oz.) can tomatoes
1 small can green chilies, diced
2 c. pasteurized processed cheese, cubed
1/2 c. green onions, chopped
1 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
In saucepan, combine all ingredients.
Heat just until cheese melts, stirring frequently.
Serve warm, with raw vegetables (celery, carrots, etc.).
Even French bread slices are good. Makes 4 cups.

question: What can I make with canned tomatoes and beans?
answer:
Title: Company Green Beans
Ingredients:
2 cans green beans
1 can diced tomatoes
1 medium onion, chopped
1 medium green pepper, chopped
2 Tbsp. margarine
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Saute onion and green pepper in margarine. Add to green beans and tomatoes. Add salt, garlic powder and black pepper. Simmer for 20 minutes.

question: How do I make a healthy chicken and vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 lb. skinless, boneless chicken, cut into thin strips
3 c. cut up fresh vegetables (broccoli, carrot, sweet red pepper, green pepper)
1/4 tsp. garlic powder or 2 cloves garlic, minced
1 can tomato soup
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. vinegar
Directions:
In skillet, in 1 tablespoon hot oil, stir-fry half of the chicken until browned.
Remove and repeat with remaining chicken. In remaining 1 tablespoon hot oil, stir-fry vegetables with garlic powder until tender and crisp.
Add soup, soy and vinegar.
Heat to boiling.
Return chicken to skillet.
Heat through, stirring occasionally.
Serve over rice.

question: How do I make a healthy chicken and vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Heart Healthy Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean round steak
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 onion, sliced
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 lb. broccoli, sliced
1/2 lb. carrots, cut in 1/8-inch slices
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
Rub fish with Puritan oil.
Roll fish in corn flake crumbs. Season fish with salt and pepper.

question: How do I make a healthy chicken and vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Chicken And Vegetables
Ingredients:
3 oz. boneless skinless chicken, cubed or cut in slices
1/2 c. broccoli florets
1/2 c. onion, coarsely chopped
1/2 c. pea pods
1/2 medium green pepper, cut in strips
1/2 to 3/4 c. chicken broth (Healthy Request)
3 to 4 mushrooms (fresh)
pepper to taste
Directions:
Spray frying pan or wok with butter flavor Pam.
Quickly saute over medium-high heat the cubed chicken meat; add some water (1/4 cup) to bring up flavor.
After chicken is just about done, remove and set aside in covered dish.
Re-spray pan.
Over medium heat, add onion and green pepper; when onion is partially cooked, add broccoli.
Cover, heat and add 1/4 to 1/2 cup of chicken broth and season to taste.
When those vegetables are tender-crisp, add pea pods and sliced mushrooms, continue sauteing.
Stir 1 teaspoon cornstarch and remaining broth (water can be used or added for more juices); set aside.
Add chicken; saute some more to heat and mix thoroughly.
Add cornstarch mix.
Turn off heat and serve over 2/3 cup rice.
Each serving:
325 calories (including rice), 2 gm. fat.

question: How do I make a healthy chicken and vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1 lb. boneless chicken
1 c. broccoli
1 c. carrots
1 c. red peppers
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 can tomato soup
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. vinegar
cooked rice
Directions:
In skillet, cook 1 tablespoon oil and half the chicken until browned.
Remove.
Repeat with remaining chicken.
In remaining 1 tablespoon of oil, stir-fry vegetables with ginger and garlic powder until tender-crisp.
Add soup, soy sauce and vinegar.
Heat to a boil; return chicken to skillet.
Heat through, stirring occasionally.
Serve over rice.

question: How do I make a healthy chicken and vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables With Chicken
Ingredients:
1 c. cooked chicken meat, diced
1/2 c. onion
1/2 c. cabbage
1/2 c. cauliflower
1/4 c. sunflower seeds
1/2 c. zucchini
1/2 c. broccoli
1 can water chestnuts, sliced
1/4 c. carrots
Directions:
Stir-fry all vegetables until tender-crisp in small amount of oil.
Add chicken, sunflower seeds and water chestnuts, sliced. Season with soy sauce. Serve over rice or Chinese noodles.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy lemon chiffon cake?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chiffon Cake
Ingredients:
7 eggs, separated
2 1/4 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
3 tsp. baking powder
1/2 c. Wesson oil
3 Tbsp. lemon rind and extract
3/4 c. water
1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
Directions:
Separate eggs.
In egg whites, add 1/2 tsp. cream of tartar and beat well until very stiff.
In yolks, add flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, oil, extract, rind and water.
Beat well until creamy.
Fold into egg whites, do not beat.
Pour into 10 inch tube pan.
Do not grease.
Bake at 325° for 50 minutes and 375° for 10 minutes more.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy lemon chiffon cake?
answer:
Title: Chiffon Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
3 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. vegetable oil
7 egg yolks
3/4 c. cold water
2 tsp. vanilla
2 tsp. grated lemon rind
7 egg whites
1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Blend flour, sugar, baking powder and salt in bowl.
Make a well and add in order: oil, egg yolks, water, vanilla and rind.
Beat with spoon until smooth.
Beat egg whites and cream of tartar in a large mixing bowl until the whites form very stiff peaks.*
Pour egg yolk mixture over egg whites, gently folding with a rubber spatula just until blended.
Pour into ungreased tube pan.
Bake at 325° for 55 minutes, then at 350° for 10 to 15 minutes more.
Let it hang until cold.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy lemon chiffon cake?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chiffon Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. cake flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. Wesson oil
3/4 c. water
1 Tbsp. lemon flavoring
7 eggs, separated
1 tsp. cream of tartar
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar, oil, water, lemon flavoring and egg yolks until smooth.
Beat egg whites with cream of tartar until very stiff and dry (about 5 minutes).
Fold into flour mixture and pour into ungreased tube pan.
Bake for 1 hour in preheated 300° oven.
Remove from oven and invert pan over a bottle to cool for at least 1 hour.
May be glazed.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy lemon chiffon cake?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chiffon Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sifted flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
3 tsp. baking powder
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. salad oil
7 egg yolks
2 tsp. vanilla
2 tsp. grated lemon rind
1 c. egg whites
1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
3 Tbsp. butter
3 c. sifted powdered sugar
1/2 c. drained crushed pineapple
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Sift flour, sugar, baking powder and 1 teaspoon salt into bowl.
Make well in center.
Add oil, egg yolks, 3/4 cup cold water, vanilla and lemon rind.
Beat until smooth.
Beat egg whites and cream of tartar until stiff peaks form (do not underbeat).
Pour egg yolk mixture gradually over egg whites; fold gently until blended.
Do not overmix.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy lemon chiffon cake?
answer:
Title: Congratulations Chiffon Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
3 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. oil
7 egg yolks
3/4 c. cold water
2 tsp. vanilla
2 tsp. grated lemon rind
1 c. egg whites
1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
Directions:
Sift into the first bowl the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt.
Make a well and add oil, egg yolks, water, vanilla and lemon rind.
Mix well.
In a large bowl, beat egg whites and cream of tartar until stiff peaks form.
Pour yolk mix slowly over whites, blending carefully with a spatula.
Pour into ungreased tube pan and bake 55 minutes.
Increase to 350° for 10 to 15 minutes more.
Cool over bottle upside down.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon garlic pasta?
answer:
Title: Lemon-Garlic Pasta
Ingredients:
8 oz. spaghetti
2 cloves garlic
1/4 c. olive oil
2 Tbsp. butter
1/4 c. parsley, chopped
1 tsp. lemon rind, grated
1 1/2 tsp. lemon juice
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Cook spaghetti in salted water to desired doneness; drain. Mince garlic.
In pan, heat oil and butter.
Add garlic.
Cook for 1 minute.
Add to other ingredients.
Toss well.
Test for seasoning.
Add pepper and salt for taste.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon garlic pasta?
answer:
Title: Lemon Basil Pasta
Ingredients:
8 oz. linguine (cooked without salt), drained
2 Tbsp. melted butter
1 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 1/2 tsp. basil leaves
3/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
In a small bowl, combine butter, lemon juice and spices.
Toss with pasta.
Sprinkle with cheese and serve immediately.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon garlic pasta?
answer:
Title: Lemony Pasta
Ingredients:
4 oz. uncooked thin egg noodles
1 tsp. butter or margarine
1 tsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. chopped parsley
salt and pepper (dash)
Directions:
Cook pasta in boiling, salted water for 4 minutes.
Drain well.
Return to pot and toss with remaining ingredients.
Serve hot or cold.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon garlic pasta?
answer:
Title: Easy Garlic Pasta
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. basil
1 Tbsp. parsley
1/4 c. butter/margarine (room temperature)
8 oz. cream cheese (room temperature)
1/3 c. Parmesan, grated
1/4 c. olive oil
1 clove garlic, chopped fine
1/2 Tbsp. pepper
2/3 c. boiling water
Directions:
Blend parsley and basil into butter.
Blend this with cream cheese.
Add Parmesan, olive oil, garlic and pepper.
When pasta is ready, drain.
Add 2/3 cup boiling water to cheese mixture. Stir and toss with pasta.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon garlic pasta?
answer:
Title: Good Neighbor Recipe
Ingredients:
1 tongue that does not slander
1 mind full of tolerance
2 ears closed to gossip
2 eyes overlooking other's faults
1 heart generous and kind
2 hands extending to help others
1 dash of wit
1 big smile
1 dash of sunny disposition
1 dash of cheerfulness
Directions:
Blend together all ingredients. Serve generous portions to everyone you meet.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry(Recipe From India)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/4 c. butter
1/3 c. flour
2 c. chicken broth
1 c. tomato juice
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
salt
pepper
4 tsp. curry powder
4 c. diced chicken
5 c. hot, cooked rice
Directions:
Brown onion and celery in butter.
Add flour and blend.
Add chicken broth; cook until thick, stirring constantly.
Add tomato juice, Worcestershire sauce, seasonings and chicken.
Heat thoroughly.
Serve over the cooked rice.
Serves 8.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Indian Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
2 red apples, peeled and sliced
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 1/2 lb. skinned, boned chicken breasts
1/4 c. chopped celery
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. green bell peppers, cut in strips
1 clove garlic, minced
1 1/2 Tbsp. plain flour
3 tsp. curry powder or to taste
1/4 tsp. salt and pepper (each)
1/2 tsp. ginger
1 c. chicken broth
1 can stewed tomatoes
1/4 c. raisins (optional)
1 c. water (add more, if needed)
3 c. cooked rice (served on)
Directions:
In a small bowl, combine sliced apples and lemon juice; toss. Set aside.
Slice chicken; set aside.
Combine flour and chicken broth; stir until mixed.
Add all ingredients into skillet.
Cook on low for 30 minutes or until everything is cooked down; add extra water, if necessary.
Serve over rice.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken pieces, skinned
2 cloves garlic, chopped
2-inch pieces ginger, chopped
2 tsp. cumin seed, ground
3 Tbsp. natural yogurt
4 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. turmeric
pinch of chili powder
1 tsp. pepper
2 onions, chopped
salt
Directions:
Place the garlic, ginger, turmeric, cumin, chili pepper, coriander and yogurt in a large bowl with salt to taste.
Mix well.
Add chicken and leave for 4 hours; turn occasionally. Heat the oil in the pan; add the onion and fry until golden. Add the chicken and marinade.
Bring to simmering point; cover and cook for about 30 minutes, until the chicken is tender.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Curried Chicken
Ingredients:
3 to 4 lb. chicken
1/2 c. oil
1/2 c. onion, finely minced
1 clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. curry powder
2 c. tomatoes, coarsely chopped
2 c. water (hot)
2 Tbsp. salt
1 (6 oz.) can evaporated milk
2 Tbsp. flour
Directions:
Heat oil. Add onion, garlic and curry powder.
Cook 5 minutes, stir gently.
Add chicken, brown and remove (keep warm).
Add tomatoes to oil mixture, stirring constantly (3 minutes).
Add hot water and salt; mix.
Add chicken and simmer until tender (50 minutes).
Remove chicken to serving platter.
Blend evaporated milk into flour; stir constantly.
Stir and cook until thickens. Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Curried Chicken And Vegetables
Ingredients:
1/2 c. honey
1/4 c. prepared mustard
1/4 c. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
2 Tbsp. water
1 clove garlic, minced
2 tsp. curry powder
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
1/4 tsp. ground ginger
1 (2 1/2 to 3 lb.) broiler-fryer chicken or one 4 to 5-lb. domestic duck or wild goose
cooking oil or melted butter
2 large potatoes, peeled and quartered or 8 new potatoes
6 medium carrots, bias-sliced into 1/2-inch pieces
2 medium apples, cored and cut into wedges
Directions:
Set oven to 375°.
In a small saucepan combine first 10 ingredients.
Bring to boiling, stirring constantly.
Remove from heat; set aside.

question: I need a recipe for a creamy Alfredo pasta.
answer:
Title: Low-Fat Pasta Alfredo
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. 1% cottage cheese
1/2 c. skim milk
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. dried basil
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. salt (optional)
8 oz. corkscrew noodles, cooked and drained
1 large tomato, seeded and chopped
Directions:
In a blender or food processor, process cottage cheese, milk and garlic until smooth.
Add flour, lemon juice, basil, mustard, pepper and salt, if desired; process until well blended.
Pour into a saucepan.
Cook over medium heat until thickened.
Do not boil.
Serve over noodles; sprinkle with chopped tomatoes.
Yield: 4 servings.

question: I need a recipe for a creamy Alfredo pasta.
answer:
Title: Classic Alfredo Pasta
Ingredients:
1 (12 oz.) pkg. uncooked fettuccine
1/2 c. butter or oleo
1 1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 c. heavy or whipping cream
4 Tbsp. fresh parsley, chopped
Directions:
Cook fettuccine according to your taste of doneness; drain. Meanwhile, in small saucepan, melt butter over medium heat; gradually stir in cheese, then cream until well blended.
Continue heating sauce, stirring constantly, just to boiling point.
Remove from heat; stir in parsley.
Add sauce to hot fettuccine; toss lightly.
Serves 6.

question: I need a recipe for a creamy Alfredo pasta.
answer:
Title: Herbed Pasta Alfredo
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. margarine
1/4 c. chopped green onions
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 (12 oz.) can evaporated skimmed milk
1/4 c. grated fresh Parmesan cheese
1/8 c. grated fresh Romano cheese
1/2 tsp. dried whole thyme
1/2 tsp. dried whole basil
1/4 tsp. dried dill weed
6 c. hot cooked medium seashell macaroni
Directions:
Melt margarine in saucepan over medium heat. Add onions and garlic; saute 2 minutes. Add flour and stir well.
Gradually add milk and bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat to medium-low and cook 3 minutes or until thickened, stirring constantly. Remove from heat.
Stir in cheeses and herbs. Serve over macaroni. Garnish with extra onions, if desired.
Contains 244 calories and 4.3 grams fat per serving.

question: I need a recipe for a creamy Alfredo pasta.
answer:
Title: Pasta Alfredo
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1/2 c. heavy cream
1 lb. noodles or fettuccini (cooked as directed on pkg.)
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese or more
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Heat butter and cream.
Do not boil.
Mound pasta in warm buttered bowl and pour on cream; sprinkle generously with cheese and toss thoroughly but lightly.
Season to taste.

question: I need a recipe for a creamy Alfredo pasta.
answer:
Title: Alfredo
Ingredients:
Pasta of Choice
3/4 c. Unsalted Butter
4 medium Cloves Garlic, pressed
1 3/4 c. Grated Parmesan Cheese
1 1/2 c. Evaporated Milk (unsweetened)
1 Tbsp. Fresh Ground Pepper
Directions:
Start the pasta first.
In 1/2 quart sauce pan, heat the butter, garlic and milk over a medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the butter melts and the milk is hot.
Do not boil.
Stir in the parmesan Cheese and pepper, continue heating until all is melted.
Pour sauce over the noodles, serve with additional parmesan and pepper as desired.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy chicken fajita?
answer:
Title: Easy Fajitas(Fa-He-Tas)
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef, pork or chicken
1 bell pepper, sliced
1 onion, sliced
2 tomatoes, sliced in wedges
2 Tbsp. oil
1 clove garlic, minced
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. cilantro (if you don't have this, don't worry)
3 Tbsp. salsa
couple dashes chili powder
Directions:
Cut meat into cube-size pieces.
Cook in large skillet (or wok) in oil with garlic and all spices about 10 minutes.
Add bell pepper and onion.
Cover and let cook about 10 minutes.
Add tomatoes and salsa.
Cover and let cook until meat and all veggies are tender (another 5 to 10 minutes).
Stir occasionally.
Serve with warm tortillas, sour cream and salsa.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy chicken fajita?
answer:
Title: Quick Chicken Fajitas(4 Servings)
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 large onion, sliced
1 red or yellow bell pepper, thinly sliced
1/4 tsp. cumin
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. dried oregano
1/4 tsp. dried thyme
1/2 c. canned chicken broth
4 boneless chicken breast halves, skinned and cut into strips
warm flour tortillas
1 tomato, chopped
1 avocado, peeled and chopped
1 c. salsa
Directions:
Heat oil in large, heavy skillet over medium-high heat.
Add onion and bell pepper; saute until almost tender, about 10 minutes.
Add cumin, paprika, cayenne, garlic powder, oregano and thyme; continue cooking 1 minute.
Mix in broth and bring to boil. Add chicken; stir until cooked through, about 5 minutes.
Spoon chicken mixture into tortillas.
Top with tomato and avocado. Roll up.
Serve, passing salsa separately.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy chicken fajita?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fajitas
Ingredients:
1 garlic clove, minced
2 Tbsp. lime juice
1 Tbsp. olive oil
2 tsp. Italian parsley, minced
2 fresh thyme, minced
2 chicken breast halves, skinned and boned
1/4 tsp. freshly ground pepper
pinch of cayenne pepper
1 clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 Tbsp. jalapeno, minced
1 large onion, sliced thin and cut into strips
1 red pepper, seeded
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. oil
Directions:
In a small glass bowl, combine garlic, lime juice, olive oil, herbs and seasonings.
Add chicken breasts; toss to coat with mixture and marinate until ready to cook.
Over medium heat, preheat stir-fry pan.
Add olive oil, garlic and jalapeno.
Cook briefly.
Add onion slices and bell pepper strips.
Toss to coat with oil and cook until onion becomes translucent.
Vegetables will still be slightly crisp.
Remove from heat and reserve. Preheat grill or broiler. Remove chicken breasts from marinade and place on grill or under broiler.
Grill until just done, turning once.
Baste with marinade.
Slice into thin strips.
Season with salt.
Preheat fajita pan under broiler or on top of stove until very hot.
Remove and coat with oil.
Place onion-pepper mixture on one side of pan and chicken slices on the other.
The ingredients will begin to sizzle.
Serve immediately with tortillas, guacamole, sour cream and salsa.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy chicken fajita?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fajitas
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1/2-inch wide strips
6 to 8 Tbsp. olive oil
1 Tbsp. chili powder
1 Tbsp. cumin
1 Tbsp. oregano, crush with fingers
3 to 4 cloves garlic, pressed or minced
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
approximately 8 drops hot pepper sauce or to taste
juice of 1 fresh lime (optional)
1 green pepper, cut into strips
1 large sweet onion, sliced
Directions:
Heat a large, heavy skillet and then add the chicken strips (no additional oil needed), green pepper and onion.
Stir-fry until chicken is lightly browned and veggies are crisp-tender.
(I sometimes cook the chicken and veggies separately.)

question: What’s a recipe for an easy chicken fajita?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fajitas(Low-Fat)
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut in strips
1 small onion, chopped
3 scallions, chopped
1/4 lb. mushrooms, sliced
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. canola oil or Pam
1/8 tsp. chili powder
prepared taco sauce
1 tsp. cumin
1/2 tsp. ground coriander seed
1 tsp. basil
8 drops Tabasco sauce
1 tomato, cubed
iceberg lettuce, shredded
2 oz. Monterey Jack cheese
2 oz. Cheddar cheese
pkg. 8 to 12 tortillas
Directions:
Saute mushrooms, onions, scallions and garlic in large pan with oil until opaque, 3 to 5 minutes.
Add chili powder, cumin, basil, Tabasco or hot sauce to taste (a few drops of smoke flavor may also be added).
Stir, then add chicken and stir until meat is tender and cooked.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 slices bacon (fried then crumbled)
2 1/2 c. cauliflower
3/4 c. sour cream (low fat version works just as well)
1/2 c. grated cheddar cheese
1 sm. yellow onion, finely chopped
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cook the cauliflower until firm, yet tender. Coarsely mash cauliflower with potato masher.
Add the sour cream, onion, cheese, salt and pepper.
Mix well.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Creamy Cauliflower Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, chopped
6 to 8 scallions, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 stalks celery, chopped
2 medium cauliflower, chopped
1/2 tsp. sea salt
1/2 tsp. curry powder
1/8 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. dried thyme
1 tsp. dried marjoram
6 c. water
2 Tbsp. white miso
1/8 tsp. nutmeg (optional)
1 tsp. dried basil
Directions:
In heavy soup kettle, melt butter.
Add oil.
Add onion, scallions and garlic.
Add celery and cauliflower.
Add seasonings.
Mix well and cook, uncovered, over medium heat for several minutes, stirring frequently.
Add water and miso.
Bring to a boil.
Simmer, covered, over medium heat for 15 minutes or until cauliflower is tender.
Remove cover and slightly cool.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Creole Cauliflower
Ingredients:
3 c. cooked chopped cauliflower
2 c. mashed cooked tomatoes
1/2 green pepper, chopped
1 onion, chopped
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 c. shredded cheese
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Melt butter in saucepan; add onion and green pepper and brown lightly.
Blend in flour, stirring, then add tomatoes, salt and pepper.
Heat to boiling point and cook three minutes, stirring constantly.
Add cauliflower and heat through. Place mixture in casserole, top with cheese and bake at 350° until cheese melts and is lightly browned.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Perfect Creamy Cauliflower Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, coarsely chopped
6 to 8 scallions, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
2 stalks celery, chopped
2 medium cauliflower, cored and coarsely chopped
1/2 tsp. sea salt
1/2 tsp. curry powder (optional)
1/8 tsp. fresh ground black pepper
1/2 tsp. dried thyme
1 tsp. dried basil
1 tsp. dried savory or marjoram
6 c. water
2 Tbsp. white miso
1/8 tsp. ground nutmeg
Directions:
In heavy soup kettle, melt butter.
Add oil.
Add onion, scallions and garlic.
Add celery and cauliflower.
Add seasonings.
Mix well and cook, uncovered, over medium heat for several minutes, stirring frequently.
Add water and miso.
Bring to a boil.
Simmer, covered, over medium heat for 15 minutes or until cauliflower is tender.
Remove cover and cool slightly. Puree in small increments in blender until smooth and creamy. Reheat, adding fresh ground nutmeg, if desired.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Creamy Cauliflower Soup
Ingredients:
1 medium head cauliflower, cut into flowerets
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped celery
2 (13 3/4 oz.) cans chicken broth
1/2 c. water
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 1/2 c. light cream
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except light cream in large pan or Dutch oven.
Bring to a boil over medium heat.
Reduce heat and cover.
Simmer 13 minutes or until vegetables are tender.
Pour hot mixture into blender a little at a time and puree until smooth.
Return soup to pan.
Stir in light cream and heat 2 more minutes or until hot.
Do not boil.
Makes 7 cups.

question: How do I make a tangy raspberry vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Raspberry Vinaigrette Dressing
Ingredients:
2/3 c. olive oil
1/2 c. red wine vinegar
1 tsp. chopped garlic
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/2 c. raspberry preserves
