Cook until tender, stirring to keep vegetables from scorching.
Serve on top of cooked rice.
Season with soy sauce.

question: How do I make a fluffy angel food cake?
answer:
Title: Angel Food Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. cake flour
1 1/2 c. sugar (sifted confectioners)
1 1/2 c. egg whites (12)
1 1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
1/4 tsp. salt
1 c. sugar (white)
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. almond flavoring
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Have ready a tube pan.
Stir flour and first amount of sugar together to blend.
Measure egg whites, cream of tartar and salt into large mixing bowl.
Beat until foamy. Gradually add second amount of sugar, 2 tablespoons at a time. Continue beating until meringue holds stiff peaks.
Add flavoring. Sprinkle sugar-flour mixture over meringue.
Fold in gently until mixed.
Bake in ungreased tube pan for 30 to 35 minutes.
Invert on a funnel to cool.

question: How do I make a fluffy angel food cake?
answer:
Title: Yellow Angel Food Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. sifted cake flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. baking powder
5 eggs, separated
1/2 c. cold water
1 1/2 c. sugar
3/4 tsp. cream of tartar
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Sift together flour, salt and baking powder.
Beat egg yolks thick and lemon colored.
Add water and beat until light and fluffy.
Gradually beat in sugar, fold in dry ingredients a little at a time.
Beat egg whites with cream of tartar until stiff but not dry.
Fold into egg yolk batter; add vanilla.
Bake in 10-inch ungreased tube pan; 1 hour in 325° oven.

question: How do I make a fluffy angel food cake?
answer:
Title: Filled Angel Food Cake
Ingredients:
1 large angel food cake
1 c. milk
1/2 c. sugar
2 eggs, well beaten
1/4 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. gelatin
3 Tbsp. cold water
1 tsp. vanilla
3/4 tsp. almond extract
1 c. cream, whipped
Directions:
Place milk, sugar, eggs and salt in top of double boiler. Place over boiling water; stir constantly until custard lightly coats spoon.
Do not overcook.
Soften gelatin in cold water and pour custard over it.
Stir until dissolved.
Add flavorings. Chill until partially thickened.
Stir frequently.
Fold in whipped cream.
Split cake in 2 layers.
Spoon filling between layers, on sides and top of cake.
Sprinkle with almonds.
Chill. Serves 16.

question: How do I make a fluffy angel food cake?
answer:
Title: Yellow Angel Food Cake
Ingredients:
5 large eggs, separated
1/2 c. cold water
1 1/2 c. sugar
3/4 tsp. cream of tartar
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. vanilla
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Separate eggs 1 hour before making cake.
Beat egg yolks well. Beat 1/2 cup cold water into the egg yolks.
Add the sugar gradually and beat after each addition.
Add the flour, baking powder and salt (sifted together), gradually folding in each addition.
Add vanilla.

question: How do I make a fluffy angel food cake?
answer:
Title: Angel Food Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. cake flour
3/4 c. plus 2 Tbsp. sugar
12 egg whites or 1 1/2 c. whites
1/4 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
3/4 c. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°.
Stir together flour and first amount of sugar; set aside.
In large mixer bowl, beat egg whites, cream of tartar and salt until foamy.
Add second amount of sugar, 2 tablespoons at a time, beating on high speed until meringue holds stiff peaks.
Gently fold in vanilla.
Sprinkle flour-sugar mixture (1/4 cup at a time) over meringue, folding in gently, just until flour-sugar mixture disappears.

question: How do I make a classic chicken noodle soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Chicken Noodle Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 chicken, cut up
water
2 celery stalks, sliced
1/2 onion, chopped
1/4 c. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 c. thin egg noodles
1/2 c. half and half
Directions:
In a large Dutch oven, cover chicken with water.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer 40 minutes or until tender. Remove chicken.
Reserve broth.
Bone and shred chicken.
Set aside. Discard bones and skin.
Saute celery and onion in butter until limp.
Add flour.
Cook, stirring until golden brown.
Add reserved broth, salt and pepper.
Bring to a boil.
Add noodles. Cook until noodles are tender.
Stir occasionally.
Stir in chicken and half and half.

question: How do I make a classic chicken noodle soup?
answer:
Title: Chicken Classic
Ingredients:
3 lb. chicken
1 can cream of chicken soup
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 soup can milk
1 stick butter
1/2 lb. herb stuffing mix
onion flakes
celery flakes
salt
1 c. stock from boiling chicken
Directions:
Boil chicken for 1 hour.
Onion, celery and salt can be added to the water.
Bone chicken.
Lay in 13 x 9-inch pan.
Mix both soup and the can of milk; pour over chicken.
Melt 1 stick of butter with 1 cup of stock from boiled chicken.
Sprinkle herb stuffing mix on top of chicken.
Pour butter/stock mixture on top of stuffing mix.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.

question: How do I make a classic chicken noodle soup?
answer:
Title: Chicken Noodle Soup With Vegetables
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. broiler-fryer chicken, skinned and cut up
1 qt. water
4 medium carrots, cut in 1/2 inch slices
4 stalks celery, cut in 1/2 inch slices
1 Tbsp. salt
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 small onion, chopped (optional, adds wonderful flavor!)
2 c. uncooked thin egg noodles
2 chicken bouillon cubes or 2 tsp. instant bouillon
Directions:
Heat all ingredients, except noodles and bouillon, to boiling in 4-quart Dutch oven; reduce heat.
Cover and simmer until chicken is done, about 45 minutes.
Take chicken out of soup; cool slightly.
Remove bones and cut meat up (I use kitchen scissors).

question: How do I make a classic chicken noodle soup?
answer:
Title: Classic Tuna Casserole
Ingredients:
1 envelope chicken noodle soup mix
2 1/2 c. boiling water
3 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
dash of pepper
1 can tuna, drained
2 c. canned peas, drained
1/2 c. buttered bread crumbs
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
In a small saucepan, combine soup mix and water.
Heat to boiling.
In a medium saucepan, over low heat, melt butter; blend in flour and pepper.
Gradually stir in hot soup and cook until thickened.
Add tuna and fold in peas.
Turn into a greased 1 1/2-quart dish.
Top with buttered bread crumbs. Bake 15 minutes until heated through.

question: How do I make a classic chicken noodle soup?
answer:
Title: Chicken Noodle Soup(Low-Fat Recipe)
Ingredients:
4 qt. water
1 lb. boneless chicken breasts
1 carrot, sliced
1 onion, chopped
1 rib celery, chopped
1 tsp. salt
1 clove garlic, minced (optional)
1 tsp. thyme (optional)
1 tsp. basil (optional)
5 sprigs parsley (optional)
3 to 4 peppercorns
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
3 oz. flat noodles
1 c. onion, chopped
3 carrots, sliced
3 ribs celery, sliced
Directions:
Cook the first 11 ingredients 1 hour.
Skim foam.
Refrigerate chicken.
Skim fat.
Bring broth to a boil and add the remaining ingredients plus cubed chicken.
Simmer until vegetables are tender.
Yields 16 cups.
Contains 70 calories per cup and 2 fat grams per serving.

question: What can I do with leftover mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato Cakes
Ingredients:
leftover mashed potatoes (about 3 c.)
1/2 large onion, chopped
2 medium eggs, beaten
salt and pepper to taste
3/4 c. flour
vegetable oil (for frying)
Directions:
Mix potatoes with flour, onion, eggs, salt and pepper. Mixture will resemble bread dough. Add about 1/4-inch oil in skillet. Drop potato mixture from tablespoon. Fry in hot oil until brown on both sides. Drain on paper towel. Goes good with green vegetables.

question: What can I do with leftover mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Make-Ahead Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
5 lb. potatoes
6 oz. cream cheese
1 c. sour cream
2 tsp. onion salt
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. butter
chopped green onions (optional)
Directions:
Cook peeled potatoes until tender and drain.
Mash smooth. Add all ingredients and beat until fluffy.
Cool.
Cover and place in refrigerator.
May be used any time within 2 weeks.

question: What can I do with leftover mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato Cakes
Ingredients:
2 c. leftover mashed potatoes
1 medium onion, chopped
1 egg, beaten
1 Tbsp. flour
salt and pepper
oil (for frying)
Directions:
Cook the onion in small amount of oil until tender.
Combine potatoes, onion and egg; mix well.
Drop by spoonful in hot skillet.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Brown on both sides. Serve hot.

question: What can I do with leftover mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Make-Ahead Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
8 large potatoes, pared
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1/4 c. sour cream (dairy)
salt and pepper to taste
butter and paprika
Directions:
Boil potatoes until tender.
Drain and mash.
Add cream cheese, salt and pepper, mixing well.
Put in greased two-quart casserole.
Top with pats of butter.
Cover.
Potatoes may be stored in refrigerator for several days.

question: What can I do with leftover mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Leftover Meat Pie
Ingredients:
mashed potatoes (instant works well, for 4 people)
1 large onion, cut in 1-inch pieces
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/4 c. flour
1 1/2 c. warm milk
2 bouillon cubes
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. celery salt
2 c. cooked meat, cut into 1-inch pieces
1 can peas and carrots
1 can mushrooms
Directions:
Brown onion in butter.
Add flour, stock and seasonings.
Cook until thick, then simmer about 5 minutes.
Add meat and vegetables.

question: How do I make a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
4 large mild onions
2 to 4 Tbsp. butter
2 to 3 bouillon cubes, dissolved
3 c. water
1/4 c. grated Italian or dehydrated American cheese
salt
4 slices French bread or hard rolls
Directions:
Chop onions.
Place in medium saucepan with butter.
Cover and cook until tender, not brown.
Add bouillon.
Simmer for 20 minutes.
Sprinkle bread or slice rolls with cheese and toast in hot oven.
Pour soup in deep bowl.
Place toasted bread on top just before serving.

question: How do I make a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: Chicken Classic
Ingredients:
3 lb. chicken
1 can cream of chicken soup
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 soup can milk
1 stick butter
1/2 lb. herb stuffing mix
onion flakes
celery flakes
salt
1 c. stock from boiling chicken
Directions:
Boil chicken for 1 hour.
Onion, celery and salt can be added to the water.
Bone chicken.
Lay in 13 x 9-inch pan.
Mix both soup and the can of milk; pour over chicken.
Melt 1 stick of butter with 1 cup of stock from boiled chicken.
Sprinkle herb stuffing mix on top of chicken.
Pour butter/stock mixture on top of stuffing mix.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.

question: How do I make a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. yellow onions
3 Tbsp. butter or oleo
1/4 tsp. black pepper (coarse)
1 Tbsp. flour (regular)
3 cans beef broth
3 c. water
1 bay leaf
salt and pepper
French bread (8 slices)
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
1 c. Swiss cheese, grated
Directions:
Peel onions, slice thinly (about 5 cups).
Put butter in a 4-quart saucepan; heat over moderately high heat until butter melts.
Add onions and pepper to butter.
Saute onion mixture, stirring often
until onions are a light golden brown.
Sprinkle onions with flour; stir until all traces of flour disappear.
Cook 1 minute longer, stirring constantly.
Remove from heat. Gradually add beef broth, stirring onion mixture all the time; stir in water and bay leaf.
Return to moderately high heat. Bring mixture to a boil, stirring constantly.
Reduce heat to low. Cook onion soup, uncovered, for 30 to 40 minutes.
Discard bay leaf; add salt and pepper to taste.

question: How do I make a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: Classic Green Bean Bake(Yields 6 Servings)
Ingredients:
2 (9 or 10 oz. each) pkg. frozen green beans, cooked and drained
1 (10 1/4 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup
1/2 c. milk
1 tsp. soya sauce
dash of pepper
1 (2.8 oz.) can French fried onion rings
Directions:
In a 1 1/2-quart greased casserole, combine soup, milk, soya sauce and pepper.
Add beans and 1/2 of the onion rings.
Stir. Bake in a 350° oven for 25 minutes until hot and bubbly.
Stir. Top with remaining onion rings.
Bake 5 minutes more.

question: How do I make a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: Classic Green Bean Bake
Ingredients:
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1/2 c. milk
1 tsp. soy sauce
dash of pepper
4 c. cooked cut green beans
1 can French fried onions
Directions:
Combine soup, milk, soy sauce and pepper.
Stir in beans and 1/2 can onions.
Bake at 350° for 25 minutes; stir.
Top with remaining onions.
Bake 5 minutes more.
Makes 6 servings.

question: How do I make an easy pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Easy Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. basil leaves
1 c. parsley
3 cloves garlic
1/2 c. olive oil
1 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1/3 c. pine nuts or walnuts
Directions:
Put basil and parsley in blender.
Blend with 1/4 cup olive oil at low speed.
Add cheese and remaining oil and blend.
Add nuts, blending until chopped.
Use over spaghetti or in soups or vegetables.

question: How do I make an easy pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Basic Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
2 c. lightly packed basil leaves
1 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. extra virgin olive oil
1/3 c. pine nuts
1 clove garlic
2 Tbsp. lemon juice (optional)
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a blender and whirl smooth.
Toss well over hot cooked pasta.
Add additional cheese, if desired. Makes 1 1/2 cups.

question: How do I make an easy pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. fresh basil leaves
2 to 5 cloves garlic, peeled
1/4 c. pine nuts
1/4 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
1/4 c. freshly squeezed lemon juice (if you want to cut calories) or 1/4 c. olive oil
Directions:
Put basil, garlic, pine nuts and Parmesan cheese in food processor or blender.
Turn machine on and drizzle in lemon juice or olive oil.
Continue to puree until a smooth paste is formed. This sauce is delicious to spoon on top of broiled salmon steaks.

question: How do I make an easy pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
2 c. fresh basil leaves, stripped from their stems, coarsely chopped and tightly packed (or substitute 2 c. fresh flat leaf Italian parsley, coarsely chopped and 2 Tbsp. dried basil leaves)
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. freshly ground pepper
1 to 2 tsp. chopped garlic
2 Tbsp. finely chopped pine nuts or walnuts
1 to 1 1/2 c. olive oil
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
In a blender, combine basil, pepper, salt, garlic, nuts and 1 cup of oil.
Blend at high speed until ingredients are smooth, stopping the blender every 5 to 6 seconds to push herbs down with a rubber spatula.

question: How do I make an easy pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Classic Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
2 c. fresh basil
1 c. Italian parsley
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. grated Romano cheese
2 Tbsp. pine nuts
1/4 c. blanched almonds
1/4 c. blanched walnut halves
1 garlic clove
3 Tbsp. butter
1/2 c. olive oil
Directions:
Blanch nuts in boiling water to remove skins.
Blend all ingredients in blender or food processor until you have a smooth paste.
Place into a large warm bowl.
Cook pasta al dente.
Fork pasta directly from pot onto paste in bowl.
Toss well.
Add 2 tablespoons hot water from pot and toss again.
Serve in hot soup bowls.

question: How do I make caramel sauce?
answer:
Title: Caramel Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 1/4 c. packed brown sugar
2 Tbsp. light corn syrup
1/2 c. whipping cream
Directions:
Melt butter.
Stir in brown sugar and corn syrup.
Bring to a boil.
Cook until sugar dissolves, about 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Stir in whipping cream.
Return to a boil.
Remove from heat.
Serve over ice cream, apple pie, etc.

question: How do I make caramel sauce?
answer:
Title: Homemade Caramel Sauce
Ingredients:
1 stick margarine
2 c. brown sugar
1 c. light corn syrup
2 Tbsp. water
1 (1 1/2 oz.) sweetened condensed milk
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
In a saucepan, melt butter, stir in sugar, syrup and water. Bring to a boil and stir in milk.
Simmer, stirring constantly, until it reaches the thread stage (230°).
Add vanilla and stir. Pour in jars or servers.
Store leftovers in refrigerator.
Keeps well.
Makes 3 to 4 cups.

question: How do I make caramel sauce?
answer:
Title: Caramel Sauce
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. heavy cream
1 1/3 c. sugar
1/3 c. water
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Bring cream to boil; set aside.
Bring sugar and water to boil.
With a pastry brush dipped in cold water, make a line around the inside of the saucepan just above the boiling mixture. Cook over high heat until mixture is golden brown.
Remove from heat and let cool a bit.
Add cream to mixture.
Bring to boil and cook over low heat 2 to 3 minutes.
Add vanilla.
Makes 3 cups.

question: How do I make caramel sauce?
answer:
Title: Caramel Sauce
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
2 tsp. golden syrup
2 Tbsp. condensed milk
pinch of salt
4 Tbsp. hot water
Directions:
Melt butter in saucepan.
Add remaining ingredients, except water.
Stir over heat until mixture is thick and turns rich caramel color.
When mixture leaves sides of pan, remove pan from heat; add hot water, a little at a time.
Return to heat; simmer 2 to 3 minutes; let cool.
Serve with ice cream, pancakes or cake.

question: How do I make caramel sauce?
answer:
Title: Caramel Sauce
Ingredients:
3/4 c. packed brown sugar
3/4 c. sugar
1/3 c. margarine
1/2 c. light corn syrup
2/3 c. whipping cream
Directions:
Combine everything except whipping cream.
Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally until mixture comes to a full boil (5 to 8 minutes).
Cool 5 minutes.
Stir in whipping cream.
Serve warm over ice cream or cake.
Store refrigerated.

question: What can I make with black beans and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Black Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 c. onions, chopped or 1 medium yellow onion
1/2 c. celery, chopped or 1 stalk
1 carrot, diced
2 cloves garlic, sliced
1/3 c. rice
1 tomato, chopped
1 tsp. cumin seed
1/2 tsp. basil
1/2 tsp. sage
1 can chicken broth or 1 1/2 c. homemade
1 large can black beans, drained and rinsed
hot sauce or Tabasco (optional)
Directions:
In a large skillet or saucepan, heat oil over medium-hot flame.
Add onions and saute for 5 minutes, until onion starts to soften, then add celery, carrots and garlic.
Cook until veggies start to become tender-crisp.
Add rice; stir and coat with juices in the pan.
Cook for 2 minutes.
Add tomato, spices, herbs and chicken broth.
Cover, reduce heat to simmer and cook for 10 to 15 minutes.
Add beans and continue cooking until rice is tender and beans are heated through.
Stir to keep rice from sticking.
Add Tabasco and pepper to taste.
Serve hot with crusty bread.
This can be a meal in itself or a side dish to barbecue pork or ribs.

question: What can I make with black beans and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Roasted Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. sweet potatoes, scrubbed and cut into 1-inch cubes
1 to 2 Tbsp. butter
salt and freshly ground black pepper
Directions:
Place potatoes in one layer in a lightly buttered baking dish. Dot with butter and roast in preheated 375° oven for 25 to 30 minutes or until tender, tossing every 10 minutes and adding more butter, if necessary.
Serve hot with salt and pepper to taste.

question: What can I make with black beans and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Black Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. olive oil
1 c. finely chopped green bell pepper
1 lb. rinsed, drained, cooked black beans
1 tsp. chopped fresh thyme or 1/2 tsp. dried
1 bay leaf
1/2 c. finely chopped onion
1 Tbsp. finely chopped garlic
1 c. low sodium chicken broth plus 1/2 c. water
1 1/2 c. coarsely chopped canned plum tomatoes with juice
1/4 tsp. dried oregano
1/4 tsp. hot pepper sauce
salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
4 c. cooked long grain rice
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh flat leaf parsley to garnish (optional)
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh cilantro
Directions:
In a medium saucepan, heat oil over medium-high heat; add onion, pepper and garlic.
Saute, stirring occasionally, 15 minutes.
Add beans, broth and water, tomatoes, thyme, bay leaf, oregano and hot pepper sauce.
Over high heat, bring to a boil . Reduce heat; simmer 45 minutes, stirring occasionally until sauce thickens and vegetables are tender.
If mixture becomes too thick, add water to thin to desired consistency.
Stir in cilantro and season with salt and pepper.
Remove bay leaf.
Serve over rice, sprinkled with parsley.

question: What can I make with black beans and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Whipped Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 medium sweet potatoes, baked until soft
1/2 c. unsalted butter
1 1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Peel the potatoes while they're hot.
Mix with the butter, salt and pepper.
Use a hand mixer to beat until smooth.
Serves 6.

question: What can I make with black beans and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Black Beans Dinner
Ingredients:
2 lb. black beans
1 Tbsp. salt
1 large onion, diced
1 large green bell pepper, diced
1 small jar pimentos, diced
3 Tbsp. olive oil
2 garlic cloves, crushed
1 Tbsp. cumin
1/2 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. sugar
4 Tbsp. vinegar
Directions:
Soak black beans in water overnight, drain.
Add 8 cups of fresh water with salt and cook over low heat until beans are tender.

question: How do I make stuffed mushrooms with cheese?
answer:
Title: Cheese Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. medium mushrooms (about 24)
1/4 c. finely chopped green onions (with tops)
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. dry bread crumbs
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. snipped parsley
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dried basil leaves
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Select firm white mushrooms with caps that are closed or slightly open around the stem.
Cut ends from mushroom stems; remove from mushrooms and chop finely.
Cook and stir mushroom stems, green onions and garlic in butter over medium heat until tender, about 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and stir in remaining ingredients.
Fill mushroom caps with stuffing mixture.
Place filled sides up in greased baking dish.
Bake in 350° oven for 15 minutes.
Serve hot.
Makes 24 appetizers.

question: How do I make stuffed mushrooms with cheese?
answer:
Title: Cheese Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. medium mushrooms
4 oz. garlic and herb semi-soft cheese
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
3 c. water
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Remove mushroom stems, keeping caps. Chop enough stems to measure 1 cup; put in bowl.
Stir in cheese and parsley.
In saucepan, bring water to boil and lemon juice. Add caps; cook 1 minute.
Drain.
Spoon cheese mixture into caps. Arrange in shallow baking pan.
Bake 8 minutes.
Makes about 2 dozen.

question: How do I make stuffed mushrooms with cheese?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. mushrooms
1/4 c. vegetable or olive oil
1/4 c. minced onion
1 garlic clove, minced
1/2 c. bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. grated cheese
1 egg
1 Tbsp. parsley
1/2 tsp. oregano
salt and pepper
Directions:
Preheat
oven to 325°.
Clean mushrooms.
Remove stems. Saute caps
in
oil until coated with oil.
Drain.
Chop stems to make 1/2 cup.
Saute with onion and garlic.
Simmer for 10 minutes. Stir
in bread crumbs, parsley, cheese, egg, oregano and
salt and
pepper
to taste.
Spoon mixture into mushroom caps.
Dot with butter and bake for 30 minutes.

question: How do I make stuffed mushrooms with cheese?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
2 large pkg. fresh mushrooms, stems removed
2 pkg. cream cheese, softened
1 pkg. salad crunchies, chopped in blender
1/4 tsp. red pepper
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
2 to 3 Tbsp. mixture of grated (finely) Monterey Jack and Cheddar cheeses
Directions:
After removing mushroom stems, combine cream cheese, salad crunchies and spices.
Add 2 to 3 tablespoons finely grated cheeses.
Spoon cream cheese mixture into mushrooms in a mound. Sprinkle cheese over filled mushrooms.
Bake at 350° on ungreased baking pans (it needs to have sides, because mushrooms become juicier) until cheeses are melted (about 15 to 20 minutes).

question: How do I make stuffed mushrooms with cheese?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Stuffings
Ingredients:
stems from mushrooms, finely chopped
1/2 c. finely chopped onion
1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1/4 c. fine dry bread crumbs
1/2 c. chopped cooked ham or bacon
Directions:
In 1 1/2-quart casserole dish place chopped stems and onion. Cover.
Microwave at High (10) 4 minutes.
Stir after 2 minutes. To hot mixture add cream cheese, mashing and mixing well.
Stir in crumbs and ham or bacon.
Stuffs 12 large mushrooms.

question: How do I make lemon herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Lemon Herb Chicken
Ingredients:
1/2 c. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 tsp. salt
3 lb. chicken parts
1/4 c. corn oil
2 tsp. dried dill weed
1/4 tsp. pepper (fresh ground)
Directions:
In a large, shallow baking dish, mix lemon juice, oil, herbs and spices.
Add chicken; turn to coat.
Cover and refrigerate, turning occasionally, for several hours or overnight.
Remove chicken from marinade.
Grill or broil 6 inches from heat, turning and brushing frequently with marinade, for 35 to 45 minutes, or until tender.

question: How do I make lemon herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Roast Chicken With Herbs
Ingredients:
1 chicken (1 1/2 to 2 lb.)
4 Tbsp. melted butter
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. each: dried oregano, rosemary and sage
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°. Cut chicken in
half. Arrange in roasting pan, skin side up. Combine butter, lemon juice, oregano, rosemary, sage, salt and pepper in a small bowl and mix well. Brush chicken with this mixture and bake for 25 to 30 minutes. Then you may want to broil 6-inches from heat for 3 minutes.

question: How do I make lemon herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Herb Roasted Chicken(Serves Four)
Ingredients:
1 large roasting chicken (about 6 lb.)
3 Tbsp. butter, softened
1 clove garlic, minced
3 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. sage leaves
3/4 tsp. thyme leaves
3/4 tsp. basil leaves
6 Tbsp. butter, softened
salt
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
Wash chicken; pat dry.
Cream together 3 tablespoons butter, garlic, Parmesan, sage, thyme and basil.
This mixture goes under the skin, so turn chicken breast side up and make skin as loose as possible.
Spread herb mixture underneath the skin.
Smear butter on outside of skin.
Put chicken breast up in roasting pan and place in oven.
Melt remaining butter.
Cook chicken 15 minutes, basting once.
Reduce to 350°.
Roast 20 minutes per pound, basting with butter every 10 minutes.
Serve.

question: How do I make lemon herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Herb-Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. margarine, melted
1/4 c. plus 2 Tbsp. vinegar
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 1/2 tsp. dried tarragon
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. freshly ground pepper
1 lb. new potatoes (unpeeled)
1 c. sliced celery
1 (2 oz.) jar pimento, chopped
1/4 c. chopped fresh parsley
1 (5 to 6 lb.) stewing chicken
Directions:
Combine first 8 ingredients, mixing well.
Set aside.
Cover potatoes with water in a small saucepan and cook, covered, over medium heat until tender, about 15 minutes.
Drain and cool.
Cut potatoes into bite-sized pieces and return to the saucepan.
Add celery, pimento and parsley to the pan.
Toss gently.
Add 2 tablespoons of the tarragon-oil mixture and again toss gently. Set aside.

question: How do I make lemon herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Herb Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
4 lb. chicken fryer
1 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 c. melted butter
1/2 c. dry white wine
1 tsp. crushed rosemary
1 tsp. sweet basil, crushed
1 tsp. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°. Sprinkle chicken cavities with the garlic salt and crushed rosemary. Truss chicken and place in an open roasting pan. Combine butter, wine, rosemary, basil, parsley, salt and pepper in a small saucepan. Cook over low heat a few minutes until thoroughly blended.
Baste chicken with wine sauce. Roast 20 minutes per pound until tender. Baste frequently. The last 20 minutes, turn to brown underside.

question: What’s a recipe for classic banana pudding?
answer:
Title: Old Fashioned Banana Pudding
Ingredients:
3/4 c sugar
1/3 c all purpose flour
dash salt
4 eggs, separated
2 c milk
1/2 tsp vanilla extract
1 16 oz pkg vanilla wafers
5 to 6 fully ripened bananas
Directions:
Bring 3/4 full pan of water to boil in bottom pan of double boiler. Combine 1/2 c sugar, flour, and salt in top pan of a double boiler. Beat egg yolks and milk together, add to flour mixture; blend well. Place over boiling water,
cook, uncovered, stirring constantly till thickened. Reduce heat, cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 min. Remove from heat, stir in vanilla extract. Spread small amount of custard in bottom of a 2 qt. casserole dish. Layer wafers, bananas, and custard. Repeat for total of 3 layers, ending with custard. Set aside. In a grease free bowl, beat egg whites till stiff but not dry. Add remaining 1.4 c sugar, beat till stiff peaks form. Spread over pudding, sealing edges. Bake at 450° for 5 min. Cool before serving. When I make this recipe, I double the pudding recipe and add more bananas. I also use the wafer crumbs in the bottom of the package to sprinkle on top of the meringue.

question: What’s a recipe for classic banana pudding?
answer:
Title: Chicken Classic
Ingredients:
3 lb. chicken
1 can cream of chicken soup
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 soup can milk
1 stick butter
1/2 lb. herb stuffing mix
onion flakes
celery flakes
salt
1 c. stock from boiling chicken
Directions:
Boil chicken for 1 hour.
Onion, celery and salt can be added to the water.
Bone chicken.
Lay in 13 x 9-inch pan.
Mix both soup and the can of milk; pour over chicken.
Melt 1 stick of butter with 1 cup of stock from boiled chicken.
Sprinkle herb stuffing mix on top of chicken.
Pour butter/stock mixture on top of stuffing mix.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for classic banana pudding?
answer:
Title: Old-Fashioned Banana Pudding
Ingredients:
3/4 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
2 c. milk
3 eggs, separated
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1 box vanilla wafers
6 medium size ripe bananas, sliced
Directions:
Combine 1/2 cup sugar, flour and salt in top of double boiler; stir in milk. Cook over boiling water, stirring constantly, until thickened. Cook, uncovered, 15 minutes more, stirring occasionally. Beat egg yolks. Gradually stir in hot mixture. Return to double boiler. Cook 5 minutes, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Add vanilla. Line bottom of a 1 1/2-quart casserole with vanilla wafers. Top with a layer of sliced bananas. Pour a portion of custard over the bananas. Continue to layer wafers, bananas and custard, ending with remaining 1/4 cup sugar and beat until mixture forms stiff peaks. Pile on top of pudding in casserole. Bake in preheated hot oven.

question: What’s a recipe for classic banana pudding?
answer:
Title: Banana Pudding
Ingredients:
2/3 c. sugar
3 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/2 tsp. salt
3 c. milk
3 egg yolks, slightly beaten
1 Tbsp. butter
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Combine sugar, cornstarch, salt and milk.
Cook until mixture begins to thicken.
Take out 1 cup of this mixture and stir in beaten egg yolks.
Pour back into saucepan.
Cook at gentle boil for 1 minute.
Remove from heat; add butter and vanilla.

question: What’s a recipe for classic banana pudding?
answer:
Title: Layered Banana Pudding
Ingredients:
1/3 c. flour
2/3 c. packed brown sugar
2 c. milk
2 eggs, beaten
2 Tbsp. margarine, melted
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1 c. heavy cream, whipped
4 to 6 firm bananas, sliced
Directions:
In a medium saucepan, combine flour and brown sugar; stir in milk.
Cook and stir over medium heat until thickened and bubbly; cook and stir 1 minute more.
Remove from the heat.
Gradually stir about 1 cup hot mixture into egg yolks.
Return all to the saucepan.
Bring to a gentle boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes. Remove from the heat; stir in butter and vanilla.
Cool to room temperature, stirring occasionally.
Fold in the whipped cream. Layer a third of the pudding in a 2 quart glass bowl.
Top with half the bananas.
Repeat layers.
Top with remaining pudding. Cover and chill at least 1 hour before serving.
Yield:
8 servings.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a homemade vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Layered Vegetable Vinaigrette(Serves 8. Preparation :20.  Stand 1:00.  Total 1:20.)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. vinegar
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. Dijon mustard
fresh ground black pepper (to taste)
4 carrots
1 lb. green beans
2 tomatoes
2 cucumbers
1/4 lb. mushrooms
Directions:
Mix dressing (first 4 ingredients) in a jar. Shake well. Scrub or peel carrots and slice into rounds. Steam green beans for 5 minutes; drain. Slice tomatoes, cucumbers and mushrooms into slices. Layer vegetables in a serving dish and top with dressing. Refrigerate 1 hour or more before serving.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a homemade vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Tomatoes Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
2 medium tomatoes
1/2 c. vegetable oil
3 Tbsp. wine vinegar
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. dried oregano leaves
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. dry mustard
1 clove garlic, crushed
lettuce leaves
4 green onions, finely chopped
1 Tbsp. parsley
Directions:
Arrange tomatoes in glass baking dish.
Shake oil, vinegar, oregano, salt, pepper, mustard and garlic in tightly covered jar. Pour over tomatoes.
Cover and refrigerate, spooning dressing over tomatoes occasionally, at least 2 hours.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a homemade vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Hot Vinaigrette Vegetable
Ingredients:
2 c. each: broccoli and cauliflower florets
1 c. thinly sliced onions
6 cherry tomatoes
1/2 c. red bell pepper strips
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 1/2 tsp. each; lemon juice and raspberry vinegar
1 tsp. Chinese sesame oil
1/2 tsp. each: granulated sugar and salt
1 small garlic clove, mashed
1/4 tsp. oregano leaves
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. chopped fresh basil
Directions:
In 2-quart saucepan, bring 1 quart water to a boil.
Add broccoli and cauliflower and cook, stirring once for 30 seconds to 1 minute.
Drain vegetables and transfer to serving platter.
Add onions, tomatoes and bell peppers and set aside.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a homemade vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Versatile Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
2/3 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. white wine vinegar
1/4 c. water
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. fresh ground pepper
1 clove garlic, pressed
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a jar.
Cover tightly and shake vigorously.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a homemade vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Our Favorite Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. prepared Dijon style mustard
4 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 tsp. granulated sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
minced parsley and/or snipped fresh chives to taste
1/2 c. olive oil
Directions:
Measure mustard into a bowl.
Whisk in vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper and herbs to taste.
Continue to whisk mixture while slowly dribbling in olive oil until mixture thickens.
Adjust seasoning to taste.
Cover until ready to use.
(Vinaigrette is best if made just before it is to be used.)
If necessary, whisk again before serving.
Makes 1 cup.

question: I want a recipe for a spicy chili with beans.
answer:
Title: Spicy Bean Dip
Ingredients:
2 cans chili beef soup
1 can Cheddar cheese or nacho cheese soup
water
1/2 c. green olives
1 large onion
4 oz. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Saute onion.
Add 3 cans of soup and enough water so it will be dip consistency.
Add olives.
Sprinkle with shredded cheese. Bake at 350° until it bubbles.

question: I want a recipe for a spicy chili with beans.
answer:
Title: Hot Chili
Ingredients:
1 lb. dried beans
2 lb. ground beef
2 large onions, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 jalapeno pepper, seeded, rinsed and chopped
3 to 5 Tbsp. chili powder
1 Tbsp. ground cumin
1 tsp. celery salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 (4 oz.) can green chilies, chopped
1 (28 oz.) can tomatoes, chopped
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
4 c. cocktail vegetable juice
Directions:
Sort and wash beans. Put in Dutch oven.
Cover with water and bring to a boil.
Cover and cook 2 minutes.
Remove from heat. Let stand 1 hour.
Bring to boil.
Reduce heat and simmer 1 hour or until tender.
Drain beans and set aside.
Combine ground beef, onion, garlic and jalapeno in large Dutch oven.
Cook over medium heat, stirring to crumble meat, until meat is browned.
Drain off drippings.
Add beans and remaining ingredients.
Stir well. Cover and simmer 1 hour.
Yields 10 to 12 servings.

question: I want a recipe for a spicy chili with beans.
answer:
Title: Chili Hot Beans Chili Recipe
Ingredients:
3 T. oil
1 lb. ground beef
1 lg. chopped onion
4 pieces chopped celery
3 cloves garlic
1 30 oz. can Bush Best Chili Hot Beans
3 c. water
2 t. salt
1/2 t. pepper
1/2 t. sugar
1 t. chili powder
1/2 c. ketchup
1/2 t. Cayenne pepper or hot pepper sauce
Directions:
Heat oil in skillet.
Lightly brown the meat.
Drain excess fat.
Push to side of pan.
Mix in remaining ingredients.
Simmer 30 to 45 min.
Serves 6 to 7 people.

question: I want a recipe for a spicy chili with beans.
answer:
Title: Spicy Green Beans *
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. peanut oil
1 tsp. minced ginger
1/2 tsp. minced garlic
1/2 lb. green beans, trimmed and slivered (whole works well, too)
1 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. dry sherry
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 to 2 tsp. chili paste with garlic (available at Oriental food stores)
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 tsp. cornstarch
1 Tbsp. cold water
1 tsp. sesame oil
Directions:
Heat wok over high heat.
Add oil and heat.
Add ginger and garlic and stir-fry 30 seconds.
Add beans.
Stir-fry 2 to 3 minutes longer.
Add sugar, sherry, salt, chili paste with garlic and soy sauce.
Stir-fry 1 to 2 minutes longer.
In separate dish, combine cornstarch and water to make smooth paste.
Add to wok and cook until mixture boils and thickens.
Remove from heat. Add sesame oil.
Let cool.
Chill 2 or more hours.
Yield:
6 servings.

question: I want a recipe for a spicy chili with beans.
answer:
Title: Spicy Hot Chili
Ingredients:
2 medium cloves garlic
1 large onion, chopped
1 lb. ground chuck
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 (15 oz.) can pinto beans
1 to 2 tsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. oregano leaves
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
Directions:
Brown meat in Dutch oven.
Add garlic and onion while browning, stirring occasionally.
When brown, drain fat.
Add remaining ingredients to Dutch oven.
Heat to boiling.
Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, one hour, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot.
Yield:
4 (1 1/2 cup) servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for stuffed mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Rice Stuffing
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1 c. chopped onion
1 c. chopped celery
1/4 c. snipped fresh parsley
4 c. cooked white rice
4 c. cooked brown rice, cooked in turkey or chicken broth
1 c. sliced mushrooms
2 tsp. ground thyme
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. ground or rubbed sage
1/2 tsp. ground black pepper
1/2 tsp. ground cloves
1/2 tsp. ground nutmeg
Directions:
Melt butter in large pan.
Add onion, celery and parsley. Cook over low heat until tender, stirring constantly.
Add cooked rice, mushrooms and seasonings.
Toss together lightly.
Makes enough stuffing for a 12 to 15 pound turkey.

question: What’s a good recipe for stuffed mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. medium size mushrooms, wiped with a damp cloth
1 c. mushroom stems
3 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/4 c. butter, softened
1 c. nuts, finely chopped
1 clove garlic, crushed
1/4 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 to 1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. heavy cream
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°. Arrange mushrooms in a shallow baking dish, hollow side up. Combine all remaining ingredients except cream; heap into mushroom umbrellas. Pour cream over mushrooms; bake at 350° for 20 minutes. Baste once or twice with sauce in baking dish. Serves 6 to 8.

question: What’s a good recipe for stuffed mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Stuffings
Ingredients:
stems from mushrooms, finely chopped
1/2 c. finely chopped onion
1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1/4 c. fine dry bread crumbs
1/2 c. chopped cooked ham or bacon
Directions:
In 1 1/2-quart casserole dish place chopped stems and onion. Cover.
Microwave at High (10) 4 minutes.
Stir after 2 minutes. To hot mixture add cream cheese, mashing and mixing well.
Stir in crumbs and ham or bacon.
Stuffs 12 large mushrooms.

question: What’s a good recipe for stuffed mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
fresh mushrooms (large, 10 to 15)
butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. chopped green onions
4 Tbsp. bread crumbs or stuffing mix
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley or chives
1/4 c. sour cream
salt and pepper
cayenne
grated Cheddar cheese
2 Tbsp. chopped meat (leftover) or bacon
Directions:
Take out stems of large, fresh mushrooms.
Saute in 2 tablespoons butter or margarine.
Add green onions, bread crumbs, meat and parsley or chives.
Moisten with sour cream.
Add seasonings.
Stuff caps with mixture.
Sprinkle grated cheese over. Drizzle melted butter over.
Bake at 375° for 15 to 20 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for stuffed mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
12 large or 24 medium mushrooms
2 Tbsp. minced green onion (include tops)
5 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 tsp. lemon juice
3/4 c. Jack cheese, shredded
1 c. flaked crab
1/2 c. soft bread crumbs
1 egg, lightly beaten
1/4 tsp. dill weed
1/4 c. dry white wine
Directions:
Clean mushrooms.
Remove stems and some of meat.
Chop and saute stems with onions in 2 tablespoons butter.
Stir in all else, except cheese and rest of butter and wine.
Melt butter and coat mushrooms with it.
Fill each mushroom with stuffing and pile cheese on top.
Pour wine into baking pan and bake mushrooms at 400° for 15 minutes.
Serve hot.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy potato wedges?
answer:
Title: Crispy Potato Wedges(Low Calorie)
Ingredients:
1 tsp. Paprika
1 tsp. Dried Parsley Flakes
1/4 tsp. Onion Salt
1/8 tsp. Pepper
2 Medium Potatoes Cut into Wedges
Refrigerated Butter Spray
Directions:
In a reusable plastic bag.
Combine the first 4 ingredients. Spritz the potato wedges with butter flavored spray.
Place in the bag a few at a time, and shake to coat.
Arrange in a single layer on an ungreased baking sheet.
Bake at 450 for 25-30 minutes or until tender.
Makes 2 Servings - 1 Point Each.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy potato wedges?
answer:
Title: Crispy Potato Wedges
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. each: dried basil, thyme and oregano leaves
1/4 tsp. paprika
4 to 6 medium potatoes
1/4 to 1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Combine olive oil and seasonings in a bowl.
Scrub unpeeled potatoes well.
Cut each potato in half lengthwise, then in thirds.
Coat each slice in the seasoned oil.
Spread in a single layer on a greased baking sheet.
Bake at 450° for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with cheese.
Bake 15 minutes longer.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy potato wedges?
answer:
Title: Crispy Potato Wedges
Ingredients:
4 medium Russet potatoes (cut into large wedges)
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/8 tsp. salt
garlic salt
ketchup
Directions:
Place potatoes in large bowl; add cold water to cover and let stand for 15 minutes. Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Spray a nonstick baking sheet with vegetable cooking spray. Set aside. Drain potatoes in a colander. Spread on a double layer of paper towels. Cover with a second layer of paper towels. Press down on the towels to dry potatoes. Transfer potatoes to a clean large bowl. Sprinkle with oil, pepper and salt; toss gently to combine. Arrange seasoned potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet. Bake for 20 minutes, using a spatula turn potatoes; sprinkle with garlic salt. Bake until golden, about 20 minutes, turning baking sheet after 10 minutes for even browning. Serve immediately with ketchup on the side.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy potato wedges?
answer:
Title: Crispy Potato Wedges
Ingredients:
4 medium Russet potatoes
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/4 tsp. ground pepper
1/8 tsp. salt
2 cloves garlic or powder
Directions:
Place potato wedges in large bowl; add cold water to cover. Let set 15 minutes.
Preheat oven to 425°.
Spray nonstick spray on baking pan and set aside.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy potato wedges?
answer:
Title: Crispy Potato Wedges
Ingredients:
2 medium baking potatoes
1 medium sweet potato
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. paprika
3/4 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 tsp. dried thyme, crushed
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cut each potato lengthwise into 8 wedges (24 wedges total). On an ungreased 15 x 10 x 2-inch baking pan, arrange wedges in a single layer, skin side down.

question: What’s a good recipe for shrimp tacos?
answer:
Title: M'M Good Taco Pie
Ingredients:
1 taco seasoning mix
1 deep dish pie shell
1 lb. ground beef
1 medium onion, chopped
1 (8 1/4 oz.) can refried beans
1 (8 oz.) jar taco sauce, divided usage
2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese, divided usage
1 to 1 1/2 c. Nachips or Fritos, crushed
tomatoes
sour cream
lettuce
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Thaw pie crust 10 minutes.
Prick bottom of pie shell thoroughly with a fork.
Bake pie shell for 10 minutes.
Remove from oven and reduce temperature to 350°.

question: What’s a good recipe for shrimp tacos?
answer:
Title: Cajun Shrimp Creole
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
3 stalks celery, chopped
3 cloves garlic, minced
1 large onion, diced
1 large bell pepper, diced
1 (14 oz.) can stewed tomatoes
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 tsp. dried basil leaves
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
3/4 tsp. salt
1 lb. medium shrimp, shelled and deveined
cooked rice
Directions:
In large, deep	fry
pan
over medium heat, melt butter and oil.
Add
celery, garlic, onion and bell pepper.
Saute 4 minutes, until
vegetables	begin to soften.
Add stewed tomatoes and tomato	sauce.	Mix well.
Add basil, pepper, cayenne pepper and salt.
Mix
well.
Over medium-high heat, simmer 10 minutes. Add shrimp.
Simmer
5
to	8 minutes, stirring frequently, until shrimp
are pink and cooked thoroughly.
Serve over white or brown rice.

question: What’s a good recipe for shrimp tacos?
answer:
Title: Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground meat
1 large onion
1/2 tsp. cumin seed or powder
garlic powder to taste
1 hot jalapeno pepper
4 to 5 chopped fresh tomatoes or Del Monte Mexican style canned tomatoes
1 box taco shells
chopped lettuce and tomatoes (for topping)
Directions:
Heat shells in oven (325°) until crisp.
Simmer all ingredients for 45 minutes, thickening with 1 tablespoon flour if needed.
Spoon filling into taco shells.
Top with chopped lettuce, tomatoes and shredded cheese.

question: What’s a good recipe for shrimp tacos?
answer:
Title: Tijuana Taco Salad(Good Diabetic Recipe)
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground turkey
1/4 c. chopped onion
1 (7 1/2 oz.) can tomatoes, cut up (undrained)
2 tsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. ground cumin
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 large head lettuce
3 medium tomatoes, cut into wedges
3/4 c. (3 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Brown ground turkey and onion in a skillet; drain.
Stir in undrained tomatoes, chili powder, garlic powder, salt, cumin and pepper.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until liquid evaporates, stirring occasionally.

question: What’s a good recipe for shrimp tacos?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Dip
Ingredients:
2 cans shrimp
1 or 2 lemons juiced
1/2 - 3/4 small can chopped Ortega style chilies
1/4 - 1/2 bell pepper finely chopped
1 bunch green onions chopped
1-2 Tbsp. taco sauce or salsa
5 - 10 drops Tabasco
Directions:
Mix all ingredients and serve with Tortilla or corn chips.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked stuffed shells?
answer:
Title: Baked Stuffed Shells
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 lb. ground beef
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 small can tomato paste
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 c. cottage cheese
1 large egg
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
4 oz. jumbo macaroni shells
1 can mushrooms, sliced or whole
Directions:
Saute onion, beef and all other ingredients, except cottage cheese, egg, parsley, Parmesan cheese and mushrooms.
Simmer about 15 minutes.
Cook shells as directed; cool.
Fill shells with cheese mixture:
cottage cheese, egg, Parmesan cheese and parsley. Place sauce in 2-quart baking dish.
Add stuffed shells.
Bake for 30 minutes at 300°.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked stuffed shells?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Shells - Florentine
Ingredients:
1 jar (29 oz. or more) marinara sauce
1 - 10 oz. pkg. chopped spinach
2 lbs. Ricotta cheese
1 egg
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
1 pkg. JUMBO shells, this recipe fills 50 shells
Directions:
Heat marinara sauce. Spoon 1 cup of sauce into bottom of a large pan or maybe 2 pans.
Reserve remaining sauce.
Cook spinach as directed on pkg. Drain well and mix with ricotta cheese, egg, oregano, nutmeg and parmesan cheese in a large bowl.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked stuffed shells?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Stuffed Shells
Ingredients:
2 tsp. margarine
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. shredded carrots
1 pkg. chopped spinach, cooked
1/4 tsp. basil
8 jumbo shells, cooked and drained
1 jar spaghetti sauce
4 to 8 oz. Monterey Jack cheese
1 c. Ricotta cheese
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Spray 8-inch baking pan with nonstick cooking spray.
In large skillet, melt butter (margarine); add onion.
Cook over medium for 5 minutes.
Add carrots, spinach and basil.
Cook another 3 minutes.
Remove from heat and add 1 cup Ricotta cheese.
Stuff into shells.
Put in baking dish.
Cover with sauce and cheese.
Bake 15 minutes or until heated through.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked stuffed shells?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Shells
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 large onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, chopped
8 oz. Mozzarella cheese, shredded
1/2 c. bread crumbs
1/4 c. chopped parsley
1 egg
2 jars spaghetti sauce
Parmesan cheese
1 box large shells
Directions:
In skillet, brown beef, onion and garlic.
Drain; cool.
Stir in cheese, crumbs, parsley, and egg.
Season with salt and pepper. Cook shells.
Use meat mixture to stuff shells.
Spoon 1/4 of sauce over bottom of baking dish.
Place shells on top of sauce.
Pour remaining sauce over shells.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
Bake at 350° for 25 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked stuffed shells?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Shells
Ingredients:
1 pkg. jumbo shells
1/4 c. butter
1 lb. pork
1/2 c. minced onion
1 qt. spaghetti sauce
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1 Tbsp. salt
1 lb. hamburger
1/2 c. bread crumbs
2 cloves minced garlic
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°.
Cook shells until soft, place in cold water and set aside.
Melt butter.
Add pork and beef; cook until brown.
Drain.
Add onion and garlic.
Cover and simmer 10 to 15 minutes or until onion is tender.
Remove from heat; stir in Parmesan, salt and bread crumbs.
Pour 1/2 cup of spaghetti sauce in the bottom of casserole dish.
Stuff each shell and arrange on top of sauce.
Cover with remaining sauce and bake for 30 minutes.

question: What can I cook with ground pork and cabbage?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Cabbage
Ingredients:
3/4 lb. ground pork
3/4 lb. ground beef
2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. black pepper
3/4 lb. rice, washed well
1 large onion, minced
3 Tbsp. shortening
1 large head of cabbage
1 small can of sauerkraut
1 No. 2 can tomato juice
Directions:
Core cabbage and place in enough boiling salted water to cover. With a fork in one hand and a knife in the other, keep cutting off the leaves as they become wilted. Drain. Trim thick center vein of each cabbage leaf. Brown the onion in shortening. Add to meat, seasonings and rice; mix well. Place a tablespoon of filling on each cabbage leaf and roll, tucking in edges. Place in pot and cover 2/3 full with water; arrange sauerkraut on top; add tomato juice. Cover and cook slowly for about 1 1/2 hours or until rice is tender. Serves 6 to 8 people. You can substitute green pepper for the cabbage or use both. For green peppers, cut off tops, scoup out center and fill peppers about 2/3 full with filling. Cook as directed for cabbage.

question: What can I cook with ground pork and cabbage?
answer:
Title: Cabbage Casserole
Ingredients:
1 or 2 heads cabbage
1 to 1 1/2 lb. ground pork
1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes
1 c. onion
1 c. celery
1 c. bell pepper
1 c. bread crumbs
Directions:
Cut up cabbage and boil until tender. Fry ground pork until brown; add seasonings, Ro-Tel tomatoes and cabbage.
Cook for about 45 minutes.
Add salt and black pepper to taste.
Add 1/2 cup bread crumbs to mixture. Cook about 2 to 3 minutes.
Pour into baking dish and sprinkle remaining crumbs on top.
Bake at 350° until bread crumbs are brown.

question: What can I cook with ground pork and cabbage?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Cabbage
Ingredients:
1/2 c. uncooked rice
1 lb. ground beef
1 lb. ground pork
1 medium chopped onion
1 clove garlic, minced
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 eggs, beaten
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 lb. cooked roast pork (butt end)
2 Tbsp. butter
1 large head cabbage
16 oz. sauerkraut, drained
1 qt. whole tomatoes
caraway seed
Directions:
Cook the rice in lightly salted water according to package directions.
Cool slightly.
Mix with the next 8 ingredients for filling.

question: What can I cook with ground pork and cabbage?
answer:
Title: Cabbage Rolls
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. ground chuck
1/2 lb. ground pork
1 c. rice (soak in warm water)
1 1/2 Tbsp. chili powder
1/2 Tbsp. red pepper
black pepper and salt
Directions:
While mixing other ingredients, put cabbage in very hot water to soften for easy rolling.
In separate bowl, mix 1 can tomato paste, salt, pepper, a little sugar and enough water to come up to level of cabbage.
Put meat and rice mixture on cabbage and roll. Pour tomato paste mixture over rolls and cook very slowly for 2 hours and 15 minutes.
Never stack cabbage more than 2 deep.

question: What can I cook with ground pork and cabbage?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Cabbage
Ingredients:
3 medium onions
approximately 1 lb. salt pork (ground)
2 large heads cabbage
2 lb. ground pork
2 lb. ground beef
6 c. cooked rice (3 pkg. Success boil bags)
2 cans whole or crushed tomatoes
2 cans tomato soup
Directions:
Cook cabbage until tender.
(Easy Tip:
Freeze cabbage a couple of days; thaw 1 day until limp.)
Remove tough skin on salt pork and grind fat.
Chop and saute onions and salt pork.
Let cool.
Mix ground pork, ground beef, cooked rice and onion and salt pork mixture.

question: What’s a good vegetarian burger recipe?
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Hamburgers
Ingredients:
3 eggs, beaten
1/3 c. milk
1 onion, grated
1 rounded Tbsp. peanut butter
1 tsp. Vegex
1 c. oatmeal
Directions:
Mix all the ingredients except oatmeal together and then fold in the oatmeal.
Fry by tablespoons as patties.
Make gravy and simmer burgers in it for 45 minutes.

question: What’s a good vegetarian burger recipe?
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Hamburgers
Ingredients:
1 can (20 oz.) vegeburger
6 eggs, beaten
1 large onion, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
1 tsp. sage
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
3/4 c. cracker crumbs
1 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
Saute onion and green pepper and add to burger.
Mix all ingredients together. Fry in patties, 1/2 cup per bun.

question: What’s a good vegetarian burger recipe?
answer:
Title: Lentil-Walnut Burgers(Vegetarian)
Ingredients:
3/4 c. dry lentils
1 1/2 c. water
2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1 Tbsp. peanut or olive oil
1 c. finely minced onion
4 to 5 large cloves garlic, minced
10 large mushrooms, minced
1/2 c. very finely minced walnuts
1 tsp. salt
1/2 lb. fresh spinach, finely minced (optional)
1 tsp. dry mustard
fresh black pepper to taste
1/2 c. fine bread crumbs or wheat germ
Directions:
Place lentils and water in small saucepan and bring to a boil. Lower the heat and simmer, partially covered, for about 30 minutes or until the lentils are soft and the liquid is gone. Transfer to a medium bowl.
Add vinegar and mash well.

question: What’s a good vegetarian burger recipe?
answer:
Title: Veggie Burger Patties
Ingredients:
3 c. water
2/3 c. pearl barley
2/3 c. lentils
2/3 c. long grain brown rice
1/4 c. vegetable oil
2 c. grated carrots
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 Tbsp. minced garlic
1/4 c. shelled sunflower seeds
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh basil
2 tsp. chopped fresh thyme
2 tsp. chopped fresh oregano
salt and pepper to taste
4 beaten eggs
7 Tbsp. flour
vegetable oil for frying
Directions:
Dried herbs can be substituted, use smaller amounts.

question: What’s a good vegetarian burger recipe?
answer:
Title: Sausage And Cabbage
Ingredients:
16 oz. vegetarian sausage burger
4 small red potatoes
1 c. water
1 c. sour cream
1 Tbsp. salt
1/2 small head cabbage
1 Tbsp. melted margarine
Directions:
Slice potatoes into 1/4-inch width.
Mix salt and boiling water and bring to a boil.
Add 1/8 leaf slices of cabbage. Cook, covered, for approximately 25 minutes, until potatoes are done.
Add sour cream and sausage and cook 10 to 15 minutes further.
Serve.

question: What can I make with pumpkin puree and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Coconut Muffins
Ingredients:
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. sugar
3/4 c. vegetable oil
1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 (3 1/2 oz.) pkg. coconut cream instant pudding
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1 c. canned pumpkin
1/2 c. chopped nuts (pecans or walnuts)
Directions:
Combine first 3 ingredients in large mixer bowl.
Beat at medium speed until well blended.
Combine flour and next ingredients in medium bowl.
Add to the sugar mixture alternately with pumpkin.
Mix after each addition.
Stir in nuts.
Pour into greased muffin pans.
Bake at 350° for 20 minutes or until wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean.
Cool in pan for 10 minutes.
Makes 15 to 18 muffins.

question: What can I make with pumpkin puree and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Puree Of Pumpkin Soup
Ingredients:
4 Tbsp. (1/2 stick) butter/margarine
1 large onion, chopped
1 medium leek (white part only), chopped
1 lb. canned pumpkin puree
4 c. chicken broth
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. curry powder
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
1/4 tsp. ground white pepper
1/4 tsp. ground ginger
1 bay leaf
1 c. half and half
Directions:
In medium soup pot, melt butter/margarine.
Saute onion and leek, stirring occasionally until soft.
Stir in pumpkin, chicken broth, salt and spices.
Simmer, uncovered, for 15 minutes.
Stir occasionally.
Remove bay leaf.
Puree the mixture in batches in blender for a smoother texture or in food processor fitted with metal blade.
Can refrigerate for 2 days.
May be frozen.
Return to soup pot and add half and half.

question: What can I make with pumpkin puree and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin-Coconut Bread
Ingredients:
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. sugar
3/4 c. vegetable oil
1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 (3 1/2 oz.) pkg. coconut cream instant pudding mix
1/2 tsp. ground nutmeg
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 c. canned or cooked, mashed pumpkin
1/2 c. chopped pecans (optional)
Directions:
Combine first 3 ingredients in a large mixing bowl; beat at medium speed of an electric mixer until blended.
Combine flour and next 7 ingredients in a medium bowl; add to sugar mixture alternately with pumpkin, beginning and ending with flour mixture. Mix after each addition.
Stir in pecans, if desired.

question: What can I make with pumpkin puree and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Pudding
Ingredients:
4 c. sweet potatoes
4 c. pumpkin
1 c. coconut milk
1/2 c. butter
3 eggs, lightly beaten
2 c. brown sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/4 c. flour
1/2 c. water
1/2 tsp. ginger
2 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. cloves
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen raspberries in light syrup, thawed
1/3 c. apple fiber
3 egg whites
1/4 c. sugar
Directions:
Puree frozen raspberries and their syrup in a food processor or blender.
To eliminate the seeds, push the raspberries through a sieve, mashing down on the puree with a spoon.
Discard the seeds.

question: What can I make with pumpkin puree and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Custard Cups
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. low-fat milk
1/2 c. canned pumpkin
1/3 c. packed brown sugar
2 Tbsp. reduced-calorie maple syrup
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/4 tsp. ground ginger
2 eggs
4 egg whites
1/2 c. water
1/3 c. raisins
2 Tbsp. reduced-calorie maple syrup
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Heat milk in heavy 1-quart saucepan until hot, but not boiling.
Mix pumpkin, brown sugar, 2 tablespoons syrup, cinnamon, ginger, eggs and egg whites in a large bowl until smooth.
Beat in hot milk.
Divide evenly among 6 ungreased 10-ounce custard cups.
Place cups in rectangular pan, 13 x 9 x 2-inches, on oven rack.
Pour very hot water into pan to within 1-inch of tops of cups.

question: How do I make roasted asparagus with parmesan?
answer:
Title: Roasted Asparagus
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh asparagus, trimmed
2 Tbsp. olive oil
pinch salt
shaved parmesan cheese
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Arrange oven racks to middle and lower third of oven.
Heat oven to 400 degrees.
Divide asparagus and spread on two jelly-roll pans.
Toss each with 1 tablespoon oil and salt.
Roast 10 minutes. Switch pans between racks and roast 10 minutes more until stalks are tender.
Sprinkle top with cheese if desired and pepper.
Makes 4-6 servings.

question: How do I make roasted asparagus with parmesan?
answer:
Title: Parmesan Topped Asparagus
Ingredients:
2 lb. asparagus, trimmed and peeled
1/4 c. unsalted butter, melted
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Blanche asparagus in boiling water for 3 to 5 minutes.
Drain on paper towels.
Arrange spears in a shallow ovenproof serving dish.
Pour melted butter over asparagus.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste.
Sprinkle cheese evenly over top.
Bake for 20 minutes or until lightly browned.

question: How do I make roasted asparagus with parmesan?
answer:
Title: Hazelnut-Parmesan Asparagus
Ingredients:
2 c. water
2 lbs. asparagus spears
2 Tbsp. butter or stick margarine
3 c. sliced mushrooms
1 1/2 tsp. chopped fresh basil leaves
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground pepper
1/4 c. shredded Parmesan cheese
1/4 c. chopped hazelnuts
Directions:
Heat water to boiling; cover and cook 4-6 minutes or until crisp and tender.
Drain and set aside.
Melt butter in skillet over medium heat.
Stir in mushrooms, and cook until light brown. Stir asparagus, basil, salt and pepper into mushrooms until vegetables are coated with seasoning and asparagus is heated through.
Sprinkle with cheese and hazelnuts.

question: How do I make roasted asparagus with parmesan?
answer:
Title: Roasted Asparagus
Ingredients:
1 lb. asparagus
2 to 3 cloves chopped garlic
3 to 4 Tbsp. olive oil
Directions:
Break off tough ends of asparagus.
Peel lower white sections; place in baking dish.
Drizzle with olive oil.
Sprinkle on chopped garlic.
Bake at 450° for 8 to 10 minutes.
Makes 2 to 3 servings.

question: How do I make roasted asparagus with parmesan?
answer:
Title: Mary Jane'S Baked Asparagus
Ingredients:
2 lb. asparagus
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. grated parmesan cheese
garlic powder
2 Tbsp. bread crumbs
Directions:
Put asparagus in large jelly roll pan.
Drizzle oil and sprinkle with salt, pepper, parmesan cheese, garlic powder and bread crumbs.
Turn until evenly coated.
Then arrange in a single layer.
Bake at 425°.
Roast for 10 to 15 minutes or until tender when pierced and tips start to brown.
Serve immediately or cool in pan.
Cover and refrigerate.
To reheat turn oven to 350° for 5 minutes.
Serve with lemon wedges.
Can be made up to one day ahead of time.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Better Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
3 to 3 1/2 lb. sprouts
2 1/2 Tbsp. butter
2 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
8 cloves coarsely chopped garlic
1 c. chicken broth
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
freshly squeezed lemon
Directions:
Cut off stems from sprouts and remove outer yellow layer.
Cut small x in bottom of each.
Rinse in cold water; drain and pat dry.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts With Cream And Garlic
Ingredients:
3 pounds Brussels sprouts, trimmed and cross cut in base
1/4 cup unsalted butter
2 medium garlic cloves, minced
1 cup whipping cream
1 tsp. salt
Freshly ground pepper
Directions:
Cook Brussels sprouts in large pot of boiling salted water until crisp-tender, about 10 minutes.
Drain, rinse under cold water and drain again.
(Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated.)
Melt butter in heavy large skillet over medium heat.
Add garlic and cook until soft, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes.
Do not brown.
Add Brussels sprouts, cream, salt and pepper and cook until cream thickens enough to coat Brussels sprouts, stirring occasionally, about 15 minutes.
Serve hot. Yield:
8 to 10 servings.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Better Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
3 to 3 1/2 lb. Brussels sprouts
2 1/2 Tbsp. butter
2 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
8 cloves garlic
1 c. chicken broth
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Cut off stem and "X" bottom of each sprout.
Over low heat, melt the butter with olive oil in a large pot.
Add garlic; cook 2 to 3 minutes.
Add sprouts; toss with butter mixture.
Add chicken broth, salt and pepper.
Cover; cook for 10 to 15 minutes over low.
Do not overcook.
Drain; return to pot.
Before serving, toss with melted butter and parsley.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts (Any Vegetable) Soup
Ingredients:
1 small potato
1 medium onion
2 Tbsp. oleo
1 lb. sprouts (veggie)
3 c. chicken broth
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 egg
1/4 c. milk
Directions:
Saute onion and tater until tender.
Add sprouts, broth, salt and pepper.
Boil until tender.
Puree in food processor.
Return to pan.
Mix egg with milk with fork.
Stir into soup.
Cook and stir until hot.
Do not boil.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts Supreme
Ingredients:
1 pound fresh Brussels sprouts, trimmed
1 cup chopped celery
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 cup milk
1/2 cup shredded process American cheese
1/4 tsp. salt
pinch cayenne pepper, optional
Directions:
Place Brussels sprouts, celery, and a small amount of water in a saucepan; cover and cook for 8 minutes or until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in another saucepan, melt butter.
Stir flour until smooth.
Gradually add milk; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.
Add cheese, salt, and cayenne if desired; stir until cheese is melted.
Drain sprouts and celery; top with cheese sauce.
Yield:
4-6 servings.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and beans?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice With Leftovers(Very Good!!!)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. long grain rice, washed in 3 changes of water and drained
3 Tbsp. oil
2 stalks celery, diced
1 medium onion, diced
1/4 green pepper, diced
2 cloves garlic, diced
1 to 2 c. or more of any leftover meat (ham, beef, pork, chicken or combination), diced
1/4 c. soy sauce (optional)
1 can water chestnuts, sliced
1 can pieces and stems mushrooms, drained (save juice)
2 1/2 c. water
4 Tbsp. chicken bouillon
Directions:
Fry rice in skillet over high heat, stirring all the time, until brown.
Scrape into 4-quart pan with lid.
Add all ingredients, bringing to a boil.
Boil for 1 minute. Turn to low heat and cover tightly.
Don't lift lid for 25 minutes.
Stir and serve.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and beans?
answer:
Title: Easy Red Beans And Rice(Makes 10 Servings. Prep Time: 15 Minutes.)
Ingredients:
3 c. water
1 1/2 c. long grain rice
2 Tbsp. butter
1 (16 oz.) pkg. smoked sausage, cut 1/4-inch thick
1 (14.5 oz.) can stewed tomatoes/onions and green peppers
2 (15 oz.) cans kidney beans
1/2 tsp. chopped garlic
1 tsp. lemon pepper
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 tsp. oregano
Directions:
Bring water, rice and butter to hard boil.
Cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
Put a little oil in large frying pan and saute meat and onion.
Brown for five minutes and add tomatoes and beans with seasonings.
Heat to boiling, then reduce heat to simmer and cover for about 15 minutes.
Remove lid and let simmer about 15 more minutes.
Serve over rice.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and beans?
answer:
Title: Leftover Night
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground chuck
2 c. rice (uncooked)
1 can green beans, drained
1 can corn, drained
1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes
1/2 onion and bell pepper
1/2 jar salsa (hot or mild)
salt
pepper
jalapeno peppers
Directions:
Cook ground chuck, onion and bell pepper together.
Cook rice, then add beans, corn, Ro-Tel, salsa, salt, pepper and ground chuck mixture. Add jalapeno peppers.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and beans?
answer:
Title: Chicken Rice Casserole(From Leftovers)
Ingredients:
1 c. cooked rice
1 c. cooked chicken (preferably leftover barbecue)
1/4 c. minced fresh parsley
1/2 c. or more grated cheese
1 bell pepper, chopped fine
1/2 c. cooked or canned French-style green beans
1 can celery soup (undiluted)
Directions:
Mix together and place in greased or sprayed casserole. Garnish with paprika.
Bake at 350° for 20 to 30 minutes to warm thoroughly.
Serves 4.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and beans?
answer:
Title: Red Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
1 cup of rice
5 cups of red beans
4 cans of tomato sauce
1 cup of oil
Directions:
1.
Put a little bit of boiling whater in a pot.

question: How do I make a zesty lime chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Marvelous Marinade
Ingredients:
3 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 c. red wine vinegar
1/3 c. catsup
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. crushed basil
2 to 3 lb. meat or chicken, cut in 1/4-inch chunks or pieces
veggies
Directions:
In a small pan, cook garlic in oil.
Remove from heat.
Add the rest of the ingredients, except the meat and vegetables.
Pour sauce over meat/chicken in covered container.
Marinate meat/chicken 6 hours or overnight.

question: How do I make a zesty lime chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Zesty Grilled Chicken Lo-Fat!
Ingredients:
8 chicken breasts, halved, boneless and skinless
2 Tbsp. olive oil and enough water to equal 1/4 c.
1/4 c. lite soy sauce
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
2 cloves garlic, minced
3 whole cloves
dash of pepper
1/2 tsp. dried thyme
1/2 tsp. dried basil
Directions:
Place chicken breasts in a shallow glass dish (or a Ziploc bag works well, too).
Prepare marinade with remaining ingredients. Pour marinade over chicken and refrigerate a minimum of 4 hours. May be refrigerated up to 24 hours.
Grill quickly over hot coals, basting frequently.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make a zesty lime chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Mexican Lime Marinade
Ingredients:
juice of 3 limes
juice of 1 lemon
1/2 c. dry white wine
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. dried tarragon
1 clove garlic, minced
Directions:
Combine all ingredients with 6 skinless chicken breasts; marinate for 4 to 6 hours, then barbecue.

question: How do I make a zesty lime chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marinade
Ingredients:
1/2 c. soy sauce
1/3 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. water
2 Tbsp. dried minced onion
2 Tbsp. sesame seeds
1 Tbsp. sugar
4 garlic cloves, minced
1 tsp. ginger
3/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together. Pour over chicken (approximately 4 to 6 pieces). Cover and refrigerate overnight or for 8 hours. Keep 1/2 cup of the sauce for marinating while cooking; toss the remaining sauce. Grill or bake until done.

question: How do I make a zesty lime chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Sesame-Lime Marinade
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. finely shredded lime peel
1/3 c. lime juice
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 Tbsp. sesame oil
1/4 tsp. salt
4 chicken breasts, washed and patted dry
2 Tbsp. honey
1 tsp. sesame seed
Directions:
In a large bowl or plastic bag combine lime peel, lime juice, vegetable oil, sesame oil and salt.
Add chicken to marinade. Cover and refrigerate 4 hours or longer if desired, turning occasionally.
Remove chicken from marinade.
Reserve 1/4 cup marinade.
In a small bowl, combine 1/4 cup marinade, honey and sesame seed.
Grill or broil chicken with marinade-honey mixture several times while cooking.

question: What’s a good recipe for glazed carrots?
answer:
Title: Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. carrots (about 8 medium), pared and cut into 1-inch pieces
2 c. stock or broth
2 Tbsp. light brown sugar
6 Tbsp. butter
pinch of freshly ground black pepper
freshly grated nutmeg to taste
salt to taste
Directions:
Combine carrots, stock and brown sugar in a heavy saucepan with lid; bring to a boil, then reduce the heat and cover tightly.
Cook the carrots until they are about half done, 10 to 15 minutes; then remove the lid from the pot.
Return the heat to medium-low and reduce the cooking liquid to a thick syrup.
As the syrup thickens, shake the pan frequently to keep the carrots from sticking.
When the syrup is thick, add the butter, pepper, nutmeg and salt.
When the butter is melted, shake the pan again, rolling the carrots gently in the glaze so each piece is covered.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for glazed carrots?
answer:
Title: Apple Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
2 c. sliced, hot cooked carrots
1 1/2 Tbsp. melted butter
3 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/4 c. applesauce
Directions:
Combine carrots, butter, brown sugar and applesauce; heat and serve.
Season cold cooked carrots as suggested in the recipe; place in baking dish.
Cover; bake in oven at 350° for 15 minutes. Yields 6 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for glazed carrots?
answer:
Title: Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
16 medium carrots, cut into 2-inch pieces
1 1/2 c. water
2 Tbsp. liquid Butter Buds
1 onion, diced
1 Tbsp. packed brown sugar
1 tsp. dry instant beef broth
1/2 tsp. lemon peel
1/2 tsp. Sweet 'N Low brown sugar substitute
1/8 tsp. ground nutmeg
Directions:
In a large saucepan, combine all ingredients and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low.
Simmer, covered, 20 to 25 minutes. With slotted spoon, remove carrots to a bowl.
Increase heat and bring to a rapid boil.
Reduce to glaze consistency.
Add carrots and coat evenly with glaze.
One 1 cup serving contains 95 calories and 0 gm fat.

question: What’s a good recipe for glazed carrots?
answer:
Title: Quick Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
1 carrot (per person)
cold water
butter
a good pinch of salt, pepper and sugar
Directions:
Cut carrot into match sticks and place in cold water.
When ready to cook, drain water from carrot and place them in a frypan along with butter, salt, pepper and sugar.
Steam cook until just tender; check seasoning and add more if needed.

question: What’s a good recipe for glazed carrots?
answer:
Title: Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
water
1 lb. carrots, cut in large chunks or julienne strips
salt to taste
2 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
Directions:
In a 2-quart saucepan over medium heat in 1-inch boiling water, heat carrots and 1/4 teaspoon salt to boil.
Reduce heat to low; cover and simmer 15 minutes or until tender-crisp, then drain.
In a saucepan, heat butter, sugar, nutmeg and 3/4 teaspoon salt; stir well and heat.
Add carrots; stir until carrots are glazed.

question: How do I make a simple lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Lemon Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1/4 c. fresh lemon juice
2 large cloves garlic, coarsely chopped
1/2 c. olive oil
1/2 c. fresh grated Parmesan
Directions:
Puree lemon juice and garlic in food processor.
With machine running, gradually add olive oil and blend until smooth.
Add Parmesan cheese, blend until thickened.
Season with salt and pepper.

question: How do I make a simple lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Creamy Vinaigrette Dressing
Ingredients:
1/2 c. oil
1/2 c. half and half
1 egg, lightly beaten
1 clove garlic, minced
5 Tbsp. tarragon vinegar
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. white pepper
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. sugar
juice of 1 1/2 lemons
Directions:
Whisk together and refrigerate for 2 hours.

question: How do I make a simple lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Vinaigrette (Basic)
Ingredients:
1 tsp. Dijon mustard
scant 1/2 tsp. salt
5 twists of peppermill
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
scant tsp. fresh lemon juice
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/4 c. olive oil
Directions:
Put mustard in the bottom of a salad bowl.
Stir the first 5 ingredients, whisking constantly.
Add vegetable oil and olive oil in a very thin stream.
Makes 6 tablespoons of vinaigrette, enough for 10 to 12 cups of salad greens.
Use shortly after it is made. Add whatever you like, garlic, anchovies, shallots, sliced mushrooms, chopped capers, etc.
May be used on grilled fish or cold roast beef (add horseradish) or chicken.

question: How do I make a simple lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Tomatoes Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
2 medium tomatoes
1/2 c. vegetable oil
3 Tbsp. wine vinegar
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. dried oregano leaves
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. dry mustard
1 clove garlic, crushed
lettuce leaves
4 green onions, finely chopped
1 Tbsp. parsley
Directions:
Arrange tomatoes in glass baking dish.
Shake oil, vinegar, oregano, salt, pepper, mustard and garlic in tightly covered jar. Pour over tomatoes.
Cover and refrigerate, spooning dressing over tomatoes occasionally, at least 2 hours.

question: How do I make a simple lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Lemon Vinaigrette Dressing
Ingredients:
1/2 c. vegetable oil
1/3 c. ReaLemon lemon juice from concentrate
1/4 c. sliced green onions
1 Tbsp. Dijon style mustard
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
In 1-pint jar with tight fitting lid or cruet, combine all ingredients; shake well.
Chill to blend flavors.
Use as a salad dressing or as a marinade for asparagus, broccoli, poultry or fish.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Crispy Oven Potatoes
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter, melted
1 Tbsp. scallions, chopped
1 Tbsp. parsley, chopped
1/4 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
4 large unpeeled potatoes, thinly sliced
1 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese (optional)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
Lightly grease a 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish.
Combine melted butter with the next 5 ingredients.
Layer potatoes in baking dish, brushing each layer with butter mixture. Bake for 40 minutes or until tender.
Sprinkle with cheese and bake for 5 minutes.
(Bake at 350° for 1 1/2 hours, if desired.) Serve with pork or sausage.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Crispy Recipe
Ingredients:
2 c. brown sugar
2 sticks butter or margarine
1 3/4 c. white syrup
1 can Borden Eagle Brand milk
1 large box Rice Krispies, puffed rice or popcorn
Directions:
Combine first 3 ingredients in a large saucepan.
Boil for 3 minutes and remove from heat.
Add Eagle Brand milk and boil 3 additional minutes.
Pour 1 large box Rice Krispies, puffed rice or popcorn into large bowl or roasting pan.
Pour cooked mixture over cereal and mix well.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Oven Crisped Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. Russet potatoes
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1 Tbsp. shallots, minced
1 Tbsp. diet soft margarine or Pam
1/4 c. chopped fresh basil (1/8 c. dried)
Directions:
Cut potatoes into eighths or sixteenths.
Brush margarine or spray with Pam evenly on potatoes to coat.
Sprinkle with garlic salt.
Roast potatoes in 450° oven until brown and crispy, approximately 20 to 30 minutes, turning once or twice.
Stir in basil and shallots.
Transfer to serving dish.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Crispy Oven Potatoes
Ingredients:
1/4 c. margarine
1 Tbsp. grated onion
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
