Add bell pepper and garlic; cook 6 minutes or just until tender.
Add shrimp, lemon juice, crushed red pepper, salt and black pepper; cook 10 minutes or until shrimp is pink and opaque.
Sprinkle with parsley.
Add shrimp mixture to cooked linguine in large bowl and toss well.
Serve immediately.

question: How do I make garlic shrimp in a skillet?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Skillet
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. onion
1/2 tsp. salt
1 3/4 c. hot water
1 c. cooked shrimp
1 c. French-style green beans
1/2 c. celery
dash of pepper
1 can cream of mushroom soup
2 tsp. lemon juice
1 1/3 c. Minute rice
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Add rice to butter, onion, celery in skillet and saute until rice is golden brown.
Add remaining ingredients.
Bring to a boil and then simmer uncovered 5 minutes.

question: How do I make garlic shrimp in a skillet?
answer:
Title: Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
3 cloves fresh garlic, crushed
8 oz. whole mushrooms, stems removed
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
12 oz. fresh shrimp, shelled and deveined
1 c. white wine
2 Tbsp. cornstarch, mixed with just enough water to dissolve
Directions:
Melt butter in large skillet.
Add crushed garlic and whole mushrooms.
Gently mix in lemon juice and shrimp.
(Add more butter, if needed, at this time.)
Saute 1 minute on each side, or until pink.
Add wine; increase heat and bring to a boil.
Remove from heat and add cornstarch mixture.
Return to flame until sauce is thickened.
Serve over rice.

question: How can I make a homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
1/3 c. olive oil
2 cloves garlic, peeled and sliced
3 Tbsp. finely chopped parsley
3 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
1 can (28 oz.) whole tomatoes
1 bay leaf
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
In large saucepan, heat oil over medium heat.
Add garlic and saute for 2 to 3 minutes.
Add parsley and onion.
Slowly add tomatoes.
Stir to break up tomatoes.
Add bay leaf, salt and pepper.
Bring to a boil.
Cover and simmer on low about 15 minutes.
Serve over pasta dishes or with rice.

question: How can I make a homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Basic Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, chopped fine
4 Tbsp. dried parsley
1 tsp. sugar
2 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. salt
1 (28 oz.) can tomatoes, chopped (reserve liquid)
Directions:
Heat oil in heavy skillet.
Add onion and garlic.
Cook until tender.
Add tomatoes and liquid, spices and sugar.
Cover and simmer over medium heat 20 minutes to blend flavors.
Cool and divide into 3 half-pint freezer containers.
Freeze and use to make Mediterranean Stuffed Potatoes, Southwest Turkey Pie or marinara makes an excellent base for spaghetti sauce.

question: How can I make a homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
16 oz. can tomatoes, crushed
8 oz. can tomato sauce
1/2 small onion, chopped
1/2 tsp. each oregano, basil and parsley
1/2 c. mushrooms, sliced (optional)
Directions:
Saute garlic and onions in oil.
Add remaining ingredients; bring to a boil.
Cover, reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes to 1 hour.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How can I make a homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
2 to 3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 white onion, chopped
1 medium bell pepper, chopped
2 stalks celery, chopped
1 lb. mushrooms, chopped
1 medium zucchini, diced
2 to 3 tomatoes, chopped
2 tsp. basil
1 handful fresh basil leaves, chopped
1 (13 oz.) can tomatoes
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. thyme
1 tsp. salt
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1 Tbsp. honey
3 tsp. black pepper
4 to 5 cloves garlic, minced
1/4 c. fresh minced parsley
Directions:
Heat olive oil in Dutch oven.
Add onion, bell pepper, celery, mushrooms, zucchini, fresh tomatoes, herbs and salt.
Saute over medium heat until onion is soft; add can of tomatoes, tomato paste, honey and black pepper.
Bring to a boil, then simmer partially covered for about 30 minutes.
Add garlic and cook for 10 minutes. Add parsley last.

question: How can I make a homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
2 c. coarsely chopped onions
1/2 c. sliced carrot
2 cloves garlic, finely chopped
4 c. Italian tomatoes (plum Roma)
salt and pepper to taste
4 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. dried oregano
1 Tbsp. fresh basil or 1 tsp. dried
Directions:
Tips:
Use more carrots (makes sweeter) or garlic or oregano if you like more herbs; whatever you desire, it's always good.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut rice?
answer:
Title: Creamy Rice Pudding
Ingredients:
1 qt. milk
1/2 c. rice
1/2 c. sugar
2 eggs
cinnamon
sugar
Directions:
Heat milk, rice and sugar and cook until tender.
Stir 2 or 3 times while cooking.
Take off burner and add beaten eggs.
Stir until thickened (do not cook).
If too thick, thin with a little heavy cream or milk.
Sprinkle with cinnamon and sugar.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut rice?
answer:
Title: Tropical Coconut Rice
Ingredients:
2 c. water
1 c. coconut milk
1 1/2 c. uncooked long grain white rice
1/2-inch piece fresh ginger
1/2 c. pineapple tidbits
1/2 c. shredded coconut, toasted
1 1/2 Tbsp. cilantro (fresh), minced
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 c. red bell pepper, minced
1/2 c. red onion, minced
1/2 c. chopped toasted cashews
Directions:
Bring water and coconut milk to boil. Stir in rice and ginger. Cover. Reduce heat to low and simmer 20 minutes, until liquid is absorbed. Transfer to bowl. Remove ginger. Add pineapple, shredded coconut and cilantro to rice and stir to combine. Heat olive oil in saut pan. Add red bell pepper and onion and saut until softened. Add to rice. Last, add cashews to rice; stir well. Serves 6.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut rice?
answer:
Title: Coconut Rice
Ingredients:
2 tsp oil
3/4 c shredded coconut
1/2 c finely chopped onion
2 c rice
4 c chicken broth
1 small mango, peeled and chopped
1/4 cup fresh chives, chopped
Directions:
Heat oil in a large saucepan. Add coconut and cook and stir until browned. Add onion and cook 1 minute. Stir in rice. Add broth and bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat to low and simmer for 25 to 30 minutes until liquid is absorbed and rice is tender. Remove from heat. Stir in mango. Sprinkle with chives.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut rice?
answer:
Title: Creamy Rice Pudding
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. rice
1 1/4 c. sugar
6 c. milk
2 c. water
2 eggs
1 Tbsp. vanilla
2 c. milk
Directions:
Combine rice, sugar, 6 cups milk and water.
Bring to a boil. Cook 1 hour, covered, over low heat, stirring occasionally.
Mix together the eggs, vanilla and 2 cups milk.
Add to the heated rice mixture and heat an additional 10 minutes.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut rice?
answer:
Title: Curried Coconut Rice
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. curry powder
2 c. water
2 chicken broth cubes
1 c. uncooked rice
1 c. coconut milk
1/3 c. golden raisins
sliced onions, fried
Directions:
Melt butter in 2-quart saucepan over medium heat. Stir in curry powder. Add water and broth cubes and bring to a boil. Add rice, coconut milk and raisins. Stir to blend.
Return to boil and then reduce heat.
Cover and simmer until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed.
Put into a serving dish and garnish with fried onions.

question: What’s a recipe for grilled pork chops with herbs?
answer:
Title: Herbed Pork Chops
Ingredients:
4 lean pork chops (about 1-inch thick)
1 c. unsweetened pineapple juice
2/3 c. dry sherry
3 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/2 tsp. dried rosemary leaves, crushed
1 clove garlic, minced
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except pork chops.
Mix well.
Place chops in shallow dish.
Pour marinade over chops.
Cover and refrigerate overnight, turning meat occasionally.
Remove pork chops from marinade and place on rack of broiling pan.
Broil 10 to 12 minutes on each side or until done, turning and basting once with marinade.

question: What’s a recipe for grilled pork chops with herbs?
answer:
Title: Herbed Grill Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 large sweet pepper, cut in strips
2 small zucchini, julienned
2 small yellow summer squash, julienned
1 tsp. fresh thyme or 1 tsp. dried
1 tsp. fresh oregano or 1/2 tsp. dried
1/4 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
In a medium bowl, toss the red pepper, zucchini and squash with thyme, oregano and black pepper.
Drizzle 1 teaspoon of oil over vegetables and toss well.
Spread vegetables in a single layer on rack.
Cook vegetables 8 inches from heat until golden brown on both sides (3 to 4 minutes each side).
Yields 4 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for grilled pork chops with herbs?
answer:
Title: Grilled Pork Chops
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
2 chopped garlic cloves
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
dash of salt and pepper
Directions:
Mix oil with garlic, soy sauce and lemon juice; set aside. Score meat on both sides; baste with lemon mixture and place on grill.
Partially cover and cook 8 to 10 minutes on each side. Turn 3 to 4 times; baste occasionally.

question: What’s a recipe for grilled pork chops with herbs?
answer:
Title: Pork Chops With Herbs
Ingredients:
6 pork chops
2 onions, sliced
1 can cream of celery soup
1/2 c. milk
1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/2 tsp. salt
pepper
1/2 c. water
1 tsp. dried thyme
1 tsp. dried oregano
snipped parsley
Directions:
Brown chops in heavy skillet.
In same skillet, saute onions until golden.
Combine soup, milk, thyme, poultry seasoning, oregano, water and salt.
Remove chops and onions to baking dish. Cover with remaining ingredients.
Cook 1 1/2 hours in covered pan at 350°.

question: What’s a recipe for grilled pork chops with herbs?
answer:
Title: Herb Grilled Vegetables
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1 Tbsp. onion powder
1 Tbsp. parsley flakes
1 tsp. basil leaves, crumbled
1 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. ground black pepper
1 medium-sized eggplant, cut in 1/2-inch slices
2 medium zucchini, cut in half, lengthwise
2 medium tomatoes, cut in 1/2, crosswise*
Directions:
*Italian Roma tomatoes also work well; split in half lengthwise.

question: How do I make a basic chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
3 1/3 c. Basic Cake Mix
9 Tbsp. cocoa
1 c. milk
2 eggs
2 1/2 Tbsp. melted butter
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°.
Mix well and bake 25 to 30 minutes.

question: How do I make a basic chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Easy Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
3 heaping c. flour
3 rounded Tbsp. cocoa
3 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 c. shortening
3 c. sugar
3/4 c. buttermilk or sour milk
1 1/2 c. boiling water
3 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Measure and sift the flour, cocoa, soda, baking powder and salt.
Beat shortening and sugar; cream well.
Add alternately with dry ingredients and mix well.
Add buttermilk or sour milk, boiling water and vanilla.
Dough will be thin.
Bake in hot oven at 375° to 400°.

question: How do I make a basic chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Basic No-Fat Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. evaporated skim milk
3/4 c. unsweetened cocoa powder
1 c. unsweetened applesauce
1 Tbsp. vanilla extract
2 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 c. granulated sugar
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
whites from 4 large eggs, room temperature
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Spray 13 x 9-inch cake pan with Pam.
Heat milk in medium size saucepan until barely simmering.
Remove from heat and whisk in cocoa until thickened and almost smooth.
Let stand 2 or 3 minutes to cool.
Whisk in applesauce and vanilla. Mix flour, 1 1/4 cup sugar, baking powder, soda and salt in a large bowl.
Beat egg whites in medium size bowl with mixer on high until thick and foamy.
Gradually beat in remaining 1/4 cup sugar until stiff peaks form.
Pour cocoa mixture over flour. Stir just until blended.
With rubber spatula, gently stir abut 1/4 egg whites into flour mixture.
Fold in remaining egg whites until no white streaks remain.
Pour into pan.
Bake 25 to 30 minutes. Makes 30 servings.
133 calories per serving, .3 grams fat.

question: How do I make a basic chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Can Do Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
1 2/3 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 c. shortening
1 tsp. vanilla
2 eggs
2/3 c. cocoa
1 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. buttermilk
Directions:
Grease and flour 2 round pans or 1 oblong pan.
In large bowl, combine all ingredients.
Beat on low speed 30 minutes, scraping sides and bottom of bowl.
Beat 3 minutes on medium speed, scraping bowl frequently.
Pour into prepared pans.
Bake at 350° until done.

question: How do I make a basic chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: 1-2-3-4 Basic Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. butter
2 c. sugar
3 c. flour
4 eggs
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 salt
1 Tbsp. vanilla extract
Directions:
Cream butter and sugar together.
Add eggs, one at a time. Add dry items, one cup at a time.
Add vanilla extract.
Bake at 350° in 8 or 9-inch pan.
Complete with your favorite topping.

question: What’s a good recipe for corn on the cob?
answer:
Title: Fantastic Corn On The Cob
Ingredients:
6 ears frozen or fresh sweet corn
1 Tbsp. parsley flakes
1/2 tsp. oregano
salt to taste
pepper to taste
1/4 c. butter
Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Boil corn for 15 minutes.
Remove from water and place in rectangular dish.
Sprinkle with spices and add butter.
Sprinkle corn with Parmesan cheese.
Cover dish with foil and place in warm oven until ready to serve.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for corn on the cob?
answer:
Title: Microwave Corn On The Cob
Ingredients:
1 to 8 ears corn
Directions:
Corn may be husked before cooking.
Wrap in waxed paper or place in a covered glass dish and cook.
Rotate dish one-quarter turn through cooking time.

question: What’s a good recipe for corn on the cob?
answer:
Title: Corn-On-Cob(Microwave)
Ingredients:
6 ears tender corn
2 Tbsp. water
butter or margarine
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Place all ingredients in large baking dish.
Cover with wax paper, or plastic wrap.
Microwave 8 to 10 minutes.
Turn corn over after 5 minutes and test for doneness.

question: What’s a good recipe for corn on the cob?
answer:
Title: Baked Corn
Ingredients:
2 large cans cream-style corn
1 large onion, chopped
1 medium bell pepper, chopped
1 (2 oz.) jar pimento, chopped
1 c. grated cheese
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 c. fine crushed cracker crumbs
1 egg, well beaten
1/4 c. melted oleo or butter
salt and pepper to taste
2/3 c. milk
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together and place in a 9-inch casserole dish.
Bake at 350° for one hour.

question: What’s a good recipe for corn on the cob?
answer:
Title: Fried Corn
Ingredients:
6 ears fresh corn
1/4 c. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
2 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 c. water
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/8 tsp. salt
Directions:
Wash and cut corn off the cob in a large bowl.
Combine corn, sugar, flour, water, salt and pepper; mix well.
Melt butter over medium heat.
Add ingredients in the skillet and cook over low heat, stirring frequently, for 1/2 hour to 45 minutes, or until tender.

question: How do I make garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Butterflied Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter
2 lb. medium shrimp, peeled, deveined and butterflied
3 garlic cloves, smashed and chopped
1 1/2 green peppers, cut into thin strips
salt and pepper
1 large lemon, peeled and diced
1 Tbsp. parsley, chopped
1/4 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Heat butter in large frying pan.
Add shrimp and cook 2 minutes on each side over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and season well. Continue cooking for 1 minute.
Stir in green peppers and diced lemon.
Cook 1 more minute.
Add parsley, paprika, salt and pepper. Mix and serve.

question: How do I make garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. parsley flakes
1 pkg. (12 oz.) frozen, peeled, deveined, quick cooking shrimp
Directions:
Place butter in custard cup. Microwave at high 30-45 second, until melted. Stir in garlic powder and parsley flakes.

question: How do I make garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Lemon Garlic Sauce
Ingredients:
1 lb. large shrimp
2 egg yolks
1 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. fresh parsley, finely chopped
2 to 3 cloves garlic, crushed
2 tsp. chives, chopped (optional)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper or 1/2 tsp. red pepper flakes
1/2 c. butter or margarine, melted
1 c. vegetable oil
1 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Clean, peel and devein shrimp and set aside.
Position knife blade in food processor bowl; add next 8 ingredients to bowl and top with cover.
Process for 30 seconds or until well mixed.
With processor running, add butter through food chute; process 1 minute or until sauce is thickened.
Set aside.
Heat oil in large skillet to 375°.
Combine flour, salt and pepper.
Drain shrimp and dredge in flour mixture.
Fry shrimp in hot oil until golden brown.
Turn once; drain.
Arrange shrimp in 4 or 5 individual baking dishes and top with sauce.
Broil shrimp 30 to 45 seconds. Makes 4 to 5 servings.

question: How do I make garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter(Microwave; Easy)
Ingredients:
1/2 stick butter
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. parsley flakes
1 (12 oz.) pkg. frozen, peeled and deveined shrimp
Directions:
Place butter in microwave-safe dish (8 or 9-inch); a Corning Ware dish works great.
Heat butter 35 to 45 seconds to melt. Stir in garlic powder and parsley flakes.
Place shrimp in colander; run cold water over to clean and separate.
Drain.
Stir shrimp into butter mixture to evenly coat.
Cover tightly with plastic wrap.
Microwave 6 to 8 minutes on High.
Stir every 2 minutes.
When shrimp are tender and opaque, let stand 1 1/2 minutes before serving.
Serve with toothpicks.
Fresh shrimp may be used if deveined and peeled.
Makes 1 1/2 to 2 cups.

question: How do I make garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Broiled Shrimp In Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
1 lb. shrimp
1 clove garlic, split
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/3 c. butter
2 tsp. green onions
1 tsp. oregano
salt and pepper
Directions:
Brown garlic in butter.
Remove garlic; mix other seasonings in butter.
Place peeled and deveined shrimp in baking dish.
Pour butter mixture over shrimp.
Broil 5 minutes, or until done.
Add lemon juice.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut-Sesame Noodles
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. linguine or thin spaghetti
3 garlic cloves
1 1/2 tsp. minced peeled ginger root
7 Tbsp. low sodium soy sauce
6 Tbsp. peanut butter
1/4 c. rice wine vinegar
1/4 c. honey
1 tsp. dark sesame oil
1/2 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 c. broccoli florets, blanched until tender-crisp
1 c. sliced Napa cabbage
1/2 c. carrots, diagonally sliced
1/2 c. bean sprouts
Directions:
Cook linguine according to package directions until al dente; rinse in cold water and drain well.
In food processor or blender, combine garlic, ginger, soy sauce, peanut butter, vinegar, honey, sesame oil and hot pepper sauce; process until blended.
Add water to reach desired consistency (1/2 to 3/4 cup), processing until smooth.
To serve, toss cooked linguine with vegetables and sauce. Yield:
6 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut Sesame Noodles
Ingredients:
8 oz. thin spaghetti
4 Tbsp. toasted sesame oil
6 green onions, finely chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/4 tsp. dried hot pepper flakes
1 Tbsp. rice wine vinegar
1 tsp. granulated sugar
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 c. finely chopped salted dry peanuts
1/3 c. chopped fresh cilantro
Directions:
Cook spaghetti until al dente.
Drain.
Rinse in cold water and toss with 2 tablespoons sesame oil.
Set aside.
Place remaining sesame oil in large heated frying pan.
Add green onions, garlic and pepper flakes.
Stir over medium heat until onions have softened, 2 minutes.
Add spaghetti, vinegar, sugar and soy sauce.
Heat mixture, tossing to combine for 3 or 4 minutes.
Stir in peanuts and cilantro.
Add salt to taste. Transfer to serving bowl.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Thai Noodles With Spicy Peanut Sauce
Ingredients:
1 lb. linguine
1 sweet red pepper
2 carrots
1 bunch of scallions, diced, for garnish
sesame seeds for garnish
Directions:
Cook linguine.	Rinse, drain and toss with olive oil.
Cut veggies into matchsticks or dice. Toss sauce with noodles and vegetables.
Garnish with scallions and sesame seeds.
Can be served hot or cold.
(If serving hot, blanch veggies).

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut Sauce For Pasta
Ingredients:
1/4 c. creamy peanut butter
2 Tbsp. hot water
1 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. salad oil
1/2 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 (8 oz.) pkg. pasta
Directions:
In medium bowl with wire whisk or fork, beat peanut butter with water until smooth.
Stir in vinegar and next 4 ingredients until blended.
Add cooked and drained pasta; toss gently to coat well. Serve immediately.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Good Neighbor Recipe
Ingredients:
1 tongue that does not slander
1 mind full of tolerance
2 ears closed to gossip
2 eyes overlooking other's faults
1 heart generous and kind
2 hands extending to help others
1 dash of wit
1 big smile
1 dash of sunny disposition
1 dash of cheerfulness
Directions:
Blend together all ingredients. Serve generous portions to everyone you meet.

question: How do I make fluffy mashed potatoes without cream?
answer:
Title: Mashed Potatoes - Make-Ahead Type
Ingredients:
6 medium potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/2 c. sour cream
3 oz. cream cheese
2 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. onion salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 to 1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Cook potatoes until tender.
Drain.
Mash potatoes and mix in sour cream, softened cream cheese, 1 tablespoon butter, onion salt and pepper.
Gradually beat in enough milk to make potatoes fluffy and light.
Turn into a greased 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Cover with foil.
Chill up to 24 hours.
To serve, dot with remaining 1 tablespoon butter and bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes or until heated through.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make fluffy mashed potatoes without cream?
answer:
Title: Creamed Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. yellow Finn or long white potatoes, washed and peeled
1/2 c. (1 stick) unsalted butter, cut into pieces
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, cut into pieces
1/4 c. heavy cream
salt and freshly ground pepper
Directions:
Cut potatoes in quarters. Place in a large stockpot with water to cover. Boil over high heat uncovered for 30 minutes or until soft. Drain and mash with potato masher or pass through a food mill. While hot, add butter, cream cheese, heavy cream and salt and pepper to taste. Whip until smooth with a wooden spoon.

question: How do I make fluffy mashed potatoes without cream?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Baked Potatoes
Ingredients:
4 medium potatoes
3 Tbsp. onion, minced
2 large potatoes, boiled
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 c. butter
1 Tbsp. snipped parsley
1 c. Cheddar cheese, grated
salt
pepper
Directions:
Scrub the 4 potatoes, dry and coat with oil or fat. Wrap in foil. Bake at 350° for 1 hour and 30 minutes. Halve lengthwise. Scoop out insides; salt and pepper shells. Mash boiled potatoes with pulp of baked potatoes. Beat sour cream and butter with potatoes until fluffy; season. Stir in onions and parsley; stuff shells. Sprinkle with cheese. Return to oven until hot.

question: How do I make fluffy mashed potatoes without cream?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Potato Bake(A Tangy Version Of Mashed Potatoes)
Ingredients:
3 lb. potatoes (6 large)
1/4 c. finely chopped onion
1/4 c. margarine or butter
1 (12 oz.) carton small curd cream-style cottage cheese (1 1/2 c.)
1/4 c. snipped parsley
1 tsp. salt
margarine or butter, melted (optional)
Directions:
Cook, peel and mash potatoes.
In saucepan, cook onion in 1/4 cup margarine until tender, but not brown.
Stir onion, cottage cheese, parsley and salt into mashed potatoes.
Spoon potato mixture into a well-greased 2-quart casserole dish.
Drizzle melted margarine over top, if desired.

question: How do I make fluffy mashed potatoes without cream?
answer:
Title: Make Ahead Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
5 lbs. potatoes, cooked and drained
1 (8 oz.) cream cheese
1 c. sour cream
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and beat until fluffy.	Pour into casserole dish sprayed with Pam.
Bake until lightly brown at 350°.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for banana bread?
answer:
Title: My Favorite Banana Bread(Heals Family Recipes)
Ingredients:
1 c. granulated sugar
1/2 c. butter or margarine
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. mashed banana
2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 c. buttermilk
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
In a large mixing bowl cream the first 2 ingredients.
Add the eggs and banana. Mix well. Set aside.
In a large mixing bowl, sift together the flour, salt and baking soda.
Add to creamed mixture alternately with the buttermilk, mixing well after each addition. Fold in the walnuts.
Pour into greased 8 x 4 x 3-inch bread pan and bake in a preheated 350° oven for 1 hour or until toothpick inserted into center of bread comes out clean. Cool loaf completely on wire rack. Wrap loaf in foil and store in refrigerator.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for banana bread?
answer:
Title: Banana Bread
Ingredients:
2 ripe medium bananas, mashed
1 3/4 c. unsifted all-purpose flour
1 c. chopped walnuts or pecans
1/4 c. plus 1 tsp. buttermilk
1 tsp. vanilla
2 eggs
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. vegetable oil
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Grease and flour 9 x 5 loaf pan. Combine all ingredients in large bowl and mix well. Transfer to prepared pan. Bake at 325° until top is golden brown and splits slightly, about 1 hour and 20 minutes. Serve warm.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for banana bread?
answer:
Title: Banana Bread(Jamaican Recipe)
Ingredients:
1 c. white sugar
1/4 c. Crisco or butter
3 medium sized ripe bananas
1 egg, unbeaten
2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. cinnamon
Directions:
Cream
butter
and
sugar.
Add bananas; mix well.
Add egg; mix
well.
Add sifted ingredients.
Bake in waxed paper lined loaf
tin in moderate oven (350°) for 60 to 70 minutes. Chopped nuts (1/2 cup) or raisins may be added.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for banana bread?
answer:
Title: Best-Ever Banana Bread
Ingredients:
2 ripe medium bananas, mashed
2 eggs
1 3/4 c. all-purpose flour, unsifted
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 c. chopped walnuts
1/2 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. plus 1 Tbsp. buttermilk
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 325°.
Grease and flour a 9 x 5-inch loaf pan.
Combine all ingredients in a large bowl and mix well. Transfer to prepared pan.
Bake until top is golden brown and splits slightly, about 1 hour and 20 minutes.
Serve warm or cold. Makes 1 loaf.
Do not double recipe.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for banana bread?
answer:
Title: Best Ever Banana Bread
Ingredients:
3 ripe medium bananas
2 eggs
1 3/4 c. unsifted all-purpose flour
3/4 c. dark brown sugar
3/4 c. white sugar
1 c. chopped pecans
1/2 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. plus 1 Tbsp. buttermilk
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Grease and flour one 9 x 5-inch loaf pan.
Mash bananas with a fork.
Add eggs and rest of ingredients; mix well.
Pour into pan and bake for 1 hour and 20 minutes, until golden brown and splits slightly.

question: How do I make an easy pumpkin pie?
answer:
Title: Easy Pumpkin Pie
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
1 1/2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/4 tsp. cloves
1 c. cooked pumpkin
3 egg yolks
1 c. milk or cream
4 Tbsp. margarine
Directions:
Combine sugar, cornstarch and spices; add pumpkin.
Beat egg yolks; add milk and pour into pumpkin mixture.
Add 1/2 teaspoon salt and margarine; mix well.
Cook over low heat until mixture thickens.
Pour into baked shell.

question: How do I make an easy pumpkin pie?
answer:
Title: Easy Pumpkin Pie
Ingredients:
3/4 c. sugar
1/2 c. baking mix
2 Tbsp. margarine
1 (13 oz.) can evaporated milk or half and half
2 eggs
16 oz. can pumpkin
2 1/2 tsp. pumpkin pie spices (or 1 tsp. each cinnamon, ginger and cloves)
2 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Pour all ingredients into blender. Blend on high for 1 minute or mix by hand until smooth.
Pour into greased 9-inch pie plate.
Bake 50 to 55 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean.

question: How do I make an easy pumpkin pie?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Pie
Ingredients:
2 c. pumpkin
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. granulated sugar
2 Tbsp. flour
2 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. milk
2 Tbsp. butter
unbaked pastry shell
Directions:
Mix pumpkin with eggs.
Add dry ingredients.
Heat milk with butter and add to pumpkin mixture.
Pour in shell.
Bake at 400° for 20 minutes.
Reduce to 350°
for 30 minutes more or until knife comes out clean.
This makes a very deep pie.
I use a 10-inch round, 2-inch deep pie pan.

question: How do I make an easy pumpkin pie?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Pie
Ingredients:
3 eggs
1/2 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. flour
1/2 c. brown sugar (firmly packed)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. allspice
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 1/2 c. pumpkin
1 1/2 c. canned milk
Directions:
To slightly beaten eggs, add sugar, flour, salt and spices. Stir thoroughly.
Add pumpkin and stir again.
Add milk and mix thoroughly.
Pour mixture into prepared pie crust.
Bake at 450° for 10 minutes. Reduce heat to 350° and bake for 40 minutes longer, or until a silver knife comes out clean when inserted in filling.

question: How do I make an easy pumpkin pie?
answer:
Title: Easy Pumpkin Pie
Ingredients:
1 small can pumpkin
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1 can sweetened condensed milk
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
Directions:
Mix all ingredients well and pour into pie shell.
Bake at 425° for 15 minutes, then reduce oven to 350° for 30 to 45 minutes.
Pie is done when knife inserted in center comes out clean.

question: I need a recipe for a healthy chicken wrap.
answer:
Title: Quick And Easy Chicken Wraps
Ingredients:
1 c. nonfat plain yogurt
1/2 tsp. minced garlic
1/2 c. roughly chopped cilantro
3 c. diced cooked chicken breast
4 large whole wheat tortillas
4 large pre-washed lettuce slices (large enough to cover tortilla surface)
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
In medium mixing bowl, combine yogurt, garlic and herb. Stir until blended. Salt and pepper to taste. Add chicken breast and stir until well coated. Place lettuce slices and 1/4 of chicken mixture on a whole wheat tortilla and wrap up. Serves 4.

question: I need a recipe for a healthy chicken wrap.
answer:
Title: Recipe For Healthy Children
Ingredients:
1 large open field, well grassed and clean
6 children, boys and girls of assorted sizes
2 or 3 dogs
Directions:
Sprinkle with pebbles and flowers; moisten in running brook water.
Cover with blue sky and bake in the sun.
When they are done brown, remove children and set to cool in bathtub.

question: I need a recipe for a healthy chicken wrap.
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Chicken Wraps
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless skinless chicken breast
1 Tbsp. garlic powder
1 Tbsp. onion powder
1 Tbsp. pepper
15 jalapeno peppers, halved and seeded
2 tsp. seasoned salt
1 tsp. paprika
1 small onion, cut into strips
1 lb. sliced bacon, halved widthwise
Blue cheese dressing (for dipping)
Directions:
Cut chicken into 2 x 1 1/2-inch strips.
In a large plastic bag, mix garlic and onion powder, pepper, seasoned salt and paprika; add chicken and shake to coat.
Place a chicken and onion strip in each jalapeno half.
Wrap each with a piece of bacon and secure with toothpicks.
Grill, uncovered, over indirect medium heat for 18 to 20 minutes or until chicken juices run clear and bacon is crisp, turning once.

question: I need a recipe for a healthy chicken wrap.
answer:
Title: Healthy Baked Chicken
Ingredients:
1 c. Italian bread crumbs
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1 Tbsp. dry minced onion
1/2 to 1 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. salt (optional)
1/4 tsp. oregano, basil and thyme
4 whole chicken breasts, split and skinned
1 (8 oz.) carton plain yogurt
1/4 c. melted margarine (optional)
1 recipe Lemon Yogurt Sauce
Directions:
In plastic bag, combine crumbs, cheese and spices.
Rinse chicken and pat dry.
Coat chicken with yogurt, then roll in crumb mixture.
Place in greased baking pan.
Optional: Drizzle margarine on top.
Bake uncovered in 375° oven for 50 to 55 minutes.
Serve with rice and lemon yogurt sauce.

question: I need a recipe for a healthy chicken wrap.
answer:
Title: Asian Chicken Wrap
Ingredients:
6 (8-inch) flour tortillas
1 large carrot, peeled and sliced into strips
1 medium yellow squash, sliced into strips
6 scallions, thinly sliced
2 whole roasted red peppers, thinly sliced
8 oz. cooked shredded chicken
3 Tbsp. orange marmalade
1 Tbsp. low-sodium soy sauce
1 tsp. ground ginger
1 1/2 tsp. olive oil
Directions:
Place flour tortillas on work surface.
Divide and layer sliced carrot, squash, scallions, red peppers and chicken in the center of each tortilla.
Roll up tortilla, enclosing filling. Slice in half.

question: How do I make a cheesy garlic bread?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 loaf crusty French or Italian bread
1 stick butter
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. basil
4 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese, shredded (Sargento)
Directions:
Slice bread diagonally but leave bottom crust unsliced. Soften butter.
Add garlic, herbs and cheese to butter and mix well.
Gently pull slices of bread open and spread with butter. Take care not to break bottom crust.
Spread any leftover butter on top of loaf.
Carefully place buttered
loaf on foil and wrap ends, leaving top of loaf exposed.
Bake at 350°
until crusty. Great with spaghetti!

question: How do I make a cheesy garlic bread?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 c. (4 oz.) shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
1 c. thinly sliced green onions with tops
3 garlic cloves, minced
1 loaf French bread (20-inch), halved lengthwise
1/3 c. minced, fresh parsley (optional)
Directions:
Mix mayonnaise, cheese, onions and garlic; spread on bread halves.
If desired, spread with parsley.
Wrap each half in foil. Refrigerate 1 to 2 hours or freeze.
Unwrap and place on baking sheet.
Bake at 400° for 8 to 10 minutes (20 to 25 minutes if frozen) or until puffed but not brown.
Cut into slices.
Serves 12 to 15.

question: How do I make a cheesy garlic bread?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 c. (4 oz.) shredded sharp cheese
1 c. thinly sliced green onions (with tops)
3 garlic cloves, minced
1 loaf French bread (20 inch), halved lengthwise
1/3 c. minced fresh parsley
paprika
Directions:
Mix mayonnaise, cheese, onions and garlic.
Spread on bread halves.
Sprinkle with parsley and paprika.
Wrap each half in foil and refrigerate for 1 to 2 hours or can freeze.
Unwrap and place on a baking sheet.
Bake at 400° for 8 to 10 minutes, 20 if frozen.

question: How do I make a cheesy garlic bread?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
1 c. thinly sliced green onion, with tops
3 cloves garlic, minced
1 loaf French bread (about 20 inches), halved lengthwise
fresh parsley (optional)
paprika (optional)
Directions:
Mix mayonnaise, cheese, onions and garlic.
Spread on bread halves.
If desired, sprinkle with parsley and paprika.
Wrap each half in foil.
Refrigerate for 1 to 2 hours, or freeze.
Unwrap and place on a baking sheet.
Bake at 400° for 8 to 10 minutes (20 to 25 minutes, if frozen).
Cut into slices.
Yield: 12 to 15 servings.

question: How do I make a cheesy garlic bread?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 loaf unsliced French bread
1 c. shredded cheese
1/2 c. margarine, softened
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. celery seed
1/2 tsp. parsley flakes
Directions:
Slice French bread into 1-inch slices.
Combine remaining ingredients, mixing well.
Spread butter mixture between bread slices and on top and sides of loaf.
Wrap loaf in foil.
Bake at 350° for 15 minutes or until thoroughly heated.

question: What can I make with sweet potatoes and lentils?
answer:
Title: Candied Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 sweet potatoes
1 small flat can pineapple slices
1/2 stick butter
1 c. sugar (may use less)
1/2 c. orange juice
1/2 c. apricot nectar
1/2 c. pineapple juice (from can)
spices: cinnamon, allspice, nutmeg (optional)
Directions:
Cook yams until tender.
Do not overcook.
Melt butter in a skillet.
Add sugar and juices.
Cook until syrup is formed.
Dip sweet potatoes (quartered) in syrup, then place in a Pyrex baking dish.
Dip pineapple slices in syrup and place on top of potatoes. Sprinkle with spices, if desired.
Pour rest of syrup over dish. Bake until good and hot.

question: What can I make with sweet potatoes and lentils?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
4 c. boiled potatoes, cut in chunks
2 c. sauerkraut
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 (20 oz.) can big franks, sliced
1 can mushroom soup
1/4 tsp. paprika
1 medium onion, diced
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Saute onion in butter and then add the big franks.
Add all other ingredients and mix well.
Spray an oblong pan with Pam and pour in ingredients.
Sprinkle with a little paprika.
Bake 45 minutes at 375°.
Makes a large casserole.

question: What can I make with sweet potatoes and lentils?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
2 onions, chopped
1 potato, cubed
1 c. mushrooms, sliced
3 cloves garlic, chopped
1 carrot, grated
2 c. celery, sliced
1 (16 oz.) can crushed tomatoes
2 c. beef broth
1 c. water
1/2 c. dry red wine
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. marjoram
1 tsp. oregano
2 bay leaves
1 1/2 c. lentils, washed and drained
Directions:
Spray a heavy, 4-quart skillet with nonstick vegetable spray. Brown lightly onions, potato, mushrooms, garlic, carrot and celery.
Add remaining ingredients.
Simmer, partially covered, until lentils are soft (approximately 1 1/2 hours).
Add more water, if needed, during cooking.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What can I make with sweet potatoes and lentils?
answer:
Title: Creamed Sweet Potatoes With Marshmallows
Ingredients:
6 large yellow sweet potatoes
1/4 lb. butter
1 1/4 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. orange flavoring
1 c. whole milk
3 eggs, well beaten
heavy dash of ground ginger
dash of black pepper
pinch of salt
1 c. chopped pecans
1 c. raisins
2 tsp. orange flavoring
1 c. whole milk
3 eggs, well beaten
heavy dash of ground ginger
dash of black pepper
pinch of salt
1 c. chopped pecans
1 c. raisins
Directions:
Place in a casserole dish and cook until it sets.
Cover with marshmallows and brown lightly.
Add crystallized red cherries between marshmallows.

question: What can I make with sweet potatoes and lentils?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 cloves garlic, chopped
1 large onion, chopped
1 large carrot, grated
1/2 stick celery, chopped
2 large potatoes, chopped
1/2 tsp. cumin
1 c. washed lentils
1 large can tomatoes
3 c. water or stock
thyme to taste
1 c. fresh corn
Directions:
Saute garlic, onion, carrot, celery and potatoes in oil.
Add the remaining ingredients together in a large pot.
Bring to a boil.
Simmer 1 hour.

question: What can I make with tofu and peanut sauce?
answer:
Title: Crispy Tofu(Crisp Outside, Soft Inside)
Ingredients:
1 box "regular" tofu
1/4 c. chopped, roasted peanuts
2 medium cucumbers, cubed
2 to 3 Tbsp. vinegar
2 to 3 Tbsp. sugar
1 bunch cilantro, chopped
Directions:
Soak 4 blocks tofu in salted water overnight or 4 hours if cut in cubes.
Cut each block into 9 to 12 cubes, depending on size, and drain.
Dip-fry in hot oil (should be crispy outside and soft inside, not hard).
Dip or pour Peanut Dressing over Crispy Tofu when ready to eat.

question: What can I make with tofu and peanut sauce?
answer:
Title: Tofu Chili
Ingredients:
5 c. cooked pinto beans
2 lb. tofu, frozen, then thawed, broken into pieces
1/4 c. soy sauce
1 1/2 Tbsp. peanut butter
1/2 Tbsp. onion powder
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 Tbsp. tomato paste
2 Tbsp. oil
2 Tbsp. oil
1 green pepper, diced
2 large onions, diced
3 cloves garlic, minced
16 oz. can tomatoes
8 oz. can tomato sauce
3 Tbsp. chili powder
1/2 Tbsp. cumin
Directions:
Reserve the cooking water or liquid from cans of pintos.
Mix the soy sauce with next 6 ingredients (including the first of 2 tablespoons of oil); coat tofu pieces with this mixture.
Fry over medium heat until all liquid is absorbed and tofu is browned. Saute the green pepper, onions and garlic in the other 2 tablespoons oil.
Put beans, tofu mixture and sauteed vegetables in a cooking pot or crockpot.
Add the tomatoes, sauce and season. Simmer 30 minutes or longer.
If in crock-pot, simmer several hours.
Serves 8 to 10.

question: What can I make with tofu and peanut sauce?
answer:
Title: Sesame Tofu
Ingredients:
1 lb. firm tofu
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/3 c. sliced green onion
1 Tbsp. sesame seed, toasted
1 tsp. sesame seed oil
1/4 c. almonds, grind
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1/4-inch thick or 3/4-inch cubes.
Mix soy sauce, onion, sesame seed, oil and almonds into small bowl.
In a dish, put sliced tofu and mixed sauce on the top of tofu; make layer. Cook in microwave about 4 to 5 minutes.
If you want to bring it to boil, use stainless pot or pan.
Cook about 3 minutes on medium-high temperature.
Serve with rice.

question: What can I make with tofu and peanut sauce?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables With Tofu
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. tofu, cut into 1/2-inch cubes (firm or extra firm is best)
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. vinegar
1/4 tsp. cumin
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. grated ginger
3 Tbsp. peanut or salad oil
1 large carrot, chopped
2 c. chopped broccoli
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1/2 c. sliced green onions
3 Tbsp. cilantro (optional)
use any vegetables that are your favorites
crispy noodles
Directions:
Place tofu in shallow bowl.
Mix soy, vinegar, cumin, garlic and ginger; drizzle this over tofu and set aside.
Heat oil in wok or large pan over high heat.
Add carrot and stir-fry 1 minute. Add broccoli and cook 2 minutes, then add mushrooms and onions. Reduce heat to medium.
Add tofu mixture and cook, stirring gently until heated through but vegetables are still crisp.
Garnish with cilantro.
Spoon over hot rice and pass the soy sauce and add crispy noodles on top.

question: What can I make with tofu and peanut sauce?
answer:
Title: Sweet And Sour Tofu And Vegies
Ingredients:
2 tsp. cornstarch
2 Tbsp. water
1/3 can (2/3 c.) pineapple chunks with juice
1/4 c. water
1 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1/2 Tbsp. malt or molasses or 1 tsp. honey
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. ginger
touch of pepper
2 Tbsp. sesame oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1 large carrot, sliced thinly or chopped small
3/4 lb. tofu, cut into chunks
1 green pepper, chopped
Directions:
Dissolve cornstarch in 2 tablespoons of water; add 1/4 cup pineapple juice, 1/4 cup water, vinegar, honey, soy sauce, ginger, and pepper; set aside.
Heat oil in a wok or large skillet on high heat.
Add onion and stir until strong smell starts to go away. Add carrot and stir a little more.
Add tofu and stir until lightly browned.
Add green pepper and salt.
Stir a minute more, then reduce heat to medium and cook, uncovered.
Colorful, rich and juicy with a Chinese flavor.
A meal in itself with rice or chow mein noodles.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken?
answer:
Title: Crispy Oven-Fried Chicken(Makes 4 Servings)
Ingredients:
2 cloves garlic, peeled
4 slices white bread, torn into pieces
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese (about 1 oz.)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. crumbled sage or thyme
1/4 c. milk
2 1/2 c. chicken parts
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 375°.
Line a baking sheet with foil.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken?
answer:
Title: Crispy Baked Chicken
Ingredients:
1 frying chicken (2 1/2 to 3 lb.), cut in serving pieces
1 c. skim milk
1 tsp. rosemary
1 c. cornflake crumbs
freshly ground black pepper
Directions:
Remove all skin from the chicken; rinse and dry the pieces thoroughly.
Dip in milk, mix cornflake crumbs with rosemary and pepper and roll in the seasoned crumbs.
Let stand briefly so coating will adhere.
Place chicken in an oiled baking pan (line pan with foil for easy clean up).
Do not crowd; pieces should not touch.
Bake at 400° for 45 minutes.
Crumbs will form a crisp skin.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken?
answer:
Title: Crispy Chicken
Ingredients:
1 frying chicken (2 1/2 to 3 lb.), skinned and cut up
1 c. skim milk
1 c. cornflakes
1 tsp. rosemary
fresh ground black pepper
Directions:
Put cornflakes in a bag with the rosemary and pepper and use a rolling pin to crush and mix them together.
Remove all skin from chicken, rinse and dry pieces thoroughly.
Dip in milk; roll in cornflake crumbs.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken?
answer:
Title: Crisp-Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (3 lb.) chicken, cut into 8 pieces
1/2 c. butter, melted
1 1/2 c. crushed Rice Krispies
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. Pleasoning
Directions:
Melt butter and dip chicken pieces into it.
Roll in crushed cereal, mixed with seasonings.
Place, skin side up, on shallow baking pan lined with foil.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour or until tender.
Do not cover or turn.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken?
answer:
Title: Corn Crispy Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
1 c. crushed corn flakes
1 tsp. salt
2/3 c. milk
1/2 c. flour
dash of pepper
6 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Wash chicken, pat dry.
Mix corn flakes, flour, salt and pepper.
Dip chicken pieces in milk, then dip and cover well with corn flake mixture.
Melt butter in shallow pan, place skin side down in melted butter.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
Turn chicken, bake 15 to 30 minutes more.

question: What can I make with ground beef and onions?
answer:
Title: Easy Meal
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
6 medium potatoes
3 medium onions
3 carrots (optional)
Directions:
Make ground beef into 4 patties.
Place on large piece of aluminum foil each patty separate.
Slice onions and potatoes, placing in layers (sliced carrots optional).
Season with salt and pepper.
Close the foil and bake at 350° to 400° for 45 minutes. Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I make with ground beef and onions?
answer:
Title: Ground Beef Shepherds Pie
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 onion, chopped
1 lb. lean ground beef
1 tsp. dried basil
1 clove garlic, minced
1 c. green beans
1 c. tomatoes, diced
2 potatoes, cooked and mashed
1 egg, beaten
1/2 c. water
1/4 c. shredded Cheddar cheese, optional
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Coat a 2 quart casserole dish with cooking spray.
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Cook onion in oil for 5 minutes, stirring frequently.
Stir in the ground beef and basil, and cook and stir for 5 more minutes.
Mix in the garlic, green beans, and tomatoes, and simmer for 5 minutes. Transfer beef mixture to prepared dish.
In a mixing bowl, mix together the mashed potatoes, egg and water.
Spread evenly over meat mixture.
Bake in a preheated oven for 15 to 20 minutes, or until potatoes start to brown on top.
Sprinkle with cheese, and continue cooking for 5 minutes.

question: What can I make with ground beef and onions?
answer:
Title: Quick And Easy Meal
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 small onion, chopped
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen mixed vegetables
salt and pepper
Directions:
Add onion to ground beef, salt and pepper and brown meat.
Add frozen mixed vegetables and enough water to cover mixture.
Bring to boil, then simmer with lid on until done, 20 to 25 minutes. Stir occasionally.

question: What can I make with ground beef and onions?
answer:
Title: Ground Beef Surprise
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground round
salt and pepper to taste
1 medium onion, chopped
1 bag frozen French fries
1 can cream of chicken soup
1 can cream of mushroom soup
Directions:
Press ground round evenly over bottom of buttered 13 x 9-inch pan.
Season with salt and pepper.
Sprinkle onion over meat. Sprinkle frozen French fries evenly over onion.
Mix chicken and mushroom soups together; add 3/4 cup water.
Pour carefully over meat and potato mixture.
Bake at 325° for 1 hour and 30 minutes.

question: What can I make with ground beef and onions?
answer:
Title: Ground Beef And Vegetable Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 c. chopped onions
1 c. diced potatoes
1 c. diced celery
1 c. shredded cabbage
4 c. tomato juice or 2 (1 lb.) cans tomatoes
1/2 c. uncooked rice
3 c. water
pepper
3 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. basil (optional)
1 tsp. thyme (optional)
Directions:
Brown beef and onions in small amount of fat; drain.
Combine remaining ingredients in large kettle.
Add beef and onions. Simmer for 1 hour.
Yields 6 to 8 servings.

question: What can I make with lentils and carrots?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. lentils
6 c. water
2 whole carrots, chopped
2 sticks celery, chopped
1 small onion, chopped
1 garlic clove, minced
dash of hot pepper
2 cubes beef bouillon
1 bay leaf
2 heaping Tbsp. tomato sauce
1 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
1 1/2 c. raw pasta
oil
Directions:
Saute onion in oil until soft, add garlic and cook 1 minute. Add water and the rest of ingredients, except pasta. Bring to a boil. Cook 30 minutes on simmer covered.
Cook pasta in a separate pot and then add to lentils.

question: What can I make with lentils and carrots?
answer:
Title: Creole Style Lentils
Ingredients:
1/2 c. chopped carrots
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 large onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. margarine
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. pepper
few drops hot pepper sauce
1 c. lentils, cooked and drained
hot cooked rice (optional)
Directions:
Cook carrots, celery and onion in hot margarine in medium size saucepan until lightly browned, about 10 minutes.
Add tomatoes, salt, sugar, pepper, pepper sauce and lentils.
Cover; simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve over rice.
Makes about 5 1/2 cups.

question: What can I make with lentils and carrots?
answer:
Title: Ma'S Lentils And Rice
Ingredients:
1 lb. lentils, uncooked
1/2 c. chopped celery, raw
1/2 c. chopped carrot, raw
1/2 c. chopped onion, raw
1/2 c. chopped tomato, raw
1 Tbsp. chopped garlic
1 Tbsp. oregano
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
4 c. cooked rice
olive oil
Directions:
Place uncooked lentils in clean pot (not aluminum), cover with water until water is 1 1/2 to 2 inches above level of beans.
Let soak for 2 1/2 to 3 1/2 hours.
Drain lentils and return pot; fill again with water to same level as before.
Bring water to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 1 1/2 to 2 hours with cover.
Add celery, carrot, onion, tomato, garlic, oregano, salt and pepper 1/2 hour before lentils are done cooking.
Stir lentils occasionally during cooking time; add more water if necessary to keep beans covered.
When lentils are done cooking you may mix rice in all at once or individual servings.
If so desired, add a dash of olive oil to each individual serving and mix.

question: What can I make with lentils and carrots?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 celery stalk, diced
1/2 medium onion, peeled and finely chopped
1 carrot, pared and diced
1/2 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. celery seed
1 tsp. chopped fresh parsley
1 garlic clove, smashed and chopped
1 c. lentils
6 c. hot chicken stock
1/4 c. long grain rice, rinsed and drained
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Heat butter in saucepan. When hot, add celery and onion; cover and cook 3 minutes over medium heat. Add carrot, spices and garlic; cover and continue cooking for 3 minutes. Add lentils and chicken stock; season well and mix. Bring to a boil. Cook soup, partially covered, 2 hours over low heat. Sixteen minutes before end of cooking, add rice and finish cooking. Serve.

question: What can I make with lentils and carrots?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
2 medium carrots
2 medium celery stalks
1 medium onion
3/4 lb. small red potatoes
1 (14 to 16 oz.) can Italian stewed tomatoes
3 c. water
1 c. dry lentils
2 (13 or 14 oz.) cans chicken broth
1 garlic clove
2 Tbsp. olive and salad oil
1 small head escarole
Directions:
Dice carrots, celery and onions.
Cut potatoes into 1/2-inch pieces.
Mince garlic.
In 5-quart Dutch oven over medium high heat, in hot olive oil, cook vegetables until tender.
Add garlic. Cook until brown.
Stir in tomatoes, lentils, broth, potatoes and water.
Over high heat, heat to boiling.
Reduce to low and cover. Simmer for 50 minutes.
Thinly slice escarole.
Just before serving, stir into soup.
Cook until wilted.

question: What’s a recipe for classic sugar cookies?
answer:
Title: Classic Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
3/4 c. butter or margarine, softened
1/2 tsp. salt
1 egg
1 tsp. grated lemon rind
1 tsp. vanilla extract
2 1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
additional sugar for top of cookies
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
In a large bow, cream sugar, butter, and salt.
Beat in egg, lemon rind, and vanilla until light and fluffy.
Sift together flour and baking powder. Gradually stir into creamed mixture.
On floured board, using floured rolling pin, roll dough until 1/8 in thick.
Cut into fancy shapes.
Place on ungreased baking sheets.
Sprinkle with additional sugar.
Bake 9 to 12 minutes or until lightly browned around the edge.
Cool on racks.
Store in airtight containers. Makes about 5 to 7 dozen cookies.

question: What’s a recipe for classic sugar cookies?
answer:
Title: Old Fashioned Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. sifted all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
3/4 c. butter, at room temperature (1 1/2 sticks, no substitute)
1 1/4 c. sugar
3/4 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. lemon extract
1/4 tsp. almond extract
2 large eggs
Directions:
Sift together dry ingredients.
Beat butter until light and fluffy.
Gradually beat in sugar until well mixed.
Add extract and eggs and mix thoroughly.
Stir in flour mixture.
Mix well. This will make a soft, sticky dough.
Place in a tight container or roll in foil and season overnight in the refrigerator.

question: What’s a recipe for classic sugar cookies?
answer:
Title: Chicken Classic
Ingredients:
3 lb. chicken
1 can cream of chicken soup
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 soup can milk
1 stick butter
1/2 lb. herb stuffing mix
onion flakes
celery flakes
salt
1 c. stock from boiling chicken
Directions:
Boil chicken for 1 hour.
Onion, celery and salt can be added to the water.
Bone chicken.
Lay in 13 x 9-inch pan.
Mix both soup and the can of milk; pour over chicken.
Melt 1 stick of butter with 1 cup of stock from boiled chicken.
Sprinkle herb stuffing mix on top of chicken.
Pour butter/stock mixture on top of stuffing mix.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for classic sugar cookies?
answer:
Title: Old Fashioned Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
1 stick each unsalted butter and margarine, softened
1/2 c. confectioners sugar
1/2 c. granulated sugar
1 large egg
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
2 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 c. coarse white or colored sugar, or a combination
Directions:
Heat oven to 375 degrees.
Coat baking sheets with nonstick spray.
In a large bowl, beat butter, margarine, confectioners and granulated sugar with mixer on low speed until blended.
Increase to high until fluffy and light.
Beat in egg, vanilla, baking powder and salt.
On low, blend in flour.
Roll dough into 1 inch balls.
Roll balls in coarse sugar.
Place about 2 inches apart on baking sheet.
Flatten balls with the bottom of a glass or bottle into 2 inch rounds.
Bake 10 minutes or until golden brown.
Cool on baking sheets for 10 seconds or so before removing cookies to wire racks to cool completely.

question: What’s a recipe for classic sugar cookies?
answer:
Title: Old Fashioned Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. butter, softened
1 c. sugar
1 egg
3 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/4 tsp. baking powder
1/8 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/2 tsp. ground nutmeg
red or green food coloring (optional)
additional sugar
colored sugar sprinkles (optional)
Directions:
Cream butter; gradually add 1 cup sugar, beating until light and fluffy.
Add egg; beat well.
Combine flour, baking powder, soda, cinnamon and nutmeg; add to creamed mixture, mixing until blended. Tint with food coloring, if desired.
Cover and chill dough.

question: How do I make a spicy chili con carne?
answer:
Title: Chili Con Carne
Ingredients:
2 tsp. vegetable oil
2 medium onions, chopped
1 medium carrot, diced
2 garlic cloves, minced
10 oz. lean ground beef
2 Tbsp. plus 1 1/2 tsp. mild or hot chili powder
2 tsp. ground cumin
2 cups canned whole Italian tomatoes, coarsely chopped
1 tsp. dried oregano
1/4 tsp. ground cloves
1/4 tsp. ground red pepper
4 oz. black beans, cooked and drained
Directions:
In large saucepan, heat oil; add onions and carrot. Cook over medium heat, stirring frequently, 3-5 minutes, until onions are softened. Add garlic; cook, stirring frequently, 5 minutes, until onions are golden brown.

question: How do I make a spicy chili con carne?
answer:
Title: Chili Con Carne
Ingredients:
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. diced green pepper
1 clove garlic, chopped fine
1 lb. ground beef
1 tsp. finely chopped beef suet or 1 slice bacon, chopped fine
2 c. canned tomatoes
2 c. red kidney beans, drained (save liquid)
2 tsp. sugar
2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. chili powder, diluted in 2 Tbsp. warm water
4 Tbsp. fat or oil
Directions:
Heat oil. Add onion, garlic, bacon and green pepper.
Saute until golden brown. Add beef and stir until lightly brown. Add remaining ingredients. Cover and bring to a quick boil.
Lower heat and simmer 30 minutes.
Add beans and simmer an additional 15 minutes.

question: How do I make a spicy chili con carne?
answer:
Title: Chili Con Carne
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground chuck
1 large onion, chopped
1/2 large green pepper, chopped
3 stalks celery, chopped
1 large can peeled tomatoes, cut up
3 tsp. chili powder
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 small can tomato paste
Directions:
In Dutch oven, put ground chuck, onion, green pepper and celery on medium heat, stirring constantly, until meat is browned. Add cut up tomatoes, chili powder, tomato paste and sugar.
Mix well.
Let mixture come to a boil. Turn stove on low and cook for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add kidney beans and cook 15 minutes longer.
Stir to mix well.
Remove from heat and serve over rice.

question: How do I make a spicy chili con carne?
answer:
Title: Chili Con Carne(Easy But Tasty)
Ingredients:
2 lb. lean ground beef
1 medium to large green pepper, sliced
1 medium to large onion, chopped or sliced
1 (15 oz.) can crushed or stewed tomatoes
2 (15 oz.) cans red kidney beans
1 or 2 Tbsp. corn or vegetable oil
1 tsp. beef bouillon powder
1 trace garlic powder or garlic clove
1 to 5 tsp. chili powder
Directions:
Sear ground beef at high temperature in a large pot.
Reduce temperature, pour off grease and add corn oil.
Add onions.
Cook with beef at lower temperature until translucent.
Add green peppers.
Cook until texture is to your taste.
Add canned tomatoes and can of beans.
Add from second can of beans to your own desired amount.
Rinse tomato and bean cans with one or two ounces of water; add to pot.
Add teaspoon of bouillon powder; stir well. Add chili powder to taste.
Add one or two shakes of garlic powder or one or two cloves of fresh garlic cloves.
Stir well and simmer 15 or 20 minutes.

question: How do I make a spicy chili con carne?
answer:
Title: Chili Con Carne
Ingredients:
3 lb. round steak, cut in bite size chunks
1 1/2 Tbsp. chili powder
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. onion powder
1/4 tsp. black pepper
6 Tbsp. flour
3 c. water
Directions:
Turn heat on high and cook the water out of the meat.
Remove from heat and add spices and flour.
Blend all together, then add water slowly.
Turn on heat to medium-high until it begins to thicken, then turn down to low and cook slowly, but stirring occasionally.
The flavor is even better if made a day ahead. Cook 1 to 3 hours.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: What can I make with apples and oats?
answer:
Title: Apple 'N Oat Bread
Ingredients:
3 c. chopped, pared raw apples
1/2 c. water
1 c. brown sugar, packed
1 tsp. each: baking powder, cinnamon, soda and salt
2 c. sifted flour
1/2 tsp. allspice
1 c. rolled oats (regular)
1/2 c. seedless raisins
1/2 c. chopped nuts
2 eggs, beaten
1/4 c. melted shortening or cooking oil
Directions:
Combine apples, water and 1/2 cup brown sugar.
Cook until apples are almost tender, about 5 minutes.
Cool while preparing remaining ingredients.
Sift together flour, baking powder, soda, salt and spices.
Stir in remaining brown sugar, oats, raisins and nuts.
Add apple mixture, eggs and shortening or oil to dry ingredients; stir just until dry ingredients are moistened.

question: What can I make with apples and oats?
answer:
Title: Apple Crisp
Ingredients:
3/4 c. rolled oats
3/4 c. brown sugar
1/2 c. flour
1/2 c. butter or margarine
4 medium apples
Directions:
Set oven at 350°.
Lightly grease 8-inch round pan with butter.
Peel 4 medium sized apples; slice thin.
Place around bottom of pan.
Mix the first 4 ingredients until crumbly.
Put mixture on apples.
Bake for 35 minutes.
Serves 6.

question: What can I make with apples and oats?
answer:
Title: Apple Oatmeal Crisp
Ingredients:
4 c. peeled and thinly sliced tart (Granny Smith) cooking apple
1 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
3 Tbsp. granulated sugar
1/3 c. flour
1 c. rolled oats
1/2 c. firmly packed dark brown sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon or to taste
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. unsalted butter, melted and cooled
Directions:
In a well buttered 9 inch square baking pan, combine apples, lemon juice, and the granulated sugar.
In a bowl combine the flour, oats, brown sugar, cinnamon, and the salt, add the butter and combine the mixture well.

question: What can I make with apples and oats?
answer:
Title: Apple Bars
Ingredients:
2 c. rolled oats
1 c. flour
1 c. brown sugar
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 c. shortening
7 medium apples, peeled and sliced
Directions:
Mix first 5 ingredients until crumbly.
Press half of mixture in 9 x 12-inch pan.
Put in apples.
Sprinkle rest of mixture over apples.
Press lightly.
Sprinkle top with cinnamon.
Bake in preheated 350° oven for 40 minutes.
Cool.
Cut into squares.

question: What can I make with apples and oats?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Apple Bars
Ingredients:
2 c. unsifted flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. salt
2 c. quick cooking rolled oats
1 c. packed light brown sugar
1 c. soft butter
4 apples (3 1/2 c.), peeled and chopped
1 c. chopped nuts
1/2 c. granulated sugar
3 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Sift together flour, soda and salt.
Add oats, brown sugar and butter.
Mix with pastry blender until grainy.
Put half of mixture into lightly greased 15 x 10 x 1-inch pan.
Cover mixture with apples.
Mix nuts and granulated sugar.
Sprinkle half on apples and dot with butter.
Put on remaining mix and sprinkle with nuts.
Bake in slow oven for 1 hour and 15 minutes or until done.
Cut while still warm.

question: How do I make homemade bread without yeast?
answer:
Title: Homemade Bread
Ingredients:
8 c. warm water
3 pkg. yeast
1 c. powdered milk
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. oil
3 Tbsp. salt
5 lb. flour (plus some)
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in water and powdered milk. Add all other ingredients. Mix well. Knead for at least 10 minutes. Put back in greased bowl and let rise until double, punch down and let rise again.

question: How do I make homemade bread without yeast?
answer:
Title: Homemade Bread
Ingredients:
4 c. lukewarm water
4 pkg. active dry yeast
4 Tbsp. sugar
4 Tbsp. shortening
4 tsp. salt
3 1/2 qt. flour
Directions:
Mix all ingredients except flour and let stand until dissolved.
Add about 1/2 the flour.
Beat 5 minutes.
Gradually add remaining flour to make a soft dough.
Knead until smooth and no longer stretchy (about 10 minutes), adding a small amount of flour as needed.
Place in greased bowl.
Turn over to grease top. Cover with towel and let rise in warm place until double in size. Punch down; let rise again.
Make into 5 or 6 loaves.
Let rise. Bake at 400° for 45 minutes.
This recipe will serve 40 people.

question: How do I make homemade bread without yeast?
answer:
Title: Easy "No Knead" Yeast Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. milk
3 Tbsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. salt
1 1/2 Tbsp. oil
4 1/2 c. flour
1 c. warm water
2 pkg. yeast
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in cup of warm water; set aside.
Scald milk, sugar, salt and oil.
Let cool.
Mix yeast mixture and cooled milk mixture.
Stir in flour until well mixed.
Cover, let rise double in bowl, about 45 minutes.
After rising, stir dough a half minute.
Place dough in greased 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Cover, let rise double in size, 1 hour.
Bake at 400° for 25 to 30 minutes. Brush with oleo.
Makes 1 loaf.

question: How do I make homemade bread without yeast?
answer:
Title: Homemade Bread
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
3 Tbsp. sugar
2 tsp. salt
2 pkg. dry yeast
2 c. water
1/4 c. oil
4 c. flour (set to side)
Directions:
In large bowl, mix 2 cups flour, sugar, salt and yeast. In saucepan, combine water and oil; heat until warm, 120° to 130°. Add warm liquid to flour mixture. Blend on low speed until moistened. Blend approximately 3 minutes on medium speed. Stir in by hand approximately 3 cups flour until dough pulls away from bowl. Knead in flour (about 1 cup) until smooth and elastic, about 5 minutes. Place in greased bowl; cover with plastic wrap and towel. Place bowl in warm oven (80° to 85°) for 50 to 60 minutes or until 2 times larger. (Hint: To heat oven to proper temperature, turn oven to 400° for 1 minute, turn off and place covered bowl inside for 60 minutes.) Remove dough from oven and punch dough down to remove air bubbles. Cut in half and shape into 2 loaves. Place in 2 greased 8 x 4 or 9 x 5-inch pans and cover with towel. Place in warm oven (same as before) for 30 to 35 minutes or until 1 inch above pan. Remove towel; turn oven to 350°. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes. Bread should sound hollow when tapped.

question: How do I make homemade bread without yeast?
answer:
Title: Easy Homemade Bread
Ingredients:
3 3/4 c. warm water
3 pkg. dry yeast
6 Tbsp. sugar
4 or 5 tsp. salt
10 c. flour
6 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 eggs
Directions:
Mix yeast with water in a large bowl.
Add sugar, salt, eggs and butter; then add in flour (mixer can be used).
Stir with a spoon until all flour is well mixed in.
Let sit for 1 hour. Grease and flour hands; then divide dough into 3 loaves.
Put in greased pans.
Cover with towel and let sit 40 minutes.
Bake at 350° for 40 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. top round steak, thinly sliced across grain into bite sized strips
1 1/2 c. broccoli, cut in 1-inch pieces
3 carrots, bias slices
1 medium onion, cut in thin wedges
2 cloves garlic, chopped
1/2 lb. mushrooms, thinly sliced
1 c. frozen peas, thawed
1 can water chestnuts, drained and sliced
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. dry sherry
1 c. beef broth, water and bouillon
2 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Blanch in boiling water for 2 minutes the broccoli and carrots.
Drain.

question: What’s a good recipe for a beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Good Neighbor Recipe
Ingredients:
1 tongue that does not slander
1 mind full of tolerance
2 ears closed to gossip
2 eyes overlooking other's faults
1 heart generous and kind
2 hands extending to help others
1 dash of wit
1 big smile
1 dash of sunny disposition
1 dash of cheerfulness
Directions:
Blend together all ingredients. Serve generous portions to everyone you meet.

question: What’s a good recipe for a beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef top round steak
1 1/2 c. broccoli (1-inch size)
3 medium carrots
1 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. dry sherry
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 medium onion
1 c. frozen peas
1/2 c. water chestnuts
1/2 c. bamboo shoots
4 to 6 c. cooked rice
Directions:
Slice beef very thin in bite size strips.
Add cooking oil to preheated hot wok (high heat).
Stir-fry broccoli, carrots and onion in hot oil for 2 minutes or until crisp-tender.
Remove from wok.
Add more oil, if necessary, before stir-frying the beef strips (fry only 1/2 of the portion of beef strips at a time) in hot oil (high heat) for 2 to 3 minutes.
Return all meat to wok. Add peas, water chestnuts and bamboo shoots.

question: What’s a good recipe for a beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 to 2 Tbsp. sesame oil
1 tsp. five-spice powder
2 lb. sirloin, cut into thin slices
1/4 c. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/2 c. beef broth
1 tsp. red pepper flakes
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 tsp. fresh ginger, grated
2 cloves garlic, grated
1 onion, chopped
2 c. bean sprouts
1 c. snow peas
Directions:
Combine sesame oil and five-spice powder in a skillet and heat to medium-high heat; add beef and brown. Remove from pan.

question: What’s a good recipe for a beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. sirloin, thinly sliced
1 Tbsp. oil
3 c. sliced vegetables (such as green onions, bell peppers, snow peas or mushrooms)
1 pkg. brown gravy mix
3/4 c. cold water
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
dash each of ground ginger and garlic powder
Directions:
Brown sirloin in oil.
Add vegetables.
Mix gravy mix, water and soy sauce together.
Add spices.
Pour over meat and vegetables.
Simmer 1 minute until thickened.
Serve with rice or noodles.

question: What can I make with green beans and almonds?
answer:
Title: Fresh Green Beans With Almonds
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh green beans
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. melted butter
1 tsp. salt
dash of garlic powder
1/4 c. slivered almonds
Directions:
Stem and wash beans.
Put beans in a pot and cover with boiling water.
Bring to a boil and boil 1 minute; reduce heat. Add seasonings.
Cover and cook for approximately 15 to 20 minutes or until tender.
Drain.
Put in serving dish; drizzle with butter.
Top with almonds.

question: What can I make with green beans and almonds?
answer:
Title: Green Beans With Almonds
Ingredients:
3 (14.5 oz.) cans green beans, drained and rinsed
2 cubes beef bouillon
2 c. water
1/2 c. corn oil
1/4 c. chopped onions (optional)
salt and pepper to taste
3/4 c. sliced or slivered almonds, toasted
Directions:
In a large pan, combine beans, bouillon cubes, water, oil and onions.
Bring to a boil on the stove and cook on low heat for 1 hour.
Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Add almonds during last 15 minutes of cooking or use almonds as a garnish when served.
Yield:
8 to 12 servings.

question: What can I make with green beans and almonds?
answer:
Title: Green Beans With Almonds
Ingredients:
3 pounds fresh green beans (stem ends removed)
1/2 teaspoon butter flavored buds or butter flavored cooking spray
1/8 teaspoon garlic powder
1 1/2 teaspoons crushed dried thyme
2 tablespoons slivered almonds, toasted
Directions:
Bring green bean to a boil in a large covered pot.
Reduce heat and simmer until crisp and tender, 3 to 4 minutes.
Drain. Toss with butter flavored buds, garlic powder and thyme.
Garnish with toasted almonds.
Serve hot.

question: What can I make with green beans and almonds?
answer:
Title: Green Beans With Almonds
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh green beans, cut or left whole
2 c. boiling water
3/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 c. blanched slivered almonds
1/4 to 1/2 c. butter
Directions:
Place
green beans in kettle of salted water with sugar added. Cook,
covered,
until
barely
tender
(from 10 to 25 minutes). Drain but keep hot for serving.

question: What can I make with green beans and almonds?
answer:
Title: Green Beans And Almonds
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. fresh green beans, ends trimmed
1/4 c. margarine or butter
1/2 c. coarsely chopped almonds
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cook beans in salt water 5 to 7 minutes; drain.
Melt 2 tablespoons of margarine or butter in skillet; add nuts.
Use low heat.
Stir occasionally 5 to 7 minutes until browned.
Stir in remaining salt and pepper.
Pour over beans.
Toss to mix.
Yields 12 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy tofu?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables With Tofu
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. tofu, cut into 1/2-inch cubes (firm or extra firm is best)
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. vinegar
1/4 tsp. cumin
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. grated ginger
3 Tbsp. peanut or salad oil
1 large carrot, chopped
2 c. chopped broccoli
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1/2 c. sliced green onions
3 Tbsp. cilantro (optional)
use any vegetables that are your favorites
crispy noodles
Directions:
Place tofu in shallow bowl.
Mix soy, vinegar, cumin, garlic and ginger; drizzle this over tofu and set aside.
Heat oil in wok or large pan over high heat.
Add carrot and stir-fry 1 minute. Add broccoli and cook 2 minutes, then add mushrooms and onions. Reduce heat to medium.
Add tofu mixture and cook, stirring gently until heated through but vegetables are still crisp.
Garnish with cilantro.
Spoon over hot rice and pass the soy sauce and add crispy noodles on top.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy tofu?
answer:
Title: Crispy Tofu(Crisp Outside, Soft Inside)
Ingredients:
1 box "regular" tofu
1/4 c. chopped, roasted peanuts
2 medium cucumbers, cubed
2 to 3 Tbsp. vinegar
2 to 3 Tbsp. sugar
1 bunch cilantro, chopped
Directions:
Soak 4 blocks tofu in salted water overnight or 4 hours if cut in cubes.
Cut each block into 9 to 12 cubes, depending on size, and drain.
Dip-fry in hot oil (should be crispy outside and soft inside, not hard).
Dip or pour Peanut Dressing over Crispy Tofu when ready to eat.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy tofu?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Tofu And Veggies
Ingredients:
1 lb. extra firm tofu
1/2 c. Sake or white wine
2 Tbsp. sesame oil or vegetable oil
4 Tbsp. soy sauce or to taste
2 cloves minced garlic
2 tsp. ginger juice (optional)
1 onion, thinly sliced
1 red pepper, diced
2 c. broccoli florets or Chinese cabbage
8 oz. snow peas
1/4 c. roasted cashews or almonds
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1-inch cubes.
In wok or skillet, bring soy sauce, garlic, ginger and wine to a boil.
Add tofu cubes, cover and simmer for 5 to 10 minutes.
Remove tofu and remaining broth from wok or skillet.
Heat oil in wok and stir-fry vegetables over medium heat for 3 to 5 minutes.
Add remaining broth, tofu and cashews or almonds.
Heat and serve.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy tofu?
answer:
Title: Delicious Crispies
Ingredients:
1 yeast cake
1/2 c. water
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. shortening
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. milk, scalded
5 to 6 c. flour
1 tsp. lemon flavoring
1/2 c. soft butter
1 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
1/2 c. sugar
Directions:
Soften yeast in warm water.
Add 1/2 cup sugar, shortening and salt to scalded milk.
Cool.
Add 2 cups flour and beat well.
Add eggs, yeast and lemon flavoring.
Beat well and add remaining flour.
Knead until smooth.
Place in greased bowl.
Cover and let rise until doubled (1 1/2 hours).

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy tofu?
answer:
Title: Tofu Patties
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) box firm tofu, mashed
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 c. fine chopped celery
1 1/2 c. chopped onion
1 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. dry parsley
3/4 tsp. sweet basil
3/4 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. salt
2 c. cooked brown rice
3/4 c. quick oats
Directions:
Mix in rice and oats.
Form into patties on lightly oiled cookie sheet.
Bake at 350° for 20 minutes on the first side; flip patties, 20 minutes on the second side.

question: I need a recipe for roasted vegetables.
answer:
Title: Oven Roasted Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 pkg. Lipton Recipe Secrets savory herb with garlic soup mix
1 1/2 lb. fresh vegetables (sliced zucchini, squash, bell peppers, carrots, celery, mushrooms, asparagus, etc.)
2 Tbsp. olive or vegetable oil
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
In large bowl, add all ingredients. Toss in bowl until vegetables are evenly coated. Arrange vegetables in 13 x 9-inch baking pan. Bake uncovered, stirring once for 20 minutes or until vegetables are tender.

question: I need a recipe for roasted vegetables.
answer:
Title: Roasted Vegetables
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. olive oil
thyme to taste (optional)
rosemary to taste (optional)
soy sauce or Tabasco to taste
onions
potatoes
use your favorite veggies: turnips, broccoli, cauliflower, garlic, peppers, zucchini, summer squash, mushrooms)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 475°.
Melt oil and butter in roasting pan large enough so that vegetables rest on bottom of pan.
Adjust oil and butter to amount of vegetables.
Using tongs, turn cut sides of longest cooking vegetables down to seal in juices (potatoes, onions, turnips).
Roast 15 minutes.
Toss once or twice.
Add medium cooking vegetables (broccoli, summer squash) and pour soy sauce (or other favorite sauce) to coat.
Roast 15 minutes.
Add mushrooms and any seasonings.
Toss lightly.
Roast 5 to 10 minutes.
Serve with cornbread.

question: I need a recipe for roasted vegetables.
answer:
Title: Oven Roasted Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 envelope Lipton Recipe Secrets savory herb with garlic or Secrets onion soup mix
2 Tbsp. olive or vegetable oil
1 1/2 lb. assorted fresh vegetables: carrots, snow peas, sugar, snap peas, zucchini, green peppers, red peppers, celery, mushrooms and sliced cabbage
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
In plastic bag or large bowl, shake or toss all ingredients until vegetables are coated.
Empty into 13 x 9-inch baking pan.
Discard bag.
Bake 20 minutes, stirring once, or until vegetables are tender.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: I need a recipe for roasted vegetables.
answer:
Title: Roasted Winter Vegetables(Low-Fat)
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 1/2 tsp. tarragon
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 stalk broccoli (about 3/4 lb.)
1/2 head cauliflower (about 3/4 lb.)
2 small red onions
Directions:
Heat oven to 425°.
Put butter, tarragon, salt and pepper in a shallow roasting pan.
Put pan in oven just long enough to melt butter.
Cut broccoli and cauliflower into florets.
Cut onions into wedges.
Toss onions in butter mixture and roast uncovered, 5 minutes.
Stir in broccoli and cauliflower.
Continue roasting until vegetables are tender, about 25 minutes.
Yields 6 servings.

question: I need a recipe for roasted vegetables.
answer:
Title: Roasted Mixed Vegetables
Ingredients:
4 large red skin potatoes, wedged (about 2 lb.)
3 large carrots, peeled and cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces (about 2 c.)
3 large parsnips, peeled and cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces (about 2 c.)
2 lb. onions, cut into wedges (large)
1 Tbsp. dried rosemary leaves
2 tsp. garlic powder
3 Tbsp. Fleischmann's margarine, melted
Directions:
In a large bowl, toss potatoes, carrots, parsnips and onions with rosemary and garlic.
Drizzle with margarine.
Arrange in a 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan. Bake at 450° for 40 to 45 minutes or until fork-tender, stirring constantly.

question: What’s a good recipe for chocolate truffles?
answer:
Title: Classic Chocolate Truffles
Ingredients:
9 oz. milk chocolate, chopped
3/4 c. whipping cream
Directions:
Place cream in a small saucepan over medium heat.
Bring to a boil, stirring constantly with wooden spoon.
As soon as cream reaches boiling point, remove from
heat, add the chopped chocolate and cover the pan.
Leave covered for three minutes to allow chocolate to melt.
Stir the mixture until perfectly blended and smooth.
Refrigerate for 30 minutes to cool and stiffen.
Drop by spoonful on wax paper lined cookie sheet and refrigerate for one hour or until firm.
Form into balls and dip into chocolate.

question: What’s a good recipe for chocolate truffles?
answer:
Title: Truffles
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. milk chocolate (3 c. shaved or finely cut and firmly packed)
1/3 c. heavy cream
1/3 c. dairy half and half
1 1/2 tsp. pure vanilla
chocolate or white dipping chocolate (about 1 pkg. of melts)
Directions:
Melt milk chocolate in top of double boiler over hot (not boiling) water.
When melted, beat until smooth.
Meanwhile, combine heavy cream and half and half in small saucepan; heat to scalding.
