Remove from heat; let stand until temperature is about 130°.
Add warm cream to melted chocolate at once.
Beat until smooth and well blended.
Remove from heat; add vanilla and let cool.
When cool, beat with electric mixer until candy is light and rather fluffy.
Let stand in refrigerator until firm.
When firm, roll a teaspoonful of candy into a ball in palms of hands.
Dip immediately into melted chocolate with dipping fork and place on wax paper to dry.
When ready to package, use small candy cups for each individual piece.
Makes 36 to 40 (2 pounds).

question: What’s a good recipe for chocolate truffles?
answer:
Title: Truffles
Ingredients:
8 oz. bittersweet chocolate
4 oz. unsalted butter, cut into small cubes
2 egg yolks
2 Tbsp. dark rum, cognac or orange liqueur
unsweetened cocoa
Directions:
Melt chocolate in a bowl over hot water.
Remove bowl from hot water and whisk in butter.
Next, whisk in egg yolks.
Add rum, cognac or liqueur.
Place bowl over cold water and beat vigorously until chocolate is thick and smooth.
Chill until workable.
Form into balls with 2 teaspoons; roll in unsweetened cocoa.
Place on a chilled plate until firm.
Roll in cocoa again and keep chilled in a covered container until served.

question: What’s a good recipe for chocolate truffles?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Truffles
Ingredients:
6 oz. semi-sweet baking chocolate
10 Tbsp. butter, softened
2 egg yolks, beaten
1 1/2 c. sifted confectioners sugar
2 tsp. vanilla extract
cocoa
Directions:
Melt chocolate in saucepan over very low heat, stirring constantly.
Cool.
Cream butter with egg yolks in bowl.
Add confectioners sugar gradually, blending well.
Stir in chocolate and vanilla.
Chill until firm enough to handle.
Shape into 30 to 35 balls.
Roll in cocoa.
Store in airtight container

question: What’s a good recipe for chocolate truffles?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Truffles
Ingredients:
1 pkg. semi-sweet chocolate
4 oz. cream cheese, softened
8 oz. tub chocolate nondairy whipped topping, thawed
powdered sugar
finely chopped nuts, toasted coconut, grated semi-sweet chocolate, cookie crumbs or multi colored sprinkles
Directions:
Cook chocolate on High for 2 minutes or until chocolate is almost melted, stirring halfway through heating time.
Stir until chocolate is completely melted.
Stir in cream cheese until smooth.
Cool to room temperature.
Gently stir in whipped topping.
Refrigerate 1 hour.
Shape into 1 inch balls.
Roll in powdered sugar, nuts, coconut, grated chocolate, cookie crumbs or sprinkles.
Store in the refrigerator.
Makes 2 1/2 to 3 dozen.

question: What’s a quick recipe for guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
1 medium avocado, peeled
1 small tomato, quartered
2 Tbsp. lime or lemon juice
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise or salad dressing
2 Tbsp. sour cream
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. red pepper
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/3 c. chopped onion
Directions:
Position knife blade in food processor bowl.
Add all ingredients except onion.
Process 1 minute or until lumpy.
Stir in onions.
Yields 2 cups.

question: What’s a quick recipe for guacamole?
answer:
Title: Quick Guacamole
Ingredients:
1 ripe avocado
1/2 c. small curd cottage cheese
1/3 c. hot picante sauce or salsa
1/2 tsp. minced, seeded jalapeno pepper (optional)
tortilla chips or raw vegetables
Directions:
In a bowl, mash the avocado.
Stir in cottage cheese and picante sauce.
Add jalapeno if desired.
Serve with chips or vegetables.
Yields about 1 1/2 cups.

question: What’s a quick recipe for guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
4 avocados, peeled and chopped
2 green onions, chopped
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. red pepper flakes
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. dried cilantro or 1 fresh sprig
1 medium tomato, chopped
Directions:
In a mixing bowl, combine avocados, onions, lemon juice, salt, red pepper flakes, garlic powder and cilantro.
Using a fork or potato masher, mix and mash coarsely.
Add most of the tomatoes; stir well. Pour into serving bowl; garnish with remaining tomatoes and sprigs of cilantro.
Serve with tortilla chips.

question: What’s a quick recipe for guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole(An Authentic Mexican Recipe)
Ingredients:
2 avocados, mashed
1/2 small onion, grated
salt to taste
1/2 juicy lemon (large)
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 small fresh tomato, chopped
1 green chile (I use canned ones)
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and serve as dip with Doritos or Fritos.
Serve as a salad with other Mexican dishes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for guacamole?
answer:
Title: Make Ahead Guacamole
Ingredients:
1 envelope gelatin
1/4 c. cold water
1/2 c. boiling water
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 1/2 c. mashed ripe avocado
1/3 c. mayonnaise
3/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. finely minced onion
1 small ripe tomato, seeded and diced (1/3 c.)
Directions:
Sprinkle gelatin over cold water and let stand 5 minutes.
Add 1/2 cup boiling water and stir until dissolved.
Whisk in lemon juice, mashed avocado, mayonnaise and salt.
Stir in minced onion and tomato.
Turn into 3 cup mold or bowl.	Make in a.m. and serve in p.m. and it will not darken.

question: I need a recipe for chocolate pudding from scratch.
answer:
Title: Chocolate Pudding
Ingredients:
2 (1 oz.) sq. unsweetened chocolate
3/4 c. sugar
1/4 tsp. salt
3 1/2 c. skim milk, divided
1/4 c. plus 1 Tbsp. cornstarch
2 tsp. vanilla extract
Directions:
Melt chocolate in a heavy saucepan over low heat.
Stir in sugar and salt.
Gradually add 3 cups milk, stirring constantly with a wire whisk.
Cook over medium heat 5 minutes.
Combine remaining milk and cornstarch; stir well.
Add to saucepan.
Cook 30 minutes or until mixture comes to a boil, stirring frequently. Cook 1 minute, stirring frequently.
Remove from heat; stir in vanilla.
Serve warm or chilled.
Yield:
8 servings (about 167 calories per 1/2-cup).

question: I need a recipe for chocolate pudding from scratch.
answer:
Title: Scratch Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. self-rising flour
2 c. sugar
4 Tbsp. cocoa
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. salt
1 stick butter
1/2 c. Wesson oil
1 c. water
2 eggs, beaten
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 c. buttermilk
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. chopped pecans
Directions:
Mix
together in a big bowl flour, sugar, cocoa, cinnamon
and salt.
Melt
in
a
saucepan 1 stick butter, oil and water; bring
to a boil.
Add dry with liquid ingredients and mix well. Add beaten eggs, soda and buttermilk.
Add vanilla. Stir
all together and pour into a greased, floured pan.
Cook at
350°
for 30
to
40 minutes.
While cake is hot from the oven, pour frosting on it.

question: I need a recipe for chocolate pudding from scratch.
answer:
Title: Chocolate Pudding
Ingredients:
3/4 c. sugar
1 c. self-rising flour
2 Tbsp. cocoa
1/2 c. milk
3 Tbsp. melted butter
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/4 c. cocoa
1 1/2 c. water or coffee
Directions:
Mix in a 9-inch baking pan the sugar, flour, cocoa and milk. Stir.
Combine sugars and 1/4 cup cocoa and sprinkle over batter. Pour water or coffee over top.
Bake at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes. This makes its own sauce.

question: I need a recipe for chocolate pudding from scratch.
answer:
Title: Tarheel Scratch Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. confectioners sugar
1 c. butter
3 c. flour
3 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. milk
6 eggs
Directions:
Cream the butter and sugar together.
Sift the baking powder and flour together.
Add the salt and mix with the butter, sugar and milk.
Beat thoroughly.
Beat the eggs until stiff and add to the rest of ingredients.
Stir well and bake in buttered layer cake pans for 20 to 25 minutes in a 375° oven.
Spread the layers with icing.

question: I need a recipe for chocolate pudding from scratch.
answer:
Title: Grandma'S Scratch Cake
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. flour
2 c. sugar
1/2 c. cocoa
2 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
3/4 c. oil
2 eggs
1 c. buttermilk
1 c. hot coffee
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Grease and flour pans, set aside.
Mix with a beater the first 8 ingredients.
Add the hot coffee and vanilla (mix on low).
Pour into pans.
Bake at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes.
Cool and frost with frosting.

question: How do I make slow-cooker pulled chicken?
answer:
Title: Slow Cooker Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (6 oz.) pkg. Stove Top dressing
1 1/4 c. water
1/4 c. white wine
12 carrots, cut into 2-inch pieces
4 to 5 lb. roasting chicken
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Prepare dressing as directed.
Set aside to cool.
Stir in wine.
Blanch carrots 5 minutes in boiling water.
Drain and put in crock-pot.
Stuff chicken with dressing and place in pot over carrots.
Cover pot and set on low for 6 to 8 hours.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: How do I make slow-cooker pulled chicken?
answer:
Title: Easy Slow Cooker Chicken
Ingredients:
4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
1 (10.75 oz.) can condensed cream of chicken soup
1 (10.75 oz.) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (10.75 oz.) can condensed cream of celery soup
1 c. white rice
Directions:
Cut chicken breasts into large chunks. Place the chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of celery soup and the rice in a slow cooker. Cook on high for 3 hours or low for 4 hours.

question: How do I make slow-cooker pulled chicken?
answer:
Title: Slow Cooker Chicken
Ingredients:
1 fryer
salt
flour
1 small onion
1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/4 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. celery and parsley flakes (or any seasoning desired)
Directions:
Before you go to church Sunday morning, cut up and remove the skin from fryer; salt and flour lightly.
Arrange in single layer in slow cooker.
Slice onion; spread over chicken.
Sprinkle over this the seasoning, thyme and celery
and parsley flakes.
Place lid on cooker; turn on.
Come home from church and eat!

question: How do I make slow-cooker pulled chicken?
answer:
Title: Fast Paced Chicken
Ingredients:
4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
1 c. sour cream
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/3 c. salsa (mild, medium or hot)
1/8 tsp. white pepper
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/2 tsp. celery salt
Directions:
Place chicken in a glass 9-inch baking dish.
Mix remaining ingredients and pour over chicken.
Refrigerate 8 to 24 hours. Preheat oven to 350° and bake 1 hour.
Good served with rice and a steamed squash medley.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make slow-cooker pulled chicken?
answer:
Title: Lemon Garlic Chicken(Slow Cooker Or Crock-Pot Recipe)
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken breast halves
1 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/4 c. water
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. chicken bouillon granules
1 tsp. minced fresh parsley
Directions:
Remove skin and fat from chicken and pat dry.
Mix oregano, seasoned salt and pepper together and rub all into chicken.
Brown chicken in 2 tablespoons of butter.
Transfer chicken to slow cooker.
Place water, lemon juice, garlic and bouillon granules in skillet used to brown chicken, scraping and incorporating all bits from bottom of skillet.
Pour over chicken and cook on high for 2 1/2 to 3 hours or on low for 5 to 6 hours.
Thirty minutes before serving, stir in the parsley and cook on high.
Serve with rice pilaf.

question: How do I make a lemon butter sauce for fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Sauce For Fish
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1 1/2 c. milk
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Melt butter. Blend in flour, salt and pepper. Gradually stir in milk. Cook, stirring constantly, until thickened and smooth. Add lemon juice and parsley. Serve over fish.

question: How do I make a lemon butter sauce for fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Butter Baked Fish
Ingredients:
1 lb. catfish fillets
1/2 to 1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. (1/4 lb.) butter
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. paprika
Directions:
In a 12 x 8 x 2-inch dish, arrange fillets with thickest, meaty areas to outside edge of dish. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. In 1-quart casserole dish, place butter. Microwave on High for 1 to 2 minutes until melted. Blend in parsley and lemon juice; pour over fish. Sprinkle paprika over fillets. Preheat oven to 350°. Place casserole dish in oven. Cook 45 to 60 minutes or until fillets are fluffy. Serves 2 to 3 people.

question: How do I make a lemon butter sauce for fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Butter Sauce
Ingredients:
1/3 c. butter or margarine, melted
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. minced parsley
Directions:
Combine ingredients.
Heat 1 or 2 minutes until flavors blend. Makes 4 to 6 servings.
Serve over asparagus, broccoli and fish.

question: How do I make a lemon butter sauce for fish?
answer:
Title: Piquant Sauce For Fish(Serves 4)
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or oleo
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1 1/2 tsp. dried parsley flakes
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
1 1/2 tsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Place butter in a 1-cup glass measure.
Microwave on Medium-high (roast) for about 1 1/2 minutes, or until melted.
Add mustard, parsley flakes, garlic powder and lemon juice.
Pour sauce over fish to serve.

question: How do I make a lemon butter sauce for fish?
answer:
Title: Speedy Lemon Sauce
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1 c. half and half cream
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. lemon zest
1 Tbsp. minced parsley
dash of salt and pepper
Directions:
Just mix in blender or shaker and serve over your favorite fish.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: How do I make homemade sourdough bread?
answer:
Title: Sourdough Bread
Ingredients:
1/3 c. sugar
1/2 c. oil
1 Tbsp. salt
1 1/2 c. warm water
1 c. starter
6 c. bread flour
Directions:
Stir all ingredients, except flour.
When mixed, add flour, a little at a time, to other ingredients, mixing well.
Put dough in large greased bowl; turn dough to grease the top.
Cover with foil.
Let rise at room temperature overnight, or for at least 8 hours.
Punch down dough.
Turn out onto floured board and knead. Divide into 3 parts; shape into loaves.
Put in 3 greased loaf pans; brush tops with oil.
Cover with paper towel or plastic wrap.
Let rise an additional 4 to 5 hours.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes.
Brush with butter; cool and wrap.

question: How do I make homemade sourdough bread?
answer:
Title: Sourdough Bread
Ingredients:
1/4 c. oil
1 Tbsp. salt
1/4 c. sugar
1 c. Starter
1 1/2 c. warm water
6 c. bread flour
Directions:
Combine oil, water, sugar and Starter.
Stir well and add flour.
Place in greased bowl and turn to cover all surfaces with oil. Let rise in warm place. Bowl may be covered with towel or cookie sheet.
Turn dough onto floured surface and knead several times. Shape into loaves or rounds.
Place in greased pans.
Let rise for at least 8 hours. Bake at 350° until brown, about 20 minutes for rounds, 30 minutes for loaves.
May add 1 package of Italian seasoning mix for variety.

question: How do I make homemade sourdough bread?
answer:
Title: Sourdough Bread
Ingredients:
1/4 c. sugar (scant)
1/2 c. oil
1 Tbsp. salt
1 c. Starter
1 1/2 c. warm water
6 c. bread flour
Directions:
Mix flour, sugar and salt in a large bowl. Stir in liquids and mix, making stiff batter. (Do not knead at this time.) Push dough aside and spray with Pam or grease with Crisco.
Turn dough over to grease all sides. Cover lightly with foil and let stand overnight in warm place.
(A cold oven is a good place to let it stand.)

question: How do I make homemade sourdough bread?
answer:
Title: Sourdough Bread
Ingredients:
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. corn oil
1 Tbsp. salt
1 c. starter
1 1/2 c. warm water
6 c. or more plain flour
Directions:
In large bowl make stiff dough of sugar, corn oil, salt, starter, warm water and flour.
In larger greased bowl, put dough mixture and brush top with oil.
Let rise overnight (8 hours or more), covered lightly.
Divide dough into 2 parts and knead each piece on a floured board a few times.
Make into loaves and put in loaf pans with brush with oil to rise.
Let rise 6 to 8 hours, covered lightly.
Bake in bottom rack of oven at 350° for 30 minutes or until golden brown.

question: How do I make homemade sourdough bread?
answer:
Title: Sourdough Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. milk or water
1/3 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/3 c. vegetable oil
1 packet active yeast
1 1/2 c. Starter
2 to 3 Tbsp. warm water
4 to 5 c. flour
Directions:
Scald milk.
Add sugar, shortening and salt.
Stir to mix thoroughly.
Dissolve yeast in 2 to 3 tablespoons warm water.
Let it bubble to ensure it is working.
Add to milk mixture along with 2 cups of flour.
Stir and keep adding flour to make a dough that can be handled easily.
Knead for 5 to 8 minutes, then cut into pieces to fill pans 1/2 full.
Be sure to grease pans.
Let rise to twice its size in warm place.
Bake in 400° oven for 35 to 45 minutes to a good golden brown.

question: What’s a recipe for spicy buffalo wings?
answer:
Title: Spicy Buffalo Wings
Ingredients:
1 pkg. chicken wings, cut apart
salt and pepper to taste
1 c. flour
1 tsp. butter
hot sauce to taste
1 c. grease for frying
Directions:
Rinse
chicken	wings.	Add
salt
and	pepper to flour (other seasonings
may
be added if desired) in a bowl.
Heat grease. Coat
chicken
wings
with flour mixture and place in the
grease for about 4 minutes or until done.	Take out wings and place in a bowl.
Add butter to the hot wings and sprinkle hot sauce all over the chicken.

question: What’s a recipe for spicy buffalo wings?
answer:
Title: Spicy Buffalo Wings
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken wings
1 (18 oz.) bottle your favorite barbecue sauce
Directions:
Wash chicken wings, then season with garlic, salt, pepper and lemon-pepper.
Lightly flour chicken wings.
Fry chicken wings until golden brown and almost done.
Put fried chicken in a slow cooker, between high and medium.
Pour barbecue sauce over chicken. Let slow cook for 1 1/2 hours.
Remove chicken wings from slow cooker.

question: What’s a recipe for spicy buffalo wings?
answer:
Title: Steve'S Hot Buffalo Wings
Ingredients:
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. Tabasco sauce
1/2 tsp. fresh ground pepper
2 Tbsp. Kraft Original Thick 'N Spicy
2 Tbsp. finely diced jalapeno peppers
3 lb. chicken wings
5 Tbsp. hot sauce
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper**
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and simmer covered for an hour.

question: What’s a recipe for spicy buffalo wings?
answer:
Title: Buffalo Wings
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. paprika
1 Tbsp. caraway seed
1 Tbsp. dried onion flakes
1 Tbsp. dry mustard
1 Tbsp. grated lemon peel
1 1/2 tsp. dried thyme leaves
1 1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. ground red pepper
3 lb. chicken wings
4 Tbsp. margarine or butter (1/2 stick), melted
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
In a small bowl, mix paprika, caraway seed, onion flakes (crushed), dry mustard, lemon peel, thyme leaves, salt and ground red pepper.
Brush wings with melted butter and lightly pat paprika mixture on wings.
Place wings in a large open roasting pan.
Bake 30 minutes or until tender.

question: What’s a recipe for spicy buffalo wings?
answer:
Title: Buffalo Style Hot Wings
Ingredients:
10 to 20 chicken wings
1 c. Tabasco sauce
1 cube butter or margarine
1 lb. lean ground beef
1 small onion, chopped
4 medium potatoes, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
equal amount of sliced carrots
1 can condensed tomato soup
Directions:
Brown and drain meat; add onion.
Spread half of the potatoes and carrots in a baking dish and cover with half of the meat and onion mixture.
Season to taste.
Cover with half of a can of condensed tomato soup.
Layer remaining ingredients in same order, topping with remaining half can of soup.
Bake at 350° for 1 1/2 hours.
Serves 8.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick and easy beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Fast Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. beef (sirloin), cut in 1/4-inch pieces
2 medium onions, cut in medium pieces
2 medium green peppers, cut in medium pieces
1 stick margarine
1 clove garlic, chopped fine
2 small cans mushroom pieces, drained
juice of 2 lemons with pepper to taste
Minute rice
Directions:
In large frying pan, melt margarine.
Add garlic, onions and peppers.
Cook until onions are beginning to become tender.
Add beef, lemon juice and pepper mixture.
Cover and cook until beef is done.
Cook 2 cups of Minute rice according to directions.
Serve vegetables and meat over rice.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick and easy beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Quick And Easy Supper
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground beef
salt to taste
4 medium potatoes, sliced
4 medium onions, sliced
4 medium carrots, scraped and sliced
Directions:
Form meat into individual loaf size.
Place on a piece of aluminum foil.
Over meat, place potatoes, onions and carrots. Sprinkle salt over vegetables.
Wrap securely and bake 40 minutes at 350°.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick and easy beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Quick Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 c. sliced onion
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 c. sliced carrots
1 c. chopped broccoli
1 minced clove garlic or 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. minced ginger or 1/2 tsp. powdered ginger
1/2 to 1 lb. lean meat (beef, chicken, pork or shrimp, cut in slivers
3/4 c. broth or water and chicken or beef bouillon
2 tsp. cornstarch
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
Heat skillet to medium-high heat.
Add oil and when sizzling hot, add meat, vegetables, garlic and ginger and stir-fry until meat is done and vegetables are tender-crisp.
Blend cornstarch with chicken broth or with bouillon and water.
Stir into meat and vegetable mixture.
Add soy sauce and reduce heat.
Cook for 5 more minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick and easy beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. top round steak, thinly sliced across grain into bite sized strips
1 1/2 c. broccoli, cut in 1-inch pieces
3 carrots, bias slices
1 medium onion, cut in thin wedges
2 cloves garlic, chopped
1/2 lb. mushrooms, thinly sliced
1 c. frozen peas, thawed
1 can water chestnuts, drained and sliced
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. dry sherry
1 c. beef broth, water and bouillon
2 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Blanch in boiling water for 2 minutes the broccoli and carrots.
Drain.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick and easy beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Quick 'N Easy Salmon Patties
Ingredients:
1 (15 to 16 oz.) can pink salmon or 2 cans tuna
1 egg, beaten
1/3 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 1/2 c. Crisco
Directions:
Drain salmon or tuna; set aside 2 tablespoons of the juice. In a medium mixing bowl, mix salmon, egg and onion until sticky. Stir in the flour.
Add baking powder to salmon or tuna juice. Stir into salmon mixture.
Form into small patties and fry until golden brown (about 5 minutes) in hot Crisco.
Serve with tartar sauce or Caesar salad dressing.

question: What can I make with tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella?
answer:
Title: Mozzarella With Tomatoes
Ingredients:
1 lb. fresh Mozzarella
3 ripe tomatoes
2 tsp. oregano
4 Tbsp. olive oil
freshly ground black pepper
10 fresh basil leaves, chopped
salt to taste (optional)
sliced black olives (optional)
Directions:
Slice Mozzarella and tomatoes.
Arrange by alternating overlapping layers on a serving platter.
Sprinkle oregano, black pepper and salt.
Drizzle olive oil.
Top with basil leaves.
Let sit 1/2 hour before serving.
Serves 4.

question: What can I make with tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella?
answer:
Title: Tomatoes-Mozzarella Salad
Ingredients:
3 med. tomatoes, sliced
1/2 lb. skim Mozzarella Cheese, sliced
3 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1/3 cup olive oil
3 Tbsp. chopped parsley
3 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
1 Tbsp. finely chopped fresh basil
dash of salt and pepper
Directions:
Layer tomatoes and cheese in shallow dish. In small jar with a tight lid, place oil, vinegar, parsley, onion, basil, salt and pepper. Cover and shake well. Pour over tomatoes and cheese. Cover and refrigerate several hours, occasionally spooning dressing over tomatoes salad.

question: What can I make with tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella?
answer:
Title: Tomatoes With Mozzarella
Ingredients:
tomatoes
Mozzarella
basil
salt and pepper
extra virgin olive oil
Directions:
Layer slices of tomatoes and Mozzarella.
Sprinkle with chopped fresh basil, salt and freshly ground pepper.
Drizzle with extra virgin olive oil.

question: What can I make with tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella?
answer:
Title: Tomato Basil Squares
Ingredients:
1 pkg refrig. pizza crust
2 c shredded mozzarella cheese, divided
1/4 c fresh parmesan cheese, grated
2/3 c mayonnaise
1 garlic clove, pressed
4 plum tomatoes, thinly sliced
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Using lightly floured dough roller, roll out pizza crust on a rectangle baking stone or pan. Sprinkle crust with 1 cup of the mozzarella cheese; set aside. Thinly slice tomatoes; arrange in a single layer over the mozzarella cheese on the crust. Mix all the remaining ingredients together in a mixing bowl. Then spread to cover evenly over the crust. Bake 15 to 20 minutes or until top is golden brown and bubbly.

question: What can I make with tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella?
answer:
Title: Tomato-Mozzarella Salad
Ingredients:
1/4 c. red wine vinegar
1/2 tsp. minced garlic
1/2 tsp. salt
pepper
2/3 c. olive oil
3 c. tomatoes (chunks)
2 c. cubed Mozzarella
1/4 c. chopped onion
1 Tbsp. basil
Directions:
Mix vinegar, oil, garlic, salt and pepper.
Pour over vegetables and cheese.
Sprinkle with basil.
Chill before serving.

question: How do I make a chocolate ganache?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Ganache
Ingredients:
2 c. heavy cream
4 Tbsp. unsalted butter
4 Tbsp. granulated sugar
6 oz. unsweetened chocolate
4 oz. white chocolate
12 oz. semi-sweet chocolate
Directions:
Heat cream, butter and sugar in a 2 1/2-quart saucepan over medium heat.
Stir to dissolve sugar.
Bring to a boil.
Place the semi-sweet, unsweetened and white chocolate in a steel bowl.
Pour the boiling cream mixture over chocolates.
Let stand 5 minutes. Stir until smooth.
Can put in 1 to 2 teaspoons vanilla, pecans or orange rind (optional).
Refrigerate.
Cut into bite-size pieces.

question: How do I make a chocolate ganache?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Ganache
Ingredients:
1 c. heavy cream
10 oz. semi-sweet or bittersweet chocolate, chopped (2 c.)
Directions:
Gently warm the cream in a small saucepan over medium heat until small bubbles begin to appear at the edges.
Remove from heat.
Stir in chocolate until mixture is smooth and the chocolate has melted completely.
Do not stir so vigorously that bubbles form.
If there are any visible lumps, strain the mixture through a fine mesh sieve.

question: How do I make a chocolate ganache?
answer:
Title: Sour Cream Ganache Frosting
Ingredients:
4 (3 oz.) bars bittersweet chocolate (Lindt-Excellence recommended)
1 2/3 c. sour cream, at room temperature
Directions:
In a double boiler set over hot water or in a microwave on High power, stirring every 10 seconds, melt the chocolate.
Remove from the heat and add the sour cream.
Stir with a rubber spatula until uniform in color.
If the pan feels warm, transfer to a bowl.

question: How do I make a chocolate ganache?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Eclairs
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1 c. boiling water
1 c. self-rising flour
4 eggs
Directions:
Add butter to water and cook until butter is melted.
Add all the flour at once; stir vigorously until ball forms in center of pan.
Cool a little.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating after each addition.
Mixture should be stiff.
Put in pastry tube for eclair shape or use eclair pans or cookie sheet.
Bake at 400° for 40 to 50 minutes.
Split sides and fill when cool.
Frost.
Makes 8 to 12.

question: How do I make a chocolate ganache?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Candy
Ingredients:
3 c. sugar
1/4 c. cocoa
1 stick butter
2/3 c. cream
Directions:
Mix and bring to boil.
Cook 5 minutes, stirring constantly. Remove from heat; add 1 teaspoon vanilla.
Set in sink of cold water and stir until thick enough to pour into buttered dish.

question: How do I make slow-cooked pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Barbecued Pork
Ingredients:
1 (5 to 6 lb.) Boston butt
salt
1 tsp. chili sauce
1 tsp. celery seed
1 c. catsup
1/4 c. Worcestershire sauce
1/4 c. vinegar
1 tsp. brown sugar
1 c. water
Directions:
Cook pork in lightly salted water over low heat 2 to 2 1/2 hours.
Drain, reserving 1 cup broth.
Cut pork into thin slices and place in a large shallow baking pan.
Combine salt, reserved broth and remaining ingredients.
Mix well and pour over pork slices.
Bake at 325° for 30 to 45 minutes.

question: How do I make slow-cooked pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Barbecued Pork
Ingredients:
3 lb. pork, cubed
2 c. onions, chopped
3 green bell peppers, chopped
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/4 c. vinegar
6 oz. can tomato paste
1 1/2 Tbsp. chili powder
1 tsp. dry mustard
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in slow cooker; cover and cook on high 8 hours. Shred meat with fork. Mix into sauce and heat through. Serve on hamburger/sandwich buns with grated cheese and cole slaw on top.

question: How do I make slow-cooked pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Slow Cooked Pork
Ingredients:
2 1/2 to 3 lb. country style ribs
1 medium onion, sliced
1 (27 oz.) can sauerkraut, rinsed and drained
1/3 c. brown sugar
3 Tbsp. catsup
1 1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. caraway seed
Directions:
Place ribs and onion in slow cooker.
Combine remaining ingredients and pour over ribs.
Cover and cook on low setting for 10 to 12 hours or high setting for 5 to 6 hours.

question: How do I make slow-cooked pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Barbecued Pork
Ingredients:
4 to 5 lb. pork roast
2 medium onions, sliced
salt and pepper
1 c. hot water
1 small bottle barbecue sauce
Directions:
Put one slice onion in bottom of slow cooker.
Top with roast and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Arrange remaining onions on roast and add water.
Cook on low 8 to 10 hours or until tender. Discard most of juices.
Break pork into pieces, removing fat. Pour barbecue sauce over pork and stir.
Let heat through, then serve over buns.

question: How do I make slow-cooked pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Baked Navy Beans(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. dry navy beans (3 c.)
1 medium onion, chopped
1 c. brown sugar
2 tsp. dry mustard
2 Tbsp. dark molasses
1 Tbsp. salt
1/4 lb. salt pork
Directions:
Cook dry beans in water until softened, 3 times the volume of water to beans, about 30 minutes.
Let stand for 1 to 1 1/2 hours or until softened.
Drain and put in crock-pot with all ingredients well mixed.
Cover and cook on low for 10 to 12 hours (high 4 to 6 hours), stirring occasionally.

question: How do I make a spicy jalapeño cornbread?
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Cornbread
Ingredients:
3 c. self-rising meal
2 1/2 c. buttermilk
1/2 c. salad oil
3 eggs, beaten
1 large onion, grated
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 c. cream-style corn
1/2 c. chopped jalapeno chili peppers
1 1/2 c. yellow cheese, grated
1/4 lb. bacon or more, fried and crumbled
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/4 c. pimentos, chopped
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together well. Bake at 400° for about 35 minutes or until done.

question: How do I make a spicy jalapeño cornbread?
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Cornbread(Makes 12 Servings)
Ingredients:
3 c. yellow cornmeal
1 c. creamed corn
1 tsp. sugar
2 tsp. salt
1 c. onion, chopped
1 1/3 c. Cheddar cheese, grated
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 c. salad oil
3 eggs
1 3/4 c. milk
1/2 c. jalapeno, chopped
Directions:
Mix all ingredients well. Pour into greased 9 x 16-inch baking dish. Bake at 350° for 40 to 50 minutes.

question: How do I make a spicy jalapeño cornbread?
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Cornbread
Ingredients:
1 c. yellow meal
1 c. flour
2 Tbsp. sugar
4 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. milk
1/4 c. oil
2 eggs
1 can corn, drained
1 c. Cheddar cheese
1 Tbsp. pepper
1/2 c. chopped onion
Directions:
Bake for about 30 to 45 minutes at 425°.

question: How do I make a spicy jalapeño cornbread?
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Cornbread
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. cornmeal
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. soda
1 tsp. salt
2 eggs
1 c. buttermilk
1 c. mild cheddar cheese, grated
1 c. cream style corn
1/3 c. Wesson oil
3 whole jalapeno peppers, cut up
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients. Add buttermilk. Add 1 egg at a time. Stir in corn. Fold in jalapeno peppers, and cheese. Heat oil in baking dish until very hot. Pour hot oil into batter and stir. Then pour batter into baking dish. Bake at 400° for 30 minutes.

question: How do I make a spicy jalapeño cornbread?
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Seasoned Cornbread
Ingredients:
3 c. cornbread mix
3 eggs, beaten together
2 1/2 c. sweet milk
1/2 c. jalapeno peppers, cut up
1 c. corn (small can creamed corn)
1 1/2 c. grated cheese
1/2 c. salad oil
3 Tbsp. sugar
1 large onion
Directions:
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.
Cook all at one time.
Cut in pieces and keep in freezer, if desired.
Heat and eat.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Ground Beef And Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef or turkey
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 can tomato soup
3/4 c. water
3 potatoes, sliced
salt and pepper to taste
1 c. grated cheese
Directions:
Cook meat and onion.
Drain.
Layer 1/2 of the potatoes in a 9 x 13-inch dish, then layer 1/2 of the meat mixture, followed by 1/2 cup of cheese.
Top with remaining potatoes, then rest of meat mixture.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Ground Beef Bake
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. ground beef
1 Tbsp. minced green pepper
1 can golden mushroom soup
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 medium potatoes, thinly sliced
1 small onion, sliced thin
Cheddar cheese, grated
Directions:
Brown ground beef in skillet, stirring until crumbly; drain. Add green pepper, soup, salt and pepper; set aside.
Layer potatoes and onion in greased casserole.
Spoon ground beef mixture over layers.
Bake at 350° for 35 minutes.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Bake for 5 minutes longer.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Ground Beef Bake
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
2 Tbsp. minced green pepper
2 cans golden mushroom soup
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
4 medium potatoes, thinly sliced
1 medium onion
Cheddar cheese, grated
Directions:
Brown ground beef in skillet, stirring until crumbly.
Drain. Add green pepper, soup, salt and pepper.
Set aside.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Deviled Ground Beef On Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. chopped onion
3 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. catsup
1 c. water
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
4 c. hot mashed potatoes
Directions:
In large skillet, cook beef and onion until lightly browned. Drain fat off.
Sprinkle with flour, salt, mustard and pepper. Stir in water, Worcestershire sauce and catsup.
Cook and stir over medium heat about 5 minutes.
Serve over mashed potatoes.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Ground Beef Hash
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
2 c. sliced raw potatoes
1 1/2 c. water
salt and pepper
2 medium onions, chopped
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Brown beef and drain. Add potatoes, water, salt and pepper. Cover and simmer 30 minutes. Add onions and Worcestershire sauce. Uncover and continue cooking for 15 minutes or until thick as desired.

question: What’s a good recipe for enchiladas with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchiladas
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. chicken breast, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
1 tsp. chicken bouillon granules
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. chili powder
2 garlic cloves, minced
1/2 tsp. dried oregano leaves
1/2 tsp. cumin
1 (16 oz.) can chopped tomatoes, drained
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1/2 c. chopped celery (optional)
3 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
2 Tbsp. dry red wine
1/8 tsp. red pepper
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/8 tsp. salt
4 (6-inch) tortillas
1/2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
1/2 c. grated Cheddar cheese
2 jalapeno peppers, finely chopped
Directions:
Filling:
In skillet combine first 15 ingredients.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat.
Cover tightly and simmer for 15 minutes. Uncover and cook for 5 minutes.
Remove from skillet.
Set aside.

question: What’s a good recipe for enchiladas with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchiladas(President Bill Clinton'S Favorite Recipe)
Ingredients:
cooking oil
2 (4 oz.) cans chopped green chilies
1 large clove garlic, minced
1 (28 oz.) can tomatoes
2 c. chopped onion
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. oregano
3 c. shredded, cooked chicken
2 c. dairy sour cream
2 c. grated Cheddar cheese
15 corn or flour tortillas
Directions:
Preheat oil in a skillet.
Saute chopped chilies with minced garlic in oil.
Drain and break up tomatoes; reserve 1/2 cup liquid.
To chilies and garlic, add tomatoes, onion, 1 teaspoon salt, oregano and reserved tomato liquid.
Simmer, uncovered, until thick, about 30 minutes.
Remove from skillet and set aside.

question: What’s a good recipe for enchiladas with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchiladas
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. shredded chicken
2 c. cream of mushroom soup
1 c. milk or 1/2 c. sour cream
3 cans green chiles
10 to 12 flour or corn tortillas
2 c. grated cheese
1 chopped onion
Directions:
Combine meat, salt and pepper.
Mix soup with milk or sour cream and chiles in saucepan.
Heat a small skillet with oil to hot.
Heat each tortilla just to soften.
Dip each tortilla in sauce and place a small spoonful in tortilla.
Add some chicken, onion and cheese; roll up.

question: What’s a good recipe for enchiladas with chicken?
answer:
Title: President Bill Clinton'S Favorite Recipe(Chicken Enchiladas)
Ingredients:
cooking oil
2 (4 oz.) cans chopped green chilies
1 large clove garlic, minced
1 (28 oz.) can tomatoes
2 c. chopped onion
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. oregano
3 c. shredded, cooked chicken
2 c. dairy sour cream
2 c. grated Cheddar cheese
15 corn or flour tortillas
Directions:
Preheat
oil in skillet.
Saute chopped chilies with minced garlic in it.
Drain and break up tomatoes; reserve 1/2 cup liquid.
To chilies and garlic, add tomatoes, onion, 1 teaspoon salt, oregano and reserved tomato liquid.
Simmer uncovered until thick, about 30 minutes.
Remove from skillet and set aside. Combine chicken with sour cream, grated cheese and other teaspoon salt.
Heat 1/3 cup oil; dip tortillas in oil until they become limp.
Drain well on paper towels.
Fill tortillas with chicken mixture; roll up and arrange side by side, seam down, in 9 x 13 x 2-inch baking dish.
Pour tomato mixture over enchiladas and bake at 250° until heated through, about 20 minutes.
Yields 15 enchiladas.

question: What’s a good recipe for enchiladas with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchiladas
Ingredients:
2 large chicken breasts, cooked and split into 12 strips
1 c. onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. butter or oleo
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes, chopped
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1/4 c. green chilies, chopped
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. ground cumin
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. oregano, crushed
1/2 tsp. basil, crushed
12 tortillas
2 1/2 c. Jack cheese, shredded
3/4 c. sour cream
Directions:
In saucepan, cook onion and garlic in margarine or butter until tender.
Add tomatoes, tomato sauce and seasonings.
Bring to a boil; reduce heat.
Dip each tortilla into tomato mixture to soften.
Place 1 piece of chicken and about 2 tablespoons shredded cheese on each tortilla.
Roll up and place, seam side down, in 13 1/2 x 8 3/4 x 1-inch baking dish.

question: How do I make crispy tofu stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables With Tofu
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. tofu, cut into 1/2-inch cubes (firm or extra firm is best)
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. vinegar
1/4 tsp. cumin
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. grated ginger
3 Tbsp. peanut or salad oil
1 large carrot, chopped
2 c. chopped broccoli
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1/2 c. sliced green onions
3 Tbsp. cilantro (optional)
use any vegetables that are your favorites
crispy noodles
Directions:
Place tofu in shallow bowl.
Mix soy, vinegar, cumin, garlic and ginger; drizzle this over tofu and set aside.
Heat oil in wok or large pan over high heat.
Add carrot and stir-fry 1 minute. Add broccoli and cook 2 minutes, then add mushrooms and onions. Reduce heat to medium.
Add tofu mixture and cook, stirring gently until heated through but vegetables are still crisp.
Garnish with cilantro.
Spoon over hot rice and pass the soy sauce and add crispy noodles on top.

question: How do I make crispy tofu stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Crispy Tofu(Crisp Outside, Soft Inside)
Ingredients:
1 box "regular" tofu
1/4 c. chopped, roasted peanuts
2 medium cucumbers, cubed
2 to 3 Tbsp. vinegar
2 to 3 Tbsp. sugar
1 bunch cilantro, chopped
Directions:
Soak 4 blocks tofu in salted water overnight or 4 hours if cut in cubes.
Cut each block into 9 to 12 cubes, depending on size, and drain.
Dip-fry in hot oil (should be crispy outside and soft inside, not hard).
Dip or pour Peanut Dressing over Crispy Tofu when ready to eat.

question: How do I make crispy tofu stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Tofu And Veggies
Ingredients:
1 lb. extra firm tofu
1/2 c. Sake or white wine
2 Tbsp. sesame oil or vegetable oil
4 Tbsp. soy sauce or to taste
2 cloves minced garlic
2 tsp. ginger juice (optional)
1 onion, thinly sliced
1 red pepper, diced
2 c. broccoli florets or Chinese cabbage
8 oz. snow peas
1/4 c. roasted cashews or almonds
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1-inch cubes.
In wok or skillet, bring soy sauce, garlic, ginger and wine to a boil.
Add tofu cubes, cover and simmer for 5 to 10 minutes.
Remove tofu and remaining broth from wok or skillet.
Heat oil in wok and stir-fry vegetables over medium heat for 3 to 5 minutes.
Add remaining broth, tofu and cashews or almonds.
Heat and serve.

question: How do I make crispy tofu stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Spicy Fried Tofu
Ingredients:
2 lb. tofu
1 tsp. dill weed
1/2 tsp. each: turmeric, sweet basil, powdered thyme and ground cumin
1/2 to 3/4 tsp. curry
2 cloves garlic, pressed, or 1 tsp. garlic powder
2 to 3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/4 to 1/3 c. Parmesan cheese or nutritional yeast
Directions:
First, press tofu by cutting to 1/2-inch slices and firmly patting out excess water with an absorbent towel.
Cut into small cubes.
Spray Pam on nonstick skillet or wok.
Add tofu; saute on high heat for 5 minutes, turning with spatula.
Reduce heat to medium.
Add turmeric; stir until tofu is yellow all over.
Add the other seasonings, stirring well between each addition. Increase heat.
Add soy sauce, stirring constantly.
Finally, add nutritional yeast or Parmesan cheese; mix well, sauteing until golden brown or until cheese melts.
Good hot or cold.
Serves 4 to 8.

question: How do I make crispy tofu stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Tofu Fried Rice
Ingredients:
4 c. baked rice
2 Tbsp. water
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 1/2 c. diced onion (green)
1 c. diced celery
1 1/2 c. bean sprouts
1 c. diced red pepper
1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 recipe OVEN-FRIED TOFU, diced
Directions:
Saute garlic
and
green
onion
in water until tender. Stir in celery
and
cook 2 to 3 minutes.
Stir in sprouts and red pepper and
cook 1 to 2 minutes.
Stir in remaining ingredients and remove from heat.
Serve hot with soy sauce.

question: How do I make cheesy jalapeño poppers?
answer:
Title: Poppers
Ingredients:
1 dozen jalapeno peppers
1- 8 oz. pkg. cream cheese
1-1/2 c. self-rising flour
1-1/2 c. canola oil
water
Directions:
Wash peppers and slice in half lengthwise removing all seeds, being careful not to rub your eyes and wash your hands thoroughly when done.
Stuff each pepper half thoroughly with cream cheese. In med saucepan heat oil on med-high heat until oil is hot.
In a med size bowl mix all of flour with enough water to make batter consistency thick enough to cling to peppers.
Place poppers 6 at a time in hot oil.
Let cook until crisp turning over to cook both sides.
(New oil will not allow batter to brown as well.)
Remove cooked peppers from oil and drain on paper towels.
Serve hot.

question: How do I make cheesy jalapeño poppers?
answer:
Title: Poppers
Ingredients:
fresh jalapeno peppers
Monterey Jack cheese, shredded
1/2 c. milk
1 egg
3/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
oil
Directions:
Slice open one side of pepper.
Clean out seeds, depending on taste.
Fill with cheese.
Mix milk, egg, flour and salt.
Beat into batter.
Heat oil.
Dip into batter.
Deep fry.
Drain on paper towel.

question: How do I make cheesy jalapeño poppers?
answer:
Title: Doris' Jalapeno Pepper Poppers
Ingredients:
10 medium fresh jalapeno peppers
4 oz. cream cheese, softened
10 bacon strips, halved
Directions:
Cut peppers in half; remove seeds. Stuff with 2 tablespoons of cream cheese. Wrap with slice of bacon and secure with toothpick. Place on broiler rack that has been coated with nonstick spray. Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes or until bacon is crisp.

question: How do I make cheesy jalapeño poppers?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Jalapeno Appetizer
Ingredients:
1 small can jalapeno peppers, chopped and rinsed
1 1/2 lb. grated medium sharp Cheddar cheese
1 1/2 lb. Monterey Jack cheese
5 well-beaten eggs
Directions:
Put grated cheese in buttered 9 x 13-inch pan.
Pour peppers on top.
Pour beaten eggs over entire pan.
Bake at 300° for 45 minutes.
Serve warm or cold.

question: How do I make cheesy jalapeño poppers?
answer:
Title: Cherry Tomato Poppers
Ingredients:
1 to 2 pkg. cherry tomatoes
1 to 2 cloves fresh minced garlic
1 to 2 tsp. dried or fresh oregano
1 to 2 tsp. dried or fresh parsley
1 to 2 Tbsp. olive oil
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Cut cherry tomatoes in half. Mix minced garlic, oregano, parsley, salt and pepper and oil in a large mixing bowl. Add cut tomatoes and mix gently with clean hands to coat tomato halves. Place on cookie baking sheet with the cut side up. Bake in low temperature oven, 175° to 195°, for 2 to 4 hours. Be careful, they can dehydrate too far. After the first 1.5 hours of cooking, check every 30 minutes for desired consistency. Serve warm on toast points, crackers or crispy French bread.

question: What can I make with zucchini and parmesan?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Parmesan
Ingredients:
2 tsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, coarsely chopped
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
2 medium firm red tomatoes (3/4 lb.)
2 medium zucchini (3/4 lb.)
1/4 tsp. basil (fresh if available)
1/4 tsp. oregano (fresh if available)
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1/4 c. Italian bread crumbs
1/2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
1/4 tsp. paprika (optional)
cooked pasta or rice
Directions:
In heavy skillet (with metal handle) heat oil.
Add onion and saute until golden.
Add garlic and cook until slightly brown. Stir in tomatoes.
Cook, stirring occasionally, for 2 minutes.

question: What can I make with zucchini and parmesan?
answer:
Title: Fried Zucchini Flowers
Ingredients:
24 flower blossoms
3 eggs
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 Tbsp. parsley
1/2 clove garlic, minced (optional)
1 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Wash blossoms and remove inner small piece, drain and wrap in paper towel while making batter.
Beat eggs with salt, flour and baking powder.
Dip 1 flower at a time into batter and fry until golden.
Eat as appetizer.

question: What can I make with zucchini and parmesan?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Parmesan
Ingredients:
1/2 c. grated parmesan cheese
6 medium zucchini, sliced
2/3 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 large clove garlic, minced
1/4 tsp. each of salt, pepper, oregano and rosemary
4 c. peeled tomatoes
1/4 c. olive oil
Directions:
Heat oil in a skillet and add zucchini, onion, parsley and the spices.
Saute mixture over medium heat, stirring often until zucchini is done but still crisp and tender.
Toss in chopped tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes.
Turn mixture into a serving dish and sprinkle with the parmesan cheese.

question: What can I make with zucchini and parmesan?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Parmesan
Ingredients:
5 small zucchini (approximately 1 lb.)
1/2 tsp. each: salt, pepper and paprika
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese, grated
4 Tbsp. butter, melted
Directions:
Scrub but do not peel zucchini; trim ends.
Cut the zucchini into 2-inch lengths, then cut each length into quarters, lengthwise.
Bring zucchini to a boil in salted water to cover; simmer until tender, but not soft.
Drain thoroughly.
Butter a 9-inch ovenproof dish; arrange zucchini in a layer over the bottom.
Sprinkle with salt, pepper, paprika and cheese.
Pour the melted butter over all.
Place under the broiler until cheese is melted.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What can I make with zucchini and parmesan?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Parmesan
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
3 zucchini, cut in chunks
1/2 lb. Mozzarella cheese, cut in chunks
dash of salt
1 Tbsp. parsley
1/2 c. bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. butter
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Pour oil in bottom of 8-inch baking dish.
Add zucchini and Mozzarella cubes, salt and parsley.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
Cover with bread crumbs.
Dot with butter.
Bake uncovered 45 to 50 minutes or until golden brown.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Creamy Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1 C. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 C. sour cream
1/2 C. cottage cheese
1 Tbsp. dried onion flakes
1 tsp. lemon juice
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Chill for two hours. Return to room temperature before serving.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Creamy Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and well drained (or you can use 1 can spinach, drained)
1 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing or Miracle Whip Light
1 c. sour cream
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1/4 c. green onion slices
1 tsp. dill weed
1/2 tsp. lemon pepper
Directions:
Combine ingredients; mix well. Chill and serve with assorted vegetable dippers.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Creamy Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
8 oz. sour cream
1 c. mayonnaise
1 tsp. celery salt
1/2 tsp. dill weed
1/4 tsp. onion salt
1/4 c. chopped green onions
3 c. frozen cut leaf spinach, thawed and drained
8 oz. can water chestnuts, drained and finely chopped
3 Tbsp. chopped red pepper
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients.
Mix well.
Stir in onions, spinach, water chestnuts and red pepper.
Cover and refrigerate until flavor blends.
Serve with vegetables or assorted crackers.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Best Spinach Dip Ever
Ingredients:
2 1/3 cup fat free/light sour cream
1 pkg. Dry onion soup mix (1.8 oz; Lipton's)
4 oz can drained and chopped water chestnuts
10 oz pkg frozen chopped spinach (thaw, drain and squeeze all the water out)
1 oz pkg of light/no fat cream cheese
1 pound round loaf sour dough bread (or similar)
Directions:
Mix sour cream, Ranch Dressing mix, onion soup mix, water chestnuts, cream cheese, and chopped spinach in a bowl.
Chill for 6 hours or overnight. Remove the top from the bread and make a bowl. Cut the carved-out bread top into bite-sized cubes for dining. Serve in bread bowl.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Creamy Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) sour cream
1 c. mayonnaise
1/2 tsp. celery salt
1/2 tsp. dill weed
1/4 tsp. onion salt
1/4 c. chopped green onions
3 c. frozen cut leaf spinach, well drained
1 (8 oz.) can water chestnuts, drained, finely chopped
3 Tbsp. chopped red pepper (optional)
Directions:
In medium bowl, combine sour cream, mayonnaise and seasonings. Stir in onions, spinach, water chestnuts and pepper.
Cover; refrigerate to blend flavors.
Serve with crisp vegetable dippers, assorted crackers or bread.
Makes 3 1/2 cups.

question: How do I make a simple apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
1/4 c. oats
1 c. packed brown sugar
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
3 to 4 green apples, peeled and sliced to make 6 c.
1 Tbsp. flour
1 Tbsp. white sugar
3/4 c. melted butter
Directions:
Mix together 1 1/2 cups flour, oats, brown sugar, cinnamon and melted butter.
Press 1/2 of mixture in bottom of a 9 x 12-inch greased baking dish.
In a large bowl, combine sliced apples with 1 tablespoon flour and 1 tablespoon sugar.
Turn into crust. Sprinkle with remaining half of mixture.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour. Serve warm with whipped cream or ice cream, if desired.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make a simple apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
1 c. brown sugar
5 oz. all-purpose white flour
4 to 6 c. cooking apples (1 1/2 to 2 lb.), peeled, cored and thinly sliced
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 c. butter
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 tsp. lemon rind, grated
Directions:
Combine 1/2 cup sugar and 1 ounce flour in mixing bowl. Squeeze lemon juice over apple slices.
Toss apples with sugar mixture.
Put
in
ovenproof
baking
dish.
Thoroughly
mix butter,
remaining
flour
and
cinnamon.
Add
lemon rind and remaining
1/2 cup of sugar.
Sprinkle mixture over apples and bake
in
oven
at 350° for 30 minutes or until golden.
Serve warm with ice cream.

question: How do I make a simple apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Crumbled Apple Dessert
Ingredients:
4 to 6 apples, sliced
2/3 c. light brown sugar
dash of cinnamon
3 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. cold water
1/2 c. brown sugar
1 c. flour
1/2 c. butter
pinch of salt
Directions:
Slice
apples
in deep baking dish.
Cover with 2/3 cup brown sugar,
cinnamon
and butter.
Sprinkle cold water over all. Combine
1/2
cup brown sugar, flour, 1/2 cup butter and salt to form
a crumbly mixture.
Put on top of apples.
Bake for 30
to 40
minutes or until apples are tender and crust a golden brown.

question: How do I make a simple apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Crumbled Apples
Ingredients:
6 tart apples
1/4 c. flour
3/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon
4 Tbsp. butter
3/4 c. hot water
Directions:
Quarter apples and place in buttered pan.
Mix flour, sugar, cinnamon, butter and water.
Pour over apples and bake at 350°. Can be served hot or cold or with milk.

question: How do I make a simple apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Simple Apple Cake
Ingredients:
4 c. sliced apples, peeled and cored
2 1/4 c. sugar
2 c. sifted flour
2 tsp. cinnamon
2 tsp. baking soda
2 tsp. salt
2 eggs
nuts and raisins to taste (1/2 to 1 c. each)
1/2 c. Milnot
1/4 c. margarine
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Lightly grease or coat with nonstick cooking spray a 9 x 13-inch pan.

question: What’s a good recipe for a quinoa salad?
answer:
Title: 6-Cup Salad("Quik-N-Ez")
Ingredients:
1 c. pineapple tidbits
1 c. mandarin oranges
1 c. shredded coconut
1 c. fruit cocktail
1 c. mini marshmallows
1 c. sour cream
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a large bowl.
Mix well.
Chill as long as possible or overnight.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for a quinoa salad?
answer:
Title: Pseudo-Southwestern Quinoa
Ingredients:
1 c. quinoa
1 t. ginger, minced
1 3/4 c. water 1/2 t. dulce or kelp powder
2 T. lemon juice
2 serrano peppers
1 t. oregano, dried
1 avocado, diced and drenched with lime juice
4 green onions chopped
2 ears fresh corn on the cob, cut off corn
1/2 diced green bell pepper
1/2 c. diced red sweet pepper
1/4 c. olive oil or flax seed oil
1 bunch cilantro chopped
Directions:
First of all quinoa (pronounced "keen-wa") is an alkalizing grain.
It is hardy and contains the highest amount if protein of any grain.
It cooks quickly and makes a delicious, crunchy dish. It is high in calcium, phosphorus, iron, B vitamins, and vitamin E and has an ideal balance of amino acids.
Wash quinoa thoroughly to remove the saponin, the rust-colored coating that protects this seed against insects, birds, and the sun.
While cooking, the germ on the outside of the grain unfolds like a partial spiral giving the finished cooked product a lovely appearance.

question: What’s a good recipe for a quinoa salad?
answer:
Title: Quinoa Tabouleh
Ingredients:
1 c. quinoa
2 c. water
2 medium tomatoes, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
6 green onions with tops, finely chopped
1 medium cucumber, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 small green bell pepper, seeded and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 c. finely chopped fresh parsley
1/2 c. finely chopped fresh mint
1/3 c. freshly squeezed lemon juice
1/3 c. olive oil
1 garlic clove, minced
1 tsp. fine sea salt
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
Put the quinoa in a wire strainer and thoroughly rinse with hot water to remove any bitter flavor.

question: What’s a good recipe for a quinoa salad?
answer:
Title: Spinach Quiche
Ingredients:
3 eggs, well beaten
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and well drained
2 c. low-fat cottage cheese (small curd)
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
3 Tbsp. shredded Swiss cheese
1/2 tsp. Dijon mustard
1/4 tsp. instant minced onion
1/4 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. red pepper
1/8 tsp. salt
vegetable cooking spray
Directions:
Combine first 10 ingredients; mix well.
Pour into a 9-inch pie plate coated with cooking spray.
Bake at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes or until set.
Yields 6 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a quinoa salad?
answer:
Title: Quinoam, Leek And Tofu Casserole
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. tofu
2 tsp. sesame oil
1 clove garlic, pressed
1 leek, chopped
2 c. cooked quinoa
1 tsp. sea salt or 2 tsp. shoyu
dash of black pepper
1 c. bread crumbs
1 c. soymilk (optional)
1/2 c. cheese, grated (optional)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Working with 1/2 cup tofu at a time, squeeze out water with hands.
Set aside.
Heat a large skillet or wok; add oil.
Add garlic, then leek.
Saute until lightly browned.
Add quinoa, then tofu, sauteing for 2 minutes after each addition.
Add seasonings.
Oil casserole.
Add 1/2 cup bread crumbs; rotate casserole to coat evenly.
Gently add the quinoa mixture.
Press a well in the center of the quinoa; pour in soymilk.
Cover with remaining bread crumbs and cheese.
Cover; bake for 20 minutes.
Remove cover; continue to bake until cheese is nicely browned.

question: What’s a good recipe for a taco seasoning mix?
answer:
Title: Taco Seasoning Mix
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. flour
2 tsp. chili powder
1 1/2 tsp. dried minced onion
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. paprika
3/4 tsp. crushed beef bouillon cube
1/4 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
dash onion powder
1 banana, cut into pieces
1 orange, cut into quarters
2 cups orange juice
4 ounces Cool Whip
1-1/2 cups ice
1 (12 ounce) can pineapple juice
3 cups sugar
1/2 cup Smuckers orange marmalade
1/4 cup lemon juice
1 btl (32 ounce) orange-flavor seltzer water
1 pint orange sherbet
1 orange, thinly sliced
1/2 cup maraschino cherries
Directions:
Add ice cubes before serving.
(12 servings.)

question: What’s a good recipe for a taco seasoning mix?
answer:
Title: Taco Seasoning Mix
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. instant onion
2 Tbsp. green pepper flakes
1 Tbsp. salt
1 Tbsp. chili powder
1 1/2 tsp. cornstarch
1 1/2 tsp. instant minced garlic
3/4 tsp. dried oregano
1 tsp. black pepper
1 1/2 tsp. crushed red pepper
1 1/2 tsp. ground cumin
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a bowl and blend thoroughly.
(It is important that the ingredients be evenly distributed.)
Divide on three 6-inch squares of aluminum foil.
Fold foil to make airtight packages.
Label.
Store in cool dry place.
Keeps up to 6 months.

question: What’s a good recipe for a taco seasoning mix?
answer:
Title: Tex Mix
Ingredients:
1 pkg. taco seasoning mix
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 c. sour cream
2 cans jalapeno bean dip (I use refried beans)
2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
2 or 3 green onions, sliced thin
1 large can pitted black olives, sliced
4 tomatoes, chopped (I use canned chopped tomatoes, drained)
Directions:
Mix taco seasoning mix, mayonnaise and sour cream; set aside. Spread bean dip in 9 x 13-inch pan.
Spread taco mix on top of bean dip.
Layer onions, olives and tomatoes and top with shredded cheese.
Refrigerate.

question: What’s a good recipe for a taco seasoning mix?
answer:
Title: Taco Seasoning(Healthy Mixes U-Make)
Ingredients:
1 c. dried minced onion
1/3 c. chili powder
2 Tbsp. cumin
4 tsp. crushed red pepper
1 Tbsp. oregano
4 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. onion powder
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and store in airtight container in a cool, dry place.

question: What’s a good recipe for a taco seasoning mix?
answer:
Title: M'M Good Taco Pie
Ingredients:
1 taco seasoning mix
1 deep dish pie shell
1 lb. ground beef
1 medium onion, chopped
1 (8 1/4 oz.) can refried beans
1 (8 oz.) jar taco sauce, divided usage
2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese, divided usage
1 to 1 1/2 c. Nachips or Fritos, crushed
tomatoes
sour cream
lettuce
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Thaw pie crust 10 minutes.
Prick bottom of pie shell thoroughly with a fork.
Bake pie shell for 10 minutes.
Remove from oven and reduce temperature to 350°.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut butter cheesecake?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Cheesecake Bars
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
3/4 c. brown sugar, firmly packed
1 1/2 c. chopped peanuts
1/2 c. margarine, melted
1 beaten egg
2 tsp. vanilla, divided
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk
2 eggs
1/3 c. sugar
2 c. creamy peanut butter
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar, half the chopped peanuts and margarine until crumbly.
Stir in the beaten eggs and 1 teaspoon vanilla. Mix well.
Press into bottom of 15 x 10-inch jelly roll pan and bake at 350° for 15 minutes.
Beat cream cheese until fluffy. Beat in condensed milk, 2 remaining eggs, sugar and peanut butter. Add remaining teaspoon of vanilla and mix until smooth.
Pour over prepared crust and sprinkle the remaining peanuts on top.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes until set.
Cool and cut into bars.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut butter cheesecake?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Cheesecake
Ingredients:
2 c. graham cracker crumbs
1 1/4 c. peanut butter, divided
4 pkg. cream cheese (8 oz.), at room temperature
1/4 c. sour cream
5 eggs
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. honey
1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
peanut butter and peanut brittle for garnish
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Coat 9-inch spring-form pan with nonstick cooking spray.
For crust:
In bowl combine graham cracker crumbs and 3/4 cup peanut butter.
Press onto bottom and 3/4 way up sides of pan; freeze 15 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut butter cheesecake?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Cheesecake
Ingredients:
25 Oreo cookies
1/4 c. margarine
2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1/2 c. peanut butter
4 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. sugar
1 pt. whipping cream, whipped with 2 Tbsp. sugar
Hershey's chocolate syrup
Cool Whip
Directions:
Crush cookies and blend with margarine.
Press firmly on bottom of a 9-inch spring-form pan. Chill.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut butter cheesecake?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Chip Cheesecake
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. graham cracker crumbs
1/3 c. butter or margarine, melted
1/3 c. cocoa
1/3 c. plus 1 1/2 c. sugar, divided
3 pkg. (8 oz.) cream cheese, softened
4 eggs
2 tsp. vanilla extract
1 2/3 c. (10 oz. pkg.) peanut butter chips
Chocolate Drizzle
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
In small bowl, stir together graham cracker crumbs, butter, cocoa and 1/3 cup sugar.
Press evenly onto bottom of 9-inch spring-form pan.
In large mixer bowl, beat cream cheese and remaining 1 1/2 cups sugar until smooth.
Add eggs and vanilla, beat just until combined.
Stir in peanut butter chips; pour over prepared crust.
Bake 50 to 55 minutes or until slightly puffed and center is set except for 4-inch circle in center, remove from pan. Cool 30 minutes.
With knife, loosen cheesecake from side of pan. Cool completely, remove side of pan.
Using tip of spoon, drizzle Chocolate Drizzle across top of cheesecake.
Refrigerate several hours before serving.
Cover, refrigerate leftover cheesecake.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut butter cheesecake?
answer:
Title: Apple Cheesecake
Ingredients:
2 envelopes unflavored gelatin
1/3 c. cold water
1 3/4 c. apple juice
1/2 c. sugar
3 egg yolks, beaten
3 pkg. (8 oz. each) cream cheese, softened
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
1 c. whipping cream, whipped
1/2 c. chopped dry roasted peanuts
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 c. applesauce
1/3 c. packed brown sugar
1/4 tsp. ground cinnamon
Additional whipped cream, cinnamon and peanuts, optional
Directions:
In a small bowl, soften gelatin in water; let stand for 2 minutes. In a saucepan over medium heat, cook and stir apple juice, sugar, egg yolks and gelatin mixture until gelatin is dissolved. Cool to room temperature. In a large mixing bowl, beat the cream cheese, cinnamon and nutmeg until smooth. Gradually beat in gelatin mixture until smooth. Chill until slightly thickened, about 20 minutes. Fold in cream. Pour into an ungreased 9 inch spring form pan. Chill 4 hours or overnight. In a saucepan over medium heat, brown peanuts in butter for 2 minutes. Add applesauce, brown sugar and cinnamon; cook and stir for 5 minutes. Cool. Spread over top of cheesecake. If desired, garnish with whipped cream, cinnamon and peanuts.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato bisque?
answer:
Title: Tomato Bisque
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter
1 medium onion
1 clove garlic, minced
5 large ripe red tomatoes
1 Tbsp. fresh basil, chopped
1/4 tsp. mustard powder
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper, ground
1/4 c. tomato paste
1/4 c. flour
2 c. chicken broth
4 Tbsp. sherry (optional)
2 c. light cream
Directions:
In a deep saucepan, melt butter.
Saute onion and garlic until golden.
Slice tomatoes and add with dry mustard, salt and pepper. Simmer, uncovered, 8 to 10 minutes.
Stir in tomato paste.
(If tomatoes are not full flavored, you may wish to add more paste.) Add flour and chicken broth, then bring to a boil, stirring constantly.
Puree in a blender, then strain to remove seeds and skins.
Add 1 to 2 cups light cream.
Reheat to serve, but do not boil.
Add sherry to taste.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato bisque?
answer:
Title: Tomato Bisque
Ingredients:
2 lb. ripe tomatoes or 2 (15 oz.) cans tomatoes, chopped
1 medium onion, chopped
1 Tbsp. butter
1 bay leaf
1 heaping tsp. brown sugar
2 tsp. basil, finely chopped
2 whole cloves
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 pt. light cream
1 c. milk
6 large croutons, buttered
2 Tbsp. chives, chopped
Directions:
Peel and seed tomatoes.
Saute onion in butter and add the chopped tomatoes, bay leaf, sugar, cloves, salt, pepper and basil. Simmer, stirring occasionally, until tomatoes are thoroughly cooked, about 25 minutes.
Remove bay leaf and cloves and transfer soup to blender or food processor to puree.
Add cream and milk and heat.
Serve topped with toasted buttered croutons.
Sprinkle with chives.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato bisque?
answer:
Title: Creamy Shrimp Bisque
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. olive oil
2 lb. shrimp (shelled and deveined, save shells)
1 celery stalk, chopped
1 c. wine
1 bay leaf
1/4 tsp. cayenne
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
4 Tbsp. butter
1 large onion, chopped
1 carrot, chopped
2 1/2 c. water
1/4 c. regular long grain rice
1/2 tsp. salt
3 chicken flavored bouillon cubes
2 c. heavy cream
Directions:
In a 4-quart pot over medium-high heat, cook shrimp shells in hot olive oil until pink, constantly stirring with slotted spoon. Discard shells, leaving flavored oil in pot.
Add shrimp to oil and cook, over medium-high heat, stirring frequently, until shrimp turn pink, about 3 minutes; spoon into bowl.
Reduce heat to medium.
Add butter and chopped vegetables, cook until tender, stirring occasionally.
Stir in remaining ingredients with the exception of the tomatoes and cream, reduce heat to low, cover and simmer until rice is tender (about 15 minutes).
Remove pot from heat, discard bay leaf, drain juice from tomatoes, remove seeds from tomatoes, stir tomatoes into rice combo and add shrimp.
In blender at high speed, blend mixture, one half at a time, until smooth.
Return shrimp mixture to pot, stir in cream.
Bring to short of boiling, over medium heat.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato bisque?
answer:
Title: Tomato Creme Bisque
Ingredients:
1 can bisque of tomato
1/3 c. sour cream
1 c. water
Directions:
In saucepan, blend soup and sour cream.
Gradually stir in water.
Heat and stir.
Makes 2 to 3 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato bisque?
answer:
Title: Curry Tomato Bisque
Ingredients:
1 to 2 large onions, finely chopped
1/4 c. butter
2 Tbsp. curry powder
salt to taste
pepper to taste
6 c. chicken broth
2 c. sliced carrots
1 c. rice, uncooked
1 qt. whole tomatoes
1 c. cream
1 c. milk
Directions:
Saute onions in butter.
Add curry powder, salt and pepper. Cook 5 minutes or until onion is tender.
Add chicken broth, carrots, rice and tomatoes.
Cook for 1/2 hour.
Flavor to taste with salt and pepper, if necessary.
Add cream and milk just before serving.
Do not boil.
Add a little butter at the end (optional).

question: How do I make a simple teriyaki sauce?
answer:
Title: "Make Your Own" Teriyaki Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. soy sauce
1 c. sherry (the real kind) or dilute to 1/2 c. sherry and 1/2 c. water
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 medium onion, chopped fine
1/2 tsp. dry ginger
2 tsp. sugar
2 whole chickens (fryers)
3 lb. ground meat
1 pork roast
6 to 7 small cans corn (whole kernel)
6 to 7 cans whole tomatoes
2 cans tomato sauce
1 can tomato paste (the smallest can)
2 (32 oz. size) bottles ketchup
1 lemon, squeezed and seeded (use juice only)
2 large onions, diced
2/3 c. vinegar (white)
1/2 c. sugar (white granulated)
1/2 c. sugar (brown granulated)
2 Tbsp. yellow mustard
1/3 stick butter
1 bottle hot sauce
salt and pepper to taste (to season meats as they are cooking)
1 fresh ham with the bone in it (9 to 14 lb.)
salt to taste
black pepper
2 garlic cloves, chopped
2 Tbsp. corn oil or vegetable cooking oil
2 large onions, peeled and left whole
1 whole chicken or if white meat is preferred, use breast filets
1 can Veg-All mixed vegetables
1 can Campbell's cream of chicken soup
2 deep dish pie shells, at room temperature
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Remove the skin from the chicken.
Place in a pot with enough water to cover the chicken.
Boil in a medium pot until tender.
Add the Veg-All and the cream of chicken soup. Mix well.

question: How do I make a simple teriyaki sauce?
answer:
Title: Teriyaki Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. soy sauce
1/2 c. sherry or wine
1/2 c. water
1/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. ginger
1 clove garlic, minced
boiling water
1 tsp. fresh lemon juice
pinch of white pepper
2 egg yolks
2 oz. (1/8 lb.) butter
pinch of salt
Directions:
Preheat the blender.
Put the butter on medium heat. Beat the yolks.
When the butter just starts to sizzle, pour it slowly into the beaten yolks (while beating) through the barely open top of the blender.
Add lemon juice.
Add salt and white pepper to taste.

question: How do I make a simple teriyaki sauce?
answer:
Title: Teriyaki Sauce
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/3 c. soy sauce
1/4 c. sugar
1 clove garlic, minced or mashed
2 tsp. fresh ginger, minced (or 1/2 tsp. ground ginger)
1/4 c. dry white wine (optional)
2 c. regular-strength beef broth (or 2 1/4 c., if wine is omitted)
Directions:
In a pan, blend together the cornstarch, soy sauce, sugar, garlic and fresh or ground ginger. Stir in wine, if used, and the beef broth. Cook, stirring until thickened. Makes about 2 1/2 cups.

question: How do I make a simple teriyaki sauce?
answer:
Title: Teriyaki Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. lite soy sauce
2 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 garlic or less
2 tsp. ginger
2 tsp. mustard (dried)
Directions:
Mix; marinate meat at least 1/2 hour.
Great with steak or chicken.

question: How do I make a simple teriyaki sauce?
answer:
Title: Chicken Teriyaki
Ingredients:
1/2 c. soy sauce
1/4 c. orange juice
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 Tbsp. freshly grated ginger or 1 tsp. ground ginger
2 Tbsp. sherry
3 garlic cloves, mashed
2 medium green peppers, cut into 1-inch squares
12 cherry tomatoes
12 medium mushrooms
12 pearl onions
1 1/2 lb. chicken breasts, boned, skinned and cut into 4 x 1/2-inch strips
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients in large shallow dish; stir with ladle.
Add vegetables and chicken; toss to coat.
Let marinate in refrigerator for several hours.
Toss occasionally.
Thread vegetables on 12 (6-inch) skewers alternating vegetables and chicken, weaving chicken strips in an accordion fashion.
Broil about 6 inches from heat, about 3 minutes on each side.
Baste chicken and vegetables thoroughly with marinade while broiling. Makes 6 servings (2 skewers each).

question: How do I make homemade BBQ pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Cocktail Pork Bbq
Ingredients:
1 lb. stewing beef, cubed
1 lb. pork, cubed
1 can tomato soup
1 c. water
1/3 bottle Worcestershire sauce
1 onion, chopped
1/3 c. sugar
1/2 c. vinegar
Directions:
Combine all ingredients
and simmer 3 hours.
Mash with potato masher; continue cooking until thick as desired.
Serve in chafing dish
with small rolls.
Triple amount for cocktail party.

question: How do I make homemade BBQ pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Barbecue Pork
Ingredients:
2 lb. meat, cut in cubes and cooked
1/4 c. drippings
1 medium onion, chopped
1/2 c. chopped celery or celery seed
1/4 tsp. pepper
3/4 tsp. Accent
2 garlic, crushed, or granulated garlic
1/2 c. water
1/4 c. vinegar
1/3 c. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. chili powder
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
Directions:
Heat drippings in saucepan.
Add other ingredients and simmer 2 or 3 minutes.
Add pork and simmer 5 to 10 minutes, longer if time permits.
Serve on buns or use as main dish.
The longer it simmers, the better it is.

question: How do I make homemade BBQ pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Texas Bbq Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 stick of butter
1 small onion (chopped)
1 clove garlic (minced)
1 tsp. celery salt
1 cup catsup
1/2 cup vinegar
1 1/2 cups water
1/4 cup worcestershire sauce
3 bay leaves
1 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. chili powder
Directions:
Melt butter.
Add onion, garlic and celery.
Cook until onion is tender.
Stir in water, catsup, vinegar, worcestershire sauce, bay leaves and pepper.
Simmer for 20 minutes.
Remove a little of the sauce and mix with chili powder, then add to the rest of the sauce.
Let stand at room temperature for 1 hour before serving.

question: How do I make homemade BBQ pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Eastern Style Barbecue Pork
Ingredients:
1 Boston butt (about 5 lb.)
1 pt. cider vinegar
2 tsp. salt
2 tsp. ground red pepper
1 Tbsp. red pepper flakes
2 Tbsp. firmly packed brown sugar
Directions:
Combine everything but the meat in a saucepan and heat until boiling.
In a baking pan, place the pork.
Add a little sauce on top and cover with foil.
Cook at 350° for 2 hours or as many hours as it takes your pork to be done.
Finely chop the pork and add a little more sauce.
This recipe is great with the Barbecue Slaw and Baked Beans.

question: How do I make homemade BBQ pulled pork?
answer:
Title: White Bbq Sauce For Chicken
Ingredients:
2/3 c. butter or oleo
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
few grains cayenne pepper
2 Tbsp. flour
2/3 c. water or stock
2 Tbsp. chopped pickle
1 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 c. vinegar
1/4 tsp. Tabasco sauce
Directions:
Melt oleo.
Combine
dry
ingredients
and add to oleo. Stir until well blended.
Remove from heat.
Combine remaining ingredients and gradually stir into butter mixture.
Return to heat.
Stir until thick and smooth.
Enough for 2 chickens.

question: Can you suggest a sugar-free dessert recipe?
answer:
Title: Fat-Free Strawberry Dessert(My Personal Recipe)
Ingredients:
1 box fat-free angel food cake
fresh strawberries
1 (8 oz.) container fat-free yogurt
Directions:
Prepare cake mix according to directions.
Wash and slice strawberries and add yogurt.
Mix well.
Place a slice of cake on plate; top with strawberry yogurt mix and add fat-free whipped cream if you desire.
Light and fresh!

question: Can you suggest a sugar-free dessert recipe?
answer:
Title: Sugar-Free Snack Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. raisins
1 c. prunes, cooked and chopped
1 c. water
1/2 c. butter
1/4 tsp. salt
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. self-rising flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 c. nuts, chopped
Directions:
Bring fruits and water to a boil.
Add butter and boil for 5 minutes.
Set aside to cool.
Add remaining ingredients to mixture.
Bake in 11 x 7 x 2-inch pan that has been greased.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
Cool and cut in squares.

question: Can you suggest a sugar-free dessert recipe?
answer:
Title: Low Calorie Dessert
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar-free drink mix
1 envelope unflavored gelatin
Directions:
Mix sugar-free drink mix with water as directed on package. Mix well and bring to boil.
Cool.
Add unflavored gelatin and mix until dissolved.
Pour into mold and chill in refrigerator until firm.
Makes 4 servings.
One serving equals negligible calories and free exchange.

question: Can you suggest a sugar-free dessert recipe?
answer:
Title: Sugar-Free One Layer Yellow Cake
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. self-rising flour
1/2 c. fructose sweetener
1/3 c. shortening
1 egg
3/4 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla
2 boxes sugar-free instant vanilla pudding
3 c. milk
3 bananas, sliced
1 regular size can crushed pineapple (in its own juice)
Cool Whip
nuts
1 box vanilla sugar-free pudding
Chocolate Sauce
sliced almonds
Directions:
Mix sugar-free pudding according to directions.
Let set. Spoon all of pudding between the 2 layers of cake.
Top with Chocolate Sauce and sliced almonds.

question: Can you suggest a sugar-free dessert recipe?
answer:
Title: Sugarless Cake*
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 1/2 c. applesauce
1 c. dates or raisins
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 c. whole wheat flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. cloves
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. nuts or cranberries
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients.
Beat eggs and vanilla; add to dry mixture.
Add melted butter, applesauce, raisins and nuts.
Bake in tube pan in 350 °oven for 45 minutes to 1 hour.

question: How do I make chocolate chip oatmeal cookies?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. shortening
1/4 c. peanut butter
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. brown sugar
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. salt
2 c. rolled oats
1 to 2 c. chocolate chips
1 c. chopped nuts (optional)
Directions:
Cream together first 6 ingredients.
Add remaining ingredients.
Mix well.
Drop by teaspoon on greased cookie sheet. Bake at 375° for about 10 minutes.
Makes 6 to 8 dozen.

question: How do I make chocolate chip oatmeal cookies?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
3/4 c. sugar
3/4 c. brown sugar
1 c. shortening
2 eggs
1 1/2 c. sifted flour
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. peanut butter
2 (8 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips
2 Tbsp. hot water
2 c. oatmeal (old fashioned)
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together in large bowl.
Drop by teaspoon onto greased cookie tin.
Bake at 350° for 8 to 10 minutes. Yields 2 to 3 dozen cookies.

question: How do I make chocolate chip oatmeal cookies?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. butter flavored shortening
1 1/4 c. brown sugar
2 eggs
2 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. baking soda
2 c. (12 oz.) chocolate chips
1 c. chopped nuts
1/2 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. milk
1 3/4 c. flour
2 1/2 c. oatmeal
Directions:
Beat margarine and sugar until creamy.
Add eggs, milk and vanilla and beat well.
Add flour, baking soda and salt.
Mix well. On ungreased cookie sheet, drop by tablespoonful.
Bake at 375° for 10 to 12 minutes.
Cool one minute before removing from cookie sheet.
Cool completely on cooling rack.

question: How do I make chocolate chip oatmeal cookies?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip-Oatmeal Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. butter
1 c. sugar
1 c. brown sugar
2 eggs
2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. soda
1 tsp. salt
2 c. oatmeal
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 c. chocolate chips
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
Beat butter and sugars until creamy. Add eggs and vanilla. Beat well. Add flour, soda and salt. Beat well. Stir in oatmeal, chocolate chips and nuts. Bake at 375° for 8 to 10 minutes.
Makes about 4 to 5 dozen.

question: How do I make chocolate chip oatmeal cookies?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. margarine or butter
1 1/4 c. brown sugar
1/2 c. sugar
2 eggs
2 Tbsp. milk
2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
2 1/2 c. oatmeal, uncooked
1 c. chopped nuts
1 (12 oz.) bag chocolate chips
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°.
Beat butter and sugar until creamy.
Add eggs, milk and vanilla.
Beat well.
