Add flour, baking soda and salt.
Mix well.
Stir in oatmeal, chips and nuts.
Drop by teaspoonful on an ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake 9 to 10 minutes for chewy cookie or 12 to 13 minutes for crispy cookie.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Shrimp With Coconut Milk(Ginataang Hipon)
Ingredients:
1 lb. shrimp
1 1/2 lb. green beans
1 can coconut milk
hot green pepper (jalapeno)
ginger
cooking oil
Directions:
Saute ginger and shrimp.
Add coconut milk and let it simmer for about 5 minutes.
Lastly, add pepper and green beans.
Cover and let it boil until vegetable is cooked.
Do not overcook vegetables.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Coconut Shrimp
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1 1/2 c. flour
1/2 c. dark rum
1/4 c. milk
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. ground cloves
1/4 tsp. ground allspice
1/4 tsp. black pepper
2 c. shredded coconut
16 medium-sized shrimp, peeled and deveined
vegetable oil for frying
Directions:
In medium-sized bowl, mix eggs, 1 cup flour, rum, milk, baking powder and spices.
Place remaining flour in small bowl.
Spread coconut on small plate.
Dredge shrimp in flour, then dunk it in the batter, then dredge it in coconut.
Place coated shrimp on waxed paper.
Carefully drop shrimp in hot oil and fry 3 to 5 minutes.
Drain on paper towels and serve hot.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Curry With Coconut Milk
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 large onion, finely chopped
1 cardamom pod, crushed
1-inch piece cinnamon stick
4 cloves
salt to taste
4 whole black peppercorns
1/2 tsp. turmeric
1/2 tsp. chili powder
1 1/2 tsp. finely chopped ginger
1 1/2 tsp. finely chopped garlic
4 c. large peeled shrimp
2 c. coconut milk*
Directions:
Melt butter in a saucepan.
Add onion and brown.
Add all the spices and saute for 2 minutes.
Add shrimp and saute 1/2 minute. Add coconut milk (strained) and 1/4 cup shredded coconut that is leftover after straining.
Cover and cook on medium heat until the gravy thickens.
Serve over plain rice or polao.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Tropical Coconut Fried Shrimp
Ingredients:
2 lb. raw, peeled, deveined, large shrimp (fresh or frozen)
2 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 c. milk
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. curry powder
1/2 tsp. salt
2 to 3 c. shredded coconut
oil for frying
Sweet 'N Sour Sauce
Directions:
Thaw shrimp if frozen.
Measure 1 1/2 cups flour; set aside. In a 1-quart mixing bowl, combine the remaining 1 1/2 cups flour, milk, baking powder, curry powder and salt.
Place reserved flour and coconut in 2 separate shallow pans.
Dredge shrimp in flour, dip in bowl, then roll in coconut.
Fry in hot oil at 350° until coconut is golden brown.
Drain on paper towel before transfering to warming tray.
Serve hot with Sweet and Sour sauce.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.
Tail section may be left on for easier handling.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Polynesian Shrimp Curry
Ingredients:
2 c. milk
1 (3 1/2 oz.) can flaked coconut
1 lb. unpeeled medium size fresh shrimp
1 (15 1/4 oz.) can pineapple chunks, drained
1/2 c. butter or margarine, melted and divided
1 tsp. curry powder
1/3 c. chopped green onions
1/3 c. chopped celery
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1 1/4 c. chicken broth
hot cooked rice
Directions:
Combine milk and coconut in small saucepan; bring to boil. Reduce heat and simmer 2 minutes.
Strain mixture; set milk and coconut aside.
Peel and devein shrimp.
Saute shrimp and pineapple chunks in 1/4 cup butter in large skillet 3 to 5 minutes or until shrimp turn pink, stirring frequently.
Drain shrimp mixture and discard liquid.
Set shrimp mixture aside.
Combine remaining 1/4 cup butter and curry powder in large skillet; cook over low heat, stirring constantly, 2 minutes.
Add green onions and celery; cook, stirring constantly until crisp-tender.
Combine flour and garlic salt; add to onion mixture.
Cook 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Gradually add reserved coconut milk and chicken broth; cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until thickened and bubbly.
Stir in shrimp mixture and reserved coconut.
Serve over rice.
Yield:
4 servings.

question: What can I make with bell peppers and ground turkey?
answer:
Title: Turkey Stuffed Peppers
Ingredients:
2 large green or red bell peppers
1/2 c. chopped onions
1/2 lb. lean ground turkey
3/4 c. fresh or frozen corn
3/4 c. cooked brown rice
1/2 c. parsley, chopped
1/4 c. grated low calorie Mozzarella cheese (1 oz.)
2 garlic cloves, chopped
2 Tbsp. tomato paste
2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/3 tsp. ground black pepper
Directions:
Cut peppers lengthwise to form oval boats; remove seeds.
Boil them for 5 minutes or microwave them.
Drain and rinse with cold water.
In 10-inch frypan, saute onions and garlic for 2 minutes. Add ground turkey, tomato paste and corn, stirring frequently; cook 5 minutes.
Add rice, Worcestershire sauce and pepper; cook 2 minutes on low heat.
Fill each pepper boat with 1/4 of cooked turkey mixture.
Sprinkle each with cheese and broil or microwave on High for 2 minutes.
Serves 4. Contains 189 calories each serving.

question: What can I make with bell peppers and ground turkey?
answer:
Title: Smoked Turkey
Ingredients:
1 (15 to 20 lb.) turkey
ground cayenne pepper
1 onion
1/2 bell pepper, cut in 4 pieces
1 clove garlic
1 Tbsp. liquid smoke
2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
6 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
water to almost fill the pan
Directions:
Put on about 10 p.m. and cook all night.

question: What can I make with bell peppers and ground turkey?
answer:
Title: Easy Stuffed Peppers
Ingredients:
ground turkey (12 oz. - 3/4 lb.)
1 1/2 c. cooked rice (preferably brown rice)
1 c. finely chopped onion
1 tsp. dried oregano
4 large peppers
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
2 large eggs (1/4 c.)
1 c. tomato sauce
Directions:
Cut peppers in half (2 halves per person).
Blanch peppers for 3 minutes.
Drain.
Brown turkey meat.
Add and cook onions until soft.
Mix remaining ingredients, except tomato sauce.
Fill peppers.
Top with tomato sauce and cover with foil.

question: What can I make with bell peppers and ground turkey?
answer:
Title: Turkey Meat Loaf
Ingredients:
2 to 3 lb. ground turkey
salt and pepper to taste
1 large bell pepper, chopped
1 large onion, chopped
3/4 c. catsup or 2 small cans tomato sauce
3 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 eggs
1 1/2 c. oats
Directions:
Mix all ingredients.
Form into loaf and bake at 350°.

question: What can I make with bell peppers and ground turkey?
answer:
Title: Tops-Style Chili
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. ground turkey
1 small can mushrooms
1/4 c. chopped celery
pepper to taste
chili powder to taste
1 c. green beans
1/4 c. green pepper, chopped
2 c. tomato juice
Directions:
Cook ground turkey, add remaining ingredients and simmer for 1 hour.
Yields 4 servings.

question: How do I make zucchini fritters?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Fritters
Ingredients:
3 large eggs
1/4 c. all-purpose flour, unsifted
2 Tbsp. grated onion
1 medium green zucchini, shredded
1 medium yellow squash, shredded
1 large carrot, pared and shredded
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 c. oil
Directions:
In large bowl, beat eggs, flour, onions, salt and pepper.
Stir in vegetables.
In large skillet, heat 1/4 cup oil.
Drop batter by tablespoons into hot oil.
Cook about 1 minute on each side or until golden brown.
Drain on paper towel.
Serve hot with Red Pepper Mayonnaise.

question: How do I make zucchini fritters?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Fritters
Ingredients:
1/2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. garlic
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 egg
2 c. grated, unpeeled zucchini
1 c. grated cheese
1/2 c. grated onion
1 qt. vegetable oil
Directions:
Mix first 5 ingredients
to
make
a batter; stir well. Add next 3 ingredients.
Mix
until blended.
Drop by teaspoon into hot oil.
Cook until brown.

question: How do I make zucchini fritters?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Fritters
Ingredients:
1 lb. zucchini (about 3 medium, unpeeled), grated
1 Tbsp. minced fresh parsley
1 tsp. minced fresh chives
1 c. buttermilk pancake mix
1 egg, beaten
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. vegetable oil
Directions:
Combine first 7 ingredients, stirring well. Drop mixture by tablespoonfuls into hot oil (375°). Cook until golden brown, turning once. Drain on paper towels; serve immediately. Yields 1 dozen fritters.

question: How do I make zucchini fritters?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Fritters
Ingredients:
vegetable oil
1 egg, lightly beaten
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
2 c. shredded zucchini
1/2 c. milk
1 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 (1 oz.) pkg. Ranch style dip mix
Directions:
Fill a deep fat fryer or skillet with oil to a 2-inch depth. Heat to 375°.
Meanwhile, combine milk and egg in a mixing bowl. Stir together dry ingredients and add to egg mixture; blend well. Fold in zucchini.
Drop batter by rounded teaspoonful into hot oil. Fry until deep golden brown, turning once.
Drain thoroughly on paper towels.

question: How do I make zucchini fritters?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Fritters
Ingredients:
2 c. grated zucchini
2 eggs
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1 small onion, chopped fine
approximately 1 tsp. chopped parsley
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
3/4 to 1 c. flour
Directions:
Grate zucchini.
Add eggs, salt, pepper, parsley and grated cheese.
Add enough flour to hold shape when dropped by tablespoonfuls into hot, shallow oil.
Brown on both sides and drain on paper towels.
Serve immediately.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: How do I make a traditional Greek moussaka?
answer:
Title: Moussaka (Greek)
Ingredients:
2 onions, chopped
1 medium eggplant, pared and cut up
1 lb. hamburger
oil as needed
salt as needed
3 Tbsp. oil
3 Tbsp. flour
3/4 c. milk
3/4 c. stock
2 c. shredded cheese
1 tsp. nutmeg
1 or 2 eggs, separated with whites beaten stiff
Directions:
Saute in oil separately until done the onion, eggplant and hamburger.
Drain; set aside.
Salt to taste.
Make a sauce with 3 tablespoons oil and the flour.
Cook over low heat.
Add the stock and milk; cook until thickened.
Add a little to the egg yolks, then put the egg yolks in sauce.
On a buttered casserole dish, layer eggplant, meat, cheese, sauce and nutmeg.
Repeat layers. Beat egg whites; smear on top.
Sprinkle a little cheese and nutmeg.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes, until bubbly.

question: How do I make a traditional Greek moussaka?
answer:
Title: Moussaka(Greek Main Dish, Wonderful)
Ingredients:
1 clove garlic
1 Tbsp. oil
1 lb. hamburger
1 bay leaf, crumbled
paprika
salt and pepper
6 c. thinly sliced potatoes
1 c. sliced onions
1 (No. 2) can tomatoes
1/2 tsp. sage
Directions:
Brown onions, then potatoes, then meat (take out each; put aside brown next), then put tomatoes and garlic on toothpick.
Add bay leaf.
Sprinkle sage, salt and pepper.
Put in casserole. Bake at 375° for 45 minutes.

question: How do I make a traditional Greek moussaka?
answer:
Title: Moussaka(A Greek Specialty)
Ingredients:
2 large eggplants, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch slices
1/4 c. cooking oil
2 lb. ground lamb or ground beef
1 c. chopped onion
1 clove garlic, minced
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
3/4 c. dry red wine
2 Tbsp. snipped parsley
1/4 tsp. dried oregano, crushed
1/4 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 beaten egg
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
2 c. milk
3 beaten eggs
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
ground cinnamon
Directions:
Brush both sides of eggplant slices with the oil; sprinkle with salt.
In large skillet, brown eggplant slices about 1 1/2 minutes on each side.
Drain and set aside.
In same skillet, cook lamb or beef, onion and garlic until meat is brown and onion is tender; drain off excess fat.
Stir in tomato sauce, wine, parsley, oregano, the 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon and 1 teaspoon salt.
Simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes.
Gradually stir mixture into the 1 beaten egg.

question: How do I make a traditional Greek moussaka?
answer:
Title: Greek Moussaka
Ingredients:
2 medium onions, chopped
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 lb. ground beef
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1/2 c. water
1/2 c. red wine
1/4 c. chopped parsley
salt and pepper
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 c. soft bread crumbs
2 large eggplants
1/2 c. butter
1/4 c. flour
2 c. milk
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Saute onions in 2 tablespoons oil; add meat and brown.	Pour off fat.
Spoon in tomato paste.
Add water, wine, parsley, salt, pepper and paprika. Cook, covered, for 10 minutes.	Stir in 1/4 cup bread crumbs and mix well.
Slice eggplant, unpeeled, lengthwise and thinly; fry in heated oil until tender and golden. Add oil as required.
Line bottom and sides of 2 quart casserole dish; spread with layers of meat.
Alternate eggplant and meat. Finish with eggplant on top.
Melt 1/2 cup butter and stir in flour.
Slowly add milk, stirring constantly.
Cook until thickened.	Season with salt and pepper.
Cool; add eggs and mix well.
Carefully pour into dish to cover the top and to penetrate lower layers. Sprinkle with cheese and remaining 1/4 cup crumbs. Dot with 1 tablespoon butter.
Bake in moderate oven at 350° for 1/2 hour. Cool slightly. Serve 6.

question: How do I make a traditional Greek moussaka?
answer:
Title: Greek Moussaka With Eggplant
Ingredients:
1 lb. finely chopped onion
1 lb. chopped beef
1 1/2 lb. sliced eggplant
1 lb. fresh tomatoes, peeled and sliced
1 lb. sliced potatoes
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
salt and pepper
butter and vegetable oil, mixed
Directions:
Saute the onion until soft. Add meat and tomatoes; cook 5 minutes. Season to taste and remove from heat. Add eggs, cheese and parsley. Saute the potatoes and eggplant in oil and butter until soft.
In a buttered, flat casserole, put a layer of eggplant, a layer of potatoes and a layer of meat and tomato mixture.
Repeat layers. Cover with bechamel (white sauce).
Place in preheated 325° oven and bake 20 minutes.
Serves 10.

question: How do I make roasted butternut squash?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash
Ingredients:
1 butternut squash, halved and seeded
3 Tbsp. butter
fresh rosemary and thyme
grated nutmeg
salt and pepper
honey
Directions:
Place squash, cut side up, in shallow roasting pan. Place 1 tablespoon butter in each half. Place seasonings on each half. Cover pan with aluminum foil and roast 1 1/2 hours at 350°. Remove herbs, spoon squash into a bowl and mash until very smooth. In a saucepan, add honey and remaining butter; add seasonings and warm through before serving.

question: How do I make roasted butternut squash?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash
Ingredients:
4 medium squash
2/3 c. brown sugar
2/3 c. white sugar
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
1/4 tsp. salt
4 tsp. lemon juice
5 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Cut potatoes for frying (about 6 good ones).
Coat with 1 heaping
tablespoonful of flour.
Fry in deep oil.
Salt to taste.

question: How do I make roasted butternut squash?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash
Ingredients:
1 medium butternut squash
1/2 c. water
1/4 c. chopped onion
1 c. finely diced unpeeled apple
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 c. cottage cheese
1/8 tsp. each cinnamon and ginger
1/4 tsp. each salt and pepper
1 c. Cheddar cheese
dried parsley
Directions:
Slice squash in half lengthwise.
Place face down on a baking dish.
Add 1/2 cup water.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes or until flesh is tender and shell is firm enough to be stuffed.

question: How do I make roasted butternut squash?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash
Ingredients:
1 medium butternut squash
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 c. red hots candy (2 oz. pkg.)
1/2 orange juice
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cut squash in half lengthwise and discard seeds.
Slice into 1/2-inch slices crosswise and remove peel. Place in a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Sprinkle with sugar.
Heat orange juice in microwave dish. Dissolve candy in the orange juice.
Pour over squash. Sprinkle with salt.
Cover with foil and bake at 375° for 30 to 35 minutes. Place liquid from baking pan into small saucepan and boil until thick.
Pour over squash. Yields 4 servings.
Has 150 calories, fat free.

question: How do I make roasted butternut squash?
answer:
Title: Three Vegetable Roast
Ingredients:
butternut squash
potatoes (red or white)
acorn squash
Directions:
Peel, seed and chunk squash and potatoes. Brush with oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Cook at 350° on a greased cookie sheet until tender.

question: How do I make a creamy Alfredo sauce without cream?
answer:
Title: Homemade Alfredo Sauce
Ingredients:
1 pt. heavy cream
1 stick butter
2 Tbsp. cream cheese
1/2 to 3/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
In a saucepan, combine butter, heavy cream and cream cheese. Simmer until melted and mixed well. Add Parmesan cheese and garlic powder. Simmer on low for 15 to 20 minutes.

question: How do I make a creamy Alfredo sauce without cream?
answer:
Title: Alfredo Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. butter
1 pt. heavy cream
1 pt. milk
1 c. Romano or Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. minced garlic
1 1/2 tsp. basil
1 tsp. chicken base
3/4 tsp. white pepper
cornstarch (to thicken)
Directions:
Melt butter.
Bring cream and milk to a boil in a large pan. Mix rest of ingredients except cornstarch together and add to boiling mixture.
Mix with whisk.
Burns easy.
Thicken with cornstarch.
Serve over hot fettucine.

question: How do I make a creamy Alfredo sauce without cream?
answer:
Title: Alfredo Sauce
Ingredients:
1 pt. heavy cream
1 stick real butter
2 Tbsp. cream cheese
1/2 to 3/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
In a saucepan, combine butter, heavy cream and cream cheese. Simmer until all is melted and mix well. Add the Parmesan cheese and garlic powder. Simmer this for at least 20 minutes on low (or the longer the better). You may want to season with a little salt and pepper.

question: How do I make a creamy Alfredo sauce without cream?
answer:
Title: Light And Easy Alfredo Sauce
Ingredients:
2 c. nonfat cottage cheese
3 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. butter flavored granules
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/2 tsp. chicken flavored bouillon granules
1/2 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. red pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in container of an electric blender; process until smooth, stopping once to scrape down sides.
Pour into a small saucepan.
Cook sauce over low heat, stirring constantly, until thoroughly heated.
Yields 2 1/2 cups.
Contains 86 calories, 0.8 g fat and 0.5 g saturated fat per 3 1/2-ounce serving.

question: How do I make a creamy Alfredo sauce without cream?
answer:
Title: Creamy Fettucini Alfredo
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
3/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. butter
1/2 c. milk
8 oz. fettucini, cooked and drained
Directions:
In a large saucepan combine cream cheese, Parmesan cheese, butter and milk.
Stir over low heat until smooth.
Add fettucini and toss lightly.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for a crispy coconut shrimp?
answer:
Title: Crispy Coconut Shrimp
Ingredients:
1-lb. medium-size fresh shrimp
1/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1 egg
2 Tbsp. cream
3/4 c. flaked coconut
1/3 c. packaged bread crumbs
Vegetable oil (about 3 cups)
Directions:
Shell and devein shrimp, leaving tails intact.
Combine flour, salt and 1/2 teaspoon dry mustard in a small bowl.
In another small bowl, beat egg and cream.
Combine coconut and bread crumbs on a sheet of wax paper.
Dip shrimp in flour mixture, then in egg/cream mixture, and finally in flour/crumb mixture, coating well.
Refrigerate in a single layer until ready to cook.
Pour oil into medium saucepan to 2-inch depth.
Heat to 350 degrees on deep-fat thermometer.
Fry shrimp, a few at a time in hot oil for about 2 minutes, turning once until golden brown.
Use slotted spoon and remove to paper toweling to drain.
Keep warm in slow oven (200 degrees) until all is done.
Serve with Chinese Mustard Sauce and bottled duck sauce.

question: What’s a recipe for a crispy coconut shrimp?
answer:
Title: Coconut Shrimp
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. large raw shrimp
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. cornstarch
1 Tbsp. salt
1/2 Tbsp. white pepper
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 c. ice water
oil for deep frying
2 c. short, shredded coconut
1/2 c. orange marmalade
1/4 c. Grey Poupon country mustard
1/4 c. honey
3 to 4 drops Tabasco
Directions:
Peel, devein and wash shrimp.
Dry well on paper towels.
Set aside.
In a bowl, mix all dry ingredients for batter.
Add 2 tablespoons oil and ice water.
Stir to blend.

question: What’s a recipe for a crispy coconut shrimp?
answer:
Title: Coconut Oatmeal Crispies
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
1 c. brown sugar
1 c. butter
2 1/3 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
2 Tbsp. vanilla
1 tsp. salt
2 eggs
1 tsp. baking soda
1 c. rolled oats
2 c. coconut
Directions:
Cream sugar, eggs and shortening.
Add dry ingredients.
Then add coconut and oatmeal.
Mix well.
Bake at 350° for 10 to 15 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a crispy coconut shrimp?
answer:
Title: Coconut Shrimp
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1 1/2 c. flour
1/2 c. dark rum
1/4 c. milk
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. ground cloves
1/4 tsp. ground allspice
1/4 tsp. black pepper
2 c. shredded coconut
16 medium-sized shrimp, peeled and deveined
vegetable oil for frying
Directions:
In medium-sized bowl, mix eggs, 1 cup flour, rum, milk, baking powder and spices.
Place remaining flour in small bowl.
Spread coconut on small plate.
Dredge shrimp in flour, then dunk it in the batter, then dredge it in coconut.
Place coated shrimp on waxed paper.
Carefully drop shrimp in hot oil and fry 3 to 5 minutes.
Drain on paper towels and serve hot.

question: What’s a recipe for a crispy coconut shrimp?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Coconut Crispies
Ingredients:
1 c. softened margarine
1 c. brown sugar, firmly packed
1 c. sugar
2 eggs, beaten
2 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1 c. flaked coconut
1 c. uncooked regular oats
Directions:
Cream margarine and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs, blending well.
Combine flour, soda and salt; add to creamed mixture, mixing well.
Stir in vanilla, coconut and oats. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls on greased cookie sheet.
Bake at 375° about 8 to 10 minutes or until lightly browned.
Remove to wire rack immediately.
Yield:
5 dozen.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and avocado?
answer:
Title: Shrimp And Avocado Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. wine vinegar
1/3 c. water
1/2 c. lemon juice
1 c. salad oil
1/4 c. chopped parsley
2 cloves garlic, crushed in a garlic press or minced
1 Tbsp. salt
1/4 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 tsp. thyme, crushed
1 tsp. oregano, crushed
2 lb. large shrimp, cooked, peeled and deveined
3 small onions, sliced
1/3 c. chopped green pepper
2 ripe avocados, peeled and sliced
Directions:
Note:
To prepare, 20 minutes (allow time for chilling).

question: What can I cook with shrimp and avocado?
answer:
Title: Lime-Cooked Shrimp With Avocados
Ingredients:
12 medium size shrimp, peeled and deveined
3/4 c. lime juice (from about 6 limes)
salt and pepper to taste
1 Tbsp. cumin
2 ripe avocados, peeled, pitted and cut into 8 slices each
2 red onions
1 c. thinly sliced cabbage
1 ripe tomato, diced small
1/4 c. fresh oregano
1 tsp. red chili flakes
1/2 c. extra virgin olive oil
Directions:
In a large pot of boiling water, blanch the shrimp for 45 seconds.
Remove and drain shrimp.
Cut them in half and place them in a flat, shallow pan.
Pour 1/2 cup of lime juice over the shrimp.
Sprinkle with salt, pepper and cumin.
Cover the pan and leave in refrigerator for 2 hours.
Remove shrimp and discard lime juice.
Place shrimp in a large bowl with avocados, onion, cabbage, tomato, oregano and chili flakes.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and avocado?
answer:
Title: Avocados And Shrimp
Ingredients:
2 lb. shrimp, cooked, shelled and deveined
1 c. salad oil
1 medium red onion, thinly sliced
3/4 c. white wine vinegar
1/2 c. celery, minced
1/4 c. capers, undrained
5 bay leaves
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. celery seed
1 tsp. pepper
3 drops of hot pepper sauce
lime juice
lettuce leaves
Directions:
Toss the
shrimp
with all ingredients, except the last three listed.
Chill
shrimp mixture for 24 hours.
Remove bay leaves and
strain
shrimp
mixture.
Sprinkle
diced avocados with lime juice.
Add avocados to the strained shrimp mixture. Serve on lettuce lined plates.
Serves 8.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and avocado?
answer:
Title: Shrimp-Avocado Salad
Ingredients:
1 (3 oz.) pkg. lime Jell-O
1 c. hot water
1/2 c. cold water
1 1/2 Tbsp. vinegar
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/8 tsp. pepper
3/4 c. diced shrimp (7 oz. can)
1/3 c. celery
1 tsp. chopped onion
1 c. diced avocado
Directions:
Dissolve gelatin in hot water.
Add cold water, vinegar, mayonnaise, salt and pepper.
Blend with rotary beater.
Pour into refrigerator tray.
Quick chill in freezing unit until firm, about 1-inch from edge, but soft in the center, about 15 to 20 minutes.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and avocado?
answer:
Title: Avocados Stuffed With Shrimp Salad
Ingredients:
1 lb. shrimp, peeled, deveined and cooked
juice of 1 lemon
2 hard-cooked eggs, chopped
1 medium onion, chopped
2 stalks celery, chopped
1 tsp. horseradish
1 tsp. Dijon mustard
1 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. mayo
2 ripe avocados, peeled and halved
Directions:
Chop shrimp; place in large bowl and sprinkle with fresh lemon juice.
Add next 7 ingredients, mixing well. Chill.
Fill avocado halves with shrimp mixture.

question: What’s a recipe for a healthy quinoa bowl?
answer:
Title: Pseudo-Southwestern Quinoa
Ingredients:
1 c. quinoa
1 t. ginger, minced
1 3/4 c. water 1/2 t. dulce or kelp powder
2 T. lemon juice
2 serrano peppers
1 t. oregano, dried
1 avocado, diced and drenched with lime juice
4 green onions chopped
2 ears fresh corn on the cob, cut off corn
1/2 diced green bell pepper
1/2 c. diced red sweet pepper
1/4 c. olive oil or flax seed oil
1 bunch cilantro chopped
Directions:
First of all quinoa (pronounced "keen-wa") is an alkalizing grain.
It is hardy and contains the highest amount if protein of any grain.
It cooks quickly and makes a delicious, crunchy dish. It is high in calcium, phosphorus, iron, B vitamins, and vitamin E and has an ideal balance of amino acids.
Wash quinoa thoroughly to remove the saponin, the rust-colored coating that protects this seed against insects, birds, and the sun.
While cooking, the germ on the outside of the grain unfolds like a partial spiral giving the finished cooked product a lovely appearance.

question: What’s a recipe for a healthy quinoa bowl?
answer:
Title: Broccoli And Rice Quiche
Ingredients:
2 c. water
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped broccoli
1/2 c. chopped onion
3 c. cooked long grain rice
6 oz. shredded reduced-fat sharp Cheddar cheese, divided
1 1/2 c. frozen egg substitute, thawed and divided
Mazola vegetable spray
1 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. skim milk
2 (2 1/2 oz.) jars sliced mushrooms, drained
Directions:
Bring water to a boil in a medium saucepan.
Add broccoli and onion; cover.
Reduce heat and simmer 8 to 10 minutes or until vegies are tender.
Drain well; set aside.
Combine rice, 1/2 cup cheese, 1/2 cup egg substitute and 1/4 teaspoon salt.
Press evenly over bottoms and up sides of two 9-inch quiche dishes or pie plates, coated with spray Mazola.
Combine remaining 1 cup egg substitute, remaining salt, pepper, milk, mushrooms and broccoli mixture in a bowl; stir well.
Pour mixture into dishes.
Bake at 375° for 20 minutes.
Remove from oven and sprinkle remaining cheese.
Bake until cheese melts (10 minutes).
Serves 12 (145 calories per serving).

question: What’s a recipe for a healthy quinoa bowl?
answer:
Title: Broccoli-Rice Quiche
Ingredients:
1/2 c. chopped onions
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped broccoli
3 c. hot, cooked rice
1 1/2 c. grated sharp Cheddar cheese, divided
6 eggs, divided
1 tsp. salt, divided
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/2 c. milk
1 (4 oz.) can sliced mushrooms, drained
Directions:
Cook onions with broccoli.
Drain well and set aside.
Combine rice, 3/4 cup cheese, 2 eggs (slightly beaten) and 1/2 teaspoon salt.
Press firmly and evenly over bottom and sides of 2 greased 9-inch pie pans.

question: What’s a recipe for a healthy quinoa bowl?
answer:
Title: Quinoa Tabouleh
Ingredients:
1 c. quinoa
2 c. water
2 medium tomatoes, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
6 green onions with tops, finely chopped
1 medium cucumber, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 small green bell pepper, seeded and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 c. finely chopped fresh parsley
1/2 c. finely chopped fresh mint
1/3 c. freshly squeezed lemon juice
1/3 c. olive oil
1 garlic clove, minced
1 tsp. fine sea salt
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
Put the quinoa in a wire strainer and thoroughly rinse with hot water to remove any bitter flavor.

question: What’s a recipe for a healthy quinoa bowl?
answer:
Title: Sylvia'S Italian-Style Vegetable Quiche(Made 3,000 Times.  Hated By My Children But Loved By All Others.)
Ingredients:
either: chopped spinach, broccoli, cauliflower or artichokes (1 pkg.)
1 small Mozzarella cheese, grated
3 to 4 eggs
1 medium onion
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
salt and pepper to taste
pie crust with top (or bread crumbs)
Directions:
Saute onion.
Cook or steam one of the vegetables.
Mix vegetables with sauteed onion.
Beat eggs.
Mix eggs, grated Parmesan cheese and Mozzarella cheese together in large bowl. Combine onion-vegetable mix and cheese mix.
Pour in ready-made pie crust.
Bake at 350° for 40 to 45 minutes.
(Can freeze, uncooked.)
Cool and serve.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Indian Chickpeas
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1/2 tsp. cumin seed
2 onions, diced
6 cloves garlic, crushed
1-inch piece ginger root, grated
1/2 tsp. turmeric powder
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
3/4 tsp. coriander
1/2 tsp. salt
2 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
1 tsp. garam masala
4 c. cooked chickpeas
juice of 1 lemon
4 small potatoes, boiled, peeled and chopped
Directions:
Heat oil.
Add cumin and onions.
Cook 3 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger.
Cook 5 minutes on low heat.
Add turmeric, coriander, cayenne and salt.
Stir; add chopped tomatoes and garam masala. Cook on low heat 10 minutes.
Add chickpeas and lemon juice.
Cook 5 minutes; add potatoes.
Serve over white steamed basmati rice, garnished with chopped green jalapeno peppers.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Curried Chickpeas And Vegetables
Ingredients:
2 c. soaked chickpeas or canned chickpeas
1 onion, sliced
2 carrots, diced
1 small zucchini, diced
2 tsp. olive oil
1 1/2 tsp. coriander (dry ground)
1 tsp. cumin (dry ground)
1 tsp. ground turmeric
2 tsp. salt to taste
1/3 c. fresh coriander leaves
1/2 small chili pepper (optional)
1/3 c. plain yogurt (low-fat)
Directions:
Cook chickpeas in enough water to cover until tender, 1/2 to 1 hour.
Saute onion in olive oil.
Add to chickpeas.
Add carrots and zucchini.
Cook on low heat until vegetables are tender.
Add a little water if necessary to keep moist.
Add 1 1/2 teaspoons coriander, 1 teaspoon cumin and 1 teaspoon turmeric.
Add salt, depending on your taste.
Cook on low heat for 10 minutes.
Add fresh coriander leaves, chopped fine, and 1/2 small chili if you like it hot and spicy.
Just before serving, stir in yogurt.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Chickpea Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. chickpeas
1/2 lb. diced Mozzarella cheese
6 oz. jar roasted peppers, drained and cut into strips
1 c. paper thin sliced zucchini
1/4 c. olive oil
2 Tbsp. wine vinegar (to taste)
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
dash of pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and let stand at room temperature for 30 minutes to 1 hour.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Crispy Recipe
Ingredients:
2 c. brown sugar
2 sticks butter or margarine
1 3/4 c. white syrup
1 can Borden Eagle Brand milk
1 large box Rice Krispies, puffed rice or popcorn
Directions:
Combine first 3 ingredients in a large saucepan.
Boil for 3 minutes and remove from heat.
Add Eagle Brand milk and boil 3 additional minutes.
Pour 1 large box Rice Krispies, puffed rice or popcorn into large bowl or roasting pan.
Pour cooked mixture over cereal and mix well.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Chickpea Soup
Ingredients:
4 cloves garlic
1/2 tsp. dried or 1 tsp. fresh tarragon
4 Tbsp. olive oil
8 oz. can plum tomatoes
1 lb. can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 chicken stock cube
1 1/4 c. water
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Peel and crush garlic.
If using fresh tarragon, chop it finely.
Heat the oil and saute the garlic until it begins to brown.
Add the tarragon and tomatoes, roughly chopped, and lower the heat to simmer.
When ingredients come to a boil, cook for 25 minutes or so.
When the tomatoes are cooked, add the chickpeas and cook another 5 minutes.
Stir in the stock cube and no more than 1 1/4 cups water.
Season with salt and pepper to taste and serve.

question: How do I make French toast?
answer:
Title: French Toast
Ingredients:
2 c. water
1 c. milk
5 eggs
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/8 tsp. nutmeg
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/4 tsp. almond or orange extract
Directions:
Makes about 20 slices.

question: How do I make French toast?
answer:
Title: French Toast
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1/2 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla
3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1/8 tsp. salt
3 tsp. butter
6 slices French bread
1 Tbsp. powdered sugar
Directions:
Beat eggs.
Add milk, vanilla, flour and salt to eggs.
Beat with electric mixer.
Be sure flour is well mixed.
Heat skillet. Add teaspoon of butter to skillet.
Dip bread, a slice at a time, into batter.
Coat each side.
Drop bread into hot pan; cook 2 to 3 minutes per side or until golden brown.
Cut bread in half diagonally.
Sprinkle powdered sugar on toast.

question: How do I make French toast?
answer:
Title: French Toast
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. nutmeg
4 Tbsp. sugar
3/4 c. cold milk
1 Tbsp. butter
6 to 8 slices white bread
Directions:
With a fork, lightly beat the eggs, salt, nutmeg, sugar and milk until well mixed.
Melt butter in frying pan and heat until butter begins to brown.
Dip each slice of bread in the egg mixture until well soaked and place in the frying pan to cook. Cook one side until lightly browned and flip over to brown the other side.
You can keep the cooked French toast hot in a warm oven until you've cooked all your bread.
Serve hot with butter and syrup.
Yield: 2 to 3 servings.

question: How do I make French toast?
answer:
Title: French Toast In A Bowl
Ingredients:
6 slices bread, cubed
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
3/4 c. Egg Beaters
2 c. milk
1/2 c. sugar
2 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1 c. sliced bananas (optional)
Directions:
Pour melted butter over bread cubes to coat.
Mix Egg Beaters, milk, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg and bananas (if used) and pour over bread cubes and stir gently to coat.
Bake in greased 2 quart baking dish, uncovered, at 375° for 40 minutes, or until a knife comes out clean.
Serve warm.
Dish into bowls that have been coated or drizzled with maple syrup.

question: How do I make French toast?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter French Toast
Ingredients:
1/2 c. peanut butter
1/4 c. honey
1/4 tsp. salt
8 slices bread
2 eggs, beaten
1/2 c. milk
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
Directions:
Blend peanut butter, honey and salt. Place about 2 1/2 tablespoons of peanut butter-honey mixture between 2 slices of bread to make a sandwich. Combine eggs and the milk. Soak sandwiches in egg mixture. Melt butter or margarine in a baking pan or frypan. Bake sandwiches at 400° (hot oven) about 40 minutes. Turn sandwiches to brown both sides. Or cook slowly in frypan on top of range. Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a simple tuna casserole?
answer:
Title: Tuna Casserole
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. noodles, cooked and drained well
1 (8 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach or broccoli, cooked
1/3 c. onion, sauteed in 1/4 c. butter
2 eggs, boiled and chipped finely
1 can cream of celery soup
3/4 c. milk
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Add to butter and onions; stir in vegetable and chopped eggs. Add 1 can (12 1/2 ounces) well drained, chopped tuna.
Stir in noodles and pour into a 2-quart casserole.
Add dash of Parmesan on top.
Bake at 350° for 40 to 45 minutes.

question: How do I make a simple tuna casserole?
answer:
Title: Tuna Casserole
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
3 Tbsp. flour
2 c. milk
2 c. shredded sharp cheese
1 can tuna, drained
1/2 lb. shells, cooked and drained
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. chopped parsley
Directions:
Melt butter or margarine; stir in flour.
Cook over low heat for 1 minute.
Gradually stir in milk; stir until thickened. Remove from heat; add cheese.
Stir until cheese melts; stir in tuna, shells and black pepper.
Heat until hot.
Serve and sprinkle with parsley.

question: How do I make a simple tuna casserole?
answer:
Title: Tuna Casserole
Ingredients:
1 medium onion
1 medium green pepper
3 Tbsp. butter
6 Tbsp. flour
2 (7 oz.) cans tuna, drained
3 c. milk
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Chop onion and green pepper coarsely.
Cook in butter until limp.
Stir in flour as smoothly as possible.
Add milk. Gradually season with salt and pepper.
Cook, stirring constantly, until mixture bubbles.
Stir in tuna.
Pour into a shallow baking dish.

question: How do I make a simple tuna casserole?
answer:
Title: Tuna Casserole
Ingredients:
1/4 c. diced green pepper
1 c. sliced celery
1/3 c. chopped onions
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 (10 1/2 oz.) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
2/3 c. milk
4 oz. process American cheese, cubed (about 1 c.)
8 oz. medium noodles
1/2 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
2 Tbsp. chopped pimiento (from 4 oz. can) or add 1/4 c. diced red pepper with green pepper above
1 (9 1/2 oz.) can tuna, drained and flaked
1/3 c. toasted, slivered almonds
Directions:
Cook green pepper, celery and onions in butter for 10 minutes. Add soup and milk.
Blend and heat through.
Add cheese; heat until cheese melts.
Cook and drain noodles.
Combine noodles and 1/3 of soup mixture.
Turn noodles into baking pan.

question: How do I make a simple tuna casserole?
answer:
Title: Tuna Casserole
Ingredients:
1/4 c. onion, finely chopped
1 Tbsp. margarine
1/4 c. green pepper, finely chopped
2 small cans mushrooms, sliced
2 small cans tuna, drained
1 tomato, chopped, peeled and drained
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
3/4 c. mayonnaise
1 (10 oz.) pkg. noodles, cooked
1/2 c. Cheddar cheese, shredded
Directions:
In a small skillet, melt margarine and saute onion, green pepper and mushrooms, stirring often, until tender (about 5 minutes).
Stir together with next 6 items.
Add noodles, mixing well.
Turn into a greased 2-quart casserole.
Top with cheese and bake, uncovered, at 400° for 20 minutes.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry?
answer:
Title: Curried-Coconut Shrimp
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen shrimp in shells
1 c. sifted all purpose flour
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 slightly beaten egg
2 Tbsp. salad oil
2/3 c. grated coconut
1-1/2 tsp. curry powder
Directions:
Cook 1 pound shelled shrimp; drain.
In saucepan melt 1/4 cup butter or margarine.
Stir in 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour.
Add 1 1/2 cups milk all at once; cook and stir till thickened and bubbly.
Add shrimp, 1/4 cup dry sherry, 1/2 teaspoon salt, dash pepper, and dash paprika.
Pour into 5 coquilles (individual baking shells).
Sprinkle each serving with 1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese.
Broil 3 to 4 inches from heat till cheese browns.
Makes 5 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry?
answer:
Title: Moist 'N Creamy Coconut Cake
Ingredients:
1 pkg. (2 layer size) yellow cake mix
1 1/2 c. milk
2 c. coconut
1 1/2 c. or 8 oz. Cool Whip
1/2 c. sugar
Directions:
Prepare cake mix as directed on package.
Bake in a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Cool for 15 minutes.
When cool, make holes through cake. Combine milk, sugar and 1/2 cup coconut in saucepan.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for three minutes.
Carefully spoon over warm cake allowing liquid to soak down through holes.
Let cool.
Fold 1/2 cup coconut into Cool Whip and spread over the cake.
Sprinkle the rest of the coconut over the cake.
Chill overnight.
Store leftover cake in the refrigerator.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Curry With Coconut Milk
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 large onion, finely chopped
1 cardamom pod, crushed
1-inch piece cinnamon stick
4 cloves
salt to taste
4 whole black peppercorns
1/2 tsp. turmeric
1/2 tsp. chili powder
1 1/2 tsp. finely chopped ginger
1 1/2 tsp. finely chopped garlic
4 c. large peeled shrimp
2 c. coconut milk*
Directions:
Melt butter in a saucepan.
Add onion and brown.
Add all the spices and saute for 2 minutes.
Add shrimp and saute 1/2 minute. Add coconut milk (strained) and 1/4 cup shredded coconut that is leftover after straining.
Cover and cook on medium heat until the gravy thickens.
Serve over plain rice or polao.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry?
answer:
Title: Moist 'N Creamy Coconut Cake
Ingredients:
1 pkg. yellow cake mix
1 1/2 c. milk
1/2 c. sugar
2 c. Baker's Angel Flake coconut
1 small container Cool Whip, thawed
Directions:
Prepare cake mix as directed on package, baking in a 9 x 13-inch pan. Cool 15 minutes. Poke holes in cake with a utility fork.
Meanwhile, combine milk, sugar and 1/2 cup of coconut in saucepan.
Bring to a boil; reduce heat and simmer 1 minute. Spoon evenly over warm cake.
Chill in refrigerator.
Fold 1/2 cup coconut into Cool Whip and spread over cake.
Sprinkle with remaining coconut.
Chill overnight. Keep refrigerated.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry?
answer:
Title: Curried Turkey Balls
Ingredients:
8 oz. cream cheese
1 c. finely chopped turkey
1 c. chopped peanuts
1 Tbsp. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. chutney
2 lb. curry powder
Directions:
Soften the cream cheese and mix with the rest of ingredients except coconut.
Form into small balls and roll in coconut.
Makes 40 to 50 balls.

question: I need a recipe for homemade pizza sauce.
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Sauce
Ingredients:
3 tbsp. olive oil
1/2 c. finely chopped onions
1 tbsp. garlic
4 c. tomatoes (1 qt.)
4 c. tomato paste
1 tbsp. dry oregano
1 tsp. dry basil
1 bay leaf
2 tsp. sugar
1 1/2 -2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Saute finely chopped onions and garlic in the olive oil. Add the remaining ingredients and slow cook for approximately 1 hour.

question: I need a recipe for homemade pizza sauce.
answer:
Title: Pizza Sauce
Ingredients:
2 gal. tomatoes
4 medium onions
1 c. sugar
1/4 c. salt
1 Tbsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. red pepper
2 Tbsp. garlic salt
1 Tbsp. chili powder
2 Tbsp. oregano
Directions:
Make a thickening of 3 scant cups clear-jel.
Add to mixture; cook until thick.
Cold pack 5 to 10 minutes.

question: I need a recipe for homemade pizza sauce.
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 c. warm water
1 pkg. yeast
1 tsp. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. oil
2 c. flour
1 1/2 c. additional flour
Directions:
Combine first 4 ingredients in large bowl allowing yeast to soften.
Stir in oil and 2 cups flour.
Add more flour until dough holds together.
Grease your hands lightly and knead dough on floured board until smooth.
Cover and let rise 45 minutes.
Shape it to pans you are using or into individual disks all on greased pans.
Brush with sauce and cover with ingredients.
Let rise about 5 to 10 more minutes then bake in 425° oven for 15 minutes. This recipe also makes a nice French bread loaf.
My family makes individualized pizzas.

question: I need a recipe for homemade pizza sauce.
answer:
Title: Pizza Sauce
Ingredients:
1 large onion, chopped
1 large green pepper, chopped
1/4 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
2 cans tomato paste (6 oz.)
1 can tomato sauce (8 oz.)
sliced pepperoni
1 can mushrooms
Directions:
Cover bottom of skillet with oil.
Add onion and green pepper. Cook until onions are transparent.
Add oregano, garlic salt, salt and pepper.
Add tomato paste, tomato sauce and 2 cans of water per can of paste and sauce (6 cans).
Add pepperoni and mushrooms.
Simmer for 1 hour or more.
Makes enough sauce for 3 pizzas.

question: I need a recipe for homemade pizza sauce.
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza
Ingredients:
1 c. warm water
1 pkg. active yeast
2 Tbsp. shortening
1/4 tsp. salt
4 c. sifted all-purpose flour
2 Tbsp. salad oil
Directions:
Sprinkle yeast over warm water in large mixing bowl. Stir until dissolved. Add shortening, salt and half the flour.
Beat with wooden spoon until smooth, about 2 minutes.
Gradually add remaining flour, mixing with hands until dough is stiff and leaves side of bowl. Turn dough out onto floured board.
Cover with bowl. Let rest 10 minutes. Knead 8 to 10 minutes or until smooth and elastic. Place dough in lightly greased medium bowl. Cover with towel and let raise in warm place, about 1 hour.

question: How do I make roasted garlic potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Potatoes(Preparation: 10 Minutes. Baking: 25 Minutes.  Servings: 4.)
Ingredients:
1 to 2 large cloves garlic, peeled and chopped
4 Tbsp. butter
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 lb. small potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/8 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
Place garlic, butter and water in small saucepan; simmer until water evaporates and garlic is tender. Strain butter; mash soft garlic through very fine strainer.
Toss potatoes in garlic butter; place in single layer in large baking dish.
Bake for 25 minutes, turning potatoes occasionally, until they are tender and browned.
Remove potatoes from baking dish with slotted spoon.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

question: How do I make roasted garlic potatoes?
answer:
Title: Oven Roasted Garlic Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 lb. red potatoes (3 to 4)
6 large garlic cloves, unpeeled and flattened
2 Tbsp. olive oil (any oil will do)
1 Tbsp. fresh rosemary or 1 tsp. dried rosemary, crumbled
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. coarsely ground black pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
Cut potatoes in half lengthwise and then into 3 wedges per half.
Combine all ingredients in bowl; mix well.
Bake in shallow baking pan for 30 to 35 minutes or until potatoes are light brown and tender, turning occasionally.
Serve potatoes hot.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make roasted garlic potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 to 4 potatoes, peeled
olive oil
1 clove garlic per person, peeled and chopped
1/2 tsp. rosemary per person
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Boil potatoes for 5 minutes.
Drain and pat dry.
Slice.
In a pan large enough to hold the potatoes in one layer, add enough olive oil to coat the bottom generously.
Add potatoes and garlic and toss to coat.
Add rosemary, salt and pepper.
Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes, turning occasionally, until golden brown.

question: How do I make roasted garlic potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted New Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. whole tiny new potatoes (20 to 24)
2 Tbsp. margarine, melted
2 Tbsp. water
2 cloves garlic, minced, or 1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place peeled potatoes in a greased 9 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish. Combine the margarine, water, garlic, salt and pepper.
Drizzle over potatoes.
Toss to coat.
Bake, covered, at 375° for 30 to 35 minutes, stirring once.
Uncover; bake 20 minutes more or until the potatoes are tender and slightly browned.

question: How do I make roasted garlic potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 lb. small red potatoes
1/4 c. olive oil
1 1/2 tsp. kosher salt
1 tsp. black pepper
2 Tbsp. minced garlic
2 Tbsp. minced fresh parsley
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°. Cut the potatoes in half or quarters and place in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, pepper and garlic; toss until the potatoes are well coated. Transfer the potatoes to a sheet pan and spread out into one layer. Roast in the oven for 45 minutes to 1 hour or until browned and crisp. Flip twice during cooking with a spatula in order to ensure even browning. Remove from the oven; toss with the parsley. Season to taste and serve hot.

question: How do I make a creamy risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 diced onion
1 1/4 c. Arborio rice
1/3 c. white wine
2 Tbsp. tomato paste
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
5 c. chicken broth (keep hot over low heat)
1/3 oz. diced mushrooms, soaked in 1/2 c. water for 15 minutes, then chopped
Directions:
Heat oil in a large saucepan over low heat.
Add onion and cook until tender.
Stir in rice and cook with oil.
Add wine and stir until evaporated.
Add dried mushrooms, the water they were soaked in and the tomato paste, mixed in 1/2 cup of chicken broth. Stir until liquid is absorbed.
Continue adding broth, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly.
Each addition should be absorbed before adding the next.
Cook, uncovered, until broth is all absorbed and rice is tender to the bite.
Do not overcook.
Remove from stove.
Add Parmesan cheese; stir and serve.

question: How do I make a creamy risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto With Shrimp
Ingredients:
1/4 c. cooking oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
1 1/2 c. raw rice
1 can tomato paste
2 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 can shrimp or 1/2 lb. cleaned shrimp, cut small
1/2 c. or more peas
Directions:
Saute onion and peppers in oil.
Add rice; cook over medium heat until tanned; stir constantly.
Add tomato paste, salt, pepper and broth.
Mix and cover tightly.
Simmer without stirring for 35 to 40 minutes.
Add shrimp and peas.
Mix well.
Cook an additional 5 minutes until shrimp is done.

question: How do I make a creamy risotto?
answer:
Title: Plain Risotto
Ingredients:
2 tablespoons olive oil
1 tablespoon butter
1 medium onion (chopped)
1 cup Arborio rice
1/2 cup white wine or dry vermouth
4 cups chicken or vegetable broth
1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese
fresh chopped parsley
Directions:
Heat olive oil and butter in a saucepan on medium high heat. Add onion and saut until soft.
Add rice and saut until rice is coated.
Add white wine or vermouth and stir until all the liquid is absorbed.
Add hot broth 1/2 cup at a time, until it is all absorbed in the rice and rice is tender.
Add hot water if more liquid is needed.
Stir in parmesan cheese and fresh parsley, and serve warm.

question: How do I make a creamy risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto With Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 red pepper, diced
1 medium zucchini, diced
2 Tbsp. butter
1 large onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 1/2 Risotto
4 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas, cooked
1 chicken breast, cooked and shredded
1/2 c. Romano cheese, grated
Directions:
Heat oil in skillet.
Saute pepper and zucchini until crisp or tender.
Set aside.
In large saucepan heat butter and saute onion and garlic over medium heat 5 minutes, stirring constantly.
Add Risotto and cook about 3 minutes.
Stir in 1/2 cup hot chicken broth.
Continue stirring until almost absorbed.
Add remaining hot broth 1/2 cup at a time, stirring until Risotto is al dente.
Stir in red pepper, zucchini, peas, chicken and cheese.
Rice may be substituted for Risotto.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a creamy risotto?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Risotto(Serves 6)
Ingredients:
8 Tbsp. butter (divided use)
2 c. rice
6 c. chicken broth
1 small bay leaf
1 lb. shrimp, peeled
1 tsp. minced garlic
salt and pepper
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
Melt 2 tablespoons butter.
Stir in rice to coat.
Add broth and bay leaf.
Cook rice.
Separately melt 2 tablespoons of butter; saute shrimp and garlic.
Salt and pepper to taste.
Add shrimp mixture to cooked rice.
Add remainder of ingredients. Stir and serve.

question: What’s a good recipe for a blueberry cobbler?
answer:
Title: Blueberry Cobbler
Ingredients:
1 stick butter
1 c. self-rising flour
1 c. sugar
1 c. milk
1 qt. blueberries, washed
Directions:
Melt butter in baking dish (9 x 13-inch).
Mix together flour, sugar and milk.
Pour over hot butter.
Pour berries over mixture. Do not stir.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 45 minutes.
Serves 8. Recipe can be halved.

question: What’s a good recipe for a blueberry cobbler?
answer:
Title: Fresh Blueberry Cobbler
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/2 c. sugar
6 c. picked over blueberries
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. packed brown sugar
1 1/2 tsp. double acting baking powder
3/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 stick butter (oleo), cut into bits
1/4 c. plus 2 Tbsp. boiling water
Directions:
Toss first 4 ingredients in large bowl until combined well. Put in 10-inch or 6-cup deep dish pie plate.
In a bowl combine flour, brown sugar, baking powder, salt, cinnamon and butter until resembles a coarse meal.
Add boiling water and mix (forms a dough).
Drop over blueberry mixture and bake on a baking sheet in middle of preheated 400° oven, 30 to 40 minutes, until topping is golden.
Serve warm with French vanilla frozen yogurt or ice cream.

question: What’s a good recipe for a blueberry cobbler?
answer:
Title: Blueberry Cobbler
Ingredients:
2 pt. blueberries
1/2 c sugar
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
3 Tbsp. butter, melted
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. grated lemon rind
1/8 tsp. ground cloves
3/4 c. unsifted flour
3/4 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. salt
1 large egg
2 Tbsp. milk
Directions:
Heat oven to 400°.
Grease an 8-inch round baking dish.
In baking dish, combine berries, 1/4 cup of sugar, cornstarch, 1 tablespoon of butter, lemon juice and rind and cloves.
In a small bowl, combine flour, 1/4 cup of sugar, baking powder and salt. Stir in egg, milk and 2 tablespoons of butter until soft dough forms.
Drop by tablespoonful onto blueberry mixture.
Bake 30 to 35 minutes or until topping is golden brown and filling bubbles. Delicious with ice cream.
Serves 8.

question: What’s a good recipe for a blueberry cobbler?
answer:
Title: Easy Blueberry Cobbler
Ingredients:
3 c. fresh blueberries (any fruit can be substituted)
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 c. sugar
1 egg, beaten
6 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted
Directions:
Place fruit in a 10 x 6 x 2-inch baking dish. Sprinkle with lemon juice. Combine flour, sugar
and egg. Stir until mixture resembles coarse meal. Spread over fruit. Drizzle butter over topping. Bake at 350° for 30 minutes. Serve warm.

question: What’s a good recipe for a blueberry cobbler?
answer:
Title: Blueberry Cobbler
Ingredients:
3 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/2 lb. margarine
1 egg
2 tsp. vanilla
2 tsp. baking powder
Directions:
Mix with pastry blender until crumbles together.
Press part of mixture in a greased 14 x 11-inch pan.
Add 2 cans of fruit pie filling.
Sprinkle rest of crumbs on top of the fruit.
Bake at 375° for 30 to 40 minutes.
Serve with whipped cream.

question: What can I make with canned chickpeas and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Chickpea And Tomato Stew
Ingredients:
6 medium-sized tomatoes
1/2 c. olive oil
2 medium-sized onions, peeled and chopped
4 cloves garlic, peeled and minced
2 c. boiled, drained chickpeas or drained canned chickpeas
1/2 c. very finely chopped fresh parsley
1/2 tsp. dried thyme
1 tsp. salt or to taste
Directions:
Drop the tomatoes into boiling water for 15 seconds.
Remove with a slotted spoon and peel.
Mince the tomatoes.

question: What can I make with canned chickpeas and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Chickpeas Indian Style
Ingredients:
2 cans chickpeas
2 peeled medium onions, cut in quarters
1 1/4 inch long piece fresh ginger, peeled
1 green chili or 2 dried small red chilies
3 or 4 cloves garlic
1 tsp. cumin seed
1/2 tsp. nigella seed (black onion seed)
1 tsp. mustard seed
1 tsp. powdered coriander
1/2 tsp. powdered red pepper (if desired)
small can tomatoes, broken up
salt to taste
juice of 1/2 lemon
Directions:
Open cans of chickpeas and drain, reserving liquid.
In blender or food processor place onions, ginger, chilies and garlic.
Blend this all together into a puree.
In heavy saucepan, heat 2 to 3 tablespoons oil briefly.
Add cumin, nigella and mustard seed.
The seed should pop and crackle.
(Do not let burn.)
Pour in blender contents.
Fry, stirring, until color turns golden.
Add coriander, tomatoes, salt, lemon juice and red pepper (if desired).
Mix well and gently mix drained chickpeas into the spice-onion mixture. Then add liquid from cans.
Cover and let simmer about 40 minutes. Tastes better the next day.
A good dish for vegetarians, too.

question: What can I make with canned chickpeas and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Greek Chickpeas Salad
Ingredients:
2 tsp. prepared Dijon style mustard
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 to 3/4 c. olive or vegetable oil
1/2 c. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. ground pepper
2 (20 oz. each) cans chickpeas, drained
1 medium red onion, sliced and separated into rings
1/4 lb. Feta cheese, crumbled
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
lettuce leaves (if desired)
Directions:
Combine cheese, mustard, salt, oil, lemon juice and pepper in container of electric blender; whirl until smooth.
Combine chickpeas and onion in large bowl.
Pour dressing over and toss. Refrigerate; may be prepared several days in advance.
Just before serving, add parsley; toss.
Spoon into lettuce lined salad bowl.

question: What can I make with canned chickpeas and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Indian Chickpeas
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1/2 tsp. cumin seed
2 onions, diced
6 cloves garlic, crushed
1-inch piece ginger root, grated
1/2 tsp. turmeric powder
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
3/4 tsp. coriander
1/2 tsp. salt
2 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
1 tsp. garam masala
4 c. cooked chickpeas
juice of 1 lemon
4 small potatoes, boiled, peeled and chopped
Directions:
Heat oil.
Add cumin and onions.
Cook 3 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger.
Cook 5 minutes on low heat.
Add turmeric, coriander, cayenne and salt.
Stir; add chopped tomatoes and garam masala. Cook on low heat 10 minutes.
Add chickpeas and lemon juice.
Cook 5 minutes; add potatoes.
Serve over white steamed basmati rice, garnished with chopped green jalapeno peppers.

question: What can I make with canned chickpeas and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Chickpea Soup
Ingredients:
4 cloves garlic
1/2 tsp. dried or 1 tsp. fresh tarragon
4 Tbsp. olive oil
8 oz. can plum tomatoes
1 lb. can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 chicken stock cube
1 1/4 c. water
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Peel and crush garlic.
If using fresh tarragon, chop it finely.
Heat the oil and saute the garlic until it begins to brown.
Add the tarragon and tomatoes, roughly chopped, and lower the heat to simmer.
When ingredients come to a boil, cook for 25 minutes or so.
When the tomatoes are cooked, add the chickpeas and cook another 5 minutes.
Stir in the stock cube and no more than 1 1/4 cups water.
Season with salt and pepper to taste and serve.

question: Can you suggest a vegan pasta dish?
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Pasta
Ingredients:
1 box fettucini florentine
1 red bell pepper
broccoli
carrots
fresh garlic
fresh lemon
lite olive oil
Parmesan cheese
fresh Italian parsley
Directions:
Cut pepper into strips; slice carrots diagonally and cut broccoli into bite size pieces.
Stir-fry in olive oil (1 tablespoon) until just tender.
(Cook each vegetable separately). Mix vegetables and cooked pasta together.
Add 1 clove crushed garlic, 2 tablespoons olive oil and squeeze a lemon wedge into mixture; stir and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and chopped fresh parsley.

question: Can you suggest a vegan pasta dish?
answer:
Title: Chewy Vegan Carrot Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. shredded raw carrots
1 c. raisins
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 1/2 c. water
1/3 c. margarine
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. ground cloves
1/2 tsp. ground allspice
1 tsp. ground nutmeg
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 c. whole wheat flour
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
Place carrots, raisins, sugar, water and margarine in saucepan and bring to simmer over medium heat.
Continue to simmer for 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and cool.

question: Can you suggest a vegan pasta dish?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Vegetables And Goat Cheese
Ingredients:
1 c. chicken or vegetable broth
1/2 c. dry white wine
1/2 c. chopped shallots or scallions
1/2 tsp. fresh ground black pepper
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli florets
1 small yellow squash, halved lengthwise and sliced
1 c. sliced mushrooms
8 oz. light or fat free cream cheese
4 oz. goat cheese (Feta), crumbled
3 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 lb. linguine, uncooked
1 roasted red pepper, cut in strips
Directions:
Combine broth, wine, shallots and black pepper in large saucepan.
Bring to a boil, add broccoli, breaking florets apart. Add squash and mushrooms, reduce heat, cover and simmer 5 minutes. Add cream cheese, goat cheese and lemon juice, cook on low heat, stirring constantly until cheeses are melted.
Set aside, keeping warm.
Cook pasta according to package directions, drain.
Place in large serving bowl, add vegetable/cheese mixture, toss gently. Garnish with red pepper strips.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: Can you suggest a vegan pasta dish?
answer:
Title: Vegan Lentil Chili(Serves 6 To 8)
Ingredients:
1 c. dry lentils
1 can whole tomatoes, sliced or garden tomatoes (if available)
1 can kidney beans
1 (12 oz.) can tomato juice
1 bell pepper, chopped
1 onion, chopped
2 stalks chopped celery (optional)
small amount of vegetable or olive oil for sauteing
brown sugar
garlic powder or garlic salt
cumin
chili powder
Directions:
Soak the lentils overnight.
Saute onion, bell pepper and celery (if used), then combine with lentils, beans, juice and tomatoes.
Add brown sugar to sweeten to taste.
Season with chili powder, some garlic powder, salt and cumin to taste.
Simmer an hour or so.

question: Can you suggest a vegan pasta dish?
answer:
Title: Pasta Vegetable Medley
Ingredients:
2 c. broccoli flowerets
2 c. mushrooms, sliced
1 medium red or green pepper, cut into strips
2 Tbsp. margarine
1/2 lb. Velveeta Mexican pasteurized process cheese spread with jalapeno pepper, cubed
1 Tbsp. milk
1 1/2 c. (6 oz.) tri-color corkscrew noodles, cooked and drained
Directions:
In a large skillet, stir-fry vegetables in margarine until crisp-tender.
Reduce heat to low.
Add cheese spread and milk; stir until cheese is melted.
Add noodles; toss lightly to coat noodles and mix vegetables.

question: What’s an easy recipe for mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Easy Crock Pot Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
3 c. cooked macaroni
2 c. evaporated milk
3 c. shredded processed cheese
1/2 c. finely chopped green pepper
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Add all ingredients into a lightly greased crock pot.
Cover and cook on high 2-3 hours.
Stir once or twice.

question: What’s an easy recipe for mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: My Mother'S Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
2 c. elbow macaroni, cooked and drained
1 can (28 oz.) tomatoes with liquid, cut up
1/2 tsp. onion salt (optional)
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. shredded Cheddar, divided
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Combine macaroni, tomatoes, onion salt, pepper and 1 1/2 cups of the Cheddar cheese.
Pour into a greased 2-quart casserole dish. Dot with butter.
Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes. Sprinkle with remaining cheese and bake 15 minutes longer.
Serves four.

question: What’s an easy recipe for mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Grandma'S Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. uncooked macaroni
4 Tbsp. butter
4 Tbsp. flour
2 c. milk
1 Tbsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 lb. cubed Velveeta
2/3 c. sour cream
1 1/3 c. cottage cheese
2 c. grated cheddar cheese
1 1/2 c. soft bread crumbs
Directions:
Cook and drain macaroni.
Place in 2 1/2 qt. greased casserole dish.
Melt butter over medium heat, stir in flour; mix well.
Add milk and cook over medium heat, stir constantly until sauce thickens.
Add salt, sugar, and cheese, mix well.
Mix sour cream and cheese into sauce.
Pour over macaroni; mix well.
Sprinkle grated cheese and bread crumbs over top.
Dot with butter.
The dish may be frozen at this point.
Bake at 350 degrees for 45-50 minutes.

question: What’s an easy recipe for mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Easy Crock-Pot Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
7 oz. macaroni, cooked and drained
1 large can evaporated milk
1 stick margarine, melted
3 eggs, beaten
3 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Mix first 4 ingredients with 2 cups of cheese. Pour into crock-pot. Sprinkle rest of cheese on top. Close lid. Cook on low for 3 hours. Do not remove lid during cooking time.

question: What’s an easy recipe for mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Easy Beef And Mac Whip-Up
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. Miracle Whip
1 (30 oz.) jar spaghetti sauce
1 (7 oz.) pkg. macaroni
1/2 c. grated sharp cheese
Directions:
Cook macaroni and drain.
Brown meat and drain.
Mix meat, macaroni, Miracle Whip and spaghetti sauce.
Heat on medium, stirring occasionally.
Top with cheese.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make grilled fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish Tacos
Ingredients:
2 lbs. Fish; firm and fresh, such as Swordfish,Shark, or Sea Bass, cut thick
1/3 c. Lime Juice
1/4 c. Tequila or White Wine
Directions:
Broil on the barbeque, the grill or the oven, turning as often as necessary and basting as needed, until cooked but not overdone.

question: How do I make grilled fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Tacos
Ingredients:
beef roast
pork roast
salt
chili sauce
soft tortilla shells
lettuce
onion
tomatoes
Cheddar cheese
taco sauce (hot or mild)
Directions:
Boil beef roast and pork roast about 3 hours with salt to taste.
Shred meat into small pieces.
Pour chili sauce, as much as needed to mix meat together.
In separate bowls, cut up lettuce, tomatoes, onion and Cheddar cheese.
Heat soft shells in microwave oven; fill with previous ingredients and taco sauce.

question: How do I make grilled fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Grilled Chicken Taco
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 garlic clove, minced
2 c. cooked, diced chicken
1 pkg. Azteca flour tortillas
1 1/2 c. shredded Monterey Jack or Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 Tbsp. margarine
black olives, tomato and green chilies (optional)
Directions:
In skillet, heat oil.
Cook onion and garlic until tender. Add chicken.
Heat 3 minutes.
Remove from pan into bowl.
Heat tortillas according to package. Divide chicken onto center of tortillas.
Top with cheese and optional ingredients. Fold tortillas in half.
Melt margarine in same skillet.
Grill tacos on each side for 2 or 3 minutes or until cheese melts.
Makes 8 to 10 tacos.

question: How do I make grilled fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Mexican Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 pkg. taco mix
3/4 c. water
8 taco shells
1 small head lettuce, shredded
1 large tomato, diced
1 can taco sauce
1 c. shredded Cheddar
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Brown beef; drain.
Add seasoning and water.
Bring to a boil; reduce heat and simmer for 15 to 20 minutes.
Heat shells in oven 5 to 7 minutes.
Fill shells with meat, lettuce, tomatoes and cheese.
Top with taco sauce for added flavor.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make grilled fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Baked Fish On Grill
Ingredients:
2 medium to large fish fillets
1 small onion
1 lemon
garlic salt
black pepper
butter
Directions:
Place 2 to 3 pats of butter under each fillet on aluminum foil.
Place 2 to 3 pats on top of each fillet.
Slice onion and pop out rings.
Lay on top.
Slice lemon in thin slices.
Place on top of onion.
Sprinkle with garlic salt and pepper to taste. Roll foil around and seal.
Bake 15 to 20 minutes (depending on size of fillets), turning once.
This may also be baked in a preheated oven.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic pasta sauce?
answer:
Title: Garlic Pasta Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
4 or 5 garlic cloves, sliced
1/4 c. onion, chopped
1/4 c. bell pepper, chopped
4 or 5 tomatoes, skinned and chopped
1/2 c. water
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Heat oil and brown garlic until light brown.
Add onion and bell
pepper;
cook
a
little and add tomatoes, salt and pepper. Simmer
for
5
minutes.
Add
water;
bring to boil. Reduce heat;
simmer
for 20 minutes.
Cook thin spaghetti or angel
hair pasta; drain.
Pour sauce over pasta; blend well. Sprinkle with grated Italian cheese.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic pasta sauce?
answer:
Title: Creamy Garlic Clam Sauce
Ingredients:
1 lb. pasta, cooked
2 Tbsp. butter
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. flour
3/4 c. chicken broth
3/4 c. milk
2 Tbsp. dried parsley
1/3 c. Parmesan cheese
1 can chopped clams
Directions:
Melt butter in saucepan; add garlic and cook 1 minute. Add flour and cook 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Stir in broth and milk, stirring until sauce boils and thickens.
Add parsley, salt and pepper to taste and Parmesan cheese.
Drain 1 can chopped clams; add to mixture and cook 1 more minute.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic pasta sauce?
answer:
Title: 30-Minute Pasta Sauce
Ingredients:
2 cloves garlic
1/2 small onion
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 large can chopped tomatoes
1 Tbsp. basil
1 tsp. sugar
salt and pepper to taste
1 tsp. Italian seasoning
Directions:
Chop garlic and onion very fine.
Saute in olive oil until soft.
Add tomatoes, basil and rest of seasonings.
Bring to a light boil.
Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic pasta sauce?
answer:
Title: Creamy Italian Pasta
Ingredients:
1 c. Hellmann's real or light mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried basil
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 c. twist macaroni, cooked and drained
1 c. quartered cherry tomatoes
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1/2 c. sliced ripe olives
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients.
Stir in remaining ingredients. Cover.
Chill.
Makes 3 cups.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic pasta sauce?
answer:
Title: Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. oil (I use olive ol)
approximately 1/2 c. vinegar
2 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
salt and pepper to taste
1 clove fresh garlic
1/2 tsp. dried dill
Directions:
Put ingredients in blender and mix until creamy.

question: What’s a good recipe for a grilled cheese sandwich?
answer:
Title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. unsalted butter
4 large mushrooms, sliced
2 medium green onions, minced
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. freshly ground pepper
4 oz. cold Brie, cut into 1/8-inch thick slices
8 slices firm textured white bread, crusts removed
4 sprigs fresh tarragon
Directions:
In a heavy medium skillet, melt the butter over high heat. When the butter begins to brown, add the mushrooms and toss to coat.
Saute, stirring occasionally, until the mushrooms have browned around the edges, 2 to 3 minutes.
Add the green onions and cook for 1 minute longer. Transfer the mushrooms to a plate and season with salt and pepper.
Divide the cheese among 4 slices of bread.
Top each with the mushrooms, leaving about 1/4-inch from the edge of the bread. Add a tarragon sprig and cover with the remaining 4 slices of bread.
Preheat a cast-iron ridged griddle or skillet for 10 minutes over moderate heat. Grill the sandwiches for 4 minutes per side or until the bread is lightly browned and the cheese has melted.
Serve halved as a first course or quartered as an hors d'oeuvre.

question: What’s a good recipe for a grilled cheese sandwich?
answer:
Title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
Ingredients:
2 pieces bread
butter, softened
2 to 3 slices your favorite sandwich cheese
Directions:
Prepare a medium size skillet with Pam cooking spray or butter. Heat skillet.
Lightly butter one side of each piece of bread.
Lay butter side down; place cheese on top, then place other slice of bread with butter facing up.
Cook on both sides until lightly browned.
Cut into strips or use your favorite cookie cutter for little fingers.

question: What’s a good recipe for a grilled cheese sandwich?
answer:
Title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
Ingredients:
1 slice cheese
2 slices bread
butter
Directions:
Take 2 slices bread and butter one side of each.
Put one piece of the bread buttered side down onto a hot griddle.
Put a slice of cheese on top of bread and put the other piece of bread, buttered side up, on top of cheese.
Let bottom get light or golden brown.
Turn and do the same to other side.

question: What’s a good recipe for a grilled cheese sandwich?
answer:
Title: Grilled Cheese Sandwiches
Ingredients:
1/4 stick butter
2 slices bread
1 slice cheese
Directions:
Heat butter in skillet.
Put cheese in between bread.
Put in pan.
Cook until nice and brown.
Then eat it.

question: What’s a good recipe for a grilled cheese sandwich?
answer:
Title: Grilled Cheese Sandwiches
Ingredients:
2 pieces of bread
butter
1 slice of cheese
Directions:
Heat frying pan to 350 degrees till golden brown.
Butter both sides of each slice of bread.
Put one slice in pan and put cheese on top, then put bread on top of that.
Brown on both sides.

question: What can I cook with potatoes and zucchini?
answer:
Title: Zucchini-Potato Pancakes
Ingredients:
1/4 c. milk
1 egg
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
2 c. shredded potatoes (half a 20 oz. refrigerated pkg.)
8 oz. zucchini, shredded
1 small onion, finely chopped
2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
Directions:
Whisk together milk and egg in medium size bowl.
Add the flour, baking powder, salt, pepper and garlic.
Whisk until smooth. Stir in the potatoes, zucchini, onion and cheese.
Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Using 1/4 cup for each pancake, cook until browned on underside, about 3 minutes.
Turn pancake over.
Reduce heat to medium-low; cook 5 minutes until cooked through.
Keep warm on plate.
Repeat. Makes 4 servings or 12 pancakes.

question: What can I cook with potatoes and zucchini?
answer:
Title: Zucchini And Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 medium zucchini
3 medium potatoes (red)
2 tsp. oil
1 small onion, chopped
1 large ripe tomato, diced
1 c. chicken broth
1 tsp. parsley, chopped
1/4 tsp. rosemary
1/4 tsp. oregano
Directions:
Cut unpeeled potatoes and zucchini into 1/2-inch pieces.
Heat oil in skillet.
Add potatoes.
Stir-fry 1 to 2 minutes.
Pour in chicken broth.
Cover and cook over low heat 5 minutes.
Add onion, zucchini, tomato and seasonings.
Stir.
Cover and cook until vegetables are tender.

question: What can I cook with potatoes and zucchini?
answer:
Title: Pan-Fried Potatoes And Zucchini
Ingredients:
6 medium potatoes
2 medium zucchini
2 Tbsp. oil
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cut vegetables into chunks.
Cook potatoes in oil over medium-high until some have browned.
Add zucchini, salt and pepper.
Cover; cook over medium-low until zucchini is done.

question: What can I cook with potatoes and zucchini?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Pie
Ingredients:
3 c. refrigerated loose-pack hash brown potatoes
1 beaten egg
1/4 c. chopped onion
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 medium zucchini, sliced thin
1 clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. margarine or butter
3 beaten eggs
3/4 c. shredded Swiss cheese
1/2 c. milk
2 tsp. fresh oregano or 1/2 tsp. dried oregano
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
In large bowl, combine 1 egg, onion and Parmesan cheese.
Stir in potatoes.
Pat mixture into a 9-inch pie plate or a 10-inch quiche dish.
Bake, uncovered, in a 400° oven for 35 to 40 minutes until golden.
Cool slightly; reduce oven to 350°.
In large skillet cook zucchini in garlic and butter until just tender. Cool and arrange on crust.
In mixing bowl combine remaining 3 eggs, cheese, milk, oregano, salt and pepper.
Pour over zucchini.
Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes.

question: What can I cook with potatoes and zucchini?
answer:
Title: Microwave Zucchini One-Dish Meal
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. salad oil
1 1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. salt
3 potatoes, peeled and quartered
1 large onion, cut in wedges
3 zucchini (about 8 oz. each), sliced thin
1 green pepper, cut in wedges
1 red pepper, cut in wedges
8 oz. Mozzarella cheese (about 2 c.)
Directions:
In shallow 3-quart casserole, mix oil and next 3 ingredients. Add potatoes, onions and zucchini, turning to coat all sides. Cook, covered, on High 12 minutes until potatoes are tender; stir often.
Add peppers.
Cook, covered, on High for 10 minutes more. When vegetables are all done, sprinkle with shredded cheese and cook 1 minute more until melted.
Makes 4 servings.
About 370 calories per serving.

question: What can I make with leftover pork chops?
answer:
Title: Leftover Turkey, Chicken Or Pork
Ingredients:
2 c. diced, cooked turkey
2 c. chopped celery
1 c. cooked rice
1 c. mayo or Miracle Whip
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 tsp. chopped onion
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Mix all together.
Mixture will be dry.
Top with sliced almonds or croutons.
Bake at 450° for 20 minutes or until hot.

question: What can I make with leftover pork chops?
answer:
Title: Baked Pork Chops And Dressing
Ingredients:
4 large pork chops
2 c. cubed dry bread
1/8 tsp. sage
2 Tbsp. onion, chopped
1/2 tsp. celery salt
1/2 c. celery, chopped
2 Tbsp. water or more
1/4 c. oleo, melted
1 can mushroom soup plus 1/3 can water
Directions:
Brown chops in skillet; place into a 2-quart casserole.
In small bowl combine bread cubes, onion and seasoning.
Add water and melted oleo.
Top each pork chop with 1/4 cup or more of dressing.
Combine soup and water in skillet used to brown chops and heat.
Pour over the chops and dressing.
Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 1 hour.

question: What can I make with leftover pork chops?
answer:
Title: Use Of Leftovers
Ingredients:
crisp cooked bacon or pork cooked leftovers
celery
lettuce
mayonnaise
Directions:
Chop up or grind bacon or pork and celery.
Mix with mayonnaise.
Serve on lettuce leaves as salad or as a sandwich with lettuce.

question: What can I make with leftover pork chops?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Pork Chops
Ingredients:
6 pork chops, cut 3/4-inch thick
shortening
salt and pepper
6 Tbsp. uncooked rice
6 tomato slices
6 onion slices
6 green pepper rings
1 (28 oz.) can tomatoes
1 (4 oz.) can sliced mushrooms, drained
Directions:
In skillet, brown chops in small amount of shortening.
Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Place chops in greased baking dish.
Top each chop with a tablespoon of rice.
Place tomato slices, onion slices and green pepper on rice.
Spoon tomatoes over all.
Cover.
Bake in 350° oven for 30 minutes.
Add mushrooms.
Cover and continue baking for 30 minutes longer. Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I make with leftover pork chops?
answer:
Title: Helen'S Leftover Pork
Ingredients:
1 to 1 1/2 lb. cooked pork
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1 onion, sliced
1 (16 oz.) can chunk pineapple
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
3 Tbsp. vinegar
3 Tbsp. water
1 to 2 c. cooked rice
Directions:
Julienne pork.
Add to soy sauce, ginger and mustard.
Toss and set aside.
Slice onion.
Brown pork about 6 minutes.
Add onion.
Cook about 2 to 3 more minutes.
Add pineapple and bring to a boil.

question: What can I cook with carrots and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Indian Chickpeas
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1/2 tsp. cumin seed
2 onions, diced
6 cloves garlic, crushed
1-inch piece ginger root, grated
1/2 tsp. turmeric powder
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
3/4 tsp. coriander
1/2 tsp. salt
2 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
1 tsp. garam masala
4 c. cooked chickpeas
juice of 1 lemon
4 small potatoes, boiled, peeled and chopped
Directions:
Heat oil.
Add cumin and onions.
Cook 3 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger.
Cook 5 minutes on low heat.
Add turmeric, coriander, cayenne and salt.
Stir; add chopped tomatoes and garam masala. Cook on low heat 10 minutes.
Add chickpeas and lemon juice.
Cook 5 minutes; add potatoes.
Serve over white steamed basmati rice, garnished with chopped green jalapeno peppers.

question: What can I cook with carrots and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Fresh Vegetables With Creamy Garlic Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. nonfat yogurt
4 cloves garlic, minced
1 1/2 tsp. olive oil
1 small artichoke, cooked and cooled
1 c. new potatoes, halved and cooked
