1 c. green beans, blanched
1 c. carrots (about 2 inches long), blanched
6 or 8 small beets, cooked and cooled
1/2 c. cooked chickpeas
Directions:
In a small bowl, combine yogurt, garlic and olive oil. Arrange remaining ingredients on a large platter.
Mound yogurt sauce in the center.
Serve at room temperature.
Serves 4.

question: What can I cook with carrots and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Marinated Carrots(A Great Cookout Dish And Easy To Make!)
Ingredients:
2 lb. sliced cooked carrots
1 can tomato soup
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. cooking oil
1/2 c. cider vinegar
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 chopped onion
1 chopped green pepper
3 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach
1 (9 oz.) can artichoke hearts
1/2 lb. cream cheese
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
4 Tbsp. margarine
6 Tbsp. milk
1/3 c. grated cheese
ground pepper
Directions:
Layer drained artichoke hearts in a 9 x 13-inch casserole dish.
Layer drained spinach next.
Blend cream cheese, mayonnaise and margarine until light and fluffy.
Gradually beat in milk. Spread over top of spinach.
Sprinkle with pepper and grated cheese.
Bake at 375° for 40 minutes.

question: What can I cook with carrots and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Chickpea Spread
Ingredients:
2 c. cooked garbanzos
4 Tbsp. lemon
1/2 c. tahini
1/3 c. water
1 tsp. garlic
Directions:
Blend.
Use as spread, dip or dressing.

question: What can I cook with carrots and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Marinated Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 (1 lb.) can French green beans, cut small
1 (1 lb.) can white Shoe Peg corn
1 (1 lb.) can early June peas (small)
1 c. bell pepper, chopped fine
1 c. purple onion, chopped fine
1 c. celery, chopped fine
1 small jar red pimentos
3/4 c. vinegar
1/4 c. cooking oil
1 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Combine vinegar, oil, sugar, salt and pepper in a saucepan and bring to a boil.
Pour over vegetables.
Let stand refrigerated overnight.
Keeps several days in refrigerator.

question: What’s a good recipe for a healthy vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Heart Healthy Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean round steak
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 onion, sliced
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 lb. broccoli, sliced
1/2 lb. carrots, cut in 1/8-inch slices
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
Rub fish with Puritan oil.
Roll fish in corn flake crumbs. Season fish with salt and pepper.

question: What’s a good recipe for a healthy vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: "Stir-Fry Vegetables"
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
1 lb. bean sprouts
10 pea pods
2 c. cauliflower flowerets
2 c. broccoli flowerets
2 medium carrots, sliced
2 celery sticks, sliced
1 (8 oz.) pkg. mushrooms, sliced
1/2 medium bell pepper, sliced in rings or strips
1/2 medium brown onion, sliced in rings or strips
Directions:
In large skillet, heat oil over medium heat.
Add all vegetables, except onion, mushrooms and bell pepper.
Cook until vegetables are almost to the desired tenderness, then add the onion, mushrooms and bell pepper, adding as much soy sauce as desired to taste.
Cook up to 1/2 hour or until done to taste. Serve with rice, chow mein noodles or both.

question: What’s a good recipe for a healthy vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables
Ingredients:
2 c. chopped cabbage
1 c. chopped carrots
1 c. chopped onions
1/2 c. chopped sweet pepper (maybe 1 hot pepper)
1/2 c. chopped zucchini
1 c. chopped cauliflower
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
Directions:
Heat oil about 1 minute.
Add vegetables with wooden spoon. Stir constantly until food is only wilted, but still crunchy.
The secret of good stir-fry is not to overcook.

question: What’s a good recipe for a healthy vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
olive oil flavored vegetable spray
1 medium onion, cut into thin slices
1 1/2 c. julienne cut carrots
1 1/2 c. fresh sugar snap peas
1 c. chopped red pepper
1/2 c. canned low sodium chicken broth (undiluted)
2 Tbsp. low sodium soy sauce
2 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper
Directions:
Coat a wok or large nonstick skillet with cooking spray.
Heat at medium-high (375°) until hot.
Add onion.
Stir-fry 3 minutes. Add carrot.
Stir-fry 2 minutes.
Add peas and sweet red pepper. Stir-fry 4 to 5 minutes or until crisp-tender.

question: What’s a good recipe for a healthy vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Unfried French Fries(Healthy Recipe)
Ingredients:
5 large baking potatoes (2 3/4 lb.)
light vegetable cooking spray
2 large egg whites
1 Tbsp. Cajun spice
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Cut potatoes into matchstick-size fries. Spray baking sheet well with 3 sprays of vegetable spray.
Combine lightly beaten egg whites and Cajun spice in a bowl.
Add potatoes and mix until coated.
Pour coated potatoes onto prepared baking sheet and spread out in a single layer, leaving a little space between.
Place baking sheet on middle rack of oven for 30 to 40 minutes or until fries are crispy.
Turn them every 6 to 8 minutes with spatula so they brown evenly.
Serve immediately.

question: What can I do with leftover chicken?
answer:
Title: Herbed Chicken
Ingredients:
3/4 c. Miracle Whip
2 garlic cloves, minced
2 tsp. dried basil leaves, crushed
1 tsp. dried thyme leaves, crushed
6 boneless chicken breast halves
1/4 c. dry white wine
2 Tbsp. finely chopped green onions
Directions:
Mix dressing, wine, garlic, onions and seasonings.
Pour salad dressing mixture over chicken; cover.
Refrigerate for several hours.
Drain.
Place chicken on grill over medium hot coals or on rack of broiler pan.
Grill or broil for 8 to 10 minutes on each side or until tender.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What can I do with leftover chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Casserole(Fast Recipe For Leftover Chicken)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. cooked cut-up chicken
2 to 3 cans crescent rolls
1 can cream of chicken soup
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1/2 can milk
Directions:
Combine soup, milk and 1/2 cup cheese and heat until cheese melts.
Combine chicken with mix.
Cover bottom of pan.
Fill rolls with 1 tablespoon mix and place rolls on mix in pan.
Cover rolls with remaining mix.
Heat in 375° oven for 20 to 25 minutes.

question: What can I do with leftover chicken?
answer:
Title: Gentlemen Prefer Chicken
Ingredients:
3 lb. Chicken, cut up
Salt and Pepper to taste
1/4 c. Oil
1 can Lemonade Concentrate, thawed
3/4 c. crushed Pineapple, drained
3/4 c. chunk Pineapple, drained
2 Green Bell Pepper, cut in strips
1/4 c. Brown Sugar
1/4 c. A-1 Steak Sauce
1/2 c. Slivered Almonds
Directions:
Brown chicken in skillet with oil, salt and pepper with a little butter.
When brown place in baking dish.
Put remaining ingredients over chicken in the order given.
Bake uncovered at 400 degrees for 45 minutes.

question: What can I do with leftover chicken?
answer:
Title: Leftover Chicken And Noodles
Ingredients:
1 can cream chicken soup
1/3 c. milk
1 1/2 c. diced cooked chicken
1 1/2 c. cooked noodles
1 c. corn
1/2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas
1/4 c. chopped onion
1/4 tsp. paprika
pepper
1/4 c. bread crumbs
Directions:
In 1 1/2-quart casserole, blend soup and milk; stir in chicken, noodles, corn, peas, onion, pepper and paprika.
Top with crumbs. Cook for 30 minutes in a 350° oven.
Serves 4.

question: What can I do with leftover chicken?
answer:
Title: Stuff Chicken
Ingredients:
1 large chicken
2 lb. ground pork
1 c. chopped ham
1/4 c. sweet relish
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 hot dogs, chopped
4 eggs, beaten
1/2 c. grated cheese
1/2 c. raisins
1/2 c. peas
1/2 c. ketchup
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/2 c. pimientos, chopped
1 onion, minced
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Prepare chicken for stuffing, removing all bones and meat, leaving skin, wings and legs intact.
Soak in lemon juice and soy sauce.
Chop meat of chicken.
Mix ground pork and chopped chicken, then add ham, sweet relish, hot dog, eggs, cheese, raisins, peas, ketchup, cornstarch, pimientos, onion, salt and pepper.
Mix them all together.
Stuff chicken with meat mixture.
Sew up opening and bake in moderate oven until brown.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach quiche?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Sausage Quiche
Ingredients:
1 lb. sausage, cooked, drained and crumbled
1/2 c. chopped onions
1/3 c. chopped green pepper
1 1/2 c. grated sharp cheese
1 Tbsp. flour
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. evaporated milk
1 Tbsp. parsley flakes
3/4 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 deep dish pie crust
Directions:
Saute onions and green pepper.
Combine cheese and flour. Place in pie crust.
Mix remaining ingredients and pour into shell.
Bake at 375° for 40 to 45 minutes or until filling is set.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach quiche?
answer:
Title: Spinach Quiche
Ingredients:
3 eggs, beaten
1 c. flour
1 c. milk
1 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking powder
1 lb. grated Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Butter 9 x 13-inch pan.
Mix all ingredients.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach quiche?
answer:
Title: Spinach Quiche
Ingredients:
1 pkg. frozen chopped spinach, drained
4 eggs
salt and pepper
1 c. milk
1 Tbsp. flour
1 1/2 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1 tsp. sugar
Directions:
Mix all together and bake at 350° for 1 hour; the last 5 minutes sprinkle a small amount of grated cheese on top.
Very tasty.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach quiche?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Sausage Quiche
Ingredients:
9-inch unbaked pastry shell
3/4 lb. pork sausage
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
2 eggs
1 Tbsp. flour
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. light cream or evaporated milk
Directions:
Heat oven to 425°.
Bake shell for 7 minutes.
Remove from oven and reduce temperature to 350°.
Brown sausage and drain. Reserve 2 tablespoons fat and cook and stir onion and green pepper in reserved fat.
Stir in sausage.
Spoon into pastry shell. Sprinkle with cheese.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach quiche?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Sausage Quiche
Ingredients:
9-inch pastry shell
3/4 lb. bulk pork sausage
1/2 c. chopped onion or Tbsp. instant minced onion
1/3 c. chopped green pepper
4 tsp. sweet pepper flakes
1 1/2 c. (6 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese
1 c. light cream or evaporated milk
2 eggs
1 Tbsp. flour
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley or 1 tsp. parsley flakes
1/2 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Heat oven to 425°.
Bake pastry shell 4 minutes.
Remove from oven; reduce oven temperature to 350°.
In medium skillet, brown sausage; remove and drain on paper towel.
Reserve 2 tablespoons fat; cook and stir onion and green pepper in reserved fat until crisp-tender, about 2 minutes.
Stir in drained sausage.
Spoon into partially baked shell.
Sprinkle with cheese.
In medium bowl, beat eggs until well blended.
Add remaining ingredients; mix well.
Pour over cheese.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 35 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean.
Cool 5 to 10 minutes; cut into wedges to serve.
Makes 6 servings.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Lemon Marinated Chicken
Ingredients:
4 chicken breasts (boneless, skinless)
1 Tbsp. fresh rosemary, chopped or 1 tsp. dried rosemary
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. white wine or water
1 Tbsp. oil
2 tsp. honey
1 tsp. soy sauce
1/2 tsp. Dijon mustard
1/2 tsp. lemon peel
Directions:
In a shallow dish, combine all ingredients except chicken; mix well.
Add chicken; turn to coat.
Cover and marinate in refrigerator 20 to 30 minutes, the longer, the better.
Oil broiler pan and place chicken on prepared pan; broil 4 to 6 inches from broiler.
Cook 8 to 10 minutes on one side, basting with marinade.
Turn and continue cooking and basting 8 to 10 minutes longer or until chicken is fork-tender and juices run clear.
Can also be charcoal grilled.
Use same method as for broiling. Serves 4.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Marinade With Tangy Dressing
Ingredients:
2/3 c. vinegar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. sugar
1/4 c. oil
1 can each: corn, peas and green beans, drained
1 green pepper, chopped
1 (4 oz.) jar pimento, drained and diced
1 c. onion, chopped
1 c. celery, chopped
Directions:
Heat together vinegar, salt, pepper, sugar and oil until sugar is dissolved.
Set aside to cool.
Place vegetables in large bowl and pour dressing over vegetable mixture.
Refrigerate overnight. Serves 6 to 8.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Tangy Lemon Chicken
Ingredients:
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. paprika
4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
3/4 c. boiling water
3/4 tsp. instant chicken bouillon granules
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/4 c. sliced green onions and tops
1 1/2 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 Tbsp. snipped fresh parsley
lemon slices (for garnish)
Directions:
Combine flour, salt and paprika in paper or plastic bag. Brush chicken with lemon juice.
Place a few pieces at a time in bag.
Shake to coat.
Heat oil to 365° in electric skillet or large heavy skillet.
Add chicken.
Brown.
Combine water and bouillon granules.
Stir until dissolved.
Add brown sugar and remaining lemon juice.
Pour into skillet.
Cover.
Reduce heat to 250°; simmer 5 minutes.
Turn chicken.
Sprinkle with onion and lemon peel.
Recover.
Simmer 10 minutes.
Serve garnish with lemon slices and additional parsley.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Lemon Herb Marinated Chicken
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. canola and corn oil
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. rosemary or tarragon, crushed
1/2 tsp. each salt and pepper
1 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
Directions:
In a cup, mix first five ingredients.
Pour over chicken. Cover and let stand at room temperature no longer than 30 minutes, turning once.
Broil 10 minutes or until thoroughly cooked, turning once.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Tangy Chicken
Ingredients:
4 chicken breasts, skin removed or chicken cutlets (use mallet to tenderize)
2 lemons
1 tsp. thyme, garlic powder and marjoram
2 or more Tbsp. soy sauce
4 Tbsp. honey (can add more if necessary)
Directions:
Mix ingredients; marinate chicken for one hour.
Put in broiler for 10 minutes or so.

question: How do I make a mushroom and cheese omelette?
answer:
Title: Mushroom And Cheese Omelette
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1/2 lb. mushrooms, cleaned, trimmed and sliced thin
1 clove garlic, minced or put through a press
1/4 tsp. thyme
1/4 tsp. crushed rosemary
1 Tbsp. dry white wine
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
4 eggs, beaten
1 tsp. milk
1/2 c. grated Gruyere or Parmesan cheese
fresh chopped parsley (for garnish)
Directions:
Heat half the butter in a frying pan and add mushrooms and garlic.
Cook over moderate heat 5 minutes or until mushrooms begin to soften.
Add thyme, rosemary and white wine and continue to saute another 5 minutes or until liquid evaporates.
Season to taste with salt and freshly ground pepper.
Remove from heat and set aside.

question: How do I make a mushroom and cheese omelette?
answer:
Title: Low-Fat Vegetable And Cheese Omelette
Ingredients:
1 whole egg
1 egg white
splash of low-fat milk
1/4 c. mushrooms
1/4 c. tomatoes
1/3 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1/4 green pepper
Directions:
Heat pan to medium temperature.
Saute vegetables in oil until soft.
In a bowl, whip whole egg, egg white and milk until fluffy. Remove vegetables from pan and begin cooking egg on low heat. After about 2 minutes, add vegetables and shredded cheese.
Season to taste.
Cover and continue to cook until egg is firm and cheese is melted.
Slip spatula under half of firm omelette and fold over.
Slide out of pan onto plate.

question: How do I make a mushroom and cheese omelette?
answer:
Title: Omelette Casserole
Ingredients:
4 eggs
1 1/4 c. milk
4 Tbsp. butter
salt
pepper
1/2 c. sliced mushrooms
1 c. diced potatoes
1/4 c. scallions, sliced diagonally
3/4 c. diced ham
10 slices cheese (approximately)
green peppers, diced (optional)
Directions:
Melt 2 tablespoons butter, add potatoes, mushrooms and peppers (optional).
Cook until done, slightly browned.
Mix eggs and milk, blend with beater; set aside.
Melt 2 tablespoons butter, add egg mixture, stir frequently, cook until eggs are fully cooked.
(There should be a watery liquid remaining with eggs.) Add potatoes and mushrooms, ham, scallions, salt, pepper and cheese.

question: How do I make a mushroom and cheese omelette?
answer:
Title: Cheese Omelet
Ingredients:
5 pieces bread, buttered on both sides
1/2 lb. Swiss cheese
4 eggs, well beaten
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
dash of pepper
1/2 lb. Cheddar cheese
2 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1 can mushrooms
Directions:
Place bread in a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Grate the cheeses; mix together and sprinkle on bread.
Mix together the eggs, milk, dry mustard, salt and pepper.
Beat well.
Pour over cheese.
Sprinkle mushrooms over top.
Cover and refrigerate overnight.
Remove from refrigerator 1 hour before baking.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.

question: How do I make a mushroom and cheese omelette?
answer:
Title: Texas Omelette
Ingredients:
2 c. dried bread crumbs
6 smoked sausage links
1/2 c. diced onions
1/2 c. diced green pepper
7 eggs
1 1/2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 can cream of mushroom soup or cream of chicken soup
1 can milk
1 pkg. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Layer croutons in a greased 9 x 13-inch pan.
Dice sausage links and saute them with the onions and green peppers.
Sprinkle the sausage, onions and green peppers over the croutons.
Beat the eggs and add the Worcestershire sauce, soup and milk.
Beat mixture until smooth.
Layer the shredded cheese over the sausage and vegetables.
Pour the egg mixture into the pan.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.

question: What can I cook with tofu and noodles?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables With Tofu
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. tofu, cut into 1/2-inch cubes (firm or extra firm is best)
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. vinegar
1/4 tsp. cumin
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. grated ginger
3 Tbsp. peanut or salad oil
1 large carrot, chopped
2 c. chopped broccoli
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1/2 c. sliced green onions
3 Tbsp. cilantro (optional)
use any vegetables that are your favorites
crispy noodles
Directions:
Place tofu in shallow bowl.
Mix soy, vinegar, cumin, garlic and ginger; drizzle this over tofu and set aside.
Heat oil in wok or large pan over high heat.
Add carrot and stir-fry 1 minute. Add broccoli and cook 2 minutes, then add mushrooms and onions. Reduce heat to medium.
Add tofu mixture and cook, stirring gently until heated through but vegetables are still crisp.
Garnish with cilantro.
Spoon over hot rice and pass the soy sauce and add crispy noodles on top.

question: What can I cook with tofu and noodles?
answer:
Title: Flavorful Tofu(Kids Will Eat)
Ingredients:
1 lb. extra firm tofu
1 small onion
1 can pasta ready tomatoes - 3 cheese
1/4 c. dry red wine
dash of chili pepper to taste
dash of marjoram to taste
dash of oregano to taste
dash of black pepper to taste
1/4 c. wheat germ
8 oz. mushrooms, sliced
1 Tbsp. olive oil
2 c. brown rice, cooked
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1/2-inch thick slices and allow to dry on paper towels.
Start to cook brown rice.
In large saute pan saute onions in olive oil until translucent.
Add mushrooms, red wine and spices and continue to cook until mushrooms are soft.
Coat tofu with wheat germ by placing wheat germ in shallow dish and gently pressing tofu.
Add tofu to saute, moving vegies aside to place tofu directly on pan.
Pour can of tomatoes over all and gently mix vegies onto top and in with the tomatoes.
Allow to cook, covered, on medium heat for 7 minutes.
Serve with rice.

question: What can I cook with tofu and noodles?
answer:
Title: Tofu Spaghetti
Ingredients:
8 oz. pasta
6 c. spaghetti sauce
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 lb. firm tofu, shredded or mashed
2 oz. grated Parmesan cheese
2 oz. Mozzarella cheese, shredded
2 oz. Colby or Cheddar cheese, shredded
Directions:
Cook pasta according to package directions.
Combine sauce with pasta and pour into a 9 x 13-inch casserole pan.
Combine tofu and cheese in separate bowl and cover pasta mixture with it. Bake 1/2 hour at 350°.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What can I cook with tofu and noodles?
answer:
Title: Mystic Tofu
Ingredients:
2 boxes extra firm tofu
1 large onion, sliced
2 medium tomatoes, chopped (optional)
1/2 tsp. cumin powder
1 tsp. curry powder
salt to taste
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
2 Tbsp. chopped cilantro leaves
2 Tbsp. poppy seed
2 cans cream of mushroom soup
1 onion
1 large green pepper
15 to 20 fresh mushrooms
oregano, basil, salt and pepper (sprinkle)
3 cans chunk white tuna, water drained
1 small bag frozen peas
1 box Ronzoni seashells
1 1/2 large Velveeta cheese
1 1/2 c. milk
Directions:
In bowl, add soup, onion, spices and milk and mix.
Add sliced mushrooms and diced green pepper; stir.
Boil noodles to only 3/4 cooked.
Drain and add to mixture, then add tuna and frozen peas, stirring gently into even chunks.

question: What can I cook with tofu and noodles?
answer:
Title: Tofu Chili
Ingredients:
5 c. cooked pinto beans
2 lb. tofu, frozen, then thawed, broken into pieces
1/4 c. soy sauce
1 1/2 Tbsp. peanut butter
1/2 Tbsp. onion powder
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 Tbsp. tomato paste
2 Tbsp. oil
2 Tbsp. oil
1 green pepper, diced
2 large onions, diced
3 cloves garlic, minced
16 oz. can tomatoes
8 oz. can tomato sauce
3 Tbsp. chili powder
1/2 Tbsp. cumin
Directions:
Reserve the cooking water or liquid from cans of pintos.
Mix the soy sauce with next 6 ingredients (including the first of 2 tablespoons of oil); coat tofu pieces with this mixture.
Fry over medium heat until all liquid is absorbed and tofu is browned. Saute the green pepper, onions and garlic in the other 2 tablespoons oil.
Put beans, tofu mixture and sauteed vegetables in a cooking pot or crockpot.
Add the tomatoes, sauce and season. Simmer 30 minutes or longer.
If in crock-pot, simmer several hours.
Serves 8 to 10.

question: What can I do with leftover pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Tomatoes
Ingredients:
2 large tomatoes, chopped
2 Tbsp. fresh basil or 2 tsp. dried basil
1 garlic clove, minced
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
4 oz. bow tie pasta or spaghetti, cooked and drained
fresh basil and grated Parmesan cheese (optional)
Directions:
Combine tomatoes, basil, garlic, salt and pepper; set aside at room temperature for several hours.
Serve over hot pasta.
If desired, garnish with basil and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

question: What can I do with leftover pasta?
answer:
Title: Refrigerator Soup
Ingredients:
chicken or beef broth
leftover meat
vegetables
pasta
Directions:
Use canned broth or a favorite canned soup as a base.
Add meat and vegetables from previous meals.
Simmer until heated. Add pasta or rice if desired.
Serve with salad and bread. Delicious!

question: What can I do with leftover pasta?
answer:
Title: Luscious Leftovers(Cold Salad)
Ingredients:
3 c. ham, cut up
1 c. (12 oz.) whole kernel corn, drained
1 c. chopped green pepper
2 medium tomatoes, chopped
2 Tbsp. minced onion
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
About 15 minutes before serving, mix in a large bowl.
Combine ham and all ingredients with the mayonnaise.

question: What can I do with leftover pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Herbs
Ingredients:
1 lb. noodles (spaghetti or macaroni)
3 Tbsp. basil, chopped
3 Tbsp. parsley, chopped
1 Tbsp. oregano, chopped
1 clove garlic, crushed
1/2 c. olive oil
1 c. cottage cheese
Directions:
Cook pasta until tender; drain and rinse.
Mix herbs, garlic, oil and cheese in a blender and liquify to make sauce.
Add sauce to cooked pasta and gently heat while stirring.
Serve immediately, 25 minutes to make, as a side dish or main dish.

question: What can I do with leftover pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. fancy pasta
1 c. green beans
1/2 c. olive oil
6 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
2 cloves garlic, crushed
1 tsp. sweet basil
fresh ground pepper
1/2 c. grated Parmesan or Romano cheese
2 c. sliced, cooked ham
1/2 c. sliced ripe olives
1 (7 oz.) jar roasted sweet pepper or pimento
1/8 c. chopped green onion
1/2 c. toasted almonds
Directions:
Cook pasta in boiling, salted water until tender.
Drain.
If using fresh or frozen green beans; cook until tender and drain.

question: What’s a good recipe for grilled lamb chops?
answer:
Title: Grilled Lamb Chops
Ingredients:
6 large lamb chops
1 Tbsp. olive oil
3 to 4 cloves of garlic, peeled and cut thin
1 Tbsp. rosemary
Directions:
Brush lamb chop with olive oil, then roll in garlic and rosemary.
Put on grill until done.

question: What’s a good recipe for grilled lamb chops?
answer:
Title: Indonesian Grilled Lamb Chops
Ingredients:
1 lb. lamb loin chops, trimmed and sliced
1 c. shoyu
1 c. chopped and peeled ginger
1/8 c. chopped garlic
1/8 c. sesame oil
1/2 c chopped fresh mint
1/4 c. coarse grain mustard
Directions:
Marinate for 24 hours.
Grill over charcoal.
Serve on a saute of mixed kula greens.

question: What’s a good recipe for grilled lamb chops?
answer:
Title: Grilled Greek Lamb Chops
Ingredients:
4 lamb chops (3/4-inch thick), trimmed of fat
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. snipped fresh mint
1 tsp. paprika
dash of cinnamon
dash of nutmeg
1 clove garlic
4 c. cooked rice
Directions:
Prick the lamb chops with sharp fork, then place in shallow bowl.
In a small bowl, combine lemon juice, mint, paprika, cinnamon, nutmeg and garlic.
Pour over chops, turning once so entire surface is covered with the marinade.
Refrigerate at least 30 minutes.
Drain chops.
Grill or broil 5 minutes on each side. Serve over rice.
Low-fat and tasty.

question: What’s a good recipe for grilled lamb chops?
answer:
Title: Charcoal Lamb Chops
Ingredients:
8 thick lamb chops
1/2 c. white wine
1/2 c. olive oil
1 tsp. garlic, minced
1 tsp. rosemary
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Season chops with salt and pepper.
Then marinate in a mixture of the other ingredients for 4 hours or overnight.
Grill the drained chops for 6 to 8 minutes on each side for a medium rare (pink center).

question: What’s a good recipe for grilled lamb chops?
answer:
Title: Grilled Leg Of Lamb With Garlic And Rosemary
Ingredients:
8 large garlic cloves, pressed
2 Tbsp. fresh chopped rosemary or 2 tsp. dried
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. ground pepper
1 (5 lb.) leg of lamb, boned, butterflied and trimmed of excess fat
Directions:
Combine garlic, rosemary, salt and pepper in small bowl.
Mash with fork to form coarse paste.
Place lamb in shallow baking dish.
Spread half of garlic paste over each side.
Cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours or overnight.
Bring to room temperature before cooking.

question: How do I make a cheesy chicken and broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Chicken Casserole
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. Cheddar cheese, shredded and divided
1 1/2 c. cooked chicken
1 1/2 c. pasta, cooked and drained
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped broccoli, thawed and drained
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. chopped red or green pepper
1/4 c. milk
3/4 c. seasoned croutons (optional)
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Mix all ingredients except 1/2 cup cheese and croutons.
Spoon into a 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Sprinkle with reserved cheese and croutons.
Bake 30 minutes until thoroughly heated.
You may also heat in microwave oven on High for 8 to 10 minutes.

question: How do I make a cheesy chicken and broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Chicken And Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli
2 c. (or more) cooked chicken
2 cans Cheddar cheese soup
1 c. milk
2 c. Bisquick or Jiffy mix or cornbread mix
2/3 c. milk
Directions:
Cook broccoli until tender.
Arrange spears in large 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
Place chicken on top.
Combine soup and milk and pour over chicken and broccoli.
Mix Bisquick or Jiffy mix and milk.
Spread this mixture over the chicken, broccoli and cheese. Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes.

question: How do I make a cheesy chicken and broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Chicken Casserole
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese, divided
1 1/2 c. chopped, cooked chicken
1 1/2 c. bow tie pasta, cooked and drained
1 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped broccoli, thawed and drained
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. chopped red or green pepper
1/4 c. milk
1/2 tsp. each: crushed, dried oregano leaves and garlic salt
3/4 c. seasoned croutons (optional)
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°.
Mix all ingredients, except 1/2 cup of the cheese and croutons.
Spoon into 1 1/2-quart casserole dish. Sprinkle with reserved 1/2 cup cheese and croutons.
Bake for 30 minutes or until thoroughly heated.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: How do I make a cheesy chicken and broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
1 pkg. chopped frozen broccoli
1 c. Minute rice
1 can cream of chicken soup
1/2 c. milk
1 (8 oz.) jar Cheez Whiz
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. (6 oz. can) water chestnuts, drained and sliced
Directions:
Cook broccoli by package directions; drain and set aside. Combine rice, soup, milk, cheese, salt and pepper.
Heat until cheese is melted and ingredients are well blended, then add onion, celery, water chestnuts and broccoli.
Stir thoroughly.
Place in a lightly greased 10 x 6 x 2-inch baking dish and heat in a 350° oven for about 30 minutes.
Fifteen minutes before removing from oven, cover top with finely crushed cracker crumbs.

question: How do I make a cheesy chicken and broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped broccoli
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 (8 oz.) jar Cheez Whiz
1 c. instant rice
1 c. cream of chicken soup
3/4 c. water
1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Saute celery and onion, then add frozen broccoli and steam for 10 minutes.
Then add Cheez Whiz, rice, milk, chicken soup and water.
Bring ingredients to a boil.
Pour into a casserole dish. Bake at 350° for 20 to 30 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a chicken enchilada casserole?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchilada Casserole(Or Turkey)
Ingredients:
3 to 4 c. cooked, chopped chicken or turkey
1 onion, chopped
1 small can chopped green chilies
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 can cream of chicken soup
1 small carton sour cream
3 to 4 c. shredded cheese (mix of Cheddar and Monterey Jack)
1 large pkg. flour tortillas
Directions:
Mix sour cream, soups and green chilies to make the sauce.
On a tortilla layer about 1 tablespoon meat; sprinkle on about 1 teaspoon onion.
Add 1 tablespoon sauce.
Top with 1 tablespoon cheese.
Roll up tortilla and place seam side down in a 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
Repeat until the baking dish is full.
Top with the remaining sauce and cheese.
Bake in a 350° oven until hot, about 20 to 30 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a chicken enchilada casserole?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchilada Casserole
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 medium onion, chopped
4 c. cooked shredded chicken
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
2 (14 oz.) cans whole tomato, diced
2 medium sized jars chunky-style salsa
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. parsley
1 doz. corn tortillas
3 c. grated Monterey Jack
1 (5 oz.) can sliced black olives
Directions:
Heat oil in large skillet and saute onion until soft and transparent.
Add chicken, tomato sauce, diced tomato, salsa, garlic powder and parsley; stir until blended well.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer uncovered for 15 minutes.
Place four corn tortillas in a 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
Pour one-third of the chicken mixture over the top, spreading evenly layer one third of the cheese and one third of the olives on top of the chicken mixture.
Repeat layers two more times, ending with olives on top.
Bake uncovered at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes or until cheese is light brown and bubbly.

question: What’s a good recipe for a chicken enchilada casserole?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchilada Casserole
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped onions
1/2 c. chopped bell peppers
2 Tbsp. margarine or butter
2 c. chopped cooked chicken
1 (4 oz.) can chopped green chilies
3 Tbsp. margarine or butter
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. ground coriander (cilantro)
3/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. salsa (optional)
2 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 c. sour cream
1 1/2 c. shredded Monterey Jack cheese
12 corn tortillas or chips
Directions:
Cook onions and pepper in skillet until tender. Combine in bowl with chicken and chilies. Set aside. In the same skillet, melt 3 tablespoons butter. Blend in flour, coriander and salt. Stir in chicken broth all at once; cook and stir until thick. Remove from heat; stir in sour cream and 1/2 cup cheese. Cut up tortillas (or use chips) and mix together. Pour into 13 x 9 x 2 baking dish; sprinkle with remaining cheese. Bake, uncovered, in 350° oven about 25 minutes. Serves 6. Can freeze. Can do ahead.

question: What’s a good recipe for a chicken enchilada casserole?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchiladas Casserole Style
Ingredients:
1 can Valley Fresh white chicken in water
1 small (1/2 c.) purple onion
1 small can diced green chiles
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can cream of chicken soup
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup
3 cloves garlic, chopped
1 soup size can water or milk
8 oz. sour cream
12 to 15 corn tortillas
2 c. grated cheese (Longhorn, Colby or Monterey Jack)
Directions:
Place first 7 ingredients in saucepan; heat to boil.
Reduce heat.
Add sour cream (do not boil after adding).
Place a couple of spoonfuls in the bottom of 4-cup crock-pot.
Layer tortillas, soup mixture and cheese.
Cook on low for the afternoon.
Let stand 10 minutes if there is too much liquid or cook a bit longer. Dinner is ready when lessons are finished.
Serve with tossed green salad.

question: What’s a good recipe for a chicken enchilada casserole?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchiladas Casserole
Ingredients:
4 c. pre-cooked chicken
1/4 c. butter
1 can cream of chicken soup
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 c. sour cream
1 pkg. flour tortillas
1 can chicken broth
1 can black olives, chopped
1 small can sliced green chiles
1/2 c. onion chopped
1 1/2 lb. cheddar cheese, grated
Directions:
Saute onions in butter.
Add chicken broth.
Add 2 cans soup, chiles, olives and chicken.
Simmer 7 minutes then add 1/4 cup cheddar cheese, and sour cream.
Layer in 9 x 13 inch pan. Tortilla, chicken mix, cheddar cheese, repeat, ending with 1 cup Cheddar cheese sprinkled on top.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes covered.
Remove cover last 5 minutes.

question: I need a recipe for a dairy-free soup.
answer:
Title: Creamy Cheese Soup(Debbie Loves My Cheese Soup.)
Ingredients:
6 c. milk
4 Tbsp. flour
1/2 lb. ham, diced in tiny pieces
1/2 stick oleo
1/2 lb. Colby cheese, grated
1 c. carrots, diced fine
Directions:
Put milk in a double boiler and cook on medium heat.
Melt oleo (this can be done in microwave) and add flour to oleo.
Mix well, then stir into hot milk.
Add cheese, ham and carrots and cook for 20 minutes.
Do not let double boiler boil dry!
Serves 6 to 8.

question: I need a recipe for a dairy-free soup.
answer:
Title: Apple Cake - Dairy Free
Ingredients:
2 c. apples (Granny Smith)
3 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon
2 c. sugar
1 c. cooking oil
4 eggs
1/4 c. orange juice
2 tsp. vanilla extract
3 c. flour, sifted
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Peel, core and chop the apples into small pieces.
Mix together with 3 tablespoons sugar and the cinnamon.
Set aside.

question: I need a recipe for a dairy-free soup.
answer:
Title: Cream Of Anything Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. flour
2 (14 1/2 oz.) cans evaporated milk
cheese (optional)
1 to 2 c. chopped meat or vegetables
2 to 3 c. broth
Directions:
Make a roux of butter and flour; add milk and make a thick white sauce.
If cheese is used, add here and whisk to melt.
Mix in leftover cooked vegetables or meat; stir until smooth.
Add broth to desired consistency.
Season to taste.

question: I need a recipe for a dairy-free soup.
answer:
Title: Dairy Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 (2 lb.) bag hash browns
1 can cream of chicken soup
12 oz. sour cream
1/2 c. onions, minced
salt and pepper to taste
2 c. Cheddar cheese or cheese of your choice
1/2 c. melted butter
Directions:
Mix all in large bowl and transfer to 9 x 13-inch pan.
Top with 2 cups corn flakes and 1/2 cup of melted butter mixed together.
Bake at 325°
for 45 minutes or until potatoes are tender.

question: I need a recipe for a dairy-free soup.
answer:
Title: Cheese Soup
Ingredients:
3 c. cubed potatoes
1/2 c. sliced carrots
1/2 c. sliced celery
1/4 c. chopped onion
1 Tbsp. parsley
2 Tbsp. flour
dash of pepper
1 1/2 c. milk
1/2 lb. cubed Velveeta cheese
1 can chicken broth
Directions:
Combine broth and veggies in big pot.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes.
Blend milk and flour together and stir into veggie mixture, cooking until slightly thickened. Add seasonings and cheese.
Simmer until cheese melts.
Serves 4.

question: I need a recipe for a hearty breakfast casserole.
answer:
Title: Breakfast Casserole
Ingredients:
2 c. sausage or bacon, cooked and drained
1/4 lb. sharp cheese, diced
1/2 lb. Velveeta, diced
1 stick butter
1 qt. milk
1 tsp. dry mustard
12 slices bread (crust removed)
1 tsp. dry onion
1/2 tsp. salt
6 eggs, beaten
Directions:
Grease a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Layer bread, meat, cheese and onion.
Melt butter and pour over all.
Beat eggs, seasonings and milk.
Pour over.
Chill in refrigerator overnight and bake 1 hour at 350°. Let stand 15 minutes before serving.

question: I need a recipe for a hearty breakfast casserole.
answer:
Title: Hearty Breakfast Muffins
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour (plain)
1/2 c. brown sugar
1 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. nutmeg
2 egg whites
1 1/4 c. skim milk
1/4 c. oil
1/4 c. molasses
3 c. bran flake cereal
1/3 c. raisins
1/3 c. apples, peeled and chopped
Directions:
Heat
oven
to	400°.
Mix
flour,
brown
sugar, soda, cinnamon, salt and nutmeg in a large bowl.	Beat egg whites in a small
bowl.
Stir	in milk, oil and molasses.
Add to flour mixture
and
stir	until just moist.
Stir in cereal, raisins and apples.
Spoon into greased muffin pans, filling 2/3 full. Bake 20 minutes.
Makes 1 dozen muffins.

question: I need a recipe for a hearty breakfast casserole.
answer:
Title: Hearty Casserole
Ingredients:
1 onion, chopped fine (about 1 c.)
4 Tbsp. butter
1 lb. lean ground chuck
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 (1 lb.) can red kidney beans (and liquid)
1 (10 1/2 oz.) can condensed tomato soup
1 to 1 1/2 c. sliced celery
3 to 4 thinly sliced raw potatoes (about 4 c.)
Directions:
Saute onion in butter or margarine until transparent; push aside. Add ground meat, salt and pepper; brown slightly.
Stir in remaining ingredients. Spoon into a 2-quart casserole. Cover. Bake at 375° for 1 hour or until potatoes are tender.
Makes 6 servings.

question: I need a recipe for a hearty breakfast casserole.
answer:
Title: Jb'S Hearty Breakfast Waffles
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour (white or wheat)
1 c. oats
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1/2 to 1 tsp. cinnamon powder
1/4 tsp. salt (optional)
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1 1/2 c. milk
6 Tbsp. melted butter
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
Directions:
In a very large bowl stir together the flour, oats, baking powder, cinnamon and salt. In a small bowl stir together the eggs, milk, butter and brown sugar. Add to flour mixture and stir until blended.

question: I need a recipe for a hearty breakfast casserole.
answer:
Title: Breakfast Casserole
Ingredients:
6 slices whole wheat bread
1/2 lb. ground turkey sausage
1 medium red or green pepper
1/2 c. chopped fresh mushrooms
4 oz. shredded reduced-fat sharp Cheddar cheese (1 c.)
1 (10 3/4 oz.) condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (8 oz.) carton frozen egg product, thawed
1 c. evaporated milk
3/4 tsp. mustard
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cut bread into cubes.
Place in shallow baking dish.
Bake at 350° for 8 to 10 minutes, until toasted.
Spray a 12 x 7 x 2-inch baking dish.
Place half of bread cubes in dish.
Set aside.

question: What can I cook with sausage and rice?
answer:
Title: Sausage Rice
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 medium onion, finely chopped
1 to 2 ribs celery, finely chopped
1 green pepper, finely chopped
1 (12 oz.) pkg. sausage roll
1/4 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 to 2 cloves minced garlic
1/4 tsp. each: basil and thyme
cayenne or Tabasco sauce to taste
1 c. rice
2 1/2 c. chicken stock
Directions:
In a large skillet, melt butter.
Saute onion, celery and green pepper until soft.
Add sausage until browned and crumbly. Add mushrooms, garlic and spices.
Cook about 3 to 5 minutes. Stir in rice.
Add stock.
Boil.
Reduce heat to simmer and cook until liquid is absorbed, 20 to 25 minutes.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: What can I cook with sausage and rice?
answer:
Title: Sausage And Rice
Ingredients:
1 lb. fresh sausage, sliced
1 1/2 c. cooked rice
Directions:
Fry sausage in a pan until done.
Add sausage to rice and stir mixture on low heat for about five minutes.
Serve hot!

question: What can I cook with sausage and rice?
answer:
Title: Rice And Sausage
Ingredients:
4 c. hot cooked rice
1 lb. Polska kielbasa sausage, sliced thick
1 large onion, diced
1 large bell pepper, diced
1 c. celery, cut up or chopped
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
1 c. beef broth
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. cornstarch, mixed with 2 Tbsp. water
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
Directions:
Cook rice as you would normally (4 cups boiling water to 2 cups rice). When cooked, combine sausage, onion, bell pepper and celery in large skillet. Cook for 4 minutes. Add tomatoes, broth and seasonings. Cover and simmer 5 minutes. Pour cornstarch mixture into skillet; continue to cook for about 3 minutes and pour over rice in a casserole dish.

question: What can I cook with sausage and rice?
answer:
Title: Rice-Sausage Dressing
Ingredients:
1 c. milk, warmed
2 c. bread cubes
1 onion, chopped
2 to 4 Tbsp. butter
4 c. cooked rice (not instant)
1/2 lb. mild sausage
1/2 tsp. sage
1/2 tsp. thyme
1 Tbsp. parsley
salt and pepper to flavor
Directions:
Soak bread cubes in warm milk.
Saute onion in butter until transparent.
Mix all ingredients.
Use to stuff turkey.

question: What can I cook with sausage and rice?
answer:
Title: Baked Rice With Sausage
Ingredients:
2 lb. bulk Italian sausage
4 celery ribs, thinly sliced
1 large onion, chopped
1 large green pepper, chopped
4 1/2 c. water
3/4 c. dry chicken noodle soup mix (1 to 1 1/2 envelopes)
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can condensed cream of chicken soup
1 c. uncooked long grain rice
1/4 c. dry bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
In a large skillet, cook sausage, onion and green pepper over medium heat until meat is no longer pink and vegetables are tender; drain.
In a large saucepan, bring water to a boil; add dry soup mix.
Reduce heat and simmer uncovered for 5 minutes or until noodles are tender.
Stir in canned soup, rice, sausage mixture and mix well.
Transfer to a greased 9 x 13-inch pan.
Cover and bake at 350° for 40 minutes.
Toss bread crumbs and butter; sprinkle over rice mixture.
Bake uncovered for 10 to 15 minutes or until rice is tender.
Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.
Makes 12 to 14 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for classic French crepes?
answer:
Title: French Crepes
Ingredients:
1/2 c. flour
2 large eggs
1 c. milk
1 Tbsp. melted butter
pinch of salt
Directions:
Mix flour and salt in large bowl.
Make a well in center and add eggs, melted butter and half of milk.
With a whisk or wooden spoon, gradually stir the flour into the liquid mixture.
While stirring, gradually add more liquid until consistency is that of cream.
When all liquid is added, beat or whisk to remove all lumps.
Pour 1/4 cup of crepe batter into preheated pan.
Cook both sides on low heat until lightly browned.
Makes 6 to 8 crepes. Fill with fruit, ice cream, or scrambled eggs.
Fold and enjoy.

question: What’s a recipe for classic French crepes?
answer:
Title: French Crepe
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking powder
2 eggs, well beaten
1 c. evaporated milk
1 c. water
1 Tbsp. melted shortening
Directions:
Mix together flour, baking powder and salt.
Combine eggs, milk and water.
Beat until smooth.
(I like to make batter the night before.)
In cast-iron skillet, add shortening (Crisco). When very hot, add 3 to 4 tablespoons of batter and fry until golden brown.
Serve with your favorite topping.
Brown sugar and sour cream is mine.
Roll like a jelly roll.
Enjoy.

question: What’s a recipe for classic French crepes?
answer:
Title: French Crepes
Ingredients:
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. flour
2 Tbsp. sugar
3/4 c. milk
1/2 c. water
1/4 c. butter, melted
1 can fruit filling (fresh fruit of your choice)
whipped cream
powdered sugar
Directions:
Beat ingredients together.
Pour batter into warmed skillet, just enough to thinly cover bottom of pan.
Cook over medium heat until golden.
Fill with fruit, roll up lengthwise and top with whipped cream and powdered sugar.

question: What’s a recipe for classic French crepes?
answer:
Title: Crepes(French)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
2 c. milk
2 eggs
1/2 tsp. vanilla
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Mix flour, sugar, baking powder and salt together in a bowl. Stir in remaining ingredients.
Beat mixture until smooth.

question: What’s a recipe for classic French crepes?
answer:
Title: French Crepes
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1 c. flour
1 c. milk
3 tsp. oil
pinch of salt
1/2 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Mix all together with a wire whip.
Fry as you would a pancake.
Drain on paper towel.
Cool.
Use whipped cream and top with fresh strawberries or blueberries.
Arrange the whipped cream on half of the crepe.
Then top with fresh fruit.
Then flip the crepe on top of fruit.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic shrimp pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta Salad With Shrimp
Ingredients:
1 lb. pkg. linguine
1/4 c. plus 1 Tbsp. olive oil, divided
1 Tbsp. margarine
1 lb. cleaned shrimp
1 garlic clove, minced
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
dash of cayenne pepper
1 red or green pepper, cut in 1-inch matchstick pieces
1 red onion, thinly sliced
12 small black olives, chopped
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh basil or 1 tsp. dried
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
3 tomatoes, cut in wedges
Directions:
Cook linguine according to package directions. Drain, rinse with cold water and drain again.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic shrimp pasta?
answer:
Title: Garlic Shrimp And Pasta
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 can clear chicken broth
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 1/2 lb. medium shrimp, uncooked, shelled and deveined
4 cloves garlic, minced
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper
3 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
5 c. hot cooked angel hair or very thin pasta
Directions:
Mix cornstarch and broth, set aside.
In a skillet or medium-high heat, heat oil.
Cook shrimp, garlic and pepper until shrimp turns pink, stirring often.
Set aside.
Add parsley and lemon juice.
Stir in cornstarch mixture and add.
Cook mixture to a boil and thicken, stirring often.
Return to shrimp pan.
Heat through.
Toss with pasta.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic shrimp pasta?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Pasta Medley
Ingredients:
1/4 c. (1/2 stick) margarine
1 clove garlic, minced
12 oz. medium shrimp, cleaned
1 c. half and half
1 c. pea pods, cut in half diagonally
1 red bell pepper, cut into strips
1/4 c. water
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
8 oz. linguine, cooked and drained
1 wedge (4 oz.) parmesan cheese, shredded, divided
Directions:
Melt margarine in large skillet on medium heat. Add garlic; cook and stir until lightly browned. Stir in shrimp, half and half, pea pods, bell pepper, water and crushed red pepper. Simmer 3 to 5 minutes or until shrimp turns pink. Pour sauce mixture over hot linguine. Sprinkle with 3/4 c. of cheese; toss to coat. Serve with remaining 1/4 c. cheese. Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic shrimp pasta?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Sauce For Pasta
Ingredients:
3 medium cloves garlic
1/3 c. good olive oil
1 lb. shrimp
1/2 lb. scallops (optional)
1 1/2 c. chicken broth
1/4 c. tomato paste
1/4 c. fresh minced parsley or 1 1/2 tsp. dried
1 lb. fresh tomatoes, coarsely chopped
1/2 tsp. each: oregano, rosemary and dried thyme
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Cook garlic in oil; add shrimp.
Cook a few minutes and remove from shrimp with slotted spoon.
Add tomatoes, chicken broth, tomato paste and herbs; cook until it measures around 2 cups. Just before serving, add seafood and serve over the pasta of your choice, cooked al dente.
This is an excellent pasta dish to use summer tomatoes.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic shrimp pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Shrimp
Ingredients:
1 lb. linguine
3/4 c. butter
1 medium green pepper, chopped
1 small onion, chopped
2 (12 oz.) pkg. frozen cocktail shrimp (not breaded), thaw and drain
1 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. pepper
grated cheese
Directions:
Cook spaghetti and set aside.
In heavy 3-quart saucepan melt butter.
Cook onions and peppers for a few minutes before adding the shrimp and remaining spices.
After cooked, toss over the spaghetti and sprinkle with grated cheese.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked French fries?
answer:
Title: Oven Baked French Fries(Low Calorie)
Ingredients:
2 large potatoes
1 egg white
1 Tbsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. red pepper
Directions:
Cut the potatoes into fries.
In a large bowl, beat the egg whites with a fork until foamy.
Stir in the chili powder and pepper.
Add the potatoes and coat them well.
Spray cookie sheet with Pam and spread in a row.
Bake at 450° for 30 to 35 minutes, until crisp and brown.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked French fries?
answer:
Title: Crispy French Fried Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 egg, separated
1/3 c. milk
1 tsp. sugar
1 lb. mushrooms, cleaned
5 c. Corn Chex cereal, crushed or bread crumbs or corn flakes, crushed
Directions:
Thoroughly mix flour, salt, baking powder and pepper.
Beat egg yolk and mix together.
Blend in dry ingredients.
Beat egg white until foamy.
Add sugar.
Beat until stiff but not dry. Fold into milk mixture.
Dip mushrooms in batter.
Drain.
Roll in Chex crumbs.
Drop a few at a time into deep hot (385°) fat.
Fry until golden brown (1 or 2 minutes), turning once.
Makes 18 to 20 appetizers.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked French fries?
answer:
Title: Crispy Oven-Fried Chicken(Makes 4 Servings)
Ingredients:
2 cloves garlic, peeled
4 slices white bread, torn into pieces
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese (about 1 oz.)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. crumbled sage or thyme
1/4 c. milk
2 1/2 c. chicken parts
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 375°.
Line a baking sheet with foil.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked French fries?
answer:
Title: Baked French Fries
Ingredients:
2 large potatoes
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/8 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. salt (if desired)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°. Peel potatoes and cut into slices 4-inches long and about 1/4-inch wide. Place in a bowl of iced water to crisp. Just before cooking, turn onto paper towel and pat dry. Turn pieces into a shallow baking pan. Sprinkle with vegetable oil. Shake pan to spread oil evenly over potatoes and spread into one layer. Bake 30 to 40 minutes, turning frequently, until golden brown. Turn potatoes onto paper towel. Sprinkle with paprika and salt, if desired.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked French fries?
answer:
Title: Oven French Fries
Ingredients:
6 large potatoes, do not peel
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
pepper
basil
parsley
1 clove garlic, crushed
Directions:
Cut potatoes in long strips about 1/2 inch square.
Mix olive oil and seasonings together in bowl.
Stir in potatoes until covered with mixture.
Spread potatoes (one layer) on baking sheet sprayed with cooking spray.
Sprinkle Parmesan cheese over potatoes.
Bake in 425° oven 50 to 60 minutes until crispy.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for a sweet potato pie?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Pie(Century Old Recipe)
Ingredients:
2 c. sweet potatoes
1/2 c. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. salt
2 eggs
2 c. milk
1 1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. cinnamon
juice and rind of 1 lemon
Directions:
Mix ingredients well and beat until creamy and smooth.
Cook until mixture begins to thicken.
Pour into pie pans lined with pastry and bake in moderate oven (350°) until knife inserted in middle comes out clean, approximately 35 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a sweet potato pie?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Pie
Ingredients:
2 c. mashed sweet potatoes
1 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/2 tsp. allspice
1 Tbsp. vanilla
2 eggs, beaten
2/3 c. canned milk
1 c. milk
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
1/2 c. flour, mixed with water to make a paste
Directions:
Beat potatoes.
Mix in all the spices, vanilla, eggs, milk and butter.
Mix well, then add flour mixture.
Pour into pie shells. Bake at 400° for 30 to 45 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a sweet potato pie?
answer:
Title: Very Good Sweet Potato Pie
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. cooked sweet potatoes
1/2 c. sugar
1/3 c. light brown sugar
4 Tbsp. margarine
1/2 c. evaporated milk
1 egg
5 Tbsp. French vanilla instant pudding mix
1 Tbsp. milk
Directions:
Beat potatoes with mixer until free of lumps.
Add remainder of ingredients and beat well. Pour into one 9-inch unbaked crust and bake in preheated oven at 450° for 10 minutes, then lower baking temperature to 350° and continue to bake for 30 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a sweet potato pie?
answer:
Title: Old Fashioned Sweet Potato Pie
Ingredients:
6 large sweet potatoes, boiled and peeled
1 1/2 c. evaporated milk
1 1/2 tsp. lemon juice
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 1/2 Tbsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
2 eggs
1 stick butter
1 Tbsp. flour
1 Tbsp. vanilla
3 prepared pie shells
Directions:
Prepare oven to 375°.
Mash potatoes until well blended.
Add butter, sugar and eggs, stirring well after each addition.
Add lemon juice, vanilla, cinnamon and nutmeg.
Blend until of smooth consistency. Add milk, stirring so mixture will not become lumpy. Sprinkle flour over butter.
Stir into mixture.
Pour into pie shells. Bake 30 minutes or until done in a 350° oven.

question: What’s a good recipe for a sweet potato pie?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Pie
Ingredients:
4 medium potatoes, cooked
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. lemon
1 1/2 c. milk
1 stick margarine
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. salt
3 eggs, separated
Directions:
Mash potatoes and margarine together.
Add sugar, salt, spices and flavorings.
Separate eggs.
Blend yolks with milk (add more milk if desired); add to potato mixture (will be a very thin consistency).
Pour into unbaked pie shell; cook at 400° until lightly browned (approximately 45 minutes).

question: How do I make chocolate chip cookies without eggs?
answer:
Title: The Best Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter flavor Crisco
1 1/4 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. milk
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1 egg
1 3/4 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. baking soda
1 c. semi-sweet chips
1 c. nuts (optional)
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and spoon onto ungreased sheet.
Bake at 350° for 10 to 13 minutes.
Makes 3 dozen.

question: How do I make chocolate chip cookies without eggs?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1/2 gal. mix
1 bag chocolate chips
2 eggs
Directions:
Put in bowl. Pour in pan, put it in oven 1 to 1 1/2 hours at 50°.
Take it out and cut into circles.
Wait till cool - 5 minutes.
Eat them.

question: How do I make chocolate chip cookies without eggs?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
3 eggs
1 lb. dark brown sugar
1 1/2 c. granulated sugar
2 Tbsp. vanilla
1 lb. butter or margarine, softened
6 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 Tbsp. water
4 c. chocolate chips or 2 (12 oz.) pkg.
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
In a large mixing bowl beat eggs for 4 minutes on high speed; add the sugar, vanilla and butter and mix well.
Sift together the flour, salt and baking soda.
Add the flour mixture to the batter slowly and mix well.
Add the water and mix again.
Stir in the chocolate chips.
Measure 1/4 cup batter onto an ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake at 350° for 13 to 15 minutes or until golden brown.
Be careful not to overbake.

question: How do I make chocolate chip cookies without eggs?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
3/4 c. brown sugar
3/4 c. sugar
1 c. softened butter
2 eggs
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. soda
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
2 1/2 c. flour
Directions:
Mix sugars, butter, eggs and vanilla until smooth.
Add remaining ingredients.
Bake at 350° for 10 to 12 minutes.

question: How do I make chocolate chip cookies without eggs?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. softened butter or shortening
2 medium eggs or 3 small eggs
1 c. granulated sugar
1/2 c. firmly packed brown sugar
2 tsp. vanilla flavoring
2 c. unsifted self-rising flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. chopped nuts (optional)
12 oz. semi-sweet chocolate chips
Directions:
Beat butter, eggs, sugars and vanilla until light and fluffy. Add dry ingredients; blend well.
Stir in chips and nuts.
Drop from teaspoon onto ungreased baking sheet 2 inches apart.
Bake in a moderate oven (375°) for 7 to 9 minutes.
Makes about 7 dozen.

question: What's a good dessert I can make with chocolate and strawberries?
answer:
Title: Berry Good Jello Dessert
Ingredients:
1 (3 oz.) pkg. strawberry gelatin
1 c. boiling water
1 (8 to 10 oz.) pkg. frozen strawberries
1 c. whipped cream
Directions:
Dissolve gelatin in hot water.
Stir in frozen berries.
Chill until slightly set; fold in whipped cream.

question: What's a good dessert I can make with chocolate and strawberries?
answer:
Title: Strawberries With Chocolate Cream
Ingredients:
1 c. whipping cream
3 Tbsp. cocoa
1/4 c. + 1 Tbsp. powdered sugar
2 qt. medium-sized fresh strawberries
Directions:
Beat whipping cream until foamy.
Sift cocoa and powdered sugar together.
Serve with strawberries.
Yield: about 6 1/2 dozen appetizers.

question: What's a good dessert I can make with chocolate and strawberries?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Dessert
Ingredients:
1 stick oleo
6 Tbsp. brown sugar
1 c. chopped nuts
1 1/2 c. flour
Directions:
Melt oleo in 9 x 13-inch pan; mix together remaining ingredients.
Reserve 1 cup and spread remainder evenly on bottom of pan.
Bake 20 minutes at 350°.

question: What's a good dessert I can make with chocolate and strawberries?
answer:
Title: Strawberries And Cream Dessert
Ingredients:
1 (14 oz.) can Eagle Brand sweetened condensed milk
1 1/2 c. cold water
1 (3 1/2 oz.) pkg. instant vanilla pudding and pie filling mix
2 c. whipping cream, whipped (1 pt.)
1 (12 oz.) prepared loaf pound cake, cut into cubes
4 c. sliced fresh strawberries
1/2 c. strawberry preserves
additional fresh strawberries
slivered almonds
Directions:
In large mixing bowl, combine sweetened condensed milk and water; mix well.
Add pudding mix; beat until well blended.
Chill 5 minutes.
Fold in whipped cream.
Spoon 2 cups pudding mixture into 4-quart round serving bowl; top with half the cake cubes, half the strawberries, half the preserves and half the remaining pudding mixture.
Repeat layering, ending with pudding mixture.
Garnish with additional strawberries and almonds.
Chill for 4 hours.

question: What's a good dessert I can make with chocolate and strawberries?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Dessert
Ingredients:
2 c. small pretzels, crushed
3/4 c. melted butter
2 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Mix together and bake 8 minutes at 400°.
Cool thoroughly.

question: How do I make a gluten-free cake?
answer:
Title: Diet Cake
Ingredients:
1/2 c nuts chopped
1 1/2 c dates chopped
1 c raisins
2 Tbsp butter
3/4 tsp soda
1 tsp vanilla
1 1/2 c whole wheat flour
1/4 c wheat germ
Directions:
Place all in bowl except flour and wheat germ.
Pour 1 c boiling water over all and stir well.
Add the flour and wheat germ and mix well.
Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or until done.

question: How do I make a gluten-free cake?
answer:
Title: Gluten-Free Substitute Cream Based Soups
Ingredients:
2 c. nonfat dry milk
1 c. cornstarch
2 Tbsp. dried onion flakes
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Combine and mix well.
Store in an airtight container.
Mark the mix ingredients and directions on container.

question: How do I make a gluten-free cake?
answer:
Title: Gluten Steaks
Ingredients:
8 c. unbleached white flour
2 1/2 to 3 c. water
4 c. vegetable water
1/2 c. tomato juice
3 Tbsp. oil
2 c. chopped onion
6 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Mix flour with enough water to make a stiff dough.
Form dough into a ball and knead about 10 minutes.
Place in bowl and cover with additional water.
Let stand 30 minutes or overnight.
Knead dough with hands under water to wash out the starch.
Pour off the starchy water and cover with more water.
Continue washing until water is almost clear.
You now have concentrated protein to make the steaks!

question: How do I make a gluten-free cake?
answer:
Title: Sugarless Cake
Ingredients:
16 oz. dates (chopped)
4 eggs
2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 c. unsweetened pineapple juice
1 tsp. salt
1 c. oil
2 c. flour
3 c. carrots (shredded)
1 c. nuts (chopped)
Directions:
Blend dates, eggs and juice. Add flour, cinnamon and salt; mix well. Add oil, carrots and nuts. Blend well. Spread in greased and floured 9 x 13 inch pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Serve with non-dairy whipped topping.

question: How do I make a gluten-free cake?
answer:
Title: Raw Gluten
Ingredients:
2 lb. whole wheat flour
1 qt. water
Directions:
Mix whole wheat flour with water into a firm texture.
Make sure all flour is mixed well (medium to firm dough).
Let set for 45 minutes (no less).
Put dough in a colander and while running cold water, continually squeeze dough to wash out starch from mixture.
Continue to squeeze dough, while at the same time, making sure dough stays firmly together.
Keep rinsing until all graininess is removed and water is clear from rinsing.
Cover with water until ready to use.
Yield: 1 pound.

question: How can I make crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Indian Chickpeas
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1/2 tsp. cumin seed
2 onions, diced
6 cloves garlic, crushed
1-inch piece ginger root, grated
1/2 tsp. turmeric powder
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
3/4 tsp. coriander
1/2 tsp. salt
2 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
1 tsp. garam masala
4 c. cooked chickpeas
juice of 1 lemon
4 small potatoes, boiled, peeled and chopped
Directions:
Heat oil.
Add cumin and onions.
Cook 3 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger.
Cook 5 minutes on low heat.
Add turmeric, coriander, cayenne and salt.
Stir; add chopped tomatoes and garam masala. Cook on low heat 10 minutes.
Add chickpeas and lemon juice.
Cook 5 minutes; add potatoes.
Serve over white steamed basmati rice, garnished with chopped green jalapeno peppers.

question: How can I make crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Chickpea Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. chickpeas
1/2 lb. diced Mozzarella cheese
6 oz. jar roasted peppers, drained and cut into strips
1 c. paper thin sliced zucchini
1/4 c. olive oil
2 Tbsp. wine vinegar (to taste)
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
dash of pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and let stand at room temperature for 30 minutes to 1 hour.

question: How can I make crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Curried Chickpeas And Vegetables
Ingredients:
2 c. soaked chickpeas or canned chickpeas
1 onion, sliced
2 carrots, diced
1 small zucchini, diced
2 tsp. olive oil
1 1/2 tsp. coriander (dry ground)
1 tsp. cumin (dry ground)
1 tsp. ground turmeric
2 tsp. salt to taste
1/3 c. fresh coriander leaves
1/2 small chili pepper (optional)
1/3 c. plain yogurt (low-fat)
Directions:
Cook chickpeas in enough water to cover until tender, 1/2 to 1 hour.
Saute onion in olive oil.
Add to chickpeas.
Add carrots and zucchini.
Cook on low heat until vegetables are tender.
Add a little water if necessary to keep moist.
Add 1 1/2 teaspoons coriander, 1 teaspoon cumin and 1 teaspoon turmeric.
Add salt, depending on your taste.
Cook on low heat for 10 minutes.
Add fresh coriander leaves, chopped fine, and 1/2 small chili if you like it hot and spicy.
Just before serving, stir in yogurt.

question: How can I make crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Chickpea Soup
Ingredients:
4 cloves garlic
1/2 tsp. dried or 1 tsp. fresh tarragon
4 Tbsp. olive oil
8 oz. can plum tomatoes
1 lb. can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 chicken stock cube
1 1/4 c. water
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Peel and crush garlic.
If using fresh tarragon, chop it finely.
Heat the oil and saute the garlic until it begins to brown.
Add the tarragon and tomatoes, roughly chopped, and lower the heat to simmer.
When ingredients come to a boil, cook for 25 minutes or so.
When the tomatoes are cooked, add the chickpeas and cook another 5 minutes.
Stir in the stock cube and no more than 1 1/4 cups water.
Season with salt and pepper to taste and serve.

question: How can I make crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Amanda'S Roasted Chicken With Vegetables
Ingredients:
4 to 5 lb. whole roasting chicken
1/2 c. softened butter
2 tsp. rosemary leaves, crushed
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 tsp. minced fresh garlic
6 new red potatoes, halved
6 carrots, quartered
2 medium onions, quartered
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
In small bowl, stir butter, rosemary, salt, pepper and garlic.
Rub chicken with 1/2 of butter mixture. Place chicken on rack in roasting pan.
Place vegetables around chicken and dollop remaining butter mixture over them.
Bake, basting chicken occasionally, for 2 to 2 1/2 hours.
Sprinkle with parsley.

question: How do I make homemade tortillas?
answer:
Title: Bennett'S Homemade Tortillas
Ingredients:
3 c. unbleached flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 c. shortening
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
3/4 to 1 c. boiling water
Directions:
Combine flour and baking soda, then add salt and pepper. Combine shortening into mixture, using a fork or pastry knife, until mixture is crumbly, then slowly add boiling water.
Knead for 3 minutes.
Cover and let it rest for 15 minutes, until shiny.

question: How do I make homemade tortillas?
answer:
Title: Tortillas (Flour)
Ingredients:
3 c. flour
1 1/2 Tbsp. salt
1/3 c. shortening
1/2 c. cold water
Directions:
Cut shortening in flour and salt.
Add water, enough to make a soft but not sticky dough.
Make into 18 balls.
Set aside about 30 minutes.
Roll out about 1/8-inch thick.
Bake on hot griddle. Serve warm with beans or chile con carne.

question: How do I make homemade tortillas?
answer:
Title: Tortillas
Ingredients:
5 c. flour (all-purpose)
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking powder
1/4 c. shortening
3/4 c. warm water (only as warm as your hand can stand)
Directions:
Mix flour, salt, baking powder and shortening together.
Pour small amount of warm water into flour.
Knead flour together. Only add enough water to where the flour stays together and forms a ball.
Preheat wrought iron skillet or some form of baking utensil on top of the stove.
Make small, round balls; roll out with rolling pin into a circle.
Cook in wrought iron skillet at a medium to high flame.
Cook on both sides.
Flip tortillas with tongs or fork.
Serves 6 to 8 persons.

question: How do I make homemade tortillas?
answer:
Title: Homemade Tacos
Ingredients:
1/2 green chili pepper, chopped
1/2 c. onions, chopped
1/2 c. green bell pepper, chopped
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 tsp. chili powder
1 garlic clove, minced
2 tsp. cornstarch, mixed with cold water to make paste
1 lb. ground chuck, browned
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
8 corn tortillas
Directions:
Saute
peppers,
onions
and
bell
pepper in oil until soft. Add
chili powder, garlic, cornstarch paste, meat, salt and pepper.
Cook
over
medium heat about 1/2 hour, stirring until thickened.
Fry
tortillas
and fill with meat mixture. Garnish with lettuce, tomatoes and shredded cheese.

question: How do I make homemade tortillas?
answer:
Title: Flour Tortillas
Ingredients:
4 c. flour
2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. shortening
1 c. lukewarm water
1 Tbsp. baking powder
Directions:
Place flour, salt and baking powder in mixing bowl.
Add shortening and mix well.
Add lukewarm water and blend well.
Turn out on lightly floured board and knead at least 50 strokes.
Divide into 12 equal sized pieces and form into balls.
Cover with a cloth and let stand 15 minutes.
Roll each ball into a round tortilla, about 8 inches in diameter.
Cook on moderately hot iron grill, ungreased, turning once.

question: I have only ingredients x, y, and z, what can I make?
answer:
Title: E-Z Pie Crust
Ingredients:
1 c. + 2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/3 c. oil
2 Tbsp. water
Directions:
Stir flour and salt together; add oil and water together.
Mix and combine.
Roll between 2 sheets of waxed paper; pull off one center crust in pan and pull off other sheet.
Makes one shell in less than 5 minutes.
Prick well; bake at 350° to 375° for 15 to 17 minutes.

question: I have only ingredients x, y, and z, what can I make?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti
Ingredients:
3 lb. ground chuck
1 c. bread crumbs
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 egg
a little milk
1 tsp. basil
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. Italian seasoning
salt and pepper
2 cans crushed tomatoes
3 cans tomato sauce
3 cans tomato paste
2 cloves garlic
dash of sugar
2 (8 oz.) Mozzarella cheese
2 (8 oz.) Ricotta cheese
1 egg
Directions:
Mix first 9 ingredients and make into meatballs.
Brown in oven until done.

question: I have only ingredients x, y, and z, what can I make?
answer:
Title: Z Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. oil
3 eggs
2 c. sugar
2 c. grated zucchini
2 tsp. vanilla
3 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
Mix all at once until well mixed (do not beat).
Pour into pan.
Bake for 1 1/2 hours at 325°.
Use a 12-inch loaf pan or a tube cake pan.

question: I have only ingredients x, y, and z, what can I make?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) pkg. ziti pasta
2 lb. ground beef
2 Tbsp. instant minced onion
2 Tbsp. parsley flakes
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. instant minced garlic
1 1/2 tsp. Italian seasoning
3 (8 oz.) cans tomato sauce
2 (6 oz.) cans tomato paste
2 3/4 c. water
1 (8 oz.) carton cottage cheese
1 small can sliced black olives
1 can mushrooms, drained
2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Prepare
pasta	as
directed
on
package;
cook only 7 minutes.
Drain.	Meanwhile,
brown
beef
and
drain.
Add seasonings, tomato sauce, tomato paste and water.
Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Mix pasta, meat sauce,
cottage cheese, black olives and mushrooms in a 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
Top with Mozzarella cheese.
Sprinkle Parmesan cheese
over
Mozzarella cheese.
Bake at 350° for 35 minutes.

question: I have only ingredients x, y, and z, what can I make?
answer:
Title: Ziti
Ingredients:
3 cans tomato sauce
1 lb. ground beef
1 small onion
1/4 size basil
1 Tbsp. salt (more or less)
1 Tbsp. pepper (more or less)
1/4 c. sugar (more or less)
1 large whole milk Ricotta cheese
1 box ziti
Directions:
Saute onion in oil.
Add beef and cook.
Add sauce and 1 1/2 cups water.
Bring almost to a boil.
Add seasonings.
Cook down 45 minutes to an hour.
Boil pasta with oil and a lot of salt. Wash pasta.
Mix pasta into sauce.
Add Ricotta cheese.
Enjoy.

question: How do I make a basic risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 diced onion
1 1/4 c. Arborio rice
1/3 c. white wine
2 Tbsp. tomato paste
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
5 c. chicken broth (keep hot over low heat)
1/3 oz. diced mushrooms, soaked in 1/2 c. water for 15 minutes, then chopped
Directions:
Heat oil in a large saucepan over low heat.
Add onion and cook until tender.
Stir in rice and cook with oil.
Add wine and stir until evaporated.
Add dried mushrooms, the water they were soaked in and the tomato paste, mixed in 1/2 cup of chicken broth. Stir until liquid is absorbed.
Continue adding broth, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly.
Each addition should be absorbed before adding the next.
Cook, uncovered, until broth is all absorbed and rice is tender to the bite.
Do not overcook.
Remove from stove.
Add Parmesan cheese; stir and serve.

question: How do I make a basic risotto?
answer:
Title: Fresh Vegetable Risotto
Ingredients:
2 c. sliced mushrooms
1 medium onion, chopped (1/2 c.)
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 c. long grain rice
3 c. chicken broth
3/4 c. bite-size asparagus or broccoli pieces
1 medium tomato, seeded and diced
1/4 c. shredded carrots
1 c. shredded Muenster cheese
1/4 c. grated Parmesan
3 Tbsp. fresh basil
Directions:
In a large saucepan, cook mushrooms, onion and garlic in hot oil until onion is tender, but not brown.
Stir in rice.
Cook and stir for 5 minutes.
In another saucepan, bring broth to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer.
Slowly add 1 cup of broth to rice mixture, stirring constantly.
Continue to cook and stir until liquid is absorbed.
Add 1 cup more broth, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly until broth is absorbed.
It should take 15 minutes.
Stir in tomato, carrot and remaining half cup broth. Cook until rice is slightly creamy and just tender, stirring constantly.
Stir in cheeses and basil.
If desired, garnish with tomato slices.
Serve immediately.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a basic risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto With Shrimp
Ingredients:
1/4 c. cooking oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
1 1/2 c. raw rice
1 can tomato paste
2 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 can shrimp or 1/2 lb. cleaned shrimp, cut small
1/2 c. or more peas
Directions:
Saute onion and peppers in oil.
Add rice; cook over medium heat until tanned; stir constantly.
Add tomato paste, salt, pepper and broth.
Mix and cover tightly.
Simmer without stirring for 35 to 40 minutes.
Add shrimp and peas.
Mix well.
Cook an additional 5 minutes until shrimp is done.

question: How do I make a basic risotto?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Risotto(Serves 6)
Ingredients:
8 Tbsp. butter (divided use)
2 c. rice
6 c. chicken broth
1 small bay leaf
1 lb. shrimp, peeled
1 tsp. minced garlic
salt and pepper
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
Melt 2 tablespoons butter.
Stir in rice to coat.
Add broth and bay leaf.
Cook rice.
Separately melt 2 tablespoons of butter; saute shrimp and garlic.
Salt and pepper to taste.
Add shrimp mixture to cooked rice.
Add remainder of ingredients. Stir and serve.

question: How do I make a basic risotto?
answer:
Title: Plain Risotto
Ingredients:
2 tablespoons olive oil
1 tablespoon butter
1 medium onion (chopped)
1 cup Arborio rice
1/2 cup white wine or dry vermouth
4 cups chicken or vegetable broth
1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese
fresh chopped parsley
Directions:
Heat olive oil and butter in a saucepan on medium high heat. Add onion and saut until soft.
Add rice and saut until rice is coated.
Add white wine or vermouth and stir until all the liquid is absorbed.
Add hot broth 1/2 cup at a time, until it is all absorbed in the rice and rice is tender.
Add hot water if more liquid is needed.
Stir in parmesan cheese and fresh parsley, and serve warm.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for baked sweet potato fries?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Fries
Ingredients:
1 lb. sweet potatoes
1 egg white
2 tsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. onion powder
Directions:
Peel and cut potatoes into 1/4 inch by 1/2 inch strips. In a bowl, combine egg white and seasonings; beat well. Add potatoes; toss to coat. Place in a single layer on two baking sheets coated with nonstick cooking spray. Bake, uncovered, at 450° for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown. Yield: 8 servings. One 1/2 c. serving equals 40 calories, 20 mg sodium, 0 cholesterol, 9 gm carbohydrate, 1 gm protein, trace fat. Diabetic Exchange: 1/2 starch.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for baked sweet potato fries?
answer:
Title: Oven-Fried Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 large sweet potatoes, unpeeled (about 2 lb.)
2/3 c. fine, dry breadcrumbs
3/4 tsp. dried rosemary
1/3 c. milk
vegetable cooking spray
Directions:
Scrub potatoes; cut crosswise into 3/8-inch slices.
Combine breadcrumbs and rosemary.
Dip each slice in milk and dredge in breadcrumb mixture.
Place on a lightly greased baking sheet and coat with cooking spray.
Bake at 450° for 15 minutes.
Turn potatoes and bake 10 to 15 minutes or until tender.
Yield: 6 servings.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for baked sweet potato fries?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Oven Fries
Ingredients:
2 medium sweet potatoes (12 oz. total), peeled
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. olive or canola oil
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450 degrees.
Coat baking sheet with vegetable oil spray.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for baked sweet potato fries?
answer:
Title: Spiced Sweet Potato Fries
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. canola oil
1/4 tsp. ground cinnamon
2 lb. sweet potatoes, peeled and cut lengthwise into 3/4-inch thick wedges
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine oil with salt, cinnamon and cayenne. Stir in sweet potatoes until each piece is well coated. Arrange sweet potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet. Bake at 400° for 30 minutes. Turn potatoes; bake until lightly browned, about 10 minutes. Remove from oven; place on serving platter.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for baked sweet potato fries?
answer:
Title: Oven-Roasted Sweet Potato Fries
Ingredients:
2 tsp. vegetable oil, divided
4 large sweet potatoes or baking potatoes, scrubbed
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
Line cookie sheet with foil.
Brush with 1 teaspoon of oil.
Cut potatoes lengthwise into 1/2-inch thick wedges.
Transfer to a large bowl.
Add remaining teaspoon of oil, salt and pepper.
Toss.
Spread potatoes in single layer on prepared cookie sheet.
Bake 25 to 30 minutes, until golden and crisp.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and cheese?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Cheese Soup
Ingredients:
1 qt. water
2 chicken bouillon cubes
1 c. diced celery
1/2 c. diced onion
2 1/2 c. diced, peeled potatoes
1 c. diced carrots
1 (16 oz.) bag frozen California Blend vegetables
2 cans condensed cream of chicken soup
1 lb. process cheese, cubed
Directions:
Bring water to a boil in a large kettle; add next 6 ingredients.
Reduce heat and simmer, covered, until all vegetables are tender, about 30 minutes.
Stir in soup and cheese.
Cook until soup is heated through and cheese is melted.
Yields 10 to 12 servings (3 quarts).

question: What can I make with cauliflower and cheese?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Cheese(Casserole)
Ingredients:
1 cauliflower (about 1 1/2 lb.)
1 small red pepper, chopped
1 small green pepper, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 1/2 c .milk
3 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. shredded Jack cheese or white Brick cheese
2 Tbsp. dry bread crumbs
1 Tbsp. melted butter
Directions:
Separate cauliflower into flowerets.
Drop into boiling water with salt.
Cook five minutes or until tender-crisp.
Drain. Arrange in a shallow, 2-quart well-buttered baking dish.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and cheese?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Salad
Ingredients:
1 head lettuce, cut up
1 head cauliflower, cut up
1 lb. bacon, fried
1 red onion, cut up
1/4 c. sugar
1/3 c. Parmesan cheese
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. salad dressing
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Layer first 4 ingredients. Make the dressing of sugar, cheese, salt, pepper and Miracle Whip. Sprinkle shredded cheese on top of layered mix. Spread dressing on top. Cover with Saran Wrap and refrigerate overnight. Toss before serving.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and cheese?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Cheese Casserole
Ingredients:
1 cauliflower (about 1 1/2 lb.)
1 small red pepper, chopped
