1 small green pepper, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced or mashed
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 1/2 c. milk
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. shredded Jack cheese or white Brick cheese
2 Tbsp. fine dry bread crumbs
1 Tbsp. melted butter or margarine
Directions:
Separate cauliflower into flowerets.
Drop into boiling salted water.
Cook 5 minutes or until tender-crisp.
Drain.
Arrange in a shallow 2-quart well buttered baking dish.
Heat 1 tablespoon butter in frying pan.
Add red and green pepper and garlic.
Saute for 1 1/2 minutes.
Sprinkle over cauliflower.
Mix cornstarch into milk.
Add 2 tablespoons butter to frying pan.
Stir in milk and cornstarch mixture; cook, stirring until thickened.
Add salt, pepper and cheese.
Stir until cheese is blended.
Pour over vegetables.
Mix bread crumbs and butter.
Sprinkle on top of casserole.
Bake at 350° for 25 minutes or cover and refrigerate. Bake for 35 minutes, if chilled.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and cheese?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Dip
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
1/2 lemon (juice)
1/2 onion, medium
1 large garlic clove, pressed
1 Tbsp. parsley, chopped fine
1 tsp. mustard
1 small pkg. cream cheese
Directions:
Mix all well.
Delicious served with vegetable trays for parties.

question: What can I make with leftover sausage and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sausage Egg
Ingredients:
1 leftover sausage cake, chopped
1 egg
1 tsp. water
dash of natural seasoning or onion powder
oil or butter
Directions:
Mix egg with sausage meat, water and seasoning.
Pour into skillet with small amount of oil or butter.
Over medium or hot heat, cook as an omelet.
Turn once until edges are brown.
Serve with slices of tomato.

question: What can I make with leftover sausage and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sausage Potato Dinner
Ingredients:
1 lb. Polish sausage
5 Idaho potatoes, peeled
2 cans cream of celery soup
1 c. water
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. chopped green pepper (optional)
1/4 c. chopped pimientos (optional)
Directions:
Grease a 3-quart baking dish.
In a large saucepan, heat soup and water over low heat, stirring occasionally.
Prepare cheese, peppers and pimientos.
Slice sausage.
Add above to soup mixture. Continue to heat.
Slice potatoes and layer on bottom of dish. Pour soup mixture over potatoes and bake at 400° for 1 1/4 hours. Serves 6.

question: What can I make with leftover sausage and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potatoes Parmesan(Great For Leftover Spuds)
Ingredients:
2 c. mashed potatoes
1/2 c. bread crumbs
1/4 tsp. chopped garlic
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
1 egg
Directions:
Combine all ingredients, except 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese; mix well.
Coat baking pan with Pam.
Using 2 spoons, drop on pan. Sprinkle on 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese.
Bake at 400° for 15 minutes.

question: What can I make with leftover sausage and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sausage-Vegetable Dinner
Ingredients:
3/4 lb. Polish sausage
4 medium baking potatoes
1 medium sized green pepper, cut into strips
4 medium carrots, cut into 3 x 1/2-inch strips
1 (16 oz.) can French-style green beans, drained
1 medium onion, quartered
1 medium head cabbage, cored and quartered
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. water
Directions:
Cut sausage diagonally into 1/2-inch slices.
Wash potatoes; cut into 1/3-inch crosswise sections.
Layer sausage, potatoes and next 5 ingredients in order given in a large Dutch oven, sprinkling each vegetable layer with salt and pepper.
Add water and bring to a boil.
Cover, reduce heat and simmer 35 to 45 minutes or until vegetables are tender.
Yields 4 to 6 servings.

question: What can I make with leftover sausage and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sausage-Potato-Dinner
Ingredients:
1 lb. or less Hillshire smoked sausage, cut into bite size pieces
2 1/2 c. potatoes, pared and thinly sliced
1 can cream of celery soup
1 c. water
1/3 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1/4 c. chopped pimentos (optional)
Directions:
Grease a 10-inch baking dish.
Line the bottom with potatoes. In separate saucepan, heat soup and water, stirring until smooth. Stir in cheese until melted.
Add Hillshire sausage pieces, green pepper and pimento (if desired).
Pour over potatoes.
Bake at 350° for 55 minutes or until potatoes are done.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make creamy garlic mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
8 medium potatoes, peeled and diced
6 cloves garlic, peeled and left whole
salt in water
Directions:
Boil potatoes and garlic in salt water until tender.
Drain well.
Add 1/2 stick light butter.
Using hand blender mash all above ingredients until smooth.
Slowly add skim milk and 2 Tablespoons lite mayo, until creamy consistency.
Sprinkle parsley before serving.

question: How do I make creamy garlic mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
5 lb. potatoes, pared
2 tsp. salt
2 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese with chives, cubed
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. heavy cream
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
paprika (optional)
Directions:
Cook potatoes with 1 teaspoon salt in boiling water until tender.
Drain.
Mash potatoes until smooth; add cream cheese, 4 tablespoons butter, garlic salt, pepper and 1 teaspoon salt.
Mix until smooth.
Gradually add cream; mix well after each addition. Put in greased baking dish.
(Bake at once or cover with foil and refrigerate overnight.)
Dot top of potatoes with 2 tablespoons butter and sprinkle with paprika.
Bake in 325° oven 30 minutes. Increase heat to 375° and bake 30 minutes more.

question: How do I make creamy garlic mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Herbed Garlic Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. potatoes
1/4 c. butter
1 small onion, minced
2 cloves garlic, slivered
3/4 c. milk
2 tsp. dried basil
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
In large pot, boil potatoes.
Drain.
In same pot, melt 2 tablespoons butter.
Add onion and garlic.
Cook until golden, stirring frequently.
Remove pot from heat and add potatoes, remaining 2 tablespoons butter, milk, basil, salt and pepper. Using an electric beater or potato masher, beat mixture until smooth.

question: How do I make creamy garlic mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 cloves crushed garlic
4 medium-sized all-purpose potatoes, peeled and thin sliced
1 bay leaf
1 Tbsp. margarine
1/2 c. buttermilk
3 Tbsp. plain low-fat yogurt
Directions:
In a medium-size heavy saucepan, bring 3 cups water to a boil. Add garlic, potatoes and bay leaf.
Cook, partially covered, over moderate heat until potatoes are "fork tender" (reserving 3 tablespoons cooking water).
Discard bay leaf, transfer potatoes to a large mixing bowl.
Add margarine, buttermilk and yogurt.
Beat with a mixer, then add just enough of the reserved water to make the potatoes creamy.

question: How do I make creamy garlic mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
8 baking potatoes, peeled and quartered (about 4 lb.)
1 3/4 tsp. salt, divided
1/2 c. butter, softened
3/4 c. half-and-half
3 large garlic cloves, minced
1/2 tsp. ground white pepper
1/4 c. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
Bring potatoes, 1 teaspoon salt, and water to cover to a boil in a Dutch oven or stockpot; cover, reduce heat, and simmer 30 minutes or until tender; drain.
Beat potatoes, remaining 3/4 teaspoon salt, butter, half-and-half, garlic cloves, and pepper at medium speed with an electric mixer until smooth.
Stir in fresh parsley. Serve immediately.
Makes 8 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for tacos with ground beef?
answer:
Title: Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
2 tsp. minced onions
1/2 tsp. minced garlic
3/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/4 tsp. oregano
Directions:
Cook ground beef in skillet until browned. Drain excess fat. Add rest of ingredients.
Simmer, uncovered, about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Makes 12 tacos.

question: What’s a good recipe for tacos with ground beef?
answer:
Title: M'M Good Taco Pie
Ingredients:
1 taco seasoning mix
1 deep dish pie shell
1 lb. ground beef
1 medium onion, chopped
1 (8 1/4 oz.) can refried beans
1 (8 oz.) jar taco sauce, divided usage
2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese, divided usage
1 to 1 1/2 c. Nachips or Fritos, crushed
tomatoes
sour cream
lettuce
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Thaw pie crust 10 minutes.
Prick bottom of pie shell thoroughly with a fork.
Bake pie shell for 10 minutes.
Remove from oven and reduce temperature to 350°.

question: What’s a good recipe for tacos with ground beef?
answer:
Title: Soft Beef Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 small onion, minced
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 green pepper, chopped
1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced
1 c. water
1 tsp. ground cumin
1 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. dried whole oregano
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
8 (7-inch) flour tortillas
2 c. shredded lettuce
2 tomatoes, chopped
1 c. (4 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese
1 (8 oz.) carton commercial guacamole
commercial taco or picante sauce
Directions:
Cook first 5 ingredients in a large skillet until meat is browned, stirring to crumble. Drain well. Stir in water, cumin, chili powder, oregano, salt and pepper. Cover and simmer over low heat 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Uncover and cook 8 to 10 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for tacos with ground beef?
answer:
Title: Beef Tacos(Quick Low Calorie Meal, Feeds 1 To 22)
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground beef
1 can chicken or beef stock
1 pkg. taco seasoning or chili powder, black pepper and garlic salt
grated cheese
picante sauce
taco shells
onions
lettuce
cumin
tomato
Directions:
Cook ground beef in iron skillet on medium heat.
Add 1 can of beef or chicken stock.
Season with spices or package of taco seasoning.
When stock is reduced, serve meat with slotted spoon. Chop veggies and put each in it's own serving bowl.
Put grated cheese in bowl.
Heat shells on cookie sheet in 300° oven for 15 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for tacos with ground beef?
answer:
Title: Taco Salad
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 head lettuce, shredded
1 small onion, chopped
1 small green pepper, chopped
1 tomato, chopped
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1 regular size bag Doritos, crunched up
1 large bottle Catalina salad dressing
Directions:
Brown ground beef.
Drain and cool in refrigerator.
Mix all other ingredients.
Just before serving, add beef and salad dressing.
Toss well and serve.
This is a large recipe and serves many.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Homemade Mac-N-Cheese
Ingredients:
1 lb. elbow macaroni
1 stick butter or margarine
3 c. milk
1 lb. Velveeta cheese
1 c. bread crumbs
4 Tbsp. flour
dash of salt and pepper if desired
Directions:
Cook macaroni and put in casserole dish.
Slice up cheese. Melt 4 tablespoons butter; add flour.
Stir; add milk and stir. Add cheese to mixture and stir frequently.
When melted, add to macaroni and mix.
Melt remaining 4 tablespoons butter and add bread crumbs; put on top of macaroni and cheese.
Bake at 350° for 20 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Homemade Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
8 slices American cheese
2 c. elbow macaroni, cooked
2 c. milk
1 bread slice
1/2 tsp. mustard powder
Directions:
Melt butter.
Add milk.
Add mustard powder.
Slowly add cheese.
Stir on low until sauce is thick.
Pour into baking dish with the macaroni.
Add broken bread bits.
Cook in oven at 350° for 20 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Homemade Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
2 c. uncooked macaroni
1 stick butter
1 1/2 lb. Velveeta cheese, cubed
1 can Milnot or evaporated milk
milk (enough to cover macaroni)
salt and pepper
Directions:
Put all ingredients in a prepared 9 x 13 pan and stir. Place in oven at 350°. Bake 1 hour. Every 15 minutes, pull out of oven and stir. Place back in oven; repeat process for that hour.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: My Mother'S Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
2 c. elbow macaroni, cooked and drained
1 can (28 oz.) tomatoes with liquid, cut up
1/2 tsp. onion salt (optional)
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. shredded Cheddar, divided
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Combine macaroni, tomatoes, onion salt, pepper and 1 1/2 cups of the Cheddar cheese.
Pour into a greased 2-quart casserole dish. Dot with butter.
Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes. Sprinkle with remaining cheese and bake 15 minutes longer.
Serves four.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Grandma'S Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. uncooked macaroni
4 Tbsp. butter
4 Tbsp. flour
2 c. milk
1 Tbsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 lb. cubed Velveeta
2/3 c. sour cream
1 1/3 c. cottage cheese
2 c. grated cheddar cheese
1 1/2 c. soft bread crumbs
Directions:
Cook and drain macaroni.
Place in 2 1/2 qt. greased casserole dish.
Melt butter over medium heat, stir in flour; mix well.
Add milk and cook over medium heat, stir constantly until sauce thickens.
Add salt, sugar, and cheese, mix well.
Mix sour cream and cheese into sauce.
Pour over macaroni; mix well.
Sprinkle grated cheese and bread crumbs over top.
Dot with butter.
The dish may be frozen at this point.
Bake at 350 degrees for 45-50 minutes.

question: What can I cook with leeks and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Leek Soup
Ingredients:
2 medium potatoes
bottoms of 3 large leeks
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. carrots, grated
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1 small clove garlic
salt and pepper to taste
1 pt. or more chicken broth
Directions:
Cook vegetables in enough water to keep from sticking until tender.
Add Accent while cooking.
Serve hot with saltine or other crackers.

question: What can I cook with leeks and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato Leek Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 c. coarsely chopped onions (about 1/2 lb.)
4 c. sliced leek (white part only, about 2/3 lb.)
2 medium potatoes, peeled and diced
3 Tbsp. butter, margarine or oil
4 c. chicken stock (about 2 cans clear chicken broth)
salt
freshly ground white pepper or regular white pepper
1 c. half and half
Directions:
Saute onions, leek and potatoes in butter over medium heat for 8 to 10 minutes.
Add stock and bring to a boil.
Simmer 20 minutes.
Puree potato-leek mixture in blender.
Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper.
Add half and half.
Return to heat and heat through.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What can I cook with leeks and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Leek Soup
Ingredients:
2 medium potatoes
bottom of 3 large leeks
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. carrots, grated
1/2 c. onion, chopped
small clove garlic
salt and pepper to taste
1 pt. or more chicken broth
Directions:
Cook vegetables in enough water to keep from sticking, until tender.
Serve hot with crackers.

question: What can I cook with leeks and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Leek Soup
Ingredients:
4 large leeks, well cleaned and cut into 1-inch portions (use white part)
4 medium potatoes, peeled and cut up
4 carrots, cut up
1 large onion, cut up
1 c. cabbage, cut up
1/2 c. sour cream (optional)
Directions:
Cook all vegetables in water or broth to cover.
Season with salt and pepper.
When vegetables are tender, put them through the blender with the liquid.
Blend until smooth.
Add 1/2 cup sour cream (optional) and serve hot.

question: What can I cook with leeks and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Leek Soup
Ingredients:
3 leeks
4 large potatoes, peeled and halved
2 liters water
salt and pepper
1 oz. butter
3/4 c. light cream
Directions:
Cut leeks into short (1-inch) pieces.
Saute them in butter. When they are golden brown, add water and potatoes.
Cook over medium heat until potatoes are soft.
Remove potatoes and mash them; then, return them to the soup.
Add the cream.
Serve over slices of bread lightly sauteed in butter.
Top with grated Swiss cheese.
(For those watching fat intake, substitute milk for cream and toast the bread without butter.)

question: What’s a recipe for classic shortbread cookies?
answer:
Title: "Shortbread"(Cookies)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. butter, at room temperature
1 c. confectioners sugar
1 Tbsp. vanilla
2 2/3 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 c. granulated sugar
Directions:
Beat butter, powdered sugar and vanilla until fluffy. Gradually add flour until well blended.
Divide dough in 1/2. Shape each into ball.
Flatten to 1-inch rounds between 2 pieces of plastic wrap.
Refrigerate until firm.

question: What’s a recipe for classic shortbread cookies?
answer:
Title: Shortbread Cookies
Ingredients:
3/4 lb. butter
1 c. powdered sugar
3 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/4 c. granulated sugar
Directions:
Cream softened butter and confectioners sugar together until light. Sift flour and salt together and add to butter/sugar mixture. Add vanilla and blend thoroughly. Gather dough in a bowl; wrap in wax paper and chill 4 to 6 hours. Roll out chilled dough to 5/8-inch thickness. Cut out cookies (hearts or shamrocks are nice). Sprinkle tops with granulated white or colored sugar. Place cutout cookies on ungreased cookie sheet and refrigerate for 45 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for classic shortbread cookies?
answer:
Title: Classic Shortbread
Ingredients:
1 stick butter (at room temperature)
1/3 c. powdered sugar (unsifted)
1/4 tsp. vanilla
1 c. flour
Directions:
Cream butter until light.
Mix in powdered sugar, then vanilla. Work in the flour.
Knead dough on unfloured surface until smooth. Use a shortbread pan or jelly roll pan.
Spray lightly with nonstick spray.
Put ball of dough in the middle of pan and spread to sides.
Prick entire surface with a fork, then bake at 325° for 30 to 35 minutes until very lightly browned.
Be sure middle of shortbread is completely cooked.
Cool 10 minutes, then loosen with a knife and flip onto a cutting board.
Cut while still warm into desired shapes.
Top with Lemon Curd, jelly or jam or dip in chocolate.

question: What’s a recipe for classic shortbread cookies?
answer:
Title: Fabulous Shortbread Cookies
Ingredients:
1 lb. unsalted butter, cold
1 c. sugar
1/4 tsp. salt
4 c. unbleached all-purpose flour
Directions:
Work cold butter with hands until soft and creamy, but not too soft.
Add sugar and mix.
In another bowl, mix together the flour and salt. Mix this into the butter-sugar mixture with your fingers until the particles cling together.
Gather the dough into a ball, kneading gently until it becomes smooth and soft, not too oily. Try not to handle the dough too much. The warmth from the hands melts the butter even more and over-develops the butter.
Pat the dough into a rectangle, 3/8-inch thick.
Mark out the pieces with fork tines.
Use a dull knife to score the dough into small 1 1/2 x 2-inch rectangular pieces.
Refrigerate 2 to 3 hours. Remove the pan from the refrigerator and deepen the slice lines to remove from the pan.
Bake pieces on an ungreased cookie sheet.

question: What’s a recipe for classic shortbread cookies?
answer:
Title: Shortbread Cookies
Ingredients:
1 lb. butter
1 c. granulated sugar
5 to 6 c. flour
1/2 lb. powdered sugar
2 to 4 Tbsp. lemon juice
red or green maraschino cherries, sliced
Directions:
Cream butter in mixer until smooth.
Add granulated sugar and beat until light and fluffy.
Add enough flour until mixture sticks together.
Gather dough and divide into 6 portions with minimum handling and using wax paper or foil.
Shape each dough into small log.
Wrap in foil and refrigerate overnight or until firm enough to slice.
Slice into 1/2-inch pieces and place on ungreased pan.
Bake at 275° for 45 minutes or until slightly brown on bottom and then cool.
Blend powdered sugar with lemon juice until smooth.
Frost top of each shortbread cookie.
Garnish with slices of maraschino cherries if desired.
Makes about 6 dozen cookies.

question: How do I make a honey mustard chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marinade
Ingredients:
2 or 3 Tbsp. mustard
1/2 Tbsp. honey
oregano as desired
garlic powder as desired
chicken pieces
Directions:
Combine first 4 ingredients.
Stir or mix well.
Wash chicken pieces.
Place chicken in large flat baking pan.
Pour or spoon marinade over chicken and let it marinate several hours.
Place in oven at 375° for 1 hour or until done.
Make gravy with juices. Serve with rice, mixed vegetables and butternut squash baked.

question: How do I make a honey mustard chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Honey Mustard Marinade (For Grilling)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. honey
1/4 c. Dijon mustard
1/4 c. lemon juice
1/4 c. soy sauce
2 cloves crushed garlic
Directions:
Combine all ingredients.
Brush on chicken while grilling. (Best to marinate chicken or pork for about 8 hours before grilling.)

question: How do I make a honey mustard chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Honey-Mustard Chicken
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. crushed rosemary
1/4 tsp. pepper
4 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. water
2 Tbsp. oil
4 tsp. honey
2 tsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. Dijon mustard
2 lb. chicken
Directions:
Marinate chicken for about 1 hour.
Bake or broil until chicken is cooked.
Drizzle with remainder of marinade while cooking.

question: How do I make a honey mustard chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marinade
Ingredients:
1/3 c. soy sauce + enough water to make 1/2 c.
2 Tbsp. honey
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. ginger
Directions:
Mix together and add chicken.
Let set in refrigerator for at least 2 hours.
Cook on the grill.
Enjoy.

question: How do I make a honey mustard chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Honey Basted Chicken
Ingredients:
8 chicken breasts
1/2 c. honey
1/2 c. butter
1/4 c. prepared mustard
Directions:
Dip chicken into other ingredients.
Refrigerate overnight. Bake 1 hour at 325°.
Baste with marinade.

question: I have leftover rice. What can I do with it?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice With Leftovers(Very Good!!!)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. long grain rice, washed in 3 changes of water and drained
3 Tbsp. oil
2 stalks celery, diced
1 medium onion, diced
1/4 green pepper, diced
2 cloves garlic, diced
1 to 2 c. or more of any leftover meat (ham, beef, pork, chicken or combination), diced
1/4 c. soy sauce (optional)
1 can water chestnuts, sliced
1 can pieces and stems mushrooms, drained (save juice)
2 1/2 c. water
4 Tbsp. chicken bouillon
Directions:
Fry rice in skillet over high heat, stirring all the time, until brown.
Scrape into 4-quart pan with lid.
Add all ingredients, bringing to a boil.
Boil for 1 minute. Turn to low heat and cover tightly.
Don't lift lid for 25 minutes.
Stir and serve.

question: I have leftover rice. What can I do with it?
answer:
Title: Tasty Rice
Ingredients:
2 c. rice
4 c. water
2 tsp. salt (optional)
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Stir lightly all ingredients; bring to a rolling boil and reduce heat to simmer. Cover with a tight fitting lid and simmer for 20 minutes. Remove from heat. Let stand covered 5 minutes. Remove cover; fluff with fork.

question: I have leftover rice. What can I do with it?
answer:
Title: Leftovers Delight
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. minced onion
1 Tbsp. margarine
1 1/2 c. chopped leftover meat (beef, chicken or ham)
3 c. cooked rice
1 (10 oz.) can creamed soup
grated cheese
Directions:
Cook onion in margarine in skillet until tender.
Add meat, cooked rice and soup.
Combine thoroughly.
May add a little milk for moisture.
Cover and simmer over very low heat about 10 minutes.
Sprinkle with grated cheese.
Serves four to five.

question: I have leftover rice. What can I do with it?
answer:
Title: Rice With Lemon
Ingredients:
5 c. water
1 1/2 c. arborio
1 Tbsp. salt
3 eggs
2 Tbsp. freshly squeezed lemon juice
1 c. freshly grated Parmesan plus additional for table
freshly milled white pepper
3 Tbsp. unsalted butter
Directions:
Bring water to boil in large saucepan.
Meanwhile, in bowl or pitcher with pouring spout, combine rice and salt.
Over high heat, pour rice into boiling water in slow, steady stream so as not to break boil.
Reduce heat to medium and simmer uncovered until rice is cooked 12 to 15 minutes.
Do not stir.

question: I have leftover rice. What can I do with it?
answer:
Title: Leftover Turkey, Chicken Or Pork
Ingredients:
2 c. diced, cooked turkey
2 c. chopped celery
1 c. cooked rice
1 c. mayo or Miracle Whip
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 tsp. chopped onion
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Mix all together.
Mixture will be dry.
Top with sliced almonds or croutons.
Bake at 450° for 20 minutes or until hot.

question: How do I make a tangy barbecue sauce?
answer:
Title: Tangy Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1 egg, slightly beaten
1/2 c. vinegar
1/4 c. oil
4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
Directions:
In a small saucepan, beat 1 egg; add remaining ingredients. Cook over medium-high, stirring constantly, until mixture begins to thicken.
Remove from heat.
Coat chicken wings, parts, breasts, etc. on the grill.

question: How do I make a tangy barbecue sauce?
answer:
Title: Tangy Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. catsup
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
2 tsp. prepared mustard
1 tsp. salt
1/2 to 1 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 bay leaf
1 garlic clove, minced
1/2 c. water
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Combine all of the ingredients in a small saucepan.
Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally.
Reduce heat, cover and simmer 30 minutes.
Discard bay leaf.
Use as a basting sauce when grilling chicken, pork or beef.
Yields 1 1/2 cups.

question: How do I make a tangy barbecue sauce?
answer:
Title: Tangy Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. prepared barbecue sauce
1/2 c. chili sauce
1/4 c. water
1/4 c. honey
1/4 c. brown sugar
1 clove garlic, sliced thin
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in small saucepan.
Heat to thicken and blend flavors.
Baste turkey with sauce during the last half hour of roasting.
Make 2 2/3 cups.

question: How do I make a tangy barbecue sauce?
answer:
Title: Tangy Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. ketchup
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
2 tsp. prepared mustard
1 tsp. salt
1/2 to 1 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 bay leaf
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 c. water
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Combine all of the ingredients in a small saucepan; bring to a boil, stirring occasionally.
Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 30 minutes.
Discard bay leaf.
Use as a basting sauce for chicken, pork or beef.

question: How do I make a tangy barbecue sauce?
answer:
Title: Sweet And Tangy Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
1 tsp. salt
dash of chili powder
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 medium minced onion
1/4 c. vinegar
2 Tbsp. water
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in saucepan.
Heat to boiling, stirring occasionally.
Remove from heat.
Let stand for several hours to blend flavors.
Makes about 1 1/4 cups sauce.
Use on spareribs or chicken.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked chicken drumsticks?
answer:
Title: Miniature Drumsticks
Ingredients:
3 lb. broiling chicken wings
1/2 c. flour
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. m.s.g.
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. paprika
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. oregano
3/4 c. buttermilk
oil or shortening
Directions:
Cut wings in half. Discard wing tips.
Combine flour, cheese and seasonings in shallow dish. Dip chicken pieces in buttermilk. Shake to remove excess. Roll in flour mixture.
Heat oil in electric skillet to 365°.
Fry chicken pieces for 5 minutes. Drain on absorbent paper.
Keep warm.
Yields 18 servings.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked chicken drumsticks?
answer:
Title: First Down Drumsticks
Ingredients:
3/4 c. picante sauce
1/4 c. honey
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 to 1 tsp. fresh grated ginger or 1/2 tsp. "canned" ginger
Directions:
Remove skin from chicken.
Combine ingredients; simmer for 10 minutes.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
Turn; brush with more sauce.
Bake 30 to 40 minutes longer.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked chicken drumsticks?
answer:
Title: Oven-Fried Drumsticks
Ingredients:
1/3 c. shortening
1/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 lb. chicken legs
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
Melt shortening in small pan and set aside.
In paper bag, mix flour, salt, paprika and pepper.
Put 3 or 4 chicken legs in paper bag at a time and shake to coat chicken.
Arrange flour-coated chicken in a single layer in ungreased baking pan, 13 x 9 x 2-inch.
Drizzle the melted shortening on chicken.
Bake, uncovered, 45 minutes or until chicken is tender.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked chicken drumsticks?
answer:
Title: Delicious Drumsticks
Ingredients:
1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. pepper
6 chicken drumsticks
1/4 c. melted and cooled butter
Directions:
Heat oven to 425°.
Mix flour, salt, paprika and pepper in a bowl.
Dip chicken into butter.
Roll in flour mixture to coat. Arrange in an ungreased square pan 8 x 8 x 2-inch.
Bake uncovered until done, about 50 minutes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked chicken drumsticks?
answer:
Title: Oven Fried Drumsticks
Ingredients:
12 chicken legs
3/4 c. flour
3/4 c. corn flake crumbs
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 eggs, beaten
1/2 c. margarine, melted
1 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Wipe chicken legs with damp paper towel. In clean bag, combine flour, corn flake crumbs, salt, pepper, poultry seasoning and garlic.
Dip chicken in egg a couple at a time, then shake in bag to coat with flour mixture.
Arrange in greased pan.
Pour melted margarine over chicken.
Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes at 400°.
Remove foil, increase heat to 450° and bake 25 to 30 minutes until golden brown.

question: What’s a recipe for a Greek salad?
answer:
Title: Recipe For Greek Salad
Ingredients:
1 head lettuce, washed and cut into bite-sized pieces
3 tomatoes, washed and cut into bite-sized slices
1 clove garlic, minced
3 or 4 green onions, washed, ends cut off and sliced diagonally
1/2 lb. Greek Feta cheese, crumbled or cut into small pieces
1 Tbsp. oregano, rubbed between fingers
1 tsp. Cavenders Greek seasoning
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. ground black pepper
8 Tbsp. olive oi
2 1/2 Tbsp. wine vinegar
Directions:
Add ingredients in the order given, toss gently and serve with your favorite crackers.
I like to serve it with Wheatsworth stone ground wheat crackers.
Recipe yields 6 large salads or 10 small salads.
Enjoy!

question: What’s a recipe for a Greek salad?
answer:
Title: Greek Salad
Ingredients:
1 large head lettuce, shredded
potato salad (recipe given)
2 or 3 tomatoes, cut into wedges
1 cucumber, cut lengthwise into fingers
1 to 2 avocados, sliced
6 slices Feta (Greek cheese)
1 green pepper, cut into rings
1/4 c. olive oil and 1/4 c. salad oil, blended
6 to 8 slices canned beets, cooked
shrimp, peeled and cooked
6 to 8 anchovy fillets
black olives (Greek-style preferred)
6 to 8 whole green onions
1/2 c. white vinegar
oregano
Directions:
Mound the potato salad on a large platter. Cover the potato salad with the shredded lettuce, then arrange the remaining vegetables in an attractive pattern on the lettuce. Place the anchovies and shrimp on top of the salad. The entire salad is then sprinkled with the vinegar, then the blended oil. Sprinkle liberally with oregano over all and serve at once. Toasted French or Greek bread is served with the salad. Each person serves himself from the beautiful salad platter. Serves 6 to 8.

question: What’s a recipe for a Greek salad?
answer:
Title: Greek Salad Supper
Ingredients:
5 medium potatoes, peeled, cooked and diced
2 Tbsp. each minced parsley and onion
2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1 Tbsp. oil
salt and pepper to taste
1/2 lb. cooked, cold shrimp
1/3 c. mayo
1/2 c. pitted black olives
1 head lettuce
2 tomatoes, cut into wedges
1 jar artichokes
1 cucumber, sliced into spears
1/4 lb. Feta cheese, diced
1 large green onion, sliced into rings
1/2 red onion, sliced and separated
1 bunch radishes
Directions:
Mix potatoes, parsley, onion, cider vinegar, oil, salt and pepper.
Chill until ready to serve.
Put on a bed of lettuce.
Mound potato mixture in center.
Arrange around potatoes: tomato wedges, artichokes, cucumber spears, green onion rings, red onion, pitted black olives, diced Feta cheese, shrimp and radishes.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a recipe for a Greek salad?
answer:
Title: Greek Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 c. olive oil
1/4 c. wine vinegar
bay leaf
1 clove garlic
1 tsp. oregano
1/4 c. parsley, chopped
1 bunch romaine (bite size pieces)
1/2 head lettuce (bite size pieces)
2 red onions, sliced thin
2 tomatoes, quartered
1 cucumber, sliced
1/2 green pepper, cut into strips
8 to 10 black olives
1/4 lb. Feta cheese, crumbled
4 hard-cooked eggs
Directions:
In a jar, combine oil, vinegar, bay leaf, garlic and oregano. Shake well and chill several hours.
In a large bowl, combine remaining ingredients.
Before serving, remove bay leaf and garlic from dressing.
Shake well and pour over salad.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a recipe for a Greek salad?
answer:
Title: Greek Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
3 c. cubed, cooked chicken
2 medium cucumbers, peeled, seeded and chopped (about 2 1/2 c.)
1 1/4 c. crumbled Feta cheese (5 oz.)
2/3 c. sliced pitted ripe olives
1/4 c. snipped parsley
1 recipe Aiolo or 1 c. mayonnaise, plus 3 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 c. plain yogurt
1 Tbsp. dried oregano, crushed
Boston lettuce leaves
Directions:
In a large mixing bowl, combine chicken, cucumber, Feta cheese, olives and parsley; set aside.
For dressing, in a small mixing bowl, stir together Aioli or mayonnaise and garlic mixture, yogurt and oregano.
Add to the chicken mixture.
Toss mixture gently until coated.
Cover and chill.
Serve on Boston lettuce leaves.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry(Recipe From India)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/4 c. butter
1/3 c. flour
2 c. chicken broth
1 c. tomato juice
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
salt
pepper
4 tsp. curry powder
4 c. diced chicken
5 c. hot, cooked rice
Directions:
Brown onion and celery in butter.
Add flour and blend.
Add chicken broth; cook until thick, stirring constantly.
Add tomato juice, Worcestershire sauce, seasonings and chicken.
Heat thoroughly.
Serve over the cooked rice.
Serves 8.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Curried Chicken
Ingredients:
3 to 4 lb. chicken
1/2 c. oil
1/2 c. onion, finely minced
1 clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. curry powder
2 c. tomatoes, coarsely chopped
2 c. water (hot)
2 Tbsp. salt
1 (6 oz.) can evaporated milk
2 Tbsp. flour
Directions:
Heat oil. Add onion, garlic and curry powder.
Cook 5 minutes, stir gently.
Add chicken, brown and remove (keep warm).
Add tomatoes to oil mixture, stirring constantly (3 minutes).
Add hot water and salt; mix.
Add chicken and simmer until tender (50 minutes).
Remove chicken to serving platter.
Blend evaporated milk into flour; stir constantly.
Stir and cook until thickens. Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Creamy Shrimp Curry
Ingredients:
6 c. water
1 Tbsp. salt
2 lb. unpeeled medium shrimp
1/2 c. minced onion
1/3 c. butter or margarine, melted
1/3 c. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. curry powder
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can chicken broth
1 1/2 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. ground ginger
1 tsp. lemon juice
hot cooked rice
Directions:
Combine water and 1 tablespoon salt in a Dutch oven; bring to boil. Add shrimp and cook 3 to 5 minutes; drain well and rinse with cold water. Peel and devein shrimp; set aside. Saut onion and butter until crisp-tender. Add flour and curry powder, stirring until smooth. Cook 1 minute, stirring constantly. Gradually add chicken broth and milk; cook over medium heat, stirring constantly until thickened and bubbly. Stir in salt, sugar, ginger and lemon juice. Add shrimp and cook over medium heat until thoroughly heated. Serve over rice.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Indian Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 1/4 c. onion, chopped
1 small garlic clove, minced
2 Tbsp. flour
2 tsp. brown sugar
1 tsp. curry powder
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/2 tsp. pepper
8 oz. can tomato sauce
1 1/2 c. water
2 chicken bouillon cubes
3 c. cooked chicken breasts, skinned, boned and shredded into large chunks
Directions:
Melt butter; add onion and garlic and cook until tender.
Add remaining ingredients (except cooked chicken).
Cover and simmer 30 minutes.
Add chicken; cover and heat.
Serve over hot rice.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Curried Chicken
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
1/2 c. pared, chopped apple
1/4 c. chopped onion
1 clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. curry powder
1/4 c. flour
1 c. light cream
1 c. chicken bouillon
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 c. cooked, chopped chicken (breasts)
Directions:
In a large pan, saute apple, onion, garlic and curry powder in butter until tender. Gradually add flour, then cream and bouillon. Cook and stir until sauce boils for about 1 minute. Add seasonings and chicken; cook for 10 minutes. Serve on a bed of rice (about 3 to 4 cups).

question: What’s a low-carb recipe for breakfast?
answer:
Title: Low Carb Breakfast Smoothie
Ingredients:
1/2 c. sliced fruit
1/2 c. cottage cheese
1/4 c. plain yogurt
strawberries, raspberries, peaches (fresh or frozen)
flavor with sugar-free Tang or Crystal-Lite to taste
Directions:
Mix all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth. Add ice if using fresh fruit and blend again until slushy.

question: What’s a low-carb recipe for breakfast?
answer:
Title: Breakfast Take Alongs
Ingredients:
2/3 c. butter or margarine
2/3 c. sugar
1 egg
1 tsp. vanilla
3/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. oats (quick or old-fashioned)
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. wheat germ or finely chopped nuts
6 crispy cooked bacon slices, crumbled
Directions:
Beat together until well blended the butter, sugar, egg and vanilla.
Add the combined flour, soda and salt; mix well.
Stir in oats, cheese, wheat germ and bacon.
Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased cookie sheet.
Bake at 350° for 12 to 14 minutes or until edges are golden brown.
Cool 1 minute on cookie sheet; remove to wire cooling rack.
Store in loosely covered container. Yield:
about 3 dozen cookies.

question: What’s a low-carb recipe for breakfast?
answer:
Title: Low-Carb Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. medium mushrooms
1 lb. bulk breakfast sausage (hot or sage)
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 350°. Clean the mushrooms. Remove their stems and use a paring knife to make the hole for stuffing larger. Brown and drain the sausage and stir in the cream cheese. Spoon the mixture into the mushroom caps. Bake for 20 minutes. Yield: About 30 mushrooms.

question: What’s a low-carb recipe for breakfast?
answer:
Title: Low-Fat, Low-Cholesterol Breakfast Casserole
Ingredients:
6 slices whole wheat bread, cut into cubes
1/2 lb. ground turkey sausage
1 red or green sweet pepper
1/2 c. (or more) mushrooms
1 (8 oz.) pkg. shredded reduced fat sharp Cheddar cheese
1 (10 1/2 oz.) can reduced sodium cream of mushroom soup
1 (8 oz.) carton frozen egg product, thawed (may use 4 fresh eggs)
1 c. skim milk
3/4 tsp. dry mustard
pepper
Directions:
Cut whole wheat bread into cubes, place in large shallow pan and bake at 350° for 8 to 10 minutes or until toasted, stirring once.
Spray a 12 x 8-inch baking dish and dump half of the cubes therein.

question: What’s a low-carb recipe for breakfast?
answer:
Title: Low-Carb Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. medium mushrooms
1 lb. bulk breakfast sausage, hot or sage
1 pkg. - 8 oz. cream cheese
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Clean mushrooms.
Remove stems and using a paring knife, make the hole for stuffing larger. Brown and drain sausage.
Stir in cream cheese until melted. Spoon mixture into mushroom caps.
Bake for 20 - 25 minutes.

question: What’s a kid-friendly dinner recipe with chicken?
answer:
Title: Kid'S Favorite Chicken
Ingredients:
8 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
1 roll Ritz crackers, very finely crushed
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
black pepper to taste
1 stick margarine, melted
Directions:
Mix cracker crumbs, cheese, salt, garlic and pepper; set aside.
Cut chicken into small pieces (about 1 1/2 inches).
Dip chicken in margarine, then into crumb mixture.
Place on a baking sheet in a single layer.
Bake at 400° for 20 minutes or until done.
Serve with Pineapple Dipping Sauce.

question: What’s a kid-friendly dinner recipe with chicken?
answer:
Title: Friendly Recipe
Ingredients:
1 tongue
2 ears
1 heart
1 mind
2 eyes
2 hands
Directions:
One Tongue that doesn't slander.

question: What’s a kid-friendly dinner recipe with chicken?
answer:
Title: Recipe For Making Friends
Ingredients:
1/2 cup friendship
1 cup thoughtfulness
1 cup Faith
1 cup Hope
1 cup Charity
Directions:
Be sure to add a teaspoon of gaiety that sings and then the ability to laugh at little things.
Moisten with a few tears of heart felt sympathy.
Bake in a good natured pan.
Serve repeatedly.

question: What’s a kid-friendly dinner recipe with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken For A Crowd
Ingredients:
4 c. diced, cooked chicken or turkey
1 c. chopped celery
2 Tbsp. grated onion
1 Tbsp. parsley flakes
1 Tbsp. chopped pimiento
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. mayonnaise
a little curry
water chestnuts, if desired
8 slices bread, cubed
3 eggs
1 pt. half and half cream
1 can cream of mushroom or cream of chicken soup
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Put 4 slices cubed bread on bottom of a greased 9 x 13-inch Pyrex dish.
Add chicken mixture.
Top with 4 slices of cubed bread.
Mix eggs and half and half cream.
Pour over casserole. Let stand, covered in refrigerator, overnight.
Next day, spread soup over mixture.
Top with grated Cheddar cheese.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.
Serve immediately.
Serves 10.

question: What’s a kid-friendly dinner recipe with chicken?
answer:
Title: Kid'S Wagon Wheel Dinner
Ingredients:
1/2 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. butter
1/8 tsp. black pepper
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
1 tsp. chili powder
1 (12 oz.) jar chili sauce
2 c. kidney beans
10 hot dogs
2 c. grated Cheddar cheese
4 wedge shapes of Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Slice 1 hot dog, end to end, and crosswise.
Saute onion in butter; add seasonings.
Blend in chili sauce, kidney beans and 9 sliced hot dogs.
Cook over medium heat until heated thoroughly, about 5 minutes.
Stir in grated cheese; heat until cheese melts. Pour into casserole and decorate top with cheese wedge shapes to form wagon wheel.
Place cut hot dog strips on top of cheese shapes and bake at 375° for a few minutes or until cheese melts.

question: How can I make baked ziti with sausage?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. Italian sausage, cut into slices
1/3 c. chopped onions
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 c. sliced mushrooms
2 c. eggplant, pared and cut into strips
1/4 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
3 c. uncooked ziti
3 1/2 c. spaghetti sauce
1 c. Mozzarella cheese
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Brown sausage, onions, garlic, mushrooms and eggplant.
Saute until vegetables are tender; drain off fat.
Add salt and pepper. Set aside.

question: How can I make baked ziti with sausage?
answer:
Title: Ziti With Sausage And Cream Sauce
Ingredients:
1 lb. ziti
3 Tbsp. butter or oleo
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1 lb. Italian sweet sausage, casing removed
1 c. heavy whipping cream
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Heat butter and oil in large frying pan.
Add onion and saute for 2 minutes.
Add sausage and cook, crumbling with fork, for 10 minutes, or until lightly browned.
Reduce heat to low and add cream, salt and pepper.
Continue to cook, stirring constantly, until sauce thickens; do not boil.

question: How can I make baked ziti with sausage?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. smoked sausage
1/2 c. margarine
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 c. green pepper strips
1/3 c. chopped onions
1/3 c. all-purpose flour
2 1/4 c. milk
2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese, grated
1/2 tsp. pepper
3 c. ziti
Directions:
In a large pan, brown sausage.
Slice into coin size pieces. Remove from pan and drain.
Melt margarine and cook mushrooms, green pepper and onions until tender (but do not brown).
Blend flour into vegetable mixture.
Gradually stir in milk.
Cook, stirring constantly, over medium heat until it begins to boil. Blend in cheese until melted.
Cook ziti; drain.
Stir hot ziti, cheese, vegetables and sausage together.
Pour into 2-quart buttered dish.
Bake at 350°, covered, for 30 minutes.
Makes about 6 servings.

question: How can I make baked ziti with sausage?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. sweet or hot Italian sausage or 1/2 and 1/2
1 (15 oz.) jar Ragu sauce
1 lb. Mozzarella cheese
1 (20 oz.) can tomato sauce
2 cloves garlic
1 lb. Ricotta cheese
Directions:
Brown sausage with garlic.
Add Ragu sauce and tomato paste. Simmer for 2 to 3 hours.
Cook 16 ounces ziti according to package instructions.
In a large casserole dish, place a layer of ziti, then layer of sauce, followed by cheese.
Repeat process ending with sauce.
Bake, covered, for 45 minutes at 350°.
Serve with Parmesan cheese.

question: How can I make baked ziti with sausage?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti With Sausage
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) pkg. ziti
1 1/2 lb. sweet Italian sausage links
1 medium size onion, chopped
1 large green pepper, chopped
1 (30 oz.) jar chunky garden-style spaghetti sauce
1 (8 oz.) pkg. shredded part-skim Mozzarella cheese (2 c.)
1 (15 oz.) container part-skim Ricotta cheese
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
About 1 1/4 hours before serving:
In saucepot, prepare ziti as label directs, but do not use salt in water.
Drain ziti and return to pan.

question: How do I make a crispy vegetable tempura?
answer:
Title: Tempura Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 egg
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 c. flour
1 tsp. soy sauce (optional)
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 c. water
vegetables
Directions:
Beat first 6 ingredients together until smooth.
Dip vegetables in tempura batter and cook in hot oil until brown.

question: How do I make a crispy vegetable tempura?
answer:
Title: Crispy Shrimp Tempura Batter
Ingredients:
2 lb. raw shrimp
2 eggs, separated
3/4 c. beer
1 Tbsp. oil
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 c. cornstarch
1 tsp. ginger
flour (for dipping)
oil (for frying)
Directions:
Beat egg yolks with beer, oil, soy sauce and ginger for 2 minutes well.
Just before ready, beat egg whites until stiff. Fold egg whites into the rest of batter.

question: How do I make a crispy vegetable tempura?
answer:
Title: Tempura Veggies
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. melted butter
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 c. milk
1 egg yolk
1/2 c. flour
1/4 c. milk
1 egg white
1 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Beat egg yolk. Add butter, salt and 1/4 cup milk.
Add flour and stir until smooth, then add other 1/4 cup milk.
Beat egg white until peaks form.
Add sugar to whites and beat until stiff. Fold into flour mixture.
Dip cut veggies into flour and then into batter.
Deep fry until golden.
Especially good is zucchini, onions, green peppers, mushrooms, broccoli or whatever you like best.
Even apple slices are good this way.
Will do about 2 pounds fresh veggies.

question: How do I make a crispy vegetable tempura?
answer:
Title: Tempura Cooking(Deep-Frying)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
1 heaping Tbsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
2 eggs
1 c. milk or water
oil (corn, peanut, soybean or sunflower)
item to be fried (chicken, fish or fresh vegetable), cut in uniform 2-inch bite-size pieces
Directions:
Batter:
Mix the dry ingredients.
Stir milk into beaten eggs. Pour into the dry ingredients and beat.
Let batter rest at room temperature for 1 hour before using.

question: How do I make a crispy vegetable tempura?
answer:
Title: Tempura
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. cold water
2 Tbsp. whole wheat flour
1/2 Tbsp. beaten egg
salt
oil for frying
pre-cut vegetables
Directions:
You will need the following equipment:
skillet, spatula, mixing bowls, forks, measuring spoons, paper towels, pot holder and spatter screen.

question: What’s a good recipe for a savory pie?
answer:
Title: Savory Chicken Pie
Ingredients:
5 lb. cooked chicken (boneless), pulled in pieces
1 c. pimento, diced
1 (#10) can Veg-All mixed vegetables
1 c. chicken fat or margarine
1 c. flour
1 qt. milk
1 qt. chicken stock
2 tsp. sage
1 Tbsp. salt
2 tsp. pepper
2 tsp. marjoram
2 doz. drop biscuit dough
Directions:
Fold chicken, pimento and Veg-All together.
Mix fat and flour together.
Cook until smooth and golden.
Add milk and stock, whipping until smooth and thick.
Add seasoning and fold into chicken vegetable mixture.

question: What’s a good recipe for a savory pie?
answer:
Title: Savory Scallops
Ingredients:
1 lb. scallops
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. chopped mushrooms
1/2 c. soft bread crumbs
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. butter
2 Tbsp. parsley (garnish)
Directions:
Pat dry scallops with paper towel.
Place in greased pie plate. Sprinkle with lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Top with mushrooms; drizzle with 1/4 cup butter.
Mix remaining 1/4 cup butter with bread crumbs.
Sprinkle over mushrooms.
Broil in preheated broiler 6 inches from heat until scallops are opaque, 10 to 12 minutes. Garnish with parsley.

question: What’s a good recipe for a savory pie?
answer:
Title: Savory Cheese, Tomato And Onion Pie
Ingredients:
pastry for pie crust
10 oz. cheese (1/2 Swiss, 1/2 Gruyere)
5 Tbsp. flour
2 large onions
4 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. chopped basil
2 large, firm tomatoes, sliced
2 large eggs
3/4 c. cream
Directions:
Prepare pastry; line a 10-inch pie dish and chill.
Grate all the cheese; toss it with the flour.
Melt the butter in a large skillet.
Slice onions; saute them very gently in butter until they begin to turn golden, about 1/2 hour.
Spread about 1/3 of cheese over bottom of pie dish.
Spread the onions over it.
In butter that is left in pan, heat tomato slices with chopped basil for 1 to 2 minutes.
Arrange tomato slices over the onions.
Cover with remaining cheese.
Beat eggs with cream; pour mixture over the cheese.
If you like nutmeg, sprinkle a little on the top. Bake in a preheated 350° oven for about 35 to 40 minutes, or until the top browns nicely.
Serve hot in wedges.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for a savory pie?
answer:
Title: Savory Upside-Down Pie
Ingredients:
7 1/2 oz. pkg. frozen puff pastry
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 large onion, chopped
3 egg yolks
1 c. mushrooms
4 oz. bacon slices
1/2 c. crumbled Blue cheese
1 Tbsp. chopped sorrel and chervil
Directions:
Thaw pastry.
Mix ground beef, salt, pepper and onion; bind with egg yolks.
Wash and quarter mushrooms.
Cover the bottom of an 8-inch loose bottomed cake pan with the bacon.
Arrange the cheese, herbs and mushroom quarters on top.
Cover the meat mixture, pressing it down firmly and smoothly on the top.

question: What’s a good recipe for a savory pie?
answer:
Title: Savory Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 pkg. onion salad dressing mix
6 peeled baking potatoes
3 slices bacon
Directions:
Peel 6 potatoes and cut into quarters or thick slices.
Dry on paper towels, then place in large bowl.
Sprinkle with salad dressing mix (pour right from the envelope) and bacon (coarsely chopped).
Transfer the mixture to a shallow baking pan and bake at 425° for about 45 minutes.
Makes about 6 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for a chocolate soufflé?
answer:
Title: Classic Chocolate Souffles
Ingredients:
sugar
1/2 c. whole milk
1 1/4 c. sugar
7 oz. unsweetened chocolate, chopped
6 large egg whites
4 large egg yolks
powdered sugar
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Butter 8 (2/3 cup) souffle dishes. Sprinkle with sugar.
Tap off excess.
Bring milk and 1 cup of sugar to simmer in large saucepan, stirring until sugar dissolves. Reduce heat to low.
Add chocolate and stir until smooth.
Pour into large bowl.
Cool 10 minutes.
Beat whites into soft peaks. Add remaining 1/4 cup sugar and beat until stiff.
Whisk 1/4 whites and yolks into chocolate mixture.
Fold in remaining whites.
Bake until souffle puffs about 16 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a chocolate soufflé?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Souffl
Ingredients:
1/3 c. sugar
1/3 c. baking cocoa
1/4 c. all purpose flour
1 c. skim milk
2 T. melted reduced fat butter
3 large beaten egg yolks
4 large beaten egg whites
1/4 t. cream of tartar
1/8 t. salt
3 T. sugar
Directions:
Mix first 3 ingredients in a sauce pan.
Gradually add milk, stirring constantly, and heat to boiling.
Remove from heat. Gradually add the beaten egg yolks to this mixture, and then stir in the melted butter.
Set aside.
Beat the next three ingredients with an electric mixer until foamy.
Gradually beat in sugar until meringue forms stiff and glossy peaks.
Gently combine the two mixtures and carefully pour into a well greased 6 cup souffl dish. Bake on lowest oven rack at 350 degrees for 1 hour.
Serve immediately with fat free cool whip.

question: What’s a recipe for a chocolate soufflé?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Souffle
Ingredients:
1/2 c. raspberries
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine plus 1 Tbsp.
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. milk
dash of salt
2 large eggs, separated
1/4 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 oz. sq. unsweetened chocolate
butter or margarine for dish
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Coat bottom and sides of 2-cup souffle dish or two 10-ounce cups with butter (1 tablespoon of butter). Melt 2 tablespoons of butter and chocolate in saucepan.
Add flour and stir until smooth, stirring continuously. Gradually add milk until thick.
Add salt and remove from heat.

question: What’s a recipe for a chocolate soufflé?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Souffle
Ingredients:
4 egg yolks
1/3 c. sugar
5 oz. bittersweet chocolate (Tobler, Lindt if possible)
2 Tbsp. heavy cream
1 tsp. instant coffee
2 Tbsp. cognac, rum, Grand Marnier or liqueur of choice
5 egg whites
Directions:
Ribbon egg yolks, sugar and salt heavily.
Melt chocolate and let cool.
Add heavy cream, instant coffee (dissolved in the liqueur) and blend into ribboning yolks.
Beat the whites and fold into the base.
Spoon into a buttered and lightly sugared 6-cup souffle dish.
Bake in a 400° oven for 12 to 14 minutes.
Can freeze.
Take right from freezer to oven only put on lower rack; add 5 minutes for light souffle.

question: What’s a recipe for a chocolate soufflé?
answer:
Title: Basic Souffle Recipe
Ingredients:
1 1/3 c. milk
7 Tbsp. flour
6 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. salt
4 egg yolks
4 egg whites
Directions:
Make a white sauce of melted butter, flour and milk.
Beat egg yolks until thick and lemon colored.
Add to the white sauce. Beat the egg whites until stiff, but not dry.
Fold into the white sauce-yolk mixture.
Bake in an ungreased casserole at 325°, starting with a cold oven, for 1 hour.
Remove immediately for eating or it will collapse.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make grilled cheese with a twist?
answer:
Title: Cheese Twists
Ingredients:
1 c. sifted flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/2 c. grated sharp Cheddar
1/3 c. cold water
Directions:
Sift flour, baking powder and salt into a medium sized bowl. Cut in butter with a pastry blender until crumbly.
Sprinkle water over.
Mix lightly with fork just until mixture holds together and leaves sides of bowl.
Roll out on lightly floured pastry cloth or board to a 12 x 10-inch rectangle.
Divide in half lengthwise, then cut each half crosswise into 1/2-inch wide strips.
Lift strips one at a time.
Twist a couple turns and place on ungreased baking sheet.
Bake at 425° for 10 minutes or until golden brown.

question: How do I make grilled cheese with a twist?
answer:
Title: Cheese Twist Sticks
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/8 tsp. cayenne
1/3 c. butter
1 c. grated cheese (Cheddar)
3 Tbsp. ice water
Directions:
Sift all dry ingredients and cut in cheese and butter.
Add ice water and roll to a thickness of 1/8-inch.
Cut in strips and twist.
Bake at 350° for about 15 minutes.

question: How do I make grilled cheese with a twist?
answer:
Title: Cheese Twists
Ingredients:
1 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper
3/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese, divided
1/2 c. softened butter or margarine
3 egg yolks
2 tsp. water
1 egg white, slightly beaten
1 Tbsp. sesame seeds (optional)
Directions:
Combine flour, baking soda, mustard, salt and red pepper in large bowl. Reserve 1 tablespoon cheese; stir remaining cheese into flour mixture. Cut in butter with pastry blender or 2 knives until mixture resembles fine crumbs. Add egg yolks and water, mixing until dough forms. Shape into a ball; flatten and wrap in plastic wrap. Refrigerate 2 hours or until firm.

question: How do I make grilled cheese with a twist?
answer:
Title: Twisted Macaroni Salad
Ingredients:
1 lb. twist macaroni
1 c. sugar
1 c. water
1/2 c. vinegar
2 c. mayonnaise
1 c. celery, chopped
1 onion, chopped
1/2 tsp. turmeric
1 tsp. celery seed
salt and pepper to taste
celery salt to taste
Directions:
Cook macaroni.
Drain well.
Make sure macaroni is cool before adding dressing or it will curdle.
Blend all ingredients well and mix with macaroni.
Best made 24 hours before serving.
Mix before serving.

question: How do I make grilled cheese with a twist?
answer:
Title: Cheese Twists
Ingredients:
3/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1/8 tsp. red pepper
1/4 c. cold butter or margarine
1 egg yolk
2 Tbsp. water
Directions:
In a bowl, mix flour, cheese and red pepper with a pastry blender or 2 knives.
Cut butter into flour mixture until it resembles fine crumbs.
Stir in mixture of egg yolk and water. Gather dough into a ball; dust with flour.
Wrap and refrigerate until firm.

question: What can I make with chicken thighs and rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Rice
Ingredients:
oil
1 large or 2 medium onions, chopped fine
salt and pepper
2 or 3 cloves garlic
2 fresh medium tomatoes, chopped fine
8 to 10 chicken thighs
1 1/2 c. long grained rice
Directions:
In a large pot put enough oil to cover the bottom.
Put in chicken pieces and lightly brown.
Add garlic, onions, tomatoes, salt and pepper.
Cook with cover on for 1/2 hour.
Remove cover and cook until sauce is reduced and thick.

question: What can I make with chicken thighs and rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken Thighs And Rice
Ingredients:
2 slices bacon
1 to 1 1/2 lb. chicken thighs (boneless)
1/2 c. long grain rice
1 small onion, cut into thin wedges
1 clove garlic, minced
1 (7 1/2 oz.) can tomatoes, drained and cut up
1/2 c. quartered fresh mushrooms
1/4 c. dry white wine
1 tsp. instant chicken bouillon granules
1/4 tsp. dried basil, crushed
3 Tbsp. parsley
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
In a 10-inch skillet cook bacon until crisp.
Drain, reserving drippings.
Crumble bacon and set aside.
Brown chicken in reserve drippings, about 10 minutes.
Sprinkle with a little salt and pepper.
Remove chicken from skillet.
Cook rice, onion wedges and garlic in skillet drippings until rice is golden brown.
Stir frequently.
Stir in tomatoes, mushrooms, wine, bouillon granules, salt, basil and 1 cup water.

question: What can I make with chicken thighs and rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Rice
Ingredients:
4 to 6 chicken thighs
1 c. rice
2 tsp. poultry seasoning
2 tsp. onion powder
1 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. seasoned salt
1/2 tsp. curry powder
1 tsp. pepper
1 small can peas (optional)
Directions:
Put chicken thighs in large saucepan; cover with water.
Add all seasonings.
Bring to boil; continue boiling until meat begins to fall off bone.
Remove thighs from water; take meat off bone and discard skin and bone.
Continue boiling water until about 2 cups remain in saucepan.
Add rice and boned chicken.
Cover; simmer for about 20 minutes, until all water is absorbed.
Drain and add peas.

question: What can I make with chicken thighs and rice?
answer:
Title: Curry Rice
Ingredients:
5 pieces chicken (thighs or breasts)
3 to 4 baby carrots, sliced
3 to 4 medium potatoes, sliced
1 onion, chopped
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 Tbsp. curry powder
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Cook chicken until almost done.
Add carrots and potatoes and onions.
Finish cooking.
Add curry powder, garlic powder, salt and pepper.
Mix all together (may make a thickening out of flour and water and add to finished product).

question: What can I make with chicken thighs and rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken Rice Dinner(Serves 5)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
10 chicken thighs (about 3 lb.)
3 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 c. uncooked long grain rice
1 (4 oz.) can mushroom stems and pieces (undrained)
2 c. boiling water
minced fresh parsley (optional)
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. chopped onions
2 garlic cloves, minced
2 chicken bouillon cubes
4 chicken breasts, split and boned
1 (5 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts
1 can undiluted cream of mushroom soup
1 1/2 c. finely chopped celery
1 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
1 pkg. corn bread stuffing (about 3 c.)
3/4 c. melted butter
Directions:
Mix soup, mayonnaise, chestnuts and celery.
Lightly grease 3-quart casserole.
Lay breasts in pan.
Pour over mixed ingredients.
Mix stuffing with melted butter and sprinkle on top of chicken.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes to 1 hour.
Delicious!

question: What’s a recipe for a classic chicken marsala?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marsala
Ingredients:
4 boneless breasts
1 1/2 c. bread crumbs
1 small bottle olive oil
2 eggs
1 c. milk
1 pkg. fettucine noodles
juice of 1 lemon
1/2 c. favorite wine
4 Tbsp. flour
2 Tbsp. butter
1 c. water
salt to taste
Directions:
Dip chicken in egg, milk and bread crumbs.
Brown lightly in olive oil.
Remove chicken and set aside. Make gravy with flour and butter.
When bubbly, add wine and water.
May need to add more water to get to right consistency.
Squeeze in lemon juice. Add chicken to gravy. Slice lemons on top.
Add salt and garlic. Cover and simmer 20 to 30 minutes.
Serve over pasta.
Soooo Good!

question: What’s a recipe for a classic chicken marsala?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marsala (For One)
Ingredients:
2 oz. corn oil
1 (5 oz.) chicken breast
3 Tbsp. flour
2 oz. sliced mushrooms
1 oz. Marsala wine (sweet)
2 oz. beef stock
1 oz. half and half
6 oz. cooked pasta (angel hair)
1/2 oz. chives or green onions, chopped
Directions:
In a saucepan, heat oil. Dredge chicken in flour and place in pan.
Cook until done, making sure not to burn chicken.
Add mushrooms. Deglaze pan with Marsala wine. Add beef stock; reduce by half. Slowly add half and half and cook for 1 minute.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic chicken marsala?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marsala
Ingredients:
3 large chicken breasts, split, skinned and boned
1 egg, beaten
1/4 c. milk
1/2 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. olive oil
3 Tbsp. butter
1 small onion, chopped
1/2 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 clove garlic, mashed
1 c. Marsala cooking wine
1 can chicken broth
1 lemon
Directions:
Flatten chicken pieces between sheets of wax paper with rolling pin or mallet.
Pieces should be 1/4-inch thick.
Combine egg and milk in dish.
Combine flour, salt and pepper on wax paper.
Dip chicken into egg mixture, then into flour mixture to coat all sides.
Refrigerate 2 hours.
Heat oil and butter in large skillet. Brown chicken on both sides.
Remove to platter.
Saute onion, mushrooms and garlic until tender.
Remove to platter.
Add wine and chicken broth to pan; boil 10 minutes to reduce liquid.
Return chicken and vegetables to pan; heat thoroughly.
Arrange on platter.
Garnish with lemon slices.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic chicken marsala?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marsala
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. ground pepper
4 skinless boneless chicken breasts, pounded to 1/4-inch
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/2 c. chopped onions
2 cloves garlic, chopped
1/2 lb. sliced mushrooms
3 Tbsp. dry marsala
2/3 c. beef stock
salt to taste
Directions:
Mix flour and pepper in dish.
Dredge chicken in flour mixture to coat.
Shake off excess.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic chicken marsala?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Chicken Marsala
Ingredients:
4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. shredded mozzarella cheese
1/4 c. shredded provolone cheese
1/4 c. shredded Asiago cheese
3 Tbsp. oil-packed sun dried tomatoes, drained and chopped
2 Tbsp. fresh parsley, chopped
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 pkg. (10 oz.) mushrooms, sliced
3/4 c. low-sodium chicken broth
1 tsp. all-purpose flour
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
Directions:
Flatten chicken between 2 sheets of wax paper to 3/4 inch thickness. Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper. Place on jellyroll pan. Bake 15 minutes. turn chicken; bake until almost done, 10 minutes. Meanwhile, combine cheeses, tomatoes, parsley and oregano. Remove chicken from oven. Sprinkle each piece with one-fourth of mixture. Return to oven until cheese is melted and chicken is no longer pink in center; about 5 minutes. Transfer to platter. In large skillet, heat oil over medium heat. Add mushrooms; cook, stirring occasionally, until softened. Whisk together broth and flour; pour into skillet. Bring to boil; cook, stirring occasionally until thickened, 4-5 minutes. Remove from heat, stir in butter until almost melted. Pour sauce over chicken; sprinkle with additional parsley.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon butter fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Butter Baked Fish
Ingredients:
1 lb. catfish fillets
1/2 to 1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. (1/4 lb.) butter
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. paprika
Directions:
In a 12 x 8 x 2-inch dish, arrange fillets with thickest, meaty areas to outside edge of dish. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. In 1-quart casserole dish, place butter. Microwave on High for 1 to 2 minutes until melted. Blend in parsley and lemon juice; pour over fish. Sprinkle paprika over fillets. Preheat oven to 350°. Place casserole dish in oven. Cook 45 to 60 minutes or until fillets are fluffy. Serves 2 to 3 people.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon butter fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Fish
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. celery seed
1 lb. fish fillet
Directions:
Place butter in baking dish.
Microwave on High to melt butter (45 seconds).
Blend in seasonings.
Coat fish fillets in mixture. Place around in dish.
Cover with wax paper and microwave on High until fish flakes (with fork).
Approximate time is 5 to 6 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon butter fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Sauce For Fish
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1 1/2 c. milk
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Melt butter. Blend in flour, salt and pepper. Gradually stir in milk. Cook, stirring constantly, until thickened and smooth. Add lemon juice and parsley. Serve over fish.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon butter fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Fish Roll-Ups
Ingredients:
8 fish fillets (about 2 lb.)
1 1/2 c. cooked rice
1 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen, chopped broccoli, thawed
1/3 c. butter
1/3 c. lemon
2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
In small saucepan, melt 1/3 cup butter.
Add 1/3 cup lemon, 2 teaspoons salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.
In medium bowl, combine 1 1/3 cups rice, 1 cup cheese, 1 package broccoli and 1/4 cup lemon mixture.
Divide among 8 fillets; roll-up and place seam-side down in 11 x 7-inch baking dish.
Top with remaining sauce.
Bake at 375° for 25 minutes or until fish flakes with fork.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon butter fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Fish
Ingredients:
2 lb. red snapper
1 lemon (small)
1 small onion
1 small green pepper
salt to taste
garlic to taste
1/2 tsp. black lemon pepper
1/2 to 1 stick butter (unsalted)
Directions:
Season fish with salt, pepper and garlic.
Set aside for 15 minutes.
Cut up onion and green pepper.
Squeeze lemon juice over fish.
Put in covered dish.
Add onion, green pepper and s/c lemon over the entire dish.
Cook slow in oven for one hour.
Serve hot.

question: How do I make a classic Waldorf salad?
answer:
Title: Classic Waldorf Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. diced, tart apples
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. lemon juice
dash of salt
1 c. (1-inch) julienne celery sticks
1 c. halved and seeded red Emperor grapes
1/2 c. broken walnuts
1/2 c. whipping cream, whipped
1/4 c. mayonnaise
Directions:
Sprinkle apple cubes with sugar, lemon juice and salt.
Add celery, grapes and nuts.
Fold mayonnaise into whipped cream. Gently fold into apple mixture.
Chill and serve in lettuce-lined bowls.

question: How do I make a classic Waldorf salad?
answer:
Title: Classic Waldorf Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. diced tart apples
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. lemon juice
dash of salt
1 c. 1-inch julienne celery sticks
1/2 c. broken California walnuts
1/4 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. whipping cream, whipped
Directions:
Sprinkle apple cubes with sugar, lemon juice and salt. Add celery and nuts. Fold mayonnaise into whipped cream. Gently fold into apple mixture. Chill and serve in lettuce-lined bowls. Makes 6 servings.

question: How do I make a classic Waldorf salad?
answer:
Title: Waldorf Salad
Ingredients:
2 chicken breasts, cooked and diced small
2 c. Delicious apples (with skins on), diced small
3 c. mayonnaise
1 c. raisins
2 c. walnuts
2 c. red grapes
1 c. celery, chopped small
Directions:
Mix all ingredients, except mayonnaise, in a large bowl.
Set aside.
Chop 3 heads of lettuce and 2 heads of Romaine lettuce. Place in separate bowl.
Do not mix with ingredients until ready to serve.
When ready to serve, mix all ingredients, including mayonnaise, and mix well.
Serve.
Serves 10 or more.

question: How do I make a classic Waldorf salad?
answer:
Title: Waldorf Salad
Ingredients:
5 red apples, cut up
3 bananas, cut up
3 c. red seedless grapes
2 c. celery, cut up
1 c. raisins
1 small jar maraschino cherries, cut up
1 c. mayonnaise
1/3 c. honey
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 to 1 c. walnuts or pecans
1 small bag marshmallows (if desired)
Directions:
Mix together apples, bananas, grapes (use Fruit-Fresh liberally), celery, raisins and cherries.
Mix mayonnaise, honey and sour cream; pour over fruit mixture and mix well.
Last, add nuts and marshmallows.
Keep refrigerated.

question: How do I make a classic Waldorf salad?
answer:
Title: Waldorf Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. chopped apples or pears (2 medium)
1 1/2 tsp. lemon juice
1/3 c. slivered almonds or chopped pecans, toasted
1/4 c. celery
1/4 c. dried red tart cherries or raisins
1/4 c. seedless grapes, halved
1/3 c. whipping cream
1/4 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
Directions:
In a medium mixing bowl, toss chopped apples or pears with lemon juice.
Stir in nuts, celery, cherries or raisins and grapes.

question: What can I do with leftover salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Horseradish Pate(A Great Way To Use Leftover Cooked Salmon)
Ingredients:
1 c. cooked salmon, flaked
1/3 c. shallots, minced
1 Tbsp. horseradish
2 Tbsp. diet mayonnaise (enough to hold it together)
freshly ground pepper
1 tsp. lemon juice
2 to 3 cucumbers, thinly sliced
Directions:
In a bowl, combine salmon, shallots, dill, horseradish, mayonnaise and pepper.
Let ripen at least 4 hours in the refrigerator.
(Keep only 1 to 2 days in the refrigerator.) Spread on thinly sliced cucumber rounds.
Can also be used as a dip for raw vegetables.

question: What can I do with leftover salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon, Fresh-Grilled Or Baked
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen salmon
2/3 c. onions, sliced
1 1/2 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
1/3 c. chopped fresh tomatoes
1/4 c. chopped green peppers
1/4 c. parsley
3 Tbsp. chopped pimentos
1/2 c. dry white wine
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. dill weed
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place salmon, skin side down, in baking dish which has been sprayed or greased and lined with aluminum foil.
Mix the vegetables, mushrooms, pimentos and parsley; put over fish.
Mix rest of ingredients and pour over fish.
Wrap foil over fish and seal tight.
Bake or grill 25 to 30 minutes at 350° or until flakes.

question: What can I do with leftover salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Croquettes
Ingredients:
1 can (14 1/2 oz.) salmon
1 1/2 c. leftover mashed potatoes
1 egg
1 onion, chopped
1/4 c. cracker crumbs
Directions:
Mix first four foods.
Form cone shaped; dip into cracker crumbs.
Cook 5 minutes on each side.

question: What can I do with leftover salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Loaf
Ingredients:
1 can pink salmon, drained and flaked
1/4 c. diced onion
1 1/2 c. leftover mashed potatoes
2 eggs, beaten
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Drain and flake salmon.
Combine salmon, egg, mashed potatoes, onion, salt and pepper.
Place in buttered loaf pan.
Bake at 350° for 40 minutes.
Serves 6 to 8 people.

question: What can I do with leftover salmon?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Baked Salmon
Ingredients:
1/3 c. oleo
1/3 c. chopped onion
1 Tbsp. grated lemon rind
1/4 c. lemon juice
1 c. diced celery
3 c. cooked rice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. thyme
Directions:
Melt butter in pan; saute celery and onion until tender, then toss with rice, lemon rind, salt, thyme and lemon juice.
This is enough to stuff a large salmon.
Sprinkle inside of fish with salt; stuff fish.
Spray foil and wrap fish in foil.
Prick holes in bottom.
Measure at thickest part of fish and bake in 450° oven, allowing 10 minutes cooking time for each inch of stuffed thickness.
Serve with lemon slice.

question: What can I do with leftover turkey from Thanksgiving?
answer:
Title: Thanksgiving Tomorrow
Ingredients:
3 c. leftover stuffing or 1 pkg. (6 oz.) stuffing mix, prepared according to pkg. directions
2 c. turkey, cooked and cubed
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Heat oven
to 350°.
Combine all ingredients, adding turkey broth or water if mixture is too dry.
Place in lightly greased 1-quart casserole dish.
Bake 35 to 45 minutes or until hot and lightly browned on top.

question: What can I do with leftover turkey from Thanksgiving?
answer:
Title: Day After Thanksgiving Turkey Soup
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter
1 onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
1 carrot, sliced
1 celery stalk, sliced
2 or more c. leftover cooked turkey, diced
6 c. turkey stock or chicken broth (homemade or canned)
1/2 tsp. white pepper
3 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 potato, cubed
salt to taste
1 c. heavy sweet cream
Directions:
Heat butter in a skillet and saute onion and garlic until onion is translucent.
Transfer contents of the skillet into a slow cooker.
Add all other ingredients except the cream.
Cover, turn on low and cook for about 6 hours or until the vegetables are tender.
Stir in heavy cream and heat thoroughly before serving. Serves 8.

question: What can I do with leftover turkey from Thanksgiving?
answer:
Title: What Shall We Do With The Leftover Turkey
Ingredients:
6 slices white bread
2 c. cubed turkey
1 c. cubed ham
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/4 c. chopped green pepper
1 can sliced water chestnuts
1/4 c. sliced pimentos
1 c. mayo
3/4 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
2 slightly beaten eggs
1 1/2 c. milk
1 can condensed cream of mushroom soup
1/2 c. sharp cheese, shredded
Directions:
Butter 2 slices of bread.
Cut into small cubes and set aside. Cut remaining bread in cubes.
Place half of unbuttered cubes in bottom of an 8
x
8 x 2-inch baking dish. Combine turkey, ham, vegetables, seasonings and mayonnaise. Spoon over bread.
Place remaining unbuttered cubes over mixture. Combine eggs and milk; pour over all.
Chill for 1 hour or overnight. Spoon soup over top and sprinkle with the buttered cubes. Bake at 325° for 1 hour or until set. Sprinkle shredded cheese over top during the last few minutes of baking.
Let stand for 5 minutes before serving.
Makes 6 healthy servings.

question: What can I do with leftover turkey from Thanksgiving?
answer:
Title: Leftover Turkey Pie
Ingredients:
4 potatoes, diced
2 carrots, sliced
1 stalk celery, diced
1 onion, chopped
1/2 c. Bisquick
1/2 c. flour
2 Tbsp. parsley
1/4 stick butter or margarine
2 eggs
1 1/2 c. cold mashed potatoes
leftover turkey and gravy
leftover peas or other vegetables
Directions:
Grease 2-quart baking dish with butter generously.
Cook first four ingredients together.
Mix Bisquick, flour, parsley and margarine together.
Beat eggs; season with salt and pepper and mix with leftover mashed potatoes.
Add to Bisquick mixture and work together.
Mixture will be sticky.
Spoon mixture into dish and using the back of spoon, pat it into bottom and sides of dish. Save some mixture for top.
Put cold turkey, gravy and peas in dish; add potatoes, carrots, celery and onion.
Put more turkey and gravy in center.
Spoon Bisquick mixture around sides, sealing well.
Let circle in center open.
Bake at 375° to 400° for 1 hour.

question: What can I do with leftover turkey from Thanksgiving?
answer:
Title: Thanksgiving Turkeys
Ingredients:
12 Oreo cookies
1 can chocolate icing
12 small cinnamon red hots
12 malted milk balls
1 bag candy corn
Directions:
Open all the cookies and spread icing on each side.
On one side of the cookie, press the candy corn, fat end toward the edges to form tail feathers.
On the other cookie side, press the malted milk ball into the icing to form the turkey's body, then press the red hot in front of the malted milk ball to form its "beard." Using icing as "glue," attach the "tail" half to the "body" half. Happy Thanksgiving!

question: How do I make a garlic herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Country Herb Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
2 1/2 to 3 lb. chicken
1 pkg. savory herb with garlic soup mix
2 Tbsp. water
1 Tbsp. olive oil or vegetable oil
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375° in 13 x 9-inch baking pan.
Arrange chicken.
In small bowl, combine remaining ingredients; brush on chicken.
Bake 45 minutes or until chicken is done.
Makes about 4 servings.

question: How do I make a garlic herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Herb Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
4 lb. chicken fryer
1 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 c. melted butter
1/2 c. dry white wine
1 tsp. crushed rosemary
1 tsp. sweet basil, crushed
1 tsp. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°. Sprinkle chicken cavities with the garlic salt and crushed rosemary. Truss chicken and place in an open roasting pan. Combine butter, wine, rosemary, basil, parsley, salt and pepper in a small saucepan. Cook over low heat a few minutes until thoroughly blended.
Baste chicken with wine sauce. Roast 20 minutes per pound until tender. Baste frequently. The last 20 minutes, turn to brown underside.

question: How do I make a garlic herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Herb Roasted Chicken(Serves Four)
Ingredients:
1 large roasting chicken (about 6 lb.)
3 Tbsp. butter, softened
1 clove garlic, minced
3 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. sage leaves
3/4 tsp. thyme leaves
3/4 tsp. basil leaves
6 Tbsp. butter, softened
salt
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
Wash chicken; pat dry.
Cream together 3 tablespoons butter, garlic, Parmesan, sage, thyme and basil.
This mixture goes under the skin, so turn chicken breast side up and make skin as loose as possible.
Spread herb mixture underneath the skin.
Smear butter on outside of skin.
Put chicken breast up in roasting pan and place in oven.
Melt remaining butter.
Cook chicken 15 minutes, basting once.
Reduce to 350°.
Roast 20 minutes per pound, basting with butter every 10 minutes.
Serve.

question: How do I make a garlic herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (2 1/2 to 3 lb.) chicken
2 Tbsp. garlic powder with parsley
2 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Sprinkle chicken with lemon juice, garlic powder, seasoned salt and pepper.
Wrap chicken loosely in foil.
Refrigerate overnight.

question: How do I make a garlic herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Herb Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
