2 1/2 to 3 lb. chicken, cut into serving pieces
1 pkg. Lipton recipe secrets savory herb with garlic soup mix
2 Tbsp. water
1 Tbsp. olive or vegetable oil
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°.
In 13 x 9-inch baking pan, arrange chicken.
In small bowl, combine remaining ingredients.
Brush on chicken.
Bake uncovered 45 minutes or until chicken is done. Makes about 4 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mushroom Soup(6 Cups)
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 medium onion, chopped
1 small clove garlic, minced
1 lb. fresh mushrooms, cut in 1/4-inch dices
1/4 c. flour
3 c. chicken stock
1 c. milk
1/4 c. dry sherry
1 bay leaf
1/4 c. (2 oz.) cream cheese, cut in bits
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. Tabasco sauce
3/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Melt butter in heavy saucepan.
Add onion and saute 3 to 5 minutes.
Add garlic and cook 30 seconds.
Stir in mushrooms and saute until they release juices.
Sprinkle on flour and blend. Cook 1 minute.
Add stock, milk and sherry.
Bring to boil and stir constantly.
Add bay leaf and simmer 15 minutes.
Stir in cream cheese, lemon juice and Tabasco.
Stir until smooth and cream cheese is melted.
Season with salt.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mushroom Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 large onion
1 clove garlic, finely chop
1 lb. mushrooms
3 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
1 1/2 c. chicken stock
2 1/2 c. milk or more (as desired)
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire
1/4 tsp. Tabasco
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. fresh chopped parsley
Directions:
Melt butter in skillet.
Add onion and garlic.
Cook until onion is tender.
Add mushrooms.
Cook until liquid is evaporated. Melt butter in large saucepan.
Whisk in flour.
Cook, stirring constantly, 2 to 3 minutes without browning.
Whisk in milk.
Add seasoning.
Bring to boil.
Reduce heat and cook 5 to 8 minutes.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom soup?
answer:
Title: Cream Of Mushroom Soup
Ingredients:
8 oz. mushrooms
1 pt. water or stock
3/4 pt. fresh milk
2 oz. butter or substitute
2 oz. flour
seasoning
Directions:
Chop mushrooms finely unless it is desired to strain the soup. Melt butter in saucepan; fry mushrooms for 5 minutes, stirring to prevent their discoloring.
Stir in the flour and cook for 3 minutes.
Remove the pan from the heat and gradually add water and milk.
Bring to the boil and cook until soup thickens.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom soup?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Soup
Ingredients:
3 oz. dried mushrooms
1 qt. beef broth
2 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. sour cream
Directions:
Soak mushrooms for 3 to 4 hours and bring to a boil in a small amount of water.
Add the broth and simmer, covered, for half an hour.
Melt the butter; blend in the flour, salt and pepper.
Add the stock gradually while stirring.
Stir in sour cream just before serving.
Reheat, but don't let the soup boil.
Add more seasoning to taste.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Corn Soup
Ingredients:
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 1/2 c. milk
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 (16 oz.) can corn
parsley
Directions:
In saucepan, heat soup, milk, mayonnaise and corn (with liquid), stirring occasionally.
Garnish with parsley.
Makes 5 servings.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and eggs?
answer:
Title: Spinach Squares
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. Feta cheese
2 pkg. frozen chopped spinach
2 eggs
1/4 c. Romano cheese
1 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 small chopped onion
1 pkg. filo dough (1/2 for 9 x 13-inch pan)
1 1/2 sticks melted oleo
Directions:
Mix really good the first 6 ingredients.
Brush oleo in 9 x 13-inch pan.
Layer 1 sheet of filo; brush with oleo.
Do that about 7 or 8 layers.
Put filling on that and add about 7 more sheets of filo, brushing after each with oleo.
Put in refrigerator to chill, then cut through top layer just before you bake at 350° for 50 minutes.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and eggs?
answer:
Title: Spinach Supreme
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed
2 Tbsp. butter
2/3 c. chopped onion
1 3/4 c. cottage cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
4 well beaten eggs
1/2 lb. Feta cheese, crumbled
Directions:
Saute spinach in butter.
Add onion, cottage cheese, salt, pepper and eggs.
Mix.
Add cheese.
Place in greased 8 x 8-inch pan.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes until firm.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and eggs?
answer:
Title: Spinach And Cheese
Ingredients:
speck of butter
3 eggs
1 c. flour
1 c. milk
1 tsp. or less pepper
1 tsp. baking powder
24 oz. shredded Cheddar (white)
2 pkg. frozen chopped spinach
1 small onion
Directions:
In a very large bowl, beat eggs.
Add flour, milk, pepper and baking powder and mix.
Boil spinach and drain well.
Add cheese, spinach and finely chopped onion to bowl.
In pan, melt a little butter.
Wipe excess with paper towel.
Pour mix into 13 x 9 x 2-inch Teflon pan and bake uncovered at 350° for 35 minutes.
Best if covered and refrigerated overnight.
Cut like brownies when cold.
Heat in oven or microwave before serving.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and eggs?
answer:
Title: Feta Spinach And Fruit Salad With Honey-Lemon Dressing
Ingredients:
5 c. torn fresh spinach
1 c. cantaloupe chunks
1 c. halved strawberries
1/2 c. thin-sliced red onion rings
1 c. crumbled Feta natural cheese
1/4 c. pitted ripe olives
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. honey
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place spinach, fruit, onion, cheese and olives in large bowl. Toss lightly.
Mix remaining ingredients; add and toss.
Makes 6 cups or 6 side-salad servings.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and eggs?
answer:
Title: Spinach Balls
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
3 c. herb seasoned stuffing mix (crushed)
1 large finely chopped onion
6 well-beaten eggs (I used Egg Beaters)
3/4 c. melted butter or margarine
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. grated Italian cheese (example Mozzarella)
1 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 tsp. thyme
Directions:
Cook spinach, drain and squeeze out excess.
Combine spinach and all other ingredients.
Mix well.
Shape into 3/4-inch balls and place on lightly greased cookie sheet.
Bake at 350° about 20 minutes.

question: How do I make roasted carrots with honey glaze?
answer:
Title: Honey Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
10 to 12 small carrots
3 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
2 Tbsp. honey
Directions:
Cook carrots in small amount of boiling, salted water about 10 minutes or until tender.
Drain.
In a skillet, melt butter; add sugar and honey.
Simmer mixture for 2 minutes.
Add carrots and cook over low heat, turning until well glazed, about 5 minutes. Serves 6.

question: How do I make roasted carrots with honey glaze?
answer:
Title: Honey Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
4 1/2 c. sliced carrots
1 Tbsp. butter
1 1/2 Tbsp. honey
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Boil carrots in water until tender; drain.
Melt butter in large skillet over medium heat; add honey and lemon juice, stirring until smooth.
Add carrots, tossing gently.
Serve.

question: How do I make roasted carrots with honey glaze?
answer:
Title: Honey Glazed Chicken
Ingredients:
1/2 c. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. cooking oil
1/2 tsp. grated ginger root or 1/4 tsp. ground ginger
1 (4 to 5 lb.) whole roasting chicken
1/4 c. honey
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
Stir together the 1/2 cup soy sauce, onion, garlic, oil and ginger root.
Place chicken in a plastic bag; set in a bowl.
Pour the soy sauce mixture over chicken; close bag.
Chill for 2 to 3 hours, turning chicken occasionally to distribute marinade.
Drain. Skewer the chicken neck skin to back.
Tie legs securely to tail; twist wing tips under back.
Place the chicken, breast side up, on a rack in a shallow roasting pan.
Roast in a 375° oven 1 1/2 hours or until drumstick moves easily in the socket.
Meanwhile, combine honey and the 2 tablespoons soy sauce.
Baste chicken with honey soy mixture during the last 15 minutes of roasting time.
Makes 6 servings.

question: How do I make roasted carrots with honey glaze?
answer:
Title: Honey-Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
2 lb. carrots, scraped and thinly sliced
1/2 c. water
3 Tbsp. honey
3 Tbsp. brown sugar
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. spiced mustard (this is optional)
Directions:
Combine carrots and water in medium saucepan.
Bring to a boil;
cover,
reduce
heat
and
simmer
8 minutes or until crisp-tender.
Drain and return to pan.
Add honey and remaining ingredients;
cook	over low heat, stirring gently, until butter and sugar melts.
Yields 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make roasted carrots with honey glaze?
answer:
Title: Honey Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. carrots
1/2 c. water
1/4 c. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. oil
3 Tbsp. honey
Directions:
Peel and slice carrots 1/4-inch thick or less.
Combine all ingredients in a stove top pan.
Cook on medium heat until tender. Boil off the remaining liquid and serve.
Makes 4 servings.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for pasta primavera?
answer:
Title: Pasta Primavera
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
3 cloves garlic, minced
2 large onions, chopped
2 carrots, scraped and thinly sliced
2 c. fresh broccoli flowerets
1 medium bell pepper, cut into thin strips
1 sweet red pepper, cut into thin strips
6 fresh mushrooms, sliced
1/2 c. heavy cream
1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 tsp. crushed basil
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
1/4 c. chopped fresh parsley
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. salt
8 oz. linguine, cooked and drained
Directions:
In a
large skillet, add olive oil and saute garlic and onions until
soft, about 2 1/2 minutes.
Add carrots, broccoli, peppers, mushrooms, basil and crushed red pepper.
Cook 5 minutes, stirring until broccoli and carrots are crisp-tender. Add
cream, Parmesan,
parsley,
salt
and pepper; cook until boiling.
Pour over cooked linguine.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for pasta primavera?
answer:
Title: Pasta Primavera
Ingredients:
1 lb. rigatoni or pasta of your choice
1 small onion, chopped
4 cloves garlic, finely chopped
1 medium zucchini, peeled, halved lengthwise and sliced
1 c. broccoli cuts
1/2 c. lima beans
1/2 c. peas
2 carrots, cut in thin strips
3/4 c. crushed tomatoes
1/4 c. heavy cream
3 Tbsp. olive oil
salt and pepper
grated cheese
Directions:
Combine olive oil, onion and garlic in a large skillet.
Add all vegetables and season to taste with salt and pepper.
Cook on medium-high heat (stirring occasionally) until vegetables are crisp-tender.
Remove from heat.
Serve over cooked pasta. Sprinkle with grated cheese.
Makes approximately 6 servings.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for pasta primavera?
answer:
Title: Pasta Primavera
Ingredients:
8 oz. linguine
2 large onions, chopped
2 cloves garlic, chopped
1/4 c. oil
2 c. fresh broccoli flowerets and stems, chopped
2 carrots, thinly sliced
1 1/2 c. sliced mushrooms
1/2 sweet red pepper and 1/2 green pepper, sliced in julienne strips
2 tsp. leaf basil or 1 Tbsp. fresh basil
1 c. 2% milk
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Any vegetables can be used such as cauliflower, green beans, peas or add all combined.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for pasta primavera?
answer:
Title: Pasta Primavera
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped onion
4 cloves garlic, chopped
2 Tbsp. plus 2 Tbsp. fat-free chicken broth
2 (15 oz. each) cans tomato sauce
4 Tbsp. honey
2 tsp. crushed dried oregano
2 tsp. crushed dried basil
pinch of white pepper (optional)
1 large red pepper, cut in 1-inch strips
1 1/2 c. sliced mushrooms
1 1/2 c. yellow summer squash or zucchini, cut in thin sticks 1 1/2-inches long
1 1/2 c. carrots, cut in thin sticks 1 1/2-inches long
1 1/2 c. small broccoli florets
2 Tbsp. plus 1 Tbsp. balsamic vinegar
3/4 c. peas
10 oz. whole grain pasta, cooked
1/4 c. chopped green onion
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
In a medium saucepan, cook onion and garlic in 2 tablespoons broth 5 to 7 minutes or until softened over medium-high heat. Add tomato sauce, honey, oregano, basil and white pepper.
Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer gently for 20 minutes.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for pasta primavera?
answer:
Title: Pasta Primavera(Springtime Pasta)
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium diced onion
1 Tbsp. chopped garlic
3 to 4 c. sliced vegetables (zucchini, squash, red and green pepper, fresh mushrooms, cauliflower or broccoli)
1 (14 oz.) can diced tomatoes, drained (reserve juice)
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
3/4 c. water
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. dried basil
linguine
olives
Directions:
Cook pasta.
Saute onion and garlic in medium skillet about 1 minute.
Add vegetables and saute 3 to 4 minutes.
Stir in reserved tomato juice, tomato paste and water.
Simmer 5 to 8 minutes or until vegetables are tender.
Add tomatoes and basil, salt and pepper.
Simmer another couple of minutes.
Serve over pasta.
Garnish with olives.

question: What can I make with couscous and spinach?
answer:
Title: Couscous Salad
Ingredients:
2/3 c. water
1 c. couscous
about 3 Tbsp. olive oil
about 3 Tbsp. lemon juice
3 scallions (including green parts), finely chopped
1/2 c. tightly packed Italian parsley, finely chopped
2 medium ripe tomatoes, peeled, seeded and finely chopped
3 Tbsp. finely chopped mint
kosher salt
black pepper
Directions:
Bring the water to a boil in a small saucepan.
Pour in the couscous.
Cover the pan and remove from the heat.
Let stand for 5 minutes.
Uncover the pan and stir the couscous right away with a fork.
(If the grains do not separate, fluff them gently with your fingers.)
Transfer the couscous to a bowl and stir in the remaining ingredients.
Season the salad to taste with more lemon juice, salt and pepper.

question: What can I make with couscous and spinach?
answer:
Title: Veggie-Topped Couscous
Ingredients:
1 large onion, cut into thin wedges
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. olive oil or cooking oil
2 c. thinly sliced carrots
1/2 c. water
1 tsp. dried basil, crushed
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper (optional)
2 medium zucchini, quartered lengthwise and cut into 1/2-inch pieces (2 1/2 c.)
1 (15 oz.) can garbanzo beans, rinsed and drained
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can reduced sodium stewed tomatoes
2 Tbsp. water
2 tsp. cornstarch
2 c. reduced sodium chicken broth
1 c. couscous
1/4 c. chopped unsalted dry roasted peanuts
Directions:
In a large saucepan, cook onion and garlic in hot oil over medium-low heat until crisp-tender.
Stir in carrots, 1/2 cup water, basil, cumin, salt and, if desired, red pepper.
Bring to boiling.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in zucchini, garbanzo beans and tomatoes.
Cover and cook for 2 minutes.
Stir together 2 tablespoons water and cornstarch.
Stir into tomato mixture.
Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. Cook and stir for 2 minutes more.

question: What can I make with couscous and spinach?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Couscous Pilaf
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 c. sliced zucchini
1 small onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried basil
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. white wine or chicken broth
1 c. chicken broth
3/4 c. couscous
1 c. cherry tomatoes
1/4 c. pitted black olives, cut in half (Kalamata best)
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh flat leaf parsley
Directions:
Melt butter; add onion, zucchini, salt, pepper, garlic and basil.
Cook until zucchini is tender, 4 to 5 minutes.
Add wine; bring to boil.
Cook 1 minute.
Add broth; bring to boil.
Stir in couscous, olives and tomatoes.
Remove from heat; cover.
Let stand until liquid is absorbed (about 5 minutes).
Before serving, fluff with fork; sprinkle with parsley.

question: What can I make with couscous and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Gourmet
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. onion
3 Tbsp. flour
2 c. milk
2 (14 oz.) cans spinach
3 boiled eggs
1/2 c. corn flakes, crushed
1/2 c. shredded cheese
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
paprika
Directions:
Melt butter in saucepan; saut onion until tender. Add flour, stirring until smooth.
Cook 1 minute, stirring constantly. Gradually add milk; cook over medium heat, stirring until thick and bubbly.
Drain spinach in a colander; place on paper towels. Press until barely moist.
Stir spinach, eggs, salt and pepper into sauce.
Spread in a lightly greased 8-inch square baking dish.
Combine crushed flakes and cheese; mix well. Sprinkle over spinach mixture. Sprinkle lightly with paprika.
Bake at 375° for 20 minutes.
Yield: 6 servings.

question: What can I make with couscous and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Balls
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
3 c. herb seasoned stuffing mix (crushed)
1 large finely chopped onion
6 well-beaten eggs (I used Egg Beaters)
3/4 c. melted butter or margarine
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. grated Italian cheese (example Mozzarella)
1 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 tsp. thyme
Directions:
Cook spinach, drain and squeeze out excess.
Combine spinach and all other ingredients.
Mix well.
Shape into 3/4-inch balls and place on lightly greased cookie sheet.
Bake at 350° about 20 minutes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a mango salad?
answer:
Title: Spinach & Mango Salad With Shrimp(A Quick And Easy Delight)
Ingredients:
1 bag pre-washed baby leaf spinach
2 large mangos, peeled and diced
2 Haas avocados, peeled, diced and soaked briefly in lemon juice
1 can palm hearts, drained and chopped (optional)
2 c. small cooked shrimp (fresh works best but frozen shrimp that has been thawed is good, too)
1 c. Mozzarella cheese, shredded
Directions:
Toss everything together and serve with your favorite dressing. Serves 3 to 4.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a mango salad?
answer:
Title: Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
3 fresh mangoes, peeled and chopped
16 oz. can unsweetened pears, chopped
20 oz. can chunk pineapple
16 oz. can unsweetened peaches
1 c. seedless golden raisins
1 c. coarsely chopped nuts, walnuts or pecans
1/2 pt. heavy cream
4 Tbsp. mayonnaise
Directions:
Drain all fruits well and add to mangoes.
Beat cream to pudding consistency, fold in mayo.
Put all ingredients together, cover, refrigerate until ready to serve. Serve with mint leaves for garnish.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a mango salad?
answer:
Title: Twenty-Four Hour Salad
Ingredients:
1 egg
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. sugar
pinch of salt
1/2 c. heavy cream, whipped
12 large or 48 small marshmallows, quartered
1 c. pineapple tidbits, drained
1 c. sliced orange sections
1 c. seedless grapes
1 c. sliced bananas
10 maraschino cherries, quartered
1/2 c. toasted almond slivers
crisp salad greens
Directions:
In a double boiler, beat egg with a fork; stir in lemon juice, sugar and salt.
Cook over boiling water, stirring constantly, until mixture thickens.
Remove from heat and allow to cool completely.
Fold in whipped cream, marshmallows and fruits. Refrigerate for 24 hours.
To serve, fold in almonds and arrange on crisp greens.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a mango salad?
answer:
Title: Kraut Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. kraut
1/2 c. diced onion
1/2 c. mango peppers, diced
1 c. sugar
Directions:
Mix all ingredients and chill before serving.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a mango salad?
answer:
Title: *Mango Chutney*
Ingredients:
6 lb. mangos (about 26 large mangos, or about 12 cups), chopped or put through grinder course
5 lb. brown sugar
3 pt. vinegar
2 c. water
1 c. ginger, finely chopped
1 c. onion, finely chopped
1 doz. small Hawaiian chili peppers, without seeds
6 doz. whole Hawaiian chili peppers
3 Tbsp. salt
3 cloves garlic, finely chopped
1 lb. seedless raisins, chopped
1 lb. seeded raisins, whole
Directions:
Combine vinegar, water, salt and sugar in a large pot and bring to a boil.
Add onions, raisins, garlic and ginger and bring to a boil again.
Add mangos and chili peppers and bring to a boil.
Cook for 20-30 minutes until mangos look clear or glassy. Gently stir mixture occasionally to avoid sticking to the bottom of the pot.
Remove from heat, place mixture in hot sterilized jars and seal immediately.

question: What’s a good recipe for a seafood paella?
answer:
Title: Seafood Paella
Ingredients:
1 (6 oz.) can crab meat
1 can smoked oysters
1 Tbsp. corn oil
1/2 c. chopped green onion with tops
4 c. cooked yellow saffron rice
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can diced tomato
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 lb. fresh or frozen peeled shrimp
2 c. frozen green peas, defrosted
1/2 oz. jar chopped pimiento with juice
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
3 large bay leaves
Directions:
Saute onions in oil.
Combine all ingredients in stove top pan.
Simmer for 20 to 25 minutes until seafood is cooked.
Remove bay leaves before serving.

question: What’s a good recipe for a seafood paella?
answer:
Title: Paella
Ingredients:
2 c. rice (yellow)
2 c. chicken chunks
1/2 c. sliced black olives
1 c. scallops
1 c. shrimp
2 to 3 muscles
6 clams
lobster tails (if desired)
other seafood of desire (optional)
Directions:
Steam or boil all seafood.
Cook rice.
Mix all ingredients together and bake 20 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a seafood paella?
answer:
Title: Paella(From The World'S 100 Best Recipes Roland Goock)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. olive oil
1/2 lb. pork
1 chicken, cut up
2 onions, chopped
1 clove garlic, crushed
1/4 lb. ham strips
salt and pepper
4 c. broth or bouillon
2 oz. canned mushrooms
cayenne pepper
2 pinches saffron
1 bay leaf
1 3/4 c. uncooked rice
2 green pepper strips
4 tomatoes, peeled and cut
1 c. green peas
1 c. green beans
1 small can mussels
1/4 lb. shrimp, cooled
Directions:
Heat oil in large skillet.
Add pork and chicken; cook for 15 minutes or until chicken is browned on all sides.
Add onion, garlic and ham; cook for 5 minutes longer.
Season with salt and pepper.
Add broth mixed with saffron and bay leaf.
Cook 30 minutes, remove bay leaf and add rice.
Cover and cook 15 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a seafood paella?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Seafood Rice(Paella A La Valenciana)
Ingredients:
6 c. chicken broth
1/2 tsp. saffron
1 onion, chopped
2 small chickens
salt
1/2 c. olive oil
1/4 lb. Spanish chorizo sausage (1/4-inch slices)
1 large pork chops, diced
1/4 lb. cured ham, diced
4 scallions, chopped
4 cloves garlic, minced
2 red pimientos (homemade or imported), diced
1 lb. small or medium shrimp, shelled
4 lobsters tails, split or 8 king crab claws
3 c. short grain rice
5 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 bay leaf
1/2 c. dry white wine
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 lb. fresh or frozen peas
18 clams (available at room temperature)
18 small mussels
lemon wedges (for garnish)
chopped parsley (for garnish)
Directions:
Heat the broth with the saffron and simmer 15 minutes.
Cut the chicken into small serving pieces, the whole breast in 4 parts. Sprinkle with salt.
In a metal paella pan, with about a 15-inch base, heat the oil.
Add the chicken pieces and fry over high heat until golden.
Remove to a warm platter.
Add the chorizo, pork and ham to the pan and stir-fry about 10 minutes.
Add the chopped onion, scallions, garlic and pimientos and saute until the onion is wilted.
Add the shrimp and the lobster and saute about 3 minutes more or until the shrimp and lobster barely turn pink (the lobster will cook more in the oven).
Remove the shrimp and lobster to the platter with the chicken.
Add the rice to the pan and stir to coat it well with the oil.
Sprinkle in the 5 tablespoons chopped parsley and the bay leaf.
Stir in the chicken broth, boiling the wine, lemon juice and peas.

question: What’s a good recipe for a seafood paella?
answer:
Title: Paella
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. raw shrimp
1/4 lb. raw little neck clams
1/4 lb. raw mussels
2 Tbsp. Spanish olive oil
3 chorizos or 1/2 lb. Italian sausage
3 Tbsp. Spanish olive oil
1 (1 1/2 or 2 lb.) chicken, cut up
1/2 c. flour or more if needed
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. Spanish olive oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, chopped fine
1 green pepper, sliced
1 (1 lb.) can tomatoes, drained
3 c. uncooked long grain rice
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground saffron
6 c. boiling water
1 pkg. frozen peas, thawed
1/4 c. sliced pimiento
Directions:
Remove shells from shrimp, leaving tails.
Devein by making shallow incision down the back and running under cold water.
Set aside.
Scrub clams and mussels.
Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a skillet.
Prick sausages with a fork to let out steam and cook in skillet until brown.
Pour off oil; add water to cover sausages.
Cover pan and simmer 5 minutes; set aside.
In a separate skillet, heat 3 tablespoons olive oil.
Mix 1/2 cup flour, 1 teaspoon salt and pepper.
Use to lightly coat chicken. Brown chicken until golden.
Set aside.

question: I need a recipe for homemade potato chips.
answer:
Title: Homemade Potato Chips
Ingredients:
2 medium size Russet potatoes (about 1 lb.), sliced 1/16 inch thick
1 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 350°.
Lightly grease a nonstick baking sheet.
Arrange the potato slices in 1 layer on the baking sheet and bake, turning occasionally, for 45 minutes or until golden brown.

question: I need a recipe for homemade potato chips.
answer:
Title: Potato Chips
Ingredients:
4 medium potatoes, thinly sliced
1 inch deep vegetable oil
salt
Directions:
Slice potatoes as thinly as possible.
Soak in cold water for 1 hour; drain and pat dry.

question: I need a recipe for homemade potato chips.
answer:
Title: Oven Chipped Potatoes
Ingredients:
4 unpared potatoes, thinly sliced
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1 Tbsp. grated onion
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. dried leaf thyme
1 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Layer potato slices in a greased 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish. Melt butter in a small saucepan.
Stir in grated onion, salt and pepper.
Brush potato slices with butter mixture.
Bake in a 425° oven for 45 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
Sprinkle with parsley, thyme and shredded cheese.
Bake 15 minutes longer or until cheese is melted.
Yield: 4 to 6 servings.

question: I need a recipe for homemade potato chips.
answer:
Title: Homemade Salsa Recipe
Ingredients:
about 6 to 8 finely chopped tomatoes (Roma tomatoes work best)
1 large finely chopped onion
green and red onions (if you have them)
1 jalapeno, minced (1/2 jalapeno with seeds removed if you prefer it mild)
1 garlic clove, minced
1/3 c. finely chopped fresh cilantro
juice squeezed from 1 to 2 limes
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Mix everything together and use with Tostitos chips or garnish on your favorite Mexican dish.
It's also very delicious on white chili.

question: I need a recipe for homemade potato chips.
answer:
Title: Potato Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. butter
1 c. brown sugar
1 c. white sugar
2 eggs
2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. vanilla
2 c. crushed potato chips (6 oz. pkg.)
1 c. nuts (optional)
Directions:
Cream together butter, brown sugar and white sugar.
Add eggs and beat well after each.
Sift together flour, salt and soda. Add all together and add vanilla.
Crush potato chips and nuts. Mix all ingredients together.
Mix well.
Drop by spoonfuls on ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake 10 minutes at 350°.
Take up hot.

question: How do I make a simple egg drop soup?
answer:
Title: Egg Drop Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. peanut oil
1 c. chopped onion
1 1/2 tsp. minced garlic
7 c. chicken broth
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. thinly sliced carrots
1 tsp. minced ginger root
1 lb. lean pork, cut in strips
1 (8 oz.) can bamboo shoots, drained
1 (8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts, drained
6 oz. frozen pea pods
1/4 tsp. sesame oil
2 eggs, well beaten
Directions:
In a large saucepan or Dutch oven, heat oil over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, ginger and pork; cook and stir until tender. Stir in broth, soy sauce, pepper and sesame oil; bring to a boil. Add carrots; simmer 15 minutes.
Add all remaining ingredients except eggs; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low.
Stir in eggs with a fork to separate into strands.

question: How do I make a simple egg drop soup?
answer:
Title: Simple Egg Drop Soup
Ingredients:
1 can Campbell's chicken broth
1/2 to 1 tsp. diced green onion
1 egg, white separated
1 Tbsp. water
1 Tbsp. frozen peas
1 thin slice carrot, quartered (for color)
Directions:
Mix the can of chicken
broth
with
1 can of water and bring to a slow boil
(you
can make your own chicken broth or use other brands,
however,
I
prefer
Campbell's).
Mix
egg white and sugar; whip in
a
bowl
with
a fork until blended. Slowly start pouring the
egg white into the broth until gone. This should take at least 1 minute.
Add green onion, peas and carrot slice.
Turn off
heat
and
let
stand 5 minutes, then serve.
You can double this recipe or triple.

question: How do I make a simple egg drop soup?
answer:
Title: Super Simple Supper Soup
Ingredients:
10 to 14 c. chicken broth or bouillon
1 tsp. each: basil, marjoram, rosemary, oregano and Spice Islands fines herbes (no tarragon!)
1/2 c. dried, diced onions
1 can Green Giant Mexican style beans
1 can Italian stewed tomatoes
1 (16 oz.) bag frozen soup vegetables
1 to 2 c. elbow macaroni
Directions:
Bring all ingredients, except macaroni, to a boil.
Add macaroni and simmer until tender.
Serves lots.

question: How do I make a simple egg drop soup?
answer:
Title: Egg Drop Soup
Ingredients:
4 cans chicken broth
1/4 c. water
3 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/2 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 beaten eggs
Directions:
Heat broth.
Make a paste of cornstarch and water. Add sugar, salt and pepper. Stir in cornstarch mixture. Cook and stir until slightly thick.
Holding eggs above the pot, pour in slowly, constantly stirring to break into strings.
Serve with noodles. May top with chopped green onions.

question: How do I make a simple egg drop soup?
answer:
Title: Super Simple Soup
Ingredients:
1 (7 oz.) pkg. elbow macaroni (2 c. uncooked)
1 to 1 1/2 lb. smoked sausage, sliced, quartered and cooked
1 1/2 c. shredded cabbage
1/2 c. shredded carrot
4 green onions with tops, sliced
6 c. prepared chicken or beef broth
1 tsp. Beau Monde seasoning
1/4 tsp. coarse ground pepper
1/8 tsp. ground nutmeg
2 to 3 drops hot sauce
Directions:
Prepare macaroni according to package directions.
Drain.
In large kettle, cook sausage, cabbage, carrot and green onions just until vegetables are tender.
Add remaining ingredients.
Simmer 5 minutes.
Stir in macaroni and heat through.
Serves 6.

question: What can I cook with quinoa and black beans?
answer:
Title: Pseudo-Southwestern Quinoa
Ingredients:
1 c. quinoa
1 t. ginger, minced
1 3/4 c. water 1/2 t. dulce or kelp powder
2 T. lemon juice
2 serrano peppers
1 t. oregano, dried
1 avocado, diced and drenched with lime juice
4 green onions chopped
2 ears fresh corn on the cob, cut off corn
1/2 diced green bell pepper
1/2 c. diced red sweet pepper
1/4 c. olive oil or flax seed oil
1 bunch cilantro chopped
Directions:
First of all quinoa (pronounced "keen-wa") is an alkalizing grain.
It is hardy and contains the highest amount if protein of any grain.
It cooks quickly and makes a delicious, crunchy dish. It is high in calcium, phosphorus, iron, B vitamins, and vitamin E and has an ideal balance of amino acids.
Wash quinoa thoroughly to remove the saponin, the rust-colored coating that protects this seed against insects, birds, and the sun.
While cooking, the germ on the outside of the grain unfolds like a partial spiral giving the finished cooked product a lovely appearance.

question: What can I cook with quinoa and black beans?
answer:
Title: Black Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
1 lb. black beans
1/4 lb. ham for seasoning
1 large onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
2 green peppers, chopped
1 bay leaf
1/8 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. salt
3 to 4 c. cold water
2 pkg. yellow rice
chopped green onions, fat-free sour cream and tomato for garnish (optional)
Directions:
Wash beans thoroughly.
Cover with water and put in large pot to soak overnight.
Drain beans and place in crock-pot with 3 to 4 cups of water.
Add all other ingredients, except the rice.
Cook on high for 1 hour, then cook 8 to 10 hours on low.
Remove bay leaf.
Cook rice according to directions on package.
Serve beans over rice.
Garnish as desired.
This is a low-fat, high fiber meal.

question: What can I cook with quinoa and black beans?
answer:
Title: Quinoa Tabouleh
Ingredients:
1 c. quinoa
2 c. water
2 medium tomatoes, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
6 green onions with tops, finely chopped
1 medium cucumber, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 small green bell pepper, seeded and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 c. finely chopped fresh parsley
1/2 c. finely chopped fresh mint
1/3 c. freshly squeezed lemon juice
1/3 c. olive oil
1 garlic clove, minced
1 tsp. fine sea salt
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
Put the quinoa in a wire strainer and thoroughly rinse with hot water to remove any bitter flavor.

question: What can I cook with quinoa and black beans?
answer:
Title: Black Bean And Rice Bake
Ingredients:
2 tsp. olive oil
1 1/2 c. chopped onion
3 garlic cloves, minced
1/2 c. chopped red bell pepper
1 (4 oz.) can diced green chiles
1 c. crushed, drained canned tomatoes
1 Tbsp. lime juice
1 1/2 to 2 tsp. chili powder
3/4 tsp. salt
16 oz. drained, cooked black beans
2 c. cooked brown rice
4 oz. Cheddar or Jack cheese
Directions:
Preheat
oven
to
350°.
Heat	oil
in
heavy,
large, nonstick
skillet
over
medium
heat.
Add
onion and garlic; saute 8
to 10 minutes until tender.
Add bell pepper; saute 3 minutes.
Stir in tomatoes, lime juice, chili powder and salt; bring to
a boil.
In a 2-quart casserole, mix beans and rice. Pour in
tomato
mixture and stir to combine.
Sprinkle casserole with cheese.
Bake 10 to 15 minutes until hot and bubbly. Healthy. Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I cook with quinoa and black beans?
answer:
Title: Black Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. olive oil
1 c. finely chopped green bell pepper
1 lb. rinsed, drained, cooked black beans
1 tsp. chopped fresh thyme or 1/2 tsp. dried
1 bay leaf
1/2 c. finely chopped onion
1 Tbsp. finely chopped garlic
1 c. low sodium chicken broth plus 1/2 c. water
1 1/2 c. coarsely chopped canned plum tomatoes with juice
1/4 tsp. dried oregano
1/4 tsp. hot pepper sauce
salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
4 c. cooked long grain rice
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh flat leaf parsley to garnish (optional)
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh cilantro
Directions:
In a medium saucepan, heat oil over medium-high heat; add onion, pepper and garlic.
Saute, stirring occasionally, 15 minutes.
Add beans, broth and water, tomatoes, thyme, bay leaf, oregano and hot pepper sauce.
Over high heat, bring to a boil . Reduce heat; simmer 45 minutes, stirring occasionally until sauce thickens and vegetables are tender.
If mixture becomes too thick, add water to thin to desired consistency.
Stir in cilantro and season with salt and pepper.
Remove bay leaf.
Serve over rice, sprinkled with parsley.

question: What’s a quick recipe for chicken and broccoli stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Quick Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
3 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
1 garlic clove, minced
1 c. each broccoli florets, red pepper strips and carrot slices or other vegetables
1/4 c. sliced green onions
1/2 c. Miracle Whip
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
Directions:
Heat oil in skillet over high heat.
Cut chicken into strips. Add to skillet with garlic; stir-fry 3 minutes.
Add vegetables; stir-fry an additional 3 minutes. Reduce heat to medium.
Stir in Miracle Whip, soy sauce and ginger. Simmer 1 minute.
Serve over rice. Serves 4.

question: What’s a quick recipe for chicken and broccoli stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken-Broccoli Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
2 tsp. oil
2 whole chicken breasts, boned and thinly sliced
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 (16 oz.) pkg. broccoli cuts
1 medium red pepper, sliced into 1/2-inch pieces
2 tsp. cornstarch
1/2 tsp. chicken flavored instant bouillon
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/2 c. water
Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Heat oil in
a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Stir-fry chicken and garlic for 3 to 5 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink. Reduce heat.
Remove chicken and keep warm. Stir in broccoli and red pepper. Cover and steam 3 to 5 minutes or until vegetables are crisp-tender.

question: What’s a quick recipe for chicken and broccoli stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
2 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
1 lb. fresh broccoli
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 medium onion, chunked
2 medium-size red tomatoes, chunked
1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, quartered
1/3 c. stir-fry sauce
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
Directions:
Cut chicken into 1-inch square pieces.
Cut broccoli flowerets into bite-size pieces and peeled stalks into thin slices.
Heat oil in large skillet over high heat.
Add chicken; stir-fry 1 minute.
Add broccoli and onion; stir-fry 1 minute.
Add 2 tablespoons water; cover and cook 2 minutes, stirring once.
Add bell peppers and mushrooms; stir-fry 3 minutes.
Add stir-fry sauce and crushed red pepper.
Cook, stirring, until chicken and vegetables are coated with sauce.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: What’s a quick recipe for chicken and broccoli stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Quick Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
3 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut in strips
1 garlic clove, minced
1 c. each: broccoli, cauliflower, red pepper strips and carrot strips
1/4 c. sliced green onions
2 Tbsp. fat-free mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. soy sauce (lite)
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
1 can chicken broth (fat removed)
Directions:
Spray large skillet or wok with a nonstick cooking spray. Add chicken strips and garlic.
Stir-fry 3 minutes.
Add vegetables.
Stir-fry 3 more minutes.
Add chicken broth.
Reduce heat to medium.
Stir in mayonnaise, soy sauce and ginger.
Simmer until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Do not overcook.
(I you want a thick sauce, thicken it with cornstarch and cold water.)
Serve over hot rice.

question: What’s a quick recipe for chicken and broccoli stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Quick And Easy Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
3 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
1 garlic clove, minced
1 c. each broccoli flowerets, red pepper strips and carrot slices
1/4 c. green onion
1/2 c. miracle whip
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
Directions:
Heat oil in skillet over high heat.
Cut chicken into strips. Add to skillet with garlic.
Stir-fry 3 minutes.
Add vegetables. Stir-fry for 3 minutes.
Reduce heat to medium.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Simmer for 1 minute.
Serve over rice. Serves 4.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts with bacon?
answer:
Title: The Best Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
6 slices bacon, cut across into 1/4-inch pieces
1/2 c. pine nuts
2-1/2 lb. (8 cups) Brussels sprouts, halved, cored and each half cut into quarters
2 tsp. minced garlic
1 cup carrots, peeled and cut into very small dice
2 tsp. salt
Freshly ground pepper to taste
1/4 c. chopped Italian parsley
Directions:
Place the bacon in a large skillet over medium heat and cook until the fat is rendered.
Add the pine nuts and cook until the bacon is crisp and the nuts are golden, about 1 minute.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts with bacon?
answer:
Title: Company Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
4 bacon strips, diced
1 doz. Brussels sprouts, trimmed and halved
1 medium onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. snipped fresh chives
1 carrot, thinly sliced
10 stuffed green olives, sliced
1/2 tsp. dried basil
1/3 c. chicken broth or dry white wine
1 tsp. olive oil
1/2 tsp. pepper
pinch of salt
Directions:
In a skillet, fry bacon just until cooked.
Drain, reserving 2 tablespoons drippings.
Add remaining ingredients; cook and stir over medium-high heat for 10 to 15 minutes or until Brussels sprouts are crisp-tender.
Yields 4 servings.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts with bacon?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts With Bacon
Ingredients:
3 slices bacon, coarsely chopped
1/4 c. chopped pecans
2 (10 oz. each) boxes frozen Brussels sprouts, thawed and halved or 2 c. fresh, halved
1/4 c. apple juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cook bacon over medium heat for 5 minutes, stirring frequently until crisp.
Stir in pecans and cook 1 minute, until roasted. Drain all but 1 tablespoon fat from skillet; remove bacon and pecans to a paper towel.
Add Brussels sprouts and stir to coat with remaining bacon fat.
Stir in apple juice, cover and bring to a boil over high heat.
Reduce heat to low and simmer 8 to 10 minutes (for frozen) or 10 to 12 minutes (for fresh).
Before serving, add bacon, pecans, salt and pepper.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts with bacon?
answer:
Title: Bacon Tossed Brussel Sprouts
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. and 1/2 tsp. salt
3 pt. Brussel sprouts, cleaned and halved
8 strips thick sliced bacon, cut crosswise into thin strips
1/3 c. onion, chopped
1/2 tsp. pepper
3-4 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
1 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Fill 6 quart Dutch oven with water. Add 1 Tbsp. salt. Bring water to a boil; add Brussels sprouts. Reduce heat to medium. Cook 12 minutes, until crisp and tender. Drain and rinse under cold water to stop cooking. In large non-stick pan, over medium heat, cook bacon for 5 minutes until slightly crisp. Pour off fat. Add onion to bacon in skillet and cook for 5 minutes or until tender. Add sprouts, remaining salt and pepper. Heat thoroughly. Add vinegar and butter, stirring to melt butter.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts with bacon?
answer:
Title: Easy And Good Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
8 bacon slices diced
1 med. onion, chopped
1 Tbsp. chopped garlic
1 container brussels sprouts
salt and pepper
Directions:
Par boil brussels sprouts until medium hard about 7-10 minutes. Fry bacon, onion and garlic until brown.
Add brussels sprouts to pan and mix.
Add salt and pepper to taste and saute 10 minutes.

question: How do I make a healthy energy bar?
answer:
Title: Energy Bars
Ingredients:
2 c. old-fashioned oats
1 c. raisins or dried cranberries
1 c. unsalted peanuts
1/2 c. unsalted sunflower seeds
2 1/2 c. Rice Krispies
2 Tbsp. sesame seeds
1/2 c. butter
1/2 c. chunky peanut butter
1 (10 oz.) pkg. marshmallows
Directions:
Toast oats for 15 minutes at 250°. Add peanuts, raisins and sunflower seeds. Cool. Mix in Rice Krispies. Melt butter, peanut butter and marshmallows. Add dry mixture
and mix together. Press into buttered pan. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. To serve, cut into desired size or cut and wrap to store.

question: How do I make a healthy energy bar?
answer:
Title: Energy Bars
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. Rice Krispies cereal
1 c. quick oats
1/2 c. toasted sesame seed
1/4 c. butter (1/2 stick)
1/2 c. peanut butter
1 (10 oz.) pkg. marshmallows
1/2 c. peanuts, halved
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Grease 9 x 13-inch pan.
In large frying pan, combine cereal, oats and sesame seed.
Toast over medium heat for a few minutes until crisp, stirring constantly.

question: How do I make a healthy energy bar?
answer:
Title: Energy Bars
Ingredients:
1 c. butter or oleo
1/2 c. peanut butter
1 (10 oz.) pkg. marshmallows
2 c. Rice Krispies
2 c. Minute oatmeal
1/2 c. raisins
1/2 c. peanuts
wheat germ
Directions:
Melt butter, peanut butter and marshmallows in a microwave until smooth. Add remaining ingredients, mixing thoroughly. Pour into a 9 x 13-inch pan lined with foil or sprayed with cooking spray. Flatten. When set, cut into squares.

question: How do I make a healthy energy bar?
answer:
Title: Energy Bars
Ingredients:
3 c. miniature marshmallows
1/2 c. crunchy peanut butter
1/4 c. honey
3 Tbsp. margarine
4 Tbsp. cocoa
4 c. Rice Krispies
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Melt together first 5 ingredients, stirring over low heat until marshmallows are melted. Add Rice Krispies and vanilla. Place in foil-lined pan and cool thoroughly. Cut into squares. Store in plastic container.
Makes 24 squares.

question: How do I make a healthy energy bar?
answer:
Title: Banana Energy Bars
Ingredients:
3/4 c. soft margarine
1 c. packed brown sugar
1 egg
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. mashed ripe bananas
4 c. uncooked oats
1 c. raisins
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
Cream margarine and sugar until light and fluffy.
Beat in egg, salt and bananas.
Stir in remaining ingredients.

question: What’s a recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Shortcake
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 c. milk
1 c. sugar
1 egg
2 c. flour
2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. vanilla
pinch of salt
Directions:
Mix sugar and butter, then egg.
Add milk, alternating with flour, baking powder and salt mixture.
Add vanilla.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
Double recipe for 9 x 13-inch pan.

question: What’s a recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Shortcake
Ingredients:
2 c. sifted flour
3 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 c. shortening
1 egg, well beaten
1/3 c. milk (about)
1 pkg. frozen strawberries, slightly defrosted
whipped cream
Directions:
Set oven for very hot (450°).
Grease 8-inch round cake pan. Mix and sift flour, baking powder, salt and sugar.
Cut in shortening with 2 knives or a pastry blender, until mixture looks like coarse meal.
Combine egg and milk; stir into flour mixture. If dough is too stiff, add more milk.
Pat or roll out into an 8-inch circle and put in pan.

question: What’s a recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Shortcake
Ingredients:
4 egg whites
1 1/2 sticks softened butter
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1 c. milk
3 c. finely sifted flour
4 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 qt. strawberries
3 c. whipping cream (or more; use mountains of whipped cream!)
1/4 c. sugar
Directions:
Stiffly whip the cream.
Rinse and cap the strawberries; blot dry on paper towels.
Slice strawberries and sprinkle with sugar. (If strawberries are sweet, no sugar is required.)
Divide the strawberries and put between cake layers.
(Do not put strawberries on top or they may bleed into cream.)
Spread whipped cream over the cake.
Cut and serve.

question: What’s a recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Shortcake
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
3/4 tsp. salt
4 Tbsp. sugar
1 egg
1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Preheat oven.
Sift the flour.
Add the baking powder, salt and sugar.
Break in the egg; add the milk.
Blend and drop onto very lightly greased cookie sheet by tablespoon.
Bake for 10 to 12 minutes at 425° or for 25 minutes at 375°.

question: What’s a recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Individual Strawberry Shortcakes
Ingredients:
3 c. sifted flour
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. butter or shortening
3/4 c. milk
2 qt. strawberries, crushed and sweetened
Directions:
Sift flour once.
Measure.
Add baking powder and salt and sift again.
Cut in shortening.
Add milk all at once and stir carefully until all flour is dampened.
Then stir vigorously until mixture forms a soft dough and follows spoon around bowl.
Drop 3/4 cup dough onto ungreased baking sheet*.
Brush with milk (or cream). Bake in hot oven (450°) for 15 to 20 minutes.
Serves 8.

question: How do I make a homemade barbecue rub?
answer:
Title: Barbecue Dry Rub
Ingredients:
1/4 c paprika
2 Tbsp granulated garlic
2 Tbsp Granulated onion
2 tsp peppercorns
1 tsp dry mustard
1 tsp chili powder
2 Tbsp cumin seed, toasted
3 Tbsp coriander seed, toasted
1/4 c kosher salt
1/4 c light brown sugar
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a clean coffee grinder. Rub on chicken directly or coat in a plastic storage bag. Make sure chicken is dry before applying.

question: How do I make a homemade barbecue rub?
answer:
Title: Barbecue Dry Rub Mix
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. paprika
2 Tbsp. light brown sugar
2 Tbsp. salt
1 Tbsp. red cayenne pepper
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 bay leaf
Directions:
Process until the bay leaf is pulverized and mixture is thoroughly blended.
Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 3 months.
Makes about 1/2 cup.

question: How do I make a homemade barbecue rub?
answer:
Title: Honey Barbecue Rub
Ingredients:
4 beef top sirloins (4 oz. each)
1/4 c. honey
4 cloves garlic, diced
2 tsp. dry mustard
2 tsp. chili powder
2 tsp. salt
2 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Rub each steak with 1 tablespoon honey.
Combine rest of the ingredients and rub into steaks.
Let stand 20 to 30 minutes. Barbecue or broil to desired degree of doneness.

question: How do I make a homemade barbecue rub?
answer:
Title: Homemade Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 small onions
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
2 Tbsp. vinegar
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. paprika
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
3/4 c. catsup
3/4 c. water
Directions:
Fry onions and butter until brown.
Add all the rest of ingredients with onions and slow-cook for 10 to 15 minutes.

question: How do I make a homemade barbecue rub?
answer:
Title: Goodie'S Bbq Rub
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp salt
2 Tbsp crushed red pepper
1/2 Tbsp dry rosemary
1 Tbsp chopped garlic
2 Tbsp cayenne pepper
1 Tbsp dry sage
2 Tbsp paprika
Directions:
Mix all together and use as a dry rub before cooking ribs or chicken.

question: What can I make with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Chicken-Spinach Picnic Salad
Ingredients:
1/4 c. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1/2 tsp. sugar
3 c. cooked, cubed chicken
2 c. broccoli florets
1 (8 oz.) can water chestnuts
Parmesan cheese
3 tsp. vinegar
1 tsp. minced onion
1/4 tsp. pepper
5 oz. fresh spinach, torn in bite size pieces
6 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
Directions:
Mix soy sauce, vinegar, oil, onion, sugar and pepper and pour over chicken to marinate.
Refrigerate for at least several hours. Combine spinach, broccoli, chestnuts and bacon.
Just before serving, add chicken mixture.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: What can I make with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Rolls
Ingredients:
2 pkg. (10 oz. each) frozen, chopped spinach, cooked according to directions and drained well
2 c. one-step chicken flavored stuffing mix
1 c. grated Parmesan cheese
6 large eggs, lightly beaten
3/4 c. (1 1/2 sticks) butter
1/2 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
Directions:
Mix all ingredients in a large bowl until well blended.
Roll level tablespoonfuls of mixture into balls (makes about 60). Arrange them on cookie sheet (with sides is best), close but not touching.
At this point, they can either be frozen and put in a gallon Ziploc bag or cooked in 350° oven for 15 to 20 minutes until firm.

question: What can I make with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Grits
Ingredients:
4 servings instant grits
1 can chicken broth
1 Tbsp. dry wine
salt and pepper to taste
1 tsp. ground red pepper
1 pkg. frozen chopped spinach, prepared according to pkg. directions
1 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 c. fat-free Cheddar cheese
1 1/4 c. prepared barbecue sauce
1 1/4 c. water
2 tsp. dried thyme
1 1/2 tsp. chicken bouillon
1 1/3 lb. potatoes, cut in 1/4-inch slices
Directions:
In large saute pan, combine all ingredients except potatoes; bring to a boil.
Add potatoes; cover and simmer 20 to 25 minutes until tender, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot.

question: What can I make with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Fried Spinach Stuffed Chicken Breast
Ingredients:
1 (10-oz.) frozen chopped spinach, thawed, drained
1/4 c. sour cream
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg (optional)
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. poultry seasoning
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
6 chicken breasts, skinless, boneless
1 egg
1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Place breast between heavy plastic wrap and flatten to 1/4-inch thickness.
Place 1/2 teaspoon of spinach mixture on each flattened breast.
Fold in sides and ends and secure with toothpicks. Combine egg and milk, mix well.
Dredge chicken in flour mixture, then dip in egg mixture, and dredge in flour mixture.
Pour oil to 1 inch in skillet and fry chicken in hot oil about 15 minutes or until golden brown.
May also dip in egg wash and roll in cornflake crumbs (with seasonings) and bake.

question: What can I make with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Spinach
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
4 chicken breasts (8 halves)
1 c. mayonnaise
2 cans cream of chicken soup
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. curry powder
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. buttered bread crumbs
Directions:
Squeeze excess liquid out of spinach.
Spread in 9 x 13-inch dish.
Put chicken on top.
Mix mayo, soup, lemon juice and curry. Spread on top of chicken.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Bake at 350° for 1 to 1 1/2 hours.

question: How do I make a flaky pie crust from scratch?
answer:
Title: Flaky Pie Crust
Ingredients:
1 1/3 c. flour (all-purpose)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/3 c. oil
2 Tbsp. cold water
Directions:
In a medium bowl, sift together flour and salt.
Dribble oil over flour.
Mix with flour until oil and flour are mixed.
Dribble water over this mixture.
Stir to form smooth ball.
Dampen work surface.
Put large wax paper down.
Put dough on this.
Cover with another piece of wax paper.
Roll out.
Remove wax paper.
Shape in pie plate.
Prick holes in shell for cream pies.
Bake for 15 to 20 minutes in a 425° oven.

question: How do I make a flaky pie crust from scratch?
answer:
Title: Flaky Pie Crust
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
2/3 c. shortening
2 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. vinegar
5 Tbsp. cold water
Directions:
Sift together the flour and salt into bowl.
Cut in shortening and butter until crumbly.
Mix vinegar with cold water.
Add to flour mixture.
Stir with fork until dough clings together. Divide into 2 portions.
Roll on floured surface.
Makes 2 crusts.

question: How do I make a flaky pie crust from scratch?
answer:
Title: Three Flaky Pie Crusts
Ingredients:
3 c. flour
1 1/3 c. Crisco
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1 egg
3 Tbsp. vinegar
7 Tbsp. water
Directions:
Mix flour, baking powder and salt together.
Cut in shortening.
Mix egg, water and vinegar in a cup; beat slightly. Then pour into flour mixture and mix (with fork or pie dough cutter) until you can form one big ball.
Divide into 3 sections. Place each part into a quart size plastic bag.
Mash each flat. Refrigerate extras up to one month in Ziploc bag.

question: How do I make a flaky pie crust from scratch?
answer:
Title: Flaky Pie Crust
Ingredients:
3 c. flour
1 c. Crisco
1 tsp. salt
1 egg
3 Tbsp. cold water
2 Tbsp. vinegar
Directions:
Blend flour, shortening and salt.
Cut in shortening until pieces are the size of small peas.
Beat egg; mix with water and vinegar.
Add to flour mixture and toss lightly with fork.
Roll out onto floured board or wax paper.
Makes 3 single crusts.

question: How do I make a flaky pie crust from scratch?
answer:
Title: Flaky Pie Crust
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
1/3 c. + 1 Tbsp. shortening
1/2 tsp. salt
2 tsp. sugar
3 Tbsp. ice water
Directions:
Divide shortening in half.
Work 1/2 into the dry ingredient mixture, until smooth.
Work other 1/2 into the mixture until just about the size of a pea.
Make well in center and add the ice water, 1 tablespoon at a time.

question: How do I make baked garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. parsley flakes
1 pkg. (12 oz.) frozen, peeled, deveined, quick cooking shrimp
Directions:
Place butter in custard cup. Microwave at high 30-45 second, until melted. Stir in garlic powder and parsley flakes.

question: How do I make baked garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Baked Shrimp
Ingredients:
2 lb. shrimp (large), shelled
5 or more garlic, chopped
1/2 c. parsley, chopped
3/4 c. bread crumbs
1/2 c. butter
1/4 c. olive oil
salt and pepper to taste
1 tsp. pepper flakes
Directions:
Melt butter and olive oil together.

question: How do I make baked garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Butterflied Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter
2 lb. medium shrimp, peeled, deveined and butterflied
3 garlic cloves, smashed and chopped
1 1/2 green peppers, cut into thin strips
salt and pepper
1 large lemon, peeled and diced
1 Tbsp. parsley, chopped
1/4 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Heat butter in large frying pan.
Add shrimp and cook 2 minutes on each side over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and season well. Continue cooking for 1 minute.
Stir in green peppers and diced lemon.
Cook 1 more minute.
Add parsley, paprika, salt and pepper. Mix and serve.

question: How do I make baked garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter(Microwave; Easy)
Ingredients:
1/2 stick butter
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. parsley flakes
1 (12 oz.) pkg. frozen, peeled and deveined shrimp
Directions:
Place butter in microwave-safe dish (8 or 9-inch); a Corning Ware dish works great.
Heat butter 35 to 45 seconds to melt. Stir in garlic powder and parsley flakes.
Place shrimp in colander; run cold water over to clean and separate.
Drain.
Stir shrimp into butter mixture to evenly coat.
Cover tightly with plastic wrap.
Microwave 6 to 8 minutes on High.
Stir every 2 minutes.
When shrimp are tender and opaque, let stand 1 1/2 minutes before serving.
Serve with toothpicks.
Fresh shrimp may be used if deveined and peeled.
Makes 1 1/2 to 2 cups.

question: How do I make baked garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Lemon Garlic Sauce
Ingredients:
1 lb. large shrimp
2 egg yolks
1 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. fresh parsley, finely chopped
2 to 3 cloves garlic, crushed
2 tsp. chives, chopped (optional)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper or 1/2 tsp. red pepper flakes
1/2 c. butter or margarine, melted
1 c. vegetable oil
1 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Clean, peel and devein shrimp and set aside.
Position knife blade in food processor bowl; add next 8 ingredients to bowl and top with cover.
Process for 30 seconds or until well mixed.
With processor running, add butter through food chute; process 1 minute or until sauce is thickened.
Set aside.
Heat oil in large skillet to 375°.
Combine flour, salt and pepper.
Drain shrimp and dredge in flour mixture.
Fry shrimp in hot oil until golden brown.
Turn once; drain.
Arrange shrimp in 4 or 5 individual baking dishes and top with sauce.
Broil shrimp 30 to 45 seconds. Makes 4 to 5 servings.

question: How do I make a quick chicken piccata?
answer:
Title: Chicken Piccata
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken breasts, skinless, boneless and cut up
1 c. flour
1 Tbsp. salt
1/2 c. butter
1/4 c. olive oil
1 c. chicken broth
1/4 c. lemon juice
2 lemons, sliced very thin
1/2 c. finely chopped parsley
Directions:
Place cutlets between 2 pieces of foil and pound until very thin. Dredge in flour and salt. Shake off excess.
Heat butter and oil. Saute chicken 5 minutes over medium heat, turning meat only once.
If skillet is not large enough, as soon as first slices are done, pile on a plate and keep warm. Return all chicken to skillet, adding the chicken broth. Simmer until the liquid is reduced by half.
Add lemon juice and thin slices of lemon.
Heat only until lemons are hot.
Add parsley at the last minute. Serve with the sauce poured over and garnish with the hot lemon slices.

question: How do I make a quick chicken piccata?
answer:
Title: Chicken Piccata
Ingredients:
1 lemon
1/3 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
4 chicken breasts (1 lb. total), pound to thin slices
2 tsp. olive oil
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 c. reduced-sodium or regular chicken broth
1 Tbsp. capers, rinsed
1/2 tsp. sugar
2 tsp. butter
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
With a sharp knife, remove skin and white pith from lemon and discard.
Working over a bowl, cut lemon segments from their surrounding membranes.
Chop segments coarsely and reserve with the juice.

question: How do I make a quick chicken piccata?
answer:
Title: Chicken Piccata
Ingredients:
6 chicken breast halves, skinned and boned
1/3 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/4 c. lemon juice
1 lemon, thinly sliced
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
Place each piece of chicken between 2 sheets of waxed paper; flatten to 1/4-inch thickness with meat mallet.
Combine flour, salt and pepper.
Dredge chicken in flour mixture.
Melt butter in large skillet over medium heat.
Add chicken.
Cook 3 to 4 minutes on each side or until golden brown.
Remove chicken; drain on paper towels.
Keep warm.
Add lemon juice and lemon slices to pan drippings in skillet.
Cook until thoroughly heated.
Pour lemon mixture over chicken and sprinkle with parsley.
Yields 6 servings.

question: How do I make a quick chicken piccata?
answer:
Title: Chicken Piccata
Ingredients:
2 whole skinned and boned chicken breasts, halved lengthwise
1/4 c. flour
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 c. fresh sliced mushrooms
1 clove garlic, minced
1/4 c. dry white wine or chicken broth
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Place chicken between 2 pieces of plastic wrap.
Pound chicken to 1/2-inch thickness.
Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper; coat with flour.
In a large skillet, brown chicken in 3 tablespoons of butter over medium heat for about 5 minutes or until lightly golden.
Remove from skillet and keep warm.

question: How do I make a quick chicken piccata?
answer:
Title: Chicken Piccata
Ingredients:
2 whole chicken breasts, halved lengthwise
dash of salt and pepper
1/4 c. flour
4 Tbsp. margarine
1 c. fresh mushrooms
1 garlic clove, minced
1/4 c. dry white wine
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Place chicken breast between 2 pieces of plastic wrap.
Pound chicken to 1/2 inch thickness.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper; coat with flour.
In a large skillet, brown chicken in 3 tablespoons butter 5 minutes until golden brown.
Remove from skillet.
Add remaining butter; cook mushrooms and garlic until tender.
Return chicken to pan.
Add wine and lemon juice.
Simmer 7 to 10 minutes.
Top with parsley.

question: I need a recipe for a Mediterranean chicken bowl.
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Chicken
Ingredients:
2 1/2 to 3 lb. frying chicken
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
4 Tbsp. oil
1 lb. mushrooms, sliced
3 tsp. chopped fresh parsley
1 tsp. crushed garlic
1/4 tsp. thyme
1 can artichoke hearts
1 can black olives
1 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 can Hunt's tomato paste
1/4 c. dry white wine
Directions:
Rinse chicken well.
In a bag, combine flour, salt and pepper. Shake chicken (few pieces at a time) in flour mixture to coat.
In a large skillet, brown chicken in oil.
Remove from skillet.
Add mushrooms, parsley, garlic and thyme.
Cook until mushrooms are tender.
Add artichoke hearts and olives.
Return chicken to skillet.
Mix together tomato paste and wine.
Pour over chicken. Simmer covered 40 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink inside.
Sprinkle with additional parsley, if desired.

question: I need a recipe for a Mediterranean chicken bowl.
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Chicken
Ingredients:
1 to 1 1/2 lb. boneless, skinless chicken pieces
1 (29 oz.) can Veg-All homestyle large cut vegetables
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes, drained and chopped
1 large green pepper, chopped
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. basil
1/2 tsp. oregano
1 Tbsp. fresh parsley
Directions:
Place chicken in a 3-quart baking dish.
Combine Veg-All homestyle mixed vegetables, tomatoes, onion, green pepper, lemon juice, basil and oregano in a bowl.
Pour over the chicken.
Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 40 to 45 minutes.
Sprinkle with parsley.

question: I need a recipe for a Mediterranean chicken bowl.
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
4 chicken breasts (Tyson)
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. Tabasco sauce
1/2 tsp. black pepper (ground)
1 tsp. basil
3 Tbsp. capers
1/2 celery, chopped
1/4 c. sun-dried tomatoes, cut into strips
1 c. cheese (Mozzarella)
1/4 c. olives (black), sliced
4 loaves French bread (mini loaves)
grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Boil chicken and cut into bite-size pieces.
In bowl, mix together mayonnaise, lemon juice, Tabasco, black pepper and basil. Mix in chicken, capers, celery, tomatoes, cheese and olives. Slice top off mini loaves lengthwise and hollow to form boats. Brush with melted butter, garlic and parsley.
Broil until golden and toasty.
Fill with salad mixture; sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

question: I need a recipe for a Mediterranean chicken bowl.
answer:
Title: Chicken Mediterranean
Ingredients:
4 to 6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
3 to 4 large potatoes (unpeeled), quartered
1 Tbsp. (15 ml) olive oil
1/4 c. (60 ml) fresh lemon juice
1 Tbsp. (15 ml) finely chopped fresh rosemary leaves or 1 tsp. (5 ml) dried
2 to 4 cloves garlic, finely chopped
1/4 c. (60 ml) chopped scallions (spring onions)
salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
1/4 c. (60 ml) Kalamata or other black olives
1 c. (250 ml) sliced mushrooms
Directions:
Place the chicken and potatoes in an ovenproof casserole. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. Sprinkle with rosemary, garlic, scallions, salt and pepper. Marinate in the refrigerator for 30 to 60 minutes, turning occasionally. Bake, covered, in a preheated 400°F (200°C) oven for 30 minutes. Add the olives and mushrooms; bake an additional 30 minutes. Serves 4 to 6.

question: I need a recipe for a Mediterranean chicken bowl.
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Chicken And Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. mushrooms
1/4 c. flour
3 lb. chicken
4 Tbsp. oil
1 c. chopped onion
1 c. quartered green pepper
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
1 (1 lb.) can tomatoes, broken up
1 c. water
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. Italian dressing
1/16 tsp. ground red pepper
1/2 c. raw rice
Directions:
Slice mushrooms. Dredge chicken with flour; shake off excess. Heat oil in large saucepan. Add chicken and brown well. Remove chicken.
To oil remaining, add onion, green pepper and garlic. Saute 3 minutes. Add mushrooms and saute 4 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, water, salt, Italian dressing and red pepper.
Bring to a boil.
Stir in rice.
Return chicken to saucepan.
Cover, reduce heat and simmer for 45 minutes or until chicken is tender.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make soft and chewy brownies?
answer:
Title: Chewy Brownies
Ingredients:
1/3 c. butter or margarine
3 sq. unsweetened chocolate
1 c. all-purpose flour
3/4 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
3 eggs
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
3/4 c. chopped pecans or walnuts
Directions:
Melt butter and chocolate together.
Cool.
Stir together flour, baking powder and salt.
Beat eggs until light and fluffy. Gradually add sugar, beating until thick.
Add chocolate mixture and extract.
Add flour mixture, beating just until blended.
Stir in nuts.
Bake in a well-greased 9-inch square pan at 350° for 28 to 30 minutes.
Cool on rack.
Cut into squares.
Yield: 25 brownies.

question: How do I make soft and chewy brownies?
answer:
Title: Soft And Chewy Brownies
Ingredients:
4 sq. unsweetened chocolate
3/4 c. butter, softened
2 c. sugar
1 c. flour
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Melt chocolate squares over very low heat.
In a large bowl, mix butter, sugar, vanilla and chocolate.
Add eggs and mix well. Slowly add flour and mix until completely blended.
Grease pan and bake for 40 minutes at 350°.

question: How do I make soft and chewy brownies?
answer:
Title: Chewy Brownies
Ingredients:
2/3 c. margarine
4 eggs
6 Tbsp. cocoa
2 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 c. flour
1/2 c. nuts
Directions:
Melt margarine.
Add cocoa, sugar and salt.
Mix well. Add eggs and vanilla. Add dry ingredients and mix well.
Bake in a 9 x 13-inch pan in a 350° oven for 25 minutes.

question: How do I make soft and chewy brownies?
answer:
Title: "Chewy" Brownies
Ingredients:
2 sticks margarine (not whipped margarine)
2 c. sugar
1/2 c. cocoa
4 eggs (medium)
1 1/2 c. flour (self-rising)
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
Mix sugar and cocoa in large bowl. Add melted margarine. Add eggs one at a time; stir in after each egg. (Do not beat with mixer.) Add flour, vanilla and nuts. Bake in jelly roll pan (approximately 11 x 13 x 1-inch) for 20 minutes at 325°. (Shake pan while brownies are baking to make them fall. This makes them chewy.) Top with marshmallow cream while hot, then make a chocolate confectioners icing to spread on top.

question: How do I make soft and chewy brownies?
answer:
Title: Chewy Brownies
Ingredients:
1/2 c. melted butter
1 c. sugar
1 egg
1/2 tsp. vanilla flavoring
6 Tbsp. cocoa
1/2 c. flour
1 c. chopped walnuts
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Cream butter and sugar well.
Beat in egg. Add remaining ingredients.
Bake in a greased 8-inch square pan in a moderate oven for 20 minutes.
Cut in squares when cool or serve hot with vanilla ice cream.

question: What can I make with butternut squash and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash
Ingredients:
4 medium squash
2/3 c. brown sugar
2/3 c. white sugar
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
1/4 tsp. salt
4 tsp. lemon juice
5 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Cut potatoes for frying (about 6 good ones).
Coat with 1 heaping
tablespoonful of flour.
Fry in deep oil.
Salt to taste.

question: What can I make with butternut squash and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. oil
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. cloves
1/2 tsp. allspice
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
3 eggs
2 c. plain flour
2 Tbsp. baking powder
1 tsp. soda
8 oz. crushed pineapple (undrained)
2 c. grated butternut squash
1 c. walnuts
Directions:
In large bowl, combine first 6 ingredients. Beat eggs. Add to spice mixture. Mix dry ingredients together. Slowly add to spice mixture. Beat 5 minutes. Add pineapple, squash and nuts. Fold in. Pour in large, greased tube pan. Bake at 300° for 55 minutes. Cool. Frost with Buttercream Frosting or your favorite frosting.

question: What can I make with butternut squash and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Bread
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. plus 2 Tbsp. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. ground cloves
1/2 c. melted margarine
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1/3 c. water (from cooking squash)
1 c. cooked squash
1/2 c. raisins or mixed fruit
Directions:
Sift together dry ingredients.
Beat shortening, eggs, water and squash. Combine with dry ingredients until dry mix is moist. Pour into greased and floured pan.
Bake at 350° for 55 to 60 minutes.

question: What can I make with butternut squash and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Butternut Casserole
Ingredients:
3 c. cooked, mashed butternut squash
2 Tbsp. oleo, melted
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/4 Tbsp. salt
1 Tbsp. oleo
6 c. chopped, apples (peeled)
1/4 c. sugar
1-1/2 c. corn flakes, crushed
1/2 c. chopped pecans
1/2 c. brown sugar
2 Tbsp. oleo, melted
Directions:
Combine first 4 ingredients.
Stir well.
Melt 1 tablespoon oleo in skillet.
Add apples and sugar.
Cover and cook 8 to 10 minutes and drain.
Stir apples into squash.
Spoon into a greased 2-quart casserole.
Combine remaining ingredients and sprinkle over squash.
Bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes.

question: What can I make with butternut squash and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash And Corn Casserole
Ingredients:
1 lb. butternut squash or pumpkin
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
2 Tbsp. butter
1 (17 oz.) cream-style corn
1 c. coarsely crushed Ritz crackers
1/2 c. shredded cheese
2 Tbsp. chopped pimento (optional)
1/4 c. chopped pecans (optional)
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
Directions:
Quarter squash.
Remove seeds.
In microwave-safe dish (1 1/2 quarts) place squash and 2 tablespoons water.
Cook on High 10 minutes or until tender, mash.
Microwave onion, green pepper and butter.
Stir in mashed squash, corn, crackers, cheese and optional pimento and nuts.
Cook 6 minutes.
Sprinkle with nutmeg. Serves 5 to 6.

question: How do I make stuffed zucchini boats?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Zucchini Boats(Yield:  6 Servings)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. small zucchini
3/4 c. grated Cheddar cheese, divided
1 1/2 c. fresh bread crumbs
1/4 c. minced onion
2 Tbsp. parsley
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 eggs, beaten
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Boil zucchini until tender; cut in half lengthwise.
Scoop out zucchini and reserve shells.
Add 1/2 cup cheese and next 6 ingredients.
Stuff shells with mixture.
Dot with butter and 1/4 cup cheese.
Bake, uncovered, for 30 minutes.

question: How do I make stuffed zucchini boats?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Zucchini Boats
Ingredients:
2 large zucchini
boiling water
1/4 c. margarine or butter
2 garlic cloves, minced
1 c. onion, chopped
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. carrots, grated
1/2 c. red bell pepper, chopped
4 c. dry bread, cubed
2 c. chicken broth
1 Tbsp. sweet basil, whole
1/2 tsp. whole marjoram
1 tsp. whole thyme
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
salt to taste
white pepper to taste
Directions:
Cut end off zucchini and cut lengthwise in half to make 8 boats.
Hollow out inside of zucchini in a canoe fashion, leaving 1/4-inch flesh on boat.
Heat water to boiling; salt lightly. Blanch boats in water for 3 to 4 minutes until flesh is tender. Lift out gently; drain upside down on paper towels.
Melt margarine in medium pan.
Saute garlic, onion, celery, carrots and red bell pepper until tender.
Mix sauteed vegetables, bread cubes, chicken broth, marjoram, sweet basil, thyme, salt, pepper and 1/4 cup of the Parmesan cheese.
Preheat oven to 350°.
Place zucchini boats in lightly oiled shallow baking pan.
Fill boats with stuffing mix.
Sprinkle tops with remaining 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese.
Bake 10 to 15 minutes or until cheese is browned.
Makes 8 servings.

question: How do I make stuffed zucchini boats?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Zucchini Boats
Ingredients:
2 medium zucchini
1/2 c. brown rice (uncooked)
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 small onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 red or green pepper, diced
1/2 c. mushrooms, chopped
1 tsp. Italian seasoning
dash of cayenne pepper
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/4 c. fresh parsley, chopped
2 tomatoes, chopped
10 pimento-stuffed green olives, sliced
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Cook the rice in 1 1/2 cups of water until done; set aside.
Wash the zucchini thoroughly, trim ends and slice in half lengthwise.
Scoop out the pulp, leaving a 1/4-inch shell.
Chop the zucchini pulp and reserve for later use. Saute onion and garlic in oil until softened.
Add the chopped zucchini, red or green pepper, mushrooms, herbs, spices and salt and cook until the zucchini is softened.
Remove from heat; add the tomatoes and rice and mix well.

question: How do I make stuffed zucchini boats?
answer:
Title: Italian Stuffed Zucchini Boats
Ingredients:
4 medium zucchini
1/4 lb. sausage
1/4 c. onion, chopped
1 egg, slightly beaten
dash garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. thyme
1/4 tsp. Accent
6 Tbsp. parmesan cheese
1/2 - 3/4 c. crushed crackers
Directions:
Boil zucchinis 7 to 10 minutes, drain and let cool.
Cut each zucchini in half, lengthwise and scrape out pulp.
Set zucchini aside and mash pulp and pour off liquid.
Fry sausage and onion and drain well.
Combine sausage with pulp mixture.
Add egg and remaining ingredients and mix well.
Fill zucchini halves with mixture.
Sprinkle extra parmesan cheese on top of zucchini boats and bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes.

question: How do I make stuffed zucchini boats?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Zucchini
Ingredients:
4 boats (2 zucchini cut in half longways)
1/2 c. raw rice
1 c. water
1 tsp. salt
3/4 c. grated cheese
1 egg, beaten
1/2 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. onion flakes
1 tsp. parsley
Directions:
Scoop out zucchini
pulp; cook with raw rice, water and salt for 15
minutes,
covered.
Take
off
heat.
Add
grated cheese, egg (beaten), oregano, onion flakes and parsley.
Pile into shells.
Bake
at 350° for 25 minutes.
Sprinkle top with a little grated cheese when taken out of oven.

question: What’s a good recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Shortcake
Ingredients:
4 egg whites
1 1/2 sticks softened butter
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1 c. milk
3 c. finely sifted flour
4 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 qt. strawberries
3 c. whipping cream (or more; use mountains of whipped cream!)
1/4 c. sugar
Directions:
Stiffly whip the cream.
Rinse and cap the strawberries; blot dry on paper towels.
Slice strawberries and sprinkle with sugar. (If strawberries are sweet, no sugar is required.)
Divide the strawberries and put between cake layers.
(Do not put strawberries on top or they may bleed into cream.)
Spread whipped cream over the cake.
Cut and serve.

question: What’s a good recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Shortcake
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 c. milk
1 c. sugar
1 egg
2 c. flour
2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. vanilla
pinch of salt
Directions:
Mix sugar and butter, then egg.
Add milk, alternating with flour, baking powder and salt mixture.
Add vanilla.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
Double recipe for 9 x 13-inch pan.

question: What’s a good recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Shortcake
Ingredients:
3 pt. box fresh strawberries
1/4 c. sugar or honey
2 tsp. orange juice
2 c. sifted flour
4 Tbsp. sugar
4 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. butter
1/4 c. solid shortening
1/2 c. sour cream
2 c. whipping cream
4 Tbsp. sugar
grated rind from 1 orange
Directions:
Combine sliced berries, sugar or honey and orange juice. Let stand
at room temperature for 1 hour.
Sift all dry ingredients together
into
a
medium
bowl.
Add orange rind.
Add butter and
shortening
and work them into flour mixture thoroughly. Lightly
mix
in
sour
cream with fork to form a soft dough. Roll
dough
out
onto
lightly floured board, 3/4-inch thick. Cut
into
4-inches,
4
circles.
Place
on
ungreased baking sheet,
bake
at
400° about 20 minutes or until golden. While still
warm, use fork and split cakes in half, place each on dessert
plate,
top with drained berries and second half of cake. Top
with
additional berries.
Pour juice on top, decorate with whipped cream and berries.

question: What’s a good recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Shortcake
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
3/4 tsp. salt
4 Tbsp. sugar
1 egg
1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Preheat oven.
Sift the flour.
Add the baking powder, salt and sugar.
Break in the egg; add the milk.
Blend and drop onto very lightly greased cookie sheet by tablespoon.
Bake for 10 to 12 minutes at 425° or for 25 minutes at 375°.

question: What’s a good recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Individual Strawberry Shortcakes
Ingredients:
3 c. sifted flour
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. butter or shortening
3/4 c. milk
2 qt. strawberries, crushed and sweetened
Directions:
Sift flour once.
Measure.
Add baking powder and salt and sift again.
Cut in shortening.
Add milk all at once and stir carefully until all flour is dampened.
Then stir vigorously until mixture forms a soft dough and follows spoon around bowl.
Drop 3/4 cup dough onto ungreased baking sheet*.
Brush with milk (or cream). Bake in hot oven (450°) for 15 to 20 minutes.
Serves 8.

question: How do I make a simple spinach and mushroom omelette?
answer:
Title: Spinach Omelette
Ingredients:
6 eggs
1/2 c. milk
1 small onion, diced
1/2 c. frozen spinach
4 Tbsp. butter
1/2 c. American cheese
salt and pepper to taste
Bac*Os
grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Beat eggs and milk together.
Add onion and spinach (finely chopped), butter and American cheese.
Pour into a buttered casserole and bake at 350° for 45 minutes.
Top with Bac*Os and grated Parmesan cheese.

question: How do I make a simple spinach and mushroom omelette?
answer:
Title: Mushroom And Cheese Omelette
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1/2 lb. mushrooms, cleaned, trimmed and sliced thin
1 clove garlic, minced or put through a press
1/4 tsp. thyme
1/4 tsp. crushed rosemary
1 Tbsp. dry white wine
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
4 eggs, beaten
1 tsp. milk
1/2 c. grated Gruyere or Parmesan cheese
fresh chopped parsley (for garnish)
Directions:
Heat half the butter in a frying pan and add mushrooms and garlic.
Cook over moderate heat 5 minutes or until mushrooms begin to soften.
Add thyme, rosemary and white wine and continue to saute another 5 minutes or until liquid evaporates.
