Season to taste with salt and freshly ground pepper.
Remove from heat and set aside.

question: How do I make a simple spinach and mushroom omelette?
answer:
Title: Fresh Spinach Omelet
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 small garlic clove, crushed
8 eggs
3/4 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1/4 c. chopped spinach
Directions:
In skillet over medium-low heat, cook garlic 1 minute in butter or margarine. In small bowl, beat eggs, salt, pepper and 2 tablespoons of water. Stir in spinach. Tilt skillet to grease sides. Pour egg mixture into skillet; cook until set around sides. With a spatula, lift edges, tilting skillet to allow uncooked portion to run under omelet. Shake skillet occasionally to
keep omelet moving in pan. Increase heat slightly to brown bottom of omelet. With spatula, fold omelet in half; slide onto warm platter. Serve immediately. Yield:
3 servings.

question: How do I make a simple spinach and mushroom omelette?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Omelet
Ingredients:
1 c. sliced mushrooms (about 1/4 lb.)
1/3 c. chopped onion
1/4 c. chopped green peppers
1 medium garlic clove, minced
6 tsp. butter or margarine
6 or 12 eggs
1 c. water
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can condensed tomato soup
1 large bay leaf
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Combine mushrooms, onion, green pepper and garlic in 2 teaspoons margarine in small saucepan and cook until tender.
In another saucepan, blend water, soup, bay leaf, cayenne pepper, salt and pepper to taste and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Remove bay leaf.
Keep sauce hot.

question: How do I make a simple spinach and mushroom omelette?
answer:
Title: Spinach Omelet
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped frozen spinach
4 slices bread
1/2 lb. sharp grated cheese
2 medium eggs
1 c. milk
1/4 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Cook and drain chopped spinach.
Put 2 slices of bread in bottom of buttered loaf pan.
Top with layer of spinach and cheese. Repeat, having cheese on top.
Beat eggs; add milk and seasoning and pour over top.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a lentil and vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Lentil Stew
Ingredients:
5 c. water
1 c. dried lentils, washed
1 Tbsp. salt
1/8 tsp. thyme
1/8 tsp. marjoram
1/4 c. olive oil
3 large, chopped onions
3 carrots, chopped fine
1/4 c. chopped parsley
2 tomatoes, cut up
1/4 c. dry sherry
Directions:
Bring water, lentils, salt, thyme and marjoram to a boil. Cover and simmer 15 minutes.
Saute onions and carrots in olive oil slowly, until soft.
Add to stock, along with chopped parsley, tomatoes and sherry.
Cover and simmer until lentils are tender. When ready to serve, put grated Swiss or Jack cheese in the bottom of each bowl and fill with hot stew.

question: What’s a good recipe for a lentil and vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Lentil Stew
Ingredients:
1 lb. lentils
3 medium potatoes, diced
1 red pepper, diced
2 c. V-8 juice
1 (15 oz.) can stewed tomatoes
1/4 tsp. thyme
1 tsp. paprika
1 tsp. salt
3 medium carrots, diced
2 bay leaves
1 small can tomato paste
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. garlic powder
salt to taste
Directions:
In a large 8-quart pot, cook lentils with 1 pint of water and salt.
Put all ingredients in pot.
Meanwhile, saute 2 large onions in 1 tablespoon olive oil and 3 tablespoons water.
Add to the pot when onions are soft.
Simmer for about 1 hour or until the vegetables are soft, not overcooked.
Stir occasionally.

question: What’s a good recipe for a lentil and vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Lentil Stew
Ingredients:
1 c. dry lentils
3 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can Italian style tomatoes, chopped
1 c. peeled and chopped potato
1/2 c. chopped carrot
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/2 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. snipped parsley
1 Tbsp. dried basil, crushed
1 clove garlic, minced
dash of pepper
Directions:
Rinse and drain lentils.
In a large saucepan, combine lentils, chicken broth, undrained tomatoes, potato, carrot, celery, onion, parsley, basil, garlic and pepper.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer for 45 to 50 minutes or until lentils and vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally. Low-fat, no cholesterol.

question: What’s a good recipe for a lentil and vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Lentil-Rice Stew
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. low calorie margarine
1 c. chopped celery
2 c. water
4 oz. brown rice, uncooked
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 c. chopped onions
2 (1 lb.) cans tomatoes, undrained and chopped
6 oz. lentils, uncooked
1/2 tsp. dried thyme
Directions:
Melt margarine in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add onions and celery and cook until tender, about 10 minutes. Add water, if necessary, to prevent drying.
Reduce heat to low. Add remaining ingredients.
Cover and cook 40 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add small amounts of water while cooking if more liquid is desired.
Yields 4 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a lentil and vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Lentil And Barley Stew
Ingredients:
2 to 4 Tbsp. olive oil
3/4 c. chopped celery
3/4 c. chopped onion
2 tsp. cumin seed
1 tsp. minced garlic
6 c. water
3/4 c. dry lentils
3 carrots, cut into coins
1 qt. canned tomatoes or spaghetti sauce
1/2 to 3/4 c. barley
2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. rosemary or basil (2 tsp. dry or 1/4 c. fresh)
Directions:
Saute in oil, celery, onion, cumin and garlic.
Add water and lentils; cook 20 minutes.
Add tomatoes, barley, salt, pepper and herbs.
Simmer 30 minutes.
Add carrots and simmer another 20 to 30 minutes.

question: I need a recipe for a simple tomato soup.
answer:
Title: Creamy Tomato Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. unsalted butter
1 medium onion, finely chopped
3 cloves garlic, minced
3 26 1/2 oz. boxes vacuum-packed crushed tomatoes or 10 cups canned crushed tomatoes
5 1/4 c. low-sodium chicken broth, skimmed of fat
3 sprigs fresh oregano, plus more for garnish
1/2 c. half and half
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
Directions:
Melt butter in a medium saucepan over medium-low heat.
Add onion and garlic, and cook, stirring, until translucent, about 6 minutes.
Add tomatoes, stock and oregano and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer gently until thickened, about 45 minutes. Remove oregano sprigs.
Slowly add half and half, stirring constantly.
Season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with oregano, if desired. Serve hot.

question: I need a recipe for a simple tomato soup.
answer:
Title: Super Simple Supper Soup
Ingredients:
10 to 14 c. chicken broth or bouillon
1 tsp. each: basil, marjoram, rosemary, oregano and Spice Islands fines herbes (no tarragon!)
1/2 c. dried, diced onions
1 can Green Giant Mexican style beans
1 can Italian stewed tomatoes
1 (16 oz.) bag frozen soup vegetables
1 to 2 c. elbow macaroni
Directions:
Bring all ingredients, except macaroni, to a boil.
Add macaroni and simmer until tender.
Serves lots.

question: I need a recipe for a simple tomato soup.
answer:
Title: Simple Salsa
Ingredients:
4 qts. tomatoes, drained
6 onions, chopped
4 bell peppers, chopped
6 hot peppers, chopped
4 Tbsp. sugar
5 Tbsp. salt
2 tsp. oregano
2 1/2 c. vinegar
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
Simmer all ingredients for 1 1/2-2 hours until thick.
Put into hot jars and seal with tops.

question: I need a recipe for a simple tomato soup.
answer:
Title: Old Fashion Tomato Soup(My Mother'S Recipe)
Ingredients:
1 large onion
small amount of oil and butter
1 heaping Tbsp. flour
1 pt. water
1 pt. tomatoes (home can if possible)
black pepper and salt to taste
1 tsp. sugar
1 c. milk
Directions:
Cook onion in oil and butter, but do not brown.
Stir in flour (do not brown); add water and tomatoes.
Add pepper and salt and sugar.
Cook slowly until thickened.
When soup is thick, add milk and heat until piping hot (do not boil).
Serve with crackers or cornbread.

question: I need a recipe for a simple tomato soup.
answer:
Title: Easy Tomato Soup(Yields 3 Servings)
Ingredients:
1 (12 oz.) can tomato juice
1/4 tsp. chopped parsley
1 tsp. grated onion
1 bay leaf
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Heat tomato juice. Add spices. Do not bring to a boil, but simmer gently. Serve with thin slice of lemon to garnish each serving.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick fruit tart?
answer:
Title: Fruit Tart
Ingredients:
1/2 c. confectioners sugar
3/4 c. butter
1 1/2 c. flour
8 oz. cream cheese
1 egg
1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
fruit for topping
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 1/2 c. pineapple juice (can use other juices or water to make 1 1/2 c.)
juice of 1/2 lemon
Directions:
Cut confectioners sugar, butter and flour with pastry blender. Press into 12 0r 14-inch pan and bake at 350° for 10 to 15 minutes.
Don't overcook.
Beat together softened cream cheese, egg, sugar and vanilla.
Spread on the cooked crust and bake until set (10 to 15 minutes).
Allow to cool some.
Arrange fruit on top in concentric circles.
Don't use bananas.
Good ones are fresh kiwi, grapes and strawberries; and also canned pineapple, mandarin oranges and peaches, but any fruit is okay, except bananas. Combine cornstarch, sugar and juices.
Cook and stir until thickened.
Cool and spread over fruit.
Refrigerate.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick fruit tart?
answer:
Title: Cool Fruit Tart
Ingredients:
2 c. Bisquick
1/3 c. sugar
1/3 c. margarine
1 egg
1 (3 oz.) cream cheese
1/3 c. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
3/4 c. chilled whipping cream
sliced fruit (strawberries and kiwi work well)
1/4 c. apple jelly, melted
Directions:
Mix Bisquick and 1/3 cup sugar.
Cut in margarine until crumbly.
Mix in egg until soft dough forms.
Spray fruit tart pan with Pam.
Work dough toward edges.
Prick with fork.
Bake 10 to 12 minutes at 375° until brown.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick fruit tart?
answer:
Title: Fruit Tart
Ingredients:
1/3 c. whole wheat flour
1/3 c. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. sugar
3 Tbsp. margarine
2 Tbsp. ice water
2 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. cornstarch
1/2 c. orange juice
1 kiwi fruit, peeled and sliced
3/4 c. banana, thinly sliced
1 c. strawberries, thinly sliced
Directions:
Crust:
Combine flours and 1 tablespoon sugar; cut in margarine until dough resembles coarse crumbs.
Sprinkle with ice water and toss until crumbly; form into a ball.
Put ball of dough between two pieces of wax paper and roll into a 10-inch circle.
Remove top sheet of wax paper and invert onto an ungreased baking sheet. Remove remaining wax paper and crimp pastry edges.
Prick all over with a fork.
Bake at 400° for 12 to 15 minutes (should be lightly browned).
Cool.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick fruit tart?
answer:
Title: Cranberry Fruit Tarts
Ingredients:
1 can whole cranberries
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
2 c. self-rising flour
1/4 c. shortening
2/3 c. milk
Directions:
Thicken cranberries with cornstarch.
Combine flour, shortening and milk.
Roll out on floured surface.
Cut with 4-inch cutter. Spoon 1 teaspoon of cranberries on each one.
Go around each with milk to seal edges.
Cover and seal with a fork to crimp.
Lightly grease sheet to bake.
Bake at 375° 15 to 20 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick fruit tart?
answer:
Title: Fruit Tart
Ingredients:
1/3 c. whole-wheat flour
1/3 c. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. sugar
3 Tbsp. margarine
2 Tbsp. ice water
2 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. cornstarch
1/2 c. orange juice
1 kiwi fruit, peeled and sliced
3/4 c. banana, thinly sliced
1 c. strawberries, thinly sliced
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.

question: How do I make lemon garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Lemon Garlic Sauce
Ingredients:
1 lb. large shrimp
2 egg yolks
1 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. fresh parsley, finely chopped
2 to 3 cloves garlic, crushed
2 tsp. chives, chopped (optional)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper or 1/2 tsp. red pepper flakes
1/2 c. butter or margarine, melted
1 c. vegetable oil
1 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Clean, peel and devein shrimp and set aside.
Position knife blade in food processor bowl; add next 8 ingredients to bowl and top with cover.
Process for 30 seconds or until well mixed.
With processor running, add butter through food chute; process 1 minute or until sauce is thickened.
Set aside.
Heat oil in large skillet to 375°.
Combine flour, salt and pepper.
Drain shrimp and dredge in flour mixture.
Fry shrimp in hot oil until golden brown.
Turn once; drain.
Arrange shrimp in 4 or 5 individual baking dishes and top with sauce.
Broil shrimp 30 to 45 seconds. Makes 4 to 5 servings.

question: How do I make lemon garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Butterflied Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter
2 lb. medium shrimp, peeled, deveined and butterflied
3 garlic cloves, smashed and chopped
1 1/2 green peppers, cut into thin strips
salt and pepper
1 large lemon, peeled and diced
1 Tbsp. parsley, chopped
1/4 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Heat butter in large frying pan.
Add shrimp and cook 2 minutes on each side over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and season well. Continue cooking for 1 minute.
Stir in green peppers and diced lemon.
Cook 1 more minute.
Add parsley, paprika, salt and pepper. Mix and serve.

question: How do I make lemon garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
3 cloves fresh garlic, crushed
8 oz. whole mushrooms, stems removed
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
12 oz. fresh shrimp, shelled and deveined
1 c. white wine
2 Tbsp. cornstarch, mixed with just enough water to dissolve
Directions:
Melt butter in large skillet.
Add crushed garlic and whole mushrooms.
Gently mix in lemon juice and shrimp.
(Add more butter, if needed, at this time.)
Saute 1 minute on each side, or until pink.
Add wine; increase heat and bring to a boil.
Remove from heat and add cornstarch mixture.
Return to flame until sauce is thickened.
Serve over rice.

question: How do I make lemon garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Bake
Ingredients:
1 pkg. frozen shrimp
lemon pepper to taste
garlic salt to taste
1/2 stick melted butter
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in baking dish. Cover and let cook in oven until piping hot.

question: How do I make lemon garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp With Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
2 lb. jumbo shrimp
3 cloves garlic, minced
3/4 c. olive oil (approximately)
juice of 1/2 lemon
lemon wedges
1 Tbsp. minced parsley
Directions:
Slit each shrimp down the back without removing the shell. Flatten and place cut side up in a shallow broiler pan.
Sprinkle with the garlic and olive oil and put under a preheated broiler. Broil 3 minutes, then turn the shrimp.
Broil an additional 4 minutes, or until the flesh is opaque and the shrimp are cooked through.
Transfer to a warmed platter.
Pour the cooking liquid over the shrimp and sprinkle with the parsley and lemon juice. Garnish with lemon wedges.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for a peanut butter smoothie?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Smoothie
Ingredients:
2 c. milk
1/3 c. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
2 Tbsp. peanut butter
1/2 c. crushed ice
Directions:
In a blender, add milk, sugar, peanut butter and vanilla. Blend on high speed.
Add ice until the smoothie gets thick.
Make sure all ice is chopped up.

question: What’s a recipe for a peanut butter smoothie?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter And Jelly Smoothie
Ingredients:
2 c. milk
2 Tbsp. blackberry jelly
2 Tbsp. peanut butter
1 banana, frozen and chunked
2 Tbsp. honey
2 tsp. wheat germ
Directions:
In a blender combine milk, jelly, peanut butter, banana, honey and wheat germ. Blend until smooth.

question: What’s a recipe for a peanut butter smoothie?
answer:
Title: Smoothie
Ingredients:
1 (1 lb.) white chocolate
1 (1 lb.) butterscotch
1 c. peanut butter
Directions:
Melt white chocolate and butterscotch in top of double boiler. Stir in peanut butter.
Put in little papers and cool.

question: What’s a recipe for a peanut butter smoothie?
answer:
Title: Smoothies
Ingredients:
1 pound white summer coating chocolate
1 pound butterscotch summer coating
1 cup peanut butter (smooth or chunky)
Directions:
Melt white chocolate and butterscotch coating.
Add peanut butter.
Mix well.
Drop by teaspoons into small paper baking cups.

question: What’s a recipe for a peanut butter smoothie?
answer:
Title: Banana Smoothie
Ingredients:
2 c. milk
2 medium size ripe bananas, peeled and sliced
1/4 c. honey
1/2 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Peel a banana.
Stick peanuts in the sides and sprinkle with carob powder. Eat!

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken teriyaki stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Glazed Teriyaki Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
4 boneless skinless chicken breast halves, cut into strips,
3 tablespoons vegetable oil, divided
4 medium carrots, julienne
1 medium sweet onion, julienne
1/2 cup soy sauce
1/4 cup packed brown sugar
Hot cooked rice
Sesame seed, toasted, optional
Sliced green onions, optional
Directions:
In a large skillet, stir-fry chicken in 2 tablespoons oil for 6-8 minutes or until juices run clear. Remove chicken and set aside. In the same skillet, stir-fry carrots in remaining oil for 2 minutes. Add onion, stir-fry about 2-4 minutes longer or until vegetables are tender.
Combine soy sauce and brown sugar, add to skillet. Bring to a boil. Return chicken to skillet. Boil for 5 minutes or until sauce
is slightly thickened. Serve over rice. Sprinkle with sesame seed and green onions if desired.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken teriyaki stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Teriyaki Chicken(Stir-Fry Chicken With Steamed Vegetables)
Ingredients:
2 lb. boneless chicken breasts, cut into small, bite size pieces (beef, veal, or pork can be substituted for chicken)
1 bag frozen stir-fry vegetables
1 medium red or green bell pepper
5 oz. jar mushrooms
8 oz. can sliced water chestnuts
1 large onion, chopped
1/4 c. low sodium soy sauce (plain or teriyaki)
1/4 c. red cooking wine
2-3 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
In large frying pan, cook chicken on high in olive oil, adding soy sauce during browning process to keep from sticking. Add wine and stir in onions, pepper, and garlic salt. Continue to add soy sauce as needed for liquid.
Cook on medium high for about 2 minutes.	Add mushrooms, water chestnuts, and bell pepper.
Cook on medium high for about 4 minutes.
Add frozen vegetables over top of chicken mixture. Allow vegetables to steam until desired tenderness; 1/4 cup water may be added before vegetables if there is not enough moisture to create steam.
Can be served over rice or with Chinese noodles.
Serves 4-6.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken teriyaki stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Teriyaki Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
3/4 lb. flank steak
1/4 c. reduced-sodium soy sauce
1/4 c. water
2 Tbsp. honey
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
4 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. vegetable oil
1 onion, chopped
2 c. broccoli, chopped
1 c. fresh mushrooms, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
1 tomato, chopped
Directions:
Trim fat from beef.
Cut into strips.
Combine next 5 ingredients in an 8-inch square pan.
Add steak to marinade; turn to coat.
Cover and marinate in refrigerator 30 minutes to 1 hour.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken teriyaki stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless chicken breasts, cubed
1 green pepper, sliced
1 onion, sliced
2 celery sticks, sliced
1 tsp. chopped garlic
1 bunch broccoli, sliced
4 c. cooked white rice
1 bottle Kikkoman teriyaki glaze
2 Tbsp. peanut oil
Directions:
Heat oil at a medium heat in a skillet.
Add garlic and chicken.
Cook until chicken is white.
Add vegetables and cook until desired tenderness of vegetables.
Serve stir-fry over 1 cup of steaming rice.
Heat teriyaki sauce in microwave.
Drizzle over the stir-fry.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken teriyaki stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Teriyaki Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (4 lb.) bag chicken party wings
4 to 6 cloves garlic, minced
1-inch fresh ginger, grated
4 Tbsp. sesame oil
1 1/4 c. sugar
1 c. soy sauce
Directions:
Boil chicken until done but do not overcook.
Drain; set aside.
In frying pan, add oil, garlic and ginger.
Saute 1 1/2 minutes.
Add chicken; continue to saute over low heat 2 to 3 minutes longer.
Add sugar and soy sauce.
Mix well.
Simmer 45 minutes to 1 hour or until thick.

question: How do I make a cheesy cauliflower gratin?
answer:
Title: Golden Cauliflower Au Gratin
Ingredients:
1/4 c. chopped yellow onions
6 Tbsp. unsalted butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 c. water
2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1 head cauliflower, chopped and blanched
3 well beaten eggs
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
1/2 c. buttered, toasted bread crumbs
Directions:
Saute onions in 4 tablespoons butter until soft.
Add flour and water to make white sauce.
Blend in cauliflower and cheese.
Add eggs and mix until blended.
Put into greased 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Cover with breadcrumbs, parsley and 2 tablespoons butter and bake at 350° for 30 minutes.

question: How do I make a cheesy cauliflower gratin?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Au Gratin
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 to 2 garlic cloves, minced
4 oz. cooked ham, chopped
1 head cauliflower, broken into florets
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 c. whipping cream
1/4 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
pinch of cayenne pepper
1 1/2 c. (4 to 6 oz.) shredded Swiss cheese
2 to 3 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
Melt butter in a large skillet. Saute garlic and ham for 2 minutes. Add cauliflower and cook just until crisp-tender. Combine flour and cream; stir into skillet and blend well. Add salt, pepper and cayenne pepper. Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly; cook and stir 1 minute more. Pour into a 2-quart baking dish. Sprinkle with cheese.
Place under a preheated broiler until lightly browned, about 2 to 4 minutes. Sprinkle with parsley. Serve immediately. Yield: 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make a cheesy cauliflower gratin?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Au Gratin
Ingredients:
1 large cauliflower
5 oz. butter
5 oz. flour
about 3/4 pt. water
7 eggs
1/4 to 1/2 pt. milk
salt
white pepper
grated nutmeg
2 tsp. corn flour
Directions:
Divide the cauliflower into sprigs.
Soak in salt water for a while and rinse well.
Boil up in slightly salted water.
Make a white sauce with the butter, flour and milk, adding enough cauliflower water to make a soft, smooth dough.
Allow to cool slightly and beat in the egg yolks one by one.
Finally, fold in the stiffly beaten egg whites to which the corn flour has been added.
Season to taste and line the bottom of a ovenproof dish with the gratin mixture.
Add the cauliflower and pour over the remainder of the gratin mixture.
Bake at 350° for about 1 hour testing with a knitting needle.
Serve with cold or melted butter.

question: How do I make a cheesy cauliflower gratin?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Au Gratin
Ingredients:
1 head cauliflower (cut into florets)
1 tsp. salt, divided
1/4 c. butter or margarine, melted
24 saltines, crushed
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. green pepper, diced
1 (14 1/2-oz.) can diced tomatoes
1 medium onion, chopped
1 1/2 c. (6-oz.) shredded sharp cheddar cheese
Directions:
Cook cauliflower in boiling water to cover with 1/2 teaspoon salt for 5 minutes, drain. In a large bowl, stir together 1/2 teaspoon salt, butter, crackers, sugar and pepper, mix well. Stir in cauliflower, bell pepper, tomatoes, onion and 1 1/4 cups cheese. Spoon into a lightly greased 2-quart baking dish. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour. Serve immediately.

question: How do I make a cheesy cauliflower gratin?
answer:
Title: Creole Cauliflower Au Gratin
Ingredients:
4 Tbsp. butter
1 onion, chopped
1/2 green pepper, chopped
2 Tbsp. flour
2 c. mashed cooked tomatoes (canned tomatoes can be used)
salt and pepper to taste
3 c. cooked chopped cauliflower (frozen cauliflower can be used)
1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Melt butter in a saucepan; add onion and green pepper and brown lightly.
Blend in flour and add tomatoes and salt and pepper.
Heat to boiling point and cook 3 minutes, stirring constantly.
Add cauliflower and heat thoroughly.
Place mixture in a casserole and cover with shredded cheese.
Bake at 350° until cheese has melted and mixture is hot and bubbly.
Makes 6 servings.

question: I need a recipe for a chicken Caesar wrap.
answer:
Title: Chicken Caesar
Ingredients:
3/4 c. olive oil
1/4 c. lemon juice
1/4 c. finely grated Parmesan cheese
1 can anchovies, drained and chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
2 tsp. Dijon mustard
1/2 tsp. black pepper
salt
4 boneless, skinless chicken halves
1/2 lb. green beans, drained and cooled
6 to 8 small potatoes, cooked and cooled, cut into quarters
3/4 c. cooked or thawed frozen corn
1 medium carrot, cut in halves
2 green peppers, sliced
finely chopped parsley
basil
Directions:
To make Caesar Dressing, place first 7 ingredients in food processor, processing until smooth and creamy.
Add salt to taste.

question: I need a recipe for a chicken Caesar wrap.
answer:
Title: Chicken Caesar Salad
Ingredients:
1 large head romaine lettuce (about 1 lb.)
1 (2 1/2 lb.) refrigerated roasted whole chicken
1 pt. cherry tomatoes
1 c. pitted ripe olives
1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. coarsely ground black pepper
1/2 (2 oz.) can anchovies, drained
3 Tbsp. extra virgin olive oil or olive oil
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
1 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
3/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
About 25 minutes before serving:
Wash lettuce and drain well; cut into 2-inch pieces.
Remove chicken from bones; discard skin. With fingers, tear meat into shreds.
Cut each cherry tomato and olive in half.
In a large bowl, combine lettuce, chicken, cherry tomatoes, olives, Parmesan cheese and black pepper.

question: I need a recipe for a chicken Caesar wrap.
answer:
Title: Chicken Caesar Salad
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless chicken breast halves
2 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
1 tsp. Dijon mustard
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 1/2 tsp. lemon pepper
1 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 c. olive oil
1 (1 lb.) head romaine lettuce, torn into bite sized pieces (about 8 c.)
1 c. garlic croutons
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Microwave or grill chicken.
When meat is cool enough to handle, cut into 1/4-inch crosswise strips and set aside.
Combine vinegar, mustard, Worcestershire, lemon pepper and garlic powder. Gradually whisk olive oil into dressing.

question: I need a recipe for a chicken Caesar wrap.
answer:
Title: Chicken Caesar Salad
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
1 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut in strips
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 1/2 tsp. lemon and pepper seasoning
2 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
1 tsp. Dijon mustard
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 head romaine lettuce, torn into bite size pieces
1 c. garlic croutons
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Heat oil in nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.
Toss chicken with lemon and pepper seasoning and garlic powder to evenly coat.
Add to skillet and cook 4 to 5 minutes or until thoroughly cooked, stirring frequently. Remove from heat. Do not drain off fat.
In a small bowl, combine vinegar, mustard and Worcestershire sauce with a whisk.
Stir into chicken mixture.
In a large bowl, toss lettuce with chicken mixture, croutons and cheese. Top with fresh grated Parmesan cheese, if desired.
Makes 4 servings.

question: I need a recipe for a chicken Caesar wrap.
answer:
Title: Guaranteed World Class Caesar Salad Recipe
Ingredients:
2 to 3 cloves garlic (1/2 thumb size)
3 anchovy filets (preferably Spanish)
1 coddled egg (large)
1/2 lemon
1/4 c. extra-virgin olive oil (preferably Greek)
1/2 tsp. balsamic vinegar (Italian, older the better)
2 to 3 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese (preferably Italian)
1 large head romaine lettuce, washed, torn and dry
1/2 c. croutons
Directions:
A large wooden bowl (unfinished) works best for making a Caesar Salad.
In the bowl, mash the peeled garlic cloves with a fork.
Add the anchovies and continue to mash together into a fine paste.
Using the back of a wooden salad spoon, mash the garlic and anchovies into the sides and bottom of the bowl.
Break the coddled egg into the bowl and blend lightly.
Add the lemon juice and balsamic vinegar and mix thoroughly with the previously mashed garlic, anchovies and egg.
Then add the olive oil and blend.
Mix in the Parmesan cheese last.
When ready to serve, add the lettuce and toss until the leaves are coated with the dressing.
Add the croutons last and toss lightly to mix.
Serve immediately on cold plates with a sprinkle of Parmesan cheese and cracked black pepper (preferably Indian telecherry pepper).

question: I want a recipe for a homemade granola mix.
answer:
Title: Homemade Granola
Ingredients:
2 c. old fashioned oats
1 1/2 c. chopped almonds
1 c. shredded coconut
1/2 c. toasted wheat germ
1 tsp. salt
1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1 1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Preheat
oven
to
300°.
In a large bowl combine oats, almonds, coconut,
wheat
germ and salt.
Stir in milk and oil and mix
thoroughly.
Spread
on
a
wax-paper
lined shallow baking pan and bake, stirring occasionally for 1 hour or until golden. Stir
in
raisins.	Let
cool
and	store in airtight containers. Makes 7 1/2 cups.
(And it's delicious too!)

question: I want a recipe for a homemade granola mix.
answer:
Title: Easy Granola Mix
Ingredients:
5 c. quick-cooking rolled oats
1 1/2 c. wheat germs
1 c. shredded coconut
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 c. maple syrup
1/2 butter, melted
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. raisins and/or chopped walnuts
Directions:
Mix oats, wheat germ, coconut, brown sugar and cinnamon in a large bowl. Add maple syrup and mix well. Stir together melted butter and vanilla and mix in the mixture. Turn into a large shallow pan. Bake at 325° for 15 to 20 minutes, stirring after 10 minutes. Cool. Add raisins and/or nuts. Store in airtight container.

question: I want a recipe for a homemade granola mix.
answer:
Title: Granola(Kids Recipe)
Ingredients:
4 c. old-fashioned oatmeal, uncooked
1 1/2 c. wheat germ (raw or toasted)
1 c. coconut, grated
1/4 c. nonfat dry milk
2 Tbsp. cinnamon
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/3 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. honey
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1/2 c. sesame seed
1/2 c. slivered almonds
1 c. raisins
Directions:
In a large bowl, mix dry ingredients.
Combine oil, honey and vanilla in a saucepan and warm.
Add these to the dry ingredients and stir until all the particles are coated.
(Hand mixing works well here).
Spread this mixture in a long, low pan or rimmed baking sheet that has been sprayed with vegetable shortening. Bake at 250° for an hour, turning with spatula every 15 minutes. When finished toasting, add raisins and toss.
Cool and store in an airtight container.

question: I want a recipe for a homemade granola mix.
answer:
Title: Homemade Granola
Ingredients:
4 c. uncooked oatmeal (quick type)
1 c. chopped peanuts (no skins)
1/2 c. Grape-Nuts
1/2 c. bran (unprocessed, uncooked)
sugar substitute to equal 1/4 c. sugar
1/3 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. wheat germ
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Spread the oatmeal on a cookie sheet and heat in a 350° oven for 10 minutes.
Combine all but the last two ingredients.
Bake on an ungreased cookie sheet or pan for 20 minutes, stirring once to brown evenly.
Allow mixture to cook in the oven.
Add wheat germ and raisins.
Refrigerate in glass jars or plastic containers.
(Granulated sugar substitute was more acceptable than liquid sugar substitute in this product.)

question: I want a recipe for a homemade granola mix.
answer:
Title: Granola
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. oats
1 c. fresh coconut
1/4 c. pumpkin seeds
1 c. sunflower seeds
1 c. pecans
1 c. walnuts
1 c. almonds
1/2 c. sweet rice syrup
1/2 c. ice water
1/4 c. olive oil
1/2 c. raisins
1/2 c. chopped dates
Directions:
Mix first 4 ingredients.
Add sweet rice syrup, ice water and olive oil and mix.
Spread in deep, oblong baking dish, sprayed with Pam.
Bake at 225° for 1 1/2 hours.
Add pecans, walnuts and almonds.
Mix and continue to bake 1/2 hour longer.
Add raisins and chopped dates.
Mix and cool.
Store in Ziploc bags.

question: How do I make crispy fried onion rings?
answer:
Title: Crispy Onion Rings
Ingredients:
6 large onions
2 c. milk
1 egg, beaten
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 c. flour
1/2 c. corn meal
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Slice onions and separate into rings.
Soak rings in milk for 30 minutes.
Drain.
Combine milk, egg and oil; mix well.
Stir in dry ingredients.
Dip rings in batter and fry in hot (365°) deep oil until golden.

question: How do I make crispy fried onion rings?
answer:
Title: Crispy Onion Rings
Ingredients:
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. corn meal
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking powder
2 eggs, beaten
1/2 c. milk
1 lb. large onions, sliced and separated into rings
Directions:
Sift flour, meal and baking powder. Add oil, eggs and milk. Mix thoroughly. Dip onion rings into batter. Fry in vegetable oil for 2 to 3 minutes each side, until golden brown. Drain on paper towel.

question: How do I make crispy fried onion rings?
answer:
Title: Crispy Texas Onion Rings
Ingredients:
6 large onions
2 c. milk
1 egg, beaten
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 c. flour
1/2 c. cornmeal
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
oil (for deep frying)
Directions:
Slice onions and separate into rings.
Soak rings in milk for 30 minutes.
Drain.
Combine milk, egg and oil.
Mix well.
Stir in dry ingredients.
Dip rings into batter and fry in hot deep oil until golden brown.

question: How do I make crispy fried onion rings?
answer:
Title: Fried Onion Rings
Ingredients:
3/4 c. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. milk
2 Tbsp. oil
1 egg
2 large onions
oil for frying
Directions:
Sift flour and salt into bowl.
Add milk, oil and egg.
Beat until smooth.
Cut onions into 1/4-inch slices and separate into rings.
Dip each ring into batter.
Drain excess batter into bowl. Drop into 1 inch of oil heated to 375°.
Fry 2 to 3 minutes, turning occasionally.
Drain on paper.
Leftovers may be cooled, wrapped and frozen.
Reheat in 350° oven for 5 minutes.

question: How do I make crispy fried onion rings?
answer:
Title: Fabulous Fried Onion Rings
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
1 1/2 c. beer (not light)
3 large yellow onions
Directions:
Combine flour and beer thoroughly with whisk in large bowl. Cover bowl and let set at room temperature for at least 3 hours. Cut onions into slices and separate into rings.
Stir into batter, then fry in oil at 375°.
(An electric skillet works best.)
Turn once or twice until golden, then transfer them to a preheated 200° oven, layering on brown paper bags or paper towels on cookie sheet.
These stay crispy and crunchy for hours so you can make ahead and clean up the mess.
They freeze and reheat well, too, if you have any left!

question: How do I make oatmeal cookies with raisins?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Raisin Cookies
Ingredients:
3 eggs, well beaten
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. raisins
1 c. shortening
1 c. packed light brown sugar
1 c. sugar
2 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
2 c. rolled oats
1 c. coarsely chopped pecans (optional)
Directions:
In a large mixing bowl, stir together all ingredients.
Shape into 1-inch balls.
Place on ungreased baking sheets.
Flatten with fingers.
Bake at 350° for 10 to 11 minutes or until golden brown.
Do not overbake. Remove cookies from pan and cool on wire racks.
Makes about 3 1/2 dozen.

question: How do I make oatmeal cookies with raisins?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Raisin Cookies
Ingredients:
3 eggs, well beaten
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1 c. raisins
1 c. shortening
1 c. packed light brown sugar
1 c. sugar
2 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
2 c. rolled oats
1 c. chopped pecans
Directions:
In a large mixing bowl stir together all ingredients.
Shape into 1-inch balls.
Place on ungreased baking sheets.
Flatten with fingers.
Bake at 350° for 10 to 11 minutes or until golden brown.
Do not overbake.
Remove cookies to a wire rack to cool. Yields 3 1/2 dozen.

question: How do I make oatmeal cookies with raisins?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal-Raisin Cookies
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. flour
2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
2 sticks butter, softened
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 large egg
1 3/4 c. old fashioned rolled oats
1 c. raisins
1 Tbsp. grated orange or lemon rind
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
In medium bowl, mix together flour, baking powder and salt.
In a large bowl, using an electric mixer, beat butter and sugar until light and fluffy; beat in egg.
Reduce mixer to low speed and beat in flour mixture, oats and rind.
Stir in the raisins.
Drop by tablespoon onto greased cookie sheets two inches apart.
Bake for 10 minutes.
Cool on wire racks.

question: How do I make oatmeal cookies with raisins?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Raisin Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. (1/2 lb.) butter or margarine, softened
2 c. firmly packed brown sugar
2 eggs
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking soda
3 c. quick-cooking rolled oats
1 1/2 c. raisins
1 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
In large bowl of an electric mixer, beat butter and sugar until creamy, then beat in eggs and lemon juice.
In another bowl, stir together flour, salt and baking soda; gradually add to butter mixture, blending thoroughly.
Add oats, raisins and walnuts and stir until well combined.

question: How do I make oatmeal cookies with raisins?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Raisin Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. oats
3/4 c. flour
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/4 c. sugar
1/2 c. raisins
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. butter
1 egg
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°.
Blend butter and sugars.
Mix well. Add flour, oats, baking soda and salt in separate bowl.
Add vanilla and egg to butter and sugar.
Blend, gradually adding dry mixture.
Blend well.
Add raisins.
Drop onto ungreased baking sheet by the teaspoon.
Bake 12 minutes.
Let cool before removing.

question: What can I cook with lentils and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Lentil And Tomato Bake
Ingredients:
2 large carrots
6 large tomatoes
1 c. split lentils
1 small onion
1 bay leaf
2 cloves
1/2 tsp. sea salt
1/4 c. margarine
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Grate carrots and chop tomatoes; set aside.
Wash lentils, removing any small stones.
In large saucepan, combine with 2 cups of water.
Wrap bay leaf around onion and push cloves through leaf into onion.
Add to pan with carrots and tomatoes.
Bring to a boil, stirring.
Lower heat and cover; simmer about 20 minutes. Remove onion; add salt, margarine and parsley.
Stir well.
Spoon into large ovenproof dish.
Dot top with margarine and bake in 375° oven for about 30 minutes.

question: What can I cook with lentils and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
2 onions, chopped
1 potato, cubed
1 c. mushrooms, sliced
3 cloves garlic, chopped
1 carrot, grated
2 c. celery, sliced
1 (16 oz.) can crushed tomatoes
2 c. beef broth
1 c. water
1/2 c. dry red wine
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. marjoram
1 tsp. oregano
2 bay leaves
1 1/2 c. lentils, washed and drained
Directions:
Spray a heavy, 4-quart skillet with nonstick vegetable spray. Brown lightly onions, potato, mushrooms, garlic, carrot and celery.
Add remaining ingredients.
Simmer, partially covered, until lentils are soft (approximately 1 1/2 hours).
Add more water, if needed, during cooking.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What can I cook with lentils and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Tomato Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
1 1/3 c. dried lentils
2 qt. water
1 c. chopped onion
2 c. chopped carrots
1 c. sliced celery
1/8 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. dill weed
6 oz. can tomato paste
Directions:
Place lentils, water, onion, carrots and celery in large pot. Bring to boil.
Reduce heat.
Simmer gently 2 hours.
(Add water if level gets too low.)
Add spices and stir.
Simmer another hour.
Stir in tomato paste.
Mix well.
Simmer 5 to 10 minutes. Serve.

question: What can I cook with lentils and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Lentil-Tomato Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. dried lentils (about 2 1/4 c.)
8 c. water
1 large onion, chopped
6 carrots, chopped
3 stalks celery, chopped
1 large can tomatoes (1 lb. 12 oz. can)
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 bay leaves (optional)
1 tsp. sweet basil (optional)
1 tsp. thyme (optional)
Directions:
Put all ingredients (except the tomatoes) into a large pot and simmer 3 hours.
Add more water if needed.
Stir in the tomatoes at the end.
Serves 11 cups.

question: What can I cook with lentils and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, chopped
2 medium celery ribs, thinly sliced
3 medium carrots, sliced in thin rounds
2 cloves garlic, crushed
2 tsp. thyme
1 bay leaf
1/2 c. dry red wine
1 (16 oz.) can Italian plum tomatoes, with juice
1 c. picked over lentils, rinsed
6 c. low-sodium chicken broth
1/2 lb. ham, diced in 1/2-inch pieces
salt and pepper
Directions:
In a medium, non-reactive casserole, heat the oil over moderate heat.
Add the onion, celery, carrots, garlic, thyme and bay leaf. Cover and cook until the onion is translucent, about 5 minutes. Add the wine and bring to a boil over high heat.
Add the tomatoes with their juice, breaking them up with the back of a spoon.
Add the lentils and chicken broth and return to a boil.
Reduce the heat to moderately low; cover partially and simmer, stirring occasionally, until the lentils are tender, about 35 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper and serve hot.

question: How do I make slow-cooker chicken and dumplings?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Dumplings
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. shortening
1/2 c. water
1 medium size hen or 1 large frying chicken, disjointed
3 c. self-rising flour
desired amount salt and black pepper
Directions:
Place chicken, salt and black pepper in a large pot.
Boil over medium heat until tender.
Remove chicken from stock. Combine flour, shortening and water in a mixing pan.
Mix well to form soft dough.
Roll out paper thin.
Cut in small strips.
Drop in boiling broth.
Stir lightly.
Cook dumplings for 10 to 15 minutes or until tender.
Remove from heat and add chicken.
Serve hot.

question: How do I make slow-cooker chicken and dumplings?
answer:
Title: Chicken Dumplings
Ingredients:
1 whole chicken
3 boiled eggs
2 big cans biscuits
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
8 c. water
Directions:
First put in pressure cooker for 35 minutes; then let pressure cooker cool.
Take off lid, put on stove and let it come to a boil; then add 3 boiled eggs in it, 2 big cans biscuits or make own dough.
Let it cook 10 minutes, until done.
Add 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/2 teaspoon pepper.

question: How do I make slow-cooker chicken and dumplings?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Dumplings
Ingredients:
1 whole chicken
3 Tbsp. shortening
1 1/2 c. flour
3/4 c. milk
Directions:
Boil chicken until cooked through.
Take chicken out of pan; set aside broth.
Debone chicken and place meat back into broth. Heat broth and chicken to boiling.
While broth is heating, cut shortening into flour until mixture resembles fine crumbs.
Stir in milk.
After broth starts boiling, drop dough by spoonfuls onto chicken.
Cook uncovered 10 minutes.
Cover and cook about 10 minutes longer.
Makes 8 to 10 dumplings.

question: How do I make slow-cooker chicken and dumplings?
answer:
Title: Slow Cooker Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (6 oz.) pkg. Stove Top dressing
1 1/4 c. water
1/4 c. white wine
12 carrots, cut into 2-inch pieces
4 to 5 lb. roasting chicken
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Prepare dressing as directed.
Set aside to cool.
Stir in wine.
Blanch carrots 5 minutes in boiling water.
Drain and put in crock-pot.
Stuff chicken with dressing and place in pot over carrots.
Cover pot and set on low for 6 to 8 hours.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: How do I make slow-cooker chicken and dumplings?
answer:
Title: Chicken 'N Dumplings
Ingredients:
1 whole fryer
2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
2 Tbsp. shortening
2 eggs
sweet milk
Directions:
Boil fryer until tender. Remove from broth and set aside to cool. Mix dry ingredients.
Cut in shortening.
Add beaten eggs and enough milk to make a stiff dough. Roll out really thin on heavily floured board.
Cut into pieces (pizza cutter works great!).
Drop into rapidly boiling broth.
Cover and simmer on very low heat for 5 to 10 minutes. Remove skin and bones from chicken and pull into bite size pieces.
Add chicken to pot and season to taste with black pepper.
I pour about a cup of sweet milk in pot just as it's finished cooking.

question: What’s a good recipe for a moist carrot cake?
answer:
Title: Moist Carrot Cake
Ingredients:
3 eggs, beaten
3/4 c. vegetable oil
3/4 c. skim milk
2 c. sugar
2 tsp. vanilla
2 c. flour
2 tsp. cinnamon
2 tsp. baking soda
1 (8 oz.) crushed pineapple, undrained
2 c. grated carrots
1 c. chopped nuts
1 c. flaked coconut
Directions:
Combine eggs, oil, milk, sugar and vanilla; mix well.
Combine flour, cinnamon, baking soda and salt; stir into egg mixture. Stir in pineapple, carrots, nuts and coconut.
Pour into greased and floured 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan.
Bake at 350° for 50 to 55 minutes or until cake tests done.
Do not overbake.

question: What’s a good recipe for a moist carrot cake?
answer:
Title: Moist Carrot Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
1 c. oil
3 c. flour
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. salt
2 tsp. baking soda
2 c. grated carrots
3 eggs
1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Sift flour, cinnamon, soda and salt together.
In a large bowl, beat eggs.
Add sugar and beat well. Add pineapple, carrots, oil and vanilla. Add dry ingredients and mix well.
Add nuts. Bake in greased and floured 10-inch tube pan at 350° approximately 1 hour or until done tested with a dry toothpick.

question: What’s a good recipe for a moist carrot cake?
answer:
Title: Moist Carrot Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. cooked carrots
3/4 c. oil
2 eggs
1 c. sugar
1 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 c. walnuts
Directions:
Bake at 350° until done (30 to 40 minutes).
Frost with cream cheese frosting.

question: What’s a good recipe for a moist carrot cake?
answer:
Title: Light Carrot Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. raisins
1/4 c. Port or sherry
1 1/4 c. oat bran, processed into flour
3/4 c. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. baking powder
2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 c. brown sugar
1/4 c. canola oil
1/4 c. evaporated skim milk
1/4 c. corn syrup
2 tsp. vanilla
1 c. egg substitute
2 c. grated fresh carrots
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Spray a 9-inch square baking pan with Pam or Baker's Joy.
In a small mixing bowl, soak raisins in Port and set aside.
In a mixing bowl, sift together oat bran, flour, baking powder and cinnamon.
Place in another bowl the brown sugar, oil, milk, corn syrup, vanilla and egg substitute; mix with an electric beater for a minute or two.
Add carrots to the liquid mixture, then stir in the flour mixture, then the raisins and Port.
Pour mixture into prepared baking pan; bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until a toothpick, when inserted in center of cake, comes out dry.
Let cool to room temperature, then cut into squares.

question: What’s a good recipe for a moist carrot cake?
answer:
Title: Moist Supper Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. Dr. Pepper, heated to boiling
1 c. quick cooking oats
1/2 c. shortening
1/2 c. granulated sugar
1 1/2 c. brown sugar, divided use
2 eggs
1 1/3 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/3 c. butter, melted
1/4 c. light cream
1 c. fine grated coconut
Directions:
Pour hot Dr. Pepper over oatmeal and let stand 15 to 20 minutes.
Heat oven to 375°.
With a mixer, cream shortening and gradually add in granulated sugar and 1 cup brown sugar.
Cream well; add eggs, beating until mixture is fluffy.

question: How can I make fluffy pancakes without eggs?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
4 tsp. baking powder
3 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1 egg, slightly beaten
1 tsp. vanilla
2 Tbsp. melted butter
1 3/4 c. milk
Directions:
Mix all dry ingredients.
In separate bowl, add vanilla to eggs and beat slightly.
Add to dry ingredients.
Add milk and mix.
Add melted butter and stir until smooth.
Cook on hot griddle at 400°.

question: How can I make fluffy pancakes without eggs?
answer:
Title: Best Fluffy Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
2 tsp. baking powder
2 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 c. milk
2 Tbsp. melted butter
2 eggs, separated
Directions:
Mix flour, baking powder, sugar and salt in a mixing bowl. Set aside.
Stir together milk, melted butter and egg yolks.
Whip egg whites.
Stir milk mixture into flour mixture and fold in egg whites.
Batter should hold its shape, but not be too stiff.
Bake on heated griddle.
Serve immediately with favorite topping.

question: How can I make fluffy pancakes without eggs?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
2 Tbsp. sugar
4 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
2 egg yolks
2 c. milk
2 Tbsp. melted butter
2 egg whites
Directions:
Measure flour.
Add sugar, baking powder and salt.
Stir well. Combine egg yolks, milk and butter.
Add to dry ingredients. Beat with beater until smooth.
Fold in beaten egg whites.
Pour 1/3 cup batter for each pancake on hot griddle.
Grease griddle lightly for first pancake only.
Makes 12 five-inch pancakes.

question: How can I make fluffy pancakes without eggs?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
4 tsp. baking powder
2 tsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. oil
1 egg
1 c. milk (approximately)
Directions:
Mix all the ingredients together, adding the milk last, while mixing to the desired texture.
Pour onto hot griddle.
Cook and enjoy!

question: How can I make fluffy pancakes without eggs?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
2 Tbsp. sugar
4 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
2 egg yolks
2 c. milk
2 Tbsp. melted butter
2 egg whites, stiffly beaten
Directions:
Add egg whites last.

question: How do I make a classic BLT sandwich?
answer:
Title: Blt Sandwiches
Ingredients:
3 strips fried bacon to 1 sandwich
Directions:
This sandwich is especially good on toasted whole wheat bread. If you prefer, it can be made on plain white bread, but it is not as eye-appealing.

question: How do I make a classic BLT sandwich?
answer:
Title: Blt Dip
Ingredients:
16 oz. sour cream
16 oz. mayonnaise
3 diced tomatoes
1 lb. bacon, cooked crisp and crumbled
1 loaf bread of your choice
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together and refrigerate for about 3 hours or until it is cold. Cut bread in triangles and toast well.

question: How do I make a classic BLT sandwich?
answer:
Title: Blt Egg Bake
Ingredients:
1/4 c. mayonnaise
5 slices bread, toasted
4 slices American cheese
12 bacon slices, cooked and crumbled
4 eggs
1 tomato, sliced
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 c. milk
1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
2 green onions, thinly sliced
shredded lettuce
Directions:
Spread mayonnaise on one side of each slice of toast and cut into small pieces. Arrange toast, mayonnaise side up, in a greased 8-inch square baking dish. Top with cheese slices and bacon. In a skillet, fry eggs over medium heat until completely set. Place over bacon. Top with tomato slices; set aside.

question: How do I make a classic BLT sandwich?
answer:
Title: Blt Pie
Ingredients:
8 slices bacon, fried crisp, crumbled and divided
1/3 c. shredded Monterey Jack cheese
1 c. chopped tomato
2/3 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 Pet-Ritz pie crust shell
1 egg
2/3 c. Pet evaporated milk
1 tomato, thinly sliced
1/3 c. shredded lettuce
Directions:
Preheat oven and baking sheet to 350°.
In a small bowl, combine half the bacon, cheese, chopped tomatoes, onion and parsley.
Spoon into pie crust.
Beat egg with evaporated milk. Slowly pour over bacon mixture.
Arrange sliced tomato on top of pie.
Bake on preheated baking sheet for 35 minutes (30 minutes for regular crust) or until pie crust has browned or until knife inserted in center comes out clean.
Let stand for 15 minutes; top with shredded lettuce and remaining bacon.
Serve.
Makes 8 servings (6 for regular crust).

question: How do I make a classic BLT sandwich?
answer:
Title: Blt Bites
Ingredients:
16 to 20 cherry tomatoes
1 lb. bacon, cooked and crumbled
1/2 c. mayo
1/3 c. chopped green onions
3 tbsp. grated parmesan cheese
2 tbsp. snipped fresh parsley
Directions:
With a small sharp knife, cut the top off of each tomato. Scoop out the pulp with a
small spoon and place each tomato cut side down, on paper towels to remove liquid.
Discard pulp.
In a small bowl, combine the remaining ingredients, mix well.
Spoon into tomatoes.
Refrigerate for several hours.

question: What can I make with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Spanish Rice With Turkey
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey
1 medium pepper, chopped
1 medium onion, chopped
2 cans tomatoes
1 c. water
4 oz. uncooked rice
3/4 tsp. oregano
salt
1/4 tsp. red pepper
1/8 tsp. garlic
Directions:
Cook turkey, onions and pepper until done, stirring constantly.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Bring to a boil. Cover. Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Serves 4.
Counts as 3 proteins, vegetable and 1 bread.

question: What can I make with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Ground Turkey Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey
2 bunches green onions
1 (4 oz.) can mushrooms
soy sauce
Chinese noodles
1 c. uncooked brown rice
1 c. uncooked long grain white rice
Directions:
One cup of uncooked kashi may be substituted for brown rice.

question: What can I make with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Spanish Rice
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef or turkey
1 c. finely chopped onion
1/4 c. chopped green pepper
1 (1 lb.) can tomatoes
1 1/2 c. water
3/4 c. uncooked rice
1/2 c. chili sauce
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1 tsp. brown sugar
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Brown meat.
Add onion and green pepper; cook until tender. Remove fat.
Add remaining ingredients.
Cover; simmer for 45 minutes.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: What can I make with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Turkey Wild Rice Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground turkey
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. finely chopped carrots
6 c. low salt chicken broth
1/2 c. uncooked wild rice
1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/2 tsp. dried thyme
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. flour
2 c. skim or regular milk
Directions:
Crumble ground turkey into 6-quart saucepan or Dutch oven. Stir in onion and carrots.
Cook over medium heat for 3 to 5 minutes.
Stir in chicken broth, rice, poultry seasoning, pepper and thyme.
Bring to boil and reduce heat.
Cover and simmer 45 to 55 minutes or until tender.
Place flour in a small bowl. Gradually add milk, blending until smooth.
Cook and stir over medium heat until soup bubbles and thickens slightly.

question: What can I make with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Turkey-Rice Bake
Ingredients:
1 can condensed cream of chicken soup
1 3/4 c. water
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 c. instant rice
6 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
2 c. cooked, diced turkey
1 small pkg. frozen chopped broccoli, cooked and drained
Directions:
Combine soup, 1/2 cup water, mayonnaise and lemon juice. Blend 1 cup soup mixture, remaining water, rice, 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese and salt in buttered 2-quart casserole. Top with turkey. Combine remaining soup mixture with broccoli.
Pour over turkey and sprinkle remaining Parmesan cheese over top. Cover and bake in a 350° preheated oven for 20 minutes.
Uncover and bake for 10 minutes longer.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I cook with beans and rice?
answer:
Title: Beans-N-Rice That Fill You Up
Ingredients:
2 tsp. olive oil
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped onion (set aside)
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
2 c. cooked brown rice
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/8 tsp. dried coriander
1/4 tsp. ground red pepper
1 (15 oz.) can black beans, rinsed and drained
chopped tomato (optional)
Directions:
In nonstick pan, heat oil; add 1 cup onion and 1/2 cup green pepper and cook until tender.
Add rice, cumin, red pepper and coriander.
Mix and heat 2 minutes.
Add beans; heat.
Add uncooked onion and tomato if desired.
Approximately 125 calories per 1/2 cup; less than 2 grams of fat.

question: What can I cook with beans and rice?
answer:
Title: Baked Beans
Ingredients:
4 cans pork and beans
brown sugar
mustard
bacon
Directions:
Cooking raw rice has long been a "thorn in the side" of many a good cook.
Try this "lazy rice" recipe for Steamed Rice.

question: What can I cook with beans and rice?
answer:
Title: Rice Surprise
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. rice, cooked
1 can Progresso black beans, drained
1 jar salsa or picante sauce
Directions:
May substitute bean of your choice.

question: What can I cook with beans and rice?
answer:
Title: Red Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
ben
rice
sos
sosech
worer
pot
Directions:
Put bens in hot worer and cut some sosech up.
Put some rice in a pot and put all the other stuf in and put some sos with it and add worer and cook it.

question: What can I cook with beans and rice?
answer:
Title: Red Beans And Rice(Southern Dish)
Ingredients:
1 lb. red beans
1 onion
1 garlic clove
1/4 tsp. thyme
2 qt. water
1 lb. ham or salt meat
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. red pepper
1 tsp. salt
2 c. cooked dry rice
Directions:
Wash beans and soak overnight or from 4 to 5 hours in cold water. Drain water. Place in a pot and cover with cold water. Heat slowly.
Add seasonings with meat, onion and chopped garlic. Boil at least 2 hours or until beans are tender.
Add rice.
Mix well and let steam 10 minutes.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: What can I make with shrimp and pasta?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Pasta
Ingredients:
1 lb. pasta
1 stick butter
2 1/2 Tbsp. fresh ginger
1 1/2 Tbsp. yellow mustard seeds
1/3 c. dry-roasted cashews (unsalted)
1 1/2 Tbsp. shredded coconut
1/3 c. chopped cilantro
shrimp
1/4 c. olive oil
1 1/2 Tbsp. fresh ginger
1/3 c. scallions, sliced
1 1/2 Tbsp. lime juice
salt and pepper
lime wedges and cilantro
Directions:
Grate ginger or cut into fine strips.
Heat a large frying pan and add butter, 2 1/2 tablespoons ginger, the mustard seeds and cashews.
Saut for 2 minutes.
Add precooked pasta (use a kind with ridges), coconut and cilantro.
Saut over medium heat until hot.
Set aside; keep warm.
Heat a large frying pan and add oil and 1 1/2 tablespoons ginger.
Saut 30 seconds.
Add shrimp (use large precooked ones), scallions and lime juice.
Saut until hot.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Serve over hot pasta and garnish with lime wedges and cilantro.

question: What can I make with shrimp and pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Shrimp And Vegetables
Ingredients:
olive or salad oil
1 lb. large shrimp, shelled and deveined
2 green onions, thinly sliced
1 1/2 tsp. grated fresh ginger root
1 garlic clove, minced
salt
2 medium-size carrots, thinly sliced
1 medium yellow pepper, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
2 c. small broccoli florets
3/4 (16 oz.) pkg. bow tie or rotella pasta
1/2 c. chicken broth
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
Directions:
About 40 minutes before serving:
In nonstick 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat, in 1 tablespoon hot olive or salad oil, cook shrimp, green onions, grated ginger, garlic and 1/4 teaspoon salt, stirring constantly until shrimp are opaque throughout, about 3 minutes.
With slotted spoon, remove shrimp mixture to bowl.
In dripping remaining in skillet and 1 teaspoon additional hot olive or salad oil, cook carrots, yellow pepper and 1/4 teaspoon salt, stirring frequently, until vegetables are golden and tender-crisp.

question: What can I make with shrimp and pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Shrimp And Wine
Ingredients:
12 oz. fresh or frozen shelled shrimp
1 c. onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 c. dry white wine
1 Tbsp. instant chicken bouillon granules
1 tsp. dried basil
1 clove garlic, crushed (if desired)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. black pepper
2 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped (1 c.)
10 oz. dry pasta, cooked (6 c.)
1/4 c. butter, melted
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. snipped fresh parsley
Directions:
Thaw shrimp if frozen.
In saucepan cook onion in 2 tablespoons butter and olive oil until tender, but not brown. Stir in wine, bouillon granules, basil, garlic (if used), salt and pepper.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and boil gently, uncovered, for 12 to 15 minutes or until liquid is reduced by 2/3.

question: What can I make with shrimp and pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta Salad With Shrimp
Ingredients:
1 lb. pkg. linguine
1/4 c. plus 1 Tbsp. olive oil, divided
1 Tbsp. margarine
1 lb. cleaned shrimp
1 garlic clove, minced
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
dash of cayenne pepper
1 red or green pepper, cut in 1-inch matchstick pieces
1 red onion, thinly sliced
12 small black olives, chopped
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh basil or 1 tsp. dried
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
3 tomatoes, cut in wedges
Directions:
Cook linguine according to package directions. Drain, rinse with cold water and drain again.

question: What can I make with shrimp and pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Shrimp
Ingredients:
1 lb. linguine
3/4 c. butter
1 medium green pepper, chopped
1 small onion, chopped
2 (12 oz.) pkg. frozen cocktail shrimp (not breaded), thaw and drain
1 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. pepper
grated cheese
Directions:
Cook spaghetti and set aside.
In heavy 3-quart saucepan melt butter.
Cook onions and peppers for a few minutes before adding the shrimp and remaining spices.
After cooked, toss over the spaghetti and sprinkle with grated cheese.

question: How do I make a dairy-free ice cream?
answer:
Title: Ice Cream(No Cooking)
Ingredients:
6 eggs
2 1/2 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. salt
4 cans evaporated milk
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a bowl and beat with a mixer until well
blended.
Stir
in
any flavoring that you want to choose, such as:
strawberries, bananas, chocolate, etc.
Pour into freezer.
This
does not have a canned milk taste.	Makes about 5 quarts, depending on how much fruit is added.

question: How do I make a dairy-free ice cream?
answer:
Title: Apple Cake - Dairy Free
Ingredients:
2 c. apples (Granny Smith)
3 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon
2 c. sugar
1 c. cooking oil
4 eggs
1/4 c. orange juice
2 tsp. vanilla extract
3 c. flour, sifted
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Peel, core and chop the apples into small pieces.
Mix together with 3 tablespoons sugar and the cinnamon.
Set aside.

question: How do I make a dairy-free ice cream?
answer:
Title: Dairy Queen Ice Cream
Ingredients:
2 envelopes Knox gelatine
1/2 c. cold water
4 c. whole milk
2 tsp. vanilla
2 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
3 c. whipping cream
Directions:
Soak the Knox gelatine in the cold water.
Heat the whole milk until hot, but not boiling.
Remove from heat.
Add the gelatine, vanilla, sugar and salt.
Cool.
Add the whipping cream.
Put in refrigerator to chill for 5 or 6 hours before freezing.
Makes 1 gallon.

question: How do I make a dairy-free ice cream?
answer:
Title: Homemade Ice Cream(1 Hour And 30 Minutes)
Ingredients:
4 c. milk
4 c. (2 pt.) whipping cream
1 1/2 c. sugar
5 eggs
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/8 tsp. salt
Directions:
In 3-quart saucepan, combine milk and whipping cream.
Cook over low heat until warm (6 to 8 minutes).
In large mixer bowl, combine all remaining ingredients.
Beat at medium speed, scraping bowl often, until smooth (2 to 3 minutes).
Gradually stir into milk mixture.
Cool to room temperature.
Pour into ice cream canister.
Freeze in ice cream maker according to manufacturer's directions.
Yield:
3 quarts.

question: How do I make a dairy-free ice cream?
answer:
Title: Dairy Queen Ice Cream
Ingredients:
2 envelopes Knox gelatine
1/2 c. cold water
4 c. whole milk
2 c. sugar
2 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. salt
3 c. cream
Directions:
Soak the gelatine in the cold water.
Heat the whole milk hot, but not boiling.
Remove from heat.
Add gelatine, sugar, vanilla and salt.
Cool, then add the cream.
Makes 1 gallon.

question: What can I make with only eggs, spinach, and cheese?
answer:
Title: Spinach Quiche
Ingredients:
1 unbaked pie shell
1 c. grated Swiss cheese
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1/3 c. chopped shallots
1/3 c. chopped celery
2 garlic cloves, minced
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. curry powder
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
5 to 6 dashes red pepper sauce
1 c. whipping cream
3 large eggs, beaten
6 strips bacon, fried crisp
4 oz. sliced mushrooms (fresh)
1 (10 oz.) box chopped spinach (frozen), well drained
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
In large bowl, mix grated cheese and flour.
Add shallots, celery, garlic, parsley, red pepper sauce and dry seasonings.
Stir to mix.
Add cream and eggs.
Stir to mix.
Add crumbled bacon, mushrooms and spinach.
Pour into unbaked pie shell and bake 45 to 55 minutes.
Serves 8.

question: What can I make with only eggs, spinach, and cheese?
answer:
Title: Spinach And Cheese
Ingredients:
speck of butter
3 eggs
1 c. flour
1 c. milk
1 tsp. or less pepper
1 tsp. baking powder
24 oz. shredded Cheddar (white)
2 pkg. frozen chopped spinach
1 small onion
Directions:
In a very large bowl, beat eggs.
Add flour, milk, pepper and baking powder and mix.
Boil spinach and drain well.
Add cheese, spinach and finely chopped onion to bowl.
In pan, melt a little butter.
Wipe excess with paper towel.
Pour mix into 13 x 9 x 2-inch Teflon pan and bake uncovered at 350° for 35 minutes.
Best if covered and refrigerated overnight.
Cut like brownies when cold.
Heat in oven or microwave before serving.

question: What can I make with only eggs, spinach, and cheese?
answer:
Title: Spinach Bake
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach, cooked and drained
1 c. cooked rice
1 c. sharp shredded American cheese
2 slightly beaten eggs
2 Tbsp. soft oleo
1/3 c. milk
2 Tbsp. chopped onion
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. thyme
Directions:
Mix well and pour into 10 x 6-inch dish.
Bake at 350° for 20 to 25 minutes.
Cut into squares.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.
When doubled, bake in 9 x 13-inch pan and add 15 minutes baking time.

question: What can I make with only eggs, spinach, and cheese?
answer:
Title: Spinach Layer Salad
Ingredients:
1 lb. bag spinach
4 hard-boiled eggs
1 can real bacon bits
1 (8 oz.) box frozen peas
1 red onion
1 pkg. Swiss cheese
1 (8 oz.) carton sour cream
1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
Directions:
Wash spinach; let dry.
Place layer of broken up spinach in glass 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
Cover with sliced hard-boiled eggs.
Pour bacon bits over; pour in peas.
Slice bits of red onion on top.
Mix mayo and sour cream together, then frost top like cake.
Grate Swiss cheese on top.
Refrigerate 24 hours.

question: What can I make with only eggs, spinach, and cheese?
answer:
Title: Savory Spinach Squares
Ingredients:
4 eggs
2/3 c. milk
1/4 c. melted butter
1/2 c. minced onion
2 Tbsp. dry parsley flakes
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 1/2 to 2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
2 c. cooked rice
2 (10 oz. each) pkg. frozen spinach, cooked and drained
2 (4 oz. each) pkg. shredded processed American cheese
Directions:
Beat eggs; add combined milk, butter, onion, parsley flakes, Worcestershire sauce, salt, thyme and nutmeg and mix well. Combine remaining ingredients; add egg mixture and mix well.
Pour into a greased shallow 2-quart baking dish. Bake in preheated 325° oven for about 1 hour or at 350° for 40 to 45 minutes.
Cut into squares and serve.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade falafel?
answer:
Title: Falafel
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. dried chickpeas (garbanzo beans, about 12 oz.)
2 c. chopped fresh cilantro
1 tsp. cumin
1 tsp. allspice
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper
5 garlic cloves, peeled
1 onion, quartered
1 leek, trimmed and cut into 3 pieces
6 Tbsp. olive oil, divided
Yogurt-Tahini Dip
8 (6-inch) pitas, cut in half
Directions:
Sort and wash chickpeas and place in large bowl. Cover with water to 2 inches above beans. Cover and let stand for 8 hours. Drain beans. Combine chickpeas, cilantro and next 8 ingredients in a food processor until mixture resembles coarse meal. Divide chickpea mixture into 16 equal portions, shaping each into 1/2 inch thick patties. Heat 2 Tbsp. oil in a large non-stick skillet. Add 5 patties and cook 3 minutes on each side or until golden brown. Repeat procedure twice with remaining oil and patties. Spread 1 Tbsp. Yogurt-Tahini Dip in each pita half. Fill with 1 patty. Serves 8 (2 pita halves each).

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade falafel?
answer:
Title: Soy Falafel
Ingredients:
1 cake firm tofu
1/3 c. finely chopped onions
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 c. bread crumbs
1/4 c. chopped fresh Italian parsley
1/2 Tbsp. dark sesame oil
1 Tbsp. tamari soy sauce
ground black pepper to taste
1 or more garlic cloves to taste, minced
1 tsp. ground cumin
1 tsp. turmeric
1 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Press and mash the tofu.
Mix with remaining ingredients in a medium bowl.
Form into 1-inch balls. Bake on oiled baking sheet for about 30 minutes, turning occasionally until golden and crusty on the outside.
These make a great sandwich served with sliced fresh tomato in pita pockets with a sauce made of plain yogurt and fresh dill.
(Not a children's favorite!)

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade falafel?
answer:
Title: Falafel And Tehina
Ingredients:
8 oz. chickpeas (I use canned)
1/4 tsp. coriander
2 cloves garlic
1 tsp. cumin
1/4 tsp. ground red chili pepper
1 tsp. salt
3 Tbsp. cracked wheat flour
1 lightly beaten egg
oil for deep frying
Directions:
Drain can of chickpeas.
Mash.
Add next seven ingredients. Mix thoroughly.
Taking a spoonful of the mixture at a time, roll into balls about 1-inch in diameter.
Heat oil and deep-fry falafel until browned.
Drain.
Serve hot on a gyro bread or in a pita bread pocket with tehina on top Tehina recipe follows.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade falafel?
answer:
Title: Pork Chop Casserole
Ingredients:
6 to 8 pork chops
1 large pkg. frozen string beans
1 onion, chopped
1 (16 oz.) can crushed tomato
4 small potatoes with skins washed
Directions:
This favorite was discovered on our excursions to Miami art festivals.
Falafel is sold as a street snack, a pita sandwich and is called a "dig dag.".
The sabras claim it as part of their Oriental heritage, and in Israel, falafel is an ingredient of many dishes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade falafel?
answer:
Title: Falafil Or Taamiyah(Lebanese; International)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. fava beans, soaked in water for 18 hours, drained and finely ground with electric grinder
1 1/2 c. chickpeas, soaked in water for 19 hours, drained and finely ground with electric grinder
1 1/2 lb. finely chopped onions
4 c. finely chopped parsley
3 c. finely chopped fresh coriander
1 tsp. ground coriander
1 tsp. crushed garlic
1/4 tsp. cayenne
4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. flour
vegetable oil (for frying)
Directions:
Mix all ingredients very well and knead well. Let it stand, covered, for 2 1/2 hours. Let the oil get hot on high heat. Add a dash of baking soda to the falafil with tablespoon water. Mix well. Shape into small circles; pat with the palm of your hands, then fry in oil for 3 minutes on each side or until brown. Drain. Serve with pita bread, chopped parsley, pickles, tahini, chopped tomatoes.

question: How do I make a simple beef stroganoff?
answer:
Title: Easy Beef Stroganoff
Ingredients:
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1/4 c. butter
1 lb. ground beef
2 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 can mushrooms, sliced
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 c. sour cream
Directions:
Cook the onion in butter in a saucepan over medium heat until transparent. Add the beef and cook, stirring until beef is light brown. Add the flour, salt, pepper, mushrooms and soup and cook for 5 minutes. Add the sour cream and simmer 15 more minutes. Serve over rice or noodles. Serves 6.

question: How do I make a simple beef stroganoff?
answer:
Title: Simple Stroganoff
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
onion
1 can beef broth
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1/2 c. water
3 c. uncooked noodles
1 c. sour cream
Directions:
Cook ground beef with onion.
Add beef broth, cream of mushroom soup and water.
Cover; heat to boiling.
Reduce heat to low.
Add noodles and sour cream.
Simmer for 10 minutes or until noodles are tender.

question: How do I make a simple beef stroganoff?
answer:
Title: Simple Stroganoff
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef or beef strips
1 to 2 Tbsp. dehydrated onion (to taste)
1 (8 oz.) container sour cream
1 capful Worcestershire sauce
3 Tbsp. ketchup
1 can cream of mushroom soup
rice or noodles
canned mushrooms (optional)
Directions:
Brown beef with onion.
Drain grease.
Add other ingredients (except rice or noodles) and simmer approximately 10 minutes. Serve over rice or noodles.

question: How do I make a simple beef stroganoff?
answer:
Title: Beef Stroganoff
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. sirloin, cut thin
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
4 Tbsp. butter
1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, thinly sliced
1 medium onion, sliced thin
1 Tbsp. flour
2/3 c. evaporated milk
1/3 c. Sauterne (optional)
Directions:
Cut beef into thin slices.
Season with salt and pepper. Melt butter or margarine in large skillet.
Brown meat, mushrooms and onions.
Mix flour and evaporated milk.
Add to meat.
Cook and stir until thickened.
Add Sauterne.
Serve over buttered noodles. Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make a simple beef stroganoff?
answer:
Title: Beef Stroganoff
Ingredients:
2 lb. round steak, cut in finger strips
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 small onion, chopped
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 lb. mushrooms (2 small cans)
1/2 c. sour cream (or less)
Directions:
Brown meat.
Add salt, mustard, butter, onion, pepper and one cup of water.
Pressure cook 10 to 12 minutes.
Make thickening of 2 tablespoons of flour and water.
Stir into cooked meat.
Add mushrooms, simmer until thickened.
Add sour cream.
Serve over noodles or rice.

question: I have lentils and carrots. What can I make?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. lentils
6 c. water
2 whole carrots, chopped
2 sticks celery, chopped
1 small onion, chopped
1 garlic clove, minced
dash of hot pepper
2 cubes beef bouillon
1 bay leaf
2 heaping Tbsp. tomato sauce
1 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
1 1/2 c. raw pasta
oil
Directions:
Saute onion in oil until soft, add garlic and cook 1 minute. Add water and the rest of ingredients, except pasta. Bring to a boil. Cook 30 minutes on simmer covered.
Cook pasta in a separate pot and then add to lentils.

question: I have lentils and carrots. What can I make?
answer:
Title: Creole Style Lentils
Ingredients:
1/2 c. chopped carrots
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 large onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. margarine
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. pepper
few drops hot pepper sauce
1 c. lentils, cooked and drained
hot cooked rice (optional)
Directions:
Cook carrots, celery and onion in hot margarine in medium size saucepan until lightly browned, about 10 minutes.
Add tomatoes, salt, sugar, pepper, pepper sauce and lentils.
Cover; simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve over rice.
Makes about 5 1/2 cups.

question: I have lentils and carrots. What can I make?
answer:
Title: Lentil And Tomato Bake
Ingredients:
2 large carrots
6 large tomatoes
1 c. split lentils
1 small onion
1 bay leaf
2 cloves
1/2 tsp. sea salt
1/4 c. margarine
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Grate carrots and chop tomatoes; set aside.
Wash lentils, removing any small stones.
In large saucepan, combine with 2 cups of water.
Wrap bay leaf around onion and push cloves through leaf into onion.
Add to pan with carrots and tomatoes.
Bring to a boil, stirring.
Lower heat and cover; simmer about 20 minutes. Remove onion; add salt, margarine and parsley.
Stir well.
Spoon into large ovenproof dish.
Dot top with margarine and bake in 375° oven for about 30 minutes.

question: I have lentils and carrots. What can I make?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 celery stalk, diced
1/2 medium onion, peeled and finely chopped
1 carrot, pared and diced
1/2 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. celery seed
1 tsp. chopped fresh parsley
1 garlic clove, smashed and chopped
1 c. lentils
6 c. hot chicken stock
1/4 c. long grain rice, rinsed and drained
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Heat butter in saucepan. When hot, add celery and onion; cover and cook 3 minutes over medium heat. Add carrot, spices and garlic; cover and continue cooking for 3 minutes. Add lentils and chicken stock; season well and mix. Bring to a boil. Cook soup, partially covered, 2 hours over low heat. Sixteen minutes before end of cooking, add rice and finish cooking. Serve.

question: I have lentils and carrots. What can I make?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
2 medium carrots
2 medium celery stalks
1 medium onion
3/4 lb. small red potatoes
1 (14 to 16 oz.) can Italian stewed tomatoes
3 c. water
1 c. dry lentils
2 (13 or 14 oz.) cans chicken broth
1 garlic clove
2 Tbsp. olive and salad oil
1 small head escarole
Directions:
Dice carrots, celery and onions.
Cut potatoes into 1/2-inch pieces.
Mince garlic.
In 5-quart Dutch oven over medium high heat, in hot olive oil, cook vegetables until tender.
Add garlic. Cook until brown.
Stir in tomatoes, lentils, broth, potatoes and water.
Over high heat, heat to boiling.
Reduce to low and cover. Simmer for 50 minutes.
Thinly slice escarole.
Just before serving, stir into soup.
Cook until wilted.

question: What’s a recipe for a refreshing summer salad?
answer:
Title: Evan'S Summer Refresher
Ingredients:
3 lemons, squeezed
3 oranges, squeezed
1 lime, squeezed
water
sugar
Directions:
Squeeze together in 1/2-gallon pitcher oranges, lemons and lime.
Add water to top off pitcher.
Sugar to taste.

question: What’s a recipe for a refreshing summer salad?
answer:
Title: Summer Salad
Ingredients:
1 head lettuce, chopped
1 head cauliflower, chopped
6 green onions, chopped
2 c. Cheddar cheese, grated
1 lb. bacon, cooked crisp and crumbled
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together and keep in refrigerator.
When ready to serve, combine 1/2 cup sugar and 1 cup Miracle Whip. Pour over salad and stir well.

question: What’s a recipe for a refreshing summer salad?
answer:
Title: Summer Salad
Ingredients:
large cottage cheese
1 bell pepper
1 onion or green onions
1/2 or 1 cabbage
1 tomato
1 Tbsp. mayo
Directions:
Mix all ingredients to your taste.
Add a squirt of lemon if desired.
Salt and pepper.

question: What’s a recipe for a refreshing summer salad?
answer:
Title: Refreshing Summer Cucumber Salad
Ingredients:
1 pkg. lemon jello
1 c. boiling water
1/2 c. diced celery
1 c. diced cucumber
1 c. Kraft salad dressing

little bit of onion flakes
Directions:
Combine lemon jello and boiling water; let set until leathery but not set.
Add remaining ingredients.
Mix, then put in mold or 9 x 9-inch square pan.

question: What’s a recipe for a refreshing summer salad?
answer:
Title: Refreshing Summer Jello
Ingredients:
1 (6 oz.) lemon Jell-O
2 c. boiling water
2 c. orange juice
1 (11 oz.) mandarin oranges
1 large can crushed pineapple, drained
marshmallows
Directions:
Mix boiling water and Jell-O.
Add orange juice and stir.
Mix in fruit.
Top with miniature marshmallows.

question: What can I make with tofu and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: 3 Bean Tofu Chili
Ingredients:
1/3 c. olive oil
1 Tbsp. chopped garlic
4 Tbsp. chili powder
1 small hot chili pepper, chopped fine
8 oz. baby carrots, chopped extra fine
2 c. rough chopped onions
1 c. rough chopped bell pepper
1/2 c. chopped celery
8 oz. tofu crumbles
salt and pepper to taste
1 (29 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 Tbsp. dark molasses or sorghum
2 (16 oz.) cans small pink beans
1 (16 oz.) can pinto beans
1 (16 oz.) can garbanzo beans
Directions:
Heat olive oil in cooking pot on medium high.
Add to hot oil the garlic, chili powder, chili pepper, carrots, onions, bell pepper, celery, tofu crumbles and salt to taste.
Cook until tender (approximately 10 minutes).
Add tomato and molasses.
Cook on low heat until all ingredients are blended together (approximately 5 minutes).
Drain all beans and add to mixture. Continue to cook on low heat until beans are heated through (10 to 15 minutes).
