question: What can I make with tofu and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Tofu Chili
Ingredients:
5 c. cooked pinto beans
2 lb. tofu, frozen, then thawed, broken into pieces
1/4 c. soy sauce
1 1/2 Tbsp. peanut butter
1/2 Tbsp. onion powder
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 Tbsp. tomato paste
2 Tbsp. oil
2 Tbsp. oil
1 green pepper, diced
2 large onions, diced
3 cloves garlic, minced
16 oz. can tomatoes
8 oz. can tomato sauce
3 Tbsp. chili powder
1/2 Tbsp. cumin
Directions:
Reserve the cooking water or liquid from cans of pintos.
Mix the soy sauce with next 6 ingredients (including the first of 2 tablespoons of oil); coat tofu pieces with this mixture.
Fry over medium heat until all liquid is absorbed and tofu is browned. Saute the green pepper, onions and garlic in the other 2 tablespoons oil.
Put beans, tofu mixture and sauteed vegetables in a cooking pot or crockpot.
Add the tomatoes, sauce and season. Simmer 30 minutes or longer.
If in crock-pot, simmer several hours.
Serves 8 to 10.

question: What can I make with tofu and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Mystic Tofu
Ingredients:
2 boxes extra firm tofu
1 large onion, sliced
2 medium tomatoes, chopped (optional)
1/2 tsp. cumin powder
1 tsp. curry powder
salt to taste
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
2 Tbsp. chopped cilantro leaves
2 Tbsp. poppy seed
2 cans cream of mushroom soup
1 onion
1 large green pepper
15 to 20 fresh mushrooms
oregano, basil, salt and pepper (sprinkle)
3 cans chunk white tuna, water drained
1 small bag frozen peas
1 box Ronzoni seashells
1 1/2 large Velveeta cheese
1 1/2 c. milk
Directions:
In bowl, add soup, onion, spices and milk and mix.
Add sliced mushrooms and diced green pepper; stir.
Boil noodles to only 3/4 cooked.
Drain and add to mixture, then add tuna and frozen peas, stirring gently into even chunks.

question: What can I make with tofu and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Tofu Balls
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
3 cloves garlic, minced
1 onion, finely chopped
1 large carrot, grated
1 green pepper, finely chopped
1 1/2 tsp. dried basil
3/4 tsp. dried oregano
2 large eggs
1 c. bread crumbs
3/4 c. walnuts, ground
1 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
1 1/2 tsp. sesame oil
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
black pepper to taste
3 cakes tofu, pressed
Directions:
Press water out of tofu, placing plates or weighted cutting board on top for 1/2 hour.

question: What can I make with tofu and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Tofu Veg Enchiladas
Ingredients:
1 bunch chives, chopped
2 c. fresh corn
1 red bell pepper, sliced
1 jalapeno, minced
1 tsp. cumin seed
1 lb. tofu, crumbled
10 (8-inch) corn tortillas
Directions:
Saute all ingredients (except tortillas) until tender, then wrap in corn tortillas.
Pour peanut butter sauce over enchiladas and top with cheese if desired.

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 c. warm water
1 pkg. yeast
1 tsp. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. oil
2 c. flour
1 1/2 c. additional flour
Directions:
Combine first 4 ingredients in large bowl allowing yeast to soften.
Stir in oil and 2 cups flour.
Add more flour until dough holds together.
Grease your hands lightly and knead dough on floured board until smooth.
Cover and let rise 45 minutes.
Shape it to pans you are using or into individual disks all on greased pans.
Brush with sauce and cover with ingredients.
Let rise about 5 to 10 more minutes then bake in 425° oven for 15 minutes. This recipe also makes a nice French bread loaf.
My family makes individualized pizzas.

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
3 3/4 c. flour
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 Tbsp. quick rise yeast (two 1/4 oz. packets)
1 tsp. salt
8 oz. lukewarm water (1 c.)
1/2 tsp. sugar
Directions:
Combine flour, yeast, salt and sugar in mixing bowl and stir. Add vegetable oil and water.
Mix together all ingredients.
Knead by hand for 3 minutes; shape and put in bowl. Cover and let rise until double in volume (approximately 1/2 hour).
Punch down; divide into 2 equal pieces and shape into round balls or leave in one piece for 16-inch pizza.
Let dough rest for 4 minutes.
Roll out approximately 12 or 16-inches in diameter.
Spray pizza pan lightly with no stick vegetable cooking spray and wipe off excess. Place on pizza pan; let rise for 10 to 15 minutes.
Add sauce, toppings and cheese.
Place on bottom rack in cold oven; turn oven to 500° and bake 17 to 20 minutes, depending on oven.

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 pkg. yeast
1/2 c. warm water
1 tsp. sugar
5 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 3/4 c. warm water
Directions:
Put yeast, warm water and sugar in a small bowl.
In a large bowl, add the flour, salt/yeast mixture and warm water.
Mix together, then on a floured surface, knead for a few minutes.
Put dough into a well-greased bowl.
Cover with wax paper.
Let rise for 1 hour, then spread dough onto a well-greased pizza pan or cookie sheet.
Let rise another 1/2 hour.
Bake at 350° or until crust is brown on bottom.

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 c. warm water (105~ to 115~)
1 pkg. active dry yeast
2 Tbsp. shortening
1/4 tsp. salt
4 c. sifted all-purpose flour
2 tsp. salad oil
Directions:
Mix yeast in 1 cup of warm water, then add your flour, salt and shortening.

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
3 3/4 c. flour
2 pkg. yeast
pinch of sugar
pinch of salt
1 c. warm water
1 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Mix first four ingredients.
Add water and oil.
Mix and knead until you are able to roll into a smooth ball.
Place in warm place with towel over it.
Let rise 30 minutes.
Punch down and let set for 4 minutes.
Roll out and place on pan and let rise for 15 minutes.
Add toppings (sauce, cheese, meats, veggies, etc.). Place pizza in cold oven, set temperature to 500° and bake for 15 to 17 minutes, or longer depending on your oven!
(This recipe works best on "Air-Pans.")

question: What can I do with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Turkey Wild Rice Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground turkey
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. finely chopped carrots
6 c. low salt chicken broth
1/2 c. uncooked wild rice
1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/2 tsp. dried thyme
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. flour
2 c. skim or regular milk
Directions:
Crumble ground turkey into 6-quart saucepan or Dutch oven. Stir in onion and carrots.
Cook over medium heat for 3 to 5 minutes.
Stir in chicken broth, rice, poultry seasoning, pepper and thyme.
Bring to boil and reduce heat.
Cover and simmer 45 to 55 minutes or until tender.
Place flour in a small bowl. Gradually add milk, blending until smooth.
Cook and stir over medium heat until soup bubbles and thickens slightly.

question: What can I do with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Ground Turkey Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey
2 bunches green onions
1 (4 oz.) can mushrooms
soy sauce
Chinese noodles
1 c. uncooked brown rice
1 c. uncooked long grain white rice
Directions:
One cup of uncooked kashi may be substituted for brown rice.

question: What can I do with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Spanish Rice With Turkey
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey
1 medium pepper, chopped
1 medium onion, chopped
2 cans tomatoes
1 c. water
4 oz. uncooked rice
3/4 tsp. oregano
salt
1/4 tsp. red pepper
1/8 tsp. garlic
Directions:
Cook turkey, onions and pepper until done, stirring constantly.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Bring to a boil. Cover. Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Serves 4.
Counts as 3 proteins, vegetable and 1 bread.

question: What can I do with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Ground Turkey Quick Dish
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey
2 cans stewed potatoes
2 cans pinto or kidney beans
approximately 6 to 8 servings instant rice
seasonings to taste
Directions:
Brown the ground turkey. Cook the instant rice according to directions using a microwave-safe casserole dish.
Combine the ground turkey, rice, tomatoes and beans. Microwave 3 to 4 minutes, until hot.

question: What can I do with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Taco Rice
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey or beef
1 chopped onion
1 1/2 c. salsa
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
Directions:
Brown meat and onion in skillet.
Add salsa and tomato sauce; bring to a boil.
Cover, reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Serve with rice.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter or oleo
1/4 c. onion, chopped
2 c. diced potatoes
1 c. water
1/2 c. evaporated milk
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. salt
1 can cream-style corn
1 c. milk
Directions:
Melt butter in saucepan.
Add onion.
Saute until onion is golden yellow.
Add potatoes, water, salt and pepper.
Cover and cook on low heat until potatoes are very soft.
Stir frequently. Add corn, milk and evaporated milk.
Heat, stirring frequently, until chowder bubbles.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Creamy Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
3 small potatoes, pared and diced into 1/2-inch cubes
2 c. boiling water
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 medium onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. margarine or butter
2 c. milk
1/2 c. half and half
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/2 tsp. paprika
salt and pepper
1 3/4 c. fresh corn kernels (approximately 3 ears) or 1 pkg. (10 oz.) frozen whole kernel corn
2 Tbsp. sliced fresh or canned pimiento
Directions:
Cook potatoes in boiling water and salt about 20 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
Meanwhile, saute the onion in butter until tender.
When potatoes are cooked, stir in onion, corn, pimiento, milk, half and half, brown sugar, paprika, salt and pepper to taste.
Simmer 20 to 30 minutes longer until soup is slightly thickened.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Creamy Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
3 tsp. butter or bacon drippings
1/4 c. finely chopped celery
1/4 c. finely chopped green peppers
3 tsp. flour
3 medium onions, chopped
5 medium potatoes, chopped
1 tsp. salt
1 (17 oz.) can cream-style corn
black pepper to taste
2 c. milk
Directions:
In 2-quart saucepan, cook vegetables until tender.
Remove from heat.
Stir in milk.
Simmer about 10 minutes, stirring once or twice.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Creamy Sweet Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. unsalted butter or vegetable oil
1/2 c. finely chopped onion
2 1/2 c. uncooked corn kernels (about 5 ears cut from cob)
1 c. Russet potatoes, peeled and diced
2 c. reduced sodium or homemade chicken broth
1 bay leaf
1 1/2 c. low-fat milk
Directions:
In large saucepan, heat vegetable oil or butter until melted. Add onion and cook, stirring, over medium-low heat until tender, about 5 minutes.
Add 2 cup corn kernels, potatoes, chicken broth and bay leaf.
Cover and cook over low heat until tender, about 15 minutes.
Remove and discard bay leaf.
Cool slightly; transfer to a food processor with metal blade and puree in batches if necessary.
Press mixture through a sieve set over the saucepan. Pour milk through the sieve.
Add remaining 1/2 cup corn to the saucepan.
Heat over low heat, stirring until warm; do not boil.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
6 Tbsp. chopped onion
3/4 c. chopped celery
2 1/2 c. hot water
2 medium boiling potatoes, peeled and cut into 1/2 inch cubes
3 c. fresh or frozen corn kernels, thawed
2 Tbsp. sugar (or less, according to taste)
2 Tbsp. flour
1 qt. half and half
Directions:
Melt butter in saucepan.
Add onion and celery; saute 5 minutes until soft, but not brown.
Add water, potatoes, corn, sugar, salt and pepper.
Cover and simmer until potatoes are barely tender, about 30 minutes.
Whisk flour into 1 cup half and half; stir into soup.
Add remaining half and half and simmer until soup has thickened to a creamy consistency, about 15 minutes.
Season to taste with additional salt and pepper if needed.
If too thick, add more milk; if too thin, simmer 5 to 10 minutes longer.
Makes 9 servings, about 1 cup each.

question: Give me a simple recipe for mashed potatoes.
answer:
Title: Special Occasion Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 lb. potatoes (about 12 medium), peeled and cooked
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese (room temperature)
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 c. milk
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1/4 c. onions, finely chopped
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Mash hot peppers.
Add cream cheese and butter in pieces.
Beat until both melted.
Mix in sour cream.
To milk, add eggs and onions; whip lightly.
Add to potato mixture along with seasonings. Beat until light and fluffy.
Place in greased 9-inch round casserole dish.
Refrigerate several hours (can be chilled overnight if not needed immediately).
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes. Serves 8 to 12.

question: Give me a simple recipe for mashed potatoes.
answer:
Title: Simple Potato Salad
Ingredients:
6 to 8 potatoes, diced
4 eggs, boiled
1 medium onion, chopped
3 fresh kosher pickles, chopped
salt to taste
pepper to taste
1/2 c. Miracle Whip fat-free
1 Tbsp. mustard
Directions:
Cook potatoes until done.
Drain and mash.
Add onion, pickle, mustard and Miracle Whip.
Chop 2 eggs.
Add to mix.
Mix well. Garnish with 2 eggs.

question: Give me a simple recipe for mashed potatoes.
answer:
Title: Mashed Potatoes - Make-Ahead Type
Ingredients:
6 medium potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/2 c. sour cream
3 oz. cream cheese
2 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. onion salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 to 1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Cook potatoes until tender.
Drain.
Mash potatoes and mix in sour cream, softened cream cheese, 1 tablespoon butter, onion salt and pepper.
Gradually beat in enough milk to make potatoes fluffy and light.
Turn into a greased 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Cover with foil.
Chill up to 24 hours.
To serve, dot with remaining 1 tablespoon butter and bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes or until heated through.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: Give me a simple recipe for mashed potatoes.
answer:
Title: Simple Potato Salad
Ingredients:
3 lb. potatoes
1/2 c. olive oil
2 cloves garlic, chopped
2 Tbsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. oregano
Directions:
Peel, cube and boil potatoes until tender.
Strain and place in a bowl.
Add all other ingredients.
Toss and serve.

question: Give me a simple recipe for mashed potatoes.
answer:
Title: Christmas Eve Simple Shepherd'S Pie
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground chuck
1 medium onion
1 large (16 to 20 oz.) pkg. frozen corn
4 to 6 c. mashed potatoes (fresh or instant)
Directions:
In a large skillet, brown diced onion in small amount of fat. Add ground chuck.
Cook until done and crumbly.
Prepare mashed potatoes.
Cook frozen corn.
Slightly grease or spray nonstick cooking spray a 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
Drain fat from meat. Spread crumbled meat in bottom of dish.
Spread cooked corn on top of meat.
Carefully spread mashed potatoes on top.
Dot with butter or margarine.
Sprinkle with paprika.
Bake at 325° to 350° until brown, about 1/2 hour.

question: What can I cook with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Rolls
Ingredients:
2 pkg. (10 oz. each) frozen, chopped spinach, cooked according to directions and drained well
2 c. one-step chicken flavored stuffing mix
1 c. grated Parmesan cheese
6 large eggs, lightly beaten
3/4 c. (1 1/2 sticks) butter
1/2 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
Directions:
Mix all ingredients in a large bowl until well blended.
Roll level tablespoonfuls of mixture into balls (makes about 60). Arrange them on cookie sheet (with sides is best), close but not touching.
At this point, they can either be frozen and put in a gallon Ziploc bag or cooked in 350° oven for 15 to 20 minutes until firm.

question: What can I cook with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach And Meat Combination
Ingredients:
1 lb. spinach, fresh or frozen
1 bell pepper, diced (red and green)
1 tsp. sugar
pepper and salt to taste
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 Tbsp. onion powder or small dried onion
1 chicken breast, cut up
1/2 lb. beef for stew
Directions:
In a 3-quart pot with cover, cook beef in 1 cup water for 1/2 hour, then add chicken breast with spinach and other ingredients. Add water as needed.
Cook for 45 minutes.
Usually served over rice.
Serves 4.

question: What can I cook with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Spinach
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
4 chicken breasts (8 halves)
1 c. mayonnaise
2 cans cream of chicken soup
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. curry powder
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. buttered bread crumbs
Directions:
Squeeze excess liquid out of spinach.
Spread in 9 x 13-inch dish.
Put chicken on top.
Mix mayo, soup, lemon juice and curry. Spread on top of chicken.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Bake at 350° for 1 to 1 1/2 hours.

question: What can I cook with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Chicken Florentine
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, defrosted and squeezed dry
3 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
3/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 1/2 c. milk
1/4 c. grated Parmesan
1/2 c. light cream
4 large boned, skinned chicken breasts, cooked and cut into bite size pieces
3/4 c. Italian bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
Directions:
Grease (or Pam) 9 x 9-inch casserole.
Spread spinach on bottom, then chicken.
In saucepan, melt 3 tablespoons butter. Stir in flour to form roux.
Slowly stir in milk, then add seasonings.
Cook until thick and just beginning to boil.
Add Parmesan and cream, stirring, over low heat until cheese melts. Pour sauce over chicken.
Combine crumbs and melted butter. Sprinkle on sauce.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes or until heated through.
Serve with rice.
Serves 6.
Can be doubled in a 9 x 13-inch pan.

question: What can I cook with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Spinach Bake
Ingredients:
2 pkg. frozen chopped spinach
4 to 5 c. cut-up cooked chicken
2 cans cream of chicken soup
2 c. chicken broth
2 tsp. lemon juice
salt and pepper to taste
paprika
6 Tbsp. butter
6 Tbsp. flour
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Cook spinach as on package.
Drain thoroughly and spread over the bottom of a buttered 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish.
Spread chicken over spinach.
Melt butter and blend in flour; add chicken soup, chicken broth and cook, stirring constantly, until sauce boils and thickens.
Add lemon juice and salt and pepper.
Pour sauce over chicken; sprinkle with cheese and dust with paprika. Bake in 400° oven for 30 minutes or until nice and brown.

question: What can I cook with turkey breast and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Deep Fried Turkey
Ingredients:
1 wild turkey breast
vegetable oil to fill fish cooker
Directions:
Heat oil in cooker until paper match laying in oil on the bottom of the cooker bursts into flames.
Slowly lower breast into cooker and cook until outside is dark brown.
Unbelievably simple - unbelievably good!

question: What can I cook with turkey breast and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Turkey Breast
Ingredients:
1 turkey breast
1/2 c. melted butter
1/4 c. lemon juice
2 tsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. minced onions
1 tsp. dried sage
1 tsp. dried thyme
1 tsp. marjoram
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except turkey, in a saucepan and bring to a boil.
Place turkey breast in a 13 x 9-inch oiled baking dish.
Pour 1/2 the mixture over the turkey; cover with foil and bake about an hour.
Pour the other 1/2 over the turkey and continue baking another hour.
Check for doneness.

question: What can I cook with turkey breast and vegetables?
answer:
Title: How To Cook A Turkey Breast
Ingredients:
1 turkey breast
lemon pepper
salt
pepper
paprika
1 c. water
Directions:
Wash and remove rib case (optional).
Sprinkle with lemon pepper, salt, pepper and paprika.
Heat oven to 400°.
Place in large Corning dish with a cup of water.
Cover and bake for 1 hour.
Cut heat off and leave dish in oven until oven cools. Turkey is ready to slice and serve.
Roast or ham may be cooked the same way.

question: What can I cook with turkey breast and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Turkey Breast
Ingredients:
5 to 6 lb. turkey breast
2 Tbsp. unsalted butter
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. dry white wine
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. salt
2 minced green onions
1/2 to 1 c. chicken stock
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Rub butter on skin.
Season with paprika, salt and pepper.
Scatter onions over all sides.
Put turkey in roasting pan.
Pour wine and broth in bottom of pan (1/2 inch liquid in bottom).
Roast about 1 1/2 hours until 160° to 165° on meat thermometer or until liquid runs clear.
Baste during roasting.

question: What can I cook with turkey breast and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Best Ever Turkey Breast
Ingredients:
1 turkey breast (6 to 7 lb.)
2 stalks celery
1 large onion, cut
salt and pepper
Directions:
Thaw turkey breast in refrigerator.
Wash and dry well.
Rub outside well with salt and pepper.
Also sprinkle some on the inside.
Fill cavity with chunks of celery and onion.
Wrap breast good and tight with aluminum foil.
Put in crock-pot.
Add 1 cup of water.
Turn to high for about an hour.
Reduce to low and cook all night.
You will have lots of good broth and the turkey breast will be nice and juicy and tender.

question: What can I cook with ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Ground Lamb Curry
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground lamb
2 Tbsp. flour
1 large onion, sliced thinly
1/2 to 2 tsp. curry powder (depends on taste)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. water or stock
1/2 c. raisins
juice and grated peel of 1 lemon
2 whole cloves
Directions:
Brown meat in large skillet; pour off all but 2 tablespoons of drippings. Push meat to one side. Add flour and brown slightly, stirring constantly. Add all remaining ingredients and mix in the meat. Cover and simmer about 15 minutes or until onions are tender. Remove cloves before serving. Serve over hot rice. Serves 4.

question: What can I cook with ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Lamb Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. butter
5 eggs, well beaten
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 c. sugar
2 c. flour
1/4 tsp. mace
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Cream the butter. Add sugar. Add eggs.
Beat on high speed 3 minutes. Sift, measure and sift flour, salt, mace and baking powder together. Sift again. Add dry ingredients to creamed mixture in 3 installments.
Beat 1 minute after each addition. Add lemon juice. Beat 1/2 minute.
Pour into bottom and face of lamb. Place on cookie sheet in oven at 325° for 1 hour.
Remove from oven.
Lift lid off.
Usually done at this point.

question: What can I cook with ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Butterflied Lamb In Mustard Sauce
Ingredients:
1 tsp. ground rosemary
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
4 Tbsp. olive oil
1 clove mashed garlic
1/2 c. Dijon mustard
Directions:
Split 1 hogie roll.
Remove about 2 tablespoons of bread crumbs from middle of roll.
Cook 2 slices bacon crisp.
Paint inside of roll with mayonnaise.
Place bacon on roll, then 4 oysters (raw) on top of bacon.
Roll and seal in aluminum foil. Bake in a 350° oven for 20 minutes.
Slice in thirds and serve.

question: What can I cook with ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Lamb In Casserole
Ingredients:
2 to 3 lb. boneless lamb
flour
salt and pepper
1/4 c. carrots, chopped fine
2 Tbsp. onions, chopped fine
2 Tbsp. parsley, chopped fine
2 Tbsp. drippings
Directions:
Cut lamb in uniform pieces and roll in seasoned flour.
Brown in drippings.
Place in casserole.
Add carrots, onions, parsley and cover with cold water.
Cook in moderate oven until meat is tender.
Add more seasonings if necessary.
Thicken the gravy with flour.
Time in oven 1 1/2 hours at 350°.
Serves 8.

question: What can I cook with ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Broiled Lamb
Ingredients:
1 c. olive oil
1/2 c. fresh lemon juice
1 large onion, thinly sliced
4 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 c. fresh Italian parsley, chopped
few sprigs of fresh oregano
salt
freshly ground pepper
1 leg of lamb (about 9 lb.), butterflied
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except for lamb.
Mix well and pour over lamb in glass dish.
Turn lamb to coat well.
Refrigerate overnight, turning occasionally.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta
Ingredients:
sun-dried tomatoes
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 clove garlic, crushed
1 1/2 c. tomatoes, peeled, seeded and diced
1/2 c. heavy cream
1/4 c. sun-dried tomatoes
1 Tbsp. Italian parsley, chopped
salt and pepper
pasta (except spaghetti or linguine)
Directions:
Cook pasta according to package directions.
Heat oil in skillet; add garlic and saute 1 minute.
Add tomatoes; heat to boiling.
Stir until thickens, about 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and sun-dried tomatoes and simmer about 5 minutes.
Add salt and pepper.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Italian Pasta
Ingredients:
1 c. Hellmann's real or light mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried basil
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 c. twist macaroni, cooked and drained
1 c. quartered cherry tomatoes
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1/2 c. sliced ripe olives
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients.
Stir in remaining ingredients. Cover.
Chill.
Makes 3 cups.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pesto Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1 pkg prepared pesto
1/2 c. miracle whip
3 c. rotini cooked and drained
1/2 c. pitted ripe olive slices
3 Tbsp. chopped sun dried tomatoes in oil drained
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Mix pesto and salad dressing until well blended.
Add remaining ingredients and mix well.
Refrigerate.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Fresh Tomato Sauce
Ingredients:
1 medium onion, chopped
2 tsp. olive oil
3 tomatoes, peeled and seeded
1/2 tsp. salt
12 oz. pasta, cooked
1/2 c. chicken broth
1 Tbsp. leaf basil
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. black pepper
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Saute onion in olive oil in a large nonstick skillet until golden.
Add tomatoes and simmer until tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Add broth, basil and oregano, simmer to thicken sauce, 5 to 7 minutes.
Stir in salt and pepper.
Serve over hot, cooked pasta. Sprinkle with cheese.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Baked Tomato Pasta
Ingredients:
12 medium Roma tomatoes
3 to 6 garlic cloves, minced
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1/2 c. olive oil
1 lb. dry spaghetti, cooked according to directions
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, at room temperature
1/2 c. fresh whole or 2 Tbsp. basil leaves
Directions:
Cut tomatoes in half lengthwise; set cut side up in a 9 x 13-inch baking pan.
Sprinkle lightly with salt and pepper.
Mix garlic with 1/3 cup parsley and 2 tablespoons olive oil; pat mixture over cut side of tomatoes.
Drizzle 2 tablespoons of olive oil over tomatoes.
Bake at 425° for 45 minutes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Roasted Cauliflower
Ingredients:
1 head cauliflower
2 red onions
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
2 Tbsp. garlic olive oil
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. parmesan cheese
Directions:
Make cauliflower into 1-1/2 inch florets.
Cut red onions into 8 wedges.
Heat oven to 475°.
In non-stick roasting pan, mix cauliflower, onions, oil, salt and 1/4 tsp. pepper.
Roast 15 minutes. Toss and roast 5 to 10 minutes until lightly charcoal and tender. Transfer to platter, top with 1/4 tsp. pepper, parsley and cheese.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower
Ingredients:
1 medium head cauliflower
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 tsp. finely chopped onion
2 Tbsp. water
1 tsp. mustard
1/2 c. shredded cheese
Directions:
Place cauliflower in 1 1/2-quart glass dish.
Add water. Cover and microwave for 8 to 10 minutes.
Combine mayonnaise, mustard and onion.
Spoon sauce on top of cauliflower and sprinkle with cheese.
Roast for 2 minutes.
Let stand 2 minutes; serve.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Quick Beef And Cauliflower
Ingredients:
1 lb. round steak, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
2 Tbsp. oil
1 medium head cauliflower, broken into flowerets
1 green pepper, cut into 3/4-inch pieces
1 clove garlic, minced
1/4 c. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/2 tsp. sugar
1 1/2 c. beef broth
1 c. sliced green onions
8 oz. mushrooms, sliced
3 c. hot cooked rice
Directions:
Brown steak cubes in oil in skillet.
Add cauliflower, green pepper, garlic and soy sauce; mix well.
Simmer, covered, for 8 to 10 minutes.
Blend cornstarch, sugar and broth in bowl.
Stir into beef mixture with green onions and mushrooms.
Cook until thickened, stirring constantly.
Serve over rice.
Yield:
6 servings.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Bake
Ingredients:
1 lg. cauliflower, cut into flowerets
1/2 tsp. salt
3 c. water
1/4 c. butter or margarine, melted
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 c. buttery cracker crumbs
1 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese, divided
1 med. onion, chopped
1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes, chopped and undrained
Directions:
Combine first 3 ingredients in a large saucepan, bring to a boil.
Cover, reduce heat and cook for 5 minutes or until tender. Drain and set aside.
Combine butter and next 4 ingredients in a large bowl, stir in cauliflower, 1 cup cheese, onion, chopped green pepper and tomatoes.
Spoon into a greased 13x9x2 inch baking dish.
Bake at 350° for 35 minutes.
Add remaining 1/2 cup cheese and bake 5 additional minutes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Quick Sauerbraten
Ingredients:
2 to 3 lb. cooked roast beef
1 1/2 c. gravy
1 onion, sliced
12 tsp. ground cloves or 8 whole cloves
2 bay leaves
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/4 tsp. allspice
1 c. vinegar
2 lemon slices
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Place all ingredients in a glass bowl for about 1 hour.
Turn meat after 30 minutes.
After meat and spices have set for an hour place in a heavy pan and heat for about 45 minutes.
This is a good recipe if meat is a little tough; it will become tender and delicious.
Thicken gravy.
Serve over spatzle or noodles.

question: I want to make a BBQ sauce from scratch.
answer:
Title: Scratch Italian Sauce
Ingredients:
2 tomatoes per person
1/2 green pepper per person, chopped
1 bay leaf
1 Tbsp. basil
2 green onions per person, chopped
1 clove garlic
1 Tbsp. oregano
salt to taste
Directions:
Peel and seed tomatoes. Chop up and set aside.
Saute green onions, green peppers and garlic.
Pour in tomatoes and spices. Simmer on low for at least 1 1/2 hours, covered.
Serve on pasta or grilled chicken.

question: I want to make a BBQ sauce from scratch.
answer:
Title: Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. butter
1 pt. vinegar
2 heaping tsp. black pepper
1/2 c. sugar
Directions:
The next time you make white sauce, make a "big batch" of it, thick.
Drop one tablespoon at a time on a cookie sheet leaving a little space between.
Put the sheet in the freezer and when frozen put into plastic bags.
The next time you want to cream peas, etc., take out the required number of chips and thaw in saucepan or microwave.
Thin with milk to desired consistency.

question: I want to make a BBQ sauce from scratch.
answer:
Title: Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
4 c. sugar
2 1/2 c. catsup
1 pt. mustard
2 Tbsp. salt
2 Tbsp. black pepper
1/4 tsp. red pepper
1 c. water
1 stick butter
1 1/2 qt. vinegar
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. cornstarch
Directions:
Mix the first 9 ingredients.
Cook over medium heat for 1 hour. Mix the remaining ingredients with a little water; add and simmer for 1/2 hour.
Pour into bottles.

question: I want to make a BBQ sauce from scratch.
answer:
Title: Texas Bbq Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 stick of butter
1 small onion (chopped)
1 clove garlic (minced)
1 tsp. celery salt
1 cup catsup
1/2 cup vinegar
1 1/2 cups water
1/4 cup worcestershire sauce
3 bay leaves
1 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. chili powder
Directions:
Melt butter.
Add onion, garlic and celery.
Cook until onion is tender.
Stir in water, catsup, vinegar, worcestershire sauce, bay leaves and pepper.
Simmer for 20 minutes.
Remove a little of the sauce and mix with chili powder, then add to the rest of the sauce.
Let stand at room temperature for 1 hour before serving.

question: I want to make a BBQ sauce from scratch.
answer:
Title: White Bbq Sauce For Chicken
Ingredients:
2/3 c. butter or oleo
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
few grains cayenne pepper
2 Tbsp. flour
2/3 c. water or stock
2 Tbsp. chopped pickle
1 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 c. vinegar
1/4 tsp. Tabasco sauce
Directions:
Melt oleo.
Combine
dry
ingredients
and add to oleo. Stir until well blended.
Remove from heat.
Combine remaining ingredients and gradually stir into butter mixture.
Return to heat.
Stir until thick and smooth.
Enough for 2 chickens.

question: How do I make a simple fruit salad?
answer:
Title: Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. milk
1 egg
1 tsp. flour
2 oranges, cut up
3 apples, cut up
Directions:
Place fruit in bowl.
Mix ingredients and cook until thickens.
Pour over fruit.
Mix gently and refrigerate in covered dish overnight when possible.

question: How do I make a simple fruit salad?
answer:
Title: Simple Potato Salad
Ingredients:
6 to 8 potatoes, diced
4 eggs, boiled
1 medium onion, chopped
3 fresh kosher pickles, chopped
salt to taste
pepper to taste
1/2 c. Miracle Whip fat-free
1 Tbsp. mustard
Directions:
Cook potatoes until done.
Drain and mash.
Add onion, pickle, mustard and Miracle Whip.
Chop 2 eggs.
Add to mix.
Mix well. Garnish with 2 eggs.

question: How do I make a simple fruit salad?
answer:
Title: Easy Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
1 can fruit cocktail
1 can pears, chopped
1 can peaches, chopped
1/4 c. nuts, chopped
2 bananas, sliced
mayonnaise to taste
Directions:
Drain all fruit.
Mix first 5 ingredients.
Add mayonnaise to taste. Chill and eat.

question: How do I make a simple fruit salad?
answer:
Title: Simple Potato Salad
Ingredients:
3 lb. potatoes
1/2 c. olive oil
2 cloves garlic, chopped
2 Tbsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. oregano
Directions:
Peel, cube and boil potatoes until tender.
Strain and place in a bowl.
Add all other ingredients.
Toss and serve.

question: How do I make a simple fruit salad?
answer:
Title: Fruit Salad(Low-Fat)
Ingredients:
2 bananas, peeled and sliced
1 large red apple, cut into small chunks
1 large green apple, cut into small chunks
2 oranges, peeled, sectioned and cut up
1 bunch grapes
1 grapefruit (pink), peeled, sectioned and cut up
1 can pineapple tidbits in their own juice
1/2 c. chopped walnuts (if desired)
2 stalks diced celery (if desired)
Directions:
Place all the fruit into a large
bowl.
Pour pineapple and its juice over all fruit; mix.
Add walnuts and celery, if desired.
Mix.

question: What can I make with chickpeas and couscous?
answer:
Title: Braised Vegetables With Couscous
Ingredients:
4 tsp. vegetable oil
2 c. sliced onions
1 c. sliced carrots
1 c. sliced celery
1 c. sliced zucchini
1 lb. rinsed, drained, canned chickpeas
1 sq. Knox vegetable bouillon
1/2 tsp. cumin
4 oz. uncooked couscous
Directions:
In nonstick Dutch oven, heat oil.
Add onions, carrots, celery and zucchini.
Cook over high heat, stirring frequently until onions are lightly browned.
Add 3 cups water, chickpeas, bouillon, cumin and dash of pepper.
Reduce heat to low.
Cover and simmer 10 minutes or until carrots are tender.

question: What can I make with chickpeas and couscous?
answer:
Title: Couscous With Chickpeas And Feta Cheese
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) can chicken broth or vegetable broth
1 c. packaged couscous (1 box)
1 (15 1/2 oz.) can chickpeas, drained
1 c. sliced scallions (with tops)
4 oz. crumbled Feta
1 (2 1/4 oz.) can drained ripe olives
2/3 c. Italian vinaigrette dressing
Directions:
In medium saucepan, bring broth to boil.
Stir in couscous. Remove from heat; cover and let stand for 5 minutes.
Transfer couscous to large bowl and fluff with fork.
Let stand 5 minutes; fluff again. mix in chickpeas, scallions, cheese and olives.
Pour dressing over mixture and toss lightly with fork.
Serve on bed of lettuce.
Serves 6. Enjoy.

question: What can I make with chickpeas and couscous?
answer:
Title: Spicy Vegetable Couscous
Ingredients:
1 c. each chopped zucchini and summer squash
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 clove chopped garlic
1 c. chickpeas
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley (fresh)
2 tsp. curry
1 tsp. cumin
1/4 tsp. red pepper flakes
1 lb. firm tofu (optional)*
3 c. cooked couscous
Directions:
Saute vegetables (and tofu, if desired) over medium heat until just tender.
Add chickpeas and spices, except for parsley.

question: What can I make with chickpeas and couscous?
answer:
Title: Veggie-Topped Couscous
Ingredients:
1 large onion, cut into thin wedges
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. olive oil or cooking oil
2 c. thinly sliced carrots
1/2 c. water
1 tsp. dried basil, crushed
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper (optional)
2 medium zucchini, quartered lengthwise and cut into 1/2-inch pieces (2 1/2 c.)
1 (15 oz.) can garbanzo beans, rinsed and drained
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can reduced sodium stewed tomatoes
2 Tbsp. water
2 tsp. cornstarch
2 c. reduced sodium chicken broth
1 c. couscous
1/4 c. chopped unsalted dry roasted peanuts
Directions:
In a large saucepan, cook onion and garlic in hot oil over medium-low heat until crisp-tender.
Stir in carrots, 1/2 cup water, basil, cumin, salt and, if desired, red pepper.
Bring to boiling.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in zucchini, garbanzo beans and tomatoes.
Cover and cook for 2 minutes.
Stir together 2 tablespoons water and cornstarch.
Stir into tomato mixture.
Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. Cook and stir for 2 minutes more.

question: What can I make with chickpeas and couscous?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Couscous Pilaf
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 c. sliced zucchini
1 small onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried basil
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. white wine or chicken broth
1 c. chicken broth
3/4 c. couscous
1 c. cherry tomatoes
1/4 c. pitted black olives, cut in half (Kalamata best)
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh flat leaf parsley
Directions:
Melt butter; add onion, zucchini, salt, pepper, garlic and basil.
Cook until zucchini is tender, 4 to 5 minutes.
Add wine; bring to boil.
Cook 1 minute.
Add broth; bring to boil.
Stir in couscous, olives and tomatoes.
Remove from heat; cover.
Let stand until liquid is absorbed (about 5 minutes).
Before serving, fluff with fork; sprinkle with parsley.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
5 lb. potatoes, pared
2 tsp. salt
2 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese with chives, cubed
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. heavy cream
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
paprika (optional)
Directions:
Cook potatoes with 1 teaspoon salt in boiling water until tender.
Drain.
Mash potatoes until smooth; add cream cheese, 4 tablespoons butter, garlic salt, pepper and 1 teaspoon salt.
Mix until smooth.
Gradually add cream; mix well after each addition. Put in greased baking dish.
(Bake at once or cover with foil and refrigerate overnight.)
Dot top of potatoes with 2 tablespoons butter and sprinkle with paprika.
Bake in 325° oven 30 minutes. Increase heat to 375° and bake 30 minutes more.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 cloves crushed garlic
4 medium-sized all-purpose potatoes, peeled and thin sliced
1 bay leaf
1 Tbsp. margarine
1/2 c. buttermilk
3 Tbsp. plain low-fat yogurt
Directions:
In a medium-size heavy saucepan, bring 3 cups water to a boil. Add garlic, potatoes and bay leaf.
Cook, partially covered, over moderate heat until potatoes are "fork tender" (reserving 3 tablespoons cooking water).
Discard bay leaf, transfer potatoes to a large mixing bowl.
Add margarine, buttermilk and yogurt.
Beat with a mixer, then add just enough of the reserved water to make the potatoes creamy.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Mashed Potatoes - Make-Ahead Type
Ingredients:
6 medium potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/2 c. sour cream
3 oz. cream cheese
2 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. onion salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 to 1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Cook potatoes until tender.
Drain.
Mash potatoes and mix in sour cream, softened cream cheese, 1 tablespoon butter, onion salt and pepper.
Gradually beat in enough milk to make potatoes fluffy and light.
Turn into a greased 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Cover with foil.
Chill up to 24 hours.
To serve, dot with remaining 1 tablespoon butter and bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes or until heated through.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Special Occasion Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 lb. potatoes (about 12 medium), peeled and cooked
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese (room temperature)
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 c. milk
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1/4 c. onions, finely chopped
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Mash hot peppers.
Add cream cheese and butter in pieces.
Beat until both melted.
Mix in sour cream.
To milk, add eggs and onions; whip lightly.
Add to potato mixture along with seasonings. Beat until light and fluffy.
Place in greased 9-inch round casserole dish.
Refrigerate several hours (can be chilled overnight if not needed immediately).
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes. Serves 8 to 12.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: "Make Ahead" Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
9 large baking potatoes, peeled and cut in chunks
1/2 c. butter/oleo, softened
12 oz. cream cheese (room temperature)
1/2 c. sour cream
1/4 tsp. white pepper
1/2 tsp. salt
pinch of ground nutmeg
Directions:
Place potatoes in a large pot. Cover with water and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer over medium heat until potatoes are tender. Drain.
Put potatoes in mixing bowl.
Beat with mixer until light and fluffy. Beat in butter and cream cheese (which have been cut in small chunks).
Beat in sour cream, nutmeg, salt and pepper.
Transfer mixture to a heavily buttered casserole dish. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate.
Before serving, bring to room temperature, then bake, uncovered, in preheated 350° oven for 20 to 30 minutes.
Makes 8 servings.
May be fixed 2 to 3 days ahead.

question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish
Ingredients:
fish of your choice
salt and pepper
lemon juice
Directions:
Put aluminum foil on grill.
Punch holes in foil.
Spray foil with Pam cooking spray.
Place fish, skin side down.
Salt and pepper to taste.
Squeeze lemon juice on fillet.
Cook on grill at medium temperature for 15 to 20 minutes or until flaky.
Top with Molly McButter flakes.

question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Baked Fish On Grill
Ingredients:
2 medium to large fish fillets
1 small onion
1 lemon
garlic salt
black pepper
butter
Directions:
Place 2 to 3 pats of butter under each fillet on aluminum foil.
Place 2 to 3 pats on top of each fillet.
Slice onion and pop out rings.
Lay on top.
Slice lemon in thin slices.
Place on top of onion.
Sprinkle with garlic salt and pepper to taste. Roll foil around and seal.
Bake 15 to 20 minutes (depending on size of fillets), turning once.
This may also be baked in a preheated oven.

question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish
Ingredients:
2 lb. fish
1/2 c. salad oil
1/3 c. freshly squeezed lemon juice
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. capers and juice (optional)
2 Tbsp. catsup
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. sugar
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
4 bay leaves, crushed
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 cloves garlic, finely chopped
paprika
Directions:
Marinate fish for 30 minutes in mixed ingredients.
Cook on grill about 8 minutes on each side or until fish flakes easily with fork.
Baste fish while grilling and sprinkle with paprika.
Baste shrimp or scallops only, don't marinate.

question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish
Ingredients:
4 fish fillets
1/2 c. margarine
1/2 Tbsp. garlic salt
1/4 Tbsp. black pepper
2 Tbsp. Worcestershire
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
light vegetable oil cooking spray
1/4 c. cornmeal
1 tsp. dried thyme
1 tsp. dried basil
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. lemon pepper
4 tsp. blackening seasoning
4 (4 oz.) catfish fillets
1/2 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 400°.
Spray the vegetable oil over the baking sheet 3 times to coat.
Put the cornmeal, thyme and basil on a large plate and mix well.
Sprinkle 1/8 teaspoon of the garlic powder, 1/8 teaspoon of the lemon pepper and 1 teaspoon of the blackening seasoning on each of the catfish fillets.
Coat the fillets thoroughly with the cornmeal mixture and transfer them to the prepared baking sheet.
Dust each fillet with 1/8 teaspoon of the paprika.
Coat the catfish lightly with the cooking spray. Place the baking sheet on the bottom shelf of the oven.
Bake for 20 minutes.
Reduce the heat to 350° and bake for about 5 minutes more, until the crust is golden and the fish flakes easily.

question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish
Ingredients:
1 lb. fresh fish (any kind)
splash of white wine
3 slices lemon
3 sprigs fresh dill
Directions:
Place fish on tin foil.
Splash with wine.
Place lemon slices and dill on top of fish.
Wrap fish in foil tightly.
Grill on medium coals for 20 minutes or until fish flakes.
This is very low cal and a great way to do any kind of fish.

question: What’s a quick recipe for an avocado toast with eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Egg Salad
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. sour cream
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. hot pepper sauce (optional)
2 avocados, peeled and chopped
6 hard boiled eggs, chopped
1 c. chopped tomatoes
1/2 c. chopped red onions
1/4 cup fresh parsley or cilantro
Directions:
In a medium bowl, stir together mayonnaise, sour cream, lemon juice, salt and hot pepper sauce until well blended. Toss lightly with remaining ingredients until evenly coated with dressing. Cover - chill to blend flavors.

question: What’s a quick recipe for an avocado toast with eggs?
answer:
Title: Quick Avocado Soup(Serves 4)
Ingredients:
1 can chilled chicken broth
1 avocado, peeled, pitted and diced
1/2 c. half and half
1/2 tsp. lemon juice to taste
1 Tbsp. dry sherry (optional)
1/4 tsp. each salt, pepper and dill weed
Directions:
In a blender or food processor, combine all ingredients. Blend to combine. Process until smooth.
Chill 1 hour or longer covered.
Serve sprinkled with chives.

question: What’s a quick recipe for an avocado toast with eggs?
answer:
Title: Scrambled Eggs Especial
Ingredients:
8 eggs
1 tsp. pepper
salt to taste
1/2 c. light cream
1 avocado, peeled and cubed (about 1 c.)
2 Tbsp. margarine
12 slices bacon, fried and crumbled
Directions:
Mix eggs,
pepper,
salt
and cream with fork.	Stir in avocado.
Heat
margarine
in
12-inch
Dutch oven over medium heat until just
hot
enough
to sizzle a drop of water.
Pour egg mixture into oven.	As egg mixture begins to set at bottom and side,
lift
cooked
portion
with spatula so the thin uncooked portion
can
flow to the bottom.
Avoid constant stirring.
Cook until eggs are thickened through but still moist. Sprinkle bacon on eggs.

question: What’s a quick recipe for an avocado toast with eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Egg Salad
Ingredients:
4 hard-cooked shelled eggs, diced
4 strips bacon, fried, drained and crumbled
1 Tbsp. minced onion
2 large avocados, halved and pitted
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise or salad dressing
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. bottled mustard or to taste
salt to taste
Directions:
Combine eggs, bacon and onion.
Cut and scoop avocado pulp and mash with a fork or large plate.
Stir in mayonnaise, lemon juice, prepared mustard and salt.
Add egg mixture; spoon into pretty glass cups.
Garnish with leaf of lettuce.

question: What’s a quick recipe for an avocado toast with eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Salza
Ingredients:
2 ripe California avocados, peeled and diced
1/2 c. canned corn (uncooked)
1 (2.2 oz.) can sliced black olives, drained
1/4 c. diced red pepper
2 Tbsp. toasted, slivered almonds, chopped
2 Tbsp. diced white onion
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. ground black pepper
1 tsp. oregano
3 Tbsp. extra virgin olive oil
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
Directions:
In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients, except avocado. Store in sealed container at room temperature for 6 to 8 hours. Before serving, add diced avocados.
Serve with chicken or your favorite grilled meat.
Makes 3 cups.

question: How do I make a simple chicken salad?
answer:
Title: Simple Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. cubed, cooked chicken
1 c. seedless white grapes
mayonnaise to taste
1/2 c. toasted almonds
Directions:
Combine the chicken with grapes; add mayonnaise.
Before serving, stir in 1/2 cup toasted almonds.

question: How do I make a simple chicken salad?
answer:
Title: Easy Chicken Salad(Number Of Servings: 2)
Ingredients:
1/4 c. finely chopped celery
2 Tbsp. sweet relish
1/2 tsp. Dijon mustard
black pepper to taste
1/4 c. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. finely minced onion
1/8 tsp. salt
2 c. cubed cooked chicken
salad greens (optional)
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except chicken and salad greens in large bowl. Mix well. Stir in chicken. Refrigerate at least 1 hour. Serve on salad greens.

question: How do I make a simple chicken salad?
answer:
Title: Chicken Salad With Fruit
Ingredients:
4 to 6 chicken breasts, cooked and chopped
3 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
2 stalks celery, finely chopped
1/4 c. sweet pickle relish
1/4 c. green olives, chopped
salt and pepper to taste
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 c. pecans or walnuts, chopped
3/4 c. seedless grapes, sliced
1 Golden Delicious apple, peeled, cored and diced
1 c. Miracle Whip or mayonnaise (more or less)
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine all ingredients, except dressing. Mix thoroughly. Add enough of the Miracle Whip or mayonnaise to properly moisten salad. May need more or less than 1 cup.

question: How do I make a simple chicken salad?
answer:
Title: Simple Potato Salad
Ingredients:
6 to 8 potatoes, diced
4 eggs, boiled
1 medium onion, chopped
3 fresh kosher pickles, chopped
salt to taste
pepper to taste
1/2 c. Miracle Whip fat-free
1 Tbsp. mustard
Directions:
Cook potatoes until done.
Drain and mash.
Add onion, pickle, mustard and Miracle Whip.
Chop 2 eggs.
Add to mix.
Mix well. Garnish with 2 eggs.

question: How do I make a simple chicken salad?
answer:
Title: Easy Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
3 c. chicken, cut into bite size pieces
1 c. mayonnaise or to taste
pinch of salt
1 c. celery pieces
1 c. raisins
1 c. cashews
Directions:
Combine the chicken, mayonnaise, pinch of salt and celery pieces.
Place in covered dish overnight or for several hours. Just before serving, add the raisins and cashews.
Good with melon wedges and croissants!

question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Taco Filling
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
8 oz. can tomato sauce
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 c. chopped onions
1 tsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. cumin
Directions:
Brown the ground beef and onions. Drain. Add other ingredients and simmer over low heat until most of the liquid is absorbed. Easily increased for more than 1 pound.

question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Taco Meat Filling
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 c. (8 oz.) tomato sauce
1 tsp. chili powder
3/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
Brown beef in skillet, stirring until crumbly; drain excess fat.
Stir in remaining ingredients; simmer, covered, for 10 minutes.
Makes filling for 8 taco shells.

question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Taco Filling
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. water
1 pkg. taco seasoning mix or use Taco Seasoning Mix recipe
1 can pinto, red, or chili beans, drained
1 can whole kernel corn, drained
Directions:
Brown ground beef in a medium skillet over medium-high heat. Drain excess grease.
Add water and taco seasoning mix and beans. Reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes, add corn stirring occasionally.

question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Taco Filling
Ingredients:
1 lb. pork, cut into small pieces
1 onion, diced
salt and pepper to taste
1 can tomato sauce
1/2 hot banana pepper
1 clove garlic
2 Tbsp. flour
Directions:
Brown pork with onion.
Add garlic, salt and pepper.
When browned well, mix in flour.
Add a little warm water, the can of tomato sauce and banana pepper.
Simmer until tender, about 1 hour.
Serve on warmed taco or burrito shell.
Garnish with chopped tomatoes, lettuce, additional hot sauce (if needed) and shredded cheese.

question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Picadillo (Filling For Tacos)
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. diced onion
2 or 3 cloves garlic, minced (if desired)
1 large tomato
1 or 2 potatoes, diced
1 or 2 carrots, diced
1/2 c. peas
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. fresh cilantro, chopped (available in Cub Foods produce)
1 or 2 jalapeno peppers, diced
Directions:
Cook ground beef until browned.
Drain off excess fat.
Add onion, garlic and peppers.
Cook until tender.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Cover and simmer for 20 to 25 minutes.
Serve as a filling in corn or flour tortillas that have been warmed on a grill or in the microwave.
Serve with hot sauce.
Especially good with frijoles (beans).

question: How do I make crispy baked pork chops?
answer:
Title: Crispy Pork Chops
Ingredients:
4 pork chops (1 inch thick)
3 Tbsp. olive oil
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. Dijon-style mustard
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. dry bread crumbs
1 Tbsp. wine vinegar
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried basil
1 tsp. dried thyme leaves
Directions:
Cut off excess fat from edges of chops.
Bread chops in the egg and crumbs, coating well.
Broil on a lightly greased rack about 8 inches away from heat for 10 minutes.

question: How do I make crispy baked pork chops?
answer:
Title: Oven Baked Pork Chops
Ingredients:
1/2 stick butter
1 c. coarse cracker crumbs
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 egg, beaten
2 Tbsp. milk or more
6 pork chops
Directions:
Combine crumbs, salt and pepper. In another bowl, blend egg and milk.
Coat chops with crumbs.
Dip in egg mixture and again in crumbs.
Place butter in pan.
Melt.
Place chops in a 13 x 9-inch pan and bake at 325° for 30 minutes.
Turn chops and bake 30 minutes more.

question: How do I make crispy baked pork chops?
answer:
Title: Delicious Crispies
Ingredients:
1 yeast cake
1/2 c. water
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. shortening
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. milk, scalded
5 to 6 c. flour
1 tsp. lemon flavoring
1/2 c. soft butter
1 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
1/2 c. sugar
Directions:
Soften yeast in warm water.
Add 1/2 cup sugar, shortening and salt to scalded milk.
Cool.
Add 2 cups flour and beat well.
Add eggs, yeast and lemon flavoring.
Beat well and add remaining flour.
Knead until smooth.
Place in greased bowl.
Cover and let rise until doubled (1 1/2 hours).

question: How do I make crispy baked pork chops?
answer:
Title: Baked Pork Chops
Ingredients:
6 large pork chops
garlic seasoning
black pepper
salt
1 onion, sliced
3 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. flour
4 sliced baking potatoes (leave skin on)
4 carrots
Directions:
Take Brown-in-Bag and shake flour in bag.
Place all meat, potatoes and carrots in bag.
Then take all seasonings and place on meat, potatoes and carrots.
Close bag; tie.
Slit 3 or 4 holes on top of bag.
Bake at 375° for 30 minutes.

question: How do I make crispy baked pork chops?
answer:
Title: Pecan Crispies
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
6 Tbsp. brown sugar
6 Tbsp. granulated sugar
1 egg
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 1/4 c. sifted all-purpose flour
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. salt
1 c. chopped pecans
Directions:
Cream
butter
and
sugar until light.
Beat in egg and vanilla.
Sift
together
dry ingredients.
Blend into creamed mixture.
Stir in nuts.
Drop from teaspoon onto cookie sheet. Bake at 375° about 10 minutes.
Makes 2 1/2 dozen.

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup With Spinach
Ingredients:
2 medium onions, sliced
1 clove garlic, chopped
2 Tbsp. olive oil
3 c. water or chicken stock
8 oz. dried lentils
1 tsp. salt
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen, chopped spinach
1 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Cook and stir onions and garlic in oil over medium heat until onions are tender. Stir in water, lentils and salt.
Heat to boiling. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer 1 hour.
Stir in spinach, lemon peel and lemon juice. Simmer about 5 more minutes. Serves 4.

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil-Spinach Stew
Ingredients:
1 c. dry lentils
1 medium onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
4 c. water
1 (7 1/2 oz.) can cut tomatoes
4 tsp. vegetable bouillon granules
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. salt and thyme
1/4 tsp. fennel seed and pepper
1 bay leaf
2 medium chopped carrots (1 c.)
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
1 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
Directions:
Rinse lentils; set aside.
In a large saucepan or Dutch oven cook onion and garlic until tender, not brown.
Stir in lentils, water, tomatoes, bouillon, Worcestershire sauce, salt, thyme, fennel seed, pepper and bay leaf.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
Add carrots and frozen spinach. Bring to a boil, breaking up spinach with a fork; reduce heat. Cover and simmer for about 10 minutes or until lentils are tender. Add vinegar; discard bay leaf.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup With Spinach
Ingredients:
1 c. sliced onions
2 Tbsp. olive or vegetable oil
1/2 lb. dry lentils
1 lb. frozen, chopped spinach
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
3 c. water
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 tsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Cook and stir onions and garlic in oil in 3-quart saucepan over medium heat until onions are tender.
Stir in water, lentils and salt.
Heat to boiling.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer 1 hour.
Stir in spinach, lemon peel and lemon juice.
Cover and simmer until spinach is tender, about 5 minutes.

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentils And Spinach
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. lentils (1 c.)
1 lb. spinach, chopped
1 onion
2 cloves garlic
1 tsp. coriander
1 tsp. turmeric
1 tsp. cumin seed
1/2 tsp. chili powder
lemon juice to taste
salt to taste
Directions:
Boil the lentils in 1 pint (2 cups) water until soft (about 25 minutes).
Fry sliced onion and chopped garlic; add spices.
Stir about 2 minutes.
Add cooked lentils and washed and coarsely chopped spinach.
Stir well.
Simmer 10 to 15 minutes.
Add salt and lemon juice.

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil Spinach Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. pkg. lentils
1 pkg. frozen spinach
1 small chopped onion
1 stalk celery, chopped
1 carrot, chopped
1 (16 oz.) can stewed tomatoes
8 c. water
1 bouillon cube
2 Tbsp. vinegar
freshly ground pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a large soup pot or crock-pot. Cook on low for 6 hours.
If using a crock-pot, set crock-pot to high and cook 6 hours.
Add ground pepper to taste.
Can also add two chopped Italian sausages to ingredients for different flavor before cooking.

question: What can I make with cabbage and carrots?
answer:
Title: Good Carrots
Ingredients:
12 carrots, peeled and sliced
1/4 c. butter
1 small onion, minced
1/4 tsp. dry mustard
2 c. milk
1/4 tsp. celery salt
3 c. buttered bread crumbs or Pepperidge Farm stuffing
1/4 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 lb. Cheddar cheese slices
Directions:
Cook carrots.
Saute onion in butter.
Stir in flour, salt, dry mustard and milk.
Add pepper and celery salt.
In 2-quart casserole, arrange layers of carrots and cheese, ending with carrots.
Pour on sauce.
Top with crumbs.
Bake 20 minutes or until hot throughout.

question: What can I make with cabbage and carrots?
answer:
Title: Corned Beef And Cabbage
Ingredients:
corned beef
cabbage
potato
carrot
Directions:
Boil all ingredients together until cooked and serve.

question: What can I make with cabbage and carrots?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Cabbage
Ingredients:
1 large head cabbage
1 lb. ground chuck
1/2 c. raw regular rice
1 grated small onion
2 eggs
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 sliced large onion
2 (8 oz.) cans tomato sauce
2 (No. 2 1/2) cans tomatoes (7 c.)
1 (16 oz.) can sauerkraut
1/2 c. brown sugar
Directions:
Remove 12 large leaves from cabbage.
Trim off thick part of each leaf.
Let boiling water stand on leaves a few minutes, so they become easy to roll.
Heat oven to 375°.

question: What can I make with cabbage and carrots?
answer:
Title: Relish
Ingredients:
2 medium cabbages
8 carrots
8 red peppers
8 green peppers
12 medium onions
3 pt. white vinegar
6 c. sugar
1 tsp. mustard seed and celery seed
Directions:
Grind first 5 ingredients in blender. Add 1/2 cup salt. Let stand for 2 hours. Drain dry or squeeze out. Add vinegar, sugar, mustard seed and celery seed. Mix well; pack into jars and seal. Makes 10 pints.

question: What can I make with cabbage and carrots?
answer:
Title: Chinese-Style Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. water
3 c. finely shredded cabbage
1 c. thin diagonal sliced celery
2/3 c. chopped onion
1 medium green pepper, cut in thin slices
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
In medium skillet, mix water and vegetables.
Cover; steam until crisp-tender (about 5 minutes).
Stir several times.
Season with salt and pepper; stir in soy sauce.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: Great Grandma'S Recipe For Soft Molasses Cookies
Ingredients:
4 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 1/4 c. hot water
1 tsp. lemon extract
2 eggs
3/4 c. shortening
2 c. brown sugar, packed
3/4 c. molasses
Directions:
Sift together dry ingredients.
In separate bowl, combine shortening, sugar, extract, molasses and eggs.
Add dry ingredients.
Add hot water last.
Drop by teaspoons on greased cookie sheet.
Bake in preheated 350° oven for 8 to 10 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: Soft Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
1/2 c. buttered Crisco
1 c. sugar
1 egg
1/2 c. buttermilk or sour milk
1 tsp. vanilla
2 c. sifted flour
1/2 tsp. soda
1 tsp. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Mix
shortening and sugar;
beat well.	Add vanilla and lemon juice.
Add
egg
and beat until light. Add flour, soda and
salt; alternate	with buttermilk.
Drop by tablespoonful and sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon.
Top with raisins.
Bake at 350° for 10 minutes or until lightly brown.

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: Soft Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. sugar
3/4 tsp. salt
2 eggs
2 Tbsp. hot water
4 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 c. butter, softened
4 egg yolks
1 tsp. baking soda
1 c. sour cream
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Cream sugar, butter, salt, yolks and whole eggs.
Dissolve soda in hot water.
Add with sour cream to butter mixture.
Sift flour, baking powder, nutmeg and vanilla and add to egg mixture. Dough will be sticky.
Cover and chill several hours or overnight. Roll on well-floured surface.
Cut and bake on cookie sheet at 350° for 8 to 10 minutes or until cookies are set, but not browned.

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: Big Soft Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
1 c. vegetable shortening or oleo
3 eggs
1 c. buttermilk
4 c. flour
2 tsp. baking powder
2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Cream sugar and shortening.
Add rest of ingredients as any other recipe.
Drop a teaspoon of dough on cookie sheet.
Flatten with a small jar or object dipped in milk and then in a mixture of 2 tablespoons sugar and 1 tablespoon flour.
Bake 10 to 12 minutes at 350°.

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: Soft Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
3 1/4 c. sifted flour
1 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1 c. sugar
1 egg (unbeaten)
1 1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 c. thick sour cream
Directions:
Mix together flour, soda and salt. Combine butter, egg, sugar and flavoring. Add sour cream and half of flour. Blend. Add remaining flour. Roll to 1/4-inch thickness on lightly floured surface. Cut. Place on greased cookie sheet. Bake at 400° for 8 to 10 minutes.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
4 large bell peppers (any color)
1 tsp. olive oil
2 medium tomatoes, chopped
1 medium squash, diced (yellow)
1 medium zucchini, diced
1/2 c. onion, diced
2 medium cloves garlic, minced
2 c. cooked brown rice
1/2 c. fat-free Cheddar cheese, grated
1 c. tomato juice (no salt added)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°. Cut peppers in half lengthwise. Remove stems, rubs and seeds. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat, swirling to cover bottom. Saut crookneck squash, zucchini, onion and garlic until zucchini is tender-crisp (about 4 minutes). Don't overcook. In a medium bowl, combine rice and cheese. Gently stir into skillet. Stuff pepper halves with vegetable mixture. Place in a 9-inch casserole dish. Carefully pour tomato sauce around peppers. Bake, uncovered, for 30 minutes. Serves 8.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
2 lb. hamburger meat
2 to 3 green onions
1/2 regular onion
2 chopped tomatoes
parsley, salt and pepper to taste
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
2 tsp. garlic
2 to 3 c. cooked, seasoned rice
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 c. tomato sauce
1/2 c. white cooking wine
1/2 c. water or chicken stock
Directions:
Bake at 350° for 45 to 60 minutes.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
18 small bell peppers
3/4 c. cooked rice
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. chopped bell peppers
1/3 c. chopped onion
1/4 tsp. ground red peppers
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cut thin slice from top of each green pepper; remove stems and seeds.
In saucepan over medium heat, in 1-inch boiling water, heat peppers to boiling.
Reduce heat to low.
Cover; simmer 5 minutes or until peppers are tender to crisp.
Drain.
In shallow baking dish, arrange peppers.
Meanwhile, in a skillet, brown meat and cook with chopped peppers and onions until tender.
Add remaining ingredients and mix well.
Spoon mixture into green peppers.
Bake at 350° for 40 minutes.
After the first 10 minutes of baking, baste with tomato basting sauce.
Baste after every 10 minutes of baking.
Serves 18.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
1 lb. hamburger meat
1 small onion, chopped
6 green peppers
1/2 c. uncooked rice
tomatoes
tomato sauce
1/4 c. water
salt, pepper, oregano, basil, parsley and onion salt
cheese
Directions:
Place a little oil in skillet. Brown meat with onion; drain. Add salt, pepper and other seasonings
(use the seasonings you like). Add rice, tomatoes, sauce and water; cook on low heat for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally. Wash and cut off tops of peppers. Take out seeds. Put in pan and cover with water and bring to a boil. When a knife goes through peppers and they are tender, remove from water and set aside. Put mixture in peppers. (Peppers can be left whole and cut in half.) Sprinkle cheese on top to melt (whatever kind you like).
These can be put in freezer for later when you need something fast. Serve with mashed potatoes and vegetable.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
6 large bell peppers
2 c. cooked rice
1 lb. ground meat
1 can tomatoes and green chilies
1/2 can cream of chicken soup
1/2 can cream of mushroom soup
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cut tops off and center out of peppers.
Put peppers in boiling water; cook until tender.
Saute meat and pepper tops with salt.
Drain off excess oil.
Mix well the meat, rice, 1/2 of liquid from tomatoes and soups.
If you want it hotter, add rest of tomato juice.
Place peppers in pan and stuff with mixture. Bake at 350° for 20 minutes, or until bubbling hot.

question: How do I make a simple peanut butter sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut-Sesame Noodles
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. linguine or thin spaghetti
3 garlic cloves
1 1/2 tsp. minced peeled ginger root
7 Tbsp. low sodium soy sauce
6 Tbsp. peanut butter
1/4 c. rice wine vinegar
1/4 c. honey
1 tsp. dark sesame oil
1/2 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 c. broccoli florets, blanched until tender-crisp
1 c. sliced Napa cabbage
1/2 c. carrots, diagonally sliced
1/2 c. bean sprouts
Directions:
Cook linguine according to package directions until al dente; rinse in cold water and drain well.
In food processor or blender, combine garlic, ginger, soy sauce, peanut butter, vinegar, honey, sesame oil and hot pepper sauce; process until blended.
Add water to reach desired consistency (1/2 to 3/4 cup), processing until smooth.
To serve, toss cooked linguine with vegetables and sauce. Yield:
6 servings.

question: How do I make a simple peanut butter sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Simple Peanut Butter Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. peanut butter
1 c. sugar
3 egg whites
Directions:
Separate egg whites; beat with mixer on medium for 2 minutes. Slowly add sugar.
Beat on high until soft peaks form.
Mix peanut butter into mixture by hand.
Drop spoonful of mix onto ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake 7 to 10 minutes or until golden brown. Cookies will be soft.
Let cool, then enjoy.

question: How do I make a simple peanut butter sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut Sauce For Pasta
Ingredients:
1/4 c. creamy peanut butter
2 Tbsp. hot water
1 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. salad oil
1/2 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 (8 oz.) pkg. pasta
Directions:
In medium bowl with wire whisk or fork, beat peanut butter with water until smooth.
Stir in vinegar and next 4 ingredients until blended.
Add cooked and drained pasta; toss gently to coat well. Serve immediately.

question: How do I make a simple peanut butter sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Simple Pudding Sauce
Ingredients:
2/3 c. brown sugar
1/3 c. white sugar
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
2/3 c. water
2 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. vanilla
cream
Directions:
Combine sugar, cornstarch, butter and water.
Stir and cook to the boiling point.
Cool slightly; add vanilla.
The sauce may be thinned with cream.

question: How do I make a simple peanut butter sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Olan'S So-Simple Peanut Butter Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. peanut butter (plain or crunchy)
1 c. granulated sugar
1 egg
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Beat egg well; add peanut butter, sugar and vanilla; mix well and drop by teaspoonfuls on ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake at 350° for 20 to 30 minutes.
Mmmm-good!

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken sausage?
answer:
Title: Homemade Sausage Recipe
Ingredients:
8 lb. ground pork
5 Tbsp. salt
2 tsp. cayenne pepper (1 tsp. for mild)
3 Tbsp. black pepper
4 Tbsp. sage
Directions:
Mix and package or freeze.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken sausage?
answer:
Title: Spanish-Style Chicken And Sausage
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 lb. sweet or spicy Italian sausage or chorizo, cut into 1/2-inch slices
1 whole chicken breast, boned, skinned and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 medium onion, chopped
1 medium green pepper, chopped
2 chicken bouillon cubes
1 2/3 c. hot water
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. ground thyme
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 c. frozen green peas
1 1/2 c. instant rice
2 medium tomatoes, diced
Directions:
Heat oil in a large skillet; add sausage and brown well, about 5 minutes.
Drain fat.
Add chicken, onion and green pepper and cook 5 minutes longer.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken sausage?
answer:
Title: Homemade Summer Sausage
Ingredients:
3 lb. hamburger
1 lb. sausage or chicken, ground
2 tsp. liquid smoke
4 Tbsp. Morton curing salt (Tender Quick)
1 tsp. garlic salt
2 Tbsp. mustard seed
1 1/2 c. cold water
Directions:
Mix all together.
Cover and store in refrigerator for 24 hours. Make into four loaves. Wrap in aluminum foil, leaving ends open. Poke holes in bottom of foil. Place loaves on cookie sheet. Bake 1 hour and 45 minutes at 350°. Slice thin.
Serve with crackers. Keep in refrigerator.
Keeps 4 to 6 weeks.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken sausage?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Sausage
Ingredients:
1 lb. sweet Italian sausage
3 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. freshly ground pepper
1/2 tsp. paprika
1 (3 lb.) chicken, cut up
1/4 c. oil
1 medium onion, sliced
1/2 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 (16 oz.) can whole or crushed tomatoes with their juices
1/4 tsp. caraway seed
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas
Directions:
Pierce sausage with a fork several times.
Place sausage in a small frying pan; cook over low heat for about 20 minutes to render fat.
Drain on paper towels.
Slice into 1-inch chunks. Place flour, pepper and paprika in a plastic bag.
Add chicken pieces, a few at a time; shake to coat.
Reserve flour mixture. In a Dutch oven, heat oil over medium heat.
Add chicken; cook until brown, 5 minutes a side.
Remove and drain on paper towels. Add onion and mushrooms; cook until tender.
Stir in the remaining seasoned flour.
Return chicken to the pan.
Add 1/2 cup water, the tomatoes with their juices and caraway seed.
Cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
Stir in sausage and peas to cook 10 minutes longer, or until heated through.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken sausage?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pan Sausage
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean fresh pork, beef or turkey
2 Tbsp. ground sage
2 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. flaked basil (optional)
1 1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 tsp. red pepper
Directions:
Have butcher grind pork roast, chuck roast or turkey of choice.
Mix all ingredients well.
Make patties using two tablespoons of meat mixture.
Fry or broil until done.

question: How do I make crispy roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Better Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
3 to 3 1/2 lb. sprouts
2 1/2 Tbsp. butter
2 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
8 cloves coarsely chopped garlic
1 c. chicken broth
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
freshly squeezed lemon
Directions:
Cut off stems from sprouts and remove outer yellow layer.
Cut small x in bottom of each.
Rinse in cold water; drain and pat dry.

question: How do I make crispy roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts Supreme
Ingredients:
1 pound fresh Brussels sprouts, trimmed
1 cup chopped celery
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 cup milk
1/2 cup shredded process American cheese
1/4 tsp. salt
pinch cayenne pepper, optional
Directions:
Place Brussels sprouts, celery, and a small amount of water in a saucepan; cover and cook for 8 minutes or until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in another saucepan, melt butter.
Stir flour until smooth.
Gradually add milk; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.
Add cheese, salt, and cayenne if desired; stir until cheese is melted.
Drain sprouts and celery; top with cheese sauce.
Yield:
4-6 servings.

question: How do I make crispy roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Better Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
3 to 3 1/2 lb. Brussels sprouts
2 1/2 Tbsp. butter
2 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
8 cloves garlic
1 c. chicken broth
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Cut off stem and "X" bottom of each sprout.
Over low heat, melt the butter with olive oil in a large pot.
Add garlic; cook 2 to 3 minutes.
Add sprouts; toss with butter mixture.
Add chicken broth, salt and pepper.
Cover; cook for 10 to 15 minutes over low.
Do not overcook.
Drain; return to pot.
Before serving, toss with melted butter and parsley.

question: How do I make crispy roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts (Any Vegetable) Soup
Ingredients:
1 small potato
1 medium onion
2 Tbsp. oleo
1 lb. sprouts (veggie)
3 c. chicken broth
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 egg
1/4 c. milk
Directions:
Saute onion and tater until tender.
Add sprouts, broth, salt and pepper.
Boil until tender.
Puree in food processor.
Return to pan.
Mix egg with milk with fork.
Stir into soup.
Cook and stir until hot.
Do not boil.

question: How do I make crispy roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts With Cream And Garlic
Ingredients:
3 pounds Brussels sprouts, trimmed and cross cut in base
1/4 cup unsalted butter
2 medium garlic cloves, minced
1 cup whipping cream
1 tsp. salt
Freshly ground pepper
Directions:
Cook Brussels sprouts in large pot of boiling salted water until crisp-tender, about 10 minutes.
Drain, rinse under cold water and drain again.
(Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated.)
Melt butter in heavy large skillet over medium heat.
Add garlic and cook until soft, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes.
Do not brown.
Add Brussels sprouts, cream, salt and pepper and cook until cream thickens enough to coat Brussels sprouts, stirring occasionally, about 15 minutes.
Serve hot. Yield:
8 to 10 servings.

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?
answer:
Title: Homemade Soft Pretzels
Ingredients:
1 pkg. active dry yeast
1/8 c. hot tap water
1/3 c. brown sugar
1 1/3 c. warm water
approximately 5 c. flour
baking soda
Kosher salt
Directions:
In a large bowl place 1/8 cup hot water from tap.
Add yeast and stir until dissolved.
Add warm water and brown sugar.
Stir until dissolved.
Add flour until dough does not stick to sides of bowl.
Place dough on a floured surface and knead until smooth. Pinch off dough the size of a golf ball and roll into a rope approximately 10 inches long.
Form into shape of pretzel and place on a floured surface.
Prepare cookie sheets sprayed with Pam. Fill frying pan with water.
For every cup of water add 1 tablespoon of baking soda.
Bring water to a slow boil.
Place pretzels into slowly boiling water for approximately 30 seconds. Place pretzels on cookie sheet and salt with Kosher salt.
Bake at 475° just until golden brown.
Pretzels are best if eaten right away.
They can be frozen after the frying pan step and baked from frozen at a later date.

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?
answer:
Title: Homemade Soft Pretzels
Ingredients:
1 pkg. active dry yeast
1 1/3 c. warm water (105~ to 115~)
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
3 1/2 to 4 c. unsifted all-purpose flour
1 egg
1 Tbsp. water
2 Tbsp. coarse salt
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
Grease 2 large baking sheets.
In a large bowl, sprinkle yeast over warm water.
Stir with rubber spatula until well blended and yeast is dissolved.
Water temperature should be between 105° and 115°.
If water is too hot, will kill yeast.
With a wooden spoon, gradually stir in sugar, salt and enough flour (about 3 1/2 cups) until a soft and slightly sticky dough forms.

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?
answer:
Title: Homemade Soft Pretzels
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. warm water
1 pkg. yeast
3/4 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. salt
4 c. flour
1 egg
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in water.
Add sugar and salt.
Gradually add flour. Roll dough into long rolls and shape pretzels.
Beat egg and brush on top. Sprinkle on salt. Bake at 350° for 15 to 20 minutes.

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?
answer:
Title: Soft Pretzels
Ingredients:
1 c. warm water
2 pkg. dry yeast
2 Tbsp. sugar
3 c. flour
2 tsp. baking soda
1 egg
coarse salt
Directions:
Mix yeast and water;
then
add sugar and flour.
Knead on floured surface and let raise in warm space for 30 minutes. Heat oven to 400°.
Fill
pot
1/2
full
of water; add baking soda and bring to
a
boil.
Roll dough to 1/2-inch thickness; cut and twist into pretzel shapes.
Place on slotted spoon and lower
into boiling water
for
5
to
10
seconds.
Place
on greased cookie sheet.
Brush with beaten egg and sprinkle with salt.
Bake 12 to 15 minutes.

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?
answer:
Title: Soft Pretzels(Easy Enough For Children To Make)
Ingredients:
