1 pkg. dry yeast
1 1/2 c. warm water
1 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
4 c. all-purpose flour
1 egg, beaten
1 tsp. water
kosher salt, sesame seed or poppy seed
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in warm water; let stand 5 minutes.
Combine next three ingredients; add to yeast mixture, mixing well.
Turn dough out onto a floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic (about 8 minutes).
Divide into 16 portions; roll each into an 8 to 10-inch rope.
Twist each into pretzel shapes, letters or curlicues; place on ungreased baking sheets.
Combine egg with water; stir well.
Brush pretzels with egg mixture; sprinkle with kosher salt or seed.
Bake at 425° for 12 to 13 minutes or until golden brown.
Yields 16 pretzels.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and ground beef?
answer:
Title: Eggplant From The Border
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
4 slices bacon, chopped
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1 clove garlic, minced
1 medium eggplant, peeled and cut into chunks
1 can tomato sauce
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
Brown ground beef.
Drain and set aside.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and ground beef?
answer:
Title: Baked Eggplant
Ingredients:
1 eggplant
1/2 lb. ground beef
1/4 stick margarine
1 onion, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
2 c. Italian rice, cooked
1/3 c. seasoned bread crumbs
salt and pepper to taste
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. parsley
1/3 lb. grated Romano cheese
Directions:
Peel eggplant and cut into cubes.
Cook in boiling salt water. Drain well.
Mash eggplant down with a fork.
Brown ground beef in butter with spices, onion and green pepper.
Stir in eggplant and cooked rice.
Spoon into lightly greased Pyrex casserole. Sprinkle with bread crumbs and grated Romano cheese.
Cover and bake at 375° for 20 minutes.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and ground beef?
answer:
Title: Beef Eggplant Bake
Ingredients:
2 lb. beef for stew
1/4 c. flour
2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. cooking fat
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
1/4 c. water
2 medium onions, sliced
1 tsp. dill seed
1 large eggplant (approximately 1 1/2 lb.)
2 c. boiling water
1 tsp. salt
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1/4 c. dry bread crumbs
1/4 c. grated Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
Cut beef cubes in 1/2-inch strips across the grain.
Combine flour, 2 teaspoons salt and pepper. Dredge meat and brown in hot fat in large frying pan, 1/3 at a time.
Drain tomatoes, reserving liquid.
Break tomatoes into pieces and set aside.
Add reserved tomato liquid, water, onions and dill seed.
Cover and cook slowly 1 hour and 15 minutes or until tender.
Add tomatoes and cook 5 minutes.
Cut eggplant into 1/2-inch slices.
Pare and place in large saucepan with boiling water and salt.
Boil 5 to 10 minutes, turning occasionally.
Remove to absorbent paper and pat dry. Combine Parmesan cheese and bread crumbs.
Sprinkle half the crumb mixture in bottom of a 2 1/2-quart casserole.
Place eggplant in layers in casserole and sprinkle with remaining crumbs.
Add meat mixture and top with Mozzarella cheese.
Cover and bake in moderate 350° oven for 15 to 20 minutes or until eggplant is done. Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and ground beef?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Casserole
Ingredients:
1 large eggplant
1 lb. ground beef
1 large onion, diced
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 bell pepper, chopped
1 c. fresh mushrooms, sliced
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1 Tbsp. oregano
1 Tbsp. Parmesan, grated
1/2 c. water
2 1/2 c. Mozzarella cheese, grated
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
In a saucepan, mix water, tomato paste, onion, garlic, bell pepper, mushrooms and oregano.
Cook about 30 minutes over low heat, stirring occasionally.
Peel eggplant; slice lengthwise.
Brown and drain ground meat.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and ground beef?
answer:
Title: Eggplant And Beef Casserole
Ingredients:
1 large eggplant
1/2 c. oil
1/4 c. minced onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1/2 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. bread crumbs
2 c. canned tomatoes
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 c. sharp grated cheese
Directions:
Saute eggplant (peeled and diced) in oil with onion, green pepper and ground beef for 10 minutes.
Add tomatoes, salt, pepper and sugar and cook 10 minutes longer.
Pour into buttered 2-quart casserole.
Cover with cheese and bread crumbs.
Bake at 400° for 20 minutes.
Serves 8 to 10 people.

question: What can I cook with zucchini and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Baked Zucchini
Ingredients:
2 medium zucchini, sliced thin
2 Tbsp. oil
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1 green pepper, chopped
1 Tbsp. parsley
1 tsp. basil
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
pepper to taste
8 oz. tomato sauce
Directions:
Simmer all ingredients together for 1/2 hour.
Layer in casserole dish with shredded Mozzarella cheese and cooked bacon (any amount).
Bake at 350° until cheese melts, approximately 15 minutes.

question: What can I cook with zucchini and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Zucchini And Tomato Bake
Ingredients:
4 medium zucchini, sliced
1 tsp. soy sauce
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 medium tomatoes, cut in wedges
1 medium onion, sliced
1 1/2 c. (6 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese
3 Tbsp. margarine
Directions:
Place zucchini in a 2 1/2-quart casserole.
Sprinkle with 1/2 each of soy sauce, garlic salt, salt and pepper.
Layer tomatoes and onion over zucchini; sprinkle with remaining seasonings.
Top with cheese; dot with margarine.
Cover and bake at 350° for 40 minutes.
Yields 8 to 10 servings.

question: What can I cook with zucchini and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Rolls With Tomato Sauce
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. olive oil
2 cloves garlic
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 lb. plum tomatoes, seeded and chopped
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. sugar
3 medium zucchini
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/4 lb. very thin ham
basil
Directions:
In large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons olive oil over medium-low.
Add whole garlic cloves and cook until golden brown and soft (10 minutes).
Remove garlic.
Mash and set aside.
Add onion and saute.
Add tomatoes, salt and sugar.
Partially cover and cook until chunky sauce forms.
Remove from heat.
Add mashed garlic.

question: What can I cook with zucchini and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Baked Zucchini With Tomatoes
Ingredients:
6 c. sliced zucchini
1 large onion, chopped
6 cloves garlic, minced
1 (No. 2) can tomatoes, drained and chopped
salt and pepper to taste
1 c. chopped parsley
1 tsp. oregano
2/3 c. olive oil
Directions:
Combine zucchini, onion, garlic, tomatoes, salt, pepper, parsley and oregano.
Place in casserole and pour olive oil over top.
Bake at 400° for 50 minutes.

question: What can I cook with zucchini and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Zucchini And Tomato Bake
Ingredients:
4 medium zucchini, sliced
1/2 tsp. soy sauce
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. butter
2 medium tomatoes, cut into wedges
1 medium onion, sliced
1 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Place zucchini in a 2 1/2-quart casserole.
Sprinkle with 1/2 each:
soy sauce, salt, garlic salt, and pepper.
Layer tomatoes and onion over zucchini.
Sprinkle with remaining seasoning.
Top with cheese and dot with butter.
Cover and bake at 350° for 40 minutes.
Serves 8 to 10.

question: How do I make a creamy roasted garlic hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus(Chickpea Spread)
Ingredients:
2 cloves garlic
2 c. cooked, drained chickpeas or canned
4 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
3 to 5 Tbsp. tahini sauce*
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. cumin
2 Tbsp. olive oil
Directions:
Start your food processor and then put in garlic.
As soon as garlic is minced, put in chickpeas, lemon juice, salt, tahini and cold water.
Blend until smooth.
Add more cold water if you want it thinner.
Empty contents into a shallow 6-inch wide bowl. Smooth contents.
Sprinkle with paprika and cumin, then drizzle oil over it.
Best served at room temperature.
Dip with pita bread.

question: How do I make a creamy roasted garlic hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
2/3 c. white sesame seed
3/4 oz. garlic
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/4 c. lemon juice
19 oz. can garbanzo beans
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. cumin
1 tsp. sugar
water (as needed)
pinch of cayenne (as needed)
1/2 c. chopped fresh parsley (as needed)
Directions:
Process sesame seed several minutes until consistency of coarse peanut butter.
Add garlic cloves, their oil and lemon juice. Blend, then add drained garbanzos.
Add salt, cumin and sugar, then process until smooth.
Add very little water for sandwich spread, a bit more for dip.
Add a dash of cayenne pepper, if you like heat. Before serving, add chopped parsley for color and flavor.

question: How do I make a creamy roasted garlic hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
2 cloves garlic
1 (15 oz.) can garbanzos (chickpeas)
1/2 c. tahini paste
3 to 4 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 to 4 Tbsp. water
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
pinch of coriander
salt to taste
pita bread, warmed and cut into triangles
Directions:
Mince garlic in food processor.
Add garbanzos, tahini, lemon juice, water, olive oil, salt and cumin.
Blend until smooth.
Add lemon juice or water if too thick.
Transfer to serving dish and garnish with olives, chopped red onion and chopped tomato.
Use pita triangles for dipping.

question: How do I make a creamy roasted garlic hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
1 2/3 c. (15 oz. can) cooked chickpeas, drained, reserve liquid
1/4 c. tahini (sesame paste)
1/4 c. lemon juice
3 large cloves garlic, crushed
1/2 tsp. ground coriander
1/4 tsp. cumin
1/4 tsp. paprika
water if needed
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
1/4 c. scallions
dash of cayenne
Directions:
In blender (in batches) or in food processor, process chickpeas, tahini and lemon juice until mixture reaches consistency of coarse paste; use as much of reserved pea liquid or water as needed.
Add garlic, coriander, cumin, paprika and cayenne and process again.
Transfer to a bowl and add scallions. Cover and chill one hour before serving the dip.
Add parsley as garnish.

question: How do I make a creamy roasted garlic hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
1 pkg. dried chickpeas
3 Tbsp. garlic, crushed
1 Tbsp. tahini (look at Greek market)
3 Tbsp. olive oil
salt to taste
juice of 6 lemons
1/2 c. olive oil
Directions:
Cook the chickpeas with salt for 20 minutes in the pressure cooker (or until peas are soft).
Drain chickpeas.
Combine with other ingredients in blender.
Blend until creamy.

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Banana Bread
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 c. sugar
2 eggs
2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 c. chocolate chips
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
2 to 3 ripe bananas, mashed
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
Directions:
Cream butter.
Gradually add sugar, medium speed.
Add eggs, one at a time.
Beat after each egg.
Stir in bananas, vanilla and cinnamon.
Combine flour and next 3 ingredients.
Gradually add to creamed mixture.
Beat until blended.
Stir in chips and walnuts. Spoon batter into loaf pan (greased).
Bake at 350° for 1 hour and 10 minutes.
Shield with foil after 1 hour.
Test with toothpick until comes out clean.
Cool in pan 10 minutes.
Remove from pan; cool completely.
Yields 1 loaf.

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Banana Bread
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 c. sugar
1 beaten egg
3 large bananas
1 1/2 c. sifted flour
3/4 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking powder
1 c. chocolate chips
Directions:
Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Stir in the other ingredients.
Put in greased and floured 8 x 4 x 4-inch pan. Bake at 350° for 50 to 60 minutes.

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?
answer:
Title: Banana Chocolate Chip Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
1 egg
1/2 c. butter (1 stick)
3 Tbsp. milk
1 c. mashed bananas
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 c. chocolate chips
1/2 c. chopped nuts
2 c. sifted flour
Directions:
Cream sugar, butter and egg together in large mixing bowl. Beat until fluffy.
Set aside.
Combine bananas and milk in small bowl.
Set aside.
Sift flour, baking powder and soda together. Stir by hand all ingredients, including chips and nuts.
Pour batter into greased 9 x 5 x 3-inch pan.
Bake 1 hour at 350° or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
Cool in pan for 10 minutes.
Remove from pan.
Cool on rack.

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip-Banana Bread
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter, softened
1 c. sugar
2 eggs
2 ripe bananas, mashed
2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 c. semi-sweet chocolate mini chips
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
Cream butter; gradually add sugar, beating well at medium speed of an electric mixer.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating after each addition.
Stir in bananas.
Combine flour and next 3 ingredients; gradually add to creamed mixture until blended.
Stir in many marvels and walnuts.
Spoon batter into a greased 9 x 5 x 3-inch loaf pan.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour and 10 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
Cool in pan 10 minutes; remove from pan.
Cool completely.

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Banana Bread
Ingredients:
1 stick butter
3/4 c. brown sugar
2 eggs
1 c. unbleached white flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. whole-wheat flour
3 large ripe bananas
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 bag chocolate chips
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°. Grease 9 x 5 x 3-inch bread pan. Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Combine white flour, baking soda and salt. Stir in wheat flour.
Fold in bananas, vanilla and chocolate chips. Pour mixture into pan. Bake 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean. Makes 1 loaf.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Potatoes(Preparation: 10 Minutes. Baking: 25 Minutes.  Servings: 4.)
Ingredients:
1 to 2 large cloves garlic, peeled and chopped
4 Tbsp. butter
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 lb. small potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/8 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
Place garlic, butter and water in small saucepan; simmer until water evaporates and garlic is tender. Strain butter; mash soft garlic through very fine strainer.
Toss potatoes in garlic butter; place in single layer in large baking dish.
Bake for 25 minutes, turning potatoes occasionally, until they are tender and browned.
Remove potatoes from baking dish with slotted spoon.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Oven Roasted Garlic Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 lb. red potatoes (3 to 4)
6 large garlic cloves, unpeeled and flattened
2 Tbsp. olive oil (any oil will do)
1 Tbsp. fresh rosemary or 1 tsp. dried rosemary, crumbled
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. coarsely ground black pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
Cut potatoes in half lengthwise and then into 3 wedges per half.
Combine all ingredients in bowl; mix well.
Bake in shallow baking pan for 30 to 35 minutes or until potatoes are light brown and tender, turning occasionally.
Serve potatoes hot.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted New Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. whole tiny new potatoes (20 to 24)
2 Tbsp. margarine, melted
2 Tbsp. water
2 cloves garlic, minced, or 1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place peeled potatoes in a greased 9 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish. Combine the margarine, water, garlic, salt and pepper.
Drizzle over potatoes.
Toss to coat.
Bake, covered, at 375° for 30 to 35 minutes, stirring once.
Uncover; bake 20 minutes more or until the potatoes are tender and slightly browned.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 to 4 potatoes, peeled
olive oil
1 clove garlic per person, peeled and chopped
1/2 tsp. rosemary per person
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Boil potatoes for 5 minutes.
Drain and pat dry.
Slice.
In a pan large enough to hold the potatoes in one layer, add enough olive oil to coat the bottom generously.
Add potatoes and garlic and toss to coat.
Add rosemary, salt and pepper.
Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes, turning occasionally, until golden brown.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Roasted Potatoes With Garlic And Rosemary(Makes About 3 Cups)
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
4 to 5 cloves garlic, smashed
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh rosemary
2 lb. Yukon gold and/or red skinned potatoes (unpeeled), cut into large chunks
coarse sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450° with rack in lower third.
Bring 6 quarts salted water to a boil in a large saucepan.
Heat oil, garlic and rosemary on a large baking sheet (with sides) on stove top over medium-low heat.
Do not allow garlic to brown.
To heat oil, place the pan directly on the stove top.

question: I need a recipe for roasted chicken thighs.
answer:
Title: Roasted Turkey Thighs With Autumn Vegetables
Ingredients:
2 (1 1/4 lb.) pkg. Turkey Selects turkey thighs
8 small new red potatoes, quartered
4 medium carrots, diagonally sliced 1/2-inch
1 large onion, coarsely chopped
1 (8 oz.) pkg. fresh mushrooms, quartered
4 cloves garlic, minced
5 slices bacon, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
3 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can chicken broth
1 c. dry red wine
1 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. thyme leaves
1 c. chopped fresh parsley
1 1/2 lb. beef chuck roast, coarsely ground
1 1/2 lb. pork shoulder, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 large onion, chopped
3 large garlic cloves, minced
3 c. beer or water
1 c. Special Tomatoes
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1/2 c. chili powder
1 Tbsp. salt
1 Tbsp. cumin
1 1/2 tsp. paprika
2 Tbsp. instant masa mix, combined with 3 Tbsp. warm water
1 (4 to 5 lb.) duckling
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
1/4 tsp. white pepper
1/8 tsp. ground cloves
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
5 green onions
1 Tbsp. honey
orange slices (optional)
fresh parsley or coriander (cilantro or Chinese parsley)
1/2 c. canned plum sauce
quick thousand layer buns
Directions:
Rinse duck inside and out and pat dry; cut off tail and discard.
Reserve giblets for other uses.
Mix together ginger, cinnamon, nutmeg, pepper and cloves.
Sprinkle 1/2 teaspoon of spice mixture inside duck.
Stir 1 tablespoon of the soy into remaining spice mixture, then rub evenly over exterior of bird. Cut one of the green onions in half and tuck inside cavity of duck.
Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours or until next day.

question: I need a recipe for roasted chicken thighs.
answer:
Title: Roast Chicken Legs Or Wings
Ingredients:
30 chicken wings, cut into 3 pieces (I use leg parts)
3/4 c. butter
1 c. brown sugar
1 c. soy sauce
1 tsp. dry mustard
3/4 c. water
1 tsp. crushed hot red pepper
1/4 tsp. Chinese five-season powder
Directions:
Mix all ingredients, except chicken, in saucepan and cook until slightly thickened on top of stove.
Place chicken in roasting pan and baste with sauce.
Roast, uncovered, at 350° for 2 hours, basting and turning occasionally.

question: I need a recipe for roasted chicken thighs.
answer:
Title: Pan-Roasted Chicken And Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. red potatoes, cut into 1 1/2-inch chunks
1 lb. onion, cut into 12 wedges
4 garlic cloves, peeled
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. ground black pepper
1/2 tsp. dried rosemary
1 lb. skinless, boneless chicken thighs or breasts, cut each into quarters
1 (10 oz.) bag spinach, discard stems
rosemary sprigs for garnish
Directions:
Preheat oven to 475°.
In large roasting pan, (17 x 11 1/2-inch), combine potatoes, onion, garlic, oil, salt and pepper and rosemary; toss to coat.

question: I need a recipe for roasted chicken thighs.

Title: Mahogany Glazed Chicken

Pour the remaining sauce over the chicken and serve.

question: I need a recipe for roasted chicken thighs.

question: What can I do with leftover steak?

Title: Chopped Steak Surprise

Directions:
Chill Chardonnay.
Do not over-chill!
Most people over-chill their white wines. If you can, pull out of the refrigerator early and let it stand for a few minutes. Open bottle carefully.
Most white wines do not need to breath, but do yourself a favor - let it stand a little while.
Disregard the above on Friday nights - any temperature is okay.
Just open the stuff!

question: What’s a recipe for homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Homemade Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1 c. milk
1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. butter
1/4 c. warm water
1 pkg. dry yeast
1 egg
4 c. plain flour
Directions:
Scald milk; stir in sugar, salt and butter so that the sugar is dissolved and the butter melts.
Cool to lukewarm.
Dissolve the yeast in 1/4 cup of water and add to the milk mixture.
Add 1/2 of the flour and the egg and beat by hand until smooth.
Add the rest of the flour which makes a fairly stiff batter.
Cover tightly and cool for 3 hours.
Using 1/2 of the dough, knead it several times and roll to an oval shape.
Spread the top with softened butter (you choose amount) and sprinkle a mixture of cinnamon and sugar on top of the butter.
Roll up jelly roll style and cut into 1/2-inch slices.
Place in a greased pan and allow to rise for an hour or so.
(At this point, they may be cooked or placed in the refrigerator until needed.)
Place rolls into a cold oven when ready to be baked.
Turn oven to 350° and cook until lightly browned (about 30 minutes).
Top with a simple powdered sugar icing.
Because this dough contains an egg, use the dough within 3 days.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Homemade Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
4 1/4 to 4 3/4 c. all-purpose flour
1 pkg. RapidRise yeast
1 1/4 c. milk
3/4 c. granulated sugar
1/4 c. butter
1 tsp. salt
2 eggs
6 Tbsp. butter, softened
1/2 c. packed brown sugar
2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 recipe maple nut glaze or powder sugar glaze
Directions:
In a large mixer bowl, combine 1 1/2 cups of the flour and yeast.
Heat the milk, sugar, the 1/4 cup butter and salt just until mixture is warm (120°) and the butter is almost melted, stirring constantly.
Add milk mixture to flour mixture; add eggs. Beat with an electric mixer on low speed for 30 seconds; scrape sides of bowl constantly.
Beat on high speed for 3 minutes.
Using a spoon, stir in as much of the remaining flour as you can (dough will be soft).
Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface. Knead in enough of the remaining flour to make a moderately soft dough (3 to 5 minutes).
On lightly floured surface, roll half the dough to 12 x 8-inches.
Spread with 3 tablespoons softened butter. Combine brown sugar and cinnamon; sprinkle half over rectangle. Roll up from a short side.
Seal edges.
Make a second roll with remaining dough, butter and sugar mixture.
Slice each dough roll into 8 pieces.
Arrange slices, cut side down, in a greased 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan.
Cover; let rise until nearly double (about 1 hour).
Bake rolls in a 350° oven for 25 to 30 minutes or until light brown.
Invert at once onto a wire rack.
Cool slightly. Drizzle rolls with Maple Nut glaze or powder sugar glaze.
Serve warm.
Makes 16 rolls.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Homemade Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1/2 c. warm water
1 1/2 pkg. dry yeast
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 (3 oz.) pkg. vanilla pudding
2 c. milk
1/2 c. oil
2 large eggs
8 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
4 Tbsp. cinnamon
1 c. brown sugar
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Mix everything except cinnamon and brown sugar; let rise for 1 hour.
Roll out.
Mix brown sugar and cinnamon; sprinkle on top.
Roll up tightly, then cut about 1 1/2-inch apart.
Bake for 10 to 15 minutes.
For icing, just buy plain vanilla cake icing.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: The Best-Ever Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
4 1/3 to 5 c. flour
1 pkg. active dry yeast
1 c. milk
1/3 c. margarine
1/3 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
3 eggs
3/4 c. packed brown sugar
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. ground cinnamon
1/2 c. margarine or butter
1/2 c. light raisins
1/2 c. chopped pecans
1 Tbsp. half and half or light cream
1 recipe Powdered Sugar Glaze
Directions:
In a large saucepan, heat milk, the 1/3 cup margarine or butter, the 1/3 cup sugar and salt just until warm (120° to 130°) and margarine is almost melted, stirring constantly.
Add to flour mixture.
Add eggs.
Beat with an electric mixer on low speed for 30 seconds, scraping sides of bowl constantly.
Beat on high speed for 3 minutes.
Using a wooden spoon, stir in as much of the remaining 2 1/4 to 2 3/4 cups flour as you can.
Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface.
Knead in enough of the remaining flour to make a moderately soft dough that is smooth and elastic (3 to 5 minutes total).
Shape into a ball.
Place in a greased bowl, turning once.
Cover; let rise in a warm place until double (about 1 hour).

question: What’s a recipe for homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1/2 c. warm water
4 c. sifted flour
1 tsp. salt
1 c. sugar
1/4 c. butter
2 pkg. dry yeast
1/4 c. melted butter
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
3/4 c. brown sugar
5 Tbsp. raisins
1/2 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
In a cup combine yeast with warm water.
In a pot, scald milk. Blend in sugar until sugar dissolves.
Remove from heat.
Let stand until warm.
Blend egg and yeast.
In a large bowl, combine yeast mixture with flour and cinnamon.
Blend butter.

question: What’s a good recipe for fish tacos?

question: What’s a good recipe for fish tacos?

question: What’s a good recipe for fish tacos?

question: What’s a good recipe for fish tacos?

question: What’s a good recipe for fish tacos?

Title: Tacos

question: How do I make homemade French fries?

Directions:

question: How do I make homemade French fries?

Title: Oven Baked French Fries
Ingredients:

1 tsp. salt

1/2 tsp. garlic powder

1/2 tsp. herb and pepper (optional)
Directions:
Peel potatoes and cut into 1/-8 inch wedges lengthwise.
Set aside.
Mix together oil and the rest of the ingredients.
Add the potatoes and coat well.
Place in a single layer on a cookie sheet.

question: How do I make homemade French fries?
answer:
Title: Baked French Fries
Ingredients:
2 large potatoes
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/8 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. salt (if desired)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°. Peel potatoes and cut into slices 4-inches long and about 1/4-inch wide. Place in a bowl of iced water to crisp. Just before cooking, turn onto paper towel and pat dry. Turn pieces into a shallow baking pan. Sprinkle with vegetable oil. Shake pan to spread oil evenly over potatoes and spread into one layer. Bake 30 to 40 minutes, turning frequently, until golden brown. Turn potatoes onto paper towel. Sprinkle with paprika and salt, if desired.

question: How do I make homemade French fries?
answer:
Title: Oven French Fries
Ingredients:

1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. paprika
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
spices (optional)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 475°.
Scrub potatoes, cut into long strips about 1/2-inch wide.
Dry strips thoroughly on paper towels.
Toss in a bowl with oil as if making a salad.
Toss with optional spices.
Spread potatoes in a single layer on a cookie sheet and place in preheated oven for 35 minutes.
Turn strips periodically to brown on all sides.
If a crispier, browner potato is desired, run under broiler for a minute or two.
Sprinkle with salt. Yield: 6 servings, 80 calories per serving.
This is a low cholesterol, reduced fat recipe.

question: How do I make homemade French fries?

Title: French Fries

question: What’s a good recipe for baked chicken tenders?
answer:
Title: Good Bye Chicken(My Mother'S Recipe, Adapted For Microwave)
Ingredients:
2 c. milk or light cream
1/4 c. butter or margarine
4 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. onion salt
1 tsp. salt
pepper
1 1/3 c. Minute rice
1 c. chicken broth
1/2 c. American cheese, grated
1 1/2 c. cooked asparagus (I use tips)
2 c. sliced cooked chicken
1/2 pkg. slivered almonds
Directions:
Pour milk into 6 to 8-cup glass measure.
Heat at 70% power for 3 1/2 minutes.
Remove from oven; set aside.
Place butter and half of the salt and onion salt in 2 cup glass measure; place in oven. Heat on High for 45 seconds.
At pause, stir flour into butter until smooth.
Return to oven and cook on High for 45 seconds. Remove from oven, briskly stir in warm milk and pepper.
Cook on High 3 to 5 minutes until of consistency of cream soup, stirring every 2 minutes.
Pour Minute rice into buttered 2-quart microwave dish.
Combine chicken broth and remaining salt; pour over rice. Sprinkle half of the cheese over rice.
Top with asparagus, then chicken.
Pour on sauce.
Sprinkle with remaining cheese.
Cook on 70% power, uncovered, for 10 to 12 minutes, until cheese is melted and sauce bubbling.
Top with slivered almonds and serve.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken without buttermilk?
answer:
Title: Crispy Buttermilk Oven-Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. lemon-pepper seasoning
1/3 c. buttermilk
1/2 c. corn flake crumbs
3 Tbsp. cornmeal
4 boneless skinless chicken breast halves
2 Tbsp. margarine or butter, melted
Directions:
Heat oven to 425°.
Line 15 x 10 x 1-inch baking pan with foil.
Spray foil with nonstick cooking spray.
In shallow dish, combine flour and lemon-pepper seasoning; mix well.
Place buttermilk in another shallow dish.
In third shallow dish, combine corn flake crumbs and cornmeal; mix well.
To bread chicken, dip chicken in flour mixture to coat.
Dip in buttermilk; dip in crumb mixture to coat.
Place chicken in foil-lined pan. Drizzle with margarine.
Bake at 425° for 18 to 20 minutes or until chicken is tender and juices run clear.

buttermilk

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken without buttermilk?

question: What’s a good recipe for baked oatmeal?

Title: Baked Oatmeal
Ingredients:

2 eggs, separated

question: How do I make a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
3/4 c. salad oil
3 Tbsp. lime or lemon juice
1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. finely chopped green onions
1 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. coarse black pepper
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a covered jar and shake thoroughly. Chill.
Shake again before using.
Makes 1 1/2 cups dressing. Pour over broken romaine lettuce leaves and add croutons and anchovies if you like.

question: How do I make a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:

6 eggs
1 tsp. curry powder
1 1/2 c. Parmesan cheese

1/2 c. lemon juice
parsley
Directions:
Blend eggs in blender; add anchovy paste.
Add rest of ingredients except mayonnaise and lemon juice.
Blend well. Empty mayonnaise in large mixing bowl.
Pour contents of blender over mayonnaise and mix by hand.
Add lemon juice and parsley. Chill.
Keep in refrigerator 4 to 6 weeks.
Serve with croutons.

question: How do I make a classic Caesar salad dressing?

question: How do I make a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
1 clove garlic
1/2 c. salad oil
1 c. croutons
dash of salt
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. ground pepper
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. Worcestershire
6 anchovy fillets (can use anchovy paste)
1 egg

2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Crush garlic and combine with oil. Refrigerate for 1 hour. Add to this, salt, mustard, pepper, Worcestershire, lemon and anchovies.
Refrigerate. Boil egg.

question: What can I cook with chicken breast and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Chicken Breast - Sauteed With New Potatoes
Ingredients:
1/4 c. margarine
4 to 6 large chicken breasts
1 slice onion
1 minced clove garlic
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 chicken bouillon cube
1 c. hot water
1 (No. 303) can small potatoes, drained
1/4 c. red wine
snipped parsley
Directions:
Saute chicken in large skillet in hot butter until both sides are brown.
Add onion and garlic.
Cook about 5 minutes.
In a small bowl combine flour, salt and pepper and slowly stir in bouillon cube which has been dissolved in the hot water.
Pour over browned chicken.
Cook slowly covered for about 25 minutes or until chicken is tender.
Add potatoes and wine.
Heat potatoes thoroughly.
Garnish with parsley.
Yields 4 to 6 servings.

question: What can I cook with chicken breast and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Potato Casserole
Ingredients:
1 lb. fresh new potatoes
3 cloves garlic
1/2 Tbsp. rosemary, crumbled well
4 boneless chicken breasts
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Heat oven to 475°.
Spray a 10 x 15-inch pan well.
Place potatoes in single layer and cook for 15 minutes.
Mix rosemary and garlic in small bowl.
Put chicken breasts on top of potatoes and add rosemary, garlic, salt and pepper.
Bake chicken and potatoes until tender.

question: What can I cook with chicken breast and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Chicken Breasts With New Potatoes
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or margarine
4 to 6 split chicken breasts
1 sliced onion
1 minced garlic clove
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 chicken bouillon cube
1 c. hot water
1 can small potatoes
dry parsley flakes
Directions:
Saute chicken breasts in butter on both sides until brown. Add onion and garlic; cook 5 minutes.
In small bowl, combine flour, salt and pepper.
Slowly stir bouillon into hot water. Pour over chicken; cook, covered, for 25 to 30 minutes.
Add potatoes and heat.
Garnish with parsley.

question: What can I cook with chicken breast and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Yiayia'S Greek Chicken Breasts With Potatoes
Ingredients:
8 chicken breast halves (with or without skin)
salt and pepper
oregano
1/2 stick butter (do not use margarine)
juice of 1 or 2 lemons
6 to 8 potatoes, peeled and quartered
water
Directions:
Wash and dry chicken.
Season with salt, pepper and oregano. Spray baking pan lightly with cooking spray.
Place seasoned chicken into baking pan, meaty side down.
Dot with butter. Squeeze lemon juice over chicken.
Add a small amount of water to pan.
Cook for 1/2 hour at 350°.
Turn chicken over.
Place potatoes around chicken.
Turn potatoes to coat with drippings. Add a little more salt and pepper to the potatoes if you like. Bake an additional 1/2 hour or until chicken is done.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: What can I cook with chicken breast and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Grilled Chicken And Potato Dinner
Ingredients:
1-1/4 lb. red potatoes, cut into 2-inch chunks
2 tsp. olive oil
4 skewers
2 plum tomatoes, seeded and diced
3-1/2 Tbsp. oil-cured black olives, pitted and coarsely chopped
1 small lemon, peel grated, 2 tsp. juice reserved
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. parsley, chopped
1 tsp. lemon pepper seasoning
4 (4 oz.) chicken breast halves
Directions:
Prepare grill.
Place potatoes in a steamer basket over boiling water.
Cover pan and steam 10 minutes or until tender.
Drain, transfer to a bowl and toss with oil.
When cool enough to handle, thread potatoes onto skewers.

question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: "One Pot" Dinner(Makes A Big Hit ... Especially With The Men.)
Ingredients:
1/2 to 1 lb. ground beef
3/4 lb. bacon, cut in small pieces
1 c. chopped onion
2 (1 lb. 15 oz. size) cans pork and beans
1 (1 lb.) can kidney beans, drained
1 (1 lb.) can butter limas, drained
1 c. ketchup
1/4 c. brown sugar
1 Tbsp. liquid smoke
3 Tbsp. white vinegar
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Brown ground beef in skillet; drain off fat and put beef in crock-pot.
Brown bacon and onions; drain off fat.
Add bacon, onions and remaining ingredients to crock-pot.
Stir together well.
Cover and cook on low 4 to 6 hours.
If using the 2-quart crock-pot, reduce this recipe by half.

question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: One-Pot Meal
Ingredients:
1 to 2 lb. stew beef (boneless and extra lean)
carrots, as many as you think you need
potatoes, as many as you think you need
1 large onion
1 c. water
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Mix together in crock-pot and cook on low while you are at work.
Add any vegetables desired, even a can of mixed vegetables (cabbage, celery, broccoli, mushrooms, etc.).
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: One Pot Meal
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1 large can corn
4 large sliced potatoes
1 large sliced onion
1 large can tomatoes
3 large sliced carrots
1/2 c. ketchup
1 Tbsp. mustard
salt and pepper to taste
1/2 c. water
Directions:
Make patties out of ground beef.
Sprinkle salt and pepper on each one.
In a large Dutch oven or pot, place a layer of patties. Add a layer of all vegetables.
Repeat layers until you have used all ingredients.
Mix ketchup, mustard and water; pour over top. Cook on medium until it starts to boil.
Turn stove on low heat; cook for 1 1/2 hours.
May need to add more water, depending on stove variations.

question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: One-Pot Dinner
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. ground beef
1 medium onion, chopped
1 c. chopped celery
3/4 c. chopped green pepper
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dried basil
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. uncooked medium egg noodles
1 can (16 oz) kidney beans rinsed & drained
1 can (14 1/2 oz) stewed tomatoes
3/4 c. water
1 beef bouillon cube
Directions:
In a large skillet, cook meat until no longer pink; drain. Add onion, celery and green pepper, cook for 5 minutes or until vegetables are crisp-tender.
Add Worcestershire sauce, salt, basil and pepper.
Stir in noodles, beans, tomatoes, water and bouillon.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until noodles are tender.

question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: "One Pot" Dinner
Ingredients:
1/2 to 1 lb. ground beef
5 strips bacon, cut in small pieces
1 c. chopped onion
2 (31 oz.) cans pork and beans
1 (16 oz.) can kidney beans, drained
1 c. catsup
1 (16 oz.) can butter beans, drained
1/4 c. brown sugar
1 Tbsp. liquid smoke
3 Tbsp. white vinegar
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Brown ground beef in skillet.
Drain off fat and put beef in crock-pot.
Brown bacon and onions; drain off fat.
Add bacon, onions and remaining ingredients to crock-pot.
Stir together well.
Cover and cook on low 5 to 9 hours (high 3 hours).

question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Low-Fat Chicken Alfredo
Ingredients:
4 cooked chicken breasts (skinless), cut in pieces
1 can mushrooms
1/4 c. liquid Butter Buds
1/4 c. flour
4 tsp. fat free chicken broth
1/3 c. low-fat Parmesan
1/4 tsp. minced garlic
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
10 to 12 oz. cooked fettucine
1 c. evaporated skim milk
Directions:
In saucepan over low heat, blend flour, liquid Butter Buds, skim milk and chicken broth.
Add minced garlic, salt and pepper. Continue to cook over low heat stirring constantly until the sauce thickens.
Stir in Parmesan cheese.
Combine sauce with chicken and mushrooms.
Fold into cooked pasta.
Serve immediately.

question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Chicken Alfredo
Ingredients:
2 chicken breasts, boned
2 slices bacon
1 tsp. chopped garlic
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 pt. light cream
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/3 c. frozen peas
1 chopped scallion
fresh ground pepper to taste
1/4 c. white wine
Directions:
Cut bacon into small pieces and chicken into about 1-inch cubes.
Add garlic and oil into hot skillet; cook until chicken is done.
Remove from skillet.
Reheat pan and add wine so that it picks up flavors from skillet.
Slowly add cream, scallions, cayenne pepper, oregano and peas.
Mix cornstarch with about 4 ounces water.
Add a little at a time until you get a creamy sauce.
Add chicken and bacon mixture; heat.
Add black pepper to taste.
Serve over pasta.
Shrimp may be substituted for chicken.

question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Classic Alfredo Pasta
Ingredients:
1 (12 oz.) pkg. uncooked fettuccine
1/2 c. butter or oleo
1 1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 c. heavy or whipping cream
4 Tbsp. fresh parsley, chopped
Directions:
Cook fettuccine according to your taste of doneness; drain. Meanwhile, in small saucepan, melt butter over medium heat; gradually stir in cheese, then cream until well blended.
Continue heating sauce, stirring constantly, just to boiling point.
Remove from heat; stir in parsley.
Add sauce to hot fettuccine; toss lightly.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Chicken Alfredo
Ingredients:
4 cooked chicken breasts, cut in pieces
1 c. evaporated skimmed milk
1/4 c. liquid Butter Buds
1/4 c. flour
4 tsp. fat-free chicken broth
1/2 c. fat-free Parmesan cheese
3 cloves garlic
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Stir and cook slowly until thick.
Serve over fettuccine noodles or small spaghetti.
Add chicken to sauce after it has cooked.

question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Chicken Alfredo
Ingredients:
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. lemon juice
1/4 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. oregano
4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
2 chicken broiler fryers, halved
1 c. flour
4 tsp. paprika
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 tsp. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. butter
Directions:
Combine oil, lemon juice, Parmesan cheese, oregano, 2 teaspoons salt and 1 teaspoon pepper.
Beat well.
Pour over chicken halves. Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours or longer.
Combine remaining ingredients, except butter.
Remove chicken from marinade and roll in the flour mixture.
Saute chicken in butter until browned on both sides.
Place each chicken half, skin side up, in center of a double thick square of heavy-duty aluminum foil.
Bring up sides and ends and seal with tight folds.
Place packets on baking sheet and bake at 425° for 1 hour.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Tangy Lemon Chicken
Ingredients:
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. paprika
4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
3/4 c. boiling water
3/4 tsp. instant chicken bouillon granules
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/4 c. sliced green onions and tops
1 1/2 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 Tbsp. snipped fresh parsley
lemon slices (for garnish)
Directions:
Combine flour, salt and paprika in paper or plastic bag. Brush chicken with lemon juice.
Place a few pieces at a time in bag.
Shake to coat.
Heat oil to 365° in electric skillet or large heavy skillet.
Add chicken.
Brown.
Combine water and bouillon granules.
Stir until dissolved.
Add brown sugar and remaining lemon juice.
Pour into skillet.
Cover.
Reduce heat to 250°; simmer 5 minutes.
Turn chicken.
Sprinkle with onion and lemon peel.
Recover.
Simmer 10 minutes.
Serve garnish with lemon slices and additional parsley.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Tangy Chicken
Ingredients:
2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. oleo
1/4 c. vinegar
1 tsp. onion salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. lemon juice
1 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
Combine all ingredients.
Dip cut up fryer parts in sauce. Place chicken, skin side down, in shallow pan.
Pour sauce over chicken.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chicken
Ingredients:
4 whole chicken breasts, halved, boned and skinned
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. freshly ground pepper
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 c. flour
1/4 c. clarified butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. Madeira wine
3 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 large lemon, cut in 6 slices
3 Tbsp. capers
1 tsp. chopped pimento
1/4 c. fresh chives
1 (8 oz.) pkg. fettuccine, cooked according to package
Directions:
Pound chicken breasts to 1/4-inch thickness between 2 pieces of waxed paper.
Mix salt, pepper, paprika and flour in a plastic bag; add chicken, one piece at a time, and shake to coat.
Place butter and oil in a saute pan or large skillet; heat over medium heat until bubbly.
Add garlic and chicken; saute, turning, about 6 minutes or until chicken is brown and fork can be easily inserted.
Drain on paper towels and keep warm.
Drain all but 2 tablespoons of cooking fat from pan; add wine and deglaze pan, scraping up brown bits.
Add lemon juice and heat 1 minute; return chicken to pan; add lemon slices and heat 2 minutes.
Add capers and pimento.
Sprinkle chives over all.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Tangy Lemon Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
2 1/2 Tbsp. cornstarch
2 c. water
1/3 to 1/2 c. lemon juice
2 tsp. grated lemon rind
2 Tbsp. butter
2 egg yolks, slightly beaten
Directions:
Combine sugar and cornstarch in saucepan.
Gradually add water, blending until smooth.
Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is thick and clear.
Remove from heat. Blend about 1/2 cup of hot mixture in saucepan and cook 2 minutes. Add lemon rind, lemon juice and butter.
Serve warm or cold. Sauce may be refrigerated and reheated.
Yields 2 3/4 cups.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Low-Fat Lemon Chicken
Ingredients:
1/4 c. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. frozen unsweetened orange juice concentrate, thawed
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. vegetable oil
1 Tbsp. dried parsley flakes
1 pkg. instant chicken flavor broth mix
1 lb. boned, skinned chicken parts, cut into large chunks
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. cornstarch
1 c. water
toasted sesame seed
bow tie noodles
Directions:
In a large skillet, combine lemon juice, mustard, garlic powder, pepper, orange juice, broth mix, parsley and vegetable oil.
Heat over medium heat until hot.
Add chicken.
Turning frequently, cook chicken until done (about 15 minutes).
Reduce heat to low; cover and cook 10 more minutes.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
2 small cans tomato paste
5 Tbsp. sour cream
3 c. cottage cheese
2 small cans mushrooms
2 lb. Mozzarella cheese
1 small box noodles
Directions:
Brown ground beef and drain.
Add tomato paste and two or three cans of water.
Simmer about 20 minutes.
Add sour cream and simmer about 10 minutes.
Remove and add cottage cheese and mushrooms.
Boil noodles, drain, coat in butter.
Grease a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Line with noodles, sauce and cheese.
Repeat.
Top with Parmesan cheese and the parsley.
Bake at 350° until cheese melts.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: Homemade Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. hamburger
1 lb. lasagna noodles
3/4 c. finely chopped onions
1 clove garlic
2 c. water
1 (12 oz.) can tomato paste
1 tsp. salt
3 (6 oz.) pkg. Mozzarella cheese
1 lb. cottage cheese
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Cook noodles in 6 quarts boiling water to which has been added 2 tablespoons salt.
Cook rapidly for 15 minutes.
Stir gently.
Remove from heat and drain.
Pour cold water over to cool.
Cook hamburger in heavy saucepan until color changes.
Add onions, garlic, tomato paste, water and salt.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes.
Grease a 15 1/2 x 10 1/2 x 2 1/2-inch pan.
Start with a layer of noodles, then Mozzarella cheese, then cottage cheese, then meat sauce.
Continue layering in that order until all is used up.
Sprinkle Parmesan cheese on top.
Bake 20 to 25 minutes at 350°.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef, cooked
1 clove garlic
1 Tbsp. basil
2 c. tomatoes
12 oz. tomato paste
1 1/2 tsp. salt
3 c. cottage cheese
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. parsley flakes
1 tsp. salt
2 eggs, beaten
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 lb. Mozzarella cheese, sliced thin
Directions:
Cook first 6 ingredients together to make meat sauce.
Mix remaining ingredients together except for the Mozzarella cheese to make the cheese mixture.
Lightly grease a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Put thin layer of tomato sauce mixture in bottom of pan.
Next, layer uncooked lasagna noodles, next 1/2 of cottage cheese mixture and then 1/2 of Mozzarella cheese.
Repeat layering, saving some tomato mixture for top.
Cover with foil.
Bake at 350° for 60 minutes.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 c. onions, chopped
1 garlic clove, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
1/4 tsp. oregano
1 lb. ground chuck
1 (28 oz.) can Italian tomatoes
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
Directions:
Cook the first 4 ingredients in 3 tablespoons oil until soft, but not brown.
Add meat and stir until meat loses red color.
Add tomatoes, tomato sauce and tomato paste.
Cook for 1 hour.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna(Homemade Sauce)
Ingredients:
1 lb. hamburger
2 or 3 stalks celery
1 small onion
1 can tomato juice (19 oz.)
1 can tomato soup
3/4 Tbsp. sugar (white)
salt and pepper to taste
1 can mushrooms
1/2 tsp. Italian seasoning
1/2 tsp. oregano
1 box lasagna
8 oz. Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
Add oil, onion, celery stalks to hamburger and cook until brown, then add tomato juice, tomato soup, sugar, salt, pepper, mushrooms, Italian seasoning and oregano.
Simmer for 3/4 hour. Cook lasagna, then drain.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Apple Chip Cake
Ingredients:
3 eggs
1 3/4 c. sugar
1 c. vegetable oil
2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon
2 c. chopped apples
1/2 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
Beat together eggs and sugar.
Add vegetable oil.
In large bowl, mix together flour, baking soda, salt and cinnamon.
Slowly mix dry ingredients into egg mixture.
Blend well.
Fold in apples and nuts.
Spread into a greased and floured 9 x 13-inch pan. Bake at 350° for 30 to 45 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Apple Chip Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. oil
2 c. sugar
2 eggs
3 c. peeled, chopped apples
1 c. chopped nuts
raisins
3 c. flour (I use 1/2 whole wheat)
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
Directions:
Blend oil, sugar and eggs well.
Stir in apples, nuts and raisins.
Add flour, vanilla, baking soda and cinnamon.
Bake about 1 hour in greased 13 x 9-inch pan.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Fresh Apple Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. sugar
2 eggs
1 c. salad oil
3 diced apples (Winesap)
1 c. chopped nuts
2 1/2 c. flour
3/4 tsp. cinnamon
1 pkg. butterscotch chips
Directions:
Mix sugar, eggs and oil.
Add dry ingredients.
Mix well while adding apples and nuts.
Pour into greased and floured 9 x 13-inch pan.
Sprinkle butterscotch chips over top of batter.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour or until brown.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Apple Chip Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. vegetable oil
2 c. sugar
2 eggs
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
3 c. flour
1 tsp. vanilla
3 c. apples, cubed
3/4 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
Mix oil, sugar and eggs.
Add salt, baking soda, cinnamon, flour and vanilla.
Add apples and walnuts.
Bake in ungreased 13 x 9-inch pan at 350° for 1 hour.
Do not cover tightly to store.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Fresh Apple Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. Wesson oil
2 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 c. pecans
4 c. diced apples
1 (6 oz.) pkg. butterscotch chips
Directions:
Grease and flour 13 x 9-inch pan.
Preheat oven at 350°.
Sift together dry ingredients.
Mix all ingredients except apples and chips.
Fold in apples; pour into pan.
Sprinkle chips on top. Bake 1 hour.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Savory Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
40 mushrooms (medium size), washed, caps whole, stems removed
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. rosemary
freshly ground pepper
2 c. chicken bouillon
1/2 c. wild rice
1 shallot
2 cloves garlic
1/4 c. chopped almonds
fresh lemon
Directions:
Bring bouillon to a boil.
Add washed wild rice; cover and simmer for 1 hour.
Remove from heat.
Saute mushroom caps in butter.
Mix rice, almonds, herbs and spices and fill mushroom caps.
Drizzle with fresh lemon juice.
Bake on cookie sheet at 300° for 15 minutes.
May easily be prepared a day prior to re-heating.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Savory Mushroom Caps
Ingredients:
12 to 14 medium to large mushroom caps
1/4 c. finely diced onion
1/4 c. finely diced celery
1/4 c. finely diced green peppers
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
3 oz. softened cream cheese
1 c. finely ground bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
In a large skillet, saute onion, celery and green pepper in butter until slightly softened.
Add cream cheese and stir.
Add bread crumbs, lemon juice, salt and pepper; mix well.
Stuff mushroom caps with mixture (mushrooms should be washed and laid on paper towel to dry until needed).
Place on greased baking sheet and bake at 375° for 10 to 12 minutes.
May be put under broiler if you want them browned more.
Serve warm.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
1 medium can mushrooms
4 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
1 c. rich milk
Directions:
Saute mushrooms in butter.
Add flour slowly and brown slightly.
Add milk and cook until it thickens.
Pour over steak or chicken.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 tsp. grated onion
1 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 c. milk
Directions:
Melt butter over low heat in a heavy saucepan.
Stir with wooden spoon.
Saute onion and mushrooms in butter for 5 minutes. Blend in flour and seasonings.
Cook over low heat until mixture is smooth and bubbly.
Remove from heat.
Stir in milk.
Bring to a boil; boil 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Cook until thickened. Serve over noodles, potatoes, etc.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Savory Patties
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 tsp. salt
1/4 c. minced onion
1 tsp. prepared mustard
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/4 c. fine bread crumbs
1 egg
1/2 c. bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. oil
1 can golden mushroom soup
1/4 c. water
Directions:
Combine meat, salt, onion, mustard, 1/4 cup crumbs, egg and Worcestershire sauce.
Mix very well and shape into 6 patties.
Put the 1/2 cup crumbs on a piece of waxed paper and press patties onto it so the crumbs adhere to the outside.
Heat the oil in a frypan. Brown patties on both sides.
Turn down heat.
Drain off any fat from pan.
Open soup and add 1/4 cup water.
Pour over patties. Simmer for 20 to 25 minutes.
Serve with cooked egg noodles. Sprinkle with chopped chives.
You can substitute turkey for all or part of beef.

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Crispy Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
12 chicken wings
1 egg
2 tsp. vegetable oil
2 tsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. 5 spice powder
1/4 c. water
1/2 c. Gold Medal all-purpose flour
1/4 c. cornstarch
1/2 tsp. baking soda
vegetable oil
1/2 c. Chinese hot mustard sauce
Directions:
Cut each chicken wing at joints to make 3 pieces.
Discard tips.
Mix egg, 2 teaspoons vegetable oil, the soy sauce, salt, sugar and 5 spice powder in medium glass or plastic bowl.
Stir in chicken.
Cover and refrigerate 1 hour.
Add water to chicken. Stir flour, cornstarch and baking soda into chicken.

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Crispy Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
3 lb. chicken wings (32 to 36 pieces)
1/2 c. margarine
1 c. unsifted flour
1 tsp. onion salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Line large shallow baking pan to aluminum foil.
Cut wings at each joint.
Discard tips.
Melt margarine in lined pan.
Combine flour, onion, salt and pepper in bowl.
Add chicken pieces, a few at a time, and shake to coat. Place in pan.
Bake 25 minutes at 400°.
Turn wings over and bake an additional 20 to 25 minutes or until crisp.
Drain on paper towels.
Transfer to serving platter.
Serve to barbecue sauce, Blue cheese dressing, buttermilk Ranch dressing or hot sauce.

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Crispy Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken wings
1/2 c. butter, melted
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 c. dry bread crumbs
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cut chicken wings into pieces, discarding tips.
In a small bowl, combine melted butter and garlic powder.
In another bowl, combine remaining ingredients.

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Oven Fried Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. butter
2/3 c. dried bread crumbs
2/3 c. whole wheat or all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. crushed rosemary
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. buttermilk
12 chicken wings
Directions:
In 15 1/2 x 10 1/2-inch roasting pan in 425° oven, melt butter.
Remove pan from oven.
On wax paper, mix next 5 ingredients.
Pour buttermilk into small bowl.
Dip one wing at a time in buttermilk, then in crumb mixture.
Place wings in melted butter in roasting pan, turning to coat evenly.
Bake 35 minutes or until chicken wings are tender.

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Oriental Chicken Wings(Makes 40 Wings)
Ingredients:
1 c. water
1 c. soy sauce
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. pineapple juice
1/4 c. oil
1 tsp. fresh ginger, crushed
2 cloves garlic, crushed
Directions:
Mix together marinade.
Put wings in pan.
Cover with mixture and marinate overnight.
Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 1 1/2 hours. Turn often.
To make them extra crispy, put them under broiler for about 10 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Broccoli Soup
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. minced onion
9 Tbsp. oleo
3/4 c. plus 1 Tbsp. flour
4 1/2 tsp. salt
3 c. grated carrots
9 c. milk
9 c. consomme or 4 1/2 c. and 4 1/2 c. water
30 chopped broccoli florets
Directions:
Saute onion in butter until tender.
Stir in flour and salt; gradually add milk, stirring constantly, in double boiler.
Bring to a boil.
Add broth; cook over low heat until serving time. Approximately 30 minutes before serving, add carrots and broccoli. Stir occasionally, but do not boil.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Broccoli And Cheddar Soup
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. chopped broccoli
2 c. chicken broth or 2 c. water plus 2 bouillon cubes
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. salt
2 c. light cream
1/4 c. chopped onion
3 Tbsp. margarine
3 Tbsp. cornstarch or flour
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
Directions:
In large saucepan, cook broccoli until soft; drain.
In small pan, saute onion in margarine.
Add cornstarch and slowly add broth and cream.
Stir and cook until thickens.
Add salt, nutmeg and broccoli.
Just before serving, stir in cheese.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Broccoli And Cheddar Soup
Ingredients:
4 c. broccoli, diced
3 Tbsp. butter
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
5 c. chicken stock
1 c. milk
1 c. whipping cream
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
salt and pepper
Directions:
Saute broccoli in butter over medium heat until tender. Sprinkle with flour and cook, stirring, for 2 minutes.
Gradually stir in stock and milk.
Heat just to simmering.
Stir in cream and cheese.
Allow cheese to melt in soup.
Season to taste and serve with croutons.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Broccoli Soup(6 Cups)
Ingredients:
1 lb. broccoli florets
2 tsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1 small garlic clove, minced
1/4 c. flour
3 c. chicken stock
1/8 tsp. dried basil
1/8 tsp. dried oregano
1/8 tsp. dried tarragon
1/8 tsp. dried thyme
1 c. milk
1 to 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
3/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Drop broccoli into boiling water.
Cook until tender 7 minutes.
Drain.
In saucepan, combine oil and onion; saute until soft.
Add garlic and cook 15 seconds longer.
Sprinkle on flour and stir.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Broccoli Cheddar Soup
Ingredients:
1 small onion, chopped
1/2 stick butter
1/4 c. flour
salt and pepper to taste
1 c. chicken broth
2 1/2 c. milk
2 c. broccoli, cooked slightly
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
In a saucepan, saute onion in butter until tender.
Stir in flour, salt and pepper.
Cook and stir until smooth.
Add broth and milk all at once.
Cook until thick.
Add broccoli; simmer and stir.
Remove from heat and stir in cheese until melted.

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Pasta Bolognese(Kids In The Kitchen)
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped carrot
1/2 c. chopped celery
2 garlic cloves, minced
1 (28 oz.) can crushed tomatoes or tomato puree
1 tsp. dried basil leaves
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
1/2 lb. ground sirloin or ground beef
1 lb. spaghetti or ziti, cooked according to pkg. directions
Directions:
Heat oil in a large skillet. Add onion, carrots and celery. Saute over low-medium heat, stirring frequently, about 10 minutes. Stir in garlic. Saute 2 minutes more.
Add tomato sauce to skillet. Add basil and oregano. Stir.
Cook, covered, on medium-low heat for about 10 minutes.

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Pasta Bolognese
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground beef
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 large onion
1 slice root celery or 2 stalks celery
1 carrot
4 oz. smoked ham
1 c. water
3 to 4 canned whole tomatoes or 3 Tbsp. tomato puree
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. salt
dash of black pepper
1 tsp. dried thyme
1/3 c. white wine or chicken broth
10 to 12 oz. spaghetti or other pasta
Directions:
In a skillet saute ground beef in 1 tablespoon oil until meat loses its pinkness then transfer to a pan.
Peel and chop onion then dice celery and carrot.
Chop ham into small pieces and saute in remaining oil with onion, celery and carrot.
Transfer to pan with ground meat and combine all.
Add water, tomatoes or tomato puree, garlic, salt, pepper and thyme.
Cover and cook for about 20 minutes, then add the wine or chicken broth and cook for a few more minutes.

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Pasta Bolognese
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground beef
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 large onion
2 stalks celery
1 carrot
4 oz. smoked ham
1 c. water
3 to 4 canned tomatoes
2 cloves minced garlic
1 tsp. salt
dash of black pepper
1 tsp. thyme
1/3 c. chicken broth
10 to 12 oz. spaghetti or other pasta
Directions:
Brown ground beef in 1 tablespoon oil until meat is done. Transfer to a pan.
Peel and chop onion; dice celery and carrot. Chop ham into small pieces.
Saute in remaining oil with onion, celery and carrot.
Add to ground meat.
Add water, tomatoes, garlic, salt, pepper and thyme; cover and cook about 20 minutes. Add chicken broth; cook a few minutes more.
Cook pasta according to package directions; drain well.
Serve immediately with sauce.

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Spaghettini Bolognese
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 carrot, sliced
1 clove garlic, crushed
1/2 c. each chopped onion, celery and green pepper
2 Tbsp. Wesson oil
1 lb. Italian sausage, casing removed
2 (15 oz.) cans Hunt's tomato sauce
1/2 c. water
1/4 c. dry red wine (optional)
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. Italian seasoning
Directions:
Saute mushrooms, carrot, garlic, onion, celery and green pepper in Wesson oil in Dutch oven.
Add sausage; cook until sausage loses redness.
Drain fat.
Add remaining ingredients. Simmer, uncovered, 40 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve over hot, cooked spaghettini.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Spaghetti Bolog'Nase
Ingredients:
3/4 to 1 lb. Italian sausage
2 medium onions, chopped
1 carrot, thinly sliced
1 clove garlic, minced
1/4 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 rib celery
1 green pepper
2 (15 oz.) cans tomato sauce
1/2 c. water or 1/4 c. red wine
2 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. Italian herb seasoning (increase to taste)
basil, oregano, garlic and red pepper
Directions:
Saut mushrooms, carrot, onions and green pepper in oil. Add sausage and cook until sausage is done. Drain well. Add remaining ingredients. Simmer 40 minutes (or longer).

question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Indian Chickpeas
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1/2 tsp. cumin seed
2 onions, diced
6 cloves garlic, crushed
1-inch piece ginger root, grated
1/2 tsp. turmeric powder
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
3/4 tsp. coriander
1/2 tsp. salt
2 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
1 tsp. garam masala
4 c. cooked chickpeas
juice of 1 lemon
4 small potatoes, boiled, peeled and chopped
Directions:
Heat oil.
Add cumin and onions.
Cook 3 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger.
Cook 5 minutes on low heat.
Add turmeric, coriander, cayenne and salt.
Stir; add chopped tomatoes and garam masala. Cook on low heat 10 minutes.
Add chickpeas and lemon juice.
Cook 5 minutes; add potatoes.
Serve over white steamed basmati rice, garnished with chopped green jalapeno peppers.

question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Fresh Vegetables With Creamy Garlic Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. nonfat yogurt
4 cloves garlic, minced
1 1/2 tsp. olive oil
1 small artichoke, cooked and cooled
1 c. new potatoes, halved and cooked
1 c. green beans, blanched
1 c. carrots (about 2 inches long), blanched
6 or 8 small beets, cooked and cooled
1/2 c. cooked chickpeas
Directions:
In a small bowl, combine yogurt, garlic and olive oil. Arrange remaining ingredients on a large platter.
Mound yogurt sauce in the center.
Serve at room temperature.
Serves 4.

question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Chickpea Spread
Ingredients:
2 c. cooked garbanzos
4 Tbsp. lemon
1/2 c. tahini
1/3 c. water
1 tsp. garlic
Directions:
Blend.
Use as spread, dip or dressing.

question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Marinated Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 (1 lb.) can French green beans, cut small
1 (1 lb.) can white Shoe Peg corn
1 (1 lb.) can early June peas (small)
1 c. bell pepper, chopped fine
1 c. purple onion, chopped fine
1 c. celery, chopped fine
1 small jar red pimentos
3/4 c. vinegar
1/4 c. cooking oil
1 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Combine vinegar, oil, sugar, salt and pepper in a saucepan and bring to a boil.
Pour over vegetables.
Let stand refrigerated overnight.
Keeps several days in refrigerator.

question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Marinated Carrots(A Great Cookout Dish And Easy To Make!)
Ingredients:
2 lb. sliced cooked carrots
1 can tomato soup
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. cooking oil
1/2 c. cider vinegar
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 chopped onion
1 chopped green pepper
3 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach
1 (9 oz.) can artichoke hearts
1/2 lb. cream cheese
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
4 Tbsp. margarine
6 Tbsp. milk
1/3 c. grated cheese
ground pepper
Directions:
Layer drained artichoke hearts in a 9 x 13-inch casserole dish.
Layer drained spinach next.
Blend cream cheese, mayonnaise and margarine until light and fluffy.
Gradually beat in milk. Spread over top of spinach.
Sprinkle with pepper and grated cheese.
Bake at 375° for 40 minutes.

question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Avocado Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1 pkg. curly noodles
2 small avocados
1 (8 oz.) pkg. Mozzarella cheese
1/4 c. butter or margarine
garlic salt and pepper to taste
Parmesan cheese to taste
Directions:
Cook noodles according to package directions.
Drain in colander and return to pot.
Add butter, grated cheeses, seasonings and thinly sliced avocados.
Stir.
Serves 4 to 6. Very quick and easy to make and your family will think you're a gourmet cook!

question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Avocado Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. rotini pasta
1/2 c. diced Provolone cheese
1 can pitted black olives
4 c. assorted vegetables
salt and pepper
1/2 c. Italian dressing
2 oz. Prosciutto, slivered
1/2 c. sliced red onion
1/2 c. frozen peas, thawed
2 Tbsp. fresh basil
1 avocado
Directions:
In a large bowl, gently toss pasta with dressing.
Add cheese, Prosciutto, black olives, onion, peas, broccoli, carrots, bell pepper, mushrooms, asparagus tips and sliced basil.
Toss gently. Season to taste.
Fan avocado slices on top.
Garnish with fresh basil leaves and tomato.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Avocado Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. mashed avocado
1/2 c. sour cream
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. grated onion
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. chili powder
3 slices bacon, crisp cooked
Directions:
Combine avocado, sour cream, lemon juice, onion, salt and chili powder. Chill. Stir in bacon, crumbled. Garnish with bacon curl.

question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Avocado Dish Salad
Ingredients:
2 large avocados
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
1/8 tsp. garlic salt
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1 (8 oz.) carton sour cream
2 (8 oz.) jars picante sauce
3/4 c. ripe olives, chopped
3 c. tomatoes, peeled and chopped
1 1/2 c. cheddar cheese, shredded
Directions:
Peel and mash avocados.
Stir in garlic powder, garlic salt, lemon juice and mayonnaise.
Spread mixture into a 9 x 13 x 2-inch baking dish.
Carefully spread sour cream over mixture.
Drain picante sauce and spoon on top of sour cream being careful not to mix in with sour cream layer.
Layer chopped, ripe olives over picante sauce.
Layer chopped tomatoes over olives.
Top with shredded cheese.

question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Baked Avocado
Ingredients:
2 avocados, sliced in half from top to bottom
2 cloves garlic, finely diced
1 tsp. salt
pinch of hot red pepper
pinch of black pepper
pinch of allspice
1 c. cooked shrimp, finely chopped
1 tsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. yogurt (plain)
Directions:
Empty all the inside of the avocado halves and put these creamy insides in a bowl.
Combine all the other ingredients and mix well. Preheat the oven to 350°.
Fill the avocado shells with mixture.
Bake avocado for 15 minutes.
May be served hot or cold.

question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Marinade With Tangy Dressing
Ingredients:
2/3 c. vinegar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. sugar
1/4 c. oil
1 can each: corn, peas and green beans, drained
1 green pepper, chopped
1 (4 oz.) jar pimento, drained and diced
1 c. onion, chopped
1 c. celery, chopped
Directions:
Heat together vinegar, salt, pepper, sugar and oil until sugar is dissolved.
Set aside to cool.
Place vegetables in large bowl and pour dressing over vegetable mixture.
Refrigerate overnight. Serves 6 to 8.

question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Tangy Chicken
Ingredients:
4 chicken breasts, skin removed or chicken cutlets (use mallet to tenderize)
2 lemons
1 tsp. thyme, garlic powder and marjoram
2 or more Tbsp. soy sauce
4 Tbsp. honey (can add more if necessary)
Directions:
Mix ingredients; marinate chicken for one hour.
Put in broiler for 10 minutes or so.

question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Tangy Barbecue Chicken
Ingredients:
1 c. soy sauce
1/4 c. sesame oil
4 to 6 green onions, finely chopped
1 (1-inch) piece ginger root, peeled and minced
1/2 c. sugar
2 garlic cloves, finely chopped
Directions:
Combine soy sauce, sesame oil, garlic, onions and ginger in a saucepan.
Bring to a boil to dissolve sugar and stir to blend flavors. Cool and pour over chicken.
Let stand at room temperature for 2 hours or refrigerate for 4 hours.
Bring chicken back to room temperature.
Place on grill and grill each side for 10 minutes.
Brown remaining sauce on chicken while on grill.

question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Marinade(Great For Chicken And Spareribs)
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 medium onion, blenderized
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 c. ketchup
2 Tbsp. vinegar
1/2 tsp. Tabasco
1 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 c. water
Directions:
Heat all to boiling.
Marinate meat and brush every 15 minutes while cooking.

question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Tangy Chicken
Ingredients:
1 cut up fryer or 6 breasts
1 pkg. dry onion soup mix
1 (8 oz.) bottle Catalina dressing
1 can whole cranberries
1 large onion, cut fine
1 large bell pepper, cut fine
3 Tbsp. shortening
1 lb. hamburger meat
2 1/2 c. canned tomatoes (I use two cans stewed tomatoes and cut them up if they need it)
1/2 c. uncooked rice (I use Minute rice)
1 tsp. chili powder (you've got to be kidding! I put this in until I feel like I've got enough; I like to be able to taste the spicy taste, so put a lot of this in there!)
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Cook onion and green pepper slowly in shortening until onion is yellow.
Add meat and cook until it gets brown.
I always drain the grease off right here.
Add tomatoes, rice and seasoning.
Put in casserole dish (large size) and bake in oven at 350° for 1 hour.
I hope this will be a super dish for you, too.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
1 doz. boiled eggs
3/4 tsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. green relish
2 to 3 Tbsp. mayonnaise
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Boil eggs; cool and remove shells.
Cut in half.
Remove yolks to mixing bowl.
With fork, crumble yolks for easy mixing.
Add salt, pepper, sugar, green relish and mayonnaise and mix well.
Do not use too much mayonnaise or mixture will be runny.
Put 1/2 tablespoon of the yolk mixture back in egg white.
Garnish with paprika.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
8 hard-boiled eggs, halved lengthwise
4 slices bacon, crisp-cooked, drained and crumbled
4 tsp. prepared mustard
1 medium avocado, sliced
1/8 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. paprika
dash of pepper
1/4 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
Directions:
Remove yolks from egg whites; arrange whites on plate or container.
Sieve egg yolks and combine with remaining ingredients except avocado; mix well.
Refill egg whites with egg yolk mixture.
Sprinkle with additional paprika.
Garnish with avocado. Half of recipe may be stored in a container.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
6 hard-boiled eggs
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. salad dressing (mayo)
2 slices bacon, crisply fried and crumbled
1/2 c. finely shredded American cheese
2 Tbsp. snipped parsley
Directions:
Cut eggs lengthwise in half.
Slip out yolks and mash with fork.
Mix in seasonings and salad dressing.
Fill whites with egg yolk mixture, heaping it up slightly.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
6 hard-cooked eggs
1/8 tsp. seasoned salt blend or garlic salt
dash of pepper and Tabasco sauce
3 Tbsp. salad dressing or mayonnaise
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. prepared or dry mustard
1 Tbsp. chopped jalapeno peppers or more (for desired taste)
Directions:
Mix ingredients in egg yolks and sprinkle with paprika. Refrigerate until served. Recipe may be doubled.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
6 eggs, hard-boiled and peeled
1/2 tsp. mustard
salt and pepper to taste
2 tsp. pickle relish
1 to 2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1 c. rice
1 can water
1 Tbsp. butter
1 can beef consomme soup
1 medium onion, chopped
1/4 tsp. black pepper
4 large Irish potatoes, cooked
1/2 c. chopped onion
3 eggs, hard-boiled and chopped
1/2 to 1 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/4 c. chopped bell pepper
2 Tbsp. sweet pickle relish
salt and pepper
Directions:
Peel and cube potatoes.
Gently fold into all other ingredients.
Add 1/2 cup mayonnaise and stir, adding as much as you need to make it the consistency you want.
Add salt and pepper to your taste.
Chill 1 hour before serving.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a basic vinaigrette for salad?
answer:
Title: Salad With Vinaigrette Dressing
Ingredients:
3/4 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. white wine vinegar
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
3 to 4 drops hot pepper sauce
salad greens
bell peppers, mushrooms, tomatoes or any other vegetables of your choice
Directions:
In a jar with a tight fitting lid, combine the first 7 ingredients and shake well.
Toss salad greens and vegetables in a large bowl or arrange on individual salad plates.
Serve with dressing.
Yields 1 cup of dressing.

question: How do I make a basic vinaigrette for salad?
answer:
Title: Vinaigrette (Basic)
Ingredients:
1 tsp. Dijon mustard
scant 1/2 tsp. salt
5 twists of peppermill
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
scant tsp. fresh lemon juice
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/4 c. olive oil
Directions:
Put mustard in the bottom of a salad bowl.
Stir the first 5 ingredients, whisking constantly.
Add vegetable oil and olive oil in a very thin stream.
Makes 6 tablespoons of vinaigrette, enough for 10 to 12 cups of salad greens.
Use shortly after it is made. Add whatever you like, garlic, anchovies, shallots, sliced mushrooms, chopped capers, etc.
May be used on grilled fish or cold roast beef (add horseradish) or chicken.

question: How do I make a basic vinaigrette for salad?
answer:
Title: Rice Salad Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1/3 c. finely diced carrots
3/4 c. green beans, cut in 1/4-inch bits
1/4 c. diced celery
1/4 c. diced green bell pepper
1/2 c. chopped red onion
3 Tbsp. minced fresh parsley
2 1/2 c. cooked rice, warm or cold
4 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
4 Tbsp. olive oil
3 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
salt to taste
fresh ground black pepper to taste
pinch of thyme
pinch of basil
pinch of oregano
Directions:
Cook the carrots and green beans in a minimum of salted water until they are barely tender and drain immediately.
Combine the first 7 ingredients in a large bowl and toss together.
Combine the cheese, olive oil, vinegar and seasonings and whisk until smooth.
Pour the dressing over the salad, toss until everything is thoroughly combined and put in the refrigerator to chill for several hours.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make a basic vinaigrette for salad?
answer:
Title: Vinaigrette For Salad And Tomatoes
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. diced capers
1 tsp. diced tarragon leaves or 1/2 tsp. dry
1/2 medium onion, diced
1/2 medium red onion, diced
1 large dill pickle, diced
1 1/2 tsp. thyme
1 Tbsp. tarragon vinegar
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/3 c. red wine vinegar
1 c. salad oil
2 dashes Tabasco
2 dashes Worcestershire
salt and fresh ground pepper to taste
Directions:
Mix all the ingredients in a bowl.
This recipe has been used at LeBistro for 20 years.
Spoon over any fresh salad mixture. Also excellent over tomatoes and asparagus with fresh red onion.

question: How do I make a basic vinaigrette for salad?
answer:
Title: Tomato Vinaigrette Salad
Ingredients:
8 to 12 tomatoes, cut into pieces
1/4 c. finely chopped onion
1 green pepper, cut into pieces (optional)
1/2 c. wine vinegar
2/3 c. olive oil or salad oil
2 tsp. oregano leaves
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
2 cloves garlic, crushed
Directions:
Dressing should be mixed by putting ingredients in tightly covered jar and shaking vigorously until blended.
Cover salad and chill several hours or overnight before serving.
Spoon dressing over the tomatoes occasionally.

question: What can I make with spinach and feta?
answer:
Title: Feta Spinach And Fruit Salad With Honey-Lemon Dressing
Ingredients:
5 c. torn fresh spinach
1 c. cantaloupe chunks
1 c. halved strawberries
1/2 c. thin-sliced red onion rings
1 c. crumbled Feta natural cheese
1/4 c. pitted ripe olives
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. honey
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place spinach, fruit, onion, cheese and olives in large bowl. Toss lightly.
Mix remaining ingredients; add and toss.
