Bake at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes.
Cool and frost with frosting.

question: How do I make a pizza dough from scratch?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
3 3/4 c. flour
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 Tbsp. quick rise yeast (two 1/4 oz. packets)
1 tsp. salt
8 oz. lukewarm water (1 c.)
1/2 tsp. sugar
Directions:
Combine flour, yeast, salt and sugar in mixing bowl and stir. Add vegetable oil and water.
Mix together all ingredients.
Knead by hand for 3 minutes; shape and put in bowl. Cover and let rise until double in volume (approximately 1/2 hour).
Punch down; divide into 2 equal pieces and shape into round balls or leave in one piece for 16-inch pizza.
Let dough rest for 4 minutes.
Roll out approximately 12 or 16-inches in diameter.
Spray pizza pan lightly with no stick vegetable cooking spray and wipe off excess. Place on pizza pan; let rise for 10 to 15 minutes.
Add sauce, toppings and cheese.
Place on bottom rack in cold oven; turn oven to 500° and bake 17 to 20 minutes, depending on oven.

question: How do I make homemade peanut butter?
answer:
Title: Homemade Peanut Butter
Ingredients:
1 c. roasted peanuts, with shells and skins removed
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
Directions:
Put peanuts into blender or food processor.
Gradually add 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil, blending until texture is thick and creamy.
Keep homemade peanut butter refrigerated.
If oil separates, stir back in with spoon.

question: How do I make homemade peanut butter?
answer:
Title: Homemade Peanut Butter Candy
Ingredients:
3 c. sugar
1/8 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. milk
1/4 c. butter
1 tsp. vanilla
1 (18 oz.) jar Jif peanut butter (creamy)
Directions:
Combine peanut butter, sugar and salt in a large saucepan (3 quart size).
Add milk gradually; mix thoroughly and bring to a bubbly boil on high heat, stirring continuously.
Reduce heat to medium and continue to boil the mixture without stirring until it reaches a temperature of 232° or until a small amount of mixture forms a soft ball when dropped into cold water.
(Be sure bulb of thermometer is not resting on bottom of saucepan.)
Remove saucepan from heat; add butter and vanilla to mixture.
Do not stir.
Allow candy to cool at room temperature until it reaches 110°.

question: How do I make homemade peanut butter?
answer:
Title: Homemade Peanut Butter
Ingredients:
1 c. salted, roasted Spanish peanuts
1 tsp. sugar or honey (these are optional)
1 Tbsp. peanut oil
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Place ingredients in an electric blender.
Blend until mixture becomes paste-like or speadable.
It may be necessary to add more peanut oil.
The ingredients must be blended for several minutes. Store in tightly covered container.
Homemade peanut butter will separate on standing; stir before using.
You may leave out the sugar and salt, if desired.

question: How do I make homemade peanut butter?
answer:
Title: Homemade Peanut Butter Cookies
Ingredients:
1 box yellow cake mix
1/2 c. Crisco, softened
1/2 c. peanut butter
2 eggs
1 can cream cheese frosting
Directions:
Mix together: box of cake mix, crisco, peanut butter, and eggs. Mix well. Roll into small balls and place on cookie sheet. Bake at 350° for 10-12 minutes. Remove from cookie sheet and cool. Make a cookie sandwich by spreading cream cheese frosting on the flat side of one cookie and topping with the flat side of another.

question: How do I make homemade peanut butter?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Squares
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. margarine, softened
1 c. white sugar
1 c. brown sugar
2 eggs
2 c. flour (plain)
2/3 c. peanut butter (smooth)
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. soda
2 c. oats
Directions:
Cream the margarine and sugar.
Mix eggs, peanut butter, vanilla, salt and soda.
Add flour and oats.
Spread dough in slightly greased 9 x 13-inch pan. Bake 20 to 24 minutes at 350°. While hot, cover with milk chocolate pieces and allow to melt before icing.

question: What’s a good recipe for a vegan soup?
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Vegetable Soup
Ingredients:
2 c. sliced carrots
1 c. sliced celery
1 c. sliced onions
1 small turnip, peeled and diced (optional)
4 medium potatoes, peeled and diced
1 (16 oz.) can whole tomatoes, cut up
1 (16 oz.) can whole kernel corn, drained
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Place raw ingredients in a 5-quart kettle and cover with salt and peppered water.
Cook until tender.
Add tomatoes and corn (these make the soup) and heat through.
Serve with a sandwich for lunch or a first course at dinner.

question: What’s a good recipe for a vegan soup?
answer:
Title: Chewy Vegan Carrot Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. shredded raw carrots
1 c. raisins
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 1/2 c. water
1/3 c. margarine
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. ground cloves
1/2 tsp. ground allspice
1 tsp. ground nutmeg
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 c. whole wheat flour
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
Place carrots, raisins, sugar, water and margarine in saucepan and bring to simmer over medium heat.
Continue to simmer for 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and cool.

question: What’s a good recipe for a vegan soup?
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Vegetable Soup(Stone Soup)
Ingredients:
3/4 c. onion, sliced
2 c. diced potatoes
1 1/2 c. celery, sliced
3 qt. boiling water
1 1/2 c. diced carrots
5 Tbsp. butter
1 1/2 c. string beans and peas
4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
macaroni, broken in small pieces
rice (if desired)
1 can condensed tomato soup
Directions:
Wash and cut vegetables.
Heat butter in skillet.
Add onions and celery and simmer until soft.
Remove from heat; slowly add 3 quarts of boiling water.
Add seasonings and vegetables, macaroni and rice; boil until vegetables are tender (about 20 or 30 minutes).
Add tomato soup; heat.
Add more water, if needed.

question: What’s a good recipe for a vegan soup?
answer:
Title: Vegan Lentil Chili(Serves 6 To 8)
Ingredients:
1 c. dry lentils
1 can whole tomatoes, sliced or garden tomatoes (if available)
1 can kidney beans
1 (12 oz.) can tomato juice
1 bell pepper, chopped
1 onion, chopped
2 stalks chopped celery (optional)
small amount of vegetable or olive oil for sauteing
brown sugar
garlic powder or garlic salt
cumin
chili powder
Directions:
Soak the lentils overnight.
Saute onion, bell pepper and celery (if used), then combine with lentils, beans, juice and tomatoes.
Add brown sugar to sweeten to taste.
Season with chili powder, some garlic powder, salt and cumin to taste.
Simmer an hour or so.

question: What’s a good recipe for a vegan soup?
answer:
Title: Lentil Shepherd'S Pie
Ingredients:
1 c. dried green or brown lentils
4 Tbsp. butter or vegan margarine
2 large onions, peeled and thinly sliced
1 garlic clove, crushed
1 tsp. dried Herbs de Provence
1 (15 oz.) can tomatoes, chopped
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 to 3 Tbsp. chopped parsley
salt and pepper to taste
1 1/2 lb. potatoes, cooked and mashed
a little extra butter or vegan margarine
Directions:
Put the washed lentils into a large saucepan.
Cover with water and boil gently until tender, about 45 minutes.
Drain. Preheat oven to 400°.
Use 1/2 of the butter or vegan margarine to grease a shallow ovenproof dish.
Saute the onions in the remaining butter or vegan magarine in a large saucepan for 10 minutes.
Add the garlic, mixed herbs, tomatoes, soy sauce, lentils, parsley, salt and pepper.
Spoon the mixture into the dish.
Spread the mashed potatoes evenly over the top, drawing the prongs of the fork over the surface to make ridges.
Dot the whole surface with a little butter or vegan margarine.
Bake for 45 minutes until golden brown.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Almond-Spinach Pilaf(Serves 4)
Ingredients:
2 tsp. olive oil
1 c. thawed frozen chopped spinach, squeezed dry
1/2 c. chopped scallions
1/4 c. chopped fresh dill
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
4 ___ uncooked rice
1 ___ whole almonds, coarsely chopped
1 1/4 c. low sodium beef broth
1 small navel orange, peeled and sectioned
Directions:
In a medium saucepan over medium heat, warm oil.
Add the spinach, scallions, dill, salt and pepper.
Cook, stirring frequently until vegetables are tender, about 2 minutes.
Add the rice and almonds; cook, stirring constantly until rice is well coated with oil, about 2 minutes.
Pour in broth and bring to a boil.
Cover, reduce heat to low and simmer until rice is tender, 20 minutes.
Gently stir in orange sections.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Feta Spinach And Fruit Salad With Honey-Lemon Dressing
Ingredients:
5 c. torn fresh spinach
1 c. cantaloupe chunks
1 c. halved strawberries
1/2 c. thin-sliced red onion rings
1 c. crumbled Feta natural cheese
1/4 c. pitted ripe olives
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. honey
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place spinach, fruit, onion, cheese and olives in large bowl. Toss lightly.
Mix remaining ingredients; add and toss.
Makes 6 cups or 6 side-salad servings.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Greek Chickpeas Salad
Ingredients:
2 tsp. prepared Dijon style mustard
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 to 3/4 c. olive or vegetable oil
1/2 c. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. ground pepper
2 (20 oz. each) cans chickpeas, drained
1 medium red onion, sliced and separated into rings
1/4 lb. Feta cheese, crumbled
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
lettuce leaves (if desired)
Directions:
Combine cheese, mustard, salt, oil, lemon juice and pepper in container of electric blender; whirl until smooth.
Combine chickpeas and onion in large bowl.
Pour dressing over and toss. Refrigerate; may be prepared several days in advance.
Just before serving, add parsley; toss.
Spoon into lettuce lined salad bowl.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Couscous With Chickpeas And Feta Cheese
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) can chicken broth or vegetable broth
1 c. packaged couscous (1 box)
1 (15 1/2 oz.) can chickpeas, drained
1 c. sliced scallions (with tops)
4 oz. crumbled Feta
1 (2 1/4 oz.) can drained ripe olives
2/3 c. Italian vinaigrette dressing
Directions:
In medium saucepan, bring broth to boil.
Stir in couscous. Remove from heat; cover and let stand for 5 minutes.
Transfer couscous to large bowl and fluff with fork.
Let stand 5 minutes; fluff again. mix in chickpeas, scallions, cheese and olives.
Pour dressing over mixture and toss lightly with fork.
Serve on bed of lettuce.
Serves 6. Enjoy.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Spinach And Beans
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. olive oil
5 cloves garlic (whole), smashed
large bunch fresh spinach
1 (16 oz.) can cannellini beans
1 large tomato, cubed
1 (16 oz.) can garbanzo beans
1/4 tsp. oregano (leaf)
1/2 tsp. basil (leaf)
1 c. elbow macaroni
1/2 c. white wine
chopped fresh parsley
crusty bread
grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
In 6 to 8 quart pot brown garlic in olive oil.
Steam spinach with cover on; add rest of ingredients.
Cook elbow macaroni and add to mixture.
Break to high simmer; add wine to boil off alcohol (1 to 2 minutes).
Serve in bowl; sprinkle with parsley and Parmesan cheese.
Enjoy with crusty bread.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta
Ingredients:
sun-dried tomatoes
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 clove garlic, crushed
1 1/2 c. tomatoes, peeled, seeded and diced
1/2 c. heavy cream
1/4 c. sun-dried tomatoes
1 Tbsp. Italian parsley, chopped
salt and pepper
pasta (except spaghetti or linguine)
Directions:
Cook pasta according to package directions.
Heat oil in skillet; add garlic and saute 1 minute.
Add tomatoes; heat to boiling.
Stir until thickens, about 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and sun-dried tomatoes and simmer about 5 minutes.
Add salt and pepper.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pesto Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1 pkg prepared pesto
1/2 c. miracle whip
3 c. rotini cooked and drained
1/2 c. pitted ripe olive slices
3 Tbsp. chopped sun dried tomatoes in oil drained
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Mix pesto and salad dressing until well blended.
Add remaining ingredients and mix well.
Refrigerate.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Italian Pasta
Ingredients:
1 c. Hellmann's real or light mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried basil
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 c. twist macaroni, cooked and drained
1 c. quartered cherry tomatoes
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1/2 c. sliced ripe olives
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients.
Stir in remaining ingredients. Cover.
Chill.
Makes 3 cups.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Fresh Tomato Sauce
Ingredients:
1 medium onion, chopped
2 tsp. olive oil
3 tomatoes, peeled and seeded
1/2 tsp. salt
12 oz. pasta, cooked
1/2 c. chicken broth
1 Tbsp. leaf basil
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. black pepper
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Saute onion in olive oil in a large nonstick skillet until golden.
Add tomatoes and simmer until tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Add broth, basil and oregano, simmer to thicken sauce, 5 to 7 minutes.
Stir in salt and pepper.
Serve over hot, cooked pasta. Sprinkle with cheese.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Italian Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried basil
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 c. twist macaroni, cooked and drained
1 c. quartered cherry tomatoes
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1/2 c. sliced ripe olive
Directions:
Can also add sliced artichoke hearts.

question: What’s a good recipe for a garlic butter steak?
answer:
Title: Steak Butter
Ingredients:
1/2 c. margarine, at room temperature
1/2 c. butter, at room temperature
1 clove garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. basil
1 tsp. hickory salt
1 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. chopped olives or green onion tops
Directions:
Mix altogether and serve over cooked steak.

question: What’s a good recipe for a garlic butter steak?
answer:
Title: Favorite Recipe
Ingredients:
1 car
2 or more people (friendly)
Directions:
Take I-20 east to I-75/I-85 Atlanta interchange.
Exit International Blvd.
Turn right into Steak and Ale and enjoy.

question: What’s a good recipe for a garlic butter steak?
answer:
Title: Steak Butter
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. minced green onion
1 c. dry wine
1/2 c. butter, softened
2 tsp. chopped parsley
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Cook onion and wine in a small saucepan until the liquid is reduced to 1/4 cup.
Remove from heat and cool.
With beater, cream butter and parsley.
Gradually beat in the wine mixture. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Makes 3/4 cup butter.

question: What’s a good recipe for a garlic butter steak?
answer:
Title: Steak Marinade
Ingredients:
1 qt. Italian dressing
1/4 c. Accent
1/4 c. Worcestershire sauce
good dashes of garlic powder (not salt)
good dashes of pepper
1 pt. blended whiskey
Directions:
The quantities of the ingredients are variable according to the person.

question: What’s a good recipe for a garlic butter steak?
answer:
Title: Garlic Steak
Ingredients:
2 lb. boneless round steak (1-inch thick)
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 c. vegetable oil
2 onions, sliced
1/2 c. chopped fresh parsley
8 cloves garlic, crushed
2 (10 3/4 oz.) cans chicken broth
1 1/2 c. water
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
hot cooked noodles
Directions:
Dredge steak in flour; pound to 1/2-inch thickness.
Cut steak into serving size pieces.
Brown steaks in hot oil in a Dutch oven.
Remove from skillet and set aside.
Add onion to pan drippings; saute until tender.
Return steak to Dutch oven; add remaining ingredients except noodles.
Cover.
Reduce heat and simmer 1 1/2 to 2 hours or until steak is tender.
Serve over noodles.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted shrimp?
answer:
Title: Butterflied Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter
2 lb. medium shrimp, peeled, deveined and butterflied
3 garlic cloves, smashed and chopped
1 1/2 green peppers, cut into thin strips
salt and pepper
1 large lemon, peeled and diced
1 Tbsp. parsley, chopped
1/4 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Heat butter in large frying pan.
Add shrimp and cook 2 minutes on each side over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and season well. Continue cooking for 1 minute.
Stir in green peppers and diced lemon.
Cook 1 more minute.
Add parsley, paprika, salt and pepper. Mix and serve.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp With Pesto
Ingredients:
1 c. washed and dried basil
1 c. washed and dried spinach leaves
4 cloves garlic
1/4 c. fresh lemon juice
1/4 c. pine nuts (may roast them first)
1/4 to 1/2 c. Parmesan cheese, grated
salt and pepper
1/2 to 3/4 c. good olive oil
Directions:
Put the above into the bowl of a food processor; turn on unit and very slowly add the olive oil through the tube until the mixture is smooth and thick. Refrigerate.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. parsley flakes
1 pkg. (12 oz.) frozen, peeled, deveined, quick cooking shrimp
Directions:
Place butter in custard cup. Microwave at high 30-45 second, until melted. Stir in garlic powder and parsley flakes.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted shrimp?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Potatoes(Preparation: 10 Minutes. Baking: 25 Minutes.  Servings: 4.)
Ingredients:
1 to 2 large cloves garlic, peeled and chopped
4 Tbsp. butter
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 lb. small potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/8 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
Place garlic, butter and water in small saucepan; simmer until water evaporates and garlic is tender. Strain butter; mash soft garlic through very fine strainer.
Toss potatoes in garlic butter; place in single layer in large baking dish.
Bake for 25 minutes, turning potatoes occasionally, until they are tender and browned.
Remove potatoes from baking dish with slotted spoon.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted shrimp?
answer:
Title: Scampi(Microwave)
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
1 large garlic clove, finely diced
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 tsp. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 lb. medium shrimp, shelled and deveined
Directions:
In a 1 1/2-quart glass casserole dish, cook butter on Roast for 1 1/2 minutes.
Add garlic; cook on High for 1 1/2 minutes or until butter is bubbly.
Mix in Parmesan cheese, parsley, lemon juice and shrimp.
Cook on High for 2 minutes or until shrimp are cooked.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make garlic bread from scratch?
answer:
Title: Scratch Corn Bread
Ingredients:
1/3 c. flour
3/4 c. corn meal
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 egg, beaten
2/3 c. milk
2 Tbsp. lard or oil
Directions:
Combine flour, baking powder and salt together. Cut in shortening, milk and egg.
Add to dry ingredients.
Stir only long enough to mix.
Pour into greased pan (8 x 8-inch) and bake at 425° for 25 minutes.
Butter top when done.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make garlic bread from scratch?
answer:
Title: Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 loaf Italian bread
garlic powder
1/2 c. fresh garlic
1/2 c. butter
Directions:
Cut loaf in half lengthwise.
Put butter on both halves.
Put a thin layer of fresh garlic evenly on both halves.
Lightly shake garlic powder on both halves.
Place both halves on a sheet pan and cook under the broiler for 3 to 4 minutes or until light golden brown.

question: How do I make garlic bread from scratch?
answer:
Title: Scratch Corn Bread
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
3/4 c. cornmeal
1/4 c. sugar
2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. vegetable oil
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. milk
Directions:
Combine
dry
ingredients, then add oil, eggs and milk. Pour into greased 8 x 8-inch pan.
Bake in 400° oven for 20 to 25 minutes.

question: How do I make garlic bread from scratch?
answer:
Title: Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 slice bread
garlic salt
butter
Directions:
Spread butter on bread.
Sprinkle on garlic.
Put into preheated oven at 325°.
Cook for 3 to 5 minutes.

question: How do I make garlic bread from scratch?
answer:
Title: Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 unsliced loaf French bread
1 lb. butter
1 tsp. garlic salt
1 Tbsp. parsley
1 small onion, diced
Directions:
Melt butter in a saucepan.
Add parsley, onion and garlic.
Cut bread in half (longways).
Brush on butter mixture over both halves of bread.
Bake at 325° on a cookie sheet for 10 to 15 minutes or until brown.

question: What’s an easy slow cooker recipe with pork?
answer:
Title: Slow Cooker Chops
Ingredients:
6 pork chops
1 can condensed cream of chicken soup
1 medium onion, chopped
3 Tbsp. ketchup
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Brown chops and remove from pan. Combine remaining ingredients and heat in pan in which chops were browned.
Layer chops and sauce in slow cooker or heavy Dutch oven.
Either bake, covered, in a 350° oven for 1 hour or in slow cooker on high setting until bubbly, then simmer on low until tender and sauce is consistency of gravy, 5 or 6 hours.

question: What’s an easy slow cooker recipe with pork?
answer:
Title: Barbecued Pork
Ingredients:
3 lb. pork, cubed
2 c. onions, chopped
3 green bell peppers, chopped
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/4 c. vinegar
6 oz. can tomato paste
1 1/2 Tbsp. chili powder
1 tsp. dry mustard
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in slow cooker; cover and cook on high 8 hours. Shred meat with fork. Mix into sauce and heat through. Serve on hamburger/sandwich buns with grated cheese and cole slaw on top.

question: What’s an easy slow cooker recipe with pork?
answer:
Title: Swedish Meat Balls For Slow Cooker
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground chuck
1/2 lb. ground veal
1/2 lb. ground pork
2 c. fine dry bread crumbs
2 c. half and half
3 eggs
1 large onion, minced
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 c. butter or margarine
2 cans (10 1/2 oz. each) condensed beef broth
3 Tbsp. flour
1/4 c. water
Directions:
In large mixing bowl, combine ground meats, bread crumbs, 1 cup of the half and half, eggs, onion and seasonings.
Form 1-inch meat balls.

question: What’s an easy slow cooker recipe with pork?
answer:
Title: Barbecue Pork And Beef
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. beef stew
1 1/2 lb. pork cubes
2 c. chopped onion
3 green peppers, chopped
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/4 c. cider vinegar
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 c. chili powder
2 tsp. Worcestershire
Directions:
In a 3 1/2 to 5-quart slow cooker, cover and cook on high (300°) for 8 hours.
Stir with wire whisk until meat is shredded. Serve on buns.

question: What’s an easy slow cooker recipe with pork?
answer:
Title: Easy Pork Chops
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup
4 to 5 pork chops with the bone
Directions:
Place pork chops in slow cooker.
Spread soup over chops. Turn on low for 8 hours or on high for 5 to 6 hours.
Serve with mashed potatoes.
To stop the cooker from heating up the house, place cooker in the garage or on the patio.

question: What’s a good recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef-Vegetable Stew(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
1 large can crushed tomatoes (undrained)
3 Tbsp. quick cooking tapioca
2 Tbsp. dried basil
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. black pepper
1 1/2 lb. red potatoes, cut into 1-inch cubes
3 medium carrots, cut into 1-inch slices
1 medium onion, chopped
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 1/2 lb. lean chuck roast, cut into 1-inch cubes
2 tsp. canola oil
Directions:
In a bowl, combine tomatoes, tapioca, basil, sugar, salt and pepper; let this stand for 15 to 20 minutes. Put potatoes, carrots, onion and celery in large slow cooker.

question: What’s a good recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
2 lb. beef chuck, cubed
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/4 to 1/2 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. paprika
1 1/2 c. beef broth
1/2 garlic clove, minced
1 bay leaf
4 carrots, sliced
2 onions, chopped
1 rib celery
3 potatoes, diced
Directions:
Place meat in slow cooker. Combine flour, salt, pepper and paprika. Stir into meat until coated. Add remaining ingredients. Mix well. Cover. Cook on low 10 to 12 hours or high 4 to 6 hours. Stir and serve.

question: What’s a good recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. beef cubes, cut into small pieces
4 small cans beef broth
2 envelopes Knorr classic brown gravy
as little or as much carrots as desired
as little or as much potatoes as desired
as little or as much celery as desired
2 medium onions, cut
flour
garlic salt to taste
Directions:
Put beef cubes in a bowl with flour, a little black pepper and garlic salt.
Coat beef cubes.
Brown beef cubes in hot oil on top of stove.
When brown, put beef cubes in slow cooker.
Mix in remaining ingredients; cook on medium-high for 7 hours or on high for 5 hours or until vegetables are tender.
Enjoy with hot French bread.

question: What’s a good recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Easy Beef Stew
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef stew meat
1 can tomato soup
1 can beef broth
1 can cream of celery soup
4 to 5 potatoes, cut up
3 carrots, cut up
1 can whole kernel corn
1 small onion, chopped
salt
pepper
2 bay leaves
Directions:
Combine all the ingredients in a slow cooker.
Cook on medium heat while you're at work (6 to 8 hours).
Dinner is ready when you get home.
(Make sure you remove the bay leaf.)

question: What’s a good recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: German Sauerbraten(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
2 lb. stew beef, brown and add rest of ingredients
2 Tbsp. oil
2 onions, sliced
2 tsp. salt
2 c. vinegar or little less
1 c. boiling water
12 crumbled gingersnaps
Directions:
Wrap 2 bay leaves, 2 whole cloves, 1 teaspoon mixed pickling spices in cheesecloth.
Add to sauerbraten.
Cook 8 to 10 hours on low.
Last hour on high.
Add 3 tablespoons flour and 1/2 cup cold water.

question: What’s a good recipe for buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 egg
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
maple syrup
Directions:
Beat egg.
Combine flour, baking powder, soda, salt and sugar. Add egg.
Add buttermilk and oil, beating until mixture is smooth.
For each pancake, pour about 1/4 cup batter onto a hot, lightly greased griddle.
Turn pancakes when tops are covered with bubbles and edges look cooked.
Serve with maple syrup.
Yields 8 (4-inch) pancakes.

question: What’s a good recipe for buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 egg
1 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 c. flour
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. soda, mixed with buttermilk
Directions:
Mix soda in buttermilk; set aside.
Put dry ingredients in large bowl; add buttermilk, egg and oil.
Stir until mixed good. Grease griddle.
Recipe may be doubled.
Turn pancakes as soon as puffed and full of bubbles.

question: What’s a good recipe for buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Favorite Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. sifted all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. soda
2 tsp. baking powder
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 beaten egg
1 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. salad oil or melted shortening
Directions:
Sift together flour, baking powder, sugar, soda and salt. Combine egg, milk and salad oil; add to dry ingredients, stirring just until flour is moistened (batter will be lumpy).
Bake on hot griddle.
Makes about 12 dollar size or eight (4-inch) pancakes.

question: What’s a good recipe for buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 egg
1 1/4 c. buttermilk or sour milk
2 Tbsp. Crisco oil
1 c. flour
1 Tbsp. sugar
2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
In small mixing bowl, beat egg with fork.
Beat in buttermilk or sour milk and oil.
Set aside.
In large mixing bowl, stir together flour, sugar, baking powder, soda and salt.
Add egg mixture to flour mixture.
Stir until blended but still slightly lumpy.
Lightly grease a griddle or heavy skillet.
Heat until water sprinkled on griddle dances across surface.
Pour about 1/4 cup batter on griddle for each pancake.
When pancakes have a bubbly surface and slightly dry edges, turn to cook other side. Leftover batter may be refrigerated.
Makes 8 to 9 (4-inch) pancakes.

question: What’s a good recipe for buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. flour
2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. soda
3/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 whole egg
1 1/4 c. buttermilk
3 Tbsp. Wesson oil
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Sift together flour, baking powder, soda, salt and sugar in 1 bowl.
In another bowl, beat egg.
Add buttermilk, Wesson oil and vanilla.
Stir and add liquid ingredients to dry.
Stir, leaving entire ingredients slightly lumpy.
Bake on hot griddle (greased) until bubbles form.
Turn once and bake other side or place on waffle iron until lightly browned.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for lemon garlic roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (2 1/2 to 3 lb.) broiler fryer chicken
2 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 1/2 tsp. garlic powder with parsley
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Sprinkle chicken with lemon juice, garlic powder, seasoning salt and pepper.
Wrap chicken loosely in foil.
Refrigerate overnight.
Place chicken in ovenproof dish and bake, uncovered, in a 375° oven for 1 hour or until done.
Yields 4 servings.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for lemon garlic roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Roast Chicken With Lemon
Ingredients:
1 whole chicken (about 3 lb.)
salt and freshly ground pepper
1 garlic clove, split in half
1 lemon, quartered
1 small onion, quartered
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Rinse chicken inside and out; pat dry. Season inside and out with salt and pepper.
Rub garlic over the skin, then place inside cavity.
Stuff lemon and onion inside cavity.
Tie legs together.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for lemon garlic roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
2 1/2 to 3 lb. broiler-fryer chicken
2 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 cloves garlic
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Sprinkle chicken with lemon juice, garlic powder, seasoning salt and pepper.
Wrap chicken loosely in foil.
Refrigerate overnight.
Place chicken in ovenproof dish and bake.
Top with garlic cloves.
Bake in 375° oven for 1 hour or until done.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for lemon garlic roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (2 1/2 to 3 lb.) chicken
2 Tbsp. garlic powder with parsley
2 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Sprinkle chicken with lemon juice, garlic powder, seasoned salt and pepper.
Wrap chicken loosely in foil.
Refrigerate overnight.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for lemon garlic roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (2 1/2 to 3 lb.) fryer chicken
2 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 1/2 tsp. garlic powder with parsley
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Sprinkle chicken with lemon juice, garlic powder, seasoned salt and pepper.
Wrap chicken loosely in foil.
Refrigerate overnight.
Place chicken in ovenproof dish and bake, uncovered, in a 375° oven for 1 hour or until chicken is done.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make creamy mashed sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Mashed Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 sweet potatoes
1/4 c. sugar
1 stick margarine, softened
2/3 c. milk
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. nutmeg
Directions:
Place the sweet potatoes in a large pot. Cover with water about 4-inches over the top of the potatoes.
Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Cook 30 minutes.
When slightly cooled, peel potatoes.
Place in a large bowl.
Mash well or use a mixer until all lumps are gone.
Add remaining ingredients and mix well. Place potatoes in a buttered casserole dish (2 to 3 quarts). Bake in preheated 350° oven for 25 minutes.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make creamy mashed sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Creamy Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
5 lb. sweet potatoes, peeled and cooked
4 eggs, lightly beaten
1/2 c. orange juice
1/2 c. butter or margarine, softened
1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1/2 tsp. ground nutmeg
dash of salt
miniature marshmallows
Directions:
In a large bowl, mash sweet potatoes.
Add eggs, orange juice, butter, sugar, vanilla, nutmeg and salt; mix well.
Transfer to a greased 3-quart baking dish.
Bake at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes or until set.
Top with marshmallows.
Return to oven until they just begin to puff and melt, about 5 to 10 minutes.
Yield:
10 to 12 servings.

question: How do I make creamy mashed sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
5 lb. potatoes, pared
2 tsp. salt
2 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese with chives, cubed
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. heavy cream
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
paprika (optional)
Directions:
Cook potatoes with 1 teaspoon salt in boiling water until tender.
Drain.
Mash potatoes until smooth; add cream cheese, 4 tablespoons butter, garlic salt, pepper and 1 teaspoon salt.
Mix until smooth.
Gradually add cream; mix well after each addition. Put in greased baking dish.
(Bake at once or cover with foil and refrigerate overnight.)
Dot top of potatoes with 2 tablespoons butter and sprinkle with paprika.
Bake in 325° oven 30 minutes. Increase heat to 375° and bake 30 minutes more.

question: How do I make creamy mashed sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 cloves crushed garlic
4 medium-sized all-purpose potatoes, peeled and thin sliced
1 bay leaf
1 Tbsp. margarine
1/2 c. buttermilk
3 Tbsp. plain low-fat yogurt
Directions:
In a medium-size heavy saucepan, bring 3 cups water to a boil. Add garlic, potatoes and bay leaf.
Cook, partially covered, over moderate heat until potatoes are "fork tender" (reserving 3 tablespoons cooking water).
Discard bay leaf, transfer potatoes to a large mixing bowl.
Add margarine, buttermilk and yogurt.
Beat with a mixer, then add just enough of the reserved water to make the potatoes creamy.

question: How do I make creamy mashed sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Mashed Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 to 4 sweet potatoes, cooked
1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
frozen orange juice concentrate (undiluted)
Directions:
Mash the cooked sweet potatoes.
Add margarine or butter and orange juice concentrate; beat until the mixture is smooth. Adjust the butter and juice concentrate until the desired taste is achieved.

question: How do I make a simple granola?
answer:
Title: Simple Granola
Ingredients:
3 c. 3 minute oats or old fashioned oats
1/2 c. raisins
1/2 c. sunflower nuts
1/2 c. slivered almonds
1/2 c. chopped pecans
1/2 c. wheat germ
1/2 c. coconut
1/2 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. honey
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except oil and honey in large mixing bowl.
Mix oil and honey together; pour over oat mixture.
Mix well.
Spread into 2 (15 x 10 x 1-inch) baking pans.
Bake in a 300° oven for about 20 minutes, stirring once.
Remove from pan when cool.
Store in tightly covered container.

question: How do I make a simple granola?
answer:
Title: Easy Granola Mix
Ingredients:
5 c. quick-cooking rolled oats
1 1/2 c. wheat germs
1 c. shredded coconut
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 c. maple syrup
1/2 butter, melted
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. raisins and/or chopped walnuts
Directions:
Mix oats, wheat germ, coconut, brown sugar and cinnamon in a large bowl. Add maple syrup and mix well. Stir together melted butter and vanilla and mix in the mixture. Turn into a large shallow pan. Bake at 325° for 15 to 20 minutes, stirring after 10 minutes. Cool. Add raisins and/or nuts. Store in airtight container.

question: How do I make a simple granola?
answer:
Title: Granola(Kids Recipe)
Ingredients:
4 c. old-fashioned oatmeal, uncooked
1 1/2 c. wheat germ (raw or toasted)
1 c. coconut, grated
1/4 c. nonfat dry milk
2 Tbsp. cinnamon
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/3 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. honey
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1/2 c. sesame seed
1/2 c. slivered almonds
1 c. raisins
Directions:
In a large bowl, mix dry ingredients.
Combine oil, honey and vanilla in a saucepan and warm.
Add these to the dry ingredients and stir until all the particles are coated.
(Hand mixing works well here).
Spread this mixture in a long, low pan or rimmed baking sheet that has been sprayed with vegetable shortening. Bake at 250° for an hour, turning with spatula every 15 minutes. When finished toasting, add raisins and toss.
Cool and store in an airtight container.

question: How do I make a simple granola?
answer:
Title: Homemade Granola
Ingredients:
5 c. quick oats
3/4 c. brown sugar
1/3 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. dry milk
1/3 c. honey
3/4 tsp. cinnamon
pinch of salt
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Place 1/4 cup of mung beans in a quart jar and cover with tepid water.
Cover with cheesecloth and tie securely.
Soak overnight.
Drain water off.
Set in a warm, dark place.
Every day, rinse with tepid water and drain.
Place in a warm dark place again.
Repeat 4 to 5 days or until sprouts are as big as you want.

question: How do I make a simple granola?
answer:
Title: Homemade Granola
Ingredients:
2 c. old fashioned oats
1 1/2 c. chopped almonds
1 c. shredded coconut
1/2 c. toasted wheat germ
1 tsp. salt
1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1 1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Preheat
oven
to
300°.
In a large bowl combine oats, almonds, coconut,
wheat
germ and salt.
Stir in milk and oil and mix
thoroughly.
Spread
on
a
wax-paper
lined shallow baking pan and bake, stirring occasionally for 1 hour or until golden. Stir
in
raisins.	Let
cool
and	store in airtight containers. Makes 7 1/2 cups.
(And it's delicious too!)

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a low-fat dip?
answer:
Title: Low-Fat Dip
Ingredients:
1 (12 oz.) carton low-fat cottage cheese
1 Tbsp. low-fat buttermilk
1 Tbsp. minced onions
1/2 tsp. dried whole dill weed
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
2 drops Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in container of an electric blender; process until smooth.
Chill.
Spoon dip into a serving bowl and serve with assorted vegetables.
Serving size is 1 tablespoon (11 calories per serving).

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a low-fat dip?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Dip(Low-Fat Recipe)
Ingredients:
1 c. fat-free mayonnaise
1 c. fat-free sour cream
1/3 c. chopped green pepper
1/4 c. chile sauce
1 Tbsp. prepared horseradish
1/4 tsp. lite salt
1/8 tsp. ground pepper
2 c. finely chopped cooked shrimp
Directions:
Stir all ingredients until well mixed.
Cover and chill. Makes 3 cups.
Twelve 1/4 cup servings.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a low-fat dip?
answer:
Title: Creamy Dill Dip(Low-Fat Recipe)
Ingredients:
1 c. fat-free Miracle Whip
2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
1 Tbsp. skim milk
1 Tbsp. dill weed
Directions:
Combine ingredients; cover and chill.
Serve with raw vegetables.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a low-fat dip?
answer:
Title: Quick Fruit Dip(Low-Fat)
Ingredients:
1 1/3 c. plain low-fat yogurt
1/4 c. orange marmalade
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
6 c. assorted fresh fruits
Directions:
Combine first 3 ingredients.
Cover and chill.
Serve with assorted fresh fruits.
Yields 1 1/2 cups dip.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a low-fat dip?
answer:
Title: Ranch Style Dip(Low-Fat)
Ingredients:
1 c. low-fat cottage cheese
2 Tbsp. skim milk
1/2 c. plain low-fat yogurt
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/8 tsp. onion powder
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Position knife blade in food processor bowl; add cottage cheese and milk.
Process about 45 seconds until smooth.
Fold in yogurt and remaining ingredients.
Cover and chill thoroughly. Serve with assorted fresh vegetables.
Yields 1 1/2 cups. Contains 1.5 g protein, 2 g fat, 7 g carbohydrates.

question: How do I make a crispy baked falafel?
answer:
Title: Falafel
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. dried chickpeas (garbanzo beans, about 12 oz.)
2 c. chopped fresh cilantro
1 tsp. cumin
1 tsp. allspice
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper
5 garlic cloves, peeled
1 onion, quartered
1 leek, trimmed and cut into 3 pieces
6 Tbsp. olive oil, divided
Yogurt-Tahini Dip
8 (6-inch) pitas, cut in half
Directions:
Sort and wash chickpeas and place in large bowl. Cover with water to 2 inches above beans. Cover and let stand for 8 hours. Drain beans. Combine chickpeas, cilantro and next 8 ingredients in a food processor until mixture resembles coarse meal. Divide chickpea mixture into 16 equal portions, shaping each into 1/2 inch thick patties. Heat 2 Tbsp. oil in a large non-stick skillet. Add 5 patties and cook 3 minutes on each side or until golden brown. Repeat procedure twice with remaining oil and patties. Spread 1 Tbsp. Yogurt-Tahini Dip in each pita half. Fill with 1 patty. Serves 8 (2 pita halves each).

question: How do I make a crispy baked falafel?
answer:
Title: Crispy Crisps
Ingredients:
1 box puff pastry
1 egg
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. water
poppy seed, sesame seed or Cajun seasoning (optional)
Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°.
Thaw pastry.
Roll one sheet at a time into an 18 x 10-inch size pan.
In a cup beat 1 egg; add salt and water and beat.
Brush pastry with egg mixture.
Sprinkle your choice of remaining ingredients over pastry.
Cut crosswise into 1/4-inch strips.
Place on large cookie sheet.
Bake 8 to 10 minutes.
When cool, store in airtight container.

question: How do I make a crispy baked falafel?
answer:
Title: Soy Falafel
Ingredients:
1 cake firm tofu
1/3 c. finely chopped onions
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 c. bread crumbs
1/4 c. chopped fresh Italian parsley
1/2 Tbsp. dark sesame oil
1 Tbsp. tamari soy sauce
ground black pepper to taste
1 or more garlic cloves to taste, minced
1 tsp. ground cumin
1 tsp. turmeric
1 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Press and mash the tofu.
Mix with remaining ingredients in a medium bowl.
Form into 1-inch balls. Bake on oiled baking sheet for about 30 minutes, turning occasionally until golden and crusty on the outside.
These make a great sandwich served with sliced fresh tomato in pita pockets with a sauce made of plain yogurt and fresh dill.
(Not a children's favorite!)

question: How do I make a crispy baked falafel?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Bake
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) pkg. broccoli or California Blend
3/4 lb. cubed Velveeta
3/4 c. crushed buttery crackers
2 Tbsp. margarine
Directions:
Mix broccoli and Velveeta; spoon into greased 10 x 6-inch baking dish.
Sprinkle with crumbs; dot with margarine.
Bake 25 to 30 minutes or until hot and bubbly.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: How do I make a crispy baked falafel?
answer:
Title: Delicious Crispies
Ingredients:
1 yeast cake
1/2 c. water
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. shortening
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. milk, scalded
5 to 6 c. flour
1 tsp. lemon flavoring
1/2 c. soft butter
1 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
1/2 c. sugar
Directions:
Soften yeast in warm water.
Add 1/2 cup sugar, shortening and salt to scalded milk.
Cool.
Add 2 cups flour and beat well.
Add eggs, yeast and lemon flavoring.
Beat well and add remaining flour.
Knead until smooth.
Place in greased bowl.
Cover and let rise until doubled (1 1/2 hours).

question: What can I make with avocado and eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Egg Salad
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. sour cream
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. hot pepper sauce (optional)
2 avocados, peeled and chopped
6 hard boiled eggs, chopped
1 c. chopped tomatoes
1/2 c. chopped red onions
1/4 cup fresh parsley or cilantro
Directions:
In a medium bowl, stir together mayonnaise, sour cream, lemon juice, salt and hot pepper sauce until well blended. Toss lightly with remaining ingredients until evenly coated with dressing. Cover - chill to blend flavors.

question: What can I make with avocado and eggs?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Avocado
Ingredients:
3 avocados, halved lengthwise
1 large carrot, diced small
8 oz. peas
8 oz. green beans, diced
1 lb. potatoes, diced small
1/4 c. oil
2 eggs
mayonnaise
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 lemon, juice only
1/2 tsp. mustard
1 tooth of garlic
salt to taste
Directions:
Boil the cut-up carrot, peas, green beans and potatoes.
Put the eggs in blender.
Add a continuous thread of oil a little at a time.
Add garlic, pepper, mustard and salt to taste and finally add lemon juice.

question: What can I make with avocado and eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Egg Salad
Ingredients:
4 hard-cooked shelled eggs, diced
4 strips bacon, fried, drained and crumbled
1 Tbsp. minced onion
2 large avocados, halved and pitted
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise or salad dressing
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. bottled mustard or to taste
salt to taste
Directions:
Combine eggs, bacon and onion.
Cut and scoop avocado pulp and mash with a fork or large plate.
Stir in mayonnaise, lemon juice, prepared mustard and salt.
Add egg mixture; spoon into pretty glass cups.
Garnish with leaf of lettuce.

question: What can I make with avocado and eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Eggs
Ingredients:
1 large ripe avocado
8 hard-cooked eggs, cut in half
1/2 c. softened cream cheese
pinch of salt and pepper
lemon juice
Directions:
Mash yolks of eggs with fork.
Add the cheese, 3/4 avocado, lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Stuff the egg whites.
Slice remaining avocado thinly.
Put thin slice of avocado on top of eggs.

question: What can I make with avocado and eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Loaf Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
3/4 c. shortening, creamed
3 eggs
2 c. flour
3 tsp. cinnamon
3/4 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. allspice
1 1/2 tsp. soda
1 1/2 c. pureed avocado
3/4 c. buttermilk
2 tsp. vanilla extract
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
3/4 c. raisins
Directions:
Combine sugar and shortening, beating until light and fluffy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Sift dry ingredients together.
Fold into sugar mixture.
Add pureed avocado and buttermilk.
Stir in vanilla, walnuts and raisins. Let batter stand for 10 minutes.
Grease glass loaf pan with additional shortening.
Line greased pan with waxed paper.
Fill half full with batter.
Microwave on High for 8 minutes, turning quarter turn every 2 minutes.
Cool for a few minutes; remove to rack to complete cooling.
Repeat with remaining batter for second loaf.

question: What’s a good appetizer recipe for a party?
answer:
Title: Party Appetizers
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground chuck
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/8 tsp. onion salt
1/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. taco sauce
1 to 2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Mix raw chuck with seasonings.
Spread on thin party rye bread.
Place in oven at 450° until brown.
Serve hot.

question: What’s a good appetizer recipe for a party?
answer:
Title: Party Pizza Appetizers
Ingredients:
1 lb. hot sausage, cooked, drained and crumbled
1 c onion, chopped
1/2 c sharp cheese, grated
1/2 c grated parmesan cheese (from wedge)
1 1/2 tsp oregano
1 tsp garlic salt
1 (8 oz) can tomato sauce
1 (6 oz) can tomato paste
3 cans flaky biscuits
Directions:
Combine first 8 ingredients. Separate each biscuit into 3 pizza rounds. Spread with mixture. Put pizzas on cookie sheet and freeze. Remove from cookie sheet and store in
plastic bags. Bake frozen pizzas at 425° for 10 minutes.

question: What’s a good appetizer recipe for a party?
answer:
Title: Party Pizza Appetizers(Makes 90)
Ingredients:
1 lb. hot sausage, cooked, drained and crumbled
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. sharp cheese, grated
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese (from wedge)
1 1/2 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. garlic salt
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
3 cans flaky biscuits
Directions:
Combine all ingredients, except biscuits.
Separate each biscuit into 3 pizza rounds.
Spread with mixture.
Put pizza on cookie sheet and store in plastic bags.
Bake frozen pizzas at 425° for 10 minutes.
Great for a cocktail party.

question: What’s a good appetizer recipe for a party?
answer:
Title: Party Casserole
Ingredients:
8 oz. medium egg noodles
3 qt. water
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 c. chopped onion
1 green pepper, chopped
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 c. sour cream
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. cubed, cooked chicken
2 c. cubed, cooked ham
1 c. ripe or pimento-stuffed olives, halved
4 oz. diced pimentos
1 can artichoke hearts, drained and halved
1/2 c. buttered bread crumbs
Directions:
Add egg noodles and salt to rapidly boiling water, stirring occasionally until tender; drain.
Saute onion in butter or margarine until tender, stir in green pepper and cook 1 minute longer.
In large bowl blend mushroom soup, sour cream, salt and pepper, chicken, ham, olives, pimentos and artichoke hearts.
Mix gently, spoon into buttered 3-quart casserole.
Sprinkle with buttered crumbs.
Bake at 325° for 1 hour, serve with grated Parmesan cheese.

question: What’s a good appetizer recipe for a party?
answer:
Title: Party Pizza Appetizers
Ingredients:
1 lb. hot sausage, cooked and drained
1 c. onion, chopped
1/2 c. sharp cheese, grated
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 1/2 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. salt
1 (8 oz.) tomato sauce
1 (8 oz.) tomato paste
3 cans biscuits
Directions:
Combine all ingredients, except biscuits.
Separate each biscuit into 3 pieces.
Make them look like little pizza crust. Top with mixture.
Bake at 425° for 10 minutes.
Makes 90.

question: How do I make a classic hollandaise sauce?
answer:
Title: Hollandaise Sauce
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. liquid Butter Buds
1 c. boiling water
1/2 tsp. lite salt (optional)
1 Tbsp. flour
2 Egg Beaters, beaten
juice of 1/2 lemon
Directions:
Combine Butter Buds and flour in saucepan; add boiling water, stirring constantly.
Cook over low heat.
Beat Egg Beaters, salt, and lemon juice together.
Add some of the first mixture to this before slowly adding to the Butter Buds, flour, and water.
Cook until the spoon is well coated.
This is delicious, easy to make, and will keep well.
It is just as good warmed over as it is fresh off the stove.
Yields 1 1/2 cups (six 1/2-cup servings).

question: How do I make a classic hollandaise sauce?
answer:
Title: Hollandaise Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
1/4 c. light cream
2 egg yolks, beaten
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Place butter in a 4-cup glass bowl.
Microwave on High for 1 minute or until butter is melted.
Add remaining ingredients. Beat with electric mixer until smooth.
Cook on medium for 1 minute, beating every 15 seconds until thickened.
Remove from oven and beat with mixer until light and smooth.

question: How do I make a classic hollandaise sauce?
answer:
Title: Hollandaise Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. butter, at room temperature
3 Tbsp. water
salt to taste
2 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
3 egg yolks
white pepper to taste
Directions:
Cut butter into 1-inch pieces.
In a small heavy saucepan, combine lemon juice and 2 tablespoons water and reduce over high heat to about one tablespoon.
Remove from heat and add 1 tablespoon cold water.
Beat egg yolks lightly and whisk into lemon water.
Over low heat, whisk in the butter, one piece at a time, making sure that each piece of butter is melted before adding more.
Continue to whisk the sauce until it is thick.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Serving size 8.

question: How do I make a classic hollandaise sauce?
answer:
Title: Sauce Hollandaise
Ingredients:
12 Tbsp. butter
3 egg yolks
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. hard butter
1 Tbsp. heavy cream
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Melt 12 tablespoons butter and set aside, keeping it warm. In separate saucepan, whisk egg yolks until thick, then beat in the tablespoon lemon juice.
Place that pan over low heat and stir in the 1 tablespoon hard butter.
When blended, remove pan from low heat and beat in cream; add melted butter slowly. Whisk constantly.
Makes 1 1/2 cups.

question: How do I make a classic hollandaise sauce?
answer:
Title: Hollandaise Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 egg yolks
1 Tbsp. boiling water
Salt and pepper, to taste
Directions:
In double boiler over hot water, melt butter.
Mix in lemon juice and egg yolks.
Cook slowly, beating with whisk constantly. Add boiling water a drop at a time.
Remove from heat.
Keep warm to serve.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy vanilla sponge cake?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Sponge Cake
Ingredients:
6 eggs, separated
1 1/2 c. sugar
6 Tbsp. cold water
1 1/2 c. flour (plain)
1/4 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Beat egg yolks until thick.
Add sugar and beat until smooth. Add flour and water, alternately, beating constantly.
Add vanilla.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy vanilla sponge cake?
answer:
Title: Sponge Cake
Ingredients:
3/4 c. cold water
3 eggs, separated
1 1/4 c. sugar
1 1/2 c. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Beat egg whites stiff.
Set aside.
Put cold water in a large bowl.
Add egg yolks.
Beat until light.
Add sugar and beat 7 minutes (do not fail here; this is the secret of a light cake). Sift flour twice. Add baking powder and salt. Add dry ingredients to egg yolk mixture. Add egg whites. Fold carefully and add vanilla.
Pour into ungreased tube pan and bake 45 minutes in a 350° oven.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy vanilla sponge cake?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Sponge Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
6 egg yolks
1 1/2 c. sugar
2/3 c. cold water
2 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. lemon extract
1 tsp. lemon rind, grated
6 egg whites
1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
Directions:
Heat oven to 325°; have ready an ungreased 10-inch tube pan. Sift together flour, baking powder and salt.
Beat egg yolks in small bowl until very thick and lemon colored.
Pour beaten egg yolks into large bowl and beat in sugar gradually.
Beat in dry ingredients alternately with water and flavorings.
Beat egg whites and cream of tartar in large bowl until stiff.
Fold egg yolk mixture into beaten whites.
Pour in pan.
Bake 60 to 65 minutes.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy vanilla sponge cake?
answer:
Title: Sponge Cake
Ingredients:
6 eggs
1 c. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 tsp. lemon juice, if desired
pinch of salt
1 c. flour
Directions:
Separate whites and yolks of eggs.
Beat whites until stiff, yolks until thick and lemon colored.
Add 1 cup sugar to yolks and beat until completely mixed.
Add vanilla, lemon juice and salt. Fold yolk mixture into whites very gently.
Lastly, add flour, folding in gently.
Use large buttered and floured tube pan.
Bake in 325° oven 45 to 60 minutes.
(A smaller version may be made with 4 eggs, 7/8 cup sugar and 7/8 cup flour.)
Also can be used for cupcakes.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy vanilla sponge cake?
answer:
Title: Sponge Cake(Small)
Ingredients:
3 eggs, separated
1 c. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. baking powder
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. warm water
1/2 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Put yolks in a bowl.
Add warm water and beat until very light, almost filling a large bowl.
Add gradually the cup of sugar and keep beating until very creamy.
Stir in the flour and beat the egg whites to a froth.
Fold them into the sponge cake mixture.
Then add the salt, vanilla and baking powder.
Pour into ungreased tube and bake 40 or 50 minutes.
Very slowly the first 15 minutes (250°) and then increase temperature to 350°.
Turn upside down on a clean towel and cover pan with the towel so the cooling will be gradual.

question: How do I make a savory bread pudding?
answer:
Title: Stuffin Muffins(These Savory Bread Puddings Are Absolutely Scrumptious!)
Ingredients:
10 oz. Italian bread (preferably day-old), cut into 1/2-inch cubes
2 c. milk
3 eggs
1/2 tsp. salt
2 scallions, chopped
1/4 tsp. dried thyme
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Butter 12-cup muffin pan.
Divide bread cubes among muffin cups.
In a large bowl, combine milk, eggs, scallions, thyme, salt and pepper.
Pour milk mixture over bread cubes.
Let stand 10 minutes.
Bake until golden brown, about 45 minutes.
Run knife around puddings and carefully lift out.
Cool 10 minutes.
Serve warm.

question: How do I make a savory bread pudding?
answer:
Title: Delicious Bread Pudding #1
Ingredients:
4 c. bread cubes
2 c. milk, scalded with 1/4 c. butter
1/2 c. sugar
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Put bread crumbs in 1 1/2-quart baking dish.
Blend in remaining ingredients and stir.
Place baking dish in pan of hot water, about 1-inch deep, and bake for 45 to 50 minutes, until knife inserted comes out clean.
Great for holidays!

question: How do I make a savory bread pudding?
answer:
Title: Bread Pudding(Makes 6 Servings)
Ingredients:
3 c. soft bread crumbs
1/4 c. butter
2 eggs, beaten
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
2 c. scalded milk
1/2 c. sugar
1/8 tsp. salt
1/4 c. raisins
Directions:
Scald milk with butter.
Stir in all other ingredients, except the eggs.
Mix well, then add eggs last, stirring gently.
Pour into greased pan.
Place pan in hot water and bake about 30 minutes in 350° oven.
Serve about 1 ounce butter sauce with each serving.

question: How do I make a savory bread pudding?
answer:
Title: Savory Cheese Bread(Microwave)
Ingredients:
1 c. milk
1/2 c. butter
2 3/4 c. flour
2 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 pkg. active dry yeast
1 egg
1 envelope dry onion soup mix, divided
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese, divided
Directions:
Combine milk and butter in a 2-cup glass dish.
Cook on High for 2 minutes.
Mix flour, sugar, salt and yeast in large mixing bowl.
Add milk mixture and egg.
Mix 2 tablespoons of soup mix and 1/4 cup cheese in small bowl; set aside.
Add remaining soup mix and cheese to batter.
Divide batter evenly between 2 well-greased 8 x 4-inch microproof loaf pans.
Sprinkle with reserved onion-cheese mixture.

question: How do I make a savory bread pudding?
answer:
Title: Bread Pudding
Ingredients:
2 c. milk
4 c. coarse bread crumbs
1/4 c. melted butter
1/2 c. sugar
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. seedless raisins
1 tsp. cinnamon
Directions:
Scald milk and pour over bread crumbs.
Cool and add remaining ingredients, mixing well.
Pour into a 1 1/2-quart casserole dish. Place casserole dish in pan of hot water (1 inch deep).
Bake at 350° for 1 hour, or until a silver knife inserted into pudding comes out clean.

question: How do I make a creamy leek and potato soup?
answer:
Title: Leek And Potato Soup
Ingredients:
2 large leeks
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 Tbsp. butter
2 medium potatoes, peeled and diced
2 c. chicken broth
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Cut off roots and tops of leeks.
Slice and wash.
In soup pot, saute leeks in oil and butter until limp.
Add potatoes and chicken broth.
Simmer 30 minutes or until potatoes are done.

question: How do I make a creamy leek and potato soup?
answer:
Title: Potato Leek Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 c. coarsely chopped onions (about 1/2 lb.)
4 c. sliced leek (white part only, about 2/3 lb.)
2 medium potatoes, peeled and diced
3 Tbsp. butter, margarine or oil
4 c. chicken stock (about 2 cans clear chicken broth)
salt
freshly ground white pepper or regular white pepper
1 c. half and half
Directions:
Saute onions, leek and potatoes in butter over medium heat for 8 to 10 minutes.
Add stock and bring to a boil.
Simmer 20 minutes.
Puree potato-leek mixture in blender.
Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper.
Add half and half.
Return to heat and heat through.
Makes 6 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy leek and potato soup?
answer:
Title: Potato Leek Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. potatoes, scrubbed and sliced
3 or 4 leeks (white part and 1 inch green), split open lengthwise and sliced
4 c. chicken stock (may use canned)
4 c. water
1 to 3 Tbsp. butter to taste
1 bay leaf
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
In a large soup pot, combine potatoes, leeks, stock, water and butter.
Bring to a boil, turn down heat and let simmer for about 1 hour.
Stir occasionally.
Taste for seasoning and add salt and pepper if needed.
Mash some of the potatoes into the soup to thicken slightly.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: How do I make a creamy leek and potato soup?
answer:
Title: Leek And Potato Soup(This Recipe Is About 125 Years Old)
Ingredients:
3 leeks (4 if small) or bunch of scallions
3 medium potatoes
2 Tbsp. very fine barley
3/4 qt. water
1 c. milk
salt and butter
Directions:
Split leeks or scallions in half and cut in small pieces.
Cut up potatoes.
In water, put potatoes, salt and barley and let come to a boil; cook about 1 hour.
Mash the potatoes.
Thin out soup with a cup of milk, more if needed.
Again let it come to a boiling point, turn off heat and add 4 tablespoons of butter (no substitute or it won't give same flavor).

question: How do I make a creamy leek and potato soup?
answer:
Title: Easy Leek Soup For Two
Ingredients:
1 leek (use everything except the dark green outer leaves)
2 c. water
1 chicken bouillon cube
1 medium white potato, peeled and diced
1 small onion, peeled and diced
Directions:
Cut leek into 1-inch sections and cut each section lengthwise so that you can wash away all sand.
Combine all ingredients in a medium saucepan; cover and bring to a boil.
Uncover; reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes or until vegetables are soft.
Puree in blender until creamy.
Makes 2 servings.

question: How do I make a vegan chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Six Layer Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
3 sticks butter
2 c. granulated sugar
7 eggs
2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. vanilla extract
1 Tbsp. almond extract
1/3 c. evaporated milk
Directions:
Cream butter, adding sugar until creamy.
Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Fold in sifted dry ingredients, alternating with milk, beating until smooth.
Add vanilla and almond extract.
Bake in 9-inch pans at 325° for approximately 12 minutes.
Use approximately 6 heaping tablespoonfuls of batter to each pan; makes 6 thin layers.

question: How do I make a vegan chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Chewy Vegan Carrot Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. shredded raw carrots
1 c. raisins
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 1/2 c. water
1/3 c. margarine
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. ground cloves
1/2 tsp. ground allspice
1 tsp. ground nutmeg
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 c. whole wheat flour
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
Place carrots, raisins, sugar, water and margarine in saucepan and bring to simmer over medium heat.
Continue to simmer for 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and cool.

question: How do I make a vegan chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Vegan Lentil Chili(Serves 6 To 8)
Ingredients:
1 c. dry lentils
1 can whole tomatoes, sliced or garden tomatoes (if available)
1 can kidney beans
1 (12 oz.) can tomato juice
1 bell pepper, chopped
1 onion, chopped
2 stalks chopped celery (optional)
small amount of vegetable or olive oil for sauteing
brown sugar
garlic powder or garlic salt
cumin
chili powder
Directions:
Soak the lentils overnight.
Saute onion, bell pepper and celery (if used), then combine with lentils, beans, juice and tomatoes.
Add brown sugar to sweeten to taste.
Season with chili powder, some garlic powder, salt and cumin to taste.
Simmer an hour or so.

question: How do I make a vegan chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
2 c. plain flour, sifted
1 stick margarine
1 stick butter
4 Tbsp. cocoa
1 c. water
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. soda
1/2 c. buttermilk
2 eggs, beaten
Directions:
Place sugar and flour in a bowl and mix well.
Bring margarine, butter, cocoa and water to a rapid boil.
Remove from heat and pour over sugar and flour.
Mix well.
Add vanilla, soda, buttermilk and eggs.
Beat well with an electric mixer.
Pour in a greased 9 x 13-inch pan.
Bake at 350° for 25 minutes.

question: How do I make a vegan chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Lentil Shepherd'S Pie
Ingredients:
1 c. dried green or brown lentils
4 Tbsp. butter or vegan margarine
2 large onions, peeled and thinly sliced
1 garlic clove, crushed
1 tsp. dried Herbs de Provence
1 (15 oz.) can tomatoes, chopped
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 to 3 Tbsp. chopped parsley
salt and pepper to taste
1 1/2 lb. potatoes, cooked and mashed
a little extra butter or vegan margarine
Directions:
Put the washed lentils into a large saucepan.
Cover with water and boil gently until tender, about 45 minutes.
Drain. Preheat oven to 400°.
Use 1/2 of the butter or vegan margarine to grease a shallow ovenproof dish.
Saute the onions in the remaining butter or vegan magarine in a large saucepan for 10 minutes.
Add the garlic, mixed herbs, tomatoes, soy sauce, lentils, parsley, salt and pepper.
Spoon the mixture into the dish.
Spread the mashed potatoes evenly over the top, drawing the prongs of the fork over the surface to make ridges.
Dot the whole surface with a little butter or vegan margarine.
Bake for 45 minutes until golden brown.

question: How can I make fried rice with vegetables?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice With Vegetables
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 egg, beaten
1 medium green bell pepper, chopped
3 scallions, sliced
1 celery rib, sliced
2 garlic cloves, minced
1/2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas, thawed (1 c.)
1 (8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts, drained
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/8 tsp. hot pepper sauce
2 c. cooked rice, cooled
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
In a wok, heat 1 tablespoon oil over medium-high heat until hot.
Add egg and cook, stirring, until firm, about 2 minutes. Remove to a plate.
Cut into small pieces.

question: How can I make fried rice with vegetables?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice
Ingredients:
3 to 4 carrots, chopped fine
1 c. celery, chopped
1 large bell pepper
1/2 head cabbage, chopped
1 large onion, chopped
soy sauce
4 Tbsp. sesame oil
rice
Directions:
Add sesame oil to frying pan or wok.
Add vegetables and cook. Add soy sauce (several tablespoons).
Cook rice as directed on box, then add 2 tablespoons sesame oil to pan and brown rice, then add rice to cooked vegetables.
Add as much soy sauce as you like.

question: How can I make fried rice with vegetables?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Fried Rice
Ingredients:
1 pkg. frozen vegetables (desired)
rice
soy sauce
seasonings (desired)
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
Directions:
Cook rice and set aside.
Add oil to skillet.
When hot (medium), add vegetables.
Stir constantly until cooked.
Add rice, soy sauce (desired amount of soy sauce) and seasonings. Enjoy!

question: How can I make fried rice with vegetables?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Fried Rice
Ingredients:
1/4 c. egg substitute
2 Tbsp. rice wine or dry white wine
2 Tbsp. low sodium soy sauce
1 Tbsp. water
1/8 tsp. pepper
nonstick cooking spray
1 c. loose-pack frozen green beans, thawed and well drained
1 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
1/2 c. bias-sliced celery (1 stalk)
1 small onion, halved and sliced (1/3 c.)
1/2 (8 oz.) can bamboo shoots, drained (1/2 c.)
2 c. chilled cooked rice (cooked without margarine or salt)
2 Tbsp. unsalted dry roasted peanuts, coarsely chopped (optional)
Directions:
In a small mixing bowl, stir together the egg substitute, rice wine or white wine, soy sauce, water and pepper.
Set aside.

question: How can I make fried rice with vegetables?
answer:
Title: Easy Fried Rice
Ingredients:
2 c. cooked brown rice
1/4 c. frozen peas
1 small carrot, cut real fine (small cubes)
1 small potato, cut real fine (small cubes)
1/4 c. green onion, chopped fine
salt
1 tsp. sesame seed
1/2 Tbsp. sesame seed oil
1 tsp. olive oil
Directions:
In a nonstick skillet, put olive oil.
Turn temperature to 450°.
Put carrot and potato.
Stir until cooked.
Add salt to taste, then add frozen peas.
Stir and salt.
Then add rest of ingredients.
Stir until mixed real well.
Salt to taste.

question: What can I do with leftover pork roast?
answer:
Title: Barbecue Roast Beef Or Pork
Ingredients:
1 large onion
2 Tbsp. white vinegar
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/2 tsp. mustard
1 c. ketchup
1 c. water
3 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 c. celery or 1 tsp. celery salt
leftover roast beef or pork, cubed
Directions:
Brown onions in skillet; then add vinegar, brown sugar, mustard, ketchup, water, Worcestershire sauce and celery.
Simmer together for about 20 minutes.
Add cooked cubes of meat to the sauce.
Simmer for another 20 minutes.

question: What can I do with leftover pork roast?
answer:
Title: Barbecued Pork
Ingredients:
1 pork shoulder roast
1 tsp. celery seed
1/3 c. cider vinegar
1/2 c. ketchup
1/2 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. ground nutmeg
1 tsp. brown sugar
1/8 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 bay leaf
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. lemon pepper
1 dash hot pepper sauce
1 c. water
Directions:
In heavy skillet brown the roast on all sides in a small amount of oil.
Place roast in a heavy ovenproof pan with tight fitting lid or a pan you can seal with aluminum foil.
Place the remaining ingredients in a saucepan and bring to a boil.
Boil for 1 minute; pour mixture over the roast.
Cover tightly.
Place the roast in preheated 325° oven and bake for about 35 to 45 minutes per pound. Baste several times with the juices in the pan.
Remove the roast and allow to cool slightly.
Slice the roast into bite sized thin pieces.
Add additional hot pepper sauce and few drops of vinegar if desired.
Yield:
10 servings.
Carbohydrate 5 g, protein 3 g, fat 3 g, calories 58.

question: What can I do with leftover pork roast?
answer:
Title: Orange-Ginger Pork Roast
Ingredients:
1 pork roast (approximately 1/2 lb. per person)*
1/4 to 1/2 c. honey**
1 can frozen orange juice concentrate
1 Tbsp. ginger
1/2 Tbsp. cinnamon
brandy (optional)
Directions:
* Will leave some leftovers for sandwiches.

question: What can I do with leftover pork roast?
answer:
Title: Festive Pork Roast
Ingredients:
1/2 c. chicken broth
1/2 c. soy sauce
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 tsp. dried thyme
1 tsp. ground ginger
1 boneless pork roast, 4 to 5 lbs.
Directions:
In large plastic bag, combine first five ingredients; mix well. Add roast, turning to coat on all sides. Cover and refrigerate 3 to 4 days (turning several times a day). Remove meat, discard marinade. Place with fat side down on a rack in shallow roasting pan. Bake uncovered at 325° 2 to 2 1/2 hours. Cover and let stand 15 minutes before carving. Yield: 8 to 10 servings.

question: What can I do with leftover pork roast?
answer:
Title: Leftover Roast Casserole
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. roast, sliced thin
1 1/2 c. onions, sliced thin
2 Tbsp. butter
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1/3 c. milk
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
dash of pepper
3 c. cooked potatoes
Directions:
Brown beef and onion in butter.
Blend soup, milk, 3/4 cup cheese and pepper.
In 1 1/2-quart casserole alternate layers (starting with potatoes).
Sprinkle top with remaining 1/4 cup cheese.
Bake at 375° for 30 minutes, uncovered.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate lava cake?
answer:
Title: Molten Chocolate Lava Cake(Petite Gateau)
Ingredients:
1/2 cup Butter, unsalted
4 ounce(s) Bittersweet chocolate
2 Egg(s)
2 Egg yolk(s)
1/4 cup Sugar
2 tablespoon(s) Flour, all-purpose
Directions:
Butter and flour 4 custard cups.
Preheat oven to 450F.
Melt butter and chocolate.
Do NOT let it boil.
Remove from heat and set aside.
Beat together the 2 eggs plus 2 yolks and the sugar, until it's light and thick.
Pour the now tepid chocolate mixture into the egg mixture, and beat to mix.
Quickly beat in the flour until just mixed in.
Pour into the custard cups.
(At this point you can refrigerate for up to 24 hours.
If you refrigerate, let return to room temp before you bake.)
Put custard cups on a baking sheet and bake at 450 degrees for 6-7 minutes.
The outside will be set up, but the top may still be slightly wiggly (technical French cooking term).
Invert on plate, let sit for 10 seconds or so, remove custard cup.
Sprinkle with powdered sugar, and surround with a fruit sauce of you're choice.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate lava cake?
answer:
Title: Deep Dish Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. unsifted flour
2 c. sugar
3/4 c. cocoa
1 1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
2 eggs
1 c. milk
1/2 c. vegetable oil
2 tsp. vanilla
1 c. boiling water
Directions:
Combine dry ingredients in large mixing bowl. Add remaining ingredients except for boiling water.
Beat at medium speed 2 minutes.
Stir in boiling water.
(Batter will be thin.)
Pour into a greased 9
13 pan and bake at 350° for 35 - 40 minute or until cake tester inserted in the center comes out clean.
Cool and top with our favorite frosting.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate lava cake?
answer:
Title: Homemade Lava
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. baking soda
2 Tbsp. water
1 Tbsp. dish soap
3 Tbsp. vinegar
3 drops food coloring
Directions:
Combine water and baking soda in a glass.
In another glass, combine soap, food coloring and vinegar.
When ready for the eruption, add baking soda solution to the soap/vinegar solution and watch it foam and flow.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate lava cake?
answer:
Title: Lava Flow(From The Kannapali Maui Marriott)
Ingredients:
1 shot rum
1/2 shot creme de banana
1/2 ripe banana
3 oz. pineapple juice
3 oz. Coco Lopez
1 c. ice
1 c. frozen strawberries, blended separately from other ingredients
Directions:
In bottom of glass, put 2 ounces blended strawberries.
Blend remaining ingredients.
Pour mixture over strawberries to form swirled effect.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate lava cake?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
1 stick butter
2 c. regular flour
1 Tbsp. vanilla flavor
2 sq. unsweetened chocolate
1 tsp. soda
2 c. sugar
2 eggs
1/2 c. buttermilk
1 c. hot water
Directions:
Melt chocolate in double boiler.
Cream butter and sugar; add eggs, flour and buttermilk.
Add 1/2 cup hot water to the melted chocolate; place the other half in a separate pan and bring to a boil.
Add soda to the boiling water and immediately to the chocolate.
Add mixture to batter; add vanilla.
Bake at 325° until cake pulls from pans.

question: How do I make banana pancakes?
answer:
Title: Banana Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
1/8 tsp. salt
1 egg
1 c. buttermilk
1 Tbsp. margarine, melted
1 very ripe banana, mashed
Directions:
Sift flour and combine with next 4 ingredients. Combine egg, buttermilk and margarine; add to dry mixture. Stir until smooth. Stir in banana. Use 1/4 cup batter for each pancake. Pour onto hot griddle coated with cooking spray. Turn only once when edges look done. Serve with maple syrup and strawberry preserves.

question: How do I make banana pancakes?
answer:
Title: French Banana Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 c. all purpose flour
1/4 c. confectioners sugar
1 c. milk
2 eggs
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Sift flour and confectioners sugar into a mixing bowl. Add milk, eggs, butter, vanilla and salt; beat until smooth. Heat a lightly greased 6-inch skillet; add about 3 Tbsp. batter, spreading to almost cover bottom of skillet. Cook until lightly browned; turn and brown the other side. remove to a wire rack. Repeat with remaining batter (makes 10-12 pancakes), greasing skillet as needed.

question: How do I make banana pancakes?
answer:
Title: Yummy Banana Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 c. all-purpose flour
3 c. whole wheat flour
3 tsp. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. salt
2 1/4 tsp. double acting baking powder
1 1/2 tsp. baking soda
3 eggs
3 c. buttermilk
3 Tbsp. butter, softened
1 ripe banana, mashed
Directions:
Beat 3 eggs until light.
Add 3 cups buttermilk, 3 tablespoons butter and ripe banana.
Combine the dry ingredients with the liquid ingredients.
Cook on medium hot griddle.
Makes 24 medium pancakes.
Freeze extras for easy, healthy breakfast, lunch or snacks.

question: How do I make banana pancakes?
answer:
Title: Banana Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/8 tsp. salt
1 c. nonfat buttermilk
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 c. mashed ripe banana
1/2 c. frozen egg substitute, thawed
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
vegetable cooking spray
Directions:
Combine first three ingredients in a large bowl.
Make a well in the center of mixture.
Combine buttermilk and soda, stirring well.
Add banana, egg substitute and oil.
Stir well.
Add buttermilk mixture to dry ingredients, stirring just enough to moisten.

question: How do I make banana pancakes?
answer:
Title: Banana Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/8 tsp. salt
1 c. nonfat buttermilk
1 tsp. soda
1/2 c. mashed banana
1/2 c. egg substitute
1 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar and salt in a bowl, mixing well.
Combine 1 cup nonfat buttermilk with soda.
Add to banana, eggs and oil. Pour all liquid ingredients into dry ingredients and stir until moistened.
Pour 1/4 cup of batter onto griddle sprayed with Pam. Makes 12 pancakes (4-inch size).

question: How do I make a classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Meatloaf
Ingredients:
4 slices white bread, torn into pieces
2 1/2 lb. ground beef
1 medium yellow onion, peeled and cut into 1/8's
2 cloves garlic
2 stalks celery, cut into 2 inch pieces
2 carrots, peeled, cut into 2 inch pieces
1/2 c. flat leaf parsley leaves
1 large egg
1 c. ketchup
3 tsp. dry mustard
1 Tbsp. coarse salt
2 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°.
Place bread in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a steel blade; pulse until fine crumbs form. Transfer to a medium bowl, and add ground beef.
Place onion, garlic, celery, carrots, and parsley in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a steel blade; pulse until fine.
Add to meat mixture, using hands to mix well.
Add egg, 1/2 c. ketchup, 2 tsp. dry mustard, salt and pepper; use hands to combine thoroughly.
Place in an 8 1/2 x 4 1/2 x 2 1/2 inch loaf pan.

question: How do I make a classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Super Tasty Basic Meatloaf
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. ketchup
1/3 c. tomato juice
1/2 tsp. each salt and pepper
1/8 tsp. red pepper
2 eggs, beaten
3/4 c. soft breadcrumbs
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 tsp. prepared mustard
1/4 c. ketchup
1/2 tsp. prepared mustard
2 tsp. brown sugar
Directions:
In large bowl, combine 1/2 cup ketchup, tomato juice, salt, peppers, eggs, breadcrumbs, onion and 2 teaspoons mustard.
Mix thoroughly.
Add ground beef.
Mix. Press beef into a 5 X 5 loaf pan.
Combine 1/4 cup ketchup, 1/2 teaspoon mustard and brown sugar and spread over meatloaf.
Bake at 400° for 35 to 40 minutes or until done.
Garnish with fresh herbs, if desired.

question: How do I make a classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Meatloaf
Ingredients:
2 lbs. extra lean hamburger
1/4 lb. sausage
1 cup crumbled saltines
2 eggs
3/4 cup milk
1 Tbsp. mustard
1 tsp. accent (optional)
1/2 cup finely chopped onion
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together.
If mixture seems too dry, add a little more milk.
Shape into a loaf and bake in a flat dish at 325° for 1 hour 30 minutes or until done.
Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing. May pour 8 oz. can of tomato sauce over meat before baking.

question: How do I make a classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Sweet And Sour Meatloaf
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1 c. crushed pineapple, well drained
1/4 c. ketchup
1/2 c. brown sugar
2 tsp. prepared mustard
1/4 tsp. salt
pepper
1 c. dry bread crumbs
1 small onion, finely chopped
2 lbs. ground beef
1/4 tsp. garlic
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°F.
Grease 9 x 5 x 3-inch pan.
Line the bottom with greased wax paper.
Whip eggs in a large bowl.
Stir in pineapple, ketchup, brown sugar, mustard, salt, garlic, and pepper.
Stir in bread crumbs, onion, and half the meat until thoroughly blended.
Work in remaining meat and press into pan. Lay a sheet of tin foil loosely over meat and bake for 1 hour. Uncover and drain off fat, continue baking uncovered for 30 - 40 min.

question: How do I make a classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Mexican Meatloaf
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil, plus 1 tsp.
1 c. onion, chopped
1 c. green bell pepper, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 pkg. beef broth seasoning
15 oz. ground round
4 oz. cheddar cheese, shredded
