3/4 c. bread crumbs, plain
1/2 c. tomato sauce
1/4 c. yogurt or sour cream
2 Tbsp. parsley, fresh, chopped
2 tsp. worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. chili powder
Directions:
In skillet, brown onion, peppers, garlic and seasoning packet in oil.
Combine these ingredients with remaining ingredients in mixing bowl.
Shape mixture in a loaf and bake until browned, 45 minutes at 375 degrees.

question: What’s a recipe for a lemon poppy seed muffin?
answer:
Title: Lemon Poppy Seed Muffins
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
3/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. salt
1 c. lite or fat-free sour cream
1/2 c. vegetable oil
2 eggs
2 Tbsp. poppy seeds
2 Tbsp. milk
1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
1/2 tsp. lemon extract
Directions:
In large bowl, combine flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda and salt; set aside. Combine remaining ingredients; mix well. Stir into dry ingredients just until moistened. Fill greased or paper-lined muffin cups 2/3 full. Bake at 400° for 20 to 25 minutes or until muffins test done. Cool in pan for 10 minutes before removing to a wire rack.

question: What’s a recipe for a lemon poppy seed muffin?
answer:
Title: Lemon Poppy Seed Muffins
Ingredients:
2 c. plain flour
1/4 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1 Tbsp. poppy seed
3/4 c. low-fat milk
1 (16 oz.) can frozen lemonade, thawed
2 Tbsp. oil
2 egg whites
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar, salt, baking powder and poppy seed.
Add milk, lemonade, oil and egg whites.
Stir until moistened; don't overmix.
Spray pan with Pam and fill 2/3 full.
Bake for 15 to 20 minutes at 400°.

question: What’s a recipe for a lemon poppy seed muffin?
answer:
Title: Lemon Poppy-Seed Muffins
Ingredients:
2 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1 Tbsp. poppy seed
3/4 c. skim or 1% milk
1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed
2 Tbsp. oil
2 egg whites
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar, salt, baking powder and poppy seed.
Add milk, lemonade, oil and egg whites.
Stir until moistened; do not overmix.
Coat a 12-muffin tin with nonstick cooking spray or line with muffin cups.
Fill each 2/3 full with muffin mixture.
Bake for 15 to 20 minutes at 400° or until golden brown.

question: What’s a recipe for a lemon poppy seed muffin?
answer:
Title: Lemon Poppy Muffins
Ingredients:
1 c. margarine
1 3/4 c. sugar, divided
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
5 eggs, separated
3/4 c. lemon juice
2 2/3 c. flour, sifted
1 1/4 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 c. poppy seed
1 Tbsp. grated lemon peel
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Beat margarine, 1 1/2 cups sugar and cream cheese at medium speed with mixer until light and fluffy. Blend in egg yolks and lemon juice.
Add combined flour, baking powder and baking soda and mix well.
Beat in poppy seed and peel. Set aside.
Beat egg whites until foamy.
Gradually add reserved 1/4 cup sugar, beating until soft peaks form.
Fold egg whites into batter.
Pour into greased muffin pan.
Bake 55 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
Cool and remove from pan.

question: What’s a recipe for a lemon poppy seed muffin?
answer:
Title: Lemon Poppy Seed Muffins
Ingredients:
1/4 c. melted margarine
1 c. milk
1 large egg
1/2 tsp. grated lemon rind
2 c. flour
1/3 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. poppy seed
Directions:
Combine egg, margarine, milk and lemon rind in bowl.
Add to dry ingredients.
Stir until combined.
Spoon batter into prepared 2 1/2-inch muffin pans.
Bake 20 to 22 minutes in 400° oven.

question: What’s a good recipe for sweet and sour chicken?
answer:
Title: Sweet And Sour Chicken
Ingredients:
1 c. (8 oz.) pineapple chunks
1/2 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. shortening or Pam
1 1/4 c. water
2 c. carrot sticks
3 bouillon cubes or instant broth packets
1/4 c. firmly packed brown sugar
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/4 c. catsup and 1 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. vinegar
2 c. diced cooked chicken and/or can stir-fry
1 c. green pepper strips (you can substitute green beans)
3/4 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 1/4 c. Minute rice
Directions:
Drain pineapple, reserving juice.
Add water to juice to make 2 1/4 cups.
Saute onion in shortening in large skillet until tender.
Add 1 1/4 cups water, carrots and bouillon.
Cover and simmer 5 minutes.
Combine sugar, cornstarch and ginger.
Add catsup, vinegar and soy sauce and stir into vegetable mixture. Cook until clear and thickened.
Add chicken, green peppers and pineapple.
Cover and simmer 5 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for sweet and sour chicken?
answer:
Title: Sweet Sour Mustard
Ingredients:
1 c. packed brown sugar
1/2 c. cider or raspberry vinegar
1/3 c. dry mustard
2 Tbsp. water
2 eggs, lightly beaten
Directions:
In a saucepan, whisk together all ingredients.
Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until thickened.
Pour into small jars. Cover and refrigerate.
Yields 1 1/2 cups.
Good with chicken or pretzels.

question: What’s a good recipe for sweet and sour chicken?
answer:
Title: Sweet-Sour Chicken
Ingredients:
1/4 c. water
2 tsp. cornstarch
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. brown sugar
1/3 c. vinegar
1 c. pineapple juice
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
3/4 c. green pepper, cut in strips
1/4 c. onion, cut up
1 can pineapple chunks, drained
1 chicken, cut up
vegetable oil
Directions:
Combine water and cornstarch; add salt, brown sugar, vinegar, pineapple juice and soy sauce.
Cook until thick.
Add green pepper, onion and pineapple.
Brown the chicken in oil.
Cover with sauce.
Bake at 325° until tender.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for sweet and sour chicken?
answer:
Title: Sweet-Sour Chicken
Ingredients:
1/4 c. maple syrup
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 c. liquid, drained from canned pineapple
1/4 c. vinegar
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
3 c. cooked, sliced chicken
1/4 c. onion, thin half slices
1 c. drained, canned pineapple
1/2 c. celery strips, thin
1/2 c. green pepper rings
1 (3 oz.) can chow mein noodles
2 c. cooked rice
1/4 c. slivered almonds
Directions:
Combine maple syrup, cornstarch and salt.
Stir into pineapple liquid.
Add vinegar and soy sauce.

question: What’s a good recipe for sweet and sour chicken?
answer:
Title: Sweet 'N Sour Baked Chicken
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. coarsely chopped green pepper
1/2 c. coarsely chopped carrots
3/4 c. ketchup
2 Tbsp. vinegar
1/4 c. firmly packed brown sugar
dash of red pepper
ground ginger
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. pineapple chunks, drained
1 c. pineapple juice
1 (3 lb.) chicken, cut up
Directions:
Preheat oven to
400°.	In
medium
skillet heat butter until melted.
Add onion,
green	pepper	and carrots.
Cook 5 minutes, stirring.
Stir in ketchup, pineapple juice, vinegar, sugar, soy sauce, garlic salt, salt, pepper and ginger.
Cook, stirring constantly	until
mixture	boils.	Add
pineapple. Arrange chicken in	13 x 9-inch baking dish.
Pour sauce over. Bake 45 minutes.
Uncover;	bake
30
minutes longer or until done.

question: How do I make a creamy butternut squash risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto With Shrimp
Ingredients:
1/4 c. cooking oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
1 1/2 c. raw rice
1 can tomato paste
2 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 can shrimp or 1/2 lb. cleaned shrimp, cut small
1/2 c. or more peas
Directions:
Saute onion and peppers in oil.
Add rice; cook over medium heat until tanned; stir constantly.
Add tomato paste, salt, pepper and broth.
Mix and cover tightly.
Simmer without stirring for 35 to 40 minutes.
Add shrimp and peas.
Mix well.
Cook an additional 5 minutes until shrimp is done.

question: How do I make a creamy butternut squash risotto?
answer:
Title: Sauteed Butternut Squash
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 1/2 lb. butternut squash, seeded and cut into 1-inch chunks (about 3 1/2 c.)
1 large clove garlic, minced
salt and pepper to taste
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh sage
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh Italian parsley
Directions:
In a heavy (preferably nonstick) skillet, heat oil until sizzling.
Add squash and garlic to coat well with oil.
Saute slowly over low heat, stirring frequently, for about 30 minutes until squash is golden and tender.
(Add a tablespoon or two of water to pan if squash begins to stick.)
Add salt and pepper to taste, then sprinkle sage and parsley over squash and mix to combine well.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a creamy butternut squash risotto?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. oil
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. cloves
1/2 tsp. allspice
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
3 eggs
2 c. plain flour
2 Tbsp. baking powder
1 tsp. soda
8 oz. crushed pineapple (undrained)
2 c. grated butternut squash
1 c. walnuts
Directions:
In large bowl, combine first 6 ingredients. Beat eggs. Add to spice mixture. Mix dry ingredients together. Slowly add to spice mixture. Beat 5 minutes. Add pineapple, squash and nuts. Fold in. Pour in large, greased tube pan. Bake at 300° for 55 minutes. Cool. Frost with Buttercream Frosting or your favorite frosting.

question: How do I make a creamy butternut squash risotto?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Risotto(Serves 6)
Ingredients:
8 Tbsp. butter (divided use)
2 c. rice
6 c. chicken broth
1 small bay leaf
1 lb. shrimp, peeled
1 tsp. minced garlic
salt and pepper
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
Melt 2 tablespoons butter.
Stir in rice to coat.
Add broth and bay leaf.
Cook rice.
Separately melt 2 tablespoons of butter; saute shrimp and garlic.
Salt and pepper to taste.
Add shrimp mixture to cooked rice.
Add remainder of ingredients. Stir and serve.

question: How do I make a creamy butternut squash risotto?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash
Ingredients:
1 medium butternut squash
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 c. red hots candy (2 oz. pkg.)
1/2 orange juice
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cut squash in half lengthwise and discard seeds.
Slice into 1/2-inch slices crosswise and remove peel. Place in a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Sprinkle with sugar.
Heat orange juice in microwave dish. Dissolve candy in the orange juice.
Pour over squash. Sprinkle with salt.
Cover with foil and bake at 375° for 30 to 35 minutes. Place liquid from baking pan into small saucepan and boil until thick.
Pour over squash. Yields 4 servings.
Has 150 calories, fat free.

question: What’s a recipe for fluffy chocolate chip pancakes?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
4 tsp. baking powder
3 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1 egg, slightly beaten
1 tsp. vanilla
2 Tbsp. melted butter
1 3/4 c. milk
Directions:
Mix all dry ingredients.
In separate bowl, add vanilla to eggs and beat slightly.
Add to dry ingredients.
Add milk and mix.
Add melted butter and stir until smooth.
Cook on hot griddle at 400°.

question: What’s a recipe for fluffy chocolate chip pancakes?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. buttermilk baking mix
1 c. milk
1 large egg
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips
chocolate syrup (optional)
Directions:
In a medium bowl, whisk together baking mix, milk, egg and sugar until smooth.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Heat a heavy skillet or griddle over medium-high heat.
Grease lightly.
Using about 1/4 cup batter for each pancake, pour batter into skillet in shape of a heart and cook until bubbles appear on surface and edges are dry.
Turn and cook until bottom is golden brown.
Place cooked pancakes in a warm oven until ready to serve.
Serve with chocolate syrup or syrup of your choice.
Makes about thirteen 4-inch pancakes.

question: What’s a recipe for fluffy chocolate chip pancakes?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
3/4 tsp. salt
3 tsp. baking powder
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 egg
1 c. milk
3 Tbsp. salad oil
8 oz. chocolate chips
Directions:
Mix first 7 ingredients together by hand until smooth.
Add 8 ounces chocolate chips and stir.
Cook over low heat until done.

question: What’s a recipe for fluffy chocolate chip pancakes?
answer:
Title: Best Fluffy Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
2 tsp. baking powder
2 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 c. milk
2 Tbsp. melted butter
2 eggs, separated
Directions:
Mix flour, baking powder, sugar and salt in a mixing bowl. Set aside.
Stir together milk, melted butter and egg yolks.
Whip egg whites.
Stir milk mixture into flour mixture and fold in egg whites.
Batter should hold its shape, but not be too stiff.
Bake on heated griddle.
Serve immediately with favorite topping.

question: What’s a recipe for fluffy chocolate chip pancakes?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. buttermilk baking mix
1 c. milk
1 large egg
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips
chocolate syrup, (optional)
Directions:
Mix in medium bowl milk, egg and sugar until smooth.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Heat in a heavy skillet or griddle over medium-high heat.
Grease lightly.
Using about 1/4 cup batter for each pancake, pour batter into skillet in shape of heart and cook until bubbles appear on surface and edges are dry.

question: How do I make coconut macaroons?
answer:
Title: Coconut Macaroons
Ingredients:
1 c. brown sugar, packed
1 c. granulated sugar
1 c. melted shortening (Crisco or butter)
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. coconut
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. soda
1 c. sifted flour
4 c. rolled oats
1/2 c. nuts
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Sift salt, soda and flour; mix ingredients in order given. Drop by teaspoon on greased cookie sheet.
Press flat.
Bake at 350° for 12 to 15 minutes.
Makes about 4 dozen 2-inch cookies.

question: How do I make coconut macaroons?
answer:
Title: Coconut Macaroons
Ingredients:
3 egg whites
1 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 c. grated coconut
Directions:
Beat egg whites until stiff.
Add sugar gradually; beat until glossy.
Fold in flour, salt, vanilla and coconut.
Line baking sheet with greased heavy brown paper.
Drop mixture by teaspoons on paper.
Bake at 350° for 20 minutes.
Makes 2 dozen.

question: How do I make coconut macaroons?
answer:
Title: Coconut Macaroons
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. flour
1/3 tsp. soda
2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/4 c. shortening
1 c. white sugar
1 c. brown sugar
3 eggs, well beaten
2 c. coconut
1 c. oats
1 c. chopped pecans
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Mix flour, baking powder, soda and salt together.
Work shortening until soft.
Add sugar; work until mixture is smooth and creamy.
Beat eggs; add to shortening mixture.
Mix in flour mixture oats, nuts and coconut thoroughly. (May need to work with hands.)
Roll into size of a walnut, place onto ungreased cookie sheet.
Grease hands with butter or shortening.
Makes 7 dozen.

question: How do I make coconut macaroons?
answer:
Title: Coconut Macaroons
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. white sugar
1/2 c. brown sugar
1 egg
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 c. flour
1 c. coconut (to mix in batter)
1 c. coconut (to roll batter in)
Directions:
Cream the butter and sugar.
Add egg.
Sift salt, baking powder and flour.
Add to creamed mixture, then add vanilla and 1 cup of coconut.
Using teaspoon, make ball and roll in coconut. Bake at 350°.

question: How do I make coconut macaroons?
answer:
Title: Dad'S Favorite Coconut Macaroons
Ingredients:
2 eggs
3/4 c. sugar
1/3 c. flour
1/4 tsp. baking powder
1/8 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. melted butter
1 tsp. vanilla
2 2/3 c. coconut
Directions:
Beat eggs until foamy.
Slowly add sugar; beat 5 minutes. Fold in flour, baking powder and salt, then fold in butter, vanilla and coconut.
Drop onto greased and floured cookie sheet and bake at 325° for about 15 minutes.
Watch closely.

question: I want a recipe for a crispy chicken sandwich.
answer:
Title: Crispy Chicken Sandwich
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. cooked, chopped chicken
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup, undiluted
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can cream of chicken soup, undiluted
2 Tbsp. chopped pimiento
2 Tbsp. chopped onion
1 (8 oz.) can water chestnuts, drained and thinly sliced
20 slices bread, crusts removed
4 eggs, slightly beaten
2 Tbsp. milk
1 (6 oz.) bag potato chips, crushed
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients, mixing well. Spread evenly on 10 slices of bread.
Top with the remaining 10 slices. Wrap individually in freezer wrap and freeze.

question: I want a recipe for a crispy chicken sandwich.
answer:
Title: Baked Chicken Sandwich
Ingredients:
2 c. chopped cooked chicken
1 medium onion, chopped fine
2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
1/4 oz. can sliced mushrooms (do not drain)
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/4 c. sliced ripe olives
12 slices very thinly sliced bread
1/2 pt. sour cream
1 can chicken soup
paprika
Directions:
Cut crust from 12 slices of bread.
Butter 6 and line a 9 x 13 casserole.
Mix all other ingredients and spread on top of the bread in casserole.
Cover with 6 slices bread and top with mixture of sour cream and chicken soup.
Sprinkle top with paprika.
Bake at 325° for 30 to 45 minutes.
This may be made a day ahead of time.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: I want a recipe for a crispy chicken sandwich.
answer:
Title: Crispy Rice-Peanut Butter Sandwich
Ingredients:
1/2 c. peanut butter
1/4 c. crisp rice cereal
1 grated carrot
8 slices bread
Directions:
Make spread out of first 3 ingredients.
Place mixture between bread slices.
Serves 4.

question: I want a recipe for a crispy chicken sandwich.
answer:
Title: Baked Chicken Sandwich
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. chicken, first cooked and picked from bones
1 can Franco-American chicken gravy
1 can cream of mushroom soup
2 Tbsp. chopped onion
1 c. sliced water chestnuts
Directions:
Mix all together.
Spread mix on 8 slices of bread and cover with 8 slices.
Wrap individual sandwiches in foil.
Freeze.
When ready to serve, dip sandwich while still frozen in well-beaten egg, then crushed potato chips.
Place on well-greased cookie sheet. Bake 1 hour or a little more at 300°.
Serve with salad and a light dessert.

question: I want a recipe for a crispy chicken sandwich.
answer:
Title: Delicious Crispies
Ingredients:
1 yeast cake
1/2 c. water
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. shortening
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. milk, scalded
5 to 6 c. flour
1 tsp. lemon flavoring
1/2 c. soft butter
1 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
1/2 c. sugar
Directions:
Soften yeast in warm water.
Add 1/2 cup sugar, shortening and salt to scalded milk.
Cool.
Add 2 cups flour and beat well.
Add eggs, yeast and lemon flavoring.
Beat well and add remaining flour.
Knead until smooth.
Place in greased bowl.
Cover and let rise until doubled (1 1/2 hours).

question: What can I make with leftover rice and chicken?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice With Leftovers(Very Good!!!)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. long grain rice, washed in 3 changes of water and drained
3 Tbsp. oil
2 stalks celery, diced
1 medium onion, diced
1/4 green pepper, diced
2 cloves garlic, diced
1 to 2 c. or more of any leftover meat (ham, beef, pork, chicken or combination), diced
1/4 c. soy sauce (optional)
1 can water chestnuts, sliced
1 can pieces and stems mushrooms, drained (save juice)
2 1/2 c. water
4 Tbsp. chicken bouillon
Directions:
Fry rice in skillet over high heat, stirring all the time, until brown.
Scrape into 4-quart pan with lid.
Add all ingredients, bringing to a boil.
Boil for 1 minute. Turn to low heat and cover tightly.
Don't lift lid for 25 minutes.
Stir and serve.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Brown Rice(Low-Fat)
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. oil
3/4 c. chopped green onions (including tops)
1 c. green pepper, diced
1/2 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 c. water chestnuts, sliced
3 c. cooked brown rice
3 c. cooked chicken, cut into bite-size pieces*
1/3 c. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
*Turkey or tuna may be substituted.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and chicken?
answer:
Title: Leftover Turkey, Chicken Or Pork
Ingredients:
2 c. diced, cooked turkey
2 c. chopped celery
1 c. cooked rice
1 c. mayo or Miracle Whip
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 tsp. chopped onion
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Mix all together.
Mixture will be dry.
Top with sliced almonds or croutons.
Bake at 450° for 20 minutes or until hot.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Rice Dinner(Serves 5)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
10 chicken thighs (about 3 lb.)
3 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 c. uncooked long grain rice
1 (4 oz.) can mushroom stems and pieces (undrained)
2 c. boiling water
minced fresh parsley (optional)
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. chopped onions
2 garlic cloves, minced
2 chicken bouillon cubes
4 chicken breasts, split and boned
1 (5 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts
1 can undiluted cream of mushroom soup
1 1/2 c. finely chopped celery
1 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
1 pkg. corn bread stuffing (about 3 c.)
3/4 c. melted butter
Directions:
Mix soup, mayonnaise, chestnuts and celery.
Lightly grease 3-quart casserole.
Lay breasts in pan.
Pour over mixed ingredients.
Mix stuffing with melted butter and sprinkle on top of chicken.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes to 1 hour.
Delicious!

question: What can I make with leftover rice and chicken?
answer:
Title: Leftovers Delight
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. minced onion
1 Tbsp. margarine
1 1/2 c. chopped leftover meat (beef, chicken or ham)
3 c. cooked rice
1 (10 oz.) can creamed soup
grated cheese
Directions:
Cook onion in margarine in skillet until tender.
Add meat, cooked rice and soup.
Combine thoroughly.
May add a little milk for moisture.
Cover and simmer over very low heat about 10 minutes.
Sprinkle with grated cheese.
Serves four to five.

question: What can I cook with kale and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Kalee'S Favorite Dinner(Very Quick And Easy)
Ingredients:
1 lb. hamburger
1 onion, chopped
1 can tomato soup (no water)
1 can green beans
potatoes, mashed
grated cheese (1/2 c.)
Directions:
Brown meat and onion.
Season to taste with salt, pepper and garlic.
Add soup and drained green beans.
Put in casserole dish and top with mashed potatoes.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Bake 10 to 15 minutes, just to brown top of potatoes and melt cheese.
Serves 4.

question: What can I cook with kale and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Candied Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
4 c. sweet potatoes, cooked
1/2 stick margarine
1 Tbsp. cinnamon-sugar
1/2 c. brown sugar
1 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 c. Karo syrup
Directions:
Put all the ingredients in a casserole dish with lid and bake at 400°, for about 30 minutes or until hot and bubbly.

question: What can I cook with kale and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Kale Soup(Serves 8)
Ingredients:
2 heads kale or collard greens
1/2 head cabbage
2 cans white or red cannellini beans
2 or 3 medium size potatoes
1 or 2 carrots
1 sweet potato
pork or chicken (optional)
linguica
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Chop up kale or greens, discarding the stalks.
Chop cabbage; cut potatoes into cubes.
Peel carrots and sweet potatoes.
Set all the ingredients aside.
You need a large pot filled with water. Add your meat and beans and simmer for 1 to 2 hours or until tender.
Add sweet potatoes; cook for awhile.
In a large bowl add water to the kale or greens and squeeze out the greens (water will be very green).
Discard water and add kale to pot with all other ingredients.
Make sure you still have enough water and cook until potatoes are tender, stirring frequently.
Depending on how much meat you have, this soup could take 3 to 4 hours to cook.
Cook on medium heat.
Enjoy!

question: What can I cook with kale and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Candied Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 medium sweet potatoes
1 c. sugar
1 bottle white Karo
1 stick butter
2 Tbsp. vanilla
Directions:
Boil sweet potatoes until done.
Peel and cool.
Cut lengthwise.
Put in 9 x 12-inch baking dish.
Mix all other ingredients until melted.
Pour over potatoes.
Cook at 375° for 40 minutes.

question: What can I cook with kale and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Family Favorite - Kale Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. pork sausage
1 large onion, diced
1/2 red bell pepper, diced
3 qt. chicken stock
1 bunch kale, washed, stemmed and rough chopped
1/2 tsp. crushed dried red peppers
1 Tbsp. olive oil
4 garlic cloves, minced
salt and pepper to taste
5 bay leaves
2 large baking potatoes, peeled and diced
Directions:
Remove casing from sausage and saute over medium heat in the olive oil in a large stockpot.
Break up sausage into small pieces.
When the sausage is cooked halfway, add the onion, garlic and red bell pepper.
Season with salt and pepper.
cook until the vegetables are translucent, then pour in the chicken stock.
Bring to a boil and add the bay leaves and kale.
Simmer for 30 minutes or until the kale becomes tender.
Stir in potatoes and crushed red peppers.
Simmer 45 minutes; discard the bay leaves. Re-season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve nice and hot with crusty bread.
Serves 10 to 12.

question: How do I make a spicy buffalo chicken dip?
answer:
Title: Spicy Beef Dip
Ingredients:
1 pound ground beef
1 tablespoon onion chopped
1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
1 8-ounce can tomato sauce
1/4 cup ketchup
1 teaspoon oregano
1 teaspoon sugar
1 teaspoon salt
1 8-ounce package cream cheese
Directions:
Brown beef and drain.
Add all ingredients and simmer 15-20 minutes.
Then add cream cheese with the meat mixture to a crock pot.
Stir well on low heat.
Serve with corn or tortilla chips.

question: How do I make a spicy buffalo chicken dip?
answer:
Title: Spicy Buffalo Wings
Ingredients:
1 pkg. chicken wings, cut apart
salt and pepper to taste
1 c. flour
1 tsp. butter
hot sauce to taste
1 c. grease for frying
Directions:
Rinse
chicken	wings.	Add
salt
and	pepper to flour (other seasonings
may
be added if desired) in a bowl.
Heat grease. Coat
chicken
wings
with flour mixture and place in the
grease for about 4 minutes or until done.	Take out wings and place in a bowl.
Add butter to the hot wings and sprinkle hot sauce all over the chicken.

question: How do I make a spicy buffalo chicken dip?
answer:
Title: Spicy Buffalo Wings
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken wings
1 (18 oz.) bottle your favorite barbecue sauce
Directions:
Wash chicken wings, then season with garlic, salt, pepper and lemon-pepper.
Lightly flour chicken wings.
Fry chicken wings until golden brown and almost done.
Put fried chicken in a slow cooker, between high and medium.
Pour barbecue sauce over chicken. Let slow cook for 1 1/2 hours.
Remove chicken wings from slow cooker.

question: How do I make a spicy buffalo chicken dip?
answer:
Title: Spicy Beef Dip
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 clove garlic
8 oz. tomato sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 c. ketchup
3/4 tsp. oregano
8 oz. cream cheese
1/3 c. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Cook ground beef, onion and garlic until brown and tender. Drain grease.
Stir in the tomato sauce, sugar, ketchup and oregano.
Simmer for 10 minutes.
Add cream cheese and Parmesan cheese.
Cook until cream cheese dissolves.
Serve warm with dipping size Fritos.
It tastes a lot better than it looks!

question: How do I make a spicy buffalo chicken dip?
answer:
Title: Buffalo Chicken Wings With Blue Cheese Dipping Sauce
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/4 c. hot pepper sauce
vegetable oil for frying
18 chicken wings (about 3 lb.), disjointed with the tips discarded
Directions:
Melt the butter or margarine in a small saucepan.
Add hot sauce and remove from heat.
In a large pan or deep-fat fryer, heat 1 inch of oil to 375°.
Fry wings in batch without crowding until golden brown, 10 to 15 minutes.
Drain on paper towels. Brush wings with spicy butter and serve warm, with Blue Cheese Dipping Sauce.
